Strings.String: Our ancestors had a legend about the creation of the world. Would you like to hear it? Then I'm going to need your help!
Together we will find several items that will tell us what happened before time began.
I've learned that in ancient times one of the queens of this land was deceived by an evil priest! The young woman was named Ankhesenamon, and she was the daughter of Nefertiti.
The poor woman's spirit is still under the control of the forces of darkness! We need to set her free and send her to the afterlife!
The mariner was right! The coin you found was a message. The robbers distracted you by stealing the cargo and used the opportunity to kidnap the Chief!
I think the abduction is the Shadow's handiwork! She'll give us a sign soon enough!
I managed to escape Menes's military camp, and I saw a lot of terrible creatures there! He's created an entire army of dangerous animals. They're unlike any foes we've ever encountered before!
An army of animals is more dangerous than an army of men. Animal soldiers know no fear, and they can't be negotiated with… I think we need to turn to the Nagas for help!

With all the wars and battles we frequently forget about life's little joys… I've decided to recreate a certain fragrance of perfume that was lost by our ancestors long ago. Would you care to help me?
If everything works out we'll make perfume worthy of real queens and goddesses!
Our affairs in the City are proceeding as planned. We won another battle against Menes, and all the citizens are happy and content!
However, my power of prophecy has weakened! I sense some kind of danger, but it's as though everything is in a fog… I can't tell the future!
We need to find out what's happening in the City! This must be more of Menes's dirty tricks!
I've never encountered sorcery like this before! Ancient forces of nature with which I am unfamiliar have been put into play!
A certain powerful lord will soon be passing through the region. He has expressed a desire to visit our city!
Our guest must not see what is happening in the City right now. If this news spreads, our envious neighbors might take advantage of our weakness! Let's greet him in a manner befitting his station!
All that's left of my Garden is unhealthy soil. I put so much effort and labor into tending my vegetables, fruit, and grains…
But you've taught me to never give up and to always believe in the best! I'll start it all over, and I'll sow the soil yet again! Can I count on your help?
I had a vision in which I saw one of the pharaohs of antiquity. I asked him why I was worthy of such a visit…
He beckoned for me to approach him, and I saw strange rings on all his fingers. The Pharaoh wanted to tell me something important! I realized that I should tell you about it…
Danger is coming from the sea! We must not allow the enemy to land on the coast. But our ships are meant for trade, not battle… will we be able to stand against them?
We need to build a real warship to defend the City! But I'm afraid we might not have enough time…

I've studied those writings about the last pharaoh that appeared so suddenly. Amrun wanted to put an end to the ruling dynasty, so he abducted the young prince Menetnasht. He was raised by nomads and saw war…

He sailed the seas, traded, and eventually became a priest! That was when he found the Book of Being, which revealed to Menetnasht the secret of his birth! He reclaimed the throne and ruled wisely for many years!
The old scrolls found in the Ancient City tell of a terrible fate that once befell our ancestors… I was able to translate some of it!
Amrun wanted to wipe our people from the face of the Earth with a single blow, so one day he sent us five natural disasters one after another. The sorcerers called this dark magic the Palm of Amrun!
In abandoned mines I hear strange noises, like someone live there. But this no can be; cave-in happen there long ago. I think we should check these cursed places!
I collapse old mines over hundred years ago when ordered by Pharaoh Menetnasht. He say wild, primordial evil live there! Since then I never go there…
I was able to fully translate the writings Nimiru found in Thoth's box. They tell of an inexhaustible source of Life defended by five kinds of guardians!

A representative of one of these kinds of guardians visited us last night, which means the path to the source is now open. All we have to do now is find out whether the other guardians are as friendly…
To ensure that our army has the finest soldiers I've decided to form a squadron in which the soldiers will be trained from an early age! The warrior will take care of it!
Several brave youths from the Sepat have already expressed a desire to join this squadron. All its members will be raised in accordance with the traditions of Montu, the god of war!
Our region will soon be visited by chiefs from all the cities and settlements in the area to negotiate the formation of a powerful alliance against Menes and his troops under the banner of our City!
I have been ordered to prepare the finest drinks and delectations for our guests. Much will depend on the outcome of this meeting. The future of this great alliance is in our hands!

In the desert not far from here I stumbled upon a hidden cave. In it Menes's sorcerers were cross-breeding various species of wild cats for purposes unknown! I told the warrior about this, and we attacked their camp.
The sorcerers fell to the animals' claws. But one of them managed to tell us that these beasts were created for Menes's army. Now they are free and will hunt!

The wild half-lions that have appeared in the City are the wrath of Sekhmet. I'm certain that a terrible time awaits us if we don't soothe the emotions of the goddess! Menes will not fail to take advantage of this.
Last time Sekhmet displayed her wrath these lands were inundated by rivers of human blood. We can't let something like that happen again!
By working together we managed to conduct the ritual, and Bastet has again assumed power over Sekhmet. Now nothing threatens the City, and all dangers are behind us!
After the ritual Bastet appeared before me and told me that Menes used guile to distract her so that his henchmen could awaken her dark essence. This trick almost destroyed us all!
The empress of a certain Eastern land has learned about our City from merchants. She also learned that we are bravely vying with the forces of darkness!
As a sign of her good intentions and support in future battles she sent me a dagger of magnificent steel. I would like to send her a gift in response!
I sense that something strange is happening in the world. All my amulets indicate this. I've been having bizarre dreams, and a two-tailed comet has appeared in the sky. This is a bad omen!

The barrier between our world and the spirit realm has been violated again. People have been seeing strange creatures at night, and this frightens them. We need to find out what's happening before it turns into a disaster!

The heavenly mare driven by the call of the Starry Steppes carried me into the sky. I couldn't understand how I had come to be in the other world, the world of spirits, where there are no humans, only incredible creatures!
There I met the Oracle! He told me that Menes is planning something evil. He has penetrated the spirit realm and wants to bend the ancient demons to his will! The City is in danger…
It's a disaster! For some reason Nimiru didn't tell me anything about a meeting with some prince from across the sea. My daughter has been kidnapped! And there is no such prince…
Menes took on the appearance of a handsome youth and entered our City. He tricked my daughter, then vanished along with her like smoke. What do I do now?
The exits from the city are blocked, so Menes's avenues of escape are cut off. We're intentionally leaving him only one option, which he'll definitely take!
We'll set a trap for Menes and free Nimiru!
The copper ingot you and the miner found in the caves turned out to be of excellent quality. I've studied everything my scrolls have to say about casting!

Ingots always weigh the same. This has solved the problem of constantly having to weigh these metals before trading them for other goods. The technique for casting ingots will improve the city's economy!
The miner was doing a certain job for me when he was attacked. He was looking for an ancient scroll, and it would seem he found it!
If this is the right scroll I will turn our city's medical world upside down!
Sheriti saw some kind of huge beast in the commercial warehouse last night. The girl couldn't describe it in detail, so I don't know what we're dealing with!
Huge wild beasts are our specialty! Let's try to find it before it empties the warehouse and starts hunting people!
Dark people appear in cave. It begin when evil mummy of Horus attack me. I think it servants of Menes!
I try catch thieves, but they nimble. Shadow teach them move fast in darkness.
Everything that exists around man speaks to him, giving him advice and council about past and future events.
I'm about to tell fortunes with clouds. I'd love it if you could join me.
The tradeswoman and I have good news: we've been in love for a long time, but we kept it a secret from everyone.
Our hearts have become one. The time has come for our destinies to be united! Soon we'll become a single family! I can just imagine how happy Sheriti will be!
The gods have revealed a terrible secret to me! The dark soul of a criminal who lived in this area hundreds of years ago has left the next world…
If the soul still hasn't found a way to obtain a body it will be hard for us to find it. And when it does, we won't have much time to return it to the next world!
I could have sworn I saw the deep-waters' pagan temples on the islands. Apparently their culture became deeply intertwined with that of the islanders when those lands were in darkness!
I've got a bad feeling… I don't think all the islanders are happy about the alliance with the city. Some of them probably still worship the deep-waters and will try to interfere!
I've been watching the stars for a long time. A bright new star has risen over our city. And I'd like to know what it foretells!
That star used to rise above our ancestors' lands every hundred years. The priests believed it brought good luck. Well, we'll see if it's true!
The bird you and Sheriti caught is a spawn of shadow magic. We priests call it necromancy. Nowadays the only people who use it are Menes and the old magicians in the desert!
This spawn of the underworld is just the beginning. Some of the townsfolk have already seen other creatures like it! We need to be careful. We have no idea what’s in store for us…

The Shadow, pretending to be a traveling actress from the shadow theater, secretly taught the children the secrets of her trade. The adults never suspected there was a trick behind that harmless game.
We’re in for trouble now than that villainess’s sorcery has taken root. Any shadow in the city could come to life. There could be an enemy in any home…
The knife the old necromancer used to attack the nomad was made of bone. This kind of weapon was used by the savages who used to live around here in ancient times.
Their magicians were the ones who discovered necromancy, and they worshipped the phenomena associated with it. Menes found out how to bring this hateful tribe back to life in order to sic them on us.
They gave you their bow, which will strike down your foes with great accuracy. This weapon’s flame will dispel the darkness and drive the undead warriors out of the city!
I knew help against the shadows and skeletons would come to us, and it did! Our call was answered by the Sunbaked, children of Ra from another world.
The Sunbaked themselves can’t appear in our world. It’s too dangerous for ordinary mortals. Those beings could burn us with their fire, after all.
But they gave us their weapons! And they even promised to send combat animals from their world to the city to help us defeat the Shadow’s army!
Me explore new tunnel, and me really not like it. Me see somebody’s eyes there in darkness. They look right into my soul! Me never been so scared before…
I told you so! My vision is coming true. This tunnel holds forces that are hostile to us. We need to block it up right away. Otherwise disaster will be waiting for the city!
The cat made of ice you and Sheriti found was created using ice magic. I’m somewhat familiar with this kind of sorcery. I’ve put the cat in a pyramid of ice for now.
Creatures like this cat can’t live in regular human conditions. That means it must have come from the Icy Grotto the nomad mentioned!
I think we had the idea to dig the underground tunnel too late. The darkness has already left its lair and set up shop in the city.
We need to stay on our toes now! We have no idea what kind of shape evil will assume this time. My visions never lie, but every future can be changed…
I’ve been saying for a long time now that a great power sleeps within Sheriti! She solved the conundrum I’ve been racking my brains about all this time. I think we’re saved!

The darkness covering the city is the bad thoughts of most of the people who live in it. But the children haven’t forgotten how to be happy. They can dispel the darkness in two shakes of a lamb’s tail. Sheriti has already proved it!
I spent a lot of time studying the curse that has struck our city, and I can say that driving the darkness from our streets won’t be enough. We need to destroy the very source of the evil…
He’s still hiding right where he was imprisoned for all those centuries: in a cave the miner found. And I know how to strike him right in the heart!
We can make short work of them with our picks now. My group is breaking them up, boulder by boulder. As soon as we finish all our work, the ship will be able to set sail.
Through our combined efforts, we’ll finish this work pretty quickly.
It’s a good thing the nomad and I took a look at the items and papers from the ship’s hold.
It’s only thanks to them that I was able to create an antidote and stop the epidemic threatening the entire city.
I’m glad there were no casualties and that you succeeded, my daughter. What can you tell us about those who owned the ship before us?
Oh, I think our predecessors were able to somehow protect themselves from the epidemic, and enchanted the ship.
Also, from what we can tell, the people who built the ship had a deep knowledge of many subjects. They were more developed than us in every respect.
Well, if their knowledge helps us to progress, we should study their culture more deeply. All these strange items could make our life a good deal easier.
And we may even be able to discover the nature and purpose of that strange building towering in the North.
Judging by the scroll we found, the ghost was the ship’s captain.
It seems he was the only one to stay aboard during the shipwreck. He was able to place his soul inside a crystal to leave a message for future generations.
So what do we know now about the Ship? Can we bring it into good order and take it out onto the water again?
I think so, yes. It’s just a question of time now. The nomad is handling it, and it looks like things are moving forward.
That’s great! I’ll personally go see the workers and offer them any help they might need.
While you’re busy with the repairs, I have a little time to figure out how the ancients used the items we found to control the ship.
Thanks to this ship, I think we’ll soon have far more citizens in our city.
What has Menes done?! We must work to remove this curse as quickly as possible!
What are we to do…?
Menes' mind is poisoned! I told you daughter… the man you knew is lost. We must turn our attention back to helping our citizens.
It seems Nomad has found something of interest by the Nile. Let us hope it's a key to removing Menes' curse…
O great chief and finest Nimiru, I have brought you to the river bank to show you something that emerged from the fog today at dawn.
My Chief… I found debris in the river. I thought it was from a building, but now I see it's the remains of an ancient ship.
I think its former owners suffered some sort of misfortune, because the ship is covered by giant boulders.
We should inspect the ship and try to repair it. Nomad, you take care of it – I place you in charge of the affair.
Who would have abandoned a ship on our shores? Could this vessel could be connected to the ancient building in the north…?
Hmm… this vessel is already providing more questions than answers.
We will invesigate at once. This ship could hold the secrets to removing Menes' curse. You're in charge, Nomad.
The guardian of the pharaoh Menetnasht was sealed inside the lamp, and the spell of the bracelets is now broken. That means the way into the treasure trove is open!
The pharaoh possessed enormous riches, and now they belong to the city. But we have to be careful – Menes is a son of Menetnasht, and he wants his father’s treasure back…
News from the warrior’s scouts – there’s a traitor among the citizens. He’s reporting on life in the city to our enemy – Menes!
By our latest information, this spy has collected some more intelligence and gone off to his master with a report. We need to catch up to him, before he crosses the desert!
I feel Bastet trying to communicate with me…
So long did I languish imprisoned that the people of these lands have forgotten me. The gods are strong when people know and honor them. Help them remember me once more.
The chief is awaiting the arrival of some noble lady. He wants to make a good impression on her, and he asked me to make her something sweet…
It seems this lady is not indifferent to our chief. Well, let’s try giving this stranger a real treat – I’ll make her my best raspberry pie. She won’t be able to resist it!
Our neighbors lost their crops after the hurricane. They’ve asked us to send them some seeds, farming tools and a good expert. This is a job for the farmer!
Ah, I have a lot of work to do in the city. But there’s no helping that, I’ll have to go. I’m going to need some help to gather up everything our neighbors need!
I’ve often survived in the wilderness thanks to the knowledge of my tribe’s hunters. They taught me the ways of the tracker and explained how to live in harmony with mother nature!
I want to share this knowledge with you. After all, we’ve been close friends for a long time, and traveled many roads together. Who knows what else awaits us ahead..?
A long-awaited guest has finally come to the city – the Eastern Empress! She and her entire retinue are already walking to the feast hall to celebrate her arrival in our lands!
I’m sure the feast will go great! It’s all in your hands, and everyone knows their job perfectly. Let’s show our guests what kind of celebration we’ve prepared for them. Get to work!
I haven’t seen the Lady in a long time. She hasn’t been going outside, and the potter’s seemed somehow anxious recently. Has some sort of misfortune struck their family?
I was wrong! It’s no misfortune – on the contrary, true joy has come to the home of the Lady and the potter. Soon they’ll be parents, and the city will have a new citizen!
My soldiers have been searching for the Shadow and her new thugs! These assassins are heartless and very elusive. Their methods of doing battle aren’t like ours. They fight like cowards…
It’s true – the Shadow’s people use poisoned weapons and move without leaving a trace. Even my skills as a tracker are useless in the hunt for them. We have to be careful!
In my absence, the flock lost a sheep. I can’t leave anything to you people! I knew this would happen. At least the barn is still standing. Where are we to look for that poor sheep now?
Why are you panicking, farmer? We’ll find your lost sheep. Have you heard the legend of the wandering shepherd? He helps everyone. He’ll help us too, you’ll see!
The situation with the robbery looks odd. I knew that the baker was capable of thievery. But then who did the witnesses see at the scene of the crime?
It might have been one of the Shadow’s minions. Some of them can change their form and pretend to be one of the city’s residents. There’s a lot we don’t know about our enemies!
But I know how to reveal some of the Guild of Shadows’ secrets while their poison still courses through my veins. I’m going to need some help!
The situation with the robbery looks odd. I knew that the baker was incapable of thievery. But then who did the witnesses see at the scene of the crime?
My father and I learned many secrets about the Guild of Shadows and got to its very top – its Masters. But the Shadow decided to interfere…
She activated the poison in father’s blood and he lost consciousness again. I haven’t managed to gather the ingredients for an antidote yet. I’ll need your help, and there’s no time to waste!
I’m amazed – the papyrus mill was built on top of an ancient temple of the god Ra. I’m sure there must be much secret knowledge hidden inside.

While you were searching for the temple, I had a vision! A falcon emerged from the sand in the night. It launched into the sky and turned into the sun. And its rays sundered the darkness over the world!
The theft of my diary revealed that the Shadow’s servants have gotten too close to us. It’s time to work out a plan to finally destroy their guild!
I have a crazy idea! Since we can’t defeat the Guild of Shadows from the outside, we’re going to have to do it from the inside.
The Shadow will search for new allies now, but no longer among street pickpockets – it’ll be dyed-in-the-wool bandits this time. And I have just the one in mind!
We’re in luck – the Guild of Shadows seems to have believed that you’re a bandit by the name of Bloody Scorpion. They’re willing to let you complete their rite of initiation!
I also managed to earn the trust of one of the Masters of the Shadow and become his personal informant. I’ll help you!
You’ve completed five of the Guild’s main trials. You’re a candidate for the title of Master of the Shadow and already possess some of the abilities of our enemies!
To defeat the Guild of Shadows from within, we must study all the abilities you’ve learned from them and create a weapon capable of striking the Shadow at its very heart!
In the meantime, go and complete the final trial – meeting the Shadow! But don’t forget, there is light even in the darkest places – it is within you!
I keep having the same nightmare over and over again. But when I wake up, I can’t remember it!
You can help me see my dream from beginning to end if you make your way into it using the abilities of the Path of the Shadow.
I can’t watch this dream any longer… I considered my mother a traitor and couldn’t forgive her for becoming a priestess of Amrun!
All these years, she pretended to be a servant of the demon only to study the enemy. All this time she remained true to the sun god Ra!
During the ritual, the Shadow – the dark essence of my mother – didn’t expect to meet with resistance!
Based on the notes of the Ancients and the information collected about the weaknesses of the Guild of Shadows, I’ve developed a secret weapon. But I can’t promise it’ll work…
These plans are all we have. We have to take a risk and use the weapon before Menes gives Shadow the signal to use the Eclipse!
Menes clearly doesn’t want us to find out what hides in the dark grottos of the cave. Something strange has been going on there recently!
I deciphered a message from the captain of the ship. It says that after the shipwreck, the surviving Ancients headed for the cave. We simply must get into it!
Me not understand what happen with my head, but me remember being in this underground place before. Me sure me remember!
The ship was wrecked on the shores of the Great River around a century ago. Precisely when the miner was sealed underground and when Amrun took control of these lands…
In fleeing the illness that struck the Ancients on the ship, they might have hidden underground and met the miner there. But why didn’t he remember it until now?
I don’t know what hides behind the labyrinth of traps, but this dark mouth of a corridor scares me. I feel some animosity hiding there in the depths, something with a hatred for all life!
I had a vision in which we all climbed down to the very bottom of the world and were swallowed up by an underground fire. But then the flame went out and we were all alive and well again!
I hope your prophecies are true, and that the flame won’t burn us to cinders!

The mist has cleared on the other side of the river and the ruins of the Pyramid can be seen. This mythical building was made by the Ancients themselves. The servants of Menes had once razed it to its foundations!
If we want to defeat the dark priest and remove the curse we must restore the Pyramid. I am sure that inside we will find out how to release the Gods from their imprisonment!
The construction of the Pyramid has begun. However, the search for the monster that lived in the ruins continues. I became interested where he was hiding all this time…
It turns out that Menes only destroyed the top of the Pyramid. Most of it is intact under the ground. Who knows what else may be hidden in its corridors!

As we follow the tracks of the Ancients we get closer and closer to solving the riddle of these people. We have managed to restore the ruined Gates and bring them back to life. However, we still haven’t learned how to use them!
In my dreams, I found myself inside the Pyramid, trying to find an exit. I only found a locked metal door. I think that we will find the answers we need behind it!
It is time to restore the statue of the Great Sphinx! We spent many a year looking for any information we could get about this mysterious creature and we finally found something out.
Once upon a time, our ancestors considered the Sphinx to be the defender of the people, so they put up a statue to him. However, it is still difficult to tell whether this creature really existed.
When we restore the Sphinx statue, the spirit of this incredible creature shall return to our lands again. It will bring us luck and defend the City.
As soon as we restore the Sphinx statue, the spirit of this incredible creature shall return to our lands again. It will bring us luck and defend the city.
As they await the return of the Sphinx, the people have been in high spirits and they bring valuable gifts to the foot of the statue. Hope has returned to the City and that is a good sign!
Thanks to you, my idol has appeared in the city! Its power has helped me to break into the human world from the Great Emptiness, where the other gods remain exiled.
If we build the other idols of the gods as well, we’ll be able to free their spirits from their imprisonment too. In the battle against Menes, we’ll need Thoth's Wisdom. Let’s start from there!
Thoth’s greatest achievement was the creation of the calendar. He held power over time itself and knew how to help people solve the problems of the Great River’s flow and ebb.
Thoth won five extra days of the year while playing dice with the other gods. He called them by his opponents’ names and put them into his calendar, which he gave to humans.
Thoth’s might has returned to the human world, and we’ve seen it for ourselves. It’s time to start building the next totem. It will give power to my close comrade!
We must help the god Bes to improve in strength. Although outwardly we differ from each other, we have a single cause. Bes will be a loyal ally for the citizens!
According to legend, Bes wasn’t always a protector of our homes and families. When most of the gods lived here among the people, he dwelt in other lands!
Far away, in the jungle, Bes sought out a tribe of little people that he loved very much. He became their protector and taught them to bravely face down the dangers of the big wide world!
The forces of darkness feel the awakening of the old gods. Menes has already tried more than once to summon servants from the underworld to his aid. We need help!
The only one who can harness these powers is the ruler of the beyond – Anubis! It’s time to summon his might into the human world and defend it!
A disaster has struck! While we were in the underworld, a few evil spirits were following us. They followed after our boat and fled Duat!
These escapees are incarnations of the most monstrous human vices. If we don’t get them back to the underworld, they’ll take over the minds of the citizens and then all is lost!
Strength and valor aren’t the only important things in the fight against the forces of evil. We can’t forget such qualities as wisdom and cunning. And I know someone who possesses them both.
If we build a symbol of Isis, then we can count on her support. This goddess was the best among us. A caring mother, a cunning strategist and a mighty sorceress!
Isis was a kind-hearted goddess. She believed that everyone who makes a mistake should have a chance to correct it. With this aim in mind, the magical chronometer was created!
Thanks to this artifact, it was as though humanity had received the ability to alter its future. After the gods were betrayed, the chronometer disappeared. But we’re sure to find it again!
I had a dream in which I saw the Potter with someone who was the spitting image of him. Together, they were collecting clay in a canyon…
Then the clay began to swallow up the stranger. The Potter tried to drag his twin out of its clingy grasp, but was unable. Then the vision ended!
So that's where my brother was all these years – imprisoned by Menes. But why did the dark priest need the sculptor?
He might have been doing some sort of work for Menes, but what sort, and where is he now? I won't find any peace until I find out! Will you help me?
The Hermit fought with Menes's priests, who were performing dark magic. Once, they created dangerous monsters out of animals.
The priests used these creatures as weapons against the townsfolk. But it seems that their experiments didn't stop there!
The ghost of my former husband came to me in the night. He asked me to go with him to the desert.
Ghosts visit only the people they loved dearly. I think your husband wanted to tell you something important. Go after him!
More and more, I see in my dreams those distant times when the people of this land were split into barbarian tribes. But my visions are often unclear.
If we try to go into a trance together, then perhaps we'll be able to have a shared vision. And it might shed light on some of the events of the past!
My scouts have seen squads of Menes’s warriors in the places where the Hermit lived. The enemy must be searching for the dark priests’ artifacts!
We must immediately attack the enemy squads. I have summoned our allies from the south to aid us. They’ve wanted to settle the score with Menes’s troops for a long time!
I had a terrible vision – in the depths of the ocean, the Many-Armed God awoke. That's what the deepwater denizens call their lord – a gigantic octopus.
This cruel ancient creature emerged from the water onto dry land and destroyed the entire city. I really hope it was all just a dream!
Do you remember me telling you about my beloved Jasmine? She disappeared on the day my village was attacked by hordes of the deepwater folk.
All this time I thought that my beloved was no longer among the living, but now I feel that she somehow managed to survive.
The Mariner's sickness and the forays of the deepwater folk to the surface frighten me. We must take measures. I have an idea!
I found an old text of the Ancients which talks about how to build an underwater vessel. Let's make one and scout the bottom of the ocean!
I’ve felt terrible recently. It’s all because of the magical tattoos that the servants of the deepwater folk gave me.
They burn my arms – the pain is unbearable!
Many unpleasant-looking vagabonds have appeared in the brewery recently. They keep gathering in dark corners and whispering about something!
Yes, I too noticed that many unfamiliar sailors have appeared at the port. They take work on various ships and look suspicious!
You and I and a few brave sailors will crew the underwater vessel. There’s nothing to be afraid of, we can do it!
We will finally delve into the secrets of the deepwater folk!
The pirate fleet is destroyed, and many ships have sunk with all their cargo. The sea is still carrying the items remaining from the battle onto the shore.
Walk along the shoreline and see if any of the items could come in handy. Many useful things can be found on the pirate ships.
Our scouts have reported that the pirate fleet has left its secret bay and is headed for the city.
We didn’t notice the enemy building their plans under our very nose, and now all that remains is to accept the battle.
The Empress has brought the city many exotic animals from her country. But the servants accidentally opened the cages and all the creatures ran off…
We need to hurry and catch those poor animals before something happens to them. They must be scared and upset!
The Eastern Empress has arrived in the city and wants to stay with us a while. We must do all we can to make her stay comfortable.
You will help the Lady keep our guest’s baggage safe. The Empress has brought many things with her, it’s hard for one person to keep track of it all…
My beloved wife has always dreamed of getting a jade vine as a gift. But this beautiful flower is almost impossible to get…
It grows high in the mountains on the very steepest slopes. Climbing for it is very dangerous, but I think I'm going to risk it! Let's go!
I’m seeing visions from the past again, but I can’t tell where I am in them. They’re some kind of magnificent and beautiful cities!
It seems it was the time of the pharaohs’ rule. Back then, all citizens were separated into certain classes – it was the Golden Age!
Unusual phenomena are constantly occurring in the sky, as if the border between worlds has weakened and is just about to tear…
It seems our gods have summoned up some strength in their exile and want to give us a sign. We must be attentive!
Guests from the north are arriving in the city. We’ve been negotiating an alliance with them for some time, but this time it seems we will finally sign a treaty to make it official!
The northerners are a very quick-tempered and unpredictable folk. Keep an eye on them and make sure their stay in the city passes peacefully!
The master's philosopher's stone turned out to be short-lived. Over time, its structure degraded and its dust spread throughout the city…
But people noticed that wherever it landed, miracles happened! Let's go and see!
I found an old and very long scroll on the shelves called the Great Grimoire.
It contains many secret recipes, and one of them is described as the philosopher’s stone. What do you think, should we try it?
Before his disappearance, the mage that lived in the catacombs created a formula for an elixir of immortality. But he was never able to brew it.
The mage was most likely defeated by Menes, though he did manage to hide the formula. I found it, and now I intend to create the magical elixir!
I got my hands on a certain interesting scroll that says that during Menes’s rule, a powerful mage appeared in these lands.
The only thing known about him is that he was an enemy of Menes and stood out in opposition to him many times until he disappeared…
Long time, no see! Although the guards captured most of my followers, it’s nothing to be concerned about.
The Cult of Amrun is spreading throughout the city, and its power grows every day.
Do you know anything about the followers of Amrun? Some of those vagrants are my students.
According to those vagrants, Amrun is a creature of light who brings peace. And we’re the villains getting in his way!
Just as I suspected, the townspeople's bad luck aren’t connected to the curse.
Superstition often clouds our minds and hearts, preventing us from thinking logically.
Thanks to superstition, some citizens have lost their common sense!
Some failed to heed Nimiru, and now they’re talking about the Pharaohs' vengeance!
The customers at the brewery say that a monster appeared in the city, and that it drinks the blood of the townspeople at night…
You hear all kinds of stories at the brewery… but I can't get this one out of my head.
The townspeople have been prisoners of superstition for so long that their hearts embrace terror!
To further shake the citizens’ faith, I will release Nub-It – a greedy follower of the exiled gods and my servant!
Our scouts tell us that a caravan of refugees is coming to the city. We need to help our neighbors!
Looks like these are victims of Menes' evil plots!
The refugees say that on the way here, an old man approached the caravan, but he’s disappeared…
We must find the old man and ask where he came from!
Do you know anything about Chocolate Day? In some distant countries, they celebrate it every year!
The Nomad told me that on this day, people make unusual dishes from cocoa beans. As I recall, he brought a few recipes back with him.
Let's celebrate Chocolate Day in our city too! Together we'll make something delicious from these outlandish cocoa beans!
Hi! You can't imagine how glad I am to see you! Parents' Day is just around the corner, but I still don't have a gift for mom.
I happened to hear some townspeople talking about an unusual portal that appears on our island from time to time.
Please help me! Mom won't let me go so far away… But I'm sure I can find the very best gift for her there!
There are many women in our city that would be glad to share the secrets of their beauty with each other!
What if we hold a yearly celebration to give them the opportunity?
That's a good idea, but I'm afraid one day per year won't be enough. What if we make it a monthly event..?
Vile Nub-It has used dark magic to create himself an entourage of ghosts, given life in the bodies of cats.
But I will not allow their presence in the city, especially in their corrupted cat form!
There is no doubt that it was Menes’s magic that brought Nub-It back from the grave.
And I have already read a thing or two in the old scrolls about our enemy’s weaknesses. Nub-It has already become weaker by losing his entourage. Now all we have to do is track him down!
It seems that before the Dark Times of Menes’s rule arrived, the townspeople wore entirely different clothing.
I’ve decided to find everyone in the city who might still have some clothing from that age. It’s like an entire gold mine of history!
Me think me bring disaster to city. Me cut path into mysterious cave where beasts of huge size once live.
Creatures break free. We need catch them before they destroy city!
Followers of the cult of Amrun are roaming the streets and painting the maxims of their master on the walls of homes. We need to put a stop to this at once!
We’re going to search all suspicious citizens and try to find clues and interrogate these lawbreakers.
There are still symbols left on some of the city streets, drawn by the servants of Amrun. We must uncover their secret!
I sense that these symbols hide clues about the true nature of our enemy!
The old manuscripts say that it wasn’t just the Ancients that visited our world – other Stellar Wanderers did as well.
Some of those creatures left unusual artifacts in our lands. We must find and study them!
Many of our ancestors had the chance to meet the Stellar Wanderers face to face. We have much evidence of that…
Thanks to the ancient figurines of clay and metal, we can learn how the visitors to our world looked when they came to us from the depths of the Celestial Ocean!
Halloween is drawing near, and we're planning to have a great time. Are you with us?
Then hurry up. We need to be well prepared!
The citizens are complaining that some strange creature has been getting into their homes and causing chaos!
We have to find out what it is! The creature might be one of Menes's servants!
In my homeland, these creatures are called brownies! They're harmless to people, but they can be mischievous.
If a brownie is kept well fed with tasty food, he even tries to help the citizens!
Something strange is happening. I feel that some mighty creative force has awakened in the bowels of the earth!
There is so much energy that it is capable of creating new life! Do you feel how it permeates all around us?
My time has come! I've waited long for the Crystal of Creation to awaken and show itself!
Now there is nobody from this world capable of stopping me! This is the beginning of the end!
Thanksgiving Day approaches. We still have enough time to prepare something special.
I've noticed that some strange animals have appeared in the city. The scrolls make no mention of these odd creatures…
It seems they arrived after treacherous Menes had corrupted the Crystal of Creation and turned it into the Heart of Darkness!
The Heart of Darkness is the largest of the purple crystals that I was able to create! Its power is limitless!
Soon you will feel my power grow! I'll destroy this city if its people refuse to bow before me and the overlord Amrun!
I've learned that Menes has some terrible sorcery planned. He stole all the images of the gods from the temples' walls and turned them into shades!
The creatures are now roaming the city and frightening our people. If we don't capture them, the townsfolk will lose faith in the gods forever…
You may have managed to dispel the shades of my deceptive gods, but you won't succeed in returning their images to the temples' walls!
The people will soon forget what the old gods looked like and lose faith in them forever. Then my overlord Amrun and I will usurp the dead gods' authority!
Distant lands will soon start celebrating Christmas.
We want to celebrate the holiday too! Let's make decorations and treats and have a good time!
Our tribe has kept cattle for a long time, and I know a lot about it… Let’s search for a suitable place to build a Farm.
Soon we'll celebrate Valentine's Day. It's a great occasion to give some nice gifts to your friends and loved ones.
We need to get ready! Will you help us?
Soon we'll celebrate Valentine's Day, a great occasion to give some nice gifts to your friends and loved ones.
We need to get ready! Will you help us?
I heard that there would be a beauty salon in the city. Oh, I will come here every day! Perfumes, blushers, and lipsticks! Everything a girl could dream of!
What do you mean that the Beauty salon won't open until there's no one to work here? I guess this place won't do without me.
Time to restore the Forge. The city needs the help of a good master!
My father once taught me blacksmithing. I'll be glad to refresh my old skills and learn something new!
I bought this book from a traveling merchant. It's called "Traditions and Lore." It is a collection of all superstitions and beliefs.
Little fortune won't do us any harm!
The kids and I have decided to create a pets' corner. We'll keep various animals in it and children will take care of them.
Let's get everything ready right away!
The townsfolk need to be in good shape if they want to fight off an enemy attack!
Today I'm going to start training the new recruits!
Every person has their own favorite things that make life brighter and better.
We are all different; there are no two identical people in the world! And we all like different things and pastimes.
We sometimes find interesting objects in the ground.
By studying them, we can learn a lot about people from ancient times!
Everybody likes to look beautiful, but sometimes we forget that beauty isn't just a gift from Heaven. Being beautiful means taking care of yourself.
There are plenty of beauty secrets to learn. The best ones are those that also help to keep your body healthy.
A collection is a group of items that all share some characteristic. Assembling collections is educational and fun!
I'm going to collect something too!
Each of us are experts in our field, but we are always learning, expanding our knowledge, and gaining new skills.
Learning something new is so interesting!
I want to organize a holiday meal for my friends! The main thing is to have a good plan and convenient utensils. Do I have everything I need for cooking?
I don't doubt my friends will be happy with my cooking!
Hurray! I've finished all my jobs for the day! Now I can rest. What could I do for fun?
Fishing? Definitely fun. You never know what you might hook…
Exercise can strengthen my body. But a strong body is nothing without a strong spirit. And the spirit is strengthened by perceiving beauty.
I really liked the latest theater performance. And they showed off a certain interesting idea…
I want to tell you an instructive story. My grandpa told it to my father when he was no taller than a boot.
The moral of the story is this: it doesn't matter how big you are or how strong, the key is to have a big heart.
For me personally, the most important thing in people is how they keep their promises. Listen to an old parable.
I've wanted to decorate my house with some wood carving for a long time. It's time to get down to business.
First of all, I am missing the necessary tools.
The citizens need more flour every day, but the windmill is still incomplete.
Our city must not be threatened by hunger.
We've got lots of sand left after the construction. I'm trying to think where we could use it.
With a bit of patience, simple sand will turn into a real piece of art!
The tall city walls won't be able to protect us from all enemy attacks. We need to come up with something better.
Even the most powerful opponent should be able to appreciate our military might.
Our land is abundant with all kinds of wood species. It's strange that we are not selling any lumber to our neighbors.
I'll try to assemble a caravan. I'm sure we'll make a lot of profit from selling wood.
This year's harvest has exceeded all expectations. It's imperative to begin processing the crops right away!
I'm sure this food will last us a long time.
It's time we unravel the mysteries of paint making. Let's begin the lessons then.
I hope my lessons will prove to be helpful, and I'll be able to teach others a lot of interesting things.
A glass mug or vase will always please the eye if they have been made by a really skilled craftsman. It would be nice to master the art of glassblowing.
I'm sure I won't leave anyone disappointed with the lessons.
A big cobra has settled in my garden. I thought of calling you to chase it off… but then I got some unexpected help!
A huge beautiful bird landed and, believe it or not, ate the cobra!
We use all kinds of livestock. Maybe those birds could be put to work? They could protect us from snakes!
I had a dream that I was flying over our city on some sort of strange device. It was wonderful! All the buildings looked like little toys…
Now I really want to feel that in reality, not just in my dream! I want to fly over the city again and see everything spread out before me!
At first, I thought I was dreaming the noise, but someone is wandering in the jungle behind the Apiary. Sounds more like an animal than a person.
Yesterday I tried to follow the newcomer, but in vain! The undergrowth is so thick! I made as much noise as an apprentice hunter, and scared the creature off.
You chose a great place for the zoo! Before the city was destroyed, there were farms there. Then various wild animals settled in the ruins.
This is a convenient watering place, so the animals keep the peace there. I saw it for myself – zebras and lions drinking water side by side! Perfect for the zoo!
We need to choose a zookeeper. I travel too often to take the job on. Let's ask the townspeople – everyone can help us fit the place out!
You can't imagine how glad I am that we have a Confectionery now! Working in it will let me fulfill my longtime dream of becoming an artist!
You know, my dad was a jeweler. A real craftsman! But I've been allergic to stone dust since I was a child, so I could never follow in his footsteps.
Now… Now you'll see what true culinary art is! I just need to pick out some good tools.
The spinnery isn’t just a place where you can create cloth. I’ll reveal you a secret from my past.
Long ago, I was a priestess of the goddess Shentayet, the patron of all weavers. In fact, I remember more about the weaving machines than the rituals.
Weaving is serving the goddess. To become a sacred priestess, you must adopt the six main lessons of Shentayet. Or seven..? Let me remember…
We did a splendid job today! Now we can go home and relax.
For me, fishing is more than just catching fish. It's an activity for the soul. And it's the best kind of relaxation!
Have you not been to my house yet? Then I'd like to invite you over! Let's go. I'll introduce you to my fishing gear.
In truth, housekeeping is not my cup of tea. But what I can do is cook fish well.
A fisherman is no fisherman if he can't work with what he catches. I have everything I need at home to treat you to the most delicious carp!
Honey, I was thinking and decided that we should turn our house from a plain dwelling into a real home.
What's wrong with our current house? There is a place to eat and sleep. I do my work in the workshop.
Men! The inside of the house should be pretty. And more importantly, cozy!
I was fishing by the lower reaches of the Nile and caught this wondrous and enormous fish. I think it swam into the river from the sea.
And it had somehow managed to swallow a bottle with a note! Let's see what news this unusual messenger of the sea has got for me.
A full moon is drawing near, and that's a good time for all kinds of magic.
No, no, I'm not talking about our fight against Menes, even though that's very important to us. I'm referring to your regular home magic that every housewife is so familiar with.
There are hundreds of little tricks that mothers teach their daughters. I will share with you what I once learnt.
It's fun to loaf around. But it's a lot more fun to loaf around playing games with others! Who should I play with? Hey, Miner, wait up!
I wait! What you want? Let's play game! But we play in the shade. Stand here is not very comfortable.
You're right. The shade is just what we need. So, what game shall we play?
A solar eclipse will take place soon! It's a time when the Sun meets the Moon. We must prepare ourselves for this day! Father, will you help me?
Of course, Nimiru! I am the chief, after all. The Sun is my long-time friend and patron!
I know that the Moon energy is something more related to women, but still, I am a hunter. And it is the Moon that is teaching me to hear Mother Nature. I would like to help you as well.
Look – what's that creature in the puddle? Oh, it looked like a little fish… And it just turned into a starfish while I was holding it in my hands!
It appears to be some kind of water spirit. And now it looks like a frog! What should I do with it?
I think it's sick. Well, of course it is! This creature must be in water!
Nomad, my friend! Could you please take the kids out on a camping trip for a couple of days? That way I will have time to clean everything in peace!
A desert is surrounding us. It's a dangerous place! It's not suitable for carefree walks with children.
Perfect! You'll teach them the basics of surviving in the desert! Like what you should take with you, and all that. Please! Who can handle this task better than you?
Children! What is going on here?! Are you fighting again? Don't you have anything better to do?!
Perhaps you really don't. I remember when I was a boy, my friends and I spent days in a house on a tree!
And my sisters and I wove such pretty wreaths… Follow me, girls, and I'll show you how it's done. Honey, you will find something for the boys to do, won't you?
We can't talk shop forever, can we? Let's show Menes that we can relax and have fun no matter how much he is trying to scare us!
We need a theater for that! Our city used to have a stage where various actors and musicians performed. The time has come to restore it all.
Mistress Nimiru, I absolutely love theater. Please allow me to organize everything necessary.
There is still a lot that needs to be done for our theater. I will try to get other citizens involved in the process.
Our theater will require various paper articles such as tickets, posters, and other items. I think the Master of the papyrus mill will help us make those!
We will also need an orchestra. Who among our citizens is well versed in music?
Have you heard the story of the Bennu bird? Or the dangerous Sak? Or maybe I should remind you why we all fear the great serpent, Apophis?
Sit and listen! It's time I tell you stories about the monsters and gods that once inhabited this world.
The chief told us stories about various monsters of myth, but in the real world there are many unusual creatures.
I made it my mission to find the smallest bird in the world, and in my search, I saw many miracles.
And I once saw a bird with colors so bright, it seems that a rainbow had learned to fly!
A woman should take care of her home to make sure it's a place of peace and comfort.
For example, I plant different indoor plants. And each flower, in its own way, protects my home from trouble.
And of course, sweet halvah ensures a very sweet family life. I have a whole story about halvah! Of course, it's a romantic one.
Today I walked around the City and met so many expectant mothers! It was great to know we have a safe and full life.
We can gather in a special Temple with all the goddesses who bless mothers. There, the future moms will find help and support.
I will teach all the women of the City to cook a wonderful dish, one perfect for celebrating the birth of a baby!
I never thought you’d have the patience to go so far.
It looks like I’ll have to take part again.
We have found records that show that one of the Golden Runes is hidden in the Cave grottoes.
We have found records that show that one of the Golden Runes is hidden on an island in the ocean.
We still don’t know where to start searching.
We found some notes that imply that one of the stones is hidden on an island in the ocean.
(не используется)
To make the harvest rich, you need to water your crops. Let's do it!
This is a suitable place for the Garden! [1]Let's start building![1]
Press [1]Build[1] to begin construction.
Alas, it's time for me to continue my journey. Next time I'll return with new levels. See you soon!
Amrun lured the gods into the Lower World and destroyed the gate leading to it. Enslaving the people, he gained dominion over all those lands.
We were able to awaken the gate! Let's use the gate key and try to reach the ear of the great goddess Bastet!
(место для подстановки)
Your hopes are in vain. All attempts to find out my secrets will fail.
You can’t control the power of the Gate as it was not part of my plans.
You need energy to collect resources. Let me show you how to refill your energy.
Do you know what's more expensive than the gold in the desert? Water, of course! It's your energy source. Follow me, I'll show you where it is!
Here you can refill your water containers. Get as much as you can… No one knows what lies ahead…
A drop of fresh water will restore your strength instantly.
The sun is very hot. You're thirsty? Luckily, we have water supplies. I'll show you where.
A drop of fresh water will restore your strength instantly.
Прежде, чем начать праздник, мы должны исполнить один древний обычай.
Now that we have gathered the fruit, let’s see what else we’ve collected…
В нашем племени хранится древняя Книга Жизни. Говорят, когда-то она обладала большой силой, но уже давно никто не знает, как ей пользоваться..
Во время каждого праздника, принято выносить Книгу на площадь и прочитывать над ней благодарственные гимны Древних. Давай исполним этот древний ритуал!
By completing the collection, you've earned the final item, as well as a reward!
For the collection you assembled, you [1]got the item[1] "First Harvest" and a bonus and a spell as [2]a reward[2]! You can get various rewards for collections.
Something fun is being planned without me again. No holiday for you this time! Meet your guests. Hahaha!
The city's residents have been preparing for the holiday, but Menes has sent his servants to ruin it!
There are no events right now, but very soon the Island will activate again! Check the Island later.
Island of Adventure
I'm sick of this masquerade! No holiday for you! Hahaha!
The city's residents have been preparing for the autumn holiday, but Menes has sent his servants to ruin it!

Hurray! Trophy unlocked!

Ends in:
You have unlocked an achievement:
Event ends in:

The warrior was gone from the city for so long, and finally he has returned. His mind is weak, and his body covered with wounds. He barely managed to eat a little before falling off his chair unconscious.
His unauthorized departure from the city could have brought danger upon all of us. It was a thoughtless decision. Our soldiers were without their leader, and our citizens without protection.
I agree that he acted rashly in not warning us of his intentions, but I believe he was able to find some important information about our enemies.
The warrior is getting better, which means he'll soon be able to tell us what he managed to see, and who gave him such grievous wounds.
I feel that something bad is coming! I'm an old soldier, and I've been in many battles. The gods won't let me lie – soon we will be subject to an attack from Menes…
Do you think the ancient words you found and your newly allied naga will help you to overcome me? This land was cursed many centuries ago!
Do you truly still not understand that in these lands, each grain of sand is imbued with Amrun's dark magic? And each living beast bows only to me! I'll gladly prove it to you…
What have you done, father!? Why did you attack the naga? They may have wronged us, but not of their own will. The naga were simply a weapon in Menes's hands! They wanted peace!

These creatures are not people, my daughter – they are the spawn of shadow and they betrayed us! I will not stand having enemies so close to our city. My primary responsibility is to protect our people!
The naga may look different, but they are no worse than us. I might have proved that, but now… Now you have done a truly evil thing! How are you any different from Menes..?
I've realized one important thing. Aggressively fighting against Menes won't lead us to victory. With open resistance, all we create is more evil.
To oppose our enemy, we must throw all our strength into studying the history of our ancestors. I'm sure that we can find answers to many questions there!
We found one of the main crowns of the pharaohs – the Pschent crown. This is an important find for our city. We all thought that Menes had the crowns, but it seems we were wrong!
The one who possesses the crowns of our ancient rulers will become the true lord of these lands along the entire Nile!
Emissaries are coming from across the sea. They've heard much about our city from traders, and now they want to see it with their own eyes.
Such guests are a great honor for our city! There'll be a big celebration where the chief will sign an alliance treaty with them!
The warrior can't seem to remember what happened to him on his travels before the naga attacked him. He's going to need your help. We need to restore the chain of events.
His memories are important! They might shed some light on what Menes is planning against us.
You know, I lost my treasures. I think the wicked Shadow crept into my house and stole them.
Could you help me find them? Please! Stealing from little children is wrong…
The amber jewelry I made for myself is starting to work, I think! The potter started paying attention to me again. He's always nearby.
I think my husband has some kind of surprise in store for me!
I know that you and the miner have found new veins of coal and iron. Now we'll solve our fuel problems and make many weapons and tools for the city!
You're truly a blessing for us. You always seem to do whatever you set out to do! Thank you for helping us!
I had a terrible vision! I saw Menes appear in the desert. He struck his staff into the sand and a smoking fissure appeared. Out of the fissure crawled hordes of hissing snakes…
Menes has another evil plan in motion! We have to be on guard, otherwise he'll catch us unawares!
You and the nomad have found an unusual thing. This is the belt of Tutankhamun, one of the great pharaohs of ancestral times. If I'm not mistaken, this ancient part of the city was once his palace.
In that case, we'll find many more unusual discoveries very soon!
I thought everyone has their own professional holidays, but I don't. Why don't I start my own holiday? Baker's Day!
I think that's a good idea! I'll bake many pies and rolls for the townsfolk and give them all away in the street!
The residents of the City have so many cares! We need to come up with a way for them to relax. I want the Sepat to have a place where anyone who so desires can recover their strength!
The merchants from across the sea were delighted by my beer! They want to buy several casks from me!
The merchants said they would pay double if I brew them beer unlike any anyone in our City has even tasted. Well, I think I can do it!
I had a strange vision in which the City was ruled by Menes. He was a kindly ruler, and the people revered him. And the City's wealth and grandeur were astonishing!
This truly is an unusual vision! We need time to understand its meaning. We should go to the oracle for answers.
In space there is a great multiplicity of worlds that reflect and distort each other! And in these worlds there live reflections of us as well!
The Menes the brewer saw in his vision is a reflection of the Menes from our world! And in this other world he never bowed before Amrun… Menes defeated him and was revered by men!
Tap to open the gift!
Again!
One last time!

Every day we work to make the world a better and safer place for humans, but today it's important we remember our four-legged friends. On World Animal Day, join us in advocating for the rights, safety, and welfare of all creatures to ensure they have a safe world in which to live, love, and play. After all, it's not only our planet… but theirs, too.
It's World Animal Day!
Adds %d%% time-giving chips to the level in Blitz mode.
April Fool's Day
Keep a sharp eye and don't get pranked! Let this day of smiles bring only cheerful laughter and lots of merriment!

Progress|Sync
We're finally home! It was a dangerous journey. We're lucky to be alive.
We stumbled upon a village on the seventh day of our journey. The villagers were cannibals! It was a miracle we got out of there alive after they captured us.
A kind villager helped us as he doesn't support his people's bloody tradition. We brought him with us.
I greet you, Master! I'm glad to have a chance to leave my village in search of a better life.
Master, this man is very skillful at preparing meals. Everything he makes is nothing less than delicious!
You embellish my skills, but I have lots of experience in preparing food. I've been learning about cookery for many years. That's what I call it.
We can use your skill to our tribe's advantage. Dear friend, would you like to become our cook?
Thank you for the offer! I'd be honored to be your cook!
On the seventh day of our trek, we were taken prisoner. A kind man came to our aid who didn't share the bloodthirsty traditions of his people.
As it turned out, that man was also a skilled cook. I've never tasted anything better than his meals.
You exaggerate my talents, but I do indeed have much experience. I've collected culinary knowledge for many years.
This knowledge can be used to benefit our tribe. My dear fellow, would you agree to become our chef?

On this special day we recognize that beauty has no bounds. Regardless of age, gender, race, or background, today we're taking a moment to celebrate your beauty, both inside and out. Be proud of who you are, because we like you just the way you are.
International Day of Beauty
Oh no! The celebration is over and we've run out of time to finish the cake…
Don't worry, Baker, I had lots of fun and we can always try again next year. It seems our eyes were bigger than our stomachs after all.
You've proven yourself to be the life of the party! Thanks for celebrating with us. We'll do it again next year!
Complete three-in-a-row levels to bake a cake! You will receive tons of gifts, but the most valuable prize and a unique achievement await you at the end, when the cake is ready!
The birthday cake is ready! We couldn't have done it without you! Happy Birthday, Cradle of Empires! Now, blow out the candle and get your gift!
There we are, the first layer of the cake is complete!
First layer? You mean there will be more of them? This really will be the best cake ever!
Hopefully no one complains at the amount of icing I've put on this cake. I never know how much is too much!
That's just it, Baker… there's no such thing as "too much"!
The base of our cake is ready. Now we can get to the best part… decorating!
Are you crazy? The best part of baking a cake is eating it!
We're almost finished, but it feels like we're missing something. Any ideas, Sherity?
We need the perfect topper! After all, without candles, how will anyone know how old the city is?
I want to make something special for the city's birthday celebration, but I can't make up my mind! Cupcakes? Tarts? Cookies? I just can't decide!
You can't have a birthday party without a cake!
A cake! That's brilliant, Sherity! But if I'm going to bake a cake big enough to feed the entire city, I'll need your help.
You can count on me… to taste test it, anyway…
Cradle of Empires has turned 5 years old, and only a sweet, delicious cake can commemorate such an occasion!
Birthday Cake

Thank you so much for your help. This cake has surpassed all our expectations, and I can't wait to see the eyes of the tribespeople when we bring it out for the party. It's the biggest I've ever made!
Um, Baker? How exactly are we going to carry it?
Make a cake for Cradle of Empires birthday.
Hurray, you made a birthday cake!
We are thrilled to celebrate our birthday with you! Thank you for a wonderful year!
And of course, you're invited to attend Cradle of Empires birthday party next year!
A very important occasion for our city is right around the corner – our fifth birthday!
The citizens are putting together a grand celebration. Everything is going without a hitch, but it looks like it could use more decorations.
Let's see how it turned out!
Make a cake for the Cradle of Empires birthday.
Hurray, you made a Birthday Cake!
Birthday Cake
Wonderful!
Light the candle!
Thanks for taking part in the celebration! We hope you had fun! We’ll do the same again next year for the Cradle of Empires birthday!
Birthday Cake ready!
Stage complete!
Complete 40 levels to bake a cake! Bake the cake step by step and get valuable prizes. The best confectioners will get a final reward and a unique achievement!
A birthday without cake isn’t a real birthday! Complete 40 exciting levels to bake a birthday cake!
Birthday Cake
Let’s bake a layer cake
Finishing Touches
Putting the cream on
Pouring Glaze
Adding topping
Adding stars
Adding a sweet bomb

Let's make the first layer
Let's make the third layer
Let's make the second layer
The birthday cake is ready! What you’ve done is incredible. Happy Birthday, Cradle of Empires!
We have our foundation! Now we need to make a second layer. It’ll be more fun than the first! Apart from the glaze, let’s decorate it with a topping.
Beautiful! Now let’s get the third layer ready. It might be the smallest, but it’s also the tastiest!
Don’t you think the bottom layer looks a little boring? We should decorate it somehow.
Now we have the cake, all we have to do is decorate it. That’s my favorite part! We need to think of something clever. Let’s say, stars and… you’ll see!
It’s going great! But I think I see what our cake is missing. A trademark style! Special decorations that mean something for all of us.
Hurray! Cradle of Empires is celebrating its fourth birthday! Four years already – time flies!
I went through all my recipes, but couldn’t find one awesome enough to celebrate this event with. So let’s make something new!
This will be a cake! But not just any cake, but a huge, luxury cake! With a multicolored glaze, sugar flowers, soft cream… And of course, candles!
I’m going to need your help! There’s a lot to do, but together we can handle it. Let’s celebrate this birthday in style!
Cradle of Empires is 4 years old! Let’s celebrate this occasion together and bake a Birthday Cake!
Birthday Cake

Tap to open the chest!
Father! You're awake! The city… it's been destroyed! I tried to lead in your absence, but…
Daughter! It warms my heart to see you home, and I have no doubts you've been a strong leader.
I must gather our forces immediately. Last time, the enemy took us by surprise. We will not allow them that luxury again.
I've missed so much. It's time Menes paid for his actions. I would have words with the High Priest.
Menes is a kind soul, father! I believe he's under the spell of an ancient evil called Amrun. If we break him free of the curse, he will help us.
I know how you feel about Menes, daughter, but you must consider that he may be beyond saving…
Christmas Genie
Decorating the House
Finish all the preparations for Christmas.
We finished all the preparations for Christmas.
The festivities are over – time to put away the Christmas decorations. But our Christmas cheer will stay with us all through next year!

Complete levels and decorate the living room! There are 40 levels in total, and they are divided into 5 stages. At the end of every stage, you get a gift. Decorate the whole house and you’ll get the most valuable gift.
Complete 40 exciting levels to decorate the house for Christmas!
The holiday season is upon us – the citizens are about to start decorating their homes.
Just think: not long ago, all we had was a couple of dusty tents, and now we each have our own living room – and it's all thanks to you!
It was a difficult road, but we got through it together, and that's why the citizens want to share the joy of preparing for the holidays with you. Look: they've sent Christmas decorations!
The citizens have sent you Christmas decorations: it's time to decorate the most beautiful tree in the city!
Preparing for Christmas
The holiday season has come to an end. Let's get rid of the decorations – they aren't the most important thing, after all.
The most important thing is the joy and warm feelings we give each other. The memory of them will remain in the hearts of our citizens for the entire year to come!
Sack of gifts
Find Christmas tree decorations hidden on the level.
Find tree decorations.
Time runs so fast! It seems hard to believe, but the holiday season is here again.
That means that it's time to put everything else on hold and decorate our city. Let's start getting ready!
The Genie has hidden some tree decorations under the snow. Find all the decorations to complete the level.
Tree decorations
We wish you a happy holiday. May your home always be full of comfort and warmth, may your family and friends love and care for you, and may all your endeavors be successful! Thanks for being with us!

Christmas is not only a time of peace and reflection as we look forward to the year ahead, but also a time to be cherished with friends and family. In this joyous season of giving, we're not only giving gifts to our loved ones, but to you as well! From all of us at Awem Games, we wish you a happy and prosperous holiday season.
Merry Christmas!
Merry Christmas!
Hurray! We assembled all the collections and managed to make all 3 recipes! Thanks for the help and Merry Christmas!

␣Roll the cardboard into a cone.|␣Take threads of both types and fasten their ends with pins to the base of the cone. Wind the threads around the cone, fastening them with pins every 5 cm. At the top of the tree, fasten the threads with pins and wrap the threads around the peak several times. Then wind the cone with a second layer. Cut the threads at the base of the cone and fasten them.|␣Decorate the tree with beads, buttons or small toys.

Holiday Tree instructions

␣Mix the softened butter with sugar, add ginger and vanilla sugar. Whisk the eggs, then add flour mixed with the leavening agent.|␣Knead the dough and roll it out to 3-4 mm thickness. Cut out the cookies using a mold, place them on a baking tray covered with paper.|␣Bake in the oven for 10-15 minutes at 180 degrees. When the cookies are ready, you can decorate them with a glaze, flaked almonds or confectionery beads.
450-500g flour
200g butter
150g sugar
3 eggs
2 tsp leavening agent
2 tsp vanilla sugar
1 tsp ground ginger
Ginger Cookie Recipe

␣As a gift for the birds on this holiday, make some unusual and beautiful treats! Cover the gelatine in water and let it fully dissolve. Add seeds and some berries, then mix. Distribute the mixture among the ice molds.|␣Carefully put the end of a ribbon or a string in the mold and wait for the gelatine to set. You can also place a stick or tube in the mold, so that you get a hollow when it sets, and then feed the ribbon through it.|␣Hang this treat on a tree or fasten outside the window.
gelatine
seeds
berries
molds
string
