Anubis's Idol
Bow your heads, mortals! Avert your eyes from the blinding beauty of the great goddess Bastet!
Although I'm still very weak, I yearn to take vengeance against Amrun for imprisoning me!
Oh, Great Lady, how can we help you restore the strength that once was? We are ready to do anything to bring back the gods and depose Amrun.
So long did I languish imprisoned that the people of these lands have forgotten me. The gods are strong when people know and honor them. Help them remember me once more!
The evil demon Amrun lured all the gods down to the Lower World and left them imprisoned there. Free the gods and they will help you restore the city and defeat evil!
Amrun lured all the gods down to the Lower World and left them imprisoned there. Free the gods and they will help you restore the city and defeat evil!
Increases the number of moves in Moves mode by %d%%.
Bastet's Idol
Increases torch radius in Night mode by %d%%.
Bes’s Idol
Hapi's Idol
Khnum's Idol
Isis's Idol
Amrun lured the gods into the Lower World and destroyed the gate leading to it. Enslaving the people, he gained dominion over all those lands.
These ancient statues have been here since the appearance of the first Moon, but maybe have forgotten of their majesty.
Wonderful! You managed to complete all the tasks. Now you can build an idol and return the goddess to this world!
Wonderful! You managed to complete all the tasks. Now you can build an idol and return the god to this world!
Increases level time in Timed mode by %d%%.
Thoth’s Idol
Oh, all-powerful gods! This pedestal looks to have once been part of an ancient idol I read about in some scrolls!
The thing you have found is the heart of the goddess Bastet, one of the divine symbols. We have to find the rest of them!
Nimiru, how dare you stand against the great Amrun! Did he permit you to release the gods from the Lower World?!
Amrun holds no power over me or my people! The gods will return to these lands and Amrun will be punished for his crimes!
Never! I will put a curse on all the attributes of the goddess Bastet that your strength is not capable of breaking! You do not yet know against whom you revolt…
I don't know how to decipher these symbols…
Unbelievable! Blue rays shattered the stones engraved with the symbols and freed a part of some sort of structure! We have to figure out how to decipher these signs…
The evil spirits have frightened our people for a long time. At long last, that's all over!
Because the foreigner has a heart of gold and a clear mind, the gods granted him the power to defeat the Old Magician's Spirit!
You all are free now. But remember that evil originates in our hearts. Only our hearts will help us defeat it! Live in peace and you shall not be overcome by evil!
Add more players as friends so you can give each other gifts.
Happy Fourth of July!

We wish a heartfelt happy birthday to the United States, and all our friends celebrating Independence Day! Enjoy time with your loved ones in the beautiful summer weather, and may your fireworks displays shine brightly.
The bakery provides the citizens with healthy and tasty bread, baked goods and pastry.
To maintain peace within the country, the Empire needs a strong army to fight the enemy and expand its territories.
In the Brewery, any citizen can enjoy strong tasty beer and relaxed conversation.
Here you can have a tea party with your family, a romantic date, or a meeting with friends. The very tastiest treats are available!
Tile not available at current building level.
You can build strong, beautiful houses and make different tableware out of clay.
The two stone Colossi were erected in honor of the great Pharaoh Amenhotep, who ruled Egypt many centuries ago.
In the Embalming House, the priests preserve the body of the deceased for his future life.
The papyrus is excellent material for producing paper and various household items.
Feeding a large population is no easy feat. A farm will help you overcome the challenge.
Gather fruits and vegetables to feed the growing population!
The most skilled angler in the city lives here.
Bastet, the Goddess of fertility, gave mortal man an oasis surrounded by beautiful gardens.
The Mortuary Temple of Hatshepsut is dedicated to the goddess Hathor, consort to Horus. She was seen as a celestial cow who gave birth to the sun.
Bee farming requires patience and special knowledge. Only hard work and a love for bees can bear fruit!
You can earn some money by trading and bartering with the caravans as they pass by.
Anyone with the talent of seeing beauty and using it to praise the Gods can learn how in the School of Art.
The great Pharaoh Amenhotep dedicated the construction of the Luxor Temple to the god Amun-Ra, his wife Mut and their son Khons.
Every citizen can buy and sell anything they want at the Market!
The river port is the center of trade, and also supplies the city with fresh fish and other seafood.
The "afterlife homes" built in the form of gigantic pyramids are used by mortals as tombs for Pharaohs.
Granite and other rocks used to construct temples and obelisks are produced in the Quarry.
This temple was cut straight into the cliff by the great Pharaoh Ramses II in honor of himself and of the triad: Amun-Ra, Ptah and Ra-Horakhty.
The Beauty salon is a place where any woman can feel like a queen.
The volume of sales and income increases as the city grows.
The Forge will provide the city with all the necessary tools.
The giant lion statue with a man's head symbolizes an eternal deity who was caught in a trap of oblivion and fell into a deep sleep.
Talented actors are preparing new performances for the citizens.
In exchange for modest gifts, the Great Thoth will give you the Hammer bonus. It will help you in your battles!
Horus' weapon is essential in action!|You can win many more battles with it.
The whirlwind destroys all the barriers in its way!|It can ensure a swift victory in the toughest fight!
With a single glance, Ra strikes terror into the heart of anyone who dares to oppose his will. Be a wise warrior and Ra will be your ally.
Anhur's swift chariot wipes out everything in its path!
This is where the best fabric used to make clothes for the city belles is produced.
Here you can find the most incredible beasts from all over the world and just have a great time.

Menes's curse active.
This is awful! I got distracted for one minute, and those restless cats ran out of the temple. I have to find them, but I don't know where to start!
Да! Да! Да! Они ОПЯТЬ разбежались, эти… кхм… кошки!
Oh, I didn’t introduce myself. I’m Sity, the priestess of the goddess Bastet, whose temple is located in a village nearby. Word of your kindness has traveled far.
И я все еще Сити, и кошек надо опять приманивать. Да, лакомством. Да, тем же самым.
[1]{Username}[1], if you help me return the cats to the temple, I’ll reward you handsomely. After all, how can our temple honor Bastet without any cats inside?
Уверена, ты мне опять поможешь. Поможешь, я сказала. Все, не нуди, иди работай.
I’m confident we can lure the cats back to the temple using their favorite treats. We just need to collect more of them first!

Every day we strive to make Cradle of Empires better and better for you! We often get complaints from users about incorrectly operating bonuses, or a bonus hitting the wrong cell. We've decided to make bonus usage more convenient and reliable.|Now you can choose the cell you need without hurrying and then press the confirm button to enjoy the bonus in action.|It's important to us that you find the game as fun as possible. Leave your feedback on www.fb.com/cradleofempires|Press the "Try" button and see for yourself! Entry to the level is free, and a little surprise awaits you at the end!
Good day!
We must have seriously angered Menes. Who would have thought that he'd appear in the city without so much as a hint of fear?
A New Threat
Menes's appearance was a big surprise. I urgently need to record all the events in the city's chronicles. Where did my reed pens get to?
My brave warriors are very pleased! Sometimes, people need a chance to relax and have fun. It helps improve their morale and solidarity.
Good Drinks
In honor of my victory in the equestrian contests, I want to treat all my men to the brewer's tasty beer. They'll appreciate such a gesture!
We gathered all the men we could find. I hope they can help the poor children in time…
Sand Lizard
A monster has found its way into the children's room! We need to send for help at once!
Excellent, now my cellars are full of grain and malt. Time to get to work and brew some new beer for the townspeople.
Good Drinks
My beer stocks ran out during the celebrations. It'd be nice to resupply my cellars.
You have shown great bravery and valor! Not everyone is capable of attacking a sand lizard, and even fewer can corner one. Now the reptile is tied up and no longer a threat.
Sand Lizard
We can't wait for help any longer! The poor children are in danger. Let's try to deal with the monstrous beast that crept into the Sepat on our own!
After the celebration, the brewer had practically none of his divine brew left. But he gave me a glass of the rice beer he's saving for a rainy day.
Good Drinks
Ah, it's been so long since I drank the excellent beer our brewer brews. It's time to go look in on my old friend!
The lizard's saliva can be deadly to humans. Fortunately, I managed to find a special salve. In just a few days, the potter will be well again.
Sand Lizard
The sand lizard bit the potter while he was trying to protect the children. The bites are inflamed because of the poison in the creature's saliva. The potter urgently needs my help.
I am grieved by the death of my tribesman. I took a little clay from the potter and shaped it into an Ushabti figurine. Let it be a loyal servant for the hero in the next world.
Final Journey
Disaster has struck. The old leader of the nomads has died in a skirmish with Menes's minions. We must lead the poor man's spirit into the next world with all the solemnities befitting him.
Sometimes I work with metal in my spare time. I have inscribed some sacred texts on tablets of gold, to help guide the spirit of the nomads' leader into the next world.
Final Journey
The nomad asked me to do him a small favor. The leader of his brotherhood died in a skirmish with the enemy, and now the nomadic people want to hold a magnificent burial ceremony for him.
My people believe that a man's spirit lives on after death. This is why they place things in the grave of the deceased which could be useful in the next life.
Final Journey
The city mourns the loss of the nomads' brave leader. He fell from the hands of Menes's minions, and now everyone wants to pay tribute to his bravery and valor!
The brewer knows how to amaze, no doubt. I've never tasted beer like this before in my life!
Good Drinks
I heard that the brewer has brewed a new delicious beer. I wouldn't mind going to visit him to give it a taste!
All the gifts for the fallen hero have been placed in the basket. On the warrior's orders, two soldiers helped me carry it to the tomb.
Final Journey
Many of the townsfolk wish to give something to the deceased hero. The Master weaved a basket for all the gifts. We need to fetch it from the workshop!
So that the brave hero may live in plenty in the next world, my father and I have brought gifts of great value.
Final Journey
Not just anyone is brave enough to fight Menes's minions singlehandedly! My father and I are inspired by the fallen hero's deed, and we want to give a tribute to honor his bravery!
Perhaps the nomadic tribe is not large, but its warriors always fight their enemies to the very last. Their leader was a brave man and inspired everyone to great deeds.
Final Journey
I asked some visiting traders to bring us buglers with brass trumpets from the neighboring settlements. This will lend solemnity to the ceremony.
I dig out good cave and make it strong with good stones. This make good tomb for old hero of nomad tribe.
Final Journey
Chief ask me to build good tomb for hero. I see many tomb underground. For me, this is no problem.
A fine boat! We'll place it in the tomb with the other gifts.
Final Journey
The mariner will build a funeral boat for the nomads' leader. It will carry the soul of the deceased from mortal life into the eternal next world.
With this money, I'll expand my brewery and hire some workers. The helpers will make my job easier and I'll have more time to rest.
Good Drinks
The townsfolk love the new types of beer. Each day, more and more visitors come to the brewery. It's great!
I try one mug of magical drink. Is tasty. I never drink nothing like it. I always sit in cave and drink only water.
Good Drinks
Brewer bring beer to nomad leader tomb. He say the nomads order this beer from he.
Our city has never seen such a magnificent ceremony before. Perhaps this tradition will take root among our townsfolk too. After all – death is not an end, but the beginning of a new life.
A New Threat

The nomadic tribes are not used to mourning their fallen warriors for long. It is considered bad luck. Our people prefer to send their friends and family into the next world with hope, rather than with despair.
It was a thief! He tried to get away, but fortunately, the potter came to my aid. The miscreant has been tied up and sent to the barracks. Let the warrior decide for himself what to do with him.
Lurking Dangers
Someone crept into my room and scattered all my things around! Could another lizard have gotten into the Sepat? We need to search the entire house immediately!
The townsfolk love the taste of the new beer! They're happy again and have forgotten about their worries.
Good Drinks
I have brewed a new type of beer. Come on, let's give everyone a taste to pick up their spirits!
We wish you a happy holiday. May success and happiness be your loyal companions in the new year! Thanks for being with us!
Happy New Year!
I'm grateful to the nomad for finding these ancient diagrams! And to you for saving them.
I hope with all my heart that one day our settlement will have far more people in it, and we'll be able to make these audacious projects a reality.
O Fine Nimiru, finding that which the sand hides is my calling. I am always happy to serve you and our people. Let everything be as you say!
You have completed all the tasks, Master! Wait for the update to continue the battle for the revival of the Great Empire!
You completed all levels in the hut! Now it’s time to collect [1]all the stars[1] in the building. Let’s get to it!
We can use the weapons of the ancients to protect us from evil.
The more totems we restore, the more powerful army we have. But we must remember that our main goal is peace, not war!
Unfortunately, you can't save the file. To save the files, you need to allow the game access to your photos in your device settings.
No connection to the Internet. Please check your settings and try again.
Not enough disk space on device. Please, free some space and continue to enjoy the game.
Sorry, the Twitter app is not installed on your device.
Menes's servants will be back. Let's complete a couple of levels in the meantime.

Daughter, we found an old crown in the ruins. I have a bad feeling that it's evil.
Judging by the material, it's the pharaoh's crown. If we can trust the Old Magician's Spirit, it belongs to Menes's father.
If this is true, we should hide it in a safe place. Menes can't suspect it's here.
I think he already knows it's here. That's why he sent the priests of Amrun. He wanted them to find it…
We should get rid of this crown as soon as possible. Otherwise there will be trouble.
The Great Nile never returns what was swallowed by its waters. If we throw the crown into the water, no one will find it.
Good idea, Father! I'll do it!

I want to introduce you to the master the nomad met in the faraway lands.
delete
Hello! I was intrigued by the nomad's story and decided to help you.
You're one of the few rulers who tries to lead the people out of the darkness of ignorance. I'll be glad to help you restore the art of writing in this city.
Thank you for your kind words, Master. So let's get to work! We mustn't waste precious time!
What a desire for knowledge! Let us begin!
Treasure is hidden on the level. Make three-in-a-row combinations to dig it up.

Leprechauns wish you luck in your new endeavors and would like to present you with a small gift. Enjoy this time of the year to the fullest!

There’s nothing on earth more precious than children. Each day they fill our hearts with love, our heads with imagination, and our ears with laughter, so today we celebrate World Children’s Day with love and kindness for youth around the globe!
Happy World Children’s Day!

The entrance to summer marks a fresh start for everyone! The city will soon be teeming with bright colors, good moods, and beautiful summer flowers ripe for the picking. We’re glad to have you with us for another wonderful season of fun events and memorable stories!
Summer is here!

Triple Tile
Pyramid construction (Lvl. %d) complete!
Pyramid upgrade
Let’s be quick and go inside the [1]Pyramid[1]!
What a mysterious place… Look! The [1]Guide[1] is waiting for us!
Let’s find out what this [1]room[1] conceals!
There is a [1]golden tablet[1] on every level. Let’s try to use it to fill the entire board.
Make a [1]three-in-a-row[1] combo and the [2]golden tile[2] will paint the neighboring cells.
Great! You need to paint the required number of cells [1]gold[1] to pass the level.
This mysterious artifact broke the curse of Menes. Yet again, the forces of darkness have been defeated.
Not enough keys.
Get the number of keys required to upgrade the building.
This is just the kitty I was looking for! Thanks for the help! I'll take him to Nimiru, she'll tell me why this furball got all angry.
Missing Cat
A kitty from the nursery spent all day hissing and biting, then disappeared off somewhere. I'm worried about him! Will you help me find him?
The grass pillow really helped! The warrior is still unconscious, but he's stopped raving.
Deadly Wound
The warrior's started with a fever! He keeps raving and ranting. A herbal pillow will drive away the nightmares. I need your help!
It's so big – as big as a bird! We're in luck, this is a good omen!
Whisper of Wings
A butterfly flew into the house! The poor thing is beating against the window and can't get out.
With enough care and attention, the injuries will heal in time. But the warrior's still in a bad state. I can't figure out why…
Deadly Wound
The warrior has many injuries. I need your help to clean and bind them.
Garlic is an ancient cure for all ailments. I know twenty-two types of medicine that use it as a main ingredient!
Deadly Wound
The warrior is weak. We need to protect him from other illnesses.
The propolis will heal his throat quickly. Her cough will soon be gone!
Consequences of an Illness
My wife is sick! She has a very bad cough! Please ask the beekeeper for a jar of propolis.
Since we built the port, more and more traders and travelers have been coming to the city. Our home is now known beyond the ocean.
Help at the Docks
Some traders have arrived in the port. We need to register the newcomers and collect their payments.
I was born in distant lands. Butterflies appeared there in the summer. You have reminded me of my home.
Whisper of Wings
I'd like to get myself an incredible creature, but I don't know where to find one.
We have all the information we need to make an antidote for the warrior.
Deadly Wound
I know why we can't heal the warrior. His wounds were inflicted by something using venom and dark magic. We need to act quickly!
Thank the Gods we managed to create an antidote!
Deadly Wound
We don't have much time! If we don't make an antidote for the warrior very soon, we might lose him!
The amulet banishes the forces of darkness and returns health to sick people!
Deadly Wound
A powerful amulet will banish the darkness from the warrior's body, and he'll start to get better!
Stranger slip away again! He know how to disappear in shadows?
Spy Games
Stranger sneak into tunnel. I hear rustling, I see shadow, but I not catch! We try together?
While we were running around after butterflies, someone stole the plan of our city!
Whisper of Wings
The spy put the guards to sleep, and when I rushed at her with a sword, she transformed into a swarm of butterflies.
This woman's belt – our fugitive is woman!? I think it was Shadow…
Spy Games
I see person in mines again – very fast person. We must find!
Thank you! A little longer and I'll be back on my feet again.
Consequences of an Illness
I don't really remember what happened to me… I'm still not well enough yet.
It was a diversion! Our enemies stole some of our weapons and poisoned our water and beer supplies…
Spy Games
We've been attacked! I've gathered a few units of soldiers to check the city!
I seemed to see a butterfly… Many call it "lightning" for its speed. It's a sign!
Prophetic Dream
I recently saw a strange vision! Much could depend on it in the near future!
Will these fortifications help us? Our enemies aren't used to fighting in the open…
Skirmish with an Enemy
We're building fortifications around the city. I need your help!
It's as if the enemy disappeared into thin air. But he dropped this when he fled.
Skirmish with an Enemy
I was attacked by a man who looked like a reptile. I blocked his strike and he ran away.
We did it! The tribe of underground reptiles is ready to negotiate.
Skirmish with an Enemy
The enemies are hiding in the Ancient City. We'll go to them with a white flag of truce, and what will be will be.
These are symbols of peace and fertility, and these coins are of an ancient mint. There are no more like these nowadays!
Unexpected Truce
The reptilian tribe knows our customs! As a sign of peace, we can exchange gifts with them.
"Every creature's life is precious, and it does not end after death…"
Sarcophagi Texts
The miner found some kind of ancient tablets in his tunnels.
Your skill with weapons is impressive! That was a clean victory!
Unexpected Truce
I know the tongue of the reptiles. One of them wants to challenge you to a knife fight.
Such unusual music, like the sounds of the universe itself!
Unexpected Truce
Let's go listen to their hymns in honor of the treaty!
This item will strengthen my frost magic.
Fear of the Unknown
I want to ensure our safety, just in case.
"One must lose everything to be reborn anew!"
Sarcophagi Texts
This image says that life is just one of many roads.
The Shadow always appears in black and then slips unnoticed into the night.
Fear of the Unknown
The Shadow snook into the Sepat and stole Nimiru's snow-white diadem! We have to catch the thief!
This butterfly pretends to be venomous. I think these new friends of ours are hiding something.
Whisper of Wings
I had another vision of butterflies…
The priest said that this is a rare thing! He says the entire world can fit inside it! It must be some kind of riddle.
Unexpected Truce
The snakepeople's priest wants to meet with me. I trust that these people have good intentions, but I'm still wary of them.
The soul leaves the cocoon of its earthly body just like a butterfly. But the soul of the city's last ruler is still in this world!
Whisper of Wings
The snakepeople's priest shared a secret with me…
The snakepeople decided that the treaty was a celebratory snack. We had to explain that it's a symbol of peace!
Unexpected Truce
We'll make a peace treaty with the snakepeople, and they'll come to the surface.
Do those serpents think that this gift makes up for the wounds they gave me? I still don't trust them!
Unexpected Truce
The serpents serve Menes! They wounded me! I don't believe for a moment that they're our friends now!
"The rebirth of man begins with facing and overcoming trials!"
Sarcophagi Texts
We can discover Menes's fate from the ancient texts. We just have to keep finding and translating them!
Phew! There's no way I could have succeeded alone. If we hadn't returned the merchant's property, our city's reputation would have suffered.
The City's Reputation
A merchant was just robbed at the port! We have to catch the thief before we lose him in the city streets!
"A human that overcomes inhuman challenges shall be rewarded with the strength of the gods!"
Sarcophagi Texts
I was working on translating some texts, but I seem to have lost them somewhere.
Menes used magic to enthrall the serpent people once more.
Menes's Vengeance
The serpents attacked our homes! We need the power of a totem to pacify them.
"A worthy man possesses a breadth of knowledge and a strong spirit. His is a heavy burden. His is a long road."
Sarcophagi Texts
Another text. What will we learn this time?
There's a nest of the serpentkind underneath the city. We need to strike first!
Menes's Vengeance
We need to gather our best warriors!
"A man who possesses wisdom but uses it only for himself shall plunge the world into darkness!"
Sarcophagi Texts
There's just one last text left to translate!
My plan worked! The serpents have left the Ancient City and will threaten us no longer.
Menes's Vengeance
We'll fire a hail of poisoned arrows at the serpents!
Praise the Gods! With this poison, we can make an antidote!
Antidote
We need to correct my father's mistake! If we find the poison he used on his arrows, we'll be able to find an antidote.
This is how our ancestors imagined a human being who had gone through all the sepulchral rites.
Divine Figurines
Go collect an ancient figurine from the merchant from the south.
This is a rare stone. Within it are frozen beneficial substances which no longer exist in nature.
Amber Path
Could you help me find an unusual stone? I know I left it at home, but I don't remember where…
We're in luck – this is the item we were searching for! It's a symbol of the incarnation of man's divine strength.
Divine Figurines
I'm heading out to look for a certain very important item.
Our ancestors left invisible clues in caves. If we shine light through the amber, it can help us see the marks!
Amber Path
I think I've solved a mystery… To test my theory, I'm going to need some amber!
Wow! It's a charm against evil spirits! I'll hang it over the entrance to the hut – the times are anything but calm nowadays…
Superstition
A buffalo's skull can protect a house from evil spirits! I need to find one.
Our ancestors believe that at night, when you sleep, your spirit wanders a dream-world!
Divine Figurines
Our search for divine figurines continues – what we have so far is far from a complete set!
Red amber ignites the fires of love! The potter will forget about his work in the blink of an eye…
Amber Path
The potter is always working. I need to remind him that work isn't all there is to life…
There it is! Thanks! I think it has a beneficial effect on the bees.
Amber Path
I lost my charm! What am I to do now..? My sight isn't what it once was!
We managed to collect several cartloads of provisions! We'll send this aid to our neighbors right away!
A Good Neighbor
Menes has attacked the villages south of the city and set fire to their crops! We must ask the entire city to share food with our neighbors!
This is a symbol of light, because the birds see the sunrise before other creatures! I'll give it to Nimiru.
Divine Figurines
I had a vision. I know where one of the figurines Nimiru needs is hidden!
Nectar has very strong healing properties. Just a few drops and the antidote will be ready!
Antidote
We're still missing one final ingredient before we can heal the serpent tribe of the poison my father used against them.
Shadow is humanity's traveling companion, but the Shadow we know goes her own way… She has betrayed her master!
Divine Figurines
I think I managed to solve another mystery. If we find the missing figurine, I can be certain that I'm not mistaken!
I hope the serpent people take the antidote… But protection never hurts.
Antidote
The antidote is ready! But the serpent people no doubt feel pretty hostile about us right now.
The Ren figurine. Ren is a name, but not one that a parent gives to a child. It's a name the universe itself gives!
Divine Figurines
We're missing the most important figurine. Now we can recreate it…
Warlocks use these black stones to achieve their wicked aims. It seems the Shadow wanted to get rid of me!
Amber Path
I've gotten very ill and my beer has gone sour. I had a vision that this is the work of the Shadow. She hid a black stone in my house.
The amber necklace is a very precious gift. I'm glad my father doesn't know about it…
Amber Path
When we delivered the antidote, the serpent people's priest gave us a gift. Let's hurry and assemble this collection before my father finds out!
Wow! What a fun game! I never knew that stones could hop across the water like frogs. I'm going to go tell my friends!
A New Game
I'm bored of playing with the children from the Sepat. They don't know any fun games!
A cow pen made from wood is so last century! Stone is the way to go! The cow pen is a lot stronger now!
Household Hassles
There was a strong storm in the night! It made the old cow pen collapse completely. We need to repair it.
This is the crown of the united lands' ruler. It stood on the brow of pharaohs and gods with all the power of the country in their grasp!
Crowns of the Gods
I saw the snake people's priest in a vision. He was standing in the Ancient City's central square and holding a strange crown in his hands. Let's go there, quickly!
They Amrun priestesses! I think they looking for something!
Menes's Servants
I see strange women come into cave! I think they servants of Menes. We must keep close eye on them!
Me like these naga! They like me. They live in cave and not talk too much. I think I make friends with them!
A Strange Friendship
Mistress Nimiru say these snakes are good people. She say they bring old gold. You help me pick it up?
I remember that pharaoh who rule north of our country wear this crown. His patron is goddess Nekhbet!
Crowns of the Gods
Serpent people know where we can find crowns of pharaohs. They tell me where Menes hide them. We go, I show!
Bes is one of the ancient minor gods. People place his statuette in their homes to protect them from evil influences. I'll bring this one to the miner!
Protecting the Home
We have to make the caves safe from the unwelcome visits of Menes's spies.
This is crown of ruler country's lower part. His patron is goddess Uto!
Crowns of the Gods
Serpent people good. They my friends. They want help city and they tell me where is another crown.
Amrun's priestesses are behind bars and the Atef crown is in our hands! All the Supreme Gods once wore such a crown.
Crowns of the Gods
Amrun's priestesses have stolen one of the crowns and are now hiding in the city. We have to find them!
The serpents fought with me, but didn't want to do me any harm! I don't understand – why would they act this way..?!
Hatred for Enemies
My daughter has dared to spin intrigues with the snake people behind my back? I can't allow that!
This is the crown of our land's defenders. It was always decorated with a lion's head and served to strike fear into the hearts of enemies!
Crowns of the Gods
Some sort of creatures crept into my house at night. They didn't steal anything – on the contrary, they left a gift.
The crown of Osiris! The Djed character on it is a symbol of stability. It inspired the people of our country with trust in their ruler!
Crowns of the Gods
We still have to ask the serpent people where to find one more crown – the crown of Osiris himself!
My message to the serpent people is ready. I feel as though I have wronged them…
Hatred for Enemies
I spent a long time thinking over my daughter's words. Perhaps the serpent people are not our enemies… I'll make some ink and write a message to their priest!
It wasn't easy, but together we succeeded! Look at what good wood we managed to get – there isn't a single knot in it.
Receiving Guests
The chief has ordered me to fashion a huge table for receiving guests. Let's get to work!
I completely forgot that I left my carpenter's plane in the Sepat. I was making some new beds for the children there recently.
Receiving Guests
To process the planks, we need tools. I have everything we need!
I completely forgot about this sack! Thanks for finding it. Now there'll be enough pies for everyone!
Receiving Guests
The chief has organized an important meeting with some guests. He's asked me to bake them some delicious pies.
The kids love celebrations so much. They'd be happy to decorate the whole city every day if they could.
Receiving Guests
I'm helping my kids decorate the city for the guests' arrival.
The baker is a true magician! Sheriti really loves his pies. Maybe all the men bake so well in the lands he's from!
Receiving Guests
I'm helping the baker make some food for the guests from across the sea. He needs different fillings for his pies.
Great! Now the table needs to sit in the sun for a while so that the glue dries.
Receiving Guests
We need some glue to fix the wood together. The beekeeper has what we need! Let's go see him and then we can glue the parts of the table together.
Oh, we're saved! Without salt, the pies wouldn't be anywhere near as tasty.
Receiving Guests
Salt! I've run out of salt! And I already mixed the dough…
Nice job! Even the pharaohs of ancient times would be glad to sit at this table. I hope the chief's meeting with his foreign guests goes well!
Receiving Guests
Our table is almost ready! The glue has dried and now all we have to do is varnish it.
The guests liked sitting at our table so much that they asked us to present our new table to their king as a gift!
Receiving Guests
The guests like the city! I've invited them to dine and talk about business.
Colorless ink! Now we can use it to write secret letters and messages!
Invisible Symbols
I managed to find the secret symbols of our ancestors in the caves using the blue amber. I studied the contents of their ink and decided to recreate it.
Father gave me this horse for my birthday. We've gotten very attached to each other!
A Fleeing Horse
My horse ran away! I'm so upset.
When the fog in the desert dissipated, I tried to orient myself by the stars using this chart. But I still got lost!
Lost Memory
I must return my memories of what happened in the desert. First, I'm going to need a star chart!
This money will pay for new warhorses and chariots. We'll deal a crushing blow to Menes's forces!
Rescue Mission
Menes's troops have attacked the neighboring villages again! We have to do something. Let's collect some money to help our countrymen!
When I got completely lost in the desert, I realized that I only had enough water for a day. The next day, my thirst was torturous…
Returning Memories
I remember that I took a flask of water with me into the desert. Maybe I'll manage to remember something else!
This is a good stallion! I can already see him crashing through the enemy's ranks at full gallop! He'll suit me just fine!
Rescue Mission
Find me the fastest and hardiest warhorse at the market!
The nomad caught a hyena in the desert again! That's it! I remember – when I started to grow weak, a pack of hungry hyenas started following me! But I didn't surrender…
Returning Memories
Let's go take a walk to the nomad's house. I think I'll be able to restore some of my lost memories there…
Bread, grits, vegetables and meat – everything a healthy body needs to keep up its strength! Oats for the horses will come in handy too.
Rescue Mission
Take a few soldiers and get some supplies together for our journey. The road won't be short, and our warriors have to be full of energy before they fight!
Raisins! That's right – I ran out of food very quickly. The last thing I ate was a handful of raisins. I couldn't eat the cacti like my camel, unfortunately…
Returning Memories
My memory has failed me completely! I didn't even know this sort of thing happened – my head is hurting from my attempts to remember. By the way, do you happen to have anything to eat?
You found him? This vagrant just left me and found his own way home… Some friend he is!
Returning Memories
I remembered that at some point, I let go of my camel's reins and when I turned around, he was gone. The poor thing probably got eaten by predators…
The chariots are in full battle readiness! The wheels are oiled! Our unit will be too fast for anyone to stop it!
Rescue Mission
Everything is almost ready to send. All that remains is to go see the soldiers and make sure the chariots are ready.
When I saw a lifesaving oasis in the desert, I thought my torture was at an end. But I was wrong! That's how I fell into the trap! I remember everything now!
Returning Memories
The wicked Menes created a mirage which I thought was real. I ended up falling into the serpents' trap…
So many new vegetables and grains! We need to quickly put everything out for sale. Our citizens will buy it all up within a day!
Foreign Food
Ships have arrived bearing food from across the sea. I want to buy something for the market.
Our small unit should suffice to take care of a whole hundred of Menes's soldiers. We'll destroy his troops in one fell swoop!
Rescue Mission
We need to attach sharp blades to the wheels of all the chariots. Make sure they're well sharpened!
This is stunning! I should have started using this power in battle years ago! But that's enough chitchat. It's time to get underway!
Rescue Mission
There are many spellcasters among Menes's soldiers. It wouldn't hurt to use some magic in our battle against them! Help me harness my power. As you know, magic isn't my strong point…
There's my little tooth! The Shadow stole it from me and decided to hide it somewhere safe. But you and I aren't so easily outwitted!
Children's Treasure
I've lost a lot of valuable things. One of them was my first tooth that fell out.
Well now! It looks like the Shadow has wrapped us around her finger this time! We turned over the whole house, but didn't find anything…
Children's Treasure
I know where my other treasures might be hidden. Let's hurry, we have to act very fast!
It's my ribbon! The Shadow hid it in one of the boats and marked it with a feather so she could come back for it. But we got there first!
Children's Treasure
I think the blue ribbon my mom uses to tie my hair on holidays is hidden somewhere at the port…
Daddy gave me this flower when he went off to war against Menes's troops. He never came back, so this is my only memory of him…
Children's Treasure
I lost my favorite flower. It's really dear to me.
A boy gave me these seashell beads. He disappeared the day my uncle the warrior saved us from Menes's servants!
Children's Treasure
I think the Shadow wants to lure us into a trap. Let's go, we'll probably find my next treasure soon…
The Shadow buried my box in the ground. You see? There's mud on it. That wicked woman hid my things all around the city!
Children's Treasure
We found all the treasures except the box I kept them in…
We've gotten pretty good at tracking, so if I want to play again… Oops! I mean, if the Shadow starts stealing stuff again, I can call you!
Children's Treasure
All my treasures are together again! All I have to do now is hide them in the box and put it somewhere safe…
Look how the feather chaotically blows around in the wind. I'm telling you, a storm is coming!
A Bad Feeling
The weather is going to turn bad! A sandstorm, sure as the Nile flows… I feel things like this right away. Do you have a feather, by any chance?
My old plumb bob! Me thought it was lost. I so long not dig and not build underground. Lost my tool somewhere!
Underground Works
Me decide to dig new tunnel in caves. Me need your help. Me need plumb bob to make walls even in corridors!
I have gratitude for you! I was need this drill. While I build new tunnel, I think I find veins of iron…
Underground Works
My drill go bad after last work. I give it to mariner for to fix it. You bring it here? I not like to walk streets in daytime…
This medallion belongs to the captain we're looking for… But there's no sign of the man himself. Maybe he was kidnapped…
Streak of Bad Luck
The captain of one of the ships has disappeared. The crew kicked up a fuss in the port, but how are we supposed to find him?
Just a collar and a feather… I think my little friends are both in danger!
Streak of Bad Luck
A parrot and a cat have gone missing from the animal nursery. Maybe the cat ate the bird… I hope not.
This is the purse I gave to my assistant. But there isn't a single coin in it… Maybe the boy stole them. Or maybe someone robbed him?
Streak of Bad Luck
My assistant has disappeared! He left for the port with a full purse of coins and I haven't seen him since.
I never dreamed that I'd be able to get my hands on this harp even for a day! I'm so grateful!
Moonlit Night
I want to organize a romantic date for my beloved…
As it turns out, the romantic place was right under my nose all this time!
Moonlit Night
I need to find some sort of romantic place! It should be cozy, and there should be nocturnal cicadas singing their song in the leaves of trees!
This lantern is out of oil! We'll need to replace it!
Moonlit Night
I want extra special lighting during my romantic evening with my wife.
So many different ideas! What gift should I give her? I can't decide…
Moonlit Night
My wife will be so pleased if I get her a gift. But I don't know what to give her. It has to be something that tells her how I feel about her…
You find biggerest iron deposit ever! I live here many years and not know it exists!
Underground Works
I find flakes of iron ore. I sure this cave have much more iron inside.
My wife will love this gift. When she wraps herself in this mantle, she'll feel my care for her straight away.
Moonlit Night
The merchants from the East have beautiful ladies' mantles. They're as fine and elegant as butterflies' wings! One of those would make a great gift!
He and I sat under the branches of an acacia, the harp gently playing, and the nocturnal cicadas copying the tune. Then the full moon emerged in the sky and my husband gave me a gift!
Moonlit Night
What a romantic evening my husband organized for me! It's as if he had help from Bastet herself, the goddess of love!
I feel as though this coming storm is someone's curse. Something is drawing it to us…
Streak of Bad Luck
There'll be a strong sandstorm soon. It will scour away all our crops. Nothing will remain. We must shore up our supplies of hard tack at least!
The genie was hiding in a cave under a cliff! I'll seal it inside forever and it will never again bring harm to our city!
Streak of Bad Luck
An evil genie, one of Menes's servants, has made its lair not fair from the city. It's harming the townspeople. We have to find its lair!
I know that my shining mushrooms already grow long time in brewer's cellar. He be happy, now he see everything in cellar!
Underground Works
For to dig more, we need light. But not very bright. Underground mushrooms make light we need. They not in mines right now, but I know where they are.
You can always find sailors in need of money at the port. There are always a few decent workers among the brewery's clientele too!
Underground Works
The miner needs help in the tunnels – we need to find workers in the city. I'm sure there'll be plenty of people eager to help!
Two veins in one week! Chief will be telling us big thank you! You will see!
Underground Works
I go with them to dig new tunnel. You keep searching in old one. I think we find coal there!
It not very tasty, but give much energy to body. Try it!
Underground Works
We do good work today! Now is time to rest. You want try what I eat when I live hundred years underground?
When Sheriti plays with the boys, she always comes home scratched up and muddy!
Bath Day
I don't even recognize my daughter! How did she get so grubby!? Her hair is tangled and her hands and clothes are all muddy.
This snake's venom can kill a man instantly! I know how to keep the city safe from this snake invasion!
Defense Against Snakes
I saw a venomous snake in the cellar! We have to catch it before it bites someone!
This is a divine beverage, no one has ever tasted anything more delicious! By as early as tomorrow, this wine will bless our market stalls!
Nectar of the Gods
Tonight, the merchants will treat everyone to their pomegranate wine!
We combed the whole city, but we couldn't find the Shadow anywhere. I swear I smelled her musky scent! The thief leaves it behind wherever she goes…
The Shadow's Scent
The Shadow has struck the city again. I'm heading out with my best people to search for her.
This is just what we need to lure our protector!
Protection from Snakes
To fight against the snakes, we're going to need an ally! And it's an ally we'll have to lure…
Wealthy ladies get beauty sea salt from me for their baths. It does your skin and hair a lot of good!
Bath Day
The market has run out of sea salt. The mariner should have some supplies of that ever so useful substance.
Now we fill a jug with the milk and wait!
Protection from Snakes
For our lure, we're going to need some camel's milk!
A taste like no other! This wine is truly worthy of the gods!
Nectar of the Gods
Wine sellers have come to the city from across the seas. Everyone praises the drinks they bring! Let's get some of their tastiest wine!
As you've probably realized, we're hunting a mongoose! When he tries to get at the milk, his head will get stuck in the jug. Then we'll put the collar on him!
Protection from Snakes
I asked Sheriti to weave a collar for our protector. We need to go get it, and at the same time bring a mat from the house.
It worked! I will tame this little mongoose. We don't have to worry about the snakes any longer!
Protection from Snakes
I learned to catch mongooses when I was a child. The caves we lived in were often infested with snakes. These little furry creatures were our only protection!
The ancient priests used skulls in their rituals. One such skull multiplied its possessor's magical powers many times over!
Ancestral Inheritance
Do you remember the crystal skull that the farmer found in the Ancient City? Bring it to me. I think I am close to solving the mystery of this item.
It really does taste good! It seems I have some worthy competitors! Well then, I accept the challenge!
Nectar of the Gods
The townsfolk have gotten into the habit of walking to the market and drinking that much-acclaimed drink! They've completely forgotten about my beer…
This part of the city looks safe for now…
Underground Works
The miner has dug new tunnels leading to a hitherto unknown part of the Ancient City. We must follow them to see where they lead.
This is the perfect tool to heal various illnesses. With their help I will heal Sheriti!
Ancestral Inheritance
The tradeswoman's daughter has fallen ill! I need the cylinders of the pharaohs! They possess healing powers.
We get very detailed map of new part of Ancient City. Now you and Miner not fear to get lost there!
Ancient City
I want walk with serpentfolk to new region of Ancient City and study it. I will make map!
This belt must have belonged to some kind of pharaoh! Look, it has a protective pattern on it!
Tutankhamun's Treasure
I'm going to the new part of the Ancient City to hunt for treasure!
Since the mongooses settled in the city, there hasn't been a single snake attack!
Protection from Snakes
Mongooses have made their home in the city! Let's check the houses they've settled in?
This is Tutankhamun's staff! It's engraved with a royal ideogram to bless him with long life. What a rare find!
Tutankhamun's Treasure
I calculated which tunnel has treasure in. But the entrance to it is blocked by huge stones. We need to clear the rubble!
Wine made from oranges! You'll see – people will be queueing up for it within the hour!
Nectar of the Gods
Can I not make wine as delectable as that of the merchants from the east? I'll make some even better!
In the time of the pharaohs, necklaces that covered the chest and back of their wearer were the nobles' favorite type of jewelry!
Tutankhamun's Treasure
The miner found some sort of valuable necklace in the new part of the Ancient City. We need to take it to the master.
This is just the wine we need! Mmm… Fishing and wine. What more could we want?
Nectar of the Gods
I'm going fishing. Want to join me? Maybe we could take a little wine with us?
My wine is selling like hot cakes, and no one is buying the foreign wine any more! I know what it takes to make a good drink!
Nectar of the Gods
Try some of my best wine! This one has a delicate fruity aroma… And this one leaves a pleasant sensation in the mouth… Choose, I have wine to suit any taste!
These are the pharaoh's earrings! Two cobras to protect their wearer from hardships and evil spirits!
Tutankhamun's Treasure
The excavation continues! There are a lot of the ancient pharaoh's treasures still waiting for us in the underground city!
I can't stand those little pests! Take it away somewhere far from the field!
Enemy of the Field
An old mole has made its home in the plots! It's digging its holes in them… We need to get rid of it!
Beautiful thing! Probably belong to important pharaoh!
Tutankhamun's Treasure
I go to excavation in new part of Ancient City. Come with me. Maybe we find some treasure?
Tutankhamun's treasures were hidden in a peculiar way. This was clearly no accident… It's a good thing we restored the entire collection.
Tutankhamun's Treasure
The golden pectorale is a piece of men's chest jewelry which served as protective armor for both the throat and chest at once. It's the crown jewel of the collection.
Mmm! What a fragrance! My wife will be pleased!
For Love
I want to give my wife a beautiful bouquet. Do you know where I might find one?
We managed to catch the thieves, but the Shadow got away as always!
Den of Thieves
I know where there's another den of thieves! The strength of my weapon and your bravery can help us catch them red-handed!
These two stones are called a grain bruiser! We put the grain on one of them and use the other to grind it. That's how we get flour!
Baker's Day
If you want to help me organize my holiday, feel free! I'll reveal to you the secrets of my trade.
This is a very soft pillow! Now mommy will have only good dreams! And in the morning she'll wake up all rested!
A Gift for Mom
Mommy says she's tired from working and wants to rest. I feel so sorry for her. I want to make her a soft pillow.
Our neighbors will live with our townspeople for a while, then we'll build new homes for them!
Fire Victims
Menes has set fire to some homes in the neighboring villages. Let's think of a way to help those poor people.
We'll use the sieve to sift all the flour into a dish, and the grain husks will be left over.
Baker's Day
Let's continue our preparations for the holiday! I'll go look for my sieve in the kitchen. I saw it there not so long ago.
To remove the bitterness from the root, we need to soak it in water so it becomes sweet. Afterwards, we can add it into the dough.
Baker's Day
To give my bread a special taste, I'm going to need some cassava root!
You can't have too much or too little water for dough – otherwise it won't rise.
Baker's Day
Without water, we can't mix the dough!
These supplies will be more than enough. I hope our city avoids storm and drought alike.
Food Supplies
We need to make some food supplies in case of a drought or sandstorm.
Not bad for a novice! I think that with your help, I won't have any problems baking plenty of brown bread for the holiday!
Baker's Day
You can knead the dough while I light up the stoves.
Me and you work very fast. Two new storehouses for city be ready right on time!
Food Supplies
Townspeople ask me dig out new storehouses for they. So much work!
I only have one mold left, we'll need to buy some more. Kids are always taking them from me so they can use them to build sandcastles…
Baker's Day
Now we'll put our dough into a baking mold… Speaking of which – where is it?
Congratulations! Everything is ready for the holiday! Mmm… What a lovely brown crust! I already want to try it myself…
Baker's Day
Well, now we put it all in the oven and wait for the result. The important thing is to keep an eye on the fire – we can't let the bread burn!
Menes no longer dares to attack our city openly – we're too strong now. But the smaller settlements still suffer from attacks by his bandits!
Fire Victims
Let's collect some treats for our fire victims.
I went off to sea for a few days to do some fishing, when I realized I haven't gone on a decent journey for a long time. Oh how I miss my old adventures!
Longing for the Sea
I'm in a terrible mood today. I need a way to unwind and somebody to talk to. Want to take a walk to the brewery with me?
People like watching and listening to the flow of the water. It calms the nerves and evokes pleasant thoughts.
Spiritual Balance
I'm designing a place in the Sepat where the townsfolk can come and relax. Could you help me build a small fountain?
Thank you for finding my keys! We enter into caved-in corridor from other side and fix everything.
Renovations
One corridor collapse big. There is one door lead there, but I lose all my keys.
I no like this idea of place to relax! Tree is not for looking at but for growing fruit. What will grow on this tree?
Spiritual Balance
I can't figure out these eastern scrolls. They should tell me how to take care of bonsai trees, but I don't understand a thing they say!
This is the herb we need! I've seen the animals themselves look for it many times. I hope it helps our cat recover!
Green Kingdom
One of the cats has a tummy ache. We need a special herb to treat it, but I'm not sure where we can find it.
Every time I tried to poison that rat, it ran underground and hid in the mines. But now it won't bother me anymore.
Gray Vermin
A huge rat has started living in the warehouse! It's eating all the food and ruining the other things there. I tried catching it, but I can't find where it sleeps.
This device is very strange and primitive looking, but it's sure helped me. First good night's sleep in a long time!
Spiritual Balance
I haven't had a prophetic dream in a long time. Just nightmares. How can I get rid of them?
That was tough, but we pulled it off! Keep trimming the branches on these bushes back so that the leaves grow more lush and thick!
Green Kingdom
I'm off to prune the bushes in my garden. Want to help?
Mom says I get sick so much because I don't eat enough onions, so I miss out on all the nutrients they have. I bet the mariner doesn't eat too many onions, either!
The Little Healer
I want to help the mariner get better. Let's find some onions at the market!
I never knew that contemplating the fire could clear your head like that. It's like all your bad thoughts just burn away!
Spiritual Balance
I spend a lot of time thinking about the battles of the past, but those thoughts distract me from important affairs. Nimiru said the fire might help me focus. I wonder what she means by that?
We sure showed those pirates a thing or two! It'll be a long time before they think about attacking our merchants again.
Bandits of the Sea
Hurry! Our trade ships are being attacked by bloodthirsty pirates. We won't give up without a fight!
Our magic is so much stronger when we cast it together!
Stronger Together
I've created a protective spell that can temporarily protect our citizens' homes from thieves.
I mix mountain herbs with water and drink every day. My body I feel rest after hard work and gain strength again!
Spiritual Balance
My body get used to hard work, but sometime I very tired. I try mountain herbs in the Sepat. They help, I like.
I'll place this magic pyramid in one of the rooms. Its magical field can bring the human body's energy into perfect harmony!
Spiritual Balance
I'm so glad my plans to make a nice place for the citizens to relax in were successful! Nimiru really likes how it turned out and has sent me a gift.
To recover his strength, a real man needs meat! I don't see what good these flowers and streams will do.
A Manly Rest
This relaxation spot the Lady built in the Sepat just isn't for me. I always go to the brewery to relax! Want to come along?
Yeah, that's the recipe! My dad was always the only one who could turn it into some great-tasting beer. I hope I can follow in his footsteps!
A New Beer
I had this old beer recipe I've been wanting to try my hand at making, but I can't remember where I put it!
I bet we can pull this off. Those traders from overseas will love it!
A New Beer
I've learned my father's recipe forwards and backwards. I just need to buy a few ingredients. Could you help me out?
Probably one seed get into cave and sprout. Good if we plant seed in garden. Seed die here without sun!
Underground Wonder
Never seen this beauty under the ground! Come and I show, need your help, not know what to do!
Everything is almost ready. Now we just add the yeast and give it a little more time!
A New Beer
Go to the market and get some yeast for my new beer! I'll get everything else ready in the meantime.
My father discovered that Pharaoh's Grass is great for giving beer a unique aroma. No one in our city has ever had anything like it!
A New Beer
Now for the last secret ingredient: a very rare plant.
Catching that monster wasn't easy. He slept in the river by day and hunted passers-by by night! But now the danger is dealt with.
A Clever Hunter
A massive alligator has made his home in the river. He's a great danger to our citizens! Let's use the power of the totem to catch the beast!
If we want answers from the oracle of the gods, we must bring an offering to this altar.
Ritual of Knowledge
There's an old altar located somewhere in the Ancient City. I can't perform the ritual without it!
This is an… unconventional solution, but I think swatting the midges away with branches will be easier than using our bare hands!
Green Kingdom
There's no escape from the pesky midges in the market! Got any ideas?
What are these wild magicians thinking? And where'd they get all that money? Oh well. They can't do much to trouble us.
A Clever Hunter
An old magician who lives out in the desert has promised big money for a giant alligator skin. How about having a chat with him?
This necklace has great sentimental value for me. But only valuable things can be placed on the altar. Worthless offerings will have no effect!
Ritual of Knowledge
Help me find my mother's necklace! I haven't worn it for a long time now, but we need it for the ritual.
A servant of the Shadow has come to the Sepat. The thief scampered up the vine to the second floor and climbed in through the bedroom window. But as soon as he was inside, I knocked him out cold!
Nighttime Incident
Let's go to the brewery. I'll tell you about my night!
Wow! It's not quite what I expected, but I think I like this even better!
The Green Kingdom
I stole Nimiru's magic elixir of growth! Someone cut down my favorite tree, but I want it to grow back again. Can you help me?
Nagas say this bad mask for dark illusion. Magician wear it with crocodile skin to look like nag and sow confusion!
A Clever Hunter
Nagas tell me cave has evil naga that make others harm us! We must catch it!
These cymbals are a gift from the people living at the very top of the mountain. Their sound lets you look beyond the boundaries of your usual awareness!
Ritual of Knowledge
To go into a trance, I need some incense and the sound of sacred instruments!
The baker and I have decided to launch a joint production operation! Now he'll start baking pies with various fillings made using my honey!
Honey Pies
I'm off to visit the baker for some tea and a business talk. It'd be great if you could join us.
That magician was a servant of Menes! Without your quick action, he would have sent me to the gods' judgment. I owe you one.
A Clever Hunter
A werewolf magician has been seen near the city, wearing crocodile skin. Grab your weapon. We have to catch him!
This wooden chair will do. I can use it to relax, and wood is a great conductor of energy.
Ritual of Knowledge

The ritual of knowledge must be carried out in a sitting or lying position. My mind will leave my body, and I don't want anything to happen to the latter while I'm gone. You'll help make sure of that!
When someone is ready to partake of secret knowledge, the cup will fill itself with elixir of truth!
Ritual of Knowledge
There's an ancient cup hidden in the cave. All who drink from it receive secret knowledge. I must get that cup!
I inherited this sistrum from my great-grandmother. She was a skillful sorceress and always used her gifts to benefit the people.
Ritual of Knowledge
I have several ways to contact the inhabitants of the spirit world, but all of them require special items.
You can buy ambergris from the mariner. It comes from whale intestines, after all, and has a remarkably strong smell!
Scent of Mystery
I'm going to visit a cave near the city for a while. I'll need your help getting ready for my trip. Please find me some ambergris and some coal.
Great work! These walls look like new. My wife will be so happy!
A Caring Husband
I've been patching the holes in the Sepat's walls, and I could use your help. Grab your tools and join me!
The smell of this resin helps keep evil spirits away. Where I'm going, it'll be my only defense!
Scent of Mystery
I need some aromatic resin for my descent into the cave. Could you find me some?
I've decided to head down into the cave to consult with the fallen warriors there. They must know the man who was betrayed by the Shadow!
Scent of Mystery
Make a special brazier I can mix my incense in. That will help me unravel the mystery of one of our enemies!
Thank you! I will cherish this gift. More and more robberies are happening in our city with each passing day!
An Expensive Gift
Someone has stolen my beloved silver mirror, the one the potter gave me! Please help me find it.
Thank you for your help! These days, the guys from the next village over are always snooping about the city and hurting the younger ones.
An Expensive Gift
Those guys took my toy away! I can't get it back on my own. Please help me!
The child had to sweat out the illness so it could leave his body. Now the danger has passed!
The Fever
One of my wards has fallen ill. He has a terrible fever. Find him a warm blanket while I prepare a healing decoction!
Nun is the god of the ocean. Our ancestors believed that in the beginning there was nothing in the world but his waters, and it was from these waters that Atum emerged!
World's Creation
I need an image of the god Nun. Let's look for one together!
Our City still isn't large enough to withstand the desert. If we don't give our buildings suitable supports they could turn into ruins at any time.
Renovations
From time to time the City's buildings are damaged by sand and wind. I think it's time to renovate a few buildings.
The outlanders were satisfied by their tour of the City. They decided to form an alliance with us and begin trade negotiations.
The City Tour
We have visitors from afar. We should show them the City!
When Atum emerged from the waters of Nun he realized that there was not so much a single piece of dry land around him. And so he created the first piece of earth: Ben-Ben Hill!
World's Creation
We need to find the object that our ancestors called Ben-Ben Hill. It must be a pyramid!
Candle tree rich in fat. If you stick wick in fruit, you get decent candle. It make neither soot nor smoke. This good for cave.
Nature's Whims
I need candle tree. You help me find one? I tell you about its magical properties!
I left my scooter at the fish stall. It's so convenient to be able to ride it around the market when I'm fulfilling Mother's orders!
Mother's Helper
We need to find the lost scooter right away! Without it I can't help Mother at the market.
Atum plucked out his eye and sent it to search for the lost gods. But he waited for their return for hundreds of years!
World's Creation
Atum created the god Shu and the goddess Tefnut. But they were lost in the primordial darkness. Let's find the Eye of Atum, and then I'll tell you what happened next!
This tree is also called the Dragontree because it grew where a mighty elephant defeated a bloodthirsty dragon!
Nature's Whims
Help me find a Nubian tree! I'll need its sap to make embalming solution.
Now I can sit at the market chatting with customers all day long if I want to!
A New Job
I've decided to sell some honey at the market. But I'm worried I won't able to endure sitting all day in the heat. Could you find me a comfortable chair?

Atum was not frightened by the poisonous snake. He picked it up and put it on his forehead! Ever since then this symbol has adorned the crowns of the pharaohs and protected their owners from their enemies!
World's Creation
When Atum's eye returned to its owner it saw that it had already been replaced. So the eye decided to take revenge and became the serpent Uraeus!
Me and you get there in time and save nagas! If you no use totem, monster kill our friends.
The Beast of the Depths
Hurry, our friends, Nagas, need our help! By accident they awaken terrifying monster in depths of earth!
Thanks to you I am the only one of the children to find the fern. The Lady says it's a very rare plant nowadays!
Nature's Whims
The Lady gave all the children an assignment: to find an arboraceous fern. This is a very ancient plant that grew in the earth before people appeared. Let's look for it together!
In ancient times, when men and gods lived together, an enormous city was erected! Its primary cult was the cult of the sun!
World's Creation
Let's look for a symbol of the sun underground! In ancient times people worshiped the fiery light in the heavens just as we do.
The Tears of Ra are tears of happiness shed by Ra when he saw Atum and his children! When these tears fell to the earth they became the first people!
World's Creation
And do you know how the first people came to be? A lotus grew in the ocean, and the god Ra emerged from the lotus and dispelled the primordial darkness! And then he wept…
Now I will visit the children from the Sepat several times a week to teach them arithmetic.
Knowledge is Power
Help me take this writing tablet to the Sepat. It's too heavy for me to carry by myself!
They laid a golden ankh in the tomb so the pharaoh could continue his life after death. But this symbol is made of grass, so the person who's buried here was no pharaoh…
Memories of Things Past
I find old tomb underground, but my senses tell me no go there alone. You come with me!
Your help in battle has always been invaluable! And the brewer and mariner have also demonstrated their ingenuity and valor on more than one occasion!
Martial Might
I'm planning to hold a military parade in our City! You would honor me by joining it and inviting our other heroes to do the same.
The stems of this tree store a lot of water. It's saved me from death more than once when I was on the road. Now we'll plant it in the City in case of a drought!
Nature's Whims
I need to you to do a certain important job for me. You and I need to find a rare tree in the desert!
The poor animal lost its family. I'll take care of it for a while, then set it free!
The Life-Saving Operation
A hungry sloth snuck into the Garden. It ate all the food stores, and now it's started eating the fruit of the bottle tree. If the farmer finds out he'll start grumbling again!
The baobab provides people with sustenance, soap, useful medicine, sturdy wool, and much, much more! The tree is a gift from the gods themselves!
Nature's Whims
I told you that all the peoples who dwell in this region consider the baobab the guardian of earthly life! But do you know why?
This drug will help restore his memory of the past. Perhaps he will get answers to his questions!
Memories of Things Past
The miner feels some kind of connection to the tomb he found underground. We should help him! Let's find some rubber tree sap!
I've never seen anything like it! This little animal is so funny! Feed it and set it free…
The Life-Saving Operation
A strange animal was caught in my net! It has a furry body and a bill like a duck. I need help to retrieve it.
As long as the necklace was around the queen's neck it protected her against sorcery. But the evil priest Ay found a way to steal Ankhesenamon's necklace!
An Expensive Gift
We need to find the necklace given to Ankhesenamon by her mother. Fragments of the necklace have been scattered all over the City.
This cloak belonged to one of the robbers. No one had a chance to get a good look at his face. But I think it was one of the Shadow's henchmen!
Valuable Cargo
Thieves snuck into the warehouse and stole the valuable cargo for our foreign friends. We need to find them right away!
Malachite helped her to forge a connection to the gods. In difficult situations the queen sought their council!
An Expensive Gift
Ankhesenomon's necklace was made of three different kinds of gems. One of them was malachite. We can find it under the brewery.
Well? I told you the fruit was finger-licking good! It makes such delicious juice…
The Delicious Fruit
They're selling fresh sugar apples at the market! I'm sure you've never had a chance to try anything so delicious. Come pay me a visit so I can treat you to some sugar apples!
I'll add this mushroom to some tea! The miner will immediately feel better when he drinks it.
Memories of Things Past
The miner got some of his memories back, but he needs time for the effects of the rubber tree sap to wear off. Help me find an arboreal mushroom!
Turquoise increases its owner's wealth and helps preserve what he already possesses. But Ay still managed to steal the queen's necklace.
An Expensive Gift
Now we need a turquoise! This gem protected Ankhesenamon's necklace against theft for a long time.
These must be the lockpicks they used to unlock the warehouse at the port! I think we're nearing a solution to this riddle…
Valuable Cargo
The thieves' trail has led us underground. Come on, let's keep following it. Maybe we can find the clasp!
Our efforts to free Ankhesenamon haven't worked out so well. It looks like we've awoken the spirit of the priest Ay. He won't return to the kingdom of the dead until we've assembled the necklace!
A Ghostly Threat
The citizens are saying they've seen a terrifying ghost in various parts of the City. Could this be Menes's handiwork yet again?
This coin was lying in plain sight… it has the Chief's profile on it… I think it's a message! We've been had!
Valuable Cargo
We found the cargo we were looking for. Someone just left it in the cave. Something's fishy here! Let's take a look around!
They say carneol stops bleeding and softens rage. This gem saved Ankhesenamon from wounds and dangerous foes!
An Expensive Gift
We need to find the last gem from the necklace before Ay's ghost gets up to some kind of awful mischief!
That's it! Queen Ankhesenamon's spirit has finally found peace, and Ay's ghost has been returned to the realm of the dead forever!
An Expensive Gift
You and the Master were able to collect all the pieces of the queen's necklace. Now let's assemble them and take the necklace to its owner's tomb!
This beautiful girl my sister. She die on same day when Menes attack City. I bury her myself in mine and stay next to her.
Memories of Things Past
Help me find wax and make figurine. Clumsy fingers no listen to me. But my memory coming back!
Wild cat guardian of tomb. When I drink rubber tree sap I see it again. It say grass ankh help my sister go to better place!
Memories of Things Past
When I bury my sister, entrance to cave collapse, and I stay underground. I suffer very much until subterranean cat spirit calm me down!
This coin is from some unknown mint and has a musky smell – all of which tells me the Shadow has been here! She isn't hiding the fact that she was involved in the Chief's abduction!
The Abduction of the Chief
As always during this time of day, the Chief was training in front of the barracks. Let's take a look around!
The Shadow will immediately demand a ransom for the Chief! Either that, or she'll hand him over to Menes!
The Abduction of the Chief
They say there's some kind of note nailed to a post at the market! We should go take a look!
This amount will be enough to pay for my father's ransom. But it's strange – why did the Shadow offer to make a deal with us? Doesn't she serve Menes?
The Abduction of the Chief
We can't allow the Shadow to hand my father over to Menes! If this happens, our City is doomed…
We've been duped! The Shadow vanished with the money, leaving nothing behind but a hand print on the wall. But the Chief wasn't even with her…
The Abduction of the Chief
Our meeting with the Shadow will take place at the pier. Don't forget to take a totem power with you. We don't know what to expect from that sneaky woman!
The kidnappers' tracks lead to the mines, but they get mixed up in all those dark corridors. It looks like we can't help the Chief after all…
The Investigation
I'm going to go look for the Chief. Will you accompany me? But first I have to find my sandals… for nomads, footwear is key!
This is a letter from the Chief! The Shadow delivered him into Menes's clutches, but the Chief managed to get away. He's on his way back to the City with bad news – war is coming!
The New War
I got a report that a carrier pigeon has arrived at the barracks. The message is addressed to you and me. Let's take a look!
This excellent pink marble. Southern merchant tell me in their city they recently discover new deposit!
The Expert's Opinion
Merchant from southern lands bring construction materials for our City. Tradeswoman ask me to take look at them. I no mind a little help!
The war council was a success! We should work on fortifying the City until the Chief gets back!
The New War
I sent some soldiers to meet the Chief. In the meantime our best fighters should get together and assess the situation. Let's summon a war council!
I think these sandals will fit Sheriti just fine! Now I don't have to worry about her stepping on a thorn or sharp branch again.
Sandals for a Tomboy
Sheriti crawls around in ditches and gullies with the boys; that's why her sandals keep breaking. Can you help me pick out a new pair for her?
It's good to have sturdy walls around the City in case of an enemy attack! You never know what to expect from Menes!
The New War
To fortify the City we need to rebuilt the barricades. Start collecting rebuilding materials!
The merchant from the ship is my fellow-countryman. The rugs he brought are of good quality. I don't think we'll regret buying them.
Trade Goods
Some ships loaded with goods have arrived from across the sea. One of the merchants says his cargo hold is packed with valuable rugs for our City. Let's go take a look!
What a fine kite we've made! Just look how high in the sky it flies – just like a bird!
A Skyward Flight
Help me make a new kite! Then we can fly it!
The animal finally settled down. Just look at this mutt! He could go toe-to-toe with a whole squadron of warriors all by himself!
War Plans
We were able to fight off the first enemy attack and take a prisoner. This is a very aggressive animal. I'll need your help to deal with it.
So you're saying that in your world sandals like these would appeal to any woman? Now I feel much better. The Lady trusts your opinion!
A Present for the Wife
I bought some rare silk sandals for my wife, but I think she might not like them. Would you mind stopping by my house? I need your opinion!
We'll take these cats to the enemy camp, and the enemy army will scatter. Their armor will protect the furballs against sharp fangs, so they won't be in any danger!
War Plans
We won't be able to withstand another attack by the canine army. But I think I have a plan. Will you help me?
Nice work! We've taken the provisions to a warehouse not far from our war camp!
Food for the Army
We need to go through everyone who provided our army with provisions and ask them to prepare everything we need. Get to it!
Thank you for your help! Now I can jump by myself. The boys can crawl around in gullies without me!
A Childish Prank
The boys took my jump-rope again. If Mother finds out, she'll be furious. Can you help me get it back?
We made short work of that job! Menes's spy turned out to be one of the sailors. Now we have nothing to worry about.
The Enemy Approaches from Behind
There's a spy in our midst! I don't know this person's face, but we can find him by his sandal tracks. Grab a totem power!
You establish telepathic contact with rat. Rat sneak into enemy camp, and you see everything you want with its eyes!
War Plans
Nagas offer to help us in war. They can teach us telepathic connection with their underground spies! Let's go, show!
Sometimes you have to put your worries aside and relax for a while in a cloud of white smoke!
A Peaceful Evening
Tonight I would like to invite you to join some good friends in enjoying a hookah. You should come!
Good job! I bet Menes surprised when he discover his poisoned arrows gone!
War Plans
I had a vision in which I learned that Menes is making poisoned arrows to use against us! You need to steal them right away!
Congratulations! We managed to drive the enemy from the walls of the City! I hope he won't be back anytime soon!
War Plans
It seems like all of Menes's plans to take over the City have been foiled! I think it's time to use our secret weapon!
The baker is in fine form, as always! He managed to fulfill my request and bake a loaf of bread that looks like the starry sky.
Gifts of Bread
The mariner is throwing a little party today. I ordered a special treat for him at the bakery. Come on, let's go see how it turned out!
Myrtle is a sacred plant! Its fragrant leaves were frequently used by our forefathers in various rituals.
Alluring Aroma
We need myrtle for our perfume. Go to the market; you can find some there.
I'm so tired I've decided to get a relaxing massage. After a massage you always feel just like you've been reborn!
A Relaxing Massage
I heard the merchants from across the sea brought some new aromatic massage oils. Could you help me choose?
I remember the Lady once decorating her garden with a plant called broom. And now we could really use it!
Alluring Aroma
Go to the Sepat and find some broom! It's the next ingredient we need for our perfume.
So it was a pigeon! If a pigeon flies up to your window, it's a good omen.
A Good Omen
Some kind of bird was tapping at my window all night. Let's try to catch it!
Incense is still used to make medicine and ointments. Its aroma has soothing properties.
Alluring Aroma
I think we're on the right track! In the old scrolls it says you need incense to make the perfume.
The servants of the foreign king say their master has heard a lot about my beauty, so he decided to give me these gilded sandals as a gift!
Sign of Attention
One of the kings from across the sea sent a gift for me today. Care to see what it is?
You like sandals? Nice choice – pharaoh himself used to wear them. Take them, I not used to wear sandals like these.
Comfy Shoes
Want to see what I find in ruins of Ancient City? Every day I take many little things from underground.
I baked this bread especially for the Master! I think he'll be pleased.
Gifts of Bread
I got such a kick out of baking bread in wondrous shapes that I've decided to experiment a little. I would like to make a treat for my friends.
All these kings and lords aren't interested in me, they're interested in our bountiful land. It would be better to let their gifts benefit the City!
A Good Deed
The lords of neighboring lands are showering me with gifts, but I don't need them. Take everything that's piled up to the market and sell it!
I was afraid the boys would torment that wagtail! Let it fly back to its babies!
Fighting for Justice
