Hurry! The boys are up to their old tricks again! They've set snares everywhere, and a little bird got caught in one of them! We have to help her!
You can use an infusion made from the mastic tree to treat teeth. But in our case this ingredient will serve as a unifying substance for the perfume.
Alluring Aroma
We only need two more ingredients for our perfume. One of them is fragrant juniper, and the other is mastic tree.
Can you smell that? We've successfully recreated that alluring aroma! I'm certain it will drive any man mad!
Alluring Aroma
Everything is ready for our experiment! We can start making the perfume now.
I like make round things. Circle have no corners. When you live in dark, you realize this important!
A Decoration for the City
Chief ask me make several decorative balls out of alabaster to decorate City. If you help me, work go faster!
The port is growing, and I'm always running out of sailors and fishermen! I hope the situation will change now.
The Call of the Sea
I need more people to work at the port! Help me put up help-wanted posters around town!
A cow-shaped loaf of bread is quite a strange idea, but the farmer was satisfied. He wants to offer my bread to the altar of Hathor, the goddess of fertility!
Gifts of Bread
The farmer found out that I'm baking bread in different shapes, and he gave me a double order. I'm afraid I won't be able to handle it alone!
I think this square represent our world. Pyramid-shaped rock in middle symbolize Ben-Ben Hill.
A Map of the World
In Ancient City I find strange town square. You come, I show you!
I've heard that the lotus flower is considered a symbol of knowledge in this land! It's a fine idea! I think Nimiru will like our plan!
Gifts of Bread
I've decided to bake a special loaf of bread for Nimiru! Do you have any ideas? I wouldn't say no to a little help!
Our baker is a real bread sculptor! He's baked something for each of us – he didn't forget anyone!
Gifts of Bread
Did you hear about how the baker baked all different-shaped loaves of bread for everyone in the City? Come on, maybe we can find something for you there!
The Shadow put my skin on and turned into a rabid beast! We would have been in quite a pickle if not for the power of the totem!
The Final Blow
A wild cheetah has appeared in the City. We need to catch it immediately! Get ready! Hey, where's my cheetah skin?
I'll get to work and make sure a caravan loaded with food for our neighbors departs today!
Neighborly Assistance
Our neighbors from the southern lands need our help. Their crops were destroyed by a sandstorm. Let's collect food for them!
At first I thought the new bees were unfriendly. But now I see they're getting along swimmingly with mine. The new honey is superb!
Neighborly Assistance
Some wild bees flew into the apiary. Let's collect the honey they made!
People think the end of the world is coming! But I think it's some kind of sorcery… and it's so powerful I can't even tell what it is!
The Aftermath of War
Ever since the battle with Menes's monstrous animals strange things have been happening in the City. There insects everywhere, and the crops are withering. Find out what people are saying about this!
The constellation of Meskhetiu is shining very dully – that's a bad omen! A great danger threatens us due to lost crops! We need to warn the farmer…
The Aftermath of War
Something strange is happening in the City. Let's see what the stars foretell!
Oh gods! There are only a couple of ripe avocados in the entire basket! All the other ones have been eaten by caterpillars…
Garden Pests
Help me sort through the avocados the farmer gave up to sell. I only need ripe ones. I can't put ruined goods on the stall shelf.
I've noticed that a lot of my fruits and vegetables have begun ripening faster than usual. But other ones have been withering and dying!
Ripe Fruit
Come by for a visit. I'll treat you to some peaches. This time they've ripened earlier than usual and grown to an enormous size. You've never tasted peaches like these before!
This constellation is warning the City about dark times to come! But we can definitely cope with the growing danger if we stick together.
Mysterious Spells
If we want to figure out Menes's plan we need the support of divine forces. Let's see what the stars have to tell us!
Look – this is an aphid. It drinks the juice of the leaves, then leaves drops of nectar behind. The nectar is then collected by ants. Father told me that ants herd aphids just as men herd cows.
The Young Naturalist
Come to the garden, I want to show you something! I noticed that a lot of insects have appeared in the Sepat's garden. I've been observing them all day!
The farmer's crops are withering because of the hot sun. Our ancestors believed that Aten's laughter brought people joy, but when the god is in a foul mood his laughter can be ruinous for us!
Mysterious Spells
If we want to understand the changes that have been happening in nature we need to turn to the knowledge of our forefathers. Go see what the scrolls have to say about this!
Just last night I checked all my garden beds, and everything was fine! I don't understand where these snails could have come from. It's black magic, plain and simple!
Garden Pests
Hurry! I need your help! Hundreds of snails have flooded my garden, and they're eating my fruit. We need to get rid of them immediately!
This is all the food we were able to find! Oh well, it's not that bad. This should be enough for the time being. When all is said and done we shouldn't forget about fishing and hunting!
Working Together
This time the harvest really suffered because of the pests. We need to look through all our storehouses and take stock of the food we still have in reserve.
I couldn't have done it without you! The roast goose with crunchy skin came out great! I hope our important guest will be pleased!
Pharaoh's Lunch
The lord of the northern lands has already entered the City! It's time to get ready to receive him. Can I count on your help?
We were able to save the cherries from the insects! There's no end to the pest invasion. And there are more and more of them every day! Could this really be the end of the world?
Ripe Fruit
The insects that have flooded the city still haven't made it to the top branches of the cherry trees. Let's pick all the cherries and take them to the market.

I've got it! Menes used an old spell against us! It's usually used to lull the element of earth to sleep, thus preventing earthquakes and avalanches. But Menes perverted it, and the earth was plunged into a deadly nightmare!
Mysterious Spells
This soil, which was fruitful for so long, has become useless for farming! I can't find the spell Menes used against us!
You drove those voracious creatures from our land! But now there's nothing left alive in the garden beds. Do I really have to start all over again?
Garden Pests

Everything is ruined! The soil is dried out, the shoots have withered, and the insects ate the fruit! Now an enormous horde of mole crickets is eating the roots of my last remaining crops! Is there any hope left?
There's no salvation from the locusts. They've destroyed the crops that were still left after the invasion of the other insects. People are hiding in their homes. We need a miracle!
Garden Pests
A strong wind is blowing in from the south; I can't remember anything like it! Look at those storm clouds. It doesn't look like a sandstorm… oh gods, it's locusts!
The ruler of the northern lands will like my wine! After the first glass of this vintage he'll forget about everything else in the world!
Pharaoh's Lunch
Let's go down to my cellar! You can help me find a bottle of my finest fruit wine. We'll serve it at the table to our important guest. You'll see, he'll be pleased!
Icicles – what a fine idea! The deepest caves under the City are cold enough. Now we have enough ice to keep our goods frozen for a long time.
Working Together
We've stored the food we collected in the cellar. But we'll need a lot of ice to make sure it doesn't spoil. You can find it in the City's deepest caves!
I'm not much of a cook, but I hope that with your help we can make something delicious for our guest!
Pharaoh's Lunch
I'm making desert for a visitor to the City. But I don't have much time left. Please scramble a few eggs for me while I select the appropriate honey for the pie.
Nice work! I've outfitted merchant wagons to all the neighboring lands. We'll trade our construction materials for money and food for the people of the City!
Working Together
Collect all the construction materials you can! We need everything: granite and basalt, reeds and bamboo. I've got a plan!
This is a genuine work of art! I'm sure that in the northern lands our guest hails from he has never tasted anything like it!
Pharaoh's Lunch
Sometimes my eyes play tricks on me, so you'll be the one making the honey desert. I'll guide you. It'll be fine!
Everything went smoothly! The mercenaries who wanted to attack the northern ruler turned out to be the Shadow's henchmen! Now the danger is behind us.
Security Service
My scouts have reported that there is going to be an attempt on the life of our high-ranking guest. We need to foil the assassin's plans immediately!

A freezing hurricane swept through the City, lifting the clouds of insets into the air and freezing them in a block of ice. We'll throw it into the sea, and the current will take the block ice even further from our shores!
Mysterious Spells
I want to use ice magic to summon the northern wind to blow all the pests away. It's our only chance. Will you help me?
There isn't much food in the City at the moment. But we've got a surplus of ginger, and I know a lot of dishes that can be made from it!
Ripe Fruit
Our last ginger crop was quite bountiful. Let's harvest all the ginger and sort it!

My greens are the very finest… or at least they used to be! Nevertheless, no dish is complete without fruits and vegetables. I'll set my garden to rights, and then we can expect bountiful harvests once again.
Pharaoh's Lunch

I heard that you need some greens for the meal for our high-ranking guest. Is this true? Well then, I'm willing to share the last of my greens with you. If you pay me a visit I'll give you a little something!
The ruler of the northern lands turned out to be a good man. Thanks to your eloquence over lunch he understood our position and promised to help us!
Pharaoh's Lunch
The satisfying lunch for our guest from the northern lands appears to be ready! Come help me receive him!

It's a good thing Menes's curse didn't affect our treasury or our resources! Otherwise the people of the City would had hard times in store for them. I'll be back soon, and my wagons will be filled with all manner of gustatory delights!
Working Together
The citizens are starving. We have to do something! I'm taking a caravan to the neighboring lands to buy some necessary provisions. You'll have to collect the money I need in the treasury!
The miner hasn't been toiling underground for the last century in vain. Thanks to his long concealed passages we were able to overtake the robbers and ambush them. It was another plot by the Shadow!
Security Service

Someone has stolen our supply of honey. It was quietly driven out of the City by night. We don't have a chance of catching the thieves now… unless we use the hidden underground passageways. Come on, let's go after them!
We still need to help each other during this difficult time. It's the only way we can preserve our community and thwart Menes's evil schemes! Life in the City will get back to normal very soon.
Brotherly Aid
Life in the City seems to be getting back to normal after the insect invasion. Go from house to house and ask if anyone needs help!
Given our situation, this fruit won't go to waste. We can use the pears in pies or make jam or tasty drinks out of them. And the kids will be thrilled to have fresh fruit!
Ripe Fruit
I came to an agreement with some foreign merchants about purchasing a large batch of pears. Let's unload the ships and send the goods to the market.
Bad things happen, but you still need to find time for little joys. Especially childish joy!
Childish Joy
These are tough times! There's barely enough food, but we've got plenty of fruit. What if we cheer the kids up by making them a little surprise?
Menes's henchmen didn't expect us to chase them because of a single soldier! That was their mistake – in order to achieve victory a commander needs to worry about every single one of his soldiers!
Security Service
One of my soldiers at the border has been taken prisoner by Menes's henchmen. He was enslaved and now works at the quarry. We can't leave him in the enemy's clutches!
So those were pumpkin seeds, eh? I'm glad the farmer took them despite my relationship with him! Yes, misfortune often brings people together!
New Life
I've returned from the neighboring lands, and I brought lots of delicious food! I also bought some kind of seeds. Could you give them to the farmer?
Just look how fast the seeds have grown! I can't wait for these little shoots to turn into massive pumpkins!
New Life
Let's plant these pumpkin seeds in little pots for now and put them in the sunlight. When seedlings sprout we can plant them in the garden!
I think an invitation to come to the City himself and work in the garden for the good of the citizens will really make Menes see red! And why not? A few kind deeds would do that priest some good!
The Response
Menes sent us a letter suggesting we bow before his lord, Amrun! And we're supposed to transfer all the power in the city into his hands. Let's send that villain our response!
This silt will be enough to fertilize the entire garden! I can already feel the soil coming back to life because of our efforts. It's like a person, you know – it needs some tender loving care!
New Life
Go see the baker; he's got my sieve. We're going to have to sift a lot of silt today so we can use it to fertilize the new garden beds!
If you ask me, the scarecrow came out great!
New Life
The farmer asked me for an old pot so can make a head for a scarecrow out of it. I'm sure I can find him something suitable!

You reap what you sow, that's what my grandpa always said! All our hard work has paid off. Look at this huge pumpkin! And it's just the first one – soon the soil will be restored, and everything will be as it was!
New Life
We've done everything we could: we planted seeds, fertilized the soil, and protected the garden against bird attacks. Now all we have to do is water the garden and wait for our crops to grow!
Your hunting falcon is as fast and deadly as a bolt of lightning! We haven't caught this much game in a long time. The Chief will be pleased!
Time to Hunt
I and a few other people are getting ready to go hunting. Fruits and vegetables are great, but you can't forget about meat! Would you like to join us with your hunting falcon?
Thank you for your help! This puppy means so much to me! Thanks to him, I now have hope for a new home and a new family!
A Four-Legged Friend
The puppy Sheriti have me when I moved to the City is missing! Help me find him before something happens to him!

I've realized something over the last few days: fighting the forces of nature is harder than battling enemies of flesh and blood. When you're fighting nature physical strength isn't as important as the support of those around you!
It's All Behind Us
It looks like the danger is past, and we won, but it wasn't easy! Let's take a stroll through the City and see how our fellow-countrymen are doing.

This is a song about valor and friendship! The men of my tribe used to sing it when they went into battle against the deep-water invaders! It would lend them bravery and inspire them with faith in the future!
A Musical Rest
You look tired! If you hand me my sweet-voiced kemenche I'll play you a melody that the people from the other side of the sea are very fond of!
The panther was standing by the pier and growling at the surging waves. I wonder what could have enraged it so… perhaps memory from when it used to live on the slave galley?
The Sea is Troubled
The guard panther escaped its cage! It's been uneasy lately. Now the animal is prowling the city streets. Come on, we have to hurry!
I was right! A few deep-waters snuck into the City by night. Thanks to you we were able to drive those beasts into a trap! Unfortunately, only one of them survived the furious battle…
The Sea is Troubled

Somebody knocked a few of my men out over by the pier. Judging from their tracks, the enemies crawled out of the sea. I think the City has been visited by creatures from the depths again. Let's go search the streets!
Were you able to loosen the prisoner's tongue? Maybe I should have fed him right away. The things he told you are terrifying! An entire fleet of deep-waters is headed for our shores…
The Sea is Troubled
Try as I might, I can't get our prisoner to tell me why he snuck into the City at night. Maybe you'll have better luck than I did. Go to the prison, and bring him something to eat!

It worked! The water horse is faster than many other sea creatures. I'll send a message with her to my native land. My people already defeated the deep-waters once, so they'd be glad to help us do it again!
The Sea is Troubled
I haven't seen my friend the water horse in a long time. Let's sail away from the shore and try calling to her! I'm sure she'll help us deal with the enemies that are approaching!
I can already tell that our future ship will smash the enemy vessels to splinters! Look, her frame looks just like the body of an enormous sea monster!
Lord of the Sea
It's time to start building the ship's frame. It should be made of the sturdiest kind of wood. Let's get started!
This sail looks like the wing of a mythical dragon… nothing will be able to stop our ship when the wind fills her sail! And not a single enemy arrow will pierce its hardy fabric!
Lord of the Sea
Everyone in the City is helping us build the battleship. I was given the chance to sew her sail. There's still a lot of work to be done, and I would appreciate any help you could give me!
Swords and spears did that sea monster no damage whatsoever. But the jellyfish's tentacles stung us without a missing a once. If not for the totem, it would have destroyed our ship!
The Sea is Troubled
An enormous jellyfish is on its way to the coast! It seems like it wants to stop us from building our ship. We need to stop it right away. Hurry, arm yourself!
We sailors believe that the figurehead on the prow of a ship brings good luck and aid in times of trouble! We believe that the figure is alive, so we treat it like a person – with respect!
Lord of the Sea
It's time to decorate our ship. It should be some kind of figure that will inspire terror in our enemies and valor in our warriors! Do you have any ideas?

This is all that's left of dinner! I guess the fish must have been pretty tasty. I'm sure the cats are up to their old tricks again. They're always escaping their kennel and stealing food from my guests!
Pranksters
Oh, it's good to see you! I made you some roast carp for dinner… but where is it? I just turned my back for a second, and then the dinner was gone… what in the world happened?
All right, the ship maneuvers brilliantly! The rowers are working the oars as though they were one. With a well-trained crew like ours we have nothing to worry about!
Lord of the Sea
Our ship is ready! Let's try her out and teach the rowers some combat maneuvers. The sea is restless, and I get the feeling our foes are getting close!
Take this banner! And tell the other sailors and warriors that the people for whose sake they're heading into this deadly battle will be waiting for them on the shore!
Lord of the Sea
I've decided to make a war banner for the battleship! Help me cast some victory-bringing spells on it. It's all I can do to help you in the battle, since you'll be so far from the shore.
The City lies on the coast of a river that gives life to us all. And this foul creature was a threat to us. We're grateful to you for getting rid of such a dangerous neighbor!
A Dangerous Neighbor
There's an electric eel living in the water here. All the women in the City are afraid of it. We can't wash our clothes anymore, and the children are going without baths. Do something about it!
You caught over a hundred perch. How is that even possible? Our part of the river is full of fish. I think they sense the deep-waters and are gathering here because of it.
Something Fishy

Our neighbors are complaining that there are no fish downstream from us. They want to shore up their supplies by buying from us, but my stalls are empty. Go catch some fish. Just make sure you take a new hook for your fishing pole.
Victory! The deep-water fleet has been crushed. Our battleship showed them who the real ruler of the sea is! However, if my countrymen hadn't come to our aid we would have been in trouble!
Lord of the Sea
I see enemy banners on the horizon. We need to set sail. What is there to say? We're heading into certain death, and many of us will not return!

I don't even know how much longer this is going to go on for, but the whole story with the fish brought in some nice income for the City. Naysayers are claiming all the fish came to us because of some kind of black magic!
Something Fishy
There are plenty of fish in our part of the river, but our neighbors are still coming to our City for them. Help me out at the market. There's too much business for me to handle all by myself!
As soon as we found this ring I had a vision of a little boy. He looked like a ragamuffin from a nomadic tribe. At some point an old witch wove this strange piece of jewelry for him!
The Pharaoh's Right Hand
I saw the pharaoh from the past in another dream last night. I was following him and found myself in a hut. The ghost left one of his rings there and disappeared. What did it mean?
That's the very same ring the pharaoh left! In my vision it was on the finger of a youth dressed in bronze armor and armed with a spear. I think it was that little nomad boy.
The Pharaoh's Right Hand
We're on the right track! I saw the pharaoh's ghost today, and he was smiling. Then we went to a soldiers' barracks, and the pharaoh left another ring there!

You're going to have to carve some new cogwheels for the press. I still don't understand where the old ones went. I'm sure it must have been the schemes of Shadow and her faithful henchmen. How dare they!
The Fabric of History
It's a disaster! Someone got into the factory and broke the papyrus press. I can't fix it – the wooden cogwheels are missing. Help me find them!

The ring gave me another vision! Our youth has matured – his body is covered in scars, and his face is covered in thick stubble. He was standing at the wheel of a ship, and that very ring was shining on his finger!
The Pharaoh's Right Hand
In my most recent vision I found myself on the deck of a ship along with the old pharaoh. He handed me a silver ring. I think we should go to the pier.

A golden ring like this could only belong to a rich man, a merchant, for example. I saw a middle-aged man dressed in luxurious clothing and sporting a lush beard. It seems our little boy is all grown up!
The Pharaoh's Right Hand
In my latest vision the pharaoh led me to the market. For once there were many other people there besides the two of us. I received yet another ring there. Lets' go to the town square!
I think this handle will do the job. I'll use it to spin the screw axle that squeezes the sheets of papyrus inside the press. That's when the juice from the stems sticks them together.
The Fabric of History
Try as I might, I can't find the handle for the papyrus press. It won't work without it. There used to be a back-up handle around here somewhere. Let's look for it!
This ring once belonged to the powerful priest the boy from the visions grew into. In my vision he was holding an ancient book in which these words were written: "Menetnasht wields the power!"
The Pharaoh's Right Hand
Last night the Pharaoh spoke for the first time. He took me to the Ancient City, gave me a signet ring, and asked me to give it to you. Then he said his own name, "Menetnasht!" What does it mean?
We're so lucky to have found the component we need at the market. Just a little more work, and the papyrus press will be working again. I won't let the Shadow deprive future generations of history!
The Fabric of History
By the way, you haven't seen the screw axle, have you? Could the thieves really have taken it as well? What are we going to do? It was such a rare component…
This in an unbelievable story! Pharaoh Menetnasht was the last ruler of these lands. When he passed away this ring should have gone to one of his sons, either Horus or Menes…
The Pharaoh's Right Hand
In the last vision Pharaoh Menetnasht turned into two boys. They were totally unable to share a priceless ring between the two of them! Does it make any sense to you?
I think Amrun has decided to use black magic against us again! He was weak before, but now Menes is on his side! We can't let him do it!
Echoes of the Past
We need to immediately begin studying the events of the past connected to the five disasters Amrun sent to our people. Get everyone together who might be useful!

This is just what we need! It says here that locusts came to our lands from the south. The old sorcerers drove them away by summoning the wind. We did the same thing, except we added a little snow and ice!
Egypt's Woes
Remember, our City was just recently attacked by a horde of locusts. I think this is just the beginning! Find all the records of similar events!
This lance is just what we need! You can pin the snake to the ground with it while the farmer is luring it away.
The Hidden Serpent
I need your help! Grab some kind of reliable weapon and go to the farmer's house. Today we're going to hunt a snake that's hiding nearby!
Of course! It's all so simple! When the sorcerers lost control of the wind Amrun turned it into a sandstorm. And then only the power of water could stop the wall of sand!
Egypt's Woes
In the chronicles it says that the priests couldn't control the element of wind for very long, and Amrun turned it against them. But I can't make out how. Maybe you'll have better luck.
It's a black-tailed python! I thought were hunting a somewhat smaller snake. If we hadn't worked as a team we might not have done so well. Let's take this giant as far away from the City as we can!
The Hidden Serpent
The farmer is already luring the snake out of the underbrush. Try to go around it from the other side and attack quickly, as soon as you see its head!

I have seen the past! When the sorcerers summoned the forces of water to create a barrier against the sandstorm Amrun turned it into a hurricane! The water from the sea and river fell flooded the shore and washed away everything in its path!
Egypt's Woes
Some of the records dealing with the "Palm of Amrun" are in pretty rough shape. I should try to look into the past. Help me relax and get into a trance!

This piece of fabric is perfect! It will protect the sheets of papyrus from the hard plates in the press and absorb any excess juice that comes out. Now all the sheets will come out neat and undamaged.
The Fabric of History
While I'm dealing with the papyrus press, find me a little piece of fabric. I need it to cover the papyrus sheets during pressing.

Just one perch! Apparently the fish have already calmed down since everything happened with the deep-waters, and now they've left our part of the river. Oh well, at least now our neighbors will be able to catch some fish!
Gone Fishing
Come on, let's go fishing! Sometimes I like to sit by the shore with my line in the river and wait for a decent-sized fish to bite.
Nagas say every time Amrun do even worse than to our ancestors. When all water go underground, terrible drought begin! Crops die, people thirsty…
Egypt's Woes
I go to look for history of four disasters of our people! Nagas tell me remember that time. They tell me story. You come with me, hear their story!

All these people are intrepid seafarers! They've seen a lot in their travels. They've taken a liking to our City and will definitely be back. In the meantime my brothers are grateful to you for the food supplies.
Paying a Visit
My countrymen from across the sea are getting ready to head home. Help me get a little food together for their return voyage!
All magicians die in battle with Amrun! Only five left. Then big fires start, kill all living. Magicians drive all people into cave!
Egypt's Woes
Nagas tell me they remember how the last residents of ancient city ask for help. Let us hear what happen next!
This pitcher in the form of the heart of Horus was raised from the sea near our shores, where our sailor friends fought for us as valiantly as Horus once fought for his father Osiris!
A Sign of Gratitude

The mariner's compatriots have decided to spend some time in our city. We've struck up a great relationship with their captains, so I'd like to give them a gift as a token of our friendship. Could you help me?
This powerful ancient amulet protects you from the Palm of Amrun. The nagas taught the last magicians how to create it and restore the Ancient City, and now they are giving it to us!
Egypt's Woes
All kinds of terrible disasters happened in ancient times, when Egypt had no priests or Pharaohs, only magicians and chiefs. The people were nearly destroyed, but then a miracle happened!
Just what we need! This stone will let us polish the sheets from the press. Once they have dried, we'll smooth them out, and our papyrus will be ready!
The Fabric of History
I have one last request for you. Bring me a stone I can use to polish the sheets of papyrus. But ordinary pebbles won't work!
You have defeated the giant scorpion and saved those stupid sailors! I would never have thought that monster could be beaten only by directing the power of the totem at the rock itself!
Evil Unleashed
Hurry, the boys need help! They found out that these waters are full of treasure and decided to try their luck, but the precious stone they found was being guarded by a monster from the underworld!
Like I said, this device is magic! Making papyrus is like creating a whole world. We can use it to pass all of our knowledge and history down to our descendants!
The Fabric of History
Alright! By working together, we've managed to fix the papyrus press. Now you can try making your first dozen sheets while I begin recording recent events!
Any priest would consider this box a great treasure. Thoth left us a wealth of knowledge that has helped our city and our people time and time again!
Thoth's Legacy
Actually, I want to study the scrolls Thoth left for us. Want to help? Then bring that golden box here for me!
Thank the gods! The child is healthy. I fed him some goat's milk, and he fell asleep. Nomadic tribes passing through our lands must have left him here. But no matter – I'll take care of him!
Family Ties
The nomad found a box out in the wilderness, with a baby inside. He's keeping the child at his house for now. Bring the babe to me, quickly! I must examine him.
This is a brown long-eared bat! Only one of the scrolls ever mentioned this creature. Look at those ears! He must have come after hearing me say his name in the ancient tongue.
Winged Guardians
Hear that rustling outside? It's so late! Who could it be? The sounds are frightening me, distracting me from reading the ancient scrolls.
Feeding a mob like this takes a lot of doing. Always buying and cooking food! But my wife and I are happy. We've got the biggest family in the city!
Family Ties
My wife and I don't have any children yet, but we've taken in so many orphans. So many mouths to feed, so many little ones to watch! Can you help us out?
I'm so happy! This altar has been my dream for so long. But after the last child was found, I decided it was finally time to get to it. Thanks for your help!
Family Ties
I want to build an altar to Isis! I could thank the goddess for the children she has given me. Could you help me build one?
We do good job! But you sense that nasty smell from crack in the ground? It scares me, what wait for us down there!
Treachery of the Earth
A minor earthquake opened some cracks in the roof of the abandoned mines. Find a pickax so we can open them up and get inside!
Ever since we learned the vessel's power, the brewer has been increasing his abilities of divination, taking a single sip each month. But today, we will drink together!
Thoth's Legacy
To find the Eternal Fountain of Life, drink from the vessel of wisdom! Thoth's scrolls say that this will help us understand the language of the guards and get them to let us pass.
What a great idea! The little guy likes your pillow so much that he just won't let go of it. Now that he's playing with his new friend, I just know nothing bad will happen to him.
Family Ties
This kid really likes the cats from our pet nursery. But I'm worried that they might scratch his tender skin. Maybe you have an idea?
Now things go faster for sure! With so many of us, I not fear meeting something strange under the ground!
Treachery of the Earth
Our work start going very slowly! Soft ground stops here, just rock now. Just two of us cannot do it without helpers!
You found the fruit bat! This particular species can land right on all four paws, meaning that to open the door, we have to touch it with four hands!
Winged Guardians
The scrolls say that the next guard will tell us how to get inside the tunnel leading to our goal. So let's get down into the caves and find that short-nosed fruit bat!
Swallows are the messengers of fortune. A good thing for our little one's future! And as long as he's too young to care for himself, I'll make sure his needs are met.
Family Ties
A swallow has flown into the baby's room. What a great omen! But the poor bird is stuck fluttering from corner to corner, unable to find the exit. Let's help her out!
That is better. We climb into very old part of dungeon, and I want no problem. Earth can be more dangerous than people think. But I know, I am victim of treachery of earth!
Treachery of the Earth
Crack in earth in our work area become much larger. I no want someone to fall in by mistake. Find warning flaps, we mark the dangerous places!
I think I understand now! At dusk, this flock of bats flies out to feed. We can keep an eye on them and find the right cave when they fly back!
Winged Guardians
The next guardian of the path to the Eternal Fountain of Life is the common noctule. So let's find one! Its characteristic red coloring should help us find it.
I've heard that for many peoples in the world, turtles symbolize family connections. So this little statue is a perfect emblem of our big, strong family!
Family Ties
I want to get a gift for our large family. Something symbolic that would display my feelings for my wife and all our children. Could you help me out?
Cave ceiling look quite strong. I not want to stay under earth another hundred years. Even though this time I have good company!
Treachery of the Earth
We can make good cave to get into the mines. But I do not want be buried there. We need strong materials to build support posts!
Only the totem can soothe the savage creature my soldier has become. Remember how a sickness just like this one infected that worker who got onto the abandoned Ship of the Ancients?
Death of the Ancients
We need your help! One of my soldiers who was helping a miner got trapped in the abandoned mines. He's out now, but he's not himself!
It's a good thing we noticed that bat in time. Look – this cave is filled with them! Hundreds and hundreds! Shhh… their teeth are razor sharp. If they wake up, we're done for!
Winged Guardians
The closer we get to the Eternal Fountain of Life, the more careful we have to be! Thoth's scrolls say the next guard will never attack alone. Keep your eyes open!
An arrowhead made of bone. I haven't seen anything like this in a long time! Its owner must be from before the reign of Menetnasht! Could… could these mines be the tombs of the first humans?
Rain of Death
I wouldn't rush into the abandoned mines if I were you. Pharaoh Menetnasht ordered them blocked up for a reason. You should look around there a little first.
Thank you so much for saving me! Scariest thing in cave, that bat. One not so bad, but whole flock could drain all my blood!
The Bloodthirsty Flock
Help! Man-eating bats attack me! I go into new cave that suddenly appear in wall and wake up all bloodsuckers inside!
Look at this old bat. He's at least a hundred years old! Looks like it's all alone here. I guess loneliness is the price of a long life.
Winged Guardians
The worst is behind us, and the last winged guardian lives in the cave holding the object of our search. Let's find him quickly. Not much left now!
Judging by this skull, the Ancients gradually turned into terrible giants over time. And judging by the stone arrowhead found inside it, the local barbarians didn't like that one bit!
Rain of Death
It looks like Pharaoh Menetnasht also faced the curse of the Ancients, which turned them all into horrible monsters. Let's explore the cave before another cave-in fills it in again!

I've never seen such a massive stalactite before! The brown bat is drinking the drops flowing down it. This must be the Eternal Fountain of Life we've searched so long for! "Every drop bears life," as Thoth once wrote…
Winged Guardians
But where is the Eternal Fountain of Life? Can you see anything? Wait, what's that up there, where the old bat flew off to?
I never thought I'd see so many volunteers! So many young men looking to become worthy defenders of our city in its struggle against Menes!
Children of Montu
We must summon the townspeople to our aid! If any want to enlist their sons in the new defensive unit, let them bring them to the first training session. We start today!
I've figured this magic item out! If we place several parts inside it in just the right way, we will be able to understand the speech of the ghost trapped inside.
Death of the Ancients
We must cave in the entrance to the cave holding the Curse of the Ancients. But first, we must ask the advice of someone who survived an encounter with them. Bring me the ship's crystal ball!

This is a perfect shield! Nice and light, giving the fighter some maneuverability. And durable enough to stop any enemy spear. A wall of these shields could sweep any opposing force right off the battlefield!
Children of Montu
Our first unit of young warriors will be an infantry assault force. I've ordered special shields for them from the smithy. Bring me one so I can inspect it!
This arrowhead is copper – and from the time of Pharaoh Menetnasht. I hope the warrior who shot this survived the encounter! I'll keep it for luck.
Rain of Death
It looks like more than one generation of our ancestors tried fighting the giants. This cave is just littered with arrowheads. There's another one!
Look at how well-made this helmet is. The perfect protection for your skull!
Children of Montu
My second gift to our elite squad is combat helmets. The first batch is already en route. Let's go inspect them!
So many thousands of years have passed, and this ghost fills me with a frigid terror, his thunderous words ever echoing through my mind. But now we know what to do.
Death of the Ancients
I checked the crystal, and everything's working just as I said it would. Now, when we summon the captain of the Ancient Ship, we will be able to understand him. Let's do it!
I've taught the young soldiers to use slings. And they're starting to like archery – and getting pretty good at it!
Children of Montu
I need to make around a hundred new slings for these young followers of Montu. And I need some arrowheads. Can I count on your help?
This arrowhead is so fragile, yet so deadly. Wait, I see now! The giant could pull out any arrow that wounded him, but the glass would stay inside, eventually bringing an end to the monster!
Rain of Death
All of our ancestors knew that only arrows could pierce the tough skin of the giants. And now the captain has advised us to make glass arrowheads for them? Well, it's worth a shot!
Red sandalwood is an excellent hull material for warships both old and new. It'll boost their durability and protect them from ram attacks by the enemy!
Military Campaign
We're getting ready to sail to the southern coast. They say pirates and scattered deep-water forces are causing trouble down there. Help is needed repairing the ships.
We did it. We will raise this standard over the unit, and all who see it will know that those approaching are the Children of Montu, the bravest of the brave.
Children of Montu
We need to lift the soldiers' morale with a special battle standard! Could you help me make one? It must be something very inspiring!
Wow, what an elegant weapon! Each arrow is made of lightweight hollow steel. Hundreds of these arrows will whistle through the sky and decimate our enemies!
Rain of Death
We're getting ready for a full-scale military campaign into distant lands. I've decided to equip our archers with some new arrows. It'd be great if you could help!
War is always a very costly thing. But soon we will overcome Menes and hand Amrun over to the justice of the gods. Then peace will reign once more!
Military Campaign
We've been spending lots of money training new recruits and prepping our military campaign. We've got to replenish our coffers! Can you help with that?
Thanks for helping me get these siege ladders ready! I'll train our soldiers not only to fight by land and sea but also to storm forts and castles. Menes is in trouble now!
Children of Montu
The training is in full swing, and many of my adult soldiers also want to join Montu's squad. I'm getting a new trial ready for them. Want to help?
Since I first came to this city, we've managed to build a large port, establish some trade routes, and create a whole fleet. I'm so glad we're working together!
Military Campaign
Our ship repairs are complete. Help me collect all of the tools and bring them to the potter.
May the Warrior God inspire the next generation of soldiers! May each of them know the favor of Montu!
Children of Montu
The young soldiers' training is going well. I think Montu himself aids our efforts! I would like to put up a statue of him in the barracks. Could you help?
With this device, the Ancients measured the distance between the horizon and the heavenly bodies, helping them navigate this world.
Military Campaign
To keep our campaign on track, I need the navigation device we found on the Ship of the Ancients. I've figured out how it works!
This campaign will need more than soldiers and sailors. These ships are huge! Any help will come in handy, so I'm so glad the people have come to our aid.
Military Campaign
We must summon everyone who is willing to set out to sea and liberate our neighbors! Could you send forth the call?
I've added some innovations to the Master of the Seas. Now our mariner can guide the ship with just a wave of his hand!
Military Campaign
Help me find the coral gloves belonging to the Captain of the Ancients! Then go give them to the mariner. He'll be very happy if you do.
Oh gods, the dagger of Anubis! Any wound dealt by this weapon is fatal. It seems the Shadow has decided to send me straight to the afterlife…
The Shadow Draws Nigh
That was an attempt on my life! The attacker managed to wound me then vanished…
Oh no! I do not wish to have to bury my father alive. But we must somehow settle accounts with Anubis, god of the underworld.
The Shadow Draws Nigh
We have to rescue my father! His wound is not deep, but it is fatal. To cleanse him of the poison, we must build an underground tomb. Hurry!
Anubis will be furious when he discovers that the chief is still alive! But the soul of the attacker will be a satisfactory offering for our trick and should appease the god's wrath.
The Shadow Draws Nigh
We must find the one who attacked the chief! I've heard that servant of the Shadow was last seen lurking by the pier. Be on your guard!
The god Khnum once made living people out of clay. Why can't we? This clay man has a few drops of our chief's blood inside, and by the time Anubis notices, it'll be too late!
The Shadow Draws Nigh
The Shadow are gathering over the chief! But we will not let him be taken to the world of the dead. Help me sculpt a clay man, as real-looking as we can make it!
Goat cheese has a mild, delicate flavor and is easy on the stomach. Great choice. Some of the older chiefs among our guests will sure appreciate it!
Easy on the Stomach
Cheese is the best snack to go with beer and wine. But one kind isn't enough. Satisfying all of our guests will take some doing!
My father's notes say that nutty cheeses are delicious. He has been in charge of the tables of many an ancient pharaoh. So I'm sure our chiefs will enjoy those cheeses, too!
Easy on the Stomach
I found my father's tastiest cheese recipe. To make it, we need some nuts and a little patience. Let's get started!
This cheese is moldy, but edible! I'm surprised it's smell didn't trouble you. Only people with noble blood in their veins really appreciate this taste.
Easy on the Stomach
I'd like to treat you to some rose wine, but we have to make a trip to the market first. I order some very special cheese from the tradeswoman there…
Yum! I love the taste of smoked cheese! I'm sure all the guests will love it, too. Plus, it's the best snack you can get to go with beer.
Easy on the Stomach
Now we'll make my favorite cheese. I'll go get some ordinary cheeses from the cellar while you start making us a cheese smoker!
Not bad at all. Fruit cheese is my very own invention, and it goes great with wine. No woman can resist it!
Easy on the Stomach
There's a woman coming to the chiefs' meeting! She's famed for her cruelty, and many of the men fear her. But I know how we can soften her up! Want to give me a hand?
We had plenty of treats to feed all our guests! And the leader of the nomads was so delighted that she's willing to launch an attack on Menes this very day. Looks like this alliance is in the bag!
Easy on the Stomach
The chiefs from the neighboring lands are here to discuss the alliance! Time for us to serve them the brewer's drinks and delicious snacks. You ready?
We're in luck. This specimen has eaten too much, so catching him was a piece of cake! What an interesting species. Looks like a combination of a lion and a tigress!
Feline Flurry
One of the escaped animals has gone into the city. It's been living in the brewer's warehouse and eating all of the meat supply! We have to catch it right away.
Perfect! Now I think my mom's shop is the prettiest one in the whole market. Every shopper who passes by will want to stop in!
Publicity
Could you help me decorate my mom's shop? I want to add some brightly colored ribbon. With luck, it'll flutter in the wind and attract more customers!
That cat sure did its best to keep its freedom! I never could have caught the hungry beast without your help.
Feline Flurry
It looks like those wild cats have figured out the best place to catch some easy prey! One of them is trying to get into the farmer's cowshed right now. Try to catch the beast!
By working together, we sure managed to show those animals who's in charge in this city! But they haven't left – they're just hiding, on the roofs and in the cellars. We've got to be careful!
Feline Flurry
Our city is full of strange hairy animals. Animals attacking everything that moves! The people are banding together and trying to keep the beasts away. We need your help!
What a beast! As big and strong as a lion, as nimble as a jaguar… Good thing Menes doesn't have a beast like that, or we'd never make it out of the next battle alive!
Feline Flurry
Hurry, we have to catch the next beast right away! The soldiers have cornered him but can't hold him for long. He's just too strong. They need our help!
That's got to be the funniest member of the feline family I've ever seen! A leopard with a lion's mane, and he looks like he's the youngest cat of the bunch. Should be easy to tame!
Feline Flurry
You should have no problems with the next cat. In fact, bring him to me. The kids fed the last big cat you caught, and now they're all out playing together!

The striped ones sure taught that spotted one a lesson! The poor thing didn't expect such resistance from the bees and has calmed down. Well, time to feed our menagerie. Here's hoping they quickly get accustomed to their new life!
Feline Flurry
The last beast tried to snatch some honey, but the bees didn't like that one bit! Catch him and bring him something to eat. Boy, what a day!
The magicians somehow managed to create the perfect battle cat! He's the most cunning and dangerous of the beasts. We're the perfect match. He'll be my most favorite cat of all!
Supercat
I think we've caught all of the cats created by the magicians. Wait, who's that sneaking around back there? Wow! What grace, what razor-sharp claws! Catch him, quick!
Sekhmet is the dark parallel essence of Bastet. We must journey to the goddess's ancient sanctuary to help her overcome her twin. This light will guide our way through the darkness!
The Ritual
Find the moonlight collected by Bastet before the dawn of time.
Our Ancient City research group has come together again! This time, we must descend deeper than ever before and find the forsaken sanctuary of Sekhmet.
The Ritual
The ancient temple of Sekhmet lies deep in the Ancient City. The miner will be our guide, the knowledge of the master will direct us, and the abilities of the brewer will keep us. Onward!
The first sound to ring out in the world was the silver bell! So beautiful, it can appease even the greatest wrath. Even the wrath of a goddess!
The Ritual
I was able to gaze into the past, where I saw Bastet pacifying Sekhmet. We must retrieve the goddess's bell, the one that rings with the sound of the universe itself. Find it, quickly!
If you wear this crown before the altar of Sekhmet, the goddess will perceive her parallel essence of light, Bastet. But the crown will not work for long. We have to hurry!
The Ritual
When Sekhmet is angry, the only being she will listen to is her parallel essence. To deceive the goddess, we need Bastet's crown. Let's find it right away!
Sekhmet is bloodthirsty goddess! She love the taste of human blood, and one day this taste destroy her.
The Ritual
I speak with the nagas. They tell me that Sekhmet love offerings, like any divinity. We must bring to her altar gold. Find some quick!
Use the sistrum while I speak to Sekhmet in the ancient tongue. The sound will distract her, and then Bastet will pacify her dark side and deliver the city from this misfortune!
The Ritual
There's Sekhmet's sanctuary! Time to begin the ritual. To do that, I require Bastet's golden sistrum. The sistrum is a musical instrument – and our most important weapon in this struggle!
See this needle? I carry it as a reminder of my first job as a tailor. Yes, a seamstress, can you imagine? But that painstaking work taught me many things.
Best Profession
My line of work is notoriously difficult, requiring constant and absolute precision. Trust me – I've had many professions in my life.
My father always believed that tailoring wasn't proper work for a man. I agreed, so I moved on to the stables as soon as I could and started caring for the horses there.
Best Profession
It's getting late. Walk me home while I tell you the story of my life. I'll tell you about all the professions I had before I took up my pen!
Becoming a priestly apprentice is considered great fortune. I learned many things from my priest, but knowledge was not enough. I needed to acquire special skills, too…
Best Profession

I once met a certain priest whose horse I was responsible for training. He told me I had the makings of a good apprentice, and want to teach me himself. Ah, how I dreamed of trading in my whip for a clerical scepter!

My carpets were the best in the whole region. I bought an excellent carpet-weaving machine, and using the knowledge I had learned from the priest, I created rugs with exotic animals and with great scenes from the ancient legends.
Best Profession

My teacher passed away, and I was unable to continue his work. The stables wouldn't take me back, so I began working as a carpet weaver. I had only a little experience, but the business was a very profitable one!
I lived in this one village for a long time, tending a flock of sheep. I had no friends but my shepherd's pipe. And there, far away from people and civilization, I realized a great many things.
Best Profession

I became rich, but my happiness did not last long. My competitors came, set fire to my carpets, and smashed my loom to pieces. I never knew people could be so cruel! I wanted to leave them all behind…
My pen is my weapon! With it, I can record my city's history. With it, I can deal punishment, like a whip, or do miracles, like a magic wand. And now, at last, I am happy!
The Meaning of Life
I've realized that I've learned so much, and I want to share my experience and collect the experience of others on paper for the benefit of future generations. That's why I started writing.
Thanks to our lion mask, the pack has begun treating me better. In fact, they consider me their leader now and have started obeying me! They must think I'm a cross between a human and a lion.
Chief of Cats
This pack of wild cats doesn't really listen to me, but I've got a plan. Can you help me pull it off?
Someone's really gotten our dogs riled up! One of my men saw a man in black near their cages. I bet it was a servant of Shadow and that he slipped something into the dog food!
Man's "Best Friend"
Somebody opened all the cages holding our battle rottweilers! The dogs are going nuts and attacking their trainers. We've got to calm them down and get them back in their cages!
I'll add this avocado leaf to my bouquet first. Once the bouquet is ready, I'll give it to my wife to show her my undying love!
Eternal Bouquet
Is it true that you can use dried leaves and flowers to make bouquets that last forever? I'd love to learn how to make art like that. Could you help me?
My wife will never forget this night. She'll love my gift, but we have to keep it a total secret until the big moment!
Eternal Bouquet
We need an acacia leaf for the bouquet. It'll remind my wife of that romantic evening when we sat together under that bush in the garden… can you find a leaf for me?
Thank you so much! I'm telling the kids about some animals. My assistants and I will do some skits for them! That'll teach the little ones how to understand the world.
Kids' Party
I'm putting on a little show for the kids, and I need an elephant mask right away! Can you help me out? The performance is starting soon!
Turns out carob trees were one of the ancient pharaohs' favorites. The imperial gardeners grew and cared for hundreds of them!
Eternal Bouquet
Next, my bouquet needs a carob leaf. I've read that carob is often used in flower arrangements. Help me look for one!
This leaf will make a great piece of my arrangement! The citizens of our country consider the fig tree sacred. It symbolizes abundance, which we have plenty of!
Eternal Bouquet
I like how this is turning out! Our flower arrangement looks like the pictures I've seen. Now go find some fig leaves while I dry these other ones.

Since ancient times, our people has considered the palm tree both a grand symbol of victory and the tree of life itself. My arrangement could never be complete without this leaf, but now it looks great! Thanks so much for your help.
Eternal Bouquet
My arrangement is almost finished! Just a little bit left. Please find me some palm leaves, and I'll pick the most unique ones for my bouquet.

I'm sure you know the legend recounting how the chief of these dogs would hear many people's secrets and yet keep silent, deciding to keep them unrevealed forever. This Basenji is a descendant of that legendary animal. I would like to give him as a gift to my daughter!
A Silent Friend
The mariner's ships have returned. They managed to defeat the pirates along their way and have brought back many goods from faraway realms. There's a Basenji among their cargo. Bring him to me!

Oh gods! What a beautiful bouquet! Did my husband really make all of this with his very own hands? Sometimes it seems I married not just an ordinary potter but the legendary Potter himself. He's like a wizard!
Eternal Bouquet
I know that my husband is making some kind of present for me. Do you know what it is?
I'll have to make a few more pairs of these wings and give them to our scouts. When they swoop down from the heavens, the enemy will think Montu himself is flying into the battle!
Winged Scouts
I think I know how to improve our young Clan Montu warriors. Bring me some mechanical wings, made according to the master's design!
These bandits are pretty quick! We had to chase them all around the city. It's like they know how to vanish into thin air, and then reappear from nowhere! Too bad we only managed to catch one.
Winged Scouts
One of the Clan Montu warriors has learned to fly with the mechanical wings. As he was flying about, he saw a group of men attack the mariner. We've got to help right away!
The prisoner admitted that he was planning to steal the ship blueprints. Menes has lost control of the old deep-water fleet and wants to build his own!
Servants of the Shadow
The bandit who attacked the mariner is sitting in prison. He is a servant of the Shadow, as silent as shadow, too. I'll need some elixir of truth if I'm to loosen his tongue.
That's better! Logging the arrivals and departures of ships at our Port would be a nightmare without the clock. Not to mention loading and unloading!
Servants of the Shadow
During the attack, the Servants of the Shadow smashed the port clock the potter made for me after our victory over the deep-water fleet. Could you help me make a new one?
They say the way to a man's heart is through his stomach. And that's the truth! My husband adores sweets of all kinds. These cashews will help me make him some nut mousse!
A Loving Wife
I want to thank my husband for that beautiful flower arrangement. Could you help me out? Just go down to the market and buy me some cashews!
These almonds will add a special, delicate taste to our dessert! Almond oil will make our mousse nice and rich, especially when we mix it in with some well-beaten eggs.
A Loving Wife
My mother taught me to make this delicacy, and now I'm making it for my husband. I'll teach you, too, if you want. But for now I need some almonds!
It looks like the Lady bought more peanuts than she needed for her treat. She got some for her children, too. Let's go pay them a visit!
Little Helper
The Lady told me a secret: she's making a tasty surprise for the potter! So she asked me to bring her a sack of peanuts. Could you help? I don't think I can manage on my own.
Nutmeg is used as a spice for cooking various things. But we have to be careful with it. Too much will ruin the dessert!
A Loving Wife
I need some nutmeg for my dish, too, but the market's out of it. Could you ask the farmer if he has some?
Since ancient times, walnuts have been considered a good food for men, making them stronger and smarter. That's why the pharaohs ate so many of them!
A Loving Wife
I'll grind all of these ingredients and mix them together with some sugar and whipped eggs. Could you bring me some walnuts in the meantime? I'll use them to decorate the finished dessert!
Oh gods, this is delicious! My wife knows how much I love dessert – especially her desserts. She's so wonderful!
A Loving Wife
I noticed you've been visiting the Sepat an awful lot recently. What are you and my wife planning?
Many of our weaponsmiths have been through dozens of battles themselves. Now they thrive not on the clash of blades but on the clink of coins. But no one can match their expertise!
The Clink of Coins
The warriors Montu have certainly proved themselves in battle against the pirates. But I'd like to upgrade their combat equipment. Collect the money we need for the weaponsmiths.
I promise you'll be the first to enjoy a mug of my new beer! The watch I need to time the fermentation process is somewhere in the basement. Keeping it from fermenting too long is crucial!
A New Taste
I know the miner uses this special paraffin wax watch when he's underground. I need that watch to make my new beer. Go grab it from the cave!
All of my friends have come over to enjoy my new beer! The taste fest went all night long! Thanks so much for the company. If you ever want more of my drinks, you know where to find me!
A New Taste
How do you like my new beer? Delicious, isn't it? I should hope so! Let's treat everybody who wants a taste. I'm sure they'll all love it. Call them all over here!
You know, maybe there's something to that Eastern wisdom. That cup of tea really did calm my nerves. Ah, I know what gift I'll give the Eastern Empress!
Tea Ceremony
People from the East believe that tea can soothe your mind, giving you clarity of thought and even wisdom. Bring me a cup of tea!
This is the best green tea that grows on our land. I drink it every day myself, so take it from me – one mug can really fix you up when you're feeling weary!
Tea Ceremony
The chief has ordered me to bring him the best teas grown in our city. Could you help me out? Great. Let's start with some green tea!
Bergamot peel extract is a great oil for giving your tea a unique flavor. And it's good for the skin, too. I'm sure the Eastern Empress will love it. She's a woman, after all!
Tea Ceremony
Many ancient rulers of our land preferred drinking black tea with bergamot. Let's collect some. It'll be a nice addition to our gift for the Empress.
Peppermint tea is considered a very feminine drink, as I'm sure the Eastern Empress is aware. Plus, mint is a great break from the heat and can help relieve headaches.
Tea Ceremony
We should definitely add some mint tea to our gift. The Empress will be impressed that our chief was so thoughtful. Let's find some peppermint!
If the people of the East really love tea as much as they say, the Empress will love this gift more than a bouquet of roses! And our chief really wants to make a good impression.
Tea Ceremony
Time for us to remember the drink of the pharaohs. Tea from hibiscus flowers, that is. It would be the perfect adornment for our tea collection!
Everything ready? Mmm, what a great mix of aromas! I think I'll start drinking this more often myself! I hope this gift of mine makes a lasting impression on the Empress.
Tea Bouquet
So how is it going, collecting tea for the Eastern Empress? Remember, I want this to be an exquisite gift, one worthy of the blade she sent me!
It seems there has been a breach in the spirit world, from which this dangerous creature emerged! Without the power of the totem, we would never have been able to send it back. Thank you!
From the Spirit World
This fire salamander just appeared in my house, out of nowhere! I can't catch it on my own. Please help me before it burns my house down to the ground!
The northern sailors are very grateful for our help! Their ships came to our waters to conduct some research, but without knowing the lay of the sea, they got stuck on the reefs!
Sea Dogs
A ship from the north has crashed not far from our shores. We managed to save the sailors, who are warming themselves by the fire. Let's bring them some food!
I just made friends with this boy from the Sepat. We write one another letters, then make origami out of them and slip them through the fence to each other!
A Romantic Message
See that paper dragonfly stuck in that tree there? It's too high up for me to reach. Could you get it for me? It's very important!
Capturing that nimble horse wasn't very easy! I still have to break it in, too. Yeah, that's my plan: riding this steed all the way back to the spirit world!
On Horseback
A heavenly steed has emerged from the spirit world! Help me catch it. This is our only chance to figure out what's going on!
I've never sewn a riding outfit before. Especially not a woman's one. Riding a horse seems like a man's job! But this fabric is excellent, and I've got the patterns, so it's time to get to work!
Talented Seamstress
I don't really like the idea of going off into the spirit world. Anyway, the lady asked me to sew her a riding outfit. To do that, I need some strong fabric and a pattern. Can you help me out?
These needles are made of the best steel! They shouldn't break on us. Now I just have to figure out how to do the sewing. It's not easy sewing an outfit nobody has made before!
Talented Seamstress
The fabric we bought for this outfit is so durable that I've broken several needles already.
Who else would have a thimble if not the tradeswoman? Her daughter Sheriti is quite the troublemaker, after all. Always making more work for her mother, ripping a dress here, some sandals there…
Talented Seamstress
The needle you brought is great. A real pleasure to sew with. But my fingers are really hurting now! Can you ask the tradeswoman for a thimble?

Ah, I recognize this quality Arabian thread! But let's not get distracted. Mistress Nimiru just told me that she's finally managed to bridle the horse. Meaning it's time for me to finish up the work on the outfit!
Talented Seamstress
Ugh, what bad luck! This riding outfit is turning out to be quite a job. So many stitches that I didn't even notice the thread run out. Can you get me some more?
You and the Lady have sewn a fantastic costume. It would even be worthy of the Amazons from the distant isles!
Talented Seamstress
The sky horse now obeys me. I think I'll keep it! And this suit, too.
A chess queen? Last time, this piece indicated that Nimiru was in danger. The Shadow is playing with us again! Oh how I hate all of these dark games…
Riddles in the Dark
Someone broke into my house tonight! I woke and tried to nab him, but he just vanished. Let's look around my room for anything unusual.
I never could have cleared that pile of rocks without you. Thanks! But why did the miner put them here?… Wait, look, a cave! And what a howling noise! Do you think it's a trap?
Riddles in the Dark
I'm doing fine. You and the warrior had no need to be worried! I just heard this strange howling from underground and decided to check it out. It looks like it was coming from this pile of rocks!
My giant end up being just light playing on wall, shadow of little chess piece. Awkward for me, again. But who leave this piece here? I think someone in trouble!
Riddles in the Dark
I wake up from loud howl in my cave! I follow howl and see giant at end of tunnel! I too afraid to go there alone. Maybe you come with me?

The bursts of power from the totem dispersed the darkness that was coming toward us. I've never seen anything like it! This must be the doing of demons from the spirit world. Let's leave this place right away!
Riddles in the Dark
It looks like we've been trapped in this cave! The tentacled shadows on the walls are creeping this way. Attack! Defend your lady!
Sea salt is great for cleansing and rejuvenating the skin! I must make a great impression on the visiting prince and learn what he knows.
Washing Up
I just received a strange message: a certain prince from overseas wants to meet with me. In secret! It looks like he knows something of Menes' plans. Help me get ready for the meeting!
Good fragrant soap is a real rarity in our city. Most women can't afford it. The common people use ashes for bathing and laundry.
Washing Up
I need the best soap this city has to offer, but it won't be easy to find. Maybe one of the merchants from the East has some for sale at the market.
A paper flower and a letter? He's so gallant… The prince says he fears my life is in danger! I must hurry!
Head Over Heels
The prince from overseas has sent me a gift. Why all of this ceremony? We've already agreed to meet! Could you collect the gift from the servant waiting at the port?
Beauty is a woman's greatest weapon in this world of ours. That's why we spend so much time on our appearance. Taking a bath is a whole ritual!
Washing Up
For this important meeting, Nimiru's appearance must be absolutely flawless! I need to bring some water to her washroom and get a bathing bucket ready. Can you help me out?
To keep the skin especially soft, it's important not to wipe it dry immediately. Let the water soak in a little. That's one of us women's little secrets!
Washing Up
We need to get a towel ready for Mistress Nimiru so she can wrap herself up in it after her bath. Let's see what we can find!
A woman always has to take care of her appearance, and a mirror is her most important progress report!
Washing Up
I ordered a new mirror from the miner. It's made out of polished copper and won't crack. Bring it to my room!
I asked the master to make a special wash table for Mistress Nimiru. That will make it much easier for her to use the cosmetics I've made.
A Woman's Treasure
Mistress Nimiru has asked me to bring her the best face and body creams. Let's see what I've got…
The prince's servant brought me a box of chocolates? Wow, how very thoughtful of him! Let's give them a try. Yum! These are delicious! But… but why is my head spinning all of a sudden?
A Cunning Plan
There's a man standing at the gates of the Sepat, holding a box. Go see what he needs. Perhaps he's the servant of the foreign prince, bearing a gift for Mistress Nimiru…
Bah! He couldn't get by without a magic potion. Menes must have put it in Nimiru's food, and it clouded her mind.
Looking for Nimiru
It's hard to believe Menes could have manipulated Nimiru so easily! Something isn't right…
We've searched every last nook and cranny of the city! I'm certain Menes has accomplices! It's probably the Shadow.
Looking for Nimiru
There's a magical barrier around the city that prevents Menes from entering. This means Menes and Nimiru are somewhere there!
This magical creme transforms your appearance! That explains why Menes has been able to remain unnoticed on the city streets! Menes and Nimiru are definitely still in the city!
Looking for Nimiru
We tried to detain the suspicious stranger, but he got away. He dropped this…
A father would spend all the money in the world to see his daughter again!
Looking for Nimiru
Whoever finds my daughter will receive a handsome reward! I give you my word as chief!
These nice shoes. I know what I talk about. After live many years underground my feet very hard, like rock. Now I no wear shoes. Never!
Looking for Nimiru
Place where we ambush Menes very dangerous. We must climb over sharp rocks. You need good shoes if you no want to hurt feet!
This save your life. In cave much water — but not all water good to drink! Me?! Ha ha! I used to drinking any water!
Looking for Nimiru
Where we go, water bad. One gulp, kill! You bring good water with you.
I'm going to pray to the Guide to help us find Nimiru. Give me a mask…
Looking for Nimiru
This mask will help me get in touch with Anubis and ask him to aid our operation to rescue Nimiru.
This talisman should keep you safe from harm. Good luck, and may the gods protect you!
Looking for Nimiru
I recommend taking a decent talisman with you on your trip! I had a bad vision about your journey…
Best way to pound hooks in rock face is hold a safety rope. You scare, are you? I give you a hand!
Looking for Nimiru
We go! Where I take you, no steps. We climb down sheer wall!
Look! This pure copper. I can tell by taste… I surprised copper deposits shaped like bricks. We take them with us!
Looking for Nimiru
You never go so deep underground before? These old caves have more secrets than ancient city. Look, what that over by wall?
Nimiru's consciousness is still being clouded by the drug. Thoth will tell us how to cleanse Nimiru's mind and dispel the sweet fog!
Looking for Nimiru
I'm trying to commune with the god of wisdom! To do this, I need a Thoth mask.
Evil spirits feed on human fear! When people stick together and help each other, spirits afraid of people!
Looking for Nimiru
We go far. At Anubis's pass live spirits. They serve Menes. We no can do it…
This durable safety rope even support elephant. Now you climb without me. At pass you wait, set ambush for Menes and Nimiru!
Looking for Nimiru
This last rise! There path Menes choose when he flee with Nimiru!
The signal fire was a great idea! The soldiers threw themselves at the enemy as soon as they saw the flame. The plan worked! Nimiru is back home!
Looking for Nimiru
I followed you to help you fight Menes! When Menes and Nimiru appear on the road the warriors will attack the enemy from behind!
Tin is an expensive and very durable metal. It's frequently mixed with copper.
Demand for Metal
Many merchants have taken to the idea of making ingots out of metal!
The weaponsmiths were very pleased with our bronze!
Demand for Metal
Weaponsmiths from the south have stopped at the port. They want to buy bronze ingots from us!
This silver ingot is all that's left. Where are the others? Apparently someone warned them we were coming and the thieves had time to hide along with their booty.
Demand for Metal
Last night someone stole several silver ingots. We need to find out who it was and, most importantly, why they need so much silver!
How clever! The Shadow's men started up an underground factory to make the silver masks of their thieves' guild! Now there's no way to tell the thieves apart!
Demand for Metal
The Shadow's men have put together a number of underground headquarters. Let's find every possible refuge of the thieves' guild!
He who has gold has power, and he who has no gold dreams of obtaining that power. Don't you agree?
Demand for Metal
I want to send the chief of the neighboring lands an ingot as a gift so he'll agree to trade with the city.
With new blacksmith's bellows and assistants, work go fast. Now I go back to mining!
Man's Work
Melting metal and casting it into ingots is hard work! We need some new blacksmith's bellows and a hardy worker. Can you help?
We're building foundries in the mines so the workers can make ingots right away. It'll save us a lot of time!
Man's Work
The miner and his assistants are always working on new mine shafts. They need construction materials.
The lute is perfect for this melody. What do you think? Hmm… it isn't quite what I had in mind…
Aquatic Motifs
I've been hearing a melody in my head for several days now! I can't relax until I hear it for real!
My friends have agreed to try playing the melody together! That's more like it…
Aquatic Motifs
My melody is missing the rhythmical sound of a drum and the clear-toned trills of a flute. I'm sure it would come together if I had them!
Perfect! That's just the sound I've been missing! Will you join our little orchestra?
Aquatic Motifs
I can already hear aquatic motifs in this melody — the howl of the squall, the creaking of the deck. But something is still missing…
Where can you find inspiration for a sea shanty if not on the sea itself!?
Aquatic Motifs
That's it! That's it! That's the exact melody I haven't been able to get out of my head. Now I just need to write lyrics for it!
All set! It's as though the sea gods themselves gave this song to all the sailors of the world!
The Sea Shanty
I've got it, I've got it! I'm begging you, hurry! Grab some ink and write the words I'm about to tell you, before I forget!
I killed the tiger it belonged to on my first hunt. After that they started calling me a man!
The Nomad's Story
A necklace I made out of the claws of predators I've defeated broke, and now it's missing! I need to put it back together again while everything is still around here…
I was in the desert with no food. I had to fight a leopard over an antelope! That's right… it was a hell of a fight!
The Nomad's Story
Let's find the other claws as soon as we can! Each of them is connected to a special hunting story.
I got this claw while protecting my first love! The beast had chased her into a cave and was getting ready to attack the poor girl. But I got there just in the nick of time!
The Nomad's Story
Do you think someone took my necklace apart on purpose? I mean, what good is it to anyone? Let's find the next claw!
This claw is connected to the story of our tribe's survival. This cheetah used to attack our flocks. If we hadn't caught it, the tribe would have had no food!
The Nomad's Story
The lost claws from the necklace have been scattered all over the city… could you be right? Did someone really scatter them on purpose?!
Just look how peacefully she was sleeping in my bed while we were looking everywhere for her! She must have followed me, and I didn't notice her!
Little Sleepyhead
A kitten has gone missing from the orphanage. I found her yesterday. I washed her, fed her, and left her with the others. Bot today she's gone. We need to find the poor thing!

Just look at that spry kitty! She's one of Sheriti's pets. So that's who's been raising a ruckus in my pottery studio! She must have been looking for milk in the pitchers. Take her back to the kennel!
The Furry Bandit
Someone broke my new pots and pitchers again! I spent all day making them.
What a juicy apple! I bet it's delicious. I'll take it to the old man by the pier. He's so scrawny, he looks like he hasn't eaten for ages!
A Good Heart
I saw an old beggar at the port! I feel so sorry for him…

The beggars in the city are refugees from villages that have been destroyed by Menes. The only time they every smile anymore is when they see food. People need so little to be happy — nothing more than care and kindness!
A Good Heart
Sheriti told me about the beggar you fed. And that isn't an isolated incident.
We pour boiling water over the mint and let it sit. An hour later we can strain the infusion and take it to calm our nerves.
Emergency Help
Sheriti was so upset because of the beggar that her nerves are shot. We should make her a mint decoction. Find a sprig of mint while I boil some water!

The Shadow's men are showing up all over the place, as though they're being controlled by a single will. It seems the Shadow has managed to possess the souls of all her servants! This pill is the only way to cure them!
The Power of Shadow
Remember that pill we used to exorcise the Shadow from Nimiru's body? We should make more of them. I'm afraid we're going to need a lot more of this "anti-darkness medicine!"
A door hinge! Someone carefully removed it from the entrance and snuck into the house, then kidnapped the master. This is probably connected to the pills.
The Power of Shadow
I went to see the master for the pill you prepared, but he wasn't home, and his things were strewn all over the room. I'm sure something happened to him…

One night I fell into a hunter's pit! Unluckily for me a hungry lion had already been trapped in there for three days. It wasn't just about survival — it was a fight to the death. I defeated the beast with these very hands!
The Nomad's Story
We've almost collected all the claws from the hunting necklace! There's only one left, and it's my favorite. I know where to look for it now. Let's go!
I didn't realize this necklace was special to the nomad. I'll never take it without permission again!
Well-Deserved Punishment
The nomad got mad at me because I was playing with his necklace and lost the whole thing. As a punishment I have to reassemble the necklace.

The master has been saved, but the kidnapper got away! It looks like you managed to injure our enemy. See these drops of blood? He was human. And here I thought we were dealing with the Shadow herself!
The Power of Shadow
My men are on the trail of the master's kidnappers. I know where the Shadow's latest lair is.
