The ring is here? Maybe it fell out of the box while I was looking inside? But that doesn't make any sense…
Horus's Rebellion
The pharoah's ring we used to seal Menes's brother's tomb is missing! The ring must not be allowed to fall into the wrong hands!
The miner says he was attacked next to Menes's brother's tomb! Some kind of creature attacked him from the darkness and then vanished.
Horus's Rebellion
The miner is badly wounded and needs our help. We need to dress his wounds!
Oh no! Horus's mummy has vanished from its sarcophagus! Now the creature is wandering around underground looking for a way out… If it gets out, it'll be a disaster!
Horus's Rebellion
My anxieties have been justified! We need to check the sarcophagus right away! I just hope we aren't too late.
We turned that monster to dust, leaving nothing behind but a pile of smoldering rags. Don't worry, Horus's spirit has been in a better place for a long time. This creature has nothing to do with him!
Horus's Rebellion
We've got a new assignment! We're going underground to destroy Horus's living mummy!
We did it! You know what this means? Castor oil helps with stomach cramps, stimulates hair growth, and is the basis for many medicinal ointments.
Medical Treatise
The first entry I've been able to translate from the papyrus we found describes how to get castor oil from the castor-oil plant. Let's try it!
Our ancestors called sage the "sacred herb." In the texts it says, "it can cure many illnesses if properly harvested."
Medical Treatise
The master is studying a medical treatise. It describes the medicinal properties of sage. You need to pick this herb while saying a special incantation.
It's a good thing we held our ears while we were harvesting it. Otherwise we would have gone deaf from the awful shriek it made. What a strange plant!
Medical Treatise
I found a reference to the mandragora plant in the treatise. Its roots were used to exorcise spirits from people. We should get some!
I gave my patient beer before bed, and in the morning his cough was completely gone! Isn't medicine amazing?
Medical Treatise
You won't believe it! The treatise describes a treatment using beer! Go to the brewer and bring back some beer. I just happen to have a patient who needs this kind of treatment!
The texts describe a number of secrets of longevity. They'll save the citizens on more than one occasion!
The Secrets of Longevity
I've finished translating the treatise! Now I can say with confidence that it's what I've been looking for! It reveals a number of secrets of longevity!
Half-eaten food is a "serious clue?" At most this fruit was eaten by bees, not an enormous beast.
The Enormous Beast
We should start our search for the animal Sheriti saw at the warehouse. If a creature like that was there it must have left a trail!
Huh? Seed shells? Oh no, what awful sounds! I'm sure it was the same animal Sheriti saw in the commercial warehouse!
The Enormous Beast
There were rustling sounds coming from the pantry tonight. I didn't want to risk going inside to see what was happening. It must be that huge beast Sheriti saw!
Get a load of this! The cheese is completely ruined! Someone bit into it all over and left it in the road!
The Enormous Beast
Cheese has started going missing from the brewery… it's odd. Only very small amounts have been disappearing — barely enough to feed a pet hamster.
I didn't notice anything strange… except for these half-eaten berries. But it would be absurd to say these marks were make by the teeth of any large creature…
The Enormous Beast
I've heard rumors that you're hunting an enormous beast. Should I check up on my crops? I will!
The damage isn't too severe, but the bread is no good… what nonsense! If a huge animal had found its way in here it would have gobbled up everything in sight!
The Enormous Beast
Is it true?! Is there really a huge beast in the city?! Oh no! All our hand-wringing over ruined bread seems comical now. You want me to show you? Okay, let's go…
I kept her in my pocket so Mom wouldn't find out about her. Sometimes she would run away and, apparently, go snack on whatever she wanted. Can I leave her with you?
The Enormous Beast
I have to admit, I got scared when I saw the shadow of a huge beast on the wall, but it turns out to be nothing more than a cute little mousy! He's the one who's been ruining food in the city.
Menes look for something. He send his men to brother's tomb, then to father's tomb. It good we track down robbers and get everything back!
The Robbery of the Century
Menes's servants manipulate me! They break into tomb of Pharaoh Menetnasht and steal all valuables!
If we use special spells and the power of nature we can turn any metals we mine into gold.
Ancient Alchemy
I've got an idea about how to increase our gold stores using ancient science and magic.
The new medicine works amazingly fast. Wounds close before your very eyes. The ancient healers were worthy of respect!
New Medicine
The master has made a healing ointment based on sage. I'll rub some on the miner's wounds, and he'll be well again in a few days. Go get it, and hurry!
The say the recipes for these new medicines were written by our ancestors. The ointments are truly amazing. The merchants are prepared to play big money for them!
New Medicine
I got a huge batch of medicinal ointments from the master. He asked me to distribute them at the market, sell them to merchant ships, and send a caravan to the south.
The pie came out great! How could we not try to cheer the boy up? He just came to the orphanage, so we need to surround him with warmth and care. Come join us. Have a slice of pie!
Homemade Pies
It's one of my wards' birthday today. I ordered an apple pie from the baker to celebrate. Could you go pick it up while I get ready for the party?
I'm glad you stopped by. What smells so good? Yum, a berry pie! Come on in. Have a seat and tell me about the latest news from the city!
Homemade Pies
We haven't seen each other in an eternity! I'd like to invite you to come over today for pie and tea. I'll bring the tea with honey, you bring the pies. I'll be waiting!
No one makes pies like the baker! I need something to fortify myself with during my long desert voyage. There isn't much to eat among the desert sands, and I won't have time to cook!
Homemade Pies
I know where we can find delicious meat pies for the road! Care to join me?
I've traveled quite a bit in other lands and can tell you for sure that our brewer brews the most delicious beer around! There's a reason travelers from all over the world love to visit our city!
Good Company
These meat pies the baker made are exceptional! It's time for a mug of divine brew. Let's go to our friend's place and have a glass of foamy beer!
You've got a real knack for baking! I'm impressed!
Homemade Pies
Nimiru asked me to bake her a chocolate pie. But I've got so many orders I'll never find the time…
Some important personages have deigned to visit our land again, and the Chief wants to give them a proper reception. I'm choosing the food, and the Brewer is going to brew a little more wheat beer!
A Grand Reception
Whenever important guests come to the city most of the work ends up falling on me. Bring the brewer some wheat and make all the food we need for the feast!
This striped pie is meant for the Lady. The potter loves his wife so much he's constantly coming up with special new presents for her!
Homemade Pies
My head is spinning from all these orders. Each one is more elaborate than the last! Today I have to make a black and white pie.
I think the chief's guests will be pleased with our spread!
A Grand Reception
You know about the grand reception the chief is throwing for the important guests, right? I've been asked to bake my finest pies.
When I live underground I must learn to eat what there: underground mushrooms, transparent fish, shiny moss. But when I come to surface I discover lentils! My stomach love them!
Favorite Food
My food supply running out. But I no want go out into light of day today!
This book describes sea routes, dangerous waters, and coastlines. Aside from us, no other seafarer has access to this knowledge!
Across the Sea
I'm getting ready for a sea voyage. I have to determine a route for the journey. I need an atlas for this.
Thank you for never refusing to help. I thought that basin could never be fixed. Thanks to you my little ragamuffins won't have to walk around dirty!
Second Life
The old basin I use to wash clothes broke at the worst possible moment. I've got so much children's clothes to wash!
That was a great game! I'm hard to find. I know this city like the back of my hand. Next time you get bored you can come back here. We can race each other!
Children's Games
I'm guessing you have nothing to do. Me too! Feel like playing a game? Count to a hundred while I hide, and then you can try to find me. No peeking!
Are you sure you can glue the pot back together again? That's great! I can't sell it, but I can give it to the Lady. She'll find a use for it!
Second Life
I accidentally bumped into one of the flower pots and broke it. Do I really have to throw it out?
I'm so glad you can handle making wax out of the old honeycombs. Then they can serve our citizens for a long time to come as candles.
Second Life
I've got a lot of old honeycombs, and I've heard other beekeepers have some way to melt them down and make wax out of them.
Beauties from many countries know that our ancient lady rulers made themselves clay masks every day. That's why their skin became so smooth and delicate!
A Strange Power
Help me collect some more clay from the riverbed. Hordes of merchants have flooded our city, and they only want to buy our clay. They say this is the very best part of the river!
I hear eastern empress endure attacks by nomadic tribes. She want build around her country big stone wall and hide behind it. This hard work!
The Construction Project of the Century
I need prepare big pile of construction materials. Chief say he want sell it to eastern empress. I need your help. This hard work!
Fixing fishing nets isn't easy. Not every fisherman knows how to do it. Thanks for agreeing to help me. It'll go a lot faster if we work together!
Second Life
During our last fishing trip we found an enormous tuna, it was so big we couldn't pull it into the boat. It tore through the net and swam out to sea. You haven't fixed a fishing net before, have you?
Thank you for your help! My fighters' training equipment needs to be in tip-top shape. The only time they put it down is when they go to bed!
Second Life
I've been training warriors from the Montu clan, and during one of the fights a practice shield broke. Could you fix it for me? I've got a lot to do in the ring…
I don't know where your country is, but if everyone there is as skillful as you your entire society must be flourishing! Take these tools. You'll find a use for them.
A Well-Earned Reward
The citizens have been singing your praises lately. They say you never refuse to help and never ask for anything in return for your work. I'd like to give you a little something for this!
I want my soldiers to know their commander it taking care of them. As soon as the wounded man recovers he will gladly share this bottle with his comrades and drink to your health!
The Caring Commander

One of my soldiers incapacitated an entire gang of the Shadow's servants singlehandedly. But he took a real beating. I want to reward him for what he did. Can you help me choose a beer for him? Something tasty?
I remember when I was a young man I used to daydream about being led into battle. This sound made me want to perform feats of valor, and then come home because of it!
The Grand Send-Off
The mariner's ship is leaving today on a journey to distant shores. We should give these brave sailors a proper send-off with the sound of fanfare! Can I count on you?

Do you see a dolphin too? So I wasn't mistaken! That's a good sign. The dolphin is the master of the seas, just like the mariner's ship. I get the feeling his journey was successful and he's coming back soon!
Omens in the Sky
Let's try to tell our fortunes in the sky to find out about the campaign the mariner has set out on. We haven't had any news of him for a while. Pay attention to all the fish-shaped signs!

It's a horse! I didn't see it at first. It must be connected to the warrior — he's a good rider, after all. But the horse has always been considered a messenger. I think the warrior is going to tell us some news pretty soon!
Omens in the Sky

Okay, in my opinion our first attempt at reading omens in the sky was a success. We'll find out for sure when the mariner gets back. For now let's learn something about someone else who lives in the city. The warrior, for example!
We saw two human figures, a boy and a girl. They were flying through the air on their way to one another, and then they were united right over the market. What could it mean?
Omens in the Sky
I'm eager to hear the news the warriors wants to share with us. Let's try to find out about it on our own. Keep a close eye on the sky and the clouds racing through it!

The cloud turned into a heart. There can be no doubt! I think everything should be clear now. I'd wager Bastet has decided to unite the destinies of the warrior and the tradeswoman. We'll find out soon enough!
Omens in the Sky
The cloud in which the figures of the boy and girl merged is still changing shape. Don't look away from it. In a moment we'll get the answers to our questions!

The castle probably symbolizes our city. And its massive size is our future prosperity. Time will tell whether this is true. After all, the clouds are just as changeable as everything else in this world!
Future Prosperity
I can see that telling fortunes from the sky can be useful. We had good luck reading the omens. Hey, what's that new cloud in the sky? It looks like an enormous palace or castle!
It's going to be a big wedding! All our friends are invited. No one knew Mom and the warrior had been dating for a long time. But I figured it out, and I wanted them to get married!
Wedding Kerfuffle

You know my mom and the warrior are going to get married, right? I'm so happy for them! They asked me to put together a guest list and post it in high-traffic areas throughout the city. Can you help me?

Honey masks tighten and cleanse the skin on the face. Ancient beauties always used this method to appear younger. We're not about to let them outdo us! A bride should look her best on her wedding day!
Wedding Kerfuffle
When the tradeswoman said she was going to marry the warrior I was thrilled. So I promised to help her get cleaned up for the wedding. We're going to need your help. Bring us some fragrant honey!
I like these rings! I'm sure my fiancée will like them too!
Wedding Kerfuffle
Finding rings for the wedding is my job! But I'm a simple guy. I don't know the first thing about jewelry…
This oil is one of the best ways to stay desirable. It makes you smell like flowering spring roses.
Wedding Kerfuffle
A bride should be as fragrant as a rose on her wedding day! I know one method that works like a charm…
Now that's a cake! I've never baked anything like it before. It's a dish worthy of pharaohs and queens!
Wedding Kerfuffle
I've been tasked with baking a wedding cake! There's going to be a lot of guests, so I've got no shortage of work! I need to get started if I want to finish on time.
What beautiful horses! Look at their posture, their powerful legs! They're a worthy adornment for our celebration!
Wedding Kerfuffle
Come on, let's go pick a couple of horses for the wedding procession! Good horse always cost good money.
By the gods! This is the most beautiful bouquet I've ever seen!
Wedding Kerfuffle
I want a bouquet of the most beautiful flowers on my wedding day! It should go with my wedding dress and hairdo…
We did it! The wedding altar looks great — it's worthy of our bride and groom. Bastet is protecting those two. They're truly a lovely couple, like the male and female principles made flesh!
Wedding Kerfuffle
The wedding altar still isn't ready!? How am I supposed to perform the wedding ceremony for the warrior and the tradeswoman?
This is a nice thread. It's really sturdy! It'll be perfect for the charm. The color yellow symbolizes the sun and warmth. Nimiru says it fills people with energy. It's just what I need!
Lucky Charm
Nimiru taught me how to weave charms out of colored threads. Now I've decided to make one on my own. Help me find the threads. We can start with a yellow one!
The color red symbolizes war. That's why soldiers wear red uniforms.
Lucky Charm
We need a red thread for the charm. You can get one from the city guards. They wear red uniforms, and they must have to mend them with something!

White is the color of inner purity! All gods are illuminated in bright white when they descend to the human world. People who have left for the next world also glow if they behaved well when they were alive!
Lucky Charm
We need the color white for the charm. It's the color of the city and her people. Many of our gods are depicted wearing white garments. If you find me a thread, I'll tell you why!
This blue thread will be perfect for the charm! Ever since ancient times the color blue has symbolized fear. He who understands the nature of fear is protected against its excessive manifestation.
Lucky Charm
We need a blue thread for the charm. The mariner might have one. He has all kinds of things. The color blue will remind me of the sea!
The color green symbolizes the power of nature. Nimiru says both gods and men are not separate from nature. We make use of the benefits that she shares with us so generously.
Lucky Charm
I just need a green thread, and then I'll be done. If you find one I'll be able finish your charm in a jiff!
You're constantly surrounded by danger, but the charm will protect you. It really is imbued with magical power! For some reason Sheriti was too embarrassed to give it to you.
Lucky Charm
Did you know that little Sheriti has woven a charm for you? She did it herself and brought it to me.
You actually found Osiris's rod! This means the city has been infiltrated by a fugitive form the next world. I've got to warn Nimiru!
Fugitive from the Next World
I had a vision where a dark soul left the next world by using Osiris's rod. If this is true, we have to find that rod and give it to Nimiru!
I don't know who it was, but we managed to give him a scare… thanks! At one point I thought this night was going to be my last…
Fugitive from the Next World
Help! Something is chasing me! I couldn't make him out in the darkness, but my attacker didn't look human…
Yikes! I'm really afraid of those creepy-crawly lizards! Where did it come from? Large snakes don't live in the city…
Hidden Fears
Help! A huge python slithered into our house and attacked my husband! Right now the snake is hiding somewhere in the halls. Find it before somebody gets hurt!
This how I understand: we need cup of oblivion so dark soul that leave next world drink from it. When it get body, you splash it with cup. Then it go back to Osiris!
Fugitive from the Next World
Nimiru say we must go very deep underground to gate of next world and find cup of oblivion.
Did you see the mandibles on that thing?! I thought my bees were done for! Thank you for your help!
Hidden Fears
A large poisonous spider snuck into the apiary! It destroyed the hive and wove itself a web there. If this goes on much longer the spider will kill all my bees!
Praise the gods! The evil beast left the warehouse! It's just a shame it ruined so much food. We'll have to throw it all away!
Hidden Fears
Rat! There's a gigantic rat in the warehouse! It attacks anyone who tries to approach it. What can I do?
There's a legend about a wise man who was haunted for a long time by a certain thought. Then he turned that thought into a butterfly and let it go.
A Thought Come to Life
The gods sent me a message on the wings of a lunar butterfly.
People's fears are materializing right out of the darkness. I'm sure the Shadow and her sorcery have something to do with this.
Hidden Fears
Something odd is going on in the city. People are hallucinating and seeing their most deep-seated fears. We need to keep the citizens calm until we figure this out.
You hear awful cry? I think totem help us purge evil power from my cave. I feel no more worry in my heart. Thank you for help!
Hidden Fears
Some kind of enemy hide underground. I sense presence. I see shadows come to life and move along passageway walls. We must drive this evil from my home!
I'd never risking chasing down that monster by myself. This awful mask is a creation of the Shadow. But who is this ally she has now? And why does this person inspire such fear?
Hidden Fears
Some kind of huge creature attacked me! I'm sure it wasn't the Shadow, or even her servants! It was something even more terrifying! We need to find out what it was!
The Spirit of Fear has become quite powerful. The citizens' phobias are lending this creature strength. Soon it will become corporeal!
Hidden Fears
It seems the evil spirit that fled the next world is the embodiment of Fear. It's time to return the fugitive to Osiris's court!

This monster appeared right out of the darkness that I was trying to keep at bay. It's been feeding on people's fears and growing this entire time. And the Shadow's servants helped it by tossing snakes, spiders, and rats into people's homes!
Hidden Fears
The citizens' phobias have reached their limit, and the spirit of Fear has assumed a corporeal shell. We need to send it back to the next world!
This is fresh meat! It should make some excellent chops for the soldiers. They really love meat dishes. Oops, I blabbed a little. All the soldiers in the city have been invited to the celebration!
The Great Feast
A grand celebration is coming to the city, but I can't reveal the details to you yet. You'll find out about it all soon enough. In the meantime, bring me some more meat. I need it for the feast!

Good job! We've got enough cooked food to feed the entire city! Oops, I blabbed again. Yeah… there are going to be a lot of guests. But just be patient a little longer. Everything will become clear very soon!
The Great Feast
Meat alone won't be enough for the upcoming feast. We need lots of different kinds of food.

Was the tradeswoman happy? Great. By the way, you don't know what this celebration is, do you? They asked me to brew so much beer it would take all the people of the city to drink it in one sitting. Or in a week, for that matter!
The Great Feast
The tradeswoman asked me to bring her my best chicken for hors d'oeuvres so she could try it. She wants to order another feast. But I've got so many customers at this time of day…
It's a good thing we managed to find this tree! The boys weren't lying. There's fruit here to spare. I'm so stuffed I think I'll skip lunch today!
Gardening Matters
The boys say that a large fig tree is growing nearby. The figs have already ripened. Let's go take a look. I'd love to snack on some fresh figs!
The new pomegranate tree is even better than the old one! I can already see huge red pomegranates growing on it.
Gardening Matters
The pomegranate tree in my garden died after the last storm. It was struck by lightning. But my kids love pomegranates so much!
Now the midnight garden raids will stop. I mean, I don't mind giving the kids an apple or two, but I can't forget about the people of the city!
Gardening Matters
The neighbor boys have been climbing into my garden through the dilapidated fence and stealing fruit. Can you help me plug the hole? We need some construction materials!
What a beautiful creature! I can feel verses of a new poem being born in my mind. I'm going to write them down and read them to my wife right away!
The Wings of Inspiration
Beautiful natural phenomena inspire me with a drive to write poetry. Earlier today I saw a gorgeous butterfly, but it quickly fluttered away.
"Any soul, even the most fallen, is worthy of empathy! Every soul contains a primordial light. And there is hope that this light will dispel even the most impenetrable darkness!"
A View on Life
I've guessed at the meaning of a few more of our ancestors' symbols from the ancient writings. I want to translate some of the text of "Rebirth" so I can confirm my guesses!
It says here that the gods as we know them do not exist. Anyone can become a god if he frees himself from ignorance and sees the world clearly. It's a pretty presumptuous theory, if you ask me!
A View on Life
The author of this piece had a very interesting view on life. Let's see what he has to say in "Deification!"

That white flag saved the pirates' lives! Otherwise I swear by the gods of the deep my ship would have reduced their vessel to splinters. The islanders we saved became our allies and gave us lots of gifts!
Victories at Sea
It's good to see you again! My journey to distant seas was a success. Would you like to hear about how cowardly pirates raised the white flag as soon as they saw the Master of the Seas' sails?

Discovering new seafaring routes means creating new possibilities for trade and alliances. In time the mariner will establish connections between the city and the peoples of other lands, just as it was in our ancestors' day!
Victories at Sea
The fortunes we told using the clouds came true! As you can see, the mariner's last trip was successful. He brought back a good haul. See about distributing it in the city's warehouses!

You hear songs of praise and the sounds of fanfare in our city more and more often nowadays! Do you know why? Because we've been having fewer defeats and more victories. That means real heroes have appeared among us!
Victories at Sea
I'm satisfied with the mariner's latest voyage and want to thank him! Find some sacred hymns. I want our citizens to perform them in honor of our hero and his fearless crew!
Hey, that's a zebra shark, or stegostoma! It isn't a threat to humans unless it's provoked. This predator eats shellfish and crabs. It's no danger to fishermen!
Sharp Jaws
There have been a lot of sharks in our waters recently. The fishermen are complaining about it. They're afraid to sail the sea. Let's find our what species of shark we're dealing with!
The rhincodon, or "whale shark!" Despite its enormous size it only eats plankton. But what could have led it and a flock of stegostomas to our shores?
Sharp Jaws

Rumor has it some kind of huge fish has appeared in the sea. It hasn't attacked anyone yet, but the citizens are starting to get pretty worried. You and I should go see what the tide has brought into our harbor!
By the sea gods! It's a hammerhead shark, one of the most dangerous fish in the sea. The fishermen were very lucky not to have been thrown overboard. No one gets away from that predator alive!
Sharp Jaws

Have you heard about the shark that attacked the fishing boats? The fishermen barely made it to shore, and they left their net in the water. Let's find out what happened there and try to catch the aquatic predator!
We got there just in time to save a sailor who had fallen overboard from this monster's jaws! Just look — beasts like this haven't lived in the sea for a long time. They all died off many years ago!
Sharp Jaws
I think the appearance of sharks in our waters is due to spells cast by magicians from the islands who… do you hear that shouting? It sounds like someone is calling for help. We need to hurry!
The helicoprion is yet another prehistoric creature! Its teeth never stop growing. Sharp new teeth replace old diseased ones, forming a bony spiral. This shark can bite a man in half in an instant!
Sharp Jaws
First the deep-waters' servants sent fish to our waters to lure other predators. Now ancient monsters have appeared. Who knows what to expect next? Stay on guard!
Without your help my ship's crew could never have defeated that prehistoric monster! The megalodon has terrified sailors all over the world, but we defeated it and freed our waters from predators!
The Lord of the Abyss
We're in grave danger! The deep-water priests have summoned the lord of the abyss from the depths of the sea. I'm going to set sail in my ship to fight it. Are you with me?

This will help the fisherman make a quick recovery. His wounds aren't serious, but they are numerous. He says he was up to his waist in the water casting his net when a school of bloodthirsty fish attacked him!
Fishing Failure
A careless sailor was recently attacked by aquatic predators not far from the shore. We need some healing powder to treat his wounds. Can you help me?
I hope we can save the poor citizen's life. I dressed his wound and stopped the bleeding. The fishermen say he slipped and fell in the water, where a hammerhead shark was waiting for him!
The Dangerous Sea

Another citizen has fallen victim to the teeth of aquatic predators. But this time the poor soul wasn't able to get away with just tiny bites. Hurry, bring me clean bandages so I can dress his wounds.
We did a great job! The sakh is a human body that, after Osiris's judgment, is inhabited by the Ba, his life force. And he can continue his life in the next world.
Another World
Today it is my duty to send one of our citizens to the next world. His body has to undergo all the funeral rites and become a sakh, or mummy. Can you help me with this?
A sheut is a dark human soul. All souls depart with their owners for the next world. But the Shadow has managed to avoid this fate. In order to defeat her we need to find out who her owner was.
The Mystery of the Shadow
I managed to learn a few things about the Shadow's origin and why we can't seem to kill her. I've told you a bit about human souls. Remember the one called Sheut?
As you remember, he who controls all the crowns of kings and gods will rule this land. Right now the crowns are in our treasure room awaiting their ruler. This infuriates Menes!
Dirty Theft

Sound the alarm! The Shadow stole Tefnut's crown from our treasure room. I'm sure she wants to give it to Menes. We can't allow her to do that. Come on, let's chase her down before the thieving woman flees the city!

Ever since the Shadow learned how to control the minds of her servants fighting them has gotten a lot harder. But no one has ever withstood the power of the totem. Let's show them who's boss in our city!
Disturbances on the Streets

The Shadow's servants have gone out into the city streets and are causing trouble. The citizens are hiding in their homes out of fear of this black mob of thieves and murderers. Let's put them in their place!
Angolluma has sharp hooks on its leaves, probably to help it defend against animals. Its five-pointed flower with its velvety petals resembles a starfish. It's an unusual plant!
Desert Plants
I'm currently studying succulent plants. They can store moisture in their leaves. It's an interesting phenomenon. Care to join me? Then bring me an angolluma. A fascinating specimen!
Look at what interesting leaves this little guy has. Unlike other plants, succulent plants aren't flat, but round, just like fruit. I'm going to add this sample to my collection!
Desert Plants
I want to compile an encyclopedia of succulent plants. These plants have lots of interesting characteristics and can be used as a medicine or a poison. Today I need a red stonecrop!

Who'd have thought? I've seen that ridiculous plant in the desert a hundred times. Apparently its juice clears up freckles and makes skin look younger. I need to try this jovibarba stuff for myself and see if it works!
Desert Plants
I heard that the master has discovered a new kind of cosmetic for young women. It's called green jovibarda. But I can't even imagine what it looks like. Could you help me find some?
These plants multiply in such an interesting way. It's simple: just tear off a leaf and put it in water. As soon as it puts out roots you can replant it.
Desert Plants
The master suggested we buy up a useful plant for the city. It's called haworthia. Could you help me with this? We'll need a little money and some free time!
This plant absorbs and stores moisture not just thanks to the shape of its leaves. It has no stems at all, which allows the bud to stay closer to the soil. Simply amazing!
Desert Plants
Find me another interesting succulent plant that grows around here. It's called sempervivum. The plant's appearance is as bizarre as its name.

When the leaves of succulent plants are removed from the plant itself they begin to live on their own and can easily be crossbred among themselves. Thanks to this characteristic you and I have managed to breed an entirely new species!
New Appearance
While studying succulent plants — fascinating flora that are well-suited to our climate — I came to understand their nature. I've got an idea! Can you help me?
My favorite cup is broken… you really think it isn't worth getting upset about? You know, in my country they say a broken dish brings good luck. I'll order another cup from the potter!
White Stripe
I wanted to have some tea and fresh-baked bread, but I can't seem to find my favorite cup. Where on earth did it go? Can you help me find it?
Some people believe that if you hang an upside-down horseshoe over your front door you'll have happiness and wealth. In this position the horseshoe symbolizes a full cup!
White Stripe
Since I have a family now I want to make sure we always have a happy home. Can you help me with a certain matter? Let's find a good horseshoe. I want to hang it over our front door!
This is the exact tree I was looking for. Let's take it to the garden at once. In order for the magic to work you need to plant a gold coin under the tree's roots.
White Stripe
I want to grow a money tree in the garden to bring prosperity to our home. Its leaves look like coins. Do you know what it looks like? Can you help me find one?
Hey, those are my lucky dice! I always take them with me. I'm a diehard gambler. I just love spending an evening with a mug of beer and a good game. No one can beat me!
White Stripe
I wanted to go to the brewery today to play some dice. But I lost my dice somewhere. I can't play without them — I'll lose for sure. Help me!
We sent the letter to the beekeeper! Now he should copy it and send it to one of his friends, and then the luck spell will work. Isn't it great?
White Stripe

I found out about a certain ancient ritual that brings good luck to all your loved ones. You just write a special letter with an incantation in it. But I still don't know all the hieroglyphs, so I need your help!
We really got lucky! Seeing a double rainbow is very good luck. Go on, make your most sacred wish. It'll definitely come true — that's what ancient wisdom tells us!
The Power of Desire
Our ancestors were right about the star that rose over the city. Over the last few days I've seen so many happy smiles on the citizens' faces. Hey, what's that up there in the sky? Do you see it?

Yup, that's a heavy box! And this is just the beginning. I get the feeling this move will take a long time. But who cares? Afterward we're going to live together. To be honest, I've been waiting for this for a long time!
The Long Move
The tradeswoman and Sheriti are going to move in with me in a few days. Moving is a big job. My girls have a lot of stuff. I'd really appreciate it if you could help them move a box or two!

Thanks for your help! This flower is very important to me. My mother gave it to me when Sheriti was born. She said that as long as the flower continues to grow and give off a sweet aroma my daughter will be safe from harm.
The Long Move
You know that Sheriti and I are moving in with my husband, right? He said you would help if we need to move something. Grab the flower pot, would you?

This is a painting by my grandfather. He remembered how beautiful these lands were before Menes appeared. And he always used to tell me about it and draw the Ancient City and its gods and heroes in his paintings!
The Long Move
I can't wait to get to the warrior's house. But we still have so many things left to move. Let's take this painting together!

Of course, the house is ready for us to move in, but sometimes I get the feeling it's missing something. And then I want to fix it. Well, what do you expect? The people I love are going to be living here!
New Home

I built a special new home for my family within the barracks. But it looks like construction isn't completely finished yet. I'd appreciate it if you could help me with boards and other construction materials!

I really like this set! I'm going to take it to my new house. There are so many plates and cups here. I hope that in time our family will grow and grow, and then all these dishes will definitely come in handy!
The Long Move
I've decided to replace all my dishes for our new home. I'm getting ready to look at a few things at the market. Care to join me? We can find something interesting more quickly if we work together.
All done! Thank you so much for your help. Now my girls can move into our new home. As soon as we've settled in you should definitely come over for a visit. Our home is your home!
New Home
Our new home is almost ready. Now we need to glue a few joints together in the wall. Go find some vegetable adhesive while I fill these holes!
This is a very valuable vase. It was made back when the gods walked the earth freely and this land was ruled by wise pharoahs. I hope this vase will be filled with flowers very soon!
The Long Move
The only thing left to bring to the new house is a vase for flowers. I'd really appreciate it if you could take care of this. In the meantime Sheriti and I will clean up!
Wow, thank you! I really thought I'd lost the keys to my new home. Mom and the warrior wouldn't have liked that very much. From now on I'm going to wear them around my neck!
New Home
My mother and I finally moved into our new house, where we're going to live with the warrior. He gave me keys to the front door. Oh no… where did they go? Did I really lose them?
My father believed that amber is a gift from the soil. And red amber contains enormous energy. If you bury it in a garden bed the soil will give the city bountiful harvests!
Earth Magic
Soon it will be time to sow the soil. I want to perform a few fertility rituals. Perhaps you would like to help me with this? Okay, find a piece of red amber!

If we tell the customers that honey isn't just healthy, but can also be used to make masks for the skin, it'll sell even more quickly. The island's beauties will buy it all up in the blink of an eye, you'll see!
Fragrant Honey

Many of our neighbors already know how delicious my bees' honey is. Well, now some merchants from the islands have decided to buy some from me to try it. Bring them all there is. They can take it home to their kids!
In ancient times our ancestors believed that before sowing the soil one should honor all the gods of fertility. That's why we give them a sacrifice of crops left over from the last harvest!
Earth Magic
We need to conduct another fertility ritual. While I try to remember the words to the prayer you can go to the warehouse and collect all the crops and fruit left over from the last harvest!
Magicians often use black amber for their occult activities. This amber carries a curse placed by Menes. It was hidden under the miner's cot in order to incapacitate our friends. But why?
Menes's Kingdom
Something has happened to the miner. He suddenly came down with some strange illness, and I can't seem to help him. It must be black magic. Let's try to find the source together!

We've got the crown back! The hallways the thieves led us down turned out to be quite dangerous. Menes must have wanted to leave us without a guide, so he cursed the miner. But the totem's power didn't let us down!
Menes's Mischief

There's been a robbery! This time Pschent's crown has been stolen. The servants of Menes and the Shadow took it underground. Without the miner it'll be hard to catch the thieves and stop them. We'll have to use the totem!
The potter loves it when I wear this cape. He gave it to me on one of our dates. He thinks I look irresistible in it. I think so too!
Dinner with Friends
The warrior and the tradeswoman have invited me and my husband over for dinner. Our families are going to become friends. I’d like to wear a lace cape to dinner. Can you help me find one?

Oh, thank you so much! I’m a little worried. This is the first time since the wedding we’ve decided to plan a dinner with another family. The Lady and I are old friends, but the warrior and the potter are so different…
Dinner with Friends
The potter and the Lady are going to come over for a visit! But I’ve still got so much to do, and Sheriti has run off somewhere. I need to clean the house and buy groceries. Can I count on your help?

I told you, it’s as though the cicadas warned us about the danger and gathered in one place from all over the city. I didn’t get a look at our enemy, but the power of the totem frightened it. Apparently the beast is yet another creation of the Shadow.
A Bad Presentiment

I’m feeling nervous! And my nerves never deceive me. It’s so quiet in the city that all you can hear is the chirping of the cicadas, and I don't like it that way. Let’s search the perimeter. We should arm ourselves with the totem just in case!

This bird cackles so hideously! It must have been a raven once. But what has it transformed into now? It’s as though its skeleton is covered in shadow. Maybe we should show it to Nimiru. She has to see it!
Skin and Bones

Come with me, hurry! You’ve never seen anything like this before. I noticed a strange bird near the house. But there’s something sinister about it, as though it isn’t alive. We definitely need to catch it!

I’m going to travel the desert at night. It’s the only way I can catch the necromancers’ trail. The map of stars in the sky will guide me. Nimiru wants to know if the magicians are planning something against the city…
The Secret Mission

I’m headed into the desert with a very important mission. My path is long and hidden from the naked eye. I need a map of the starry sky. It’s the only way I’m going to be able to stay on track. Help me find one!

People say all kinds of things. I never believe anything until I’ve seen it with my own eyes. Rumor has it necromancy was involved in this… what do you think, are these creatures dangerous? What do they want with my ships?
Skin and Bones

You won’t believe what’s happening at the port. The river is swarming with strange black creatures that look like fish. But instead of flesh, these creatures’ skeletons are covered in darkness. Come on, you have to see this!
This creature resembles the skeleton of a turtle. It looks harmless, but you understand that we have no idea what to expect from it. The children’s safety is my top priority!
Skin and Bones
My wards found one of the creatures that appeared recently in the city. They dragged it into the yard, and now they’re trying to play with it. Could you get them to stop this bizarre game?

Thank you for your help! It’s a good the camel didn’t get too far. He must have been drawn by the smell of fresh bread from the bakery. Last time he snuck into the potter’s shop and smashed all the pots!
The Secret Mission
I have important news for Nimiru. I was in such a hurry that I forgot to tie up my camel! The curious animal won’t stand still for long. Find him before it’s too late!

I heard something rustling in the cellar, and when I went down there I thought that ball of darkness was one of Sheriti’s cats. But when a beam of light fell on it I realized that I was seriously mistaken. I think the townsfolk call these creatures skeletons…
Skin and Bones

Help me, quick! A creepy creature crawled into my cellar. It’s in the corner, and it hisses at me like a demon from the underworld every time I try to go down there. Something needs to be done about this!

One of the necromancers’ curses says that one must enchant an “innocent bone” and bury it. Then the earth will divulge its hiding places, and the dead will become the living! Menes cast a spell on Sheriti’s tooth and brought us all this grief…
What You Sow…

I’ve received important information about what kind of curse has been making animal remains rise from the ground. Sheriti is mixed up in this. You need to find the tooth she lost, and then I’ll tell you what’s going on!
It look like there no end to mess with Sheriti’s tooth! Curse still in effect. Skeletons start attacking people. If earth must give up all their bones, me not even want to think what happen next!
Skin and Bones
Me awfully scared! In one cave me meet creepy monster: skeleton. Me barely get away from its blades. You my last hope! Who else deal with beast from underworld?
That dragon was destroyed by our ancestors in ancient times. And now, thanks to necromancy, it was reborn. If not for the rays of the morning sun we could never have defeated it. Your trick worked!
Ancient Horror
Sound the alarm! The city is in danger! Grab your weapons and follow me! The miner was right. The earth was holding a real ancient horror in its depths. We need to stand against it!

A magician emerged from the darkness. He was no longer human, and he was being controlled by someone else’s will. He wanted to stab me through the heart with this knife, but I managed to knock it out of his hands and run away. I don’t know where he is right now…
Skeleton Weaponry

I found the last necromancer in the desert. He told me that Menes is responsible for everything we’ve suffered, and then I left him. But last night the old man came to me himself. Would you like to see what he brought?
You really beat that guy up! What happened to him? He evaporated as soon as the sunlight touched him… all that’s left of him is his bone bow. Yet another foul creation of necromancy…
Skeleton Weaponry
The guards found an enemy archer on the roof of one of the houses. He’s already wounded several people, but we can’t seem to subdue and disarm him. Could you take care of it?

Drink, drink, and don’t interrupt! The savage necromancers swore they would serve whoever could dig up their earthly remains and give them a new physical form. It looks like Menes and the Shadow found a way to do it…
Arisen from the Sand
I bet you want to know why skeletons have started coming to our world, eh? Have a seat, sip some palm wine, and listen to my vision. A great danger is coming…
That black warrior was armed with a sword. He was a strong opponent. He attacked the soldiers furiously, with no concern for being wounded. If there are more like him, we’re going to be in trouble!
Skeleton Weaponry
Yet another spy snuck into the barracks. It was a skeleton. It’s hard to kill something that’s already been deprived of life. Help me incapacitate it before it hacks up half my soldiers!
Skeletons wrapped in clumps of darkness like flesh. Me think Shadow give them bodies like that. Light of totem rip false flesh from them, and then our enemies become vulnerable!
Surprise Attack
Hurry, horde of skeletons escape from underground. We must stave off their assault. In darkness, they practically invincible. Only magic help us!

Now that our foes have maces and axes they’ve become ever stronger. They’re crushing our soldiers like reeds. Is there really no way we can resist them? It’s been a long time since I met such a mighty enemy on the battlefield!
Skeleton Weaponry
A couple of heavily-armed skeletons climbed out of the earth and attacked the townsfolk. We’re going to need all our strength to withstand this deadly assault. Get your weapons ready!

Earlier we could have ripped the shadowy cloaks from the skeletons and then finished them off. But now that they’re hiding behind these shields their formation will be impossible to break. They’ll sweep everything from their path…
Battle Formation
The scouts have reported that an armed squadron of skeletons is approaching the city. It won’t be easy to defeat them. They’re marching in formation behind a wall of bone shields!

I knew I could always count on you. The Shadow’s servants are cowardly, and they abandon their stolen goods as soon as they get a whiff of danger. But the thieves themselves are very hard to catch. You’d have to become one of them… Hey, that isn’t a bad idea!
The Shadow Never Sleeps

Ever since those skeletons started appearing in the city and everything went topsy-turvy the thieves have been hard at work. They stole some gold from the treasury, and my silver medallion is missing. I’m giving you the job of returning the stolen items and catching the criminals!
Look, you got a snail! Isn’t it great? The woman promised she’d show me another animal tomorrow. Come back, it’ll be fun!
Shadow Show
Want me to teach you a fun game? It’s easy. A woman on the street showed it to me. Just copy the way I move my hands, and you’ll see a shadow come to life on the wall!
All the cats are in the kennel. The silhouette on the wall was just a trick of the shadows. Maybe the kids decided to pull the wool over my eyes and have a little fun. Well, it worked!
Shadow Show
Apparently cat run away from cat kennel. All day me run around halls looking for it, but it really fast. Me barely see its silhouette on wall. You help me catch it?
Your rabbit came out even better than mine! Its silhouette looks just like the real thing. Look, look! I think it came to life… How did you do that? Hurry, catch it, catch it!
Shadow Show
I was waiting for you! The woman who’s been teaching me to make shadow animals left. Don’t worry, I already learned a few things from her. I’ll show you!

Oh, no! We aren’t talking about harmless bunnies and kitties anymore. Sheriti made an elephant silhouette, and it came to life! Look, it’s growing before our eyes and moving along the walls of our house. Pretty soon it’ll separate from them…
Shadow Show

What’s happening in the city is currently inexplicable. Someone taught the children how to create all kinds of silly animals by playing with light and shadow, and they’ve started coming to life. We need to put a stop to this game at once!
This is the strangest elephant I’ve ever caught. If I didn’t know it was recently a shadow on the wall I wouldn’t be able to tell it from a living one. But this one is blacker than night!
Blacker than Night

An enormous black elephant is roaming the city! The citizens are panicking. The master said it was created by some kind of shadow magic. We need to catch it right away. Be careful. We don’t know what to expect from this animal!
Unbelievable! The outline of the bird just separated from your hand and is now thrashing against the walls of the room. It’s knocking the papyri all over the room with its black wings!
Shadow Show

I need to understand how this magic with the living shadows works. Try to create something, say, a bird. We’ll close the window. That way, if it comes to life, it won’t be able to fly out of my house.

This eagle’s beak and claws are sharper than knives. If it was controlled by the will of the Shadow or Menes it could cause some real trouble in the city. It’s a good thing you never thought of bringing a dragon silhouette to life!
Blacker than Night

You and the master shouldn’t have tried to study the effects of shadow magic without me. Now it’s going to take a lot of work for us to find the black eagle your harmless “birdie” turned into. Come on, let’s go!

When the face on the wall started talking I sensed something was wrong. This was no ordinary message. Menes has given us an ultimatum. Either we surrender the city, or he captures it with his necromancers and shadow magic…
Menes’s Ultimatum
The soldiers caught one of the Shadow’s men. They say he surrendered of his own accord. I tried to interrogate him, but it was no use. The guy won’t talk unless we unbind his hands. Come with me!

The city guards have had their hands full recently. Our city has been overrun by black animals, and now we have no choice but to fight them. People are hiding in their homes. They’re afraid to go outside!
Blacker than Night
I need your help! I’ve been tracking a black dog. It’s one of the creatures spawned by the Shadow’s black magic. This beast is more terrifying than any nightmare. I can’t do it without you!
I’ve never seen anything like it! I don’t care for these animals anyway, but the crocodile we caught is a real monster. I’m scared to think what else we can expect from this dark sorcery…
Blacker than Night
My men and the fishermen are afraid to go out to sea. An enormous crocodile has appeared in the river. It keeps flipping boats over. It must be one of the Shadow’s beasts. Help me catch it!

The guards are getting really tired today! I’m helping them by cooking and washing their clothes. After all, they’re my husband’s men. If not for us, the snake would have hid in the barracks and attacked the soldiers as they lay sleeping!
Blacker than Night
Help me, quick! A black snake slithered into the soldiers’ barracks. I managed to get out, but the snake is still in there. Try to find it before the soldiers come back from their patrol!

That black warrior isn’t human! It’s a creation of the Shadow, and nothing else. A creature like that could appear behind any of our backs… If that happens, everyone in the city will be killed in a single day!
The Nocturnal Doppelganger
The thing I feared most has happened! While I was waiting in ambush my shadow left the wall and attacked me. I was able to defend myself and get away. Help me defeat it!

The entire thieves’ guild is made up of enemies who live within the city walls. They serve the Shadow and Menes. If I had my way… but I promised Nimiru I wouldn’t resort to harsh measures. The more of them I can lock up, the safer our streets will be!
Food for the Prisoners

We conducted raids in all the well-known thieves’ dens. Many of Menes’s servants are behind bars. The jails are overflowing. We need to feed the prisoners somehow, but dried crusts of bread will be enough for them. Get to it!
In this dark jail, servants of Shadow no can make their illusions, because there no light. They no see in dark as good. They helpless. You remember, here must be no torches. Never!
A New Jail
We must re-equip jail so not one beam of light get in. You find building materials, me make plan. We get to work!

The Shadow’s creatures only come to life because of light. On the other hand, the skeletons become vulnerable when exposed to it. The only way to defeat our enemies is to attack them at midday! Or wait for a miracle…
Secret Council
Everyone who can be of use in the current situation is meeting today at an agreed-upon time at the brewer’s. You should come too. We won’t be able to come up with a battle plan without you!
Enjoy! This wine has a pleasant orange flavor. You’ve had an awful lot on your plate today. We should kick back and relax. You never know what tomorrow will bring!
A Hard Day
This was a very trying day. We caught all the black animals. We imprisoned many of the Shadow’s servants and posted guards all over the city. I need to relax a little. Bring me some wine!
The last merchants have fled the city in a panic. If we’re constantly getting attacked on all fronts there won’t be anyone or any time left to think about food. That’s when we’ll need my bread!
Trying Times
Hard times are coming. I know what it’s like when a city is under siege. We need a lot of bread for the townsfolk. Let’s go find my grain mill! It’s time to get to work.

I’m no soldier, of course. I don’t know how to swing a sword, and I can’t strike an enemy in the heart. My sword is a hoe, and my battlefield is the garden. I’ll do whatever it takes to get more supplies for the people of the city.
Trying Times
We can’t let people starve during this difficult time. Let’s combine all the food stores we have. The harvest was bountiful. There’s enough for everyone!
Great job! But this is just the beginning. Keep up the good work. For now I’m going to bake some ruddy bread. Just one day will be enough for us to make enough food for the entire city.
Trying Times

The flour for the bread is ready! I’ve got a lot of work ahead of me, so it would be great if you could join me. Start kneading the dough. You’ve got some experience, and I trust you as much as I do myself!

The Nile flows through many worlds at once! I’ll use this ribbon to send a message to those worlds, then wait for help. But let’s keep this between us. I don’t know what kind of help the waters of this river will bring…
Great River
I need to appeal to higher powers for help. We won’t be able to defeat Menes’s new armies without it. You’ll help me find a blue lace ribbon, won’t you? It should symbolize the Nile!
We’ve completed our military objective. Our core forces have repelled the enemy, and the civilians are unharmed. But victory is still a long way away. The skeletons are virtually invincible!
A Stab in the Back
We’re under attack! Skeletons have emerged from the ground in several parts of the city. We need to hold them off until the warrior’s troops get here. Attack!
That’s the bow from my vision! I can’t believe it! Look how it shines! I’m sure this weapon was given to us so we can defeat our enemies! Isn’t this the miracle we’ve been waiting for..?
Unexpected Help
I had a strange vision. I saw a warrior emerge from the Nile. He was wearing flaming armor and carrying a shining bow. I think you should go to the river at once and see if my vision was real!
This staff will open a window to the world of the Sunbaked and allow me to understand their language. If everything works out we’ll be able to resist Menes and the Shadow’s army!
Unexpected Help
In the ancient scrolls it says that Tutankhamun once summoned a tribe of Sunbaked from other worlds to assist him. I need the ancient pharaoh’s staff to communicate with them. Bring it to me!

What an incredible sword! It shines just like the sun. If this weapon can strike down skeletons as mercilessly as the arrows from your bow, I’ll be able to chop those monsters up like kindling with it!
Sunbaked Weaponry

Your magical bow was a real help to us in the last battle. Is it true that it was given to you by beings from another world? I wouldn’t mind getting a weapon like that myself. Could you help me get one?
Now this is my kind of weapon! Thank you. When I hold it in my hands I can sense the destructive power it’s endowed with. I can’t wait to try it out against our hateful foes!
Sunbaked Weaponry
Those Sunbaked came to our aid right in the nick of time. They’ve decided to give us their magical weapons. Do you think they might find something for me too? Go ask Nimiru!
Now this is my kind of knife! Don’t worry about me. I’ve dealt with weapons like this before. Back when I had to work, knife fights were a common affair in the taverns!
Sunbaked Weaponry
I might not be the best warrior, but I’d still like to show what I can do on the battlefield. I’d be grateful for any weapon, no matter how small. Could you get me a magic knife?
Axes are excellent weapons! I often have to use them on ships against deep-waters and pirates. I’ll feel more sure of myself when I go to battle against the skeletons if I have an axe!
Sunbaked Weaponry
We’ve got quite the battle ahead of us, eh? I’d like to join the fray myself. Give me one of the magical weapons our sunny brethren from another world gave us.
I’m going to the battlefield along with our warriors. I’m going to strike the enemy with the power of my spells. But I’ll cover my back with this shield while you’re firing your arrows… just in case!
Sunbaked Weaponry
The chief of the Sunbaked promised to give one of his magic weapons to anyone who’s willing to fight. I asked for something for myself, too. Can you bring me his gift?

What a beautiful bird! Black vultures were circling over the Sepat and scaring the children. But they aren’t frightening to us anymore. The fiery bird dispersed the darkness of those terrible creatures, and they melted away like mist!
Brighter than the Sun

Remember those awful black birds the shadows created? Today I saw herds of these birds being scattered by some kind of fiery creature. It’s circling over my house as though it’s protecting it. Care to see?
We should never forget our gods. Then they won’t forget us. Only together can we defeat Menes and then his master, the demon Amrun!
Ra’s Gratitude
We should thank Ra for the fact that his children, the Sunbaked clan, came to our aid. Let’s go to his altar and perform the ritual of praise there!

The shadows are afraid of this cat’s flame! They run from it as though it burned them. But he likes the two of us. With a protector like this I won’t be afraid to walk around the city at night anymore!
Brighter than the Sun
You won’t believe what a beautiful kitty I just saw! He must be one of the Sunbaked animals that came to the city to hunt shadows. Let’s catch up to him!

Look at this huge fish! It came from the deepest part of the river. This creature uses its little light to attract shadows, then swallows them up like herring. The water will be clean soon thanks to this fish.
Brighter than the Sun

There are fewer and fewer black fish around my ships all the time. I started noticing some kind of weird illumination in the water after they began disappearing. You don’t have any idea what it might be, do you?
The Sunbaked animals really helped us by ridding the city of the Shadow’s creatures. But we need to learn how to control them. We can learn how to do this by drinking from this goblet!
Brighter than the Sun
A huge fiery wolfhound was fighting shadows earlier today in the square, and it almost set a nearby house on fire. I need a cup of truth to pacify this beast. Can you help me out?
What a striking animal! When this flaming rhinoceros answered your call it seemed as though the sun itself was rushing through the city streets. There’s no trace of the Shadow’s soldiers!
Brighter than the Sun
You already know how to control the Sunbaked animals? That’s great! Call one of them over at once! I spotted a large contingent of the Shadow’s warriors nearby. We need to take them by surprise!
I’ve never seen so much fire before! The Sunbaked you were controlling turned Menes’s entire squadron to ash. I think it’ll take the priest a while to come to his senses after such a crushing defeat!
The Flame of Victory

Menes has decided to attack us on all fronts simultaneously. Skeletons have surrounded the city, and shadows have been roaming the city and making themselves at home. We’re going to need someone really strong to stand up to this army!
The deed is done! Thank you. It’s a good thing I noticed that nasty thing in time and didn’t step on it. Its poison could put a bull down in less than a minute!
The Hissing Hunter
I was on my way to visit the potter when I saw that my path was blocked by a dangerous snake. Catch it quickly, before it bites some inattentive passerby!
This vase will serve the baker for a long time to come. It wasn’t damaged that badly by the fall. I think I can glue it back together again, and then it’ll be as good as new!
Glued-Together Dish
The baker promised to bring me his broken vase so I could glue it back together. I’ve been waiting for him all day. Could you stop by his house and get it? I’d really appreciate it!
This collar is just what we had in mind for Sheriti’s new cat. She’ll like it too. Thank for your help. You’re always so attentive to my little girl and her whims!
A Small Gift
Sheriti picked up yet another homeless cat off the street. My husband and I have decided to give her a woven collar for him. Could you help us pick one out?

I’m an old man, and my age obviously won’t permit me to cover such long distances. In the time it takes me to make a stop here and there the whole day goes by. But I love to enjoy fresh honey from this plate in the evening!
Glued-Together Dish

I accidentally broke my favorite plate. I wanted to bring it to the potter to have it glued back together, but I’ve been swamped. Do you think you could do it for me? I’ll treat you to some fresh honey afterwards!
That was a heck of a scuffle. My club and your bow really are magical. They put our foes down better than any other weapon I know of. And with the totem, we’re completely invincible!
A Daring Raid
My scouts have reported seeing a squadron of skeletons. With Sunbaked weapons and the power of the totem we can take our enemies by surprise. Let’s set a trap for them!

The thief turned out to be a sailor from the barbarous north. He decided to take advantage of the chaos in the city to fill his pockets with gold. He could have lived the rest of life without a care in the world on the money he’d have made from that jewelry!
The Stolen Relic

Valuable ancient jewelry was stolen from the treasure room, including Tutankhamun’s earrings. The thief doesn’t appear to be a servant of the Shadow. It looks like it was a foreigner. Find him and get the stolen goods back.

Look how lush the grass we grew is! I’m going to plant it in all the gardens and courtyards in the city. The city will be instantly transformed. We’ll become a real oasis of greenery in the midst of the desert!
Greenery
The city doesn’t have enough greenery. I’m cultivating a special kind of grass for our parks. But it isn’t easy. If you help me, the work will go a lot faster!

Thank you. I don’t have a moment of free time myself. Ever since I started gluing broken dishes back together I’ve had more customers than I can handle. People really cherish the items they’ve grown accustomed to.
Glued-Together Dish
My wife gave a beggar some water outside, but he was so weak he couldn’t hold onto the glass and broke it. Bring me the broken pieces right away so I can glue them back together.

I think this is all the shards from my cup. The last thing I need is for someone to get cut on them! I’m going to take them to the potter. They say he can glue old pottery back together so you can still use it!
Glued-Together Dish

Sheriti’s new cat is just as ill-bred as my daughter. He’s still young, and he’s been running all over the house like a madman. He just broke my favorite teacup. Can you help me pick up all the shards?
Me make this bowl out of clay myself when me live underground alone for many years. It very precious to me. Thank you for hint. If potter know how to glue dishes back together, me can do it too!
Glued-Together Dish
Me not know what happen up there in city, but my cave shake real good. Rock fall from ceiling and break my only bowl. No what I eat out of?

Great job! Needless to say, the plate isn’t what it once was, but it’ll serve us for years to come on the ship. I need to get the recipe for this magical glue from the potter. Maybe I could use it to stop up some of the leaks in the ship…
Masterful Work

While the boat was rocking one of the ship’s plates broke. I brought it to the potter to have it glued back together. He’s invented some kind of special resin that sticks broken pieces of pottery right back together. Go see him. Maybe my plate is ready!

This money was earned by the blood and sweat of each of my soldiers. And those vile deserters stole it so they could flee the city. I can’t leave it like this. My scouts are already searching the surrounding area.
Traitors in the Ranks
A few soldiers stole their comrades’ money and fled. My scouts told me the deserters have hidden the money under a bush by the exit to the city. Bring me back that gold!
Hot coals… that means the deserters were here very recently. Your tracking abilities are first-rate. They must know we’re following at their heels. That’s why they decided to flee the city.
Traitors in the Ranks
I’m going to help the warrior find a few deserters. I think I’m on their trail. It leads underground. Will you join me? It’ll go faster if we work together!

The traitors weren’t willing to surrender without a fight! It’s too bad we couldn’t take them alive. They fled out of fear of being killed by Menes’s warriors, after all. But in the end they were killed by our blades…
Traitors in the Ranks

The nomad told me you’ve found the deserters’ trail. Let’s hurry up and chase the cowards down before they escape into the desert and become servants of Menes. Be careful, those men are desperate and dangerous!
Wow, what a wonderful white chair! It will match the decor in my hall perfectly. It’s so soft! It’ll be like I’m sitting on a cloud when I repose upon it. I knew you had excellent taste!
Super-Comfortable Chair

The old armchair I receive guests in is completely threadbare. Some merchants have come to the city selling wonderful furniture. Find something for me among their wares. I have full confidence in your tastes!
Right now the warrior probably doesn’t care which couch we bought. But he’ll definitely appreciate our purchase when he comes home tonight from his patrol and sits down on it to relax!
Super-Comfortable Chair
I don’t think our new house is homey enough. I convinced my husband to buy a new couch, but he doesn’t know the first thing about couches. Can you help me pick one out?
Thanks for your help! If you ask me, this bed came out quite large and comfortable. I’m going to go try it out as soon as I can. I spent all day and all night staring at scrolls, and I’m exhausted.
Super-Comfortable Chair
I sit there studying the scrolls so much that my back gets very tired. The only thing that can help me is a good night’s sleep. But my bed is no good for this. Can you help me make a new one?
I’m much more comfortable with this stool! It sure beats spending all day standing up, shifting my weight from one foot to the other. I can’t leave my shop for even a minute to stretch, after all.
Super-Comfortable Chair
Mommy is really busy around the house right now, so I’m taking over for her at the market. But it’s so boring! I’m sick of standing all day. Do you think you could bring me a comfy little stool?
The Sunbaked don’t eat in the sense we’re familiar with. Their world is subject to other laws. These beings take their energy from whatever they can burn with their flame.
Gifts for the Sunbaked

The Sunbaked have done a lot for us. We’ll show them our gratitude the only way we know how: with the crops and grains the earth has shared with us. Make sure they’re ready on time, and bring them to me!
This aroma allows me to calm my entire metabolism for a little while and put my thoughts in order. It’s the only way I can really relax. Just a few hours, and I’ll be full of energy again!
Returning Strength

Communicating with the Sunbaked requires the expenditure of an enormous amount of energy. I’m very tired, and I need a break. Bring me some incense. Its soothing aroma will help me regain my strength!
We got it done quickly! Sure, maybe we should have given the work to those sailors as punishment for their crimes. But they’re locked up for now, and I don’t have time to wait. It’s time to set sail!
Super-Comfortable Chair
Sailors are a wild bunch. They never miss an opportunity for a good fight. During the last tussle a few of my men broke a bench on the ship. Help me fix it!

It’s so simple! How could I not have figured it out? All we had to do was put out chairs for the petitioners, and they started feeling much more confident when I received them. Thank you for this ingenious idea!
A Rational Decision

The people of the city often come to me for sage advice. But when they’re standing before me they feel intimidated. I don’t want them to be afraid of their chief. That’s just not right. What can I do in this situation?

Last night I heard a voice outside and decided to see who it was. Here, next to the fountain, I saw Menes discussing something with the Shadow. Then they both disappeared. Maybe we should set up a stakeout at this location!
A New Threat
I’ve got some alarming news for you! But I can’t talk about it right now, when every shadow might have ears. Let’s meet at midnight by the fountain. Don’t be late!
Everything ready. Now ceiling no fall on our heads. Me wonder what this new hallway hiding. Maybe ancient treasure room of pharaohs, or maybe secret knowledge.
New Discoveries
Wall in Ancient City crumble to reveal new hidden corridor. Me still no follow it. Dangerous business. Collect building materials, and we buttress walls and ceiling.
I knew I was having an important vision in my dreams. But it was as though someone was blocking it in my mind. Thanks to the dream catcher everything is clear to me now. But the news isn’t good!
New Visions
Recently my mind has been troubled by some kind of vision at night. But when I wake up, I can’t remember it. I need a dream catcher. Can you get one for me?
When our ancestors settled in the fern forest they learned how to extract a special substance from the roots of this plant. We still use it to make medicine and poisons.
Important Ingredient
I’m going to look for an arboraceous fern. In olden times the earth was covered with fern forests. It’s a very rare plant nowadays, and it’s hard to find. So a little help would be nice!

Thanks for your help! Menes's Servants burned and looted these children’s villages and took their parents captive to give them to the dark priest. We’re the only ones who can care for these little ones during these trying times.
Neighborly Assistance

Many refugees have come to the city from the next village over. There are children among them who are now going to live with the other wards. There isn’t enough food for everyone. I’d really appreciate it if you could help us with supplies.

Right now the city can’t accommodate all the refugees and offer them places to live. But this won’t last long. They’re citizens just like us now, and we’ll find a place for each and every one of them. The more of them there are, the stronger we all are!
Neighborly Assistance

Menes and his servants have looted several neighboring villages. The villagers who managed to get away have come here asking for our help. We need to give our countrymen our protection and a roof over their heads. Help up get them settled!
The baobab or “bottle tree” is a useful tree for any traveler. Its seeds are edible. We’re going to collect seeds from the trees in the area and use them to make lots of satisfying cakes.
Neighborly Assistance
Our supplies have starting running low ever since the refugees arrived in the city. But I know how to get food in the surrounding desert. Can you help me? We’re going to go look for bottle trees!

This fabric will be perfect for my new cape. While I’m wearing it I’ll be able sneak into the city and the surrounding area incognito so I can talk to the refugees and help them. I want to know how they’re doing and whether they’re satisfied with everything.
Fabric Set

Find me a roll of monochrome fabric! It shouldn’t be expensive. On the contrary, it should be something simple and nondescript, like the clothing of a peasant or a fisherman. I want to sew myself a big, flowing cape.

Ha! The northern sailors’ sails were also striped, although they were a different color. But the important thing is that this fabric is sturdy and can be used to make new sails. Then my brothers will be able to continue their voyage.
Fabric Set

Sailors from the north have arrived at the port. Their ship ran into a storm while they were en route. It ripped the northerners’ sails to shreds. We need to help our seafaring brothers. Find material suitable for sails!

The foreigner with the red beard is refusing to wear my clothes and frightening off all my customers with his unseemly appearance. Hopefully now he’ll patch his weird armor and finally leave our city!
Fabric Set

One of my customers drank an awful lot of beer yesterday. He accidentally sat on some hot coals and burned the odd checkered skirt he was wearing in a very inappropriate place. Could you help the poor devil out and find him a little bit of checkered fabric?
My, what divine fabric! It feels so soft against my skin! I don’t know how to thank the eastern empress for this gift. My father says she’s a kind, wonderful woman. I simply must visit her country.
Fabric Set
The eastern empress sent trade ships to the city loaded with the fabric her empire is so famous for. As a sign of goodwill she has sent me a roll as a gift. Go and get it!

I think this fabric will be perfect for a new dress for Sheriti. But right now she’s grounded. Her new friends from the Sepat are even worse than the old ones. I need to tell the Lady to keep a closer eye on them!
Fabric Set

Sheriti has been playing with the little boys and climbing trees again. Now her dress looks like it belongs on a little ragamuffin. I’m going to have to sew her a new one. Help me find some decent fabric for her!

I’ve never seen such high-quality cloth before. There’s a reason the eastern empire is famous the world over for its textiles. If the local fashionmongers start buying up these goods, I’ll order even more from the merchants!
Eastern Fabric

Merchants from the east have brought lots of beautiful fabric to the port. It’s as delicate as rose petals. I couldn’t help myself and bought a whole batch of it. I can’t carry it all here by myself. Can you help me?

What happening to me? When we go in tunnel those eyes peer into very depths of my mind again, and me lose consciousness. You see them?! They disappear? Come on, we block this awful cave and get out of here…
Terror from the Tunnel
Me happy to make entrance to tunnel, but me afraid me see those scary eyes in darkness again. If you go there with me, me not so afraid.

This hideous creature settled into the Sepat after one of my wards snuck into the miner’s cave at night. The crazy beast scared the little boy with its cries, and when he came back home he just wasn’t himself…
Terror from the Tunnel

Recently my wards have been sleeping badly. They say they’re afraid of a foul monster from the darkness. I would never have believed it if I hadn’t seen a sticky footprint on the floor this morning. I’m frightened. What could it be?

I told you something was wrong with the doll. Why did I ever take it from that girl? I bet she fobbed it off on me on purpose. I’ve heard that a terrifying monster is living in the Sepat. You won’t be able to drag me there again…
Terror from the Tunnel
A girl from the Sepat gave me a doll. I liked it at first because it didn’t look like other dolls. But now I’m a little scared of it. I think the doll has been watching me at night. Could you check?
Thank you for your help! In my native land they also tell tales of ghosts and goblins. But I’ve never seen these creatures with my own eyes before… and I hope I never do again!
Terror from the Tunnel

A mummy has moved in next to my house. Every night I can hear it crawling out of the ground and wandering around the neighborhood. I can smell the foul odor of its half-rotten wrappings. Save me from this cursed creature!

It’s finally all behind me! It was like some kind of madness. I couldn’t see any enemy clearly, but the spark from the totem still illuminated some kind of creature that had soaked through the floor. I don’t like this one bit!
Madness

I need your skill in using the totem! Something unbelievable is happening in some of the townspeople’s homes. They’ve locked themselves inside and are wailing at the top of their lungs. I don’t know what’s going on in there, but we won’t get anywhere without magic!

I understood right away that the nightmares the townsfolk have been having are black magic. They’re born in the most secret depths of the mind. The miner was the first to experience this, and he set off a chain reaction…
Terror from the Tunnel

I decided to read a little about nightmares in the master’s old scrolls, and I learned that the only thing that can save you from them is a charm made out of a goose foot. I already have one. You should get one too!
