Those insidious beasts started by attacking the miner’s reason, then cast nets of sorcery all over the city. I read about them once in the ancient scrolls, but I never thought such creatures could still exist in the world.
The Source of Our Troubles

If nightmares could always come to life on their own the human race would have gone mad a long time ago. What’s happening in the city right now is the result of black magic. And I can guess who’s responsible. We’re heading into the tunnel!

That’s an ankh! I know that certain magicians use this symbol as a magical key. The Shadow’s servants must have dropped it here. But here’s a question: which door did they open with it, and where is it?
Dark Business

Last night I noticed some people over by the caves and decided to follow them. They turned out to be the Shadow’s servants. They were talking about some kind of door to an Icy Grotto and an assignment they had completed. Let’s find out what they meant!

I could never have done it without you. It’s very difficult to hold onto a cat made of ice without it slipping out of your hands. What do you think, is it some kind of magical animal? I wonder where it came from… Do you think Nimiru might know?
Icy Comfort

You won’t believe what I saw! A real cat made of ice! He leaves tracks covered in hoarfrost on the ground when he walks. And he doesn’t like the sunlight. I’ve been chasing after him all day. Can you help me?
Just a table and chair… this grotto doesn’t look anything like an abode of evil forces. On the contrary, it’s actually pretty cozy here if you like the cold. We should probably search the area!
Icy Comfort

Now I’m starting to understand. The Shadow’s men opened an underground door to a certain Icy Grotto. It could be home to all sorts of creatures that might be dangerous to the townsfolk… we need to find this place right away and figure out what it’s hiding!

This flower truly is beautiful, but still it brings no joy! Its lines and curves are exactly like those of a living flower. But rather than the delicacy of its petals, your fingers feel only cold, dead ice…
Icy Comfort

The master dragged all the items made of ice out of the grotto and took them to his workshop. I know that one of them is a flower made of ice that’s almost indistinguishable from a real flower. Bring it to me. I want to see this wonder with my own eyes!
Red carneol has various magical properties. One of them is the ability to see signs and symbols that are invisible to the human eye. And I’ve found some!
Magical Things
I’m particularly interested in one of the items found in the Icy Grotto. I can’t say what one yet, but I promise to reveal the secret if you help me. Find me a certain magical gem: a red carneol!

I can’t believe my eyes. This is a real book of ice magic! Until now I’ve had to piece this complex science together with bits and pieces of information from various sources. But now I have the full teaching!
Icy Comfort

The master found some kind of book made out of ice in the grotto. It took him a long time to study and translate it. But now he’s ready to show it to me. Bring me this mysterious tome right away! I want to find out what’s in it.

I understand everything now. I made this cup while I was practicing ice magic. The Lady must have drunk some of the melted water from it, and this is the result. But it’s no big deal. I know how to fix this misunderstanding!
The Wiles of Ice

I need help right away! Something happened to the Lady. She turned into an ice sculpture and has been standing there, frozen, in the middle of her room. I can’t help her until I find the reason behind this strange transformation!

This is some kind of black magic! How could it be? How on earth could a glove have a mind of its own and attack people anyway? I’ll never be able to sleep a wink after something like this. I’m not even safe in my own home anymore…
The Darkness Gathers

I think someone tried to strangle me last night. I jumped out of bed, but there was no one else in the room. And then, in the morning, I noticed a bruise around my neck. Could you hide in my house tonight and find out what this was?

Someone tossed a broken mirror into the barracks. This is a bad sign. An old superstition says that mirrors are gates to the afterlife. If you break one, the gate opens, and any spirit can return to the world of the living!
The Darkness Gathers

My husband’s soldiers are complaining that ghosts of their fallen comrades have been visiting them at night. The poor fellows can’t sleep a wink, and their nerves are shot. There’s some kind of sorcery behind this. We need to figure it out!
I swear on my life, when I saw that spot last time it was no bigger than the palm of my hand, but now it’s the size of my ship. Oh no, I don’t like this one bit! Maybe I should ask Nimiru for help…
The Darkness Gathers

I found something strange! I’ve never seen anything like it before. A black spot appeared on the ground. I didn’t dare touch it. Who knows what could happen with magic? I think you should take a look at it!

I had a feeling there was something fishy about this cat. Last night I was woken up by the feeling that I could hardly breath. It was sitting on my chest! And during the day the cat climbed up into the attic and kept scratching.
The Darkness Gathers

A few days ago I noticed a black cat near my house. I assumed it was one of the cats from the kennel, so I called it over to give it some milk. But now I can’t get rid of the creepy creature. Help me! Chase the beast away!

Black roses? They’re unbelievably beautiful, but I get the feeling there’s some kind of dirty trick here. Men in love don’t give women flowers like these. So who are they from? Black roses are a symbol of sorrow. A gift like this doesn’t bode well…
The Darkness Gathers
The servants reported that some stranger brought me a bouquet of roses as a gift. Who could it have been? Probably just another suitor. Go get the bouquet and bring it back here at once!

The black spot the mariner was looking for has grown and swallowed up the entire city. The townsfolk have been consumed by melancholy and apathy. They can’t even leave their homes. This sickness makes us vulnerable to our enemy…
The Epicenter of the Darkness

Just as the brewer prophesied, some kind of ancient curse has emerged from the caves. It’s taken over the hearts of the townsfolk, and they’re in low spirits. The city has been sunk in darkness. Walk around the city and look at what they’ve become!

I’m not young anymore, but I’m still strong. However, I started getting tired more than I used to. The eastern empress knows a lot about medicine. She’s the one who recommended I drink an infusion made from timber fungus. And I started to feel better!
Eastern Medicine

Bring me some timber fungus for an infusion. Running the city, training with the young warriors, and being in a state of constant anxiety sap my strength. I drink this wonderful beverage to restore it.

Yes, this is the gold clasp I was looking for! Thank you! I thought I’d never find it. It would be a shame to lose something so beautiful. This necklace is very dear to me. I’ll bring it to the jeweler at once to have it fixed.
The Lost Clasp
My necklace broke and scattered all over the room. I managed to find the beads, but not the clasp. Maybe you’ll have better luck than I did. It was at the papyrus mill. Look there!

You did a remarkable job of depicting Nun in the chronicle! You should be proud. I ought to invite you to do work for me more often. My chronicles don’t have enough good illustrations to accompany them.
Great Celebration
Today’s a big day, a celebration of the god Nun, who created our world from the great ocean. As always, I will describe today’s events. And you can help me with the image of our creator.

We collected a decent amount of money. People always make donations on the days of the gods. That’s how they learn respect for our creators and, most importantly, generosity. All this money will go to a good cause!
Great Celebration

So you already know about the celebration of the god Nun? That’s wonderful! Help me in the city. Today the townsfolk will make offerings to our creator. You just need to collect and count all the gold.

What a lovely memorial! Thanks to your help and skillful leadership, construction was completed on time. Ben-Ben Hill was the first piece of dry land that arose from the depths of Nun’s great ocean. It’s where life began!
Great Celebration

In honor of the god Nun I have arranged to have a memorial erected in the city. It’s a pyramid, a personification of Ben-Ben Hill. But the workers don’t have enough building materials to finish it in time. Take this upon yourself and finish the construction project!

We defeated a lot of these animals in the last battle. Where did this dog come from? It must have survived somehow and started wandering the desert. Over time it starved and went completely mad. So it decided to look for game here.
Rabid Dog
Arm yourself with a totem at once and follow me. I’ve got a little job for you. Some of Menes’s war dogs have broken into the city. Catch one of them. Hurry, there isn’t much time!

The pigeon was fast, but you were faster. Well then, what do we have here? Let’s take a look… it can’t be! The Montu clan has fallen into a trap Menes’s henchmen set in the desert. Those who survived the battle are trapped in a gorge. They need help…
News from Afar

A carrier pigeon came for me. It must have been from the warriors of the Montu clan who have been training in the desert. But I can’t seem to catch the sneaky bird so I can read the letter. Can you help me?

Thank you for your help. The myrtle infusion won’t treat the illness itself, but it will at least prevent the black spots from spreading. It’s the only thing we can do until Nimiru finds a better treatment.
Outbreak

Lots of people have been getting sick in the city. Their skin gets covered with black spots that then multiply. It looks like an epidemic. Nimiru suggested we give the sick people a concoction made of myrtle. I need more of this plant. Can you help?

This epidemic doesn’t seem like all the other ones. The black spots on the body are just a symptom. The cause lies deeper, in the person’s very soul. It’s as though something is consuming each victim from within, and he loses interest in life…
Outbreak

The sickness in the city is spreading even faster, and no one has found cure for it yet. I’m going from house to house checking in on sick people. If you could help me with this, I’d be very grateful. I can’t do it all by myself.

The smoke from incense temporarily weakens the demons and makes them abandon their victims’ souls. That’s why it’s a good idea to burn incense at home as much as possible. The sick people will stop feeling so blue, and their bodies will respond better to medicine.
Saving Souls

I still haven’t figured out all the causes of the illness, but there’s one thing I do know for sure: these people are possessed by demons of despair. It’s very difficult to fight such a foe, but it is possible. For now we need to burn incense in their homes. Collect some more of it!
The little giraffe will be safer in the city than in the desert. I’ll take care of him. I’m sure the kids will help me. In the meantime, the warrior will have to deal with Menes’s hunters!
Lost Animals

Menes’s hunters have been plying their trade in our land, and they drove away a family of giraffes. Our goal is to find a little baby giraffe and take care of it until it can find its parents. The road is far away. You’re going to need good shoes!
There’s my little guy! Where’s he been? He’s even dirtier than my daughter. Oh well, if Sheriti let him get away, her punishment will be to brush the little camel’s fur. That’ll teach her a lesson!
Lost Animals

A baby camel has gone missing from the caravan. I don’t think he was stolen. Chances are, Sheriti forgot to close the pen after she fed them. The little guy must be wandering around somewhere in the neighborhood. Find him if you can!
The little guy will do much better at Sheriti’s. My house turned into a workshop a long time ago. I don’t even live here, I just work here. That why there’s no food, just clay, pots, and pitchers!
Lost Animals
A little kitten found her way into my house. I think she’s hungry. She’s been meowing really loudly. But I don’t have anything to give the poor thing. Bring her to Sheriti. She’ll take care of her!
I told he was a great puppy! Look how strong his legs are, and what powerful jaws he has! He’s a born guard dog. He should live with me rather than on the street. I’ll take real good care of him!
Lost Animals

I spotted a homeless puppy on the street, but I lost sight of him in the crowd. Help me find him! I think he could make a good guard dog if I took good care of him. Another faithful friend certainly wouldn’t hurt!

There isn’t that much work. We can do it in a day. Thank you for helping me with the baby animals. You know, I’ve lived among animals ever since I was little. They’re no worse than people, if you ask me. Sometimes they’re even better!
Lost Animals

Incidents of poaching have become more frequent in the area. I’ve already given shelter to many young of various animals, and I’m out of room. We need to build a small pen for them. Get some building materials ready!
I’ll set this poor raven up in the attic so Mommy doesn’t know. She won’t survive in the city without our help. You can come check on her any time you want. We’re gonna be her family now!
Lost Animals
I spotted a raven nearby. I don’t think it had a tail. The poor birdie can’t fly. If some of the alley cats attack it, it’ll be in trouble. I’m really worried. Let’s try to catch it and feed it!

All the animals are just fine. They can stay with me until they grow up and get stronger. Then I’ll release them back into the wild. They should know that not every human is out to kill them. There are also people who can surround them with loving care!
Kind Soul
It looks like Menes’s hunters’ raids have stopped. I managed to save the animals’ young from their arrows. They’re all safe now. Help me clean and examine each of them!

Gilded sandals! Yeah, the dark priest never misses an opportunity to look flawless, no matter what’s going on. Only he could wear shoes like these. He must have lost them when in his hurry to hide from me.
The Enemy Within

I think I saw Menes himself in the city. But then he turned a dark corner and disappeared. We need to find some kind of evidence that he was here. If it was him, we need to tell the chief what happened!

Great, I really like what we ended up with! Hey, is it just me, or has the darkness gotten a little thinner around our house? I think we might have driven it away with our joy. I’m going to go tell Nimiru about this right away!
Children’s Drawings

Many of the townsfolk have already gotten used to the darkness that’s covered our city. They walk around all gloomy and dissatisfied. But I want to have fun! Let’s draw something together! Can you help me draw my family? I wanna draw me, my Mommy, and the warrior, too!

You won’t believe it. The children were so overjoyed to learn that their drawings could help all the people of the city that they started working on the project with real enthusiasm. I’ve already noticed the darkness gradually receding from the Sepat. I think it’s working!
Children’s Drawings

I already know that we now have a chance to drive the darkness from the city using the children’s drawings. My wards are working around the clock. So you can come by for the first picture soon. You won’t have to wait long!

The spell worked! Look, the darkness is slowly creeping away from the bakery walls like ink after a rainstorm. I’m so grateful to you… and to the children! I can feel joy filling me again from within and driving away the melancholy.
Children’s Drawings

Is it true that the children’s pictures were the reason the darkness disappeared in several neighborhoods? That’s great. It’s a miracle! Do you think you could bring one of these magic pictures to my house?

The beekeeper didn’t even know about the curse. He just draws flowers for his birds every day. The old man is pretty sharp. He’s so old, but he’s still as carefree as a baby! The townsfolk should follow his example.
Children’s Drawings

It seems the beekeeper has found a way to drive the darkness from the doors of his house by himself. Pay him a visit and find out how the old man pulled it off. Maybe he knows some other method he isn’t telling us about…

Thank you so much! This oppressive darkness was becoming simply unbearable to me. But now I feel much better. Weren’t our kids great? I’m definitely going to give them a basket of fruit once it ripens.
Children’s Drawings
I can’t live in this darkness anymore. The plants are withering, the crops are dying, and the cows aren’t giving milk. Don’t I deserve to get one of those magical drawings the children made? Well?

That was wonderful! The updraft caught the children’s drawings and carried them all over the city, tossing them into windows and fireplaces. Smiles appeared on the people’s faces again. I think we’ve taken care of the curse!
Winds of Joy

The darkness is quietly dispersing, but this isn’t the end. The kids drew a whole stack of pictures. I suggest we collect them and throw them from the tallest building in the city. Then the children’s joy will be spread throughout the city!
A good, flexible bow and an arrow as sharp as a needle – that’s all we need! But one arrow won’t be enough to take down a target. You’ll have to search for the magical bows of the Ancients…
Bullseye!

There is no mortal capable of approaching the evil that hides beneath the city. It would take over his mind instantly. That’s why we’re going to need ranged weapons. You understand what I have in mind, right?

Thanks to cold magic we were able to find this antique weapon. The master believes these bows were made when our ancestors still didn’t know the gods we have today. Back then they worshiped the Ancients!
Bullseye!
Could you help me find one of the four legendary bows? They were created by the Ancients to destroy the primordial Darkness if it ever decides to quit its earthly tomb and take over the world again!

In my visions one of the Ancients appeared before me. He wanted me to help him find a weapon. The stranger said that it was the mightiest bow of all. It was only thanks to this bow that our ancestors were able to achieve victory in the past!
Bullseye!

I know where one of the bows you’re looking for, the God of Love’s bow, is. The location appeared to me in a dream, and I’m ready to take you there. All this time it’s been hidden right under our noses. Come on, let’s go!
Me said he no refuse you, right? Naga chief say, long ago Ancients give him that bow so he can stop monsters from Lower World coming to Upper World!
Bullseye!
You look for God of Fire’s bow? Then me help you. Me see this magical weapon. Naga chief have it. He owe me one. Me think he lend you bow. Especially for common good. Let’s go!

I told you it would be difficult to get that bow. When the weapon became unnecessary, the Ancients hid it at the bottom of the Nile, where it was born. Return it once you’ve fished the business at hand!
Bullseye!
To defeat the Darkness you’ll need the God of the Nile’s bow. I don’t know where this weapon is, but I can help you get it. You know I’ve got a lot of friends under water, right?
I knew you wouldn’t let that ancient evil trick you and take over your mind. On the contrary, you managed to imagine the heart of darkness to yourself as an apple, and it materialized. Amazing!
Right on Target
You now have a magical weapon of the Ancients. Go to the cave where the primordial Darkness hides and fire your arrows without thinking. If you take too long there will be no way back!
That was a tough battle! I lost a lot of men. I’ve never encountered enemies like these among the Shadow’s servants before. Those nocturnal killers were no ordinary thieves. They’re much more deadly!
Nocturnal Killers

Sound the alarm! We’re under attack! It’s a small handful of the Shadow’s servants, but they’re hardened fighters. They appear and disappear out of the darkness as though they were part of it themselves. We can’t beat them without the totem!

Thank you for your help! Those stupid fishermen can’t take a step without the mariner’s permission. And their heads are just as full of holes as the boats they fish on. But now Neo is safe. I’m going to take care of him!
Aquarium for Neo
Let’s go to the pier at once. Neo the little fish got caught in the fishermen’s nets. They don’t want to free him without the mariner’s permission, but maybe they’ll listen to you. Please help me!
Well then… it came out pretty well! I said before you had amazing artistic talent. Don’t forget to bring this diagram to Sheriti. She must be waiting impatiently for you.
Aquarium for Neo
Sheriti has a new pet: a little fish. I promised to search the scrolls for a diagram of how to make an aquarium, but it looks like I lost it. Do you think you could draw one?
These colored stones can be placed at the bottom of the aquarium once you find it. Sheriti will be thrilled by our help. She’s such a good kid. She loves all living things!
Aquarium for Neo

My rambunctious daughter has made herself another friend: a tiny little fish. She’s looking for an aquarium for it right now. I want to make Sheriti’s day by giving her some colored rocks. Can you help me?
That’s enough! Sheriti is a good girl. She doesn’t miss a single animal in need, unlike our nomad. I think that when she grows up she’ll do a lot of good for this city!
Aquarium for Neo
Sheriti is looking for an aquarium for her little fishy. I want to give the a girl a hand and get a few water plants together. They’ll keep the water clean. Can you help me with this task?
What a spacious aquarium! I couldn’t have found a better one myself. Thank you for your help. Is Neo really going to have a new home now?
Aquarium for Neo
I’m already tired of looking for an aquarium for Neo. There’s nothing suitable in our city. You’re my last hope! Do you think you could help me look?

Once, when I was little, my mother told me a fairy tale about a little fish who found himself far from home and almost perished. But then he was helped by a little girl. This story is about me and Neo!
A New Home
Neo’s new home is ready! I could never have done it on my own. Come over soon so you can see how happily Neo is swimming around his decked-out aquarium! I think he likes it!

The bread really did come out looking like a papyrus scroll! I’m satisfied with our work. I hope the master like it. You might say you and I also did our part for the offering. Maybe the gods will hear our pleas as well!
An Offering to the Gods

We’re all very upset about what’s been happening in the city. The darkness won’t budge. Everyone who can is fighting it. The master asked me to bake some scroll-shaped bread. He wants to give it to the gods as an offering. Can you help me?

In the land where I was born my kinsmen are always baking bread in a special shape. It’s how we call upon the sun to burn brighter so it can warm our land and chase away winter and its dark servants. It’s a good custom!
The Sun Rises
They say some kind of solution has been found to the darkness that’s swallowed the city! This is good news. It means we’ll see the sun in the sky again soon. I’ve got an idea. Help me!

The refugees have come to the city during trying times. Our homes are shrouded in darkness, and this frightens us. But these people are completely homeless. However, all of this will be over soon, and then we’ll find homes and food for all of them!
All for the People
The cooks made me roast goose for lunch again. But I can’t even touch it now that I know the city has been flooded by starving refugees. Bring them the goose so they can have a decent meal!

I’m so happy! The scrambled eggs turned out to be a wonderful way to wash my hair. Who would have thought? Look how it shines in the sunlight, how rich the color is! I’m going to tell the Lady about it!
Ancient Shampoo

A visiting tradeswoman shared her secret for healthy hair with me. I don’t know if what she told me is true or not, but it’s worth a shot. I’m going to need some eggs. Scramble them thoroughly and bring them to me!

Thanks for the peaches! They’re so ruddy, like they were just picked from the tree. Right now I’m making jam, and then I’m going to make a delicious fruit filling for pastries. Come by later and try it!
Fruit Filling
I got the idea of baking pastries with a new filling. I’m going to make it out of peach jam. I’d really appreciate it if you could get me some fresh peaches!

Only the power of the totem stopped the rats from boarding the ship. I’ve seen how those animals flee ships at the first sign of danger and run to shore. But the other way around?! I’ve never seen that before!
Get out of the City!

Hurry, I need your help! I don’t know what’s happening in the city, but a huge horde of rats is fleeing all the basements and the underground area and climbing onto my ships. I have no idea how to stem the tide!

Thank you! There are more children at the Sepat now, and they all need a little attention. You understand, of course. Having a big family is a lot of work. And I’ve got the biggest family in the city!
Treats for Children

I’m so busy cleaning up that I can’t get away, even for a minute. But my husband has disappeared into his workshop, as always. Go to the market and buy a little sweet ginger for the kids. They deserve a treat.

I always thought that ants were cooperative creatures. They work together for the good of the anthill. But, as it turns out, some of them leave their home to spend time alone. They’re nomads, just like me…
All Alone
I’m currently studying the behavior of ants. It’s fascinating. I’ve learned so many new things. Look at this one, for example. It doesn’t act like the others. Let’s observe it together!

This silt will make excellent fertilizer. I just need to hurry up and sprinkle it over the crops. I’m very concerned about the next harvest. There are more people coming to the city, and we need to make sure we have enough food for all of them!
Caring for the Earth
The land hasn’t been in the best state since recent events occurred. I’m afraid this is going to damage the next harvest. I need some fertilizer right away. Bring me a bag of silt from the river!
The caterpillar you brought belongs to the silkworm family. It weaves its cocoon out of silk. This means we can now keep these little creatures for our own needs. They’re going to make us rich soon!
Looking Forward

I found one of our ancestors’ old scrolls containing interesting information about caterpillars. I’d like to familiarize myself with the species that lives around here. Bring me a caterpillar to study!
All coins in this warehouse brand new. This mean our ancestors not the ones who hid it here. It probably someone from Shadow’s gang. Me think this money legally belong to city!
An Unexpected Find
Me accidentally stumble upon someone’s treasure underground. There many gold coins. Maybe townsfolk could use them during hard times. You help me drag them to surface?

What would I have done without you? Stay here and help me in the bakery until the fuss with the refugees dies down. Bread is the most popular food people are eating right now. So I’ve got more business than I know what to do with!
The Baker's Tribulations

I was about to sprinkle some flour on the dough when I suddenly realized that I couldn’t remember where I left my sieve. It’s all because I’m tired. There’s so much work to do in the bakery right now. Help me find it!
The disorder in the city will end now. I can’t believe it, but the people we gave food and shelter to have repaid us with ingratitude. It’s appalling!
Order in the City

Some of the refugees from the destroyed villages have no appreciation for our hospitality. They plunder our warehouses at night and rob the townsfolk. We need step up the patrols all over the city. Take care of it!
I gathered together everyone who might be able to help, and just in time – the nomad said that we’re moving out immediately. With our combined strength, we’ll be able to get this huge job done.
Earthly Tremors
Although we have plenty of strong men, we don’t have enough to deal with the boulders and repair the ship. We need to summon anyone who’s still spare.
Great! I gathered everything that we needed. Now I can start preparing something that will make my fellow countrymen’s work a lot easier.
Earthly Tremors
The people spent all day trying to clear away the boulders around the ship, but all their efforts were in vain. I think I know a way to help them, but there’s something I’m going to need for it…

I remembered an old recipe for a powerful burning substance. The Lady helped me make some of this dangerous liquid. With its help, we can blow up the base of the stone pile and make our work easier. Just in case, I’ll ask for a totem’s blessing.
Earthly Tremors

If we don’t destroy the boulders, the ship won’t be able to set sail. Ordinary tools don’t seem to work on these stones – it’s as if they’re enchanted. Our people will need something stronger to free the ship from its stone prison.
Job done. Now I can move on to molding some pots. I hope I can do everything in time. I don’t want the work to stop on my account. The nomad said a lot of hope is resting on me.
Earthly Tremors
The pots are ready! I’ve never worked so fast before! I hope this will help my fellow countrymen in their work on the ship… Although I don’t really understand why they need clay pots.
Earthly Tremors

The first batch of pots broke. It seems the clay I collected at night wasn’t good enough. It’s a good thing I still have a little in supply. It’s just a shame I wasted the time I did. Now I’ll have to hurry to make the pots on time.

It wasn’t easy, but I did it. It’s a shame the fruits of my labor aren’t going to last long – Nimiru wants to fill the pots with some sort of explosive, so the nomad can blow up the boulders at the ship.
Earthly Tremors
All the clay pots I made need to be delivered to the Sepat. The entire tribe has a lot of hope invested in this. I can’t let them down!
Of course! There’s one thing I can do! I can show my countrymen how far away they need to be from the ship to be in safety.
Earthly Tremors

Today, Nimiru asked me for help. I have to pull my weight in our shared project and make sure the people who are repairing the ship stay safe. There isn’t much time, so I need to think of a way to take care of this task.
Earthly Tremors

The ship discovered on the opposite bank is all people are talking about. The whole city thinks it’s really important to investigate it. Many people are helping to remove the boulders, and my task is to make sure everyone feels safe.
There aren’t many things left that could help me learn the ship’s story. I found a few items, but it’s still too early to judge what kind of people their owners were.
In Search of Answers

I’ve decided to explore the ship. I want to know what secrets it hides, what it can tell us about its former masters. Who were they? Peaceful people struck by disaster? Bandits who paid for their evil deeds..?

I’ve never seen an illness like this before. I don’t know how to fight it or where it came from. Could it be connected to our recent discovery – the ship? I’m sure the farmer could answer a few questions, but he’s in no shape for it right now.
Another Life
I heard the farmer has succumbed to an unknown illness. I need to check on him and find out whether this disease is a threat for the other members of the tribe.
There are all kinds of things left on this ship that have caught my interest. There are things here even I don’t know the purpose of. We should take it all to the hut and study it in more detail.
In Search of Answers

I’ve wasted a lot of time trying to judge the ship’s history. We need to inspect everything here carefully. Find out what might be useful right now and what to leave behind. And not take too long over it.
In Search of Answers
Nimiru said she’s going to try to find out their purpose. But she doesn’t have enough information. I might be able to find something else to make her task easier.
I’ve decided to gather all the items I had and ask Nimiru to study them. Maybe she’ll learn something that I couldn’t.
I found a few more items and notes. Nimiru should see them. Perhaps what I’ve found will help her understand what the other things from the ship are for.
In Search of Answers
I decided to spend a little time looking over the ship again. Maybe it’ll reveal its secrets to me and share the wisdom of its former masters.
In Search of Answers

We figured out that this item helps to find the right direction. It can even be used in the daytime. The nomad hurried to the ship, saying that he saw another item there, one that’s sure to pique my interest…
The nomad brought a bunch of things from the ship. Some things are clearer, but others still need more study. It’s past midnight, but I can’t sleep – I want to know what this slab with an arrow is.
Nimiru left. She said we can’t help him any more, that the farmer just needs to rest. The fever’s gone. Now it’s time to wait for the farmer to come to and tell me what happened to him.
We need to wake the farmer up, otherwise I won’t find out whether this disease is a threat to the rest of our countrymen. Alongside Nimiru, we’ll try to heal this malady.
Alarming news! The illness the new mushrooms carry is very dangerous, and extremely contagious. We need to find out where it came from and how to cure it. Until then, everyone is in danger.
Nimiru and I have decided to study the poison in the mushrooms. To do this, we need to collect various ingredients and check how dangerous this discovery is to our tribe.

It became known today that the potter fell ill in the morning too. He came to Nimiru with the same symptoms as the farmer. He’s conscious and he might be able to shed some light on a few things. It’s strange, but from what I understood, the mushrooms didn’t cause his illness.
We need to hurry and find the source of the disease. Is it another curse, or is it connected to something else? In any case, we have to act fast.

This is incredible! Outside the potter’s house, I found the same mushrooms as in the field. They were much smaller, but they oozed a strange thick liquid with vile slugs crawling around in it. I caught one and then ran to the field… The same was happening there!
It’s strange, but the potter said some kind of slug bit him near his home. I went to see what it was.

I questioned the potter and he told me that he didn’t touch any mushrooms. A slug bit him. This is very odd – the same disease seems to have different carriers. I’ve sent for the nomad – he’ll find this information useful.
The potter came to see me. He’s been infected by an unknown illness, just like the farmer. We don’t know what awaits us. Could it be an epidemic of a never before seen illness?

I managed to break the potter’s fever. Straight after, the nomad came in. The potter told him of poisonous slugs and the nomad went to check whether he could find one of the disgusting creatures. If there’s a slug there, the nomad will bring it here for me to study.
The potter has started with a fever! We need to get his temperature down at once, otherwise he’ll lose consciousness just like the farmer before the nomad gets here!
Bad news – Nimiru and I have discovered that the mushrooms are creating the slugs, and the slugs are turning into lizards. Things could get very bad if we don’t stop this epidemic!
Nimiru and I have started studying all three carriers of the plague – the mushrooms, the slugs and the lizards. Perhaps we’ll find out where they came from.
This is amazing! I’ve never seen so many strange things before! Every corner of the ship seems to be imbued with its own unique magic that binds all the items into a single captivating story.
Courageous Captain
I’ve decided to accompany nomad into the ship’s hold myself, to carry out a new batch of the Ancients’ treasure. Doubtless there are many things worthy of our attention there.

I’d bet my life that this blade belonged to a great warrior. It has a unique comfortable grip made of coral and a blade made from a metal I don’t recognize, covered in mysterious symbols. I know of no weaponsmith who could create such a weapon.
Courageous Captain
The nomad and I found a horde of interesting things on the ship. Among them, an unusual blade caught my eye. The nomad took it away to his hut, and I decided to take a closer look at it.

I sorted through all the things and I’m still amazed at how intelligent the ship’s former owners were. A mass of new and exciting knowledge, a multitude of incredible discoveries. Father and the nomad sent for a new batch of treasure from the ship. I fear I won’t sleep tonight in anticipation of what they bring.
Courageous Captain

I’ve studied many things from the ship. Among them are things that will help our tribe and things that possess some sort of magical power. I need to study the properties of the remaining items before father and the nomad return.

After the chief studied the blade, I realized that this thing should stay with him. It’s as if they were one whole. While the chief was inspecting the blade, I managed to divine its story. The chief was incredibly pleased to hear that he could keep the blade.
Courageous Captain
I found an amazing item – a blade! But it’s no ordinary blade – it’s a work of art and a worthy companion to any warrior at the same time. The chief is sure to love this fascinating item.
It was my daughter who screamed. As it turned out, Menes, the priest of Amrun, crept into the Sepat. He stole a certain crystal from Nimiru that the nomad brought for her the day before.
Courageous Captain
Someone’s scream suddenly broke the silence of the night. I woke up and ran to where it was coming from. What happened? What disaster has befallen our settlement?

As it happened, the potter saw Menes running away and started throwing his pots at him. The wicked priest grew angry and attacked the brave potter. At that moment, he dropped the crystal, and the transparent figure of a giant man appeared above it. Menes was scared and ran away…
Courageous Captain
I grabbed my new blade and rushed toward the potter’s house, where the noise was coming from. Menes will be sorry he decided to pay us a visit this night!
Wow! I didn’t think my idea would be so effective. No one is getting in anyone’s way and everyone is focusing on their job.
Capital Repair
Work is in full swing at the ship again. I need to help with the repairs. Maybe if we split people into units, we’ll be faster and better at fixing up the ship.

Great! These materials should be enough. The internal work is going well, but there’s a roadblock in the work on the outside again. Some holes in the sides are going to leak. We need to think of a way to fill them in and make them waterproof.
Capital Repair
Things are progressing so quickly that another problem has come up… We need to provide the work crew with materials, otherwise they’ll soon have nothing to repair the ship with.
Red sandalwood resin is the most reliable and sets fast. This ship won’t spring a leak any time soon.
Capital Repair

To stop the ship from leaking, we need to patch up the holes in the sides. To do this, the nomad asked me to find the species of tree that provides the best resin. Naturally, I’m just the person for the job!
When I visited the ship, I was amazed at how well organized the work there was. The whole place is bustling with busy workers. I don’t even know what I can do to help. Although…
Capital Repair

While all the men are working tirelessly to fix the ship, I need to think of a way to help them. Maybe if I go to the ship, I’ll be able to find some work to do as well. I need to hurry, otherwise it’ll all be over before I get there.

I’ve made a bunch of treats for our workers. Now they’ll all have full stomachs. I hope this gives them strength to finish the repairs on time. The boys from the neighbors’ house will help me take the food to the ship.
Capital Repair

I don’t think our workers will refuse a good lunch. It will give them strength, and by feeding them I can help our communal project. But to make the food, I’m going to need to get hold of some ingredients.
I washed the food off the pot and prepared it for collecting resin. Who would have thought that such an essential culinary item would end up playing such a role?
Capital Repair

Everyone was so grateful for my treats. I didn’t expect my help to be needed in the repair works. The nomad said that to collect resin from the trees, we’ll need a huge pot. I’m the only one who has one.
I didn’t find the tools. They must still be in the basement somewhere. I’ve always feared to go down there alone.
Capital Repair
During the construction of the Sepat, many different tools were used. To this day, they’re still in there somewhere. The nomad asked me to collect them before he arrives.
The potter and I went down into the basement and found the tools we need. He’s so kind, he never refuses to help! Now we’ve made our own small contribution to repairing the mysterious ship.
Capital Repair
The nomad asked me to gather up some tools, but they’re in the basement of the Sepat. I’m scared to go down there alone – I’ll ask the potter to come with me.

There are a few lines left on this scroll that I couldn’t decipher earlier. The characters are so old and they’re worn away in places. Now that I have more experience, I want to try and translate them.
Old Notes
It’s been a while since the Scroll of Fate was found. Where is it now? It must have gotten mixed up in the other scrolls. Help me find it! I want to read the old texts again.
We searched the whole city, but all in vain. Unfortunately, the witch has already moved on to the next world. What a shame! It’s no surprise – she was over a hundred years old when I last saw her.
Old Notes
We need to find the witch who gave us the Scroll of Fate. Thanks to her, Nimiru managed to heal her father. But now we need the old woman’s help again to translate the remaining lines.

The pharaoh Menetnasht hid his family’s riches from Amrun, and then placed a curse on his bracelets. Only by using the bracelets can we touch the treasure, but first we’ll need to deal with the guard!
The Pharaoh’s Curse
I helped the master decipher the letters in the old scroll, and we learned about the curse on the old bracelets of the pharaoh Menetnasht. Now I know how to break it. Bring me the bracelets!

Sand genies are some of the most dangerous opponents around. They control the element of sand, and it’s all around us here. It’s a good thing the genie wasn’t able to summon a sandstorm, otherwise it would have ground us into powder…
The Pharaoh’s Curse
Menetnasht’s bracelets brought us to the place where they were found. But the brought an ancient genie back to life to protect the pharaoh’s riches. I can’t fight it alone – I need your help!
This stone is a true wonder! There are only two like it int he world. Many dream of finding a source of these minerals, but in vain. We still don’t know how it got into the old pharaoh’s treasury.
Pharaoh’s Treasure
The scrolls say that Menetnasht owned one of the rarest diamonds in the world. We need to find it as soon as possible. It’s a bright-red stone. Finding it should be easy!
Thanks to you, work go faster. Master give me special potion which I put in pot and make hot on fire. Now all things very quickly get clean in this pot and look normal again.
Hard Work
I clean treasure we find. Some of it in bad state. Some need clean from mud, some from rust. For this I need cook pot. Bring me cook pot!
Blue diamonds are in high demand among mages. These stones often contain supernatural power. And the better the cut, the stronger the power – just like this one!
Pharaoh’s Treasure
Among the treasure of the old pharaoh is a stone that he gave a name – Azure Sky. I am in great need of this blue diamond. Bring it and I’ll tell you all about its incredible properties!
Thank you! I’ve done much for the city and never asked for anything, but this rare diamond is the very reward I’ve been waiting for all this time. It’s like the sea itself, captured in a stone!
Pharaoh’s Treasure

I’d like to get hold of a stone from the pharaoh Menetnasht’s treasury. Its green color looks like the color of waves at sea. Nimiru won’t give it to me, but she’ll listen to you. This stone has to be on my ship!

I don’t even know what the old Menetnasht’s motives were. Did he want to hide his treasure for his descendants, or just keep his enemy Amrun from getting his hands on them? Whatever the case, it’s ours now!
City Treasury
Apart from precious stones, many gold coins were found in the old pharaoh’s treasury. We need to count all of them and move them to city treasury. This won’t be easy!
Menes found out that we were searching for his father’s treasure, and sent his people here. We managed to get one diamond back, but the thieves split up, and they still have the second stone!
Pharaoh’s Treasure
Several rare stones have been stolen from Menetnasht’s treasury. We can’t let them get to Menes. We’re going out to search. The thieves can’t have gone far!

We got the diamond back! The thieves didn’t have time to get it out of the city and they decided to lie low in an abandoned warehouse. This place has served as a hideaway for all kinds of criminals more than once.
Pharaoh’s Treasure

I’ve been tasked with finding the trail of the thieves that stole the precious stones from the pharaoh Menetnasht’s treasury. And it looks like I’ve found it. There’s a certain hovel at the market. The diamond should be there!
This stone not let any light through at all. I tell you for sure – there no such mineral in nature. It probably fall from sky to earth. And ancient craftsman give it facets. True miracle!
Heart of the Treasury
I want show you amazing thing! We already carry out all pharaoh’s riches, but I find something else. Come. No one notice this last diamond in darkness except me!
Do you smell the fine aroma we’ve made? The scent is subtle, barely noticeable, and smells just the same as real flowers. It’s sure to go into fashion among the citizens in the near future.
Enchanting Aromas
I’m engaged in my favorite hobby again – making perfume. I’ve had some ideas for new aromas, and I’m working on one of them right now. Want to help?
We’ve got ourselves a fine aroma! This is just what I wanted to create. I’ll probably keep this flask for my own personal stock. I want Velvet Violet to become my scent!
Enchanting Aromas

I’ve wanted to make violet-scented perfume for a long time. I love those flowers. And I think my dream will soon come true. There’s just one finishing touch left. I need add a little water to the essence. I trust you to finish it!
I think we’ve ended up with a lovely scent! I’ll give it to my father. Soon he’ll set off to the lands in the East to meet his empress. I hope that refined and elegant woman appreciates the scent!
Enchanting Aromas

You know, I got so carried away with making perfume for the feminine beauties of our city that I completely forgot about our men. Maybe they’d want to use perfume too. I have an idea. Let’s try it out!
Thanks for the help! The new kiln looks solid. I hope it lasts as long as the last one. Now I can continue my work – I have a whole bunch of jugs to fire.
New Kiln
My old kiln couldn’t withstand the temperature and cracked. Now I don’t have anywhere to fire my pots and jugs. Can you help me put together a new kiln and test it? We’re going to need a bow drill.
The Eastern Empress will be pleased with my gift. Do you smell the pleasant aroma of almonds? It took hard work to get it to smell like that. And a touch of magic, of course…
Enchanting Aromas
I’ve decided which gift to give my father for the Eastern Empress – perfume of my own creation. It’s been infusing for long enough. Pour it into a flask and bring it to me!
I don’t know what the warrior will think of my gift. He has his own view on everything and thinks that men shouldn’t smell like flowers. But I think this perfume has a supremely masculine aroma…
Enchanting Aromas

Nimiru has started making her wonderful perfume. And now she’s making it not only for women, but for men too. Interesting. I’ll probably buy something for my husband. Can you pick me up a pleasant aroma?
I can’t believe the rascals from the Sepat accidentally helped me create a new perfume. A few small spells and this perfume will have no equal in all the world. The aroma will be simply intoxicating…
An Unusual Discovery
Some of the Lady’s wards got into my perfume laboratory and broke several vials. At first I was upset, but now… Just take a whiff – we’ve ended up with a simply divine aroma!
In the lands I come from, all women learn to dance from a very early age. A man won’t marry you if you can’t dance. And the dancer’s belt was always a thing of ritual!
Magic of Dance
In my tribe, every woman makes herself a belt for dancing and gives it to her beloved. It’s a secret symbol of trust. Bring me some lace, I want to make a belt for the warrior!
Brocade is a pretty heavy fabric, but a skilled dancer has to dance in such a way that her belt flutters like wings. And good beads should shine in the sunlight and moonlight alike!
Magic of Dance

The more expensive a dancer’s belt looks, the more experienced she is. In my tribe, I was one of the best, so my belt has to look amazing. Bring me the best fabric and some beads made of precious stones!
In my youth, I never dreamed of using silk thread for a dancing belt. But now any woman from the tribe would be envious of my belt! There’s just a little left to do, then it’ll be ready!
Magic of Dance
To sew the parts of the dancing belt, I’ll need some thread. Some of the citizens keep silkworms nowadays, and there’s plenty of silk thread in the city. Bring some for me!
The thieves turned out to be street boys. They saw the tradeswoman buying buckles from the jeweler and they decided to take them. Expertly made clasps like those are worth a lot.
Magic of Dance

Someone stole some gold buckles from the tradeswoman. I doubt they were the Shadow’s servants – the thieves left too many clues. This is probably the work of city beggars. You and I will find them in no time!

In my wife’s tribe, a woman gives her dancing belt to the man she’s in love with. It’s a symbol that now she’s ready to dance for him alone for the rest of her life. This is the best gift I could have gotten!
Ritual Gift
My wife has prepared a ritual gift for me – a certain belt. She made it with her own hands. She says it’s somehow connected with her tribe’s past. Will you bring it for me?
These mice are the funniest little animals I’ve ever seen. They’ve decimated several of the beekeeper’s barrels of honey and wolfed down all the baker’s bread rolls. But where did they come from?
Furry Family

Two strange beasts recently started snooping around in the citizens’ homes. I’ve never seen anything like it in these lands. They don’t look dangerous, but we have to catch them before they devour all our neighbors’ supplies!
This beast is huge! It’s just as agile and quick on land as in the sea. It’s a true weapon of murder created by nature. It’s a good thing we managed to catch it – the citizens are safe again now.
Furry Family
A white bear climbed out of the sea onto the wharf. I’ve never seen anything like it. It’s aggressive – several sailors have already felt the bite of its powerful claws. Can you catch this creature?
The wind genie was a priceless companion in all my adventures at sea. I’ve been using him for a long time in calm weather. He’s gotten our crew out of many a tight spot!
Help from a Genie

Not far from our shores, a pirate ship attacked a science vessel and sank it. We need to save the survivors, but there isn’t enough wind to get out there. We’ll need the help of the wind genie. Bring me the lamp!

Pirates attacked the science ship in the hope of finding some easy prey, but they found only bears and ZO-O-LOG-IST scientists. It looks like the brigands got angry and cut a hole in the ship’s hull. But now they’ve all been punished!
The Chase

We managed to save all the crew of the science ship. They said the pirates couldn’t have gone far. Their ship was overloaded with goods. Let’s go and chase them immediately, and bring a totem with us!
This kerchief will protect your clever head from sunstroke! The path ahead is a long one. We’ll mainly travel at night, but extra precautions can’t hurt. Even the morning sun can be dangerous!
Operation: Interception

The desert is a dangerous place. Not everyone can cross it from edge to edge like I can. The sun bakes you without mercy, and there isn’t a drop of water around. I advise you to take a kerchief to wrap around your head!

These supplies are enough. We won’t have much time for snacking, we’ll have to eat while we walk. We can’t cook on a fire either – the traitor might see the flames from afar. Taking wood into the desert isn’t wise either.
Operation: Interception
We’ll travel light, but it’s a long way, so we’ll still have to take a little food with us. You take care of it, gather up everything we’ll need! We’re going to need food with plenty of energy!
Great weapon! The elders told me that our tribe came through the stars from a world completely covered in sand. In these harsh lands, everyone learns to use a dagger from their early childhood!
Operation: Interception
Don’t forget to bring a weapon with you! One dagger will be enough, I assure you. An extra weapon would only slow you down in the desert. A short dagger is the best friend of any nomad!

The traitor knew the desert well and was able to cover his tracks. He was perfectly prepared to encounter any enemy. Alone, I wouldn’t have been able to take him alive. Now the chief will decide his fate!
Operation: Interception

If you think a totem might come in handy on the wrong, bring it. You never know what to expect from Menes’s servants. They’re always treacherous and deceitful, like a poisonous snake hiding in your shoe!
I see the nomad taught you to get along with animals well! You don’t fear snakes, lizards or wild bears. Few possess the ability to harness mother nature like that!
Furry Family
A wild bear broke into my chambers. It must be from that science vessel the pirates sunk off our coast. Try and catch it before it hurts someone!
It’s OK, your arrows are covered in a tranquilizer. They won’t harm those huge creatures much, just put them to sleep for a while. Then the nomad will decide what to do with them!
Wild Animals
A few animals from the science ship weren’t tamed. Now they’re roaming the outskirts of the city and scaring the inhabitants. Grab a bow and some arrows, we’ll need them!

The researchers from the ship warned me that this powerful beast is dangerous. But they don’t have enough experience working with their pets. I was taught to perceive animals just like people, as if we’re of the same blood!
Furry Family
All the beasts that survived the sinking of the zoologists’ ship and were saved are under observation in my enclosures. But one is still out there. It’s a black bear, and we have to catch it!
The scientists we saved are from the north. They specialize in studying bears from all over the world. I shared some knowledge about the animals with them, and they gave me this claw in gratitude!
Memento
The researchers from the ship gave me a bear’s claw to show their gratitude. But I don’t remember where I put it. I want this trophy to take its rightful place in my house. Can you help me find it?

Our ancestors bred these dogs back in the ancient times for hunting four-legged game. A good hound is worth a fortune. It takes a long while to cultivate such a friend. They are loyal, tireless and fast.
Hunting Season
I am going hunting. Wanna come? Bring a good hound with you then. We will hunt antelopes today, and they are not easy to catch. They are so fast!
That fast animal has really tired our hounds out. Unfortunately, it’s the only thing we got today. Well, let us have it drink its fill and let it go. The thing earned it.
Hunting Season
We just didn’t have a good hunt today. It must be the wild bears roaming around, scaring all the game off. Oh! Look! I think I see an antelope… Hurry up, before it gets away!

In the end, it all worked out fine. The Lady says some wild animal found its way into her house, a hyena most likely. She couldn’t quite see in the dark. The animal is now roaming the city out there somewhere. I will warn the nomad.
Cries for Help
What was that? Did you hear it? It sounds like the Lady is calling for help! Quick, let’s go see. She and her wards may be in danger.

Hyenas mostly feed on carrion. This one must have been really hungry if it dared venture into the city. Let’s give it a little meat and take it to the desert, away from people. The hyena will find its own kind there.
The Hungry Beast

A wild hyena has sneaked into the city. This doesn’t happen very often. These animals prefer to move in small packs and never travel alone. Nor do they just wander into towns. We need to catch it right away.
We searched the entire Sepat and found nothing. We were about to leave empty-handed when we came across a boy who told us about a beautiful throne located in one of the back rooms.
Secret of the Idols
Secret symbols that once belonged to the gods are key to regaining their ear. If we hurry we may find one of them in the Sepat.
The Sepat is a refuge for children, and the Lady is almost like a mother to them. Isis is similarly the mother of all people, which is why the throne was hidden here.
Isis’ throne is hidden in the Sepat. We need to find it since it’s one of the key symbols for establishing a connection to the gods.
Nimiru told me about the symbols and said that Bastet had been locked up in the Lower World. Even though it’s late already, I have to find how they have managed to do that.
I studied some old maps and managed to figure out where the dagger was hidden. Anubis used it to administer justice when he came down to earth.
I worked hard, and I will soon be able to harvest a rich bounty to offer to Hapi.
Nimiru took the fruit I gathered to the river. After he dipped them in the water and said a few words, they all turned into precious stones…
The harvest is ready. I can now bring it in and offer it to Hapi.
I let everyone know, whoever I could think of. Now the people of my tribe are getting ready to celebrate Bastet’s upcoming return.
The Goddess of Joy
Nimiru said people must remember Bastet. It would be good to have a celebration to honor the goddess.
But what kind of a celebration would it be without wine? I happen to have a great wine in my cellar that I keep for special occasions.
Preparing for the celebration helped bring our tribe even closer together. It is as if we are all expecting something nice and good to happen now.
Menes has put a curse on the city! But this should not stop us. Let us trust Nimiru’s magic and continue to prepare for the celebration.
I hope Bastet likes the flowers I have picked. After all, they are the symbol of her beauty! If you ask me, there is no flower more beautiful than the orchid.
That’s right! We need to give her something that would make it clear how grateful I am for our fertile lands. I think I have just the right idea…
I will bring a bunch of wheat to the celebration. It will make it perfectly clear what I am so grateful to her for.
A cat showing up is a good sign. That it has chosen to settle in Bastet’s chair indicates that the goddess is with us.
The cat told us that Bastet came to our world from the stars. That happened early in the morning, when the grass and tree leaves were still covered in dew.
Suddenly, the cat spoke with a human voice! It told us plenty of great stories…
Just imagine how interesting everything that has happened before was! Everything around, such as nature and the animals, was different from what it is now.
The cat spoke on and on, telling us more and more stories. I took every single word in, anxious not to miss anything.
The cat’s stories made me think of how we may have come to acquire certain specific elements of our everyday lives.
Never before have I given much thought to things around us. Mesmerized, I was taking the cat’s every word in.
Each of us found something to his own liking in those stories. For my own part, I have also discovered an amazing story that really touched a chord with me.
We spent a long time listening to the cat’s stories. Captivated, we soaked every word in, unaware of how much time had passed.
It was late at night when we finally finished cleaning. Everybody had worked hard, and we were pleased with ourselves.
The Bastet celebration was a real hit! But we shouldn’t forget that a good celebration always requires a thorough clean-up afterwards.
In the end, after tossing and turning in bed for hours, I finally slept. I was looking forward to wonderful dreams in which our tribe would manage to conquer evil.
But after learning so much new, I just couldn’t sleep. How many amazing new discoveries tomorrow held in store for me!
Great! There’s enough gold here to help us buy something from the merchants that would help highlight the goddess’ beauty.
So what should we buy for Bastet’s Idol? Some special necklace, perhaps?
It took a long time but the kids helped us out. First, we made some silk. We would need it for decorations.
I want to make something really beautiful for the goddess. But I need to hurry to finish it on time.
All right! I didn’t think I was going to be able to prepare everything I need to work on my item, but now I see I had enough time for everything, so I can get on with my work now.
Oh, my! I have slept so long after the celebration that I hardly have any time left now to prepare my offerings. I’d better hurry if I want to get all the materials ready.
Not only kind gods inhabit Another World, but evil ones too – such as Seth. He may well have regained his strength and unleashed his beast on our world to hunt for him. What an abominable creature!
Evil Spawn

I urgently need your help and the powers of the totem! A wild beast has materialized smack in the center of the city. Several warriors have already fallen victim to him, and their bodies have disappeared. We must stop this evil spawn right away!
The scrolls have taught me how to make delicate, beautiful dishware out of POR-CE-LAIN. However, to create this material we need the kind of heat that my regular furnace could hardly withstand.
A New Skill
Help me collect materials for my new superstrong furnace. Don’t worry, the one we recently built is fine. But now I need another one. I’ll explain later.

It looks like the city streets are finally all quiet after that latest brouhaha with the shadows. All thieves are behind bars, and the Shadow’s new killers are keeping a low profile. But one can never rest easy. Be vigilant!
Security Measures

We expect some esteemed guests to arrive in the city. The streets must be safe when they come – that’s an order from the chief. You will join my people patrolling some of the most crowded neighborhoods in the city.

All right, we did it! Look, it’s a miracle! A real porcelain cup! It’s so light, so unlike those heavy earthenware mugs I used to make before. And the sound they make! Just you listen to that beautiful sound of porcelain!
Beautiful Porcelain
I tested my new superstrong furnace and am now ready to begin making my first porcelain oeuvre. Join me, if you wish. Having a helper will make it all so much easier.
These porcelain saucer and cup look so good together! It’s a perfect match! I absolutely love working with this material. Come to think of it, I may want to give this first set to my wife.
Beautiful Porcelain
Now that we’ve managed to make our first porcelain cup, everything else will come out fine too. We just need to start with something simple. How about we make a saucer for our cup now?

What a great little thing we made! What did you say you call it – SU-GAR-BOWL? That’s easy enough. People in your world use it to keep sugar in? Well, yeah, it sure does look better than a canvas bag!
Beautiful Porcelain
My wife just loved that gift. She thinks quite a few others would want porcelain dishware for their homes, so I should keep going. What else could we make? Any ideas?

Have I told you yet? The Eastern Empress is coming to visit our city soon. I want her to know I have adopted her people’s tradition and now drink tea every day myself. Let me go try out my new teapot.
Beautiful Porcelain

The denizens of the Eastern Empire drink tea all day long. They brew it in special teapots. Well, that’s a healthy habit all right! Could you order another porcelain teapot like this for me from the potter?

In a short span of time, the potter has made great progress making porcelain dishware. With you as his assistant, he is making truly beautiful things. Tomorrow morning, I will tell them to serve me milk in my new milk bowl.
Beautiful Porcelain

The potter has started making beautiful new porcelain dishware. I would like him to make a milk bowl for me. Could you please explain what I want to him and help him too, if need be? You do know what it is all about, don’t you?

It looks like I have finally mastered porcelain making. It is such a pity though that new dishware is so expensive. Quite a few of our fellow citizens won’t be able to afford such a porcelain service…
A Master of His Trade

I have learned so much from you about all this beautiful dishware from your world! Now I would like to go about making a porcelain SER-VICE. I have enough experience, but I will still need some guidance from you.

We will need a board and a rolling pin to roll dough. It will be a huge pie since all of the chief’s guests and his entire entourage will be attending the party. Everyone will want a taste of my creation.
Raspberry Pie
Well, this is as good a time as any for making the best ever pie for the best ever woman. I would appreciate your help in the kitchen. To get started, why don’t you bring all the supplies over?
I can promise you a pie the likes of which the world has never seen before. It will be rich and sumptuous. I am sure our guests have never tried anything of the kind and they will be happy.
Raspberry Pie

We don’t have much time left until our dear guests arrive. While I go to the market to get some margarine, why don’t you get the flour ready for the pie? We will need the best bleached wheat flour. Nothing less would do!
You are right on time! Whipped eggs will make our pie ever so tender. And if you beat the yolks with sugar, the pie will come out nicely browned and crumbly.
Raspberry Pie

We have a problem! When I went to the market, I forgot to buy eggs. We can make no dough without them. Why don’t you run and get some from the tradeswoman? Just tell her to give you the freshest she has, from this morning!
Unfortunately, no one in the city makes palm oil and we have to buy it from traveling merchants. But the Lady could always find a little for me…
Raspberry Pie

I only use palm oil when making pies. It gives them a nice color and a special taste. Unfortunately, it looks like we are all out, and we still need some for this treat we are making. Could you check with the Lady to see if she has any?
These raspberries are just the way we want them. Give me a minute, I will add some starch and sugar and mix it all thoroughly. It will make for a great pie filling.
Raspberry Pie

Now it’s time for our main ingredient. Listen carefully. Go to the market and buy some fresh raspberries, but make sure they are a tad overripe and falling apart. Those would be the best for the purpose.
Sheriti caught a whiff of my pie and decided to have her a treat in secret. Oh, and the feast is so near! Well, let’s give the rest to Sepat’s children and make another one while we still can.
Impossible to Resist
This is a huge pie indeed, and it looks very yummy. Except wait, what is this? Someone has cut a big slice off of my pie! Oh, that’s a total disaster! What are we going to do now? Any ideas?
Many thanks for your help. I really wanted to give Sheriti a nice present. This is a very unusual lamp indeed. It will create very mysterious ambiance in the girl’s room. She is going to like that.
A Little Surprise
I decided to give Sheriti a small present but I don’t know if she will like it. You know my stepdaughter better than me. Could you help me? I am a bit anxious here.
Thanks for your help. This little duckling is still so silly. You never know what dangers may lurk out there, on the other side of the fence. Stray cats, nasty children, you name it…
Little Ducklings
I need your help right away! We had ducklings hatching, and I was looking after them as if they were my own children. And yet, I found one of them missing today. We need to find it right away!
Is just a little gosling! Me was afraid it was some beast coming up to the surface. Again from the depths. Poor little ting, oh so scared here, in the dark. It fall through, maybe. From up there.
Little Ducklings
Me hear some strange sound in me cave. Echo all over, in da corridors. Me think it some strange animal. Find together, ya?

It makes me very happy that the ostriches have taken a liking to my place and now feel at home here. This little guy is proof of that. I have always wanted to domesticate and breed ostriches, and now my dream has come true.
Little Ducklings

I have great news! I have taken in a few ostriches, and now one of the females has laid the first egg, and it hatched, and we now have a beautiful little chick. Come have a look, it will be the first domesticated ostrich ever!

This bird is called a TUR-KEY, right? Where I come from, we don’t have any of those. This turkey chick must have escaped from one of the overseas merchant ships that come from the west. They bring tons of poultry over.
Little Ducklings
I have seen a very strange bird at the pier. I have never seen anything of the kind before. It looks like a chicken, but it’s way too large. Come with me, maybe y could tell me what those are.
It totally beats me how this little thing wound up in a crocodile nest. Well, I guess I’ll just let the farmer have it, he’ll be able to take better care of him. And I’ll set the little crocs free.
Little Ducklings

I managed to rescue a few crocodile eggs from a pillaged nest. I took good care of them for a long time. I wanted them to be healthy little crocs. But what hatched out of one of them really caught me by surprise. You want to have a look?
This year our poultry flocks have multiplied nicely. That’s a good sign. My father used to say that if there’s plenty of birds in the yard, it means the gods are looking over your farm.
The Poultry

These days I am so busy with my poultry that I have no time left at all for the Garden. Could you help me a little? Put some grain into the feeder for the chicks, and in the meantime I’ll go weed the Garden.

The river people have paid us back in full. As always, they remain true to their Nile cult. Look at this cute vessel they used to put the gold in. For them, a fish is the symbol of wealth and well-being.
Neighborly Debts

The river people have borrowed some money from us to help rebuild their villages ravaged by Menes. Now they are back on their feet and ready to pay us back. We are going to the southern villages to collect on the debt.

The Shadow doesn’t have all that many servants left these days. I wouldn’t put anything past her, but her only advantage could be the surprise factor. But this time her people were out of luck. It was the totem’s powers and your agility that stopped the thieves before they could go far.
Ambush!
The Shadow’s people knew we were transporting gold from southern lands and they ambushed us on the pier. They stole the money from under my very nose. We must give chase and teach them a good lesson!
In the end, is not as bad as seemed. Coupla big oak supports, fix good. Now we no need worry that one of the buildings suddenly go kaput underground.
Preventive Maintenance
Me notice the ceilings are peeling in some of the corridors. Debris falling down. Me want go inspect da cavern, find damage and fix. To be on the safe side. You help?
Only Menes could create such a monster. These horrible savage crossbreeds are his hobby. He is still trying to put together an army of invincible monsters and take over the city again.
Attempt on Life

I was attacked by a horrible creature – a cross between a hippo and a shark. It sprang from under the sand, its jaws ajar. I barely escaped with my life. We must try to catch it before the monster hurts someone.

This camel is young and resilient. I will quickly find Menes’ secret lair where he breeds his monsters and report back to the warrior. His soldiers will raid that ungodly place and make quick work of it.
In Search of Monsters
I am sure the sand shark has been raised not too far from the city. I am going into the desert to find Menes’ secret lair. Find me a good camel so that I could leave today.
You never know what could happen when you travel. The road is full of danger and unpleasant surprises. It is our duty to help any traveler who finds himself in our lands.
Helping a Traveler

A tired traveler chanced upon my tavern. He says he was robbed in the desert by Menes’ henchmen and he barely escaped. The poor guy will need a good camel and a water skin. Could you find those for him while I feed him?

That’s great! I will put the seeds from last year into this basket and new ones into this one. And this one is for those treated with onion juice. Everything is in order, so I don’t need to worry about shipping anymore.
The Farmer’s Mission
I need large baskets for taking seeds across the desert. Why don’t you find those while I sort the seeds? My father always said that order is paramount.

The city hasn’t had any supply problems lately, so we can afford not to be too stingy and share our bounty with the neighbors. My father always said that prosperity should go hand in hand with charity.
The Farmer’s Mission
Now would be a good time to decide what grains and vegetables we could take to our neighbors. This is going to be hard work, and we’ll do it now. Let’s go to the stores.
I hope crossing the desert is not going to be as difficult as the nomad said it would be. I really don’t feel like having my camel go nuts and carry me away somewhere, to some wild lands.
A Long Way To Go
Ever since I was a child, I have never cared much for riding camels. But there is no way around it. Find me a good halter and a whip. I want to be able to show this obstinate animal who is the boss.
Now you are talking! I like it when my sickle is razor sharp. In all fairness, a sickle is the farmer’s best weapon. Who knows what dangerous lands I will have to travel across!
The Farmer’s Mission

I have put a few tools together for our neighbors, but I am afraid one of the sickles just isn’t sharp enough. Any farmer could tell you that a dull sickle spells trouble. Could you take it to be sharpened?

And here’s the farmer’s lost rare seed box! He never stops telling me that these are magic seeds and they require extra care. Also, supposedly, they understand human speech. This is all fairy tale stuff, of course…
A Special Gift
Help me find my leather box. Where could I put it? The farmer urgently needs it to keep some rare seeds in that he wants to give to our neighbors.

Great job! Now I don’t have to worry abut leaving my Garden unattended. You will be taking care of all my things until I come back. Just don’t ever bring the pitchfork into the house – that’s a bad omen.
The Farmer’s Mission
Getting ready for a long journey to our neighbors’ lands takes a lot of time. Who will keep an eye on the farm? While I am busy, could you grab a pitchfork and spread some manure in the field?

This gadget was invented by our early ancestors. Using the calendar, our neighbors will be able to keep track of the Nile flooding and know when to work the fields and when it’s the celebration season.
Father Nile

The farmer is going to visit our neighbors to help them with a very important task – restoring their agriculture. I am putting together a calendar of the Nile’s flooding seasons for them. Will you help me finish the job?

It looks like everything is ready for my long journey to our neighbors’ land. I will try to have as quick a turnaround as I can and come back. If my father could see me now, he would be so proud of me!
The Farmer’s Mission

Many of our city folks, when they learned that I was going to go help our neighbors, offered their assistance. The want to share the fruits of their labor with us. We will have to go around town and collect all those donations people will make.

Let this crown become the symbol of successful farming for our neighbors down the river, and may Hapi help them in all of their endeavors. As for us, we will always stand ready to offer a helping hand.
A Priestly Gift
Go see the Master and get Hapi’s crown from him. Hapi is the god of the Nile and good harvest. I want the farmer to give it to the last priest left in those lands as a gift.

Yes, this is indeed my purse but there is not a single coin left inside. The port has been flooded with thieves from other cities lately. While the Shadow’s servants sit in jail, these newcomers are scouting out the territory. I don’t like this at all!
Crafty Hands
Can you believe it? I had my purse stolen in broad daylight! I just helped some cripple across the street, and before I know it my purse is gone. Could you help me find it?

We have selected an excellent bracelet for the warrior. The mariner told me they wear such bracelets aboard ships so that ropes wouldn’t give them burns as they work. My husband could also use a thing like that as he goes on practicing his own difficult craft.
A Gift for the Husband
I have noticed that many men arriving in the city from overseas wear those nice leather bracelets. I would like to buy one of those for my husband. Could you help me choose?

And here’s a snuff box! It looks like it belongs to one of those exotic sailors that come to our lands from the west in their huge rafts. But how did it make its way here, into my cabin? This ship is always a mess!
A Bad Habit
Can you smell the tobacco? Once again, one of the sailors smuggled that exotic weed on board and hid it somewhere. How about we go try and find that smuggler’s secret hiding place?

Amanita, or the warriors’ mushroom, is one of the best known poisonous mushrooms. They dry it and then take a few small bites before battle. The mushroom makes my tribe’s hunters fearless in the face of any enemy.
Going the Tracker’s Way

I would like to tell you about poisonous mushrooms. People either stomp on them or use them to kill each other. However, the priests of my tribe believe them to be living things and turn to them for help. Today, we will be looking for the warriors’ mushroom.

When you boil death cap and radishes in one pot, you get a kind of a gray sludge. This is a remedy that could bring a man back from the verge of death. But it is not a pleasant comeback at all. Trust me on this.
Going the Tracker’s Way

Today, we need to find some death caps – one of the most poisonous mushrooms known to man. If you eat some, you won’t last a day. Yet, the priests found a life-saving antidote – radishes. We will need those too.
