The sycamore fruit is the symbol of Hautore – the goddess of love. When mixed with our poisonous mushroom, its juice makes for a potent elixir that changes they way people look. It also makes them eloquent.
Going the Tracker’s Way

Sometimes one needs to hold some sway over the minds of others to make them more obedient. But that’s no easy feat. That’s why the priests came up with an elixir made of false honey fungus and sycamore. Let us find us some!

This is not an edible mushroom even though it may look like it is. However, it has one useful feature. It is so bitter that it makes one vomit. Take a little if you have food poisoning, and it’ll help empty your stomach of all the poison in no time.
Going the Tracker’s Way

I would like to tell you of a remedy that helps against stomach flu. When you travel and try to survive, it is fairly easy to confuse edible grasses and roots with inedible ones. If you do, you’ll need some boletus parasiticus.

The starry agaric is a very cunning mushroom. If you prepare and dry it the right way, it will save you from starvation when the going gets hard, but if you make a mistake, it becomes a paralyzing poison. Then you can use it to treat your arrowheads.
Going the Tracker’s Way

Do you know anything about the Cunning Mushroom, also known as the yellow knight? No? Then I am going to tell you. It won’t be a problem finding them. Let’s just go take a walk where I have found mycelium before.

They call it Seth’s Mushroom. They believe that this strong-willed dark god uses it to reveal – for a time – the ultimate knowledge to people. But anyone who is not ready loses his body forever, becoming one of Seth’s animals.
Lesson One
There is a mushroom that hunters and priests do not recommend you eat unprepared. Only if your will is strong enough will you survive what is revealed to you. I will show you that mushroom.

Phew! That was close! Thanks to you, I have managed to sneak right past the guards to the table and put the straw mat back where it was supposed to be. Had the Eastern Empress noticed it was missing, she would have been sure to take offense!
The Holiday Feast

The feast to honor the Eastern Empress has already started. She and her entourage are moving towards the banquet table. But there is no straw mat where our honored guest is going to sit. So what’s she going to sit on? We need to get a mat over there pronto!
Thank you, you are as fast as the wind! I will go serve them some papaya right away while the empress is engrossed in conversation with the chief and Nimiru, discussing the city.
The Holiday Feast

I was ordered to serve some papaya while the main action is unfurling in the banquet hall. Apparently, the empress likes this fruit very much, of which we have not been told. Run to the market while we still have time!

Thanks to you, the concert will take place as scheduled. Our guest will now have a chance to enjoy the best marine band ever. If even mermaids cannot resist our music, the empress is going to love it for sure.
The Holiday Feast
I have put together a small band of my sailors to entertain the Eastern Empress and her entourage during the feast. But one of my imbeciles forgot his oboe on board. Please bring it over, ASAP!
And here’s the holiday bedspread! I was worried that everyone had forgotten about it. I will present it to the Eastern Empress myself as a sign of our friendship and respect.
The Holiday Feast

The holiday is in full swing! There is plenty of food, wine flows freely and the musicians are playing like it’s their last gig ever. Now would be a good time to present the empress with the ritual bedspread to welcome her as an honored guest of our city. Now, where’s the bedspread?

Be careful, don’t break the jar. I have only prepared one jar for the empress. Just one jar. Rumor has it that the empress loves tart cherries and maintains a huge cherry orchard in her castle that she tends to herself.
The Holiday Feast
Now is the time for my special treat. I have made a divine cherry liqueur for the Eastern Empress’ pleasure. It is indeed very special. She will absolutely love it. Bring it over, quick.

We have fattened this bull for a long time, saving it for a special occasion, such as this one. Now our work is done and we can join everyone at the table to enjoy the holiday delicacies and the sweet wine!
The Main Dish
We have butchered the biggest bull in the city for this holiday feast. It’s almost done cooking. It’s time to serve the dish. I will need you and a few soldiers to help me.

I will help the Lady bathe the baby and put him into bed with her. She is still too tired from her labor. Thank God the boy has been born healthy and strong. The potter is so happy he can’t sit for a second.
Welcome Child

Oh, what a joyous day! The Lady gave birth to a son. She urgently needs someone to help care for the baby. He needs a warm bath right away. I will heat some water, and you could go bring the baby bathtub.

Now we have us a great rattle! The baby is sure going to love it. I want to be the first to give him a gift so he would remember me. When the boy grows up, I will become his friend and teach him to climb trees.
Welcome Child
I want to make a present for the Potter’s and Lady’s baby son – a rattle. I have got everything I need for it but somehow it doesn’t come all together. Maybe you could help me?
Goat milk is better for the baby than cow milk. It is easier for a young body to digest. The Lady told me about it when we found an abandoned child at the Sepat’s gate once.
Welcome Child

After giving birth, my wife cannot yet breastfeed our son. Eventually, she’ll be able to, but for the time being we need to do something. Goat milk will do just fine. Could you please go get some from the farmer’s family?

I thank you for your help. I am happy to see my apprentices working harder than ever and the older children mentoring the youngsters and taking care of them. My wife will get better soon and everything will get back to normal.
Young Parents

I am so busy taking care of my wife that I have no time left for working. Nor can she look after the other children for now. Could you go check on my apprentices and all those other rabble-rousers of ours?

The baby has finally stopped crying and fallen asleep. I have plenty of experience with children. In our tribe, any woman could become a child’s mother for a time, if need be. That’s how they taught us.
Welcome Child

We need to change the baby’s diapers as often as possible so that he’d be comfortable and have no reason to cry all the time. It’s also good for his tender skin. Go get some more diapers, and please hurry.
The chamomile tea is ready, and it smells good. The baby will need to take it as a medicine for a few days and he will soon be much quieter. This is something that makes even my father calm down!
Welcome Child

The Potter’s and Lady’s baby son is crying all the time, and he doesn’t sleep well. I examined him. There is nothing terribly wrong with him. He just needs time to get used to the world around him. We need to make some chamomile tea for the baby. Could you help me make it?
That’s a great little crib we’ve made! Let this small “wooden vessel” carry the baby away every night across the sea of dreams. Now, how did I even get this sentimental poetic stuff in my head?
Welcome Child

I am so glad the potter and the Lady have had them a baby son! I decided to make a modest gift for them – the baby’s first crib. I have my work cut out for me, so you are welcome to join me and help some.
I am so grateful to you. This amount is a solid offering to our gods for having given the potter and I a strong, healthy son. Let us hope they look after him for as long as he lives!
Gratitude to the Gods

I wanted to thank the gods for finally giving my husband and I a heir. We need to put some money together for the offering but for the time being I cannot swing the entire amount myself. Could I count on you here?

Now, that’s a great bowl! It will serve our gods in the altar for a long time. For years to come, the city’s denizens will be putting their offerings into it to thank the gods for their benevolence and protection.
Gratitude to the Gods
My wife wants to make an offering to the gods for giving us the child we wanted for so long. I have my own offering to make too. I am making an alabaster offering bowl. Please help me finish it.
This brush makes for a perfect tool. It’s made of desert mouse hair and costs a fortune. Not every painter can afford such a brush. Now it’s yours.
Real Talent
I would like to fully evaluate your skills as a painter. I need someone to help illustrate manuscripts and books. What do you think of that? Then let’s find a brush and get started.

We have a great color palette here. All the colors are bright and vivid, just the way I like them. That’s exactly the way your paints should look like. This way the painting will survive to be enjoyed by many a generation to come.
Real Talent
I am all out of paints, so we will have to make some more out of colored earths. We could ask the potter for some and will dig up the rest in the caves by ourselves. Come, I’ll show you how.

Now the canvas needs to dry in the sun for a while before you can start painting. I often stare at blank canvas or a clean sheet of papyrus, mesmerized. The very emptiness of it takes my breath away and my hands itch to create something new.
Real Talent
I will teach you how to stretch a canvas. We will then need to size and prime it. You will need work gloves for that.
That’s not too bad for your first easel. It’s sturdy enough and it doesn’t shake. I think we’ll use it again and again in the future. It really comes handy.
Real Talent
We’ll need an easel to secure your canvas. I have never had one but I have seen some instructions in the scrolls on how to make one out of wood. How about we try to do it together?
A painter’s palette is a simple yet original invention. You can use it to mix paints to make any hues you like. Besides, it has a large thumb hole by the edge.
Real Talent

Everything is ready for painting. Now all we need to do is mix some paint on the palette. I hope you know how to do that. So go ahead, get started, and in the meantime I will find you some interesting objects or scenery to paint.
Great job! None of my apprentices has ever created anything of the kind. Your world must be populated only by talented people. I like your technique – the landscape looks very realistic.
A New Oeuvre
Well, it’s time to get started with your painting. I have found you a great view of the Nile to paint. If you do a good job of it, I will hire you as an illustrator.
Thanks for the salad leaves. I am so preoccupied with my work that I often have no energy left to visit the training grounds and exercise. Hopefully, I will feel better now.
A Source of Energy

You can’t get enough energy from eating meat alone. Greens are very important since they help restore your strength. I could use some of that lately. I need to munch on something green. Could you find me something?
Thanks for the workout, it’s been a while since I had one so good. You have great skills with a spear and I like your easy battle technique. We just have to have another match soon.
Warrior Training
I am going to the training grounds. Thanks to you, I now feel much better and have more energy. I really do. Come with me, I’ll show you a few new tricks with a spear.
The pirates that stole the ship were the survivors of a sailor brotherhood that we overran some time ago. That’s how they wanted to take revenge on the city. But you helped us recover the ship.
A Chase Across the Waves
I urgently need your help. A few pirates took advantage of the mess at the port and stole one of our best ships. We are giving chase right away. Don’t forget to arm yourself properly.

Thanks for your help! I hope this banana pie will taste good and I can then make some more. We don’t have any of this exotic fruit in my country. That’s why I like experimenting with different fillings so much.
Banana Filling
I would like to make a banana pie. I made some dough and then realized I didn’t buy any bananas. Could you do me a favor and go and get some?

Thanks for your help. Thanks to your good name, quite a few of our fellow citizens, especially young ones, showed up at my door, all willing to become sailors. I will now have plenty of crews to man the new ships.
Call of the Sea

We now have more and more ships and not enough sailors to take them to sea. I need new recruits willing to spend their lives at sea. Could you announce it in the city that I am looking for new sailors?

And we are all done now! The farmer’s barn looks better than new. When he comes back from the southern lands, he will be very grateful to us for helping him out. Well, naturally, he’ll grumble a little at first. He always does.
A Stray Bolt of Lightning
There was a thunderstorm at night, and lightning struck the farmer’s barn. We need to help him out while he is out of town. Let’s get some materials and fix his old barn.
That’s great, we found the buffalo! If he broke a leg, the farmer would never forgive us. But now our worries are over. I’ll go take this silly animal back to the barn.
A Runaway Buffalo

When lightning destroyed the farmer’s barn, one of the buffaloes escaped through a whole in the wall. We need to find it quickly before it gives them a scare in the city or gets stuck in some hole somewhere.

Thanks for helping me out and taking the supplies to the sailors. They have paid for these provisions a while back but I just didn’t have a chance to send them over to their ship. You know, I hardly ever get a breather from the market.
Food for Sailors

There is a ship leaving the city today, and the sailors need some provisions for their voyage. Put all the food they need together, load up a donkey and take it to the ship. They will wait for you on the pier.

Thanks for the water, now I’ll have no reason to blush when my wife sees me. To be sure, I still have work to do at my pottery shop, but family comes first, especially now. In the meantime, my new apprentices will keep working.
A New Elevator

I need to go see my wife and son right away, but I haven’t finished working and I have clay all over. I can’t come see them when I am like this. Will you bring me a jug of water so that I could wash up and put myself in order?
Dis thickness gauge, it very good. Now me can measure, all my stone collection. Me have a great idea. Me want to use these stones to make some statues.
A New Hobby
When me have free time, me walk the cavern, me pick stone. Funny shapes. Me want to measure how thick. Me hear the potter have special instrument. For dis. You bring?
This instrument, me can make stone samples that me see during long hours of me solitude. Me see them often, they is kind spirits. They me speak their mystery language.
A New Hobby
Me pick the best stones from me collection. Good to make statues. Me need another tool for carving. You bring, me start work, yes?

Whoever poisoned my father decided to get rid of the evidence and dumped the cup in the water off the pier. But now I have it – thanks to you! Now I can determine what poison they have put into my father’s drink and find the right antidote.
Sneak Attack

After visiting the brewery, my father felt sick. It looks like someone has put some poison into his beer. However, the cup he drank from has disappeared. Please find it, and then I’ll be able to determine what kind of poison they used to make my father sick.

The Shadow’s people have turned the entire tavern upside down. It was a tough fight. They fight like wild animals and never give up until they die. When struck a deadly blow, they disappear in the shadows right away…
Chasing the Shadow

After a long hiatus, the Shadow and her new assassins are back on our city streets. She made an attempt on the chief’s life, and now we have to find her. That brigand! It is not going to be easy, and we’ll need the powers of the totem.
After being poisoned, my father is now having bad headaches. He regains consciousness for short periods of time, and then he is out again. I hope this incense will do him good.
Looking for Antidote
I have studied the poison my father was given. I still have a way to go before I find the antidote. In the meanwhile, could you find some incense that could help alleviate the chief’s headache?

I hate to admit it, but it doesn’t look like the Shadow’s henchmen are operating in the visible world alone. They are also lurking where we can’t see them. I’ve been to that world when I was unconscious, and I saw it all for myself…
In the World of Shadows
I feel better now. My headaches are gone, and my body feels like it’s mine again. But I can tell the poison I was given is still inside of me. Come, I’ll tell you what I saw while I was unconscious.

It appears that the empress’ hairbrush has been poisoned. The smallest of scratches, and our guest would have died on the spot. Had it not been for you, we would have a huge international scandal on our hands now. But she is not out of danger yet.
Brazen Attempt

A stranger sneaked into the room of our guest, the Eastern Empress. Her Majesty saw a shadow in the window when she entered her chambers. We need to search the premises, there may still be danger lurking.

I knew that the Shadow’s assassins had plans to ambush the empress’ ship. But thanks to you and the powers of the totem, we are out of danger now. I can now rest easy knowing that beautiful lady is safe.
Special Mission
To avoid any other attacks, I have decided to send the Eastern Empress back home. We now need to make sure her ship is secure and post guards.
Your wits and quick thinking helped our soldiers free Sheriti from her abductors and keep the gold. We must do everything we can to prevent any other kidnappings in the city.
Shameful Abduction
Oh, woe is me! The Shadow has abducted Sheriti and is now demanding a ransom. You need to put enough gold together and go leave the bag on the market square. But hurry!
Shadowy assassins are quiet and sneaky. They could easily defeat the city’s superior forces because the soldiers are so loud and in your face. But we are going to change our tactics now.
Secret Technique

Come to the training grounds! Today I will be teaching the warrior and his soldiers special techniques for moving quietly and making unexpected precision strikes. We could all use those skills to fight the Shadow’s assassins.
The nomads have a legend about a Wandering Shepherd. He is roaming out there in the world helping all the lost souls. I am sure he’ll find our sheep too, now that he knows we need him.
Wandering Shepherd

The Wandering Shepherd has his loyal dog with him. In fact, he has more than one, and all the dogs serve him faithfully. I know how to find one of them and pass a message along to the Shepherd. Why don’t we try that?

The Wandering Shepherd helps people, but he can be strict. Without a whip, he can’t look after his flock, otherwise it’ll roam all over the world and forget who its master is. But even a whip can be used without taking it from the belt…
Wandering Shepherd
The dog came back, which means the Wandering Shepherd will help us find the sheep. But first we need to find the Shepherd’s three sacred items. First, let’s find the whip.

A walking staff is the symbol of a strong man. Most people are used to living settled lives and fear what’s outside the city walls. Travelers are different. They leave everything behind and gain the entire world. They know how to live a life.
Wandering Shepherd

As a rule, shepherds have no permanent home and often travel around. And when you do, you can’t do without a sturdy staff. Now that we have the first of the Wandering Shepherd’s items, let us find the second one.

Just like with the staff, the Wandering Shepherd uses his pipe as a tool for directing his flock and collecting them from the surrounding fields and woods. You need to be very wise to know when to use the whip and when to make do with a jolly pipe tune.
Wandering Shepherd
I will help you find the last of the Wandering Shepherd’s items and thus secure his support. It is a simple thing, this pipe, but it makes the road so much more fun! Let’s go find it!
You need to throw these lentils downwind, and where they fly, that’s the direction we need to go to find my lost sheep. This Wandering Shepherd story is very strange and it smacks of magic.
Wandering Shepherd
The nomad told me that if I want to find my lost sheep I have to make an offering to the Wandering Shepherd. We need to give him some lentils. Could you help me collect them?

Praise be to the Wandering Shepherd! We found my poor sheep! Because of his patronage, she never drowned, nor broke a leg or fell pray to predators. Could it be that the legend the nomad has told us is actually true?
The Good Shepherd
The wind is down, and the lentils have all fallen in a jagged line that leads into the jungle. Could this path really lead us to my lost sheep. How about we check it out?
That’s quite some fish you’ve got! It’s a halibut. We’ve had a lot of those in our waters lately. It’s a strange creature indeed, all flat. As they age, one of their eyes shifts to the other side.
Rich Catch
I have a day off today, and I want to spend it with my friends, doing my favorite thing. You know how much I like fishing. Come with us, the fish are a-waiting!

But that’s a pike! That’s what I always fish for! It often lurks closer to shore, in the reeds. This is where it hunts smaller fish – and this is where I hunt it. Dry pike is the best thing that could happen to beer!
Rich Catch
I like fishing with the mariner. Where he goes, there’s always plenty of fish. And boy, does he know his fish! He has no equals there. Oh, it looks like you have a bite! Strike!
That’s a really big carp you’ve got! Let me take it home right away. Tonight, my family is having fried fish with lemon and vegetables. Why don’t you come and have some with us?
Rich Catch

You always fish with the mariner? You do? Then I have a job for you. Get me a carp! Folks in the city sweep fresh fish right off the counters at the market, and by the time I get there in the evening there’s nothing left. And I really feel like some fried carp.
The mariner says this time of year salmon come to our shores to breed. There is so much fish around at this time that even such a lousy fisherman as I could get some.
Rich Catch

I have started making fish pies back in my homeland. So I figured, why not here? The folks in the city may as well like them. I am fishing for salmon today and expect to get quite a few. You want to help me?

Catch eel, no easy. Very tricky fish. No can hold in hands. It twists like a snake. But eel teach me patience. Me stand still, wait long, and then… Me grab him! By the gills! Me like this kind of fishing.
Rich Catch
Me no like fishing in big water. Too much room, me scared. Me like quiet spots, like my underground lake. Me catch slippery eel there. With me bare hands! Me teach you. You want?

Just you look at this catfish! It’s huge! Without you, I would never have been able to reel it in. On the contrary, it would have probably pulled me into the river. Catfish is a predator, and when it’s as big as this one, it can even swallow a man whole.
The King of the Depths
I’d like you to go catfishing with me. Catfish rule the depths, and they can grow really huge over time. Catching them requires a lot off knowledge. I’ll teach you today.

It’s such a small animal and such a big pain! They cause so much damage we just can’t leave them alone. This is all happening because Sheriti has gathered all the cats in the city at her shelter, and now there’s no one left to catch the mice.
A Plague of Rodents
We’ve been having way too many rodents in the city lately. These mice have even found their way into my cellar and wreak havoc there. It’s time we evicted them all. Can I count on you to help?

We finally took our stores back from those filthy rodents! It’s good that I have come back from the southern lands early and we managed to save our food stores. Otherwise, the city slickers would have nothing to eat again.
A Plague of Rodents
While I was away, our store got infested with rats. How could it possibly happen? Well, we have no choice now but fight them. Help me chase those pests away and save our food supplies.
Just you look at how thick its fur is! I hear it’s very valuable. What if I catch a few and try to breed them? Not a bad idea at all, huh?
A Plague of Rodents

There’s more and more rodents in the city with every new day, but not all of them are as disgusting as rats. I have seen a few chinchillas not too far from here. They are running down the streets like they live here. What do you say we catch us one?

Oh, what a cute little pet it is, this guinea pig! Anyway, why do they even call it a pig if it has no snout? I don’t believe it can swim. I want to give it to the mariner, he knows marine animals best.
A Plague of Rodents

I have seen this cute little animal at the market. Very furry. At first I thought it was a mouse but one of the merchants told me it was a guinea pig. A pig, of all others, can you believe it? Help me catch one.
Oh, here you are, you little rascal! It has sneaked into the factory and now munches on papyrus and ancient scrolls at night. It has chewed up countless tomes. Do we now have to copy them all?
A Plague of Rodents

I give up fighting this hamster that has somehow found its way into the factory. You can never find it at daytime – what with all this papyrus lying around! This little menace only comes out at night. Could you please catch it?
These are the largest rodents I have ever seen. Visiting merchants will be ready to pay good money for them. But if we manage to domesticate these herds, we could make even more!
A Plague of Rodents

There are herds of strange animals roaming around by the river, not too far from the city. Traveling merchants say they are capybaras. They want to buy them from us and then breed them. Could you try and catch one?
Yum! It’s totally divine! It’s been so long since I ate anything sweet. By the way, dark chocolate is good for your brain. All right, now that I had a break I can go back to work.
Delicious Chocolate
I have been spending so much time lately reading ancient scrolls. It tires me out. I could use a break and a treat. Could you get me some chocolate?
I never knew there are so many different kinds of chocolate. Chances are my wife and Sheriti would love any kind I brought them, but this white chocolate is a sure thing indeed. Even I liked it.
Delicious Chocolate

Foreign merchants brought a lot of sweets from overseas, including chocolate. I’d like to give my girls a treat but I am at a loss as to which one to buy. There are so many different kinds available. Could you help me chose?
A little cocoa powder, butter, powdered sugar and fresh milk, and voila, we have us chocolate. Good chocolate too, finger-licking good. I’d better go give my wife a treat right away.
Delicious Chocolate

The city is in the grips of chocolate fever after these foreign merchants introduced the stuff here. Now they are barely gone, and everyone is already missing chocolate. Maybe we should try making our own. What do you say?

Our wards liked the treat just fine! I think they deserved it too. The kids all behaved in such a mature manner when my son was born and my wife and I were busy. They helped us as best they could and took good care of each other.
Delicious Chocolate

I bought a ton of chocolate with nuts for our kids. I want to throw a little party for them, so that there would be enough sweet treats for everyone. Could you help me bring it all into the dining room?
This chocolate is indeed delicious. The raisins give it a much needed sour note. Do you know how they make it? Maybe we could even teach my bees to make it, huh?
Delicious Chocolate
It’s like everyone has gone chocolate crazy! They are saying they have never eaten anything better. Can it be better than the honey my bees are making? Do you have any I could try?

This is zefir. It’s really easy to make – just beat some fruit or berry puree with egg whites and sugar. Then let it dry a little, pour some chocolate over, and here you go, here’s your sweet, delicious dreams.
Sweet Dreams
It’s good to see you, although I am a little busy now. I am trying to make a new confection I have read about in the old scrolls. If you are game, why don’t you join in?

Phew, now we are done! The tradeswoman told me Sheriti and her friends were playing in the mess hall at the barracks and knocked a cupboard down, dishware and all. If it were not for us, the soldiers would have to scoop their morning porridge right out of the pot.
A Large Order
The tradeswoman ordered a huge number of bowls and plates for the mess hall from me. I have until morning to make them, and there’s not much time left. I’ll need your help.
Jasmine! I think that’s the flower my wife likes best. I never tire of thanking the gods for having brought me to the walls of this city once, where I would meet my beloved.
Flowers for My Love
You have already heard this story about broken dishware, haven’t you? My wife is a genius! Now I am off to the market to buy some flowers for her. The best they have. Could you help me choose?
The mystics make a lot of this flower. But specifically, it is the red chrysanthemum that stands for love. Just a few petals for my love potion, and here it is, all ready.
A Secret Ingredient

I am now busy making a certain elixir I have found the recipe for in the ancient scrolls. However, I am still missing one last ingredient I need for it – a chrysanthemum flower. Could you bring me one?
We barely managed to hold that enraged crowd back! We could never do it without magic. All those protests, they were instigated by Menes’ servants that spread a new teaching by Amrun.
Unhappy Crowds
Unrest is brewing in one of the Shining Sun nomes. Hordes of the homeless have come together and wreak havoc. We need to put a stop to this nonsense. Grab your weapons and follow me!
A little building materials, a pair of crafty hands and a smart head, and here we are, all is done. People live up there, know not what danger they in sometimes. But you and I, we near. Always.
Renovations
One old grotto, looking very weak. Under the Sky Boat nome. That one. Me want fix a little. Walls and ceiling support. Could use your help.
Siamese cats are best for hunting mice. These cats are famous for their ability to track their prey, and they have a good memory too. I’ll give it to the farmer.
Hunting Rodents
The farmer asked me for a cat from my shelter, at least one, to chase away the mice from his store. How about we go pick one for him? Hey, whiskers, whiskers!

Well, the thief wasn’t all that smart after all. He fell for the oldest trick in the book – the fish basket. And, of course, found himself trapped in it before he knew it. That dumb tomcat. I am going to give him to Sheriti. Maybe she could put some sense into him.
Little Whiskers, Little Thief
We had us a great fishing trip and caught plenty of fish. Except there’s something out there stealing fish right out of my boat. How about we try to catch the thief? Maybe make a trap or something?
Oh, that’s some whistle we’ve made! It almost looks like a live bird, and it sounds great too. A real bird call by any measure! I am curious, why would the nomad even want something like that?
An Unusual Order

The nomad ordered a very strange thing from me – a small whistle that looks like a bird. He also asked for real bird call sound. I wouldn’t even know how to make something like that. Could you help me? Two heads are better than one.
You see, live birds can’t tell the sound our whistle makes from a real bird call. They are not afraid to come closer. That means my idea worked, and we can now get started with the plan…
Testing a Tool
I ordered a special whistle from the potter. It’s a bird call. I want to take a stroll down city streets and test it, to see how live birds would react to it. Come with me, will you?

Well, these birds are smarter than I thought. They took their time listening to our whistle. There just had to be a false note somewhere, I guess. But it’s all right, it ain’t over yet. A little practice, and we’ll be whistling away just as well.
A Rare Voice

There is a rare singing bird around these parts that can really leave you speechless. It’s that good. I’ve always wanted to catch one to learn to carry the tune. Now’s as good a time as any to try. Are you game?
Just as I thought, the gold plates turned out to be in the baker’s house. I never expected treachery from that man.
A Thief in the Midst
Some gold plates have gone missing from the treasury. And I think I know who might have stolen them. It’s a delicate matter – I’m afraid I’m going to need your help.
This is a large sum! When did he manage to steal so much money?
A Thief in the Midst
The thief got what he deserved and is in the dungeon now. His cache was full of gold. I need to count it all up.
Witness testimony has confirmed my innocence. I don’t understand how I got mixed up in this sorry affair…
Strong Alibi
I swear to the gods, I’m no thief! On the day of the robbery I was bringing pies to homeless people and drinking tea with the beekeeper!
When a novice in the Guild of Shadows removes the blindfold of the Blind One, he makes the decision to become either a thief or a Multi-armed Bandit.
Guild of Shadows
Novices in the Guild of Shadows complete a trial to learn to see the darkness. A black blindfold is used to cover their eyes and they are called Blind Ones.
With the help of these gloves, a thief’s hands can decimate any purse or open any door they can reach.
Guild of Shadows
If a person takes the decision to become a thief, they receive a gift of enchanted gloves.
The hunters call their technique the Dance of the Shadow. Few of our guards have survived an encounter with them!
Guild of Shadows
Those who choose the path of the Hunter receive daggers as a gift, which take the lives of their victims.
This mask replaces the face of the spy, which he abandons upon joining the Guild of Shadows. The spies of the Shadow are all around us…
Guild of Shadows
Watchers are the spies of the Guild of Shadows. They know everything about everyone. They can change their outward appearance using a shadowy mask.
It can turn any substance into poison – weak or strong!
Guild of Shadows
Only women of the guild can become Lamias. Their weapon is a venomous claw.
Nicely done! The members of the guild weren’t expecting an attack and we finally managed to take a few tongues.
Raid on the Guild
Thanks to you and the chief, we’ve figured out a few of the members of the Guild of Shadows. You’ll lead the raid on their camp.
We’ve captured a Master of the Shadow! He was a strong opponent.
Becoming the Shadow
The chief left clues on where to search for the Shadow’s right-hand man, one of her generals. He won’t be easy to catch!
The antidote will enter the body and strengthen the bones.
Rare Antidote
The poison that the Shadow used on my father dissolves the bones. He needs an antidote at once!
A good sample. I’ll try to get the right amount of poison out of this thorn for the experiment.
Rare Antidote
The poison has similarities with the poison of the desert thorn. We should test our future medicine on it.
Water from the Great River has healing properties.
Rare Antidote
For an antidote, we need water from the Great River. It has to be collected at midday, when the sun is at its zenith above the city.
The yolk is a symbol of the sun. A double yolk means double the power.
Rare Antidote
Sometimes, birds’ eggs contain two yolks. Only an egg such as that will work for the antidote!
The dandelion is warmed and grown by the sun. It’s a copy of the sun, its child on the ground.
Rare Antidote
There’s one more ingredient left. Bring me several dozen dandelion heads!
The spell worked! I’ll burn the doll to destroy the magic…
Rare Antidote
A magical formula must be read out above the body of the sick person while holding a doll. The poison will leave the body and transfer into the doll.
The medicine is ready. It’s time to administer it to our patient!
Rare Antidote
All that remains is to mix all the ingredients together. We’ll get a medicine that will save people from transforming into an ethereal shadow.
Me remember mother. Me remember how she wear this beautiful jewelry on neck…
The Miner’s Heritage
Servants of Shadow destroy tomb of my parents. Somewhere here should be pendant of mother!
I glad, work done! Thanks you.
The Miner’s Heritage
I do restoring work in cave. You bring building material?
Manuscript make father. Master promise translate it. He say it tell about my birth.
The Miner’s Heritage
Me find old scroll in dark tomb. Remember that father write something. Help free it from stone dust!
The beekeeper has precisely ten hives!
Signs of Numbers
I’m learning the science of counting from the master. He says it’s best to learn numbers if you’re counting specific things.
One hundred ships were built! Is that a little for our city, or a lot?
Signs of Numbers
Now I need to learn to count to a hundred.
Hurray, now thanks to you I can count to a thousand. I never knew how much that was.
Signs of Numbers
Now I need to count a thousand of something…
I can’t believe I managed to count to ten thousand.
Signs of Numbers
Count to… Ten thousand?!
A long time ago, the master counted all the people of the city and wrote the numbers into a special scroll. He’s so clever!
Signs of Numbers
We’ll never be able to count all the people on the streets in this lifetime. What are we to do?
I did it! Woohoo!
Signs of Numbers
The master says I’ve learned to count really well. He gave me one last task – to find the number one million!
This ship didn’t hold up, and would have gone straight to the bottom. But the crew is saved and the danger is behind us.
Weather Forecast
A strong wind is picking up. Almost all the fishing boats came back, but one is still out there.
We’ll need water to dilute the ingredients of my device for foretelling the weather.
Weather Forecast
I’ve decided to create a device for foretelling the weather. Will you help me make it a reality?
We need to fill a glass vessel with the ingredients. One of them is camphor.
Weather Forecast
An infusion of camphor in a vacuum-sealed vessel will get murky depending on the weather.
We need to mix the camphor with ethanol and leave it to stand a while.
Weather Forecast
The act of invention piqued my interest and I’ve decided to help you. Bring me some ethanol!
It’s a good thing the merchants had some saltpeter!
Weather Forecast
Alchemist merchants often come to the city. We need to buy a little saltpeter from the merchants!
We mix the two ingredients and add the first mixture. Then we slowly stir the liquid in a bain marie.
Weather Forecast
To create the second mixture, we need some ammonium chloride. We’ll mix it with saltpeter.
It looks like it worked. You can’t imagine how happy I am!
Weather Forecast
The storm flask is almost ready. All we have to do now is pour the mixture into a glass vessel and seal it well the other way round with wax.
The new clasp is better than the old one! I’m so glad you managed to fix my beads.
Elegant Clasp
I’m so upset. Sheriti took my favorite beads to play with and accidentally broke the clasp on them.
The bronze statuette was on a platform as if it was an altar. Was someone in the Guild of Shadows worshiping Anubis?
Bronze Anubis
I found an abandoned camp of the Guild of Shadows. There was a bronze statuette of Anubis there.
Great idea! Thoth is the god of wisdom.
Wise Thoth
The master has a holiday today – the Day of Letters! I want to give him some kind of symbolic gift.
I’ve never seen such a huge vulture before. I’m grateful to you for saving my livestock!
Hungry Vulture
A giant vulture has been circling above my house for days now. It has its beady little eye on one of my sheep.
I’m afraid one page won’t be enough to record all this stuff…
Counting Supplies
We need to record all the edible supplies in our warehouses and present the report to the tradeswoman.
That was no easy job. The tradeswoman can take care of it from now on. Our work is done!
Counting Supplies
You count the supplies in all the warehouses and I’ll keep the records. It’ll go faster that way.
A palette is a useful thing for an artist. Use it well!
Artist’s Palette
I have a little gift for you – an artist’s palette. Only I don’t remember where I put it…
During the restoration of the room, we managed to find out something about the old days.
Secret Room
A wall fell down in the basement of the mill, and there was a secret room behind it. Let’s try to restore it!
The secret room was an observatory. But why was it underground?
Secret Room
I found a stone with a fresco on it. The fresco shows a stargazer. The secret room was probably an observatory.
Thanks for the help! I couldn’t trust anyone to guard the secret room except you.
Secret Room
I’m worried the servants of the Shadow will descend on this place at night. I’d be grateful if you could guard the secret room!
My theory turned out right! This fresco is of the god Ra. It could only be found in a temple of the divinity himself.
Secret Room
Many stargazes of the ancient times were priests of the god Ra.
The chest is empty! It couldn’t be opened without a special spell!
Complicated Business
I can’t find my chest. There’s a priest’s diary inside it. I’m getting worried about its safety.
The flask was lying under Nimiru’s window. The drink is purple, just like the soldier’s lips. He was poisoned.
Complicated Business
The guard who was protecting Nimiru’s room can’t tell us anything any more. We need to find his flask.
These are the coins I was talking about! They stand out at once because of their shape.
Complicated Business
The guard came into the brewery with a strange woman in a black cowl. She paid with these coins.
Yes, this is the merchant’s ring! But where’s the merchant?
Complicated Business
A merchant from across the sea has been paying with square coins. You’ll recognize him by his signet ring with a purple gem!
The boat was burnt, but only right in the center, as if something burst into flame aboard…
Complicated Business
The merchant disappeared in the night, and with him went one of my fast sailing boats. We found it in the morning.
It’s all becoming clear. Thanks to him, Menes has gained a huge source of power!
Complicated Business
Menes’s raven brought one of the pages of my diary. But why?
The beard looks just like a real one. In it, you’ll pass as a cruel bandit who robs caravans in the desert.
Deadly Dangerous
If anyone can infiltrate the Guild of Shadows, it’s you! I’ll help you with your disguise…
Don’t worry, I’ll help you remove the makeup as soon as your task is complete.
Deadly Dangerous
This is magic makeup made with clay. It’ll change your face, transforming you into a villainous bandit. No one will be able to recognize you.
The drawing looks like the tattoo of a certain bandit. It was this image that gave him his name.
Deadly Dangerous
I’ll put a tattoo on your face. It’s only temporary – it’ll wash off with water.
I created this potion to change the timbre of your voice. The more you drink, the harsher your voice will get.
Deadly Dangerous
A bandit’s voice is very harsh and deep, not at all like yours. We have to do something about that.
These are great scissors for a hidden dagger. This dagger will be your weapon in case of danger!
Deadly Dangerous
When you get into the lair of the Guild of Shadows, you’ll have to leave your weapon.
Oh, gods! You’re indistinguishable from a real bandit. I knew our plan would work!
Deadly Dangerous
The time has come to transform into a dangerous bandit. I hope you can manage it!
Raisins are very healthy. They calm down the nervous system and can even prevent illnesses like caries.
Vitamin Motherlode
Recently, my daughter has been getting ill too often. Maybe she isn’t getting enough vitamins?
Dried apricots are good for your eyes.
Vitamin Motherlode
The fruit mix is going to need dried apricots. I’d be grateful if you could bring some.
They also prevent bacteria from multiplying. Just what my daughter needs!
Vitamin Motherlode
Prunes are usually added to fruit mixes. They work like a charm against stomach illnesses.
Thanks for collecting the fruit! All I have to do now is mix it up.
Vitamin Motherlode
Figs are great at lowering fevers, and dates have life-lengthening properties.
The fruit mix for Sheriti is ready! I hope all this coughing and sneezing will stop now.
Vitamin Motherlode
Everything has to be ground up into a consistent paste. Sheriti can’t wait for her tasty medicine.
This turned out just great. I can’t wait to try it myself. And to treat the kids to it, of course!
Overseas Treats
I’ve thought of a way to give the kids a nice surprise – I’m going to make them a tasty soufflé.
Isn’t it delicious!?
Overseas Treats
Want to try some tasty candy? The merchant said they’re called truffles. They look more like chocolate pyramids to me!
It’s much too hard on the teeth. I prefer a soft filling!
Overseas Treats
What did the merchant call this candy – brittle? I’ve tried all kinds of candy in my time, but never anything like this.
The kids are sure to like it!
Overseas Treats
Such colorful candies, all the colors of the rainbow. And they taste so fruity, it’s like they’re made of juice.
Lollipops are the perfect snack for the traveler!
Overseas Treats
I really like lollipops. I always take them with me when I travel.
This candy is divine!
Overseas Treats
I want to buy a batch of chocolate candy. I’ll need to place it in a cold, dark place to make sure it doesn’t melt.
If water surge onto bank, mine will flood!
Looming Catastrophe
Priest teach me tell future with stones. Argh! Bad hieroglyph. Disaster coming!
My hands very shake, I afraid that new prophecy not come true!
Looming Catastrophe
Me try tell future again! ‘Prayer’ hieroglyph is good sign, it give us hope.
With the help of the mighty totem, we managed to compel the sea monster!
Power of the Totem
A sea monster has appeared on the coast. This is a job for you and me!
That was a lot of work! Look how much grain we’ve collected!
Bringing in the Harvest
The grain is ripe – it’s time to harvest it. After we collect the grain, we’ll need to mill it and sieve out the husks.
Wonderful fruit!
Carob Pods
I learned the recipe of a wonderful new liqueur made of carob pods.
I hope this is enough pots for the beekeeper to collect all the honey.
Honey Pots
The beekeeper has run out of pots for his honey. I’ve sold all mine and have no new ones.
Because of the sugar, the bees stopped collecting pollen, and their honey has gone sickly sweet. This is no good!
Honey Diversion
Someone has been putting sugar in the hive for the bees. It’s made the bees lazy, and the honey has lost its taste…
Having too many drone bees is dangerous for the hive. Each one eats three times as much honey as a normal bee!
Honey Diversion
A great many drone bees have been born in the hive. Let’s help my little bees evict their excess residents!
We made a good profit on the sugary honey!
Honey Diversion
The beekeeper is upset because of all his sugary honey. We should bring all the excess to the market and sell it to foreign merchants
Look at its color – there are no bees like that. This must be the work of dark magic!
Honey Diversion
Help! A predatory bee has gotten into a hive, and it’s killing the worker bees!
We’re helping the beekeeper to fill his hives with new wild bees.
Honey Diversion
The bees that lived in the apiary were special wild bees! They can’t be bought, only caught.
It looks like the bees have accepted their new home!
Honey Diversion
It’ll take quite some time to tame them. Are you up for helping?
We’ve finally brought order to the hives!
Honey Diversion
We need to clean the hive frames. Put this protective net over your face, just in case!
With a rope like this, I can tackle the sheerest mountainside without fear. Thanks for the help, my safety is in your hands!
Hiking in the Mountains
I’m going on an exploratory hike. I’m going to have to climb some very steep mountains. I’ll need a solid shackle for a safety rope. Can you help find it?
This is obviously a well-made tool. Our ancestors didn’t have anything like this.
Hiking in the Mountains
The ancient explorers never did quite manage to conquer the heights I now aim for. There are cliff faces there without a single handhold. I’ll need a good pick to get past the difficult parts!
It’s easy to freeze to death in the mountains at night. There isn’t a lot of firewood up there, but even a small fire can help me keep warm.
Hiking in the Mountains
I’ll be spending several days up there at the top, and I’ll need to survive some cold nights. Bring me a flint and steel to take with me into the mountains!
The gaiters completely cover the shins and protect them from sharp stones and unexpected kinks in the cliff face. It’s a pleasure to climb mountains in these without having to worry about your legs.
Hiking in the Mountains
While climbing, it’s easy to cut your legs on sharp stones. To avoid this, climbers wear thick gaiters on their legs.
Now nothing will threaten me while I climb!
Hiking in the Mountains
Rockfalls often happen in the mountains, so the most important thing is to protect your head. The warrior has made a special climbing helmet for me. Go see him at the armory!
All the equipment is assembled. It’s time to go into the mountains. There are still signs of the Ancients’ presence there. I have to find them!
Conqueror of Heights
I think everything is ready for my trip into the mountains. All that’s left is to find the hiking tent that will be my home for the next few days.
So how do you feel after spending the night in that thing? I don’t envy you! The first trial was supposed to dispel your fear of the dark. Don’t forget your real purpose!
Initiation Ritual
The Guild of Shadows has sent you your first task. You must go underground, find an old empty sarcophagus there, and spend the night in it. Not a pleasant task, but it must be done!

The Masters of the Shadow believe that before stealing from the living, you must learn to steal from those who have already left this world. After all, they are far more dangerous and can haunt you forever!
Initiation Ritual
Another challenge lies ahead, one that will take you into ancient tombs. You must demonstrate your thieving skills by stealing a mummy’s heart!
A precious stone as large as a pumpkin… Hmm, what a coincidence! A little illusion and the job is done.
Initiation Ritual
The next task is a test of lying. You must fool the Masters of the Shadows by presenting them with a fake precious stone that they cannot differentiate from a real one. But don’t worry! I’ll help.

This root temporarily slows down your life processes. Clever, no? I got it from a skinny fellow who didn’t want to pay his debts to the bandits. Every time they came for money, he ‘died’ right in front of them!
Initiation Ritual
The next challenge is the hardest of all! You must meet with death without dying. But I know of a certain substance that can help with this. I have several special roots somewhere in the back room.
I’m so glad you succeeded! Few could go so far. The initiation ritual is almost complete. The Shadow awaits you!
Initiation Ritual
I have bad news! There’s poison in your blood. If anything can help you, it’s the tears of the naga. Go to them at once!
Few have been able to cross the threshold of the portal, and you’re one of them! The Shadow has realized that we tricked her. The first strike is struck – the enemy has fled!
A Step into the Darkness
You must find an ancient stone portal that was built by the shamans of our ancient ancestors. Behind its threshold hides the Shadow.
Thanks to your new abilities, you can see any person or any place through the shadows. That’s how they managed to follow us!
Powers of the Shadow
It’s time to demonstrate your new abilities. We managed to get a thing or two out of the Master of the Shadow that we took prisoner thanks to you. What about Shadow Vision?
How did you do that? You just plunged your hands into the shadows and a moment later you had my earrings!
Powers of the Shadow
Do you know how the Masters of the Shadow managed to thieve and plant poison so easily? It seems they call this ability the Hands of the Shadow. Try to reach the earrings in my room right now!
The Shadow senses that we’re planning something against her. She’s afraid of us now!
Powers of the Shadow
Is it true that all the Masters are connected by the single mind of the Shadow herself? Give it a try, link your mind to that of the entire guild.
You just disappear in the shadows and travel in the dreams of other people? You can find out the thoughts of any citizen!
Powers of the Shadow
Do you remember how father spoke of seeing the servants of the Shadow when he was unconscious? Do you know how they did it, how they got into his dream? Can you do the same?
You move through the shadows and suddenly there’s two of your. Your twin is just an illusion that repeats your movements. It serves to as a distraction while you attack!
Powers of the Shadow
The warrior said that during the raid, the Masters of the Shadow seemed to duplicate themselves. Can you create a double of yourself? How real will it look?
Eclipse allows all Masters of the Shadow to take tens and hundreds of people under control, in which case it’s all over. But what are they waiting for..? Could it be… an order from Menes!?
Capture Plan
The Shadow has been preparing a weapon against the city for a long time. Do you know anything more?
The Great River is at a lower elevation than the field. You and I will build a special mechanism that will deliver water up through some canals we’re going to dig!
Agrarian Revolution
Some scrolls of our ancestors have been found in the papyrus mill. They describe how to create an irrigation system. Want to help me?
We’ll install a water wheel right in the river. It’ll turn constantly because of the river’s flow.
Agrarian Revolution
The water wheel is one of the most complex parts of the irrigation mechanism. There’s going to be a lot of work to do, so join in!
When the water wheel starts working, the screw will work with it and automatically bring water up to the upper canals in the system!
Agrarian Revolution
We need to make the main piece of the irrigation system – an Archimedes’ screw. This is what the mechanical strength of the water wheel will be spent on. Let’s get to it!
The shadoof works on the same principle as the well. Only right now we don’t need to get water out of the ground. We’ll move it from the lower canals to the upper ones. It’ll be a piece of cake!
Agrarian Revolution
We’ve dug the channels and built the main mechanism to house the water from the river. There’s only a little left to do – we need to build a special lifting mechanism. Time to get to work!
This bucket is convenient – in spite of its size, it’s almost weightless when empty. And when it’s full, it’s very easy to move from canal to canal using the shadoof.
Agrarian Revolution
The last part of our irrigation system is a leather bucket. We’ll hang it on the shadoof and collect water in it.
The heat caused our wells to become useless – the water quickly stagnated. This irrigation system will save the day and greatly improve our harvest!
Miracle of Engineering
Our irrigation system is done already. Now it can replace dozens of workers. Let’s hurry over and see what we have!
Now this is life! The city is flourishing. Homelessness is almost non-existent now, everyone has a job, and most importantly – the people are well-fed.
Full Stocks
Things have been going just great for the farmer recently! There’ll be some new deliveries to the field today. Want to help unload them?
Beeswax is a lifesaver when it comes to keeping food from drying out, especially cheese.
Protective Wax
I really need your help! Go to the beekeeper and get as much beeswax as you can. I need it to cover up the cheese before it dries out.
Royal jelly is a very nourishing substance. Nature has everything people need!
Valuable Jelly
I’m making a new curative for nursing and pregnant mothers. I’m missing one last ingredient before I can complete the medicine – royal jelly. Go get some from the beekeeper!
I thought of repairing my hut after I fixed up the beehives. I’m not as lazy as people think after all.
Time for Repairs
I’ve lived in my hut for a long time now and I’ve never paid any attention to its condition. It’s high time to put it in order.
Phew, that’s a real weight off my shoulders. I love giving gifts to Sheriti and my lovely wife, but you know how it is, I’m a simple man, I don’t understand beauty.
The Caring Stepfather
The wife entrusted me with buying sandals for Sheriti. Maybe you can help me pick something out for the girl?
Now I understand. It seems someone just didn’t want to wash the dishes and hid them where mom wouldn’t find them. What am I to do with this girl..?
Petty Crime
I can’t seem to find Sheriti’s cup. She says she didn’t take it. Well, it sure wasn’t carried off by genies.
The children took turns jumping on the bench until it cracked. Never mind, I’ll fix it in soon, then I’ll get hold of those hooligans and teach them some manners!
A Good Workman
Someone broke the wooden bench in the garden – now I’ll have to fix it. Bring it to me and I’ll get it back in shape soon enough!
It looks like your speech made a good impression on the kids. Now they’re willing to be obedient children, just so long as evil Menes doesn’t take them away. That was a convincing story!
Lesson in Obedience
I’m going to need your help to give my new charges a lesson in good behavior. Can you take the job on?
I want to contact Bastet with a prayer to help us in our difficult work. May she give us fortune and bravery in the fight against the Shadow and her guild!
Meeting a Goddess
I need to perform an important ritual before the Bastet altar. I must be dressed only in new clean clothes while I do it. Bring me a white dress!

This is a blade of the deep-waters – my fears were true! They must have come into the city to carry someone off into the oceanic abyss. But no such luck for them – the power of the totem has never let us down!
Enemies from the Sea
Under the cover of night, some armed people crept into the city from the sea. I don’t like it – I fear the worst. We need to catch them!
An excellent sword! Sharper than many other blades and light as a feather. I’ll be able to protect you from ten servants of the Shadow with this by my side.
A Loyal Bodyguard
Until all this business of infiltrating the Guild of Shadows ends, I fear for your life. From now on I will follow you night and day and protect you. Bring me a good blade!
This amulet has made me feel a lot better. It’s strange – my heart started hurting when we started studying your new abilities. But why is this only happening to me..?
A Bad Feeling
I haven’t been feeling so well recently. My heart aches as if it’s about to tear into pieces from anxiety. Bring me a protective amulet!

This crazy disk flew into the window and almost took my head off. It looks like one of the sophisticated weapons of the Shadow’s servants. They must have started to suspect my deceit and decided to cross me off their friends list!
Head on Shoulders
I’ve been attacked! Right in the brewery! Come with me, let’s see what sort of strange weapon the attacker used. I’m still shaking!
Just as I thought, the tips of all the darts were covered in a deadly poison. If it weren’t for my agility, we wouldn’t be talking right now…
Deadly Whistle
Members of the Guild of Shadows just attacked me. Several darts flew by with a whistle without making a single scratch. It’s all thanks to my agility. Let’s go back and pick them up!
The city is flourishing. I’ve seen the financial reports that were left over from the time of the pharaoh Menetnasht. Now I can confidently say that we’ve returned these lands to their former glory!
City Treasury
New funds have been added to the city treasury, and it’s all thanks to trade. There’s quite a lot of money. I won’t be able to count it all on my own.

The holiday went well. May these children, who are finding their new families among us, see only the very best throughout their childhood. That way we’ll keep them from a life in the streets and from what hides in the shadows there!
Sweet Holiday
The beekeeper and I have thought of a little holiday for the new kids in the Sepat. The candies are ready. All we have to do now is bring everything to the place of the festivities. Give us a hand!
A vulture’s feather – it’s a message to me from the underworld! Someone is trying to talk to me, someone thirsts for vengeance…
Spirit of Vengeance
An old vulture was circling above the city last night. When it landed on the roof of my house, I drove it off. Help me find the feather it dropped!
I saw the clothing of the woman from my dream. Priestesses who plan to go through a special ritual wear that dress. She is to become the wife of her god!
Last Ritual

Each night in my sleep, I see a woman dressed in black. Two giants are leading her through a labyrinth of caves and they come to a stone grotto. I can’t see the woman’s face, but help me to at least make out her dress!
I still can’t make out the woman’s face. She enters the ring of fire and sits on a black sheepskin. Such skins are used for sacrifices to the dark gods!
Last Ritual
After the woman ends up in the stone grotto, she enters a ring of fire. Help me see what’s inside it!
I saw Menes approach the woman with something gleaming in his hand. It was a pair of scissors, and he cut off a lock of her hair with them. This is a sign of renewal and setting out on a path…
Last Ritual
This dream scares me more and more. Menes keeps entering the stone grotto and heading toward the woman. We have to see what he does!
Menes accepts a horrible-looking cup from the giant’s hands and gives it to the woman. The woman drinks from it. I think we’re just about to see her face… Oh, gods! It’s my mother!
Last Ritual
In the next part of the dream, dark shadows start to spin around and sing some sort of hymn. One of the giants walks toward Menes and is carrying something in its huge hands!

When Menes raised the magic stone above my mother, the Shadow separated from her body and started to strangle her. But suddenly, a hidden solar disk flashed out from under her dress! Its light shattered the darkness of the cave…
Last Ritual
Now I understand what’s going on. We’re seeing the past. My mother was to become a high priestess of Amrun…

Immediately, the underground flame of Amrun lit up above the throne and rushed toward my mother, surrounding her from head to foot. Nothing remained… only the Shadow, who fled her confinement and then hid in the city!
Face to Face
My mother wanted to get closer to Amrun and then defeat him. She sent the solar disk straight toward the demon’s throne… I have to see how it all ended!
The sound of the sistrum will help me calm my uncontrolled thoughts about my mother. I must compose myself!
Alone
I don’t feel so well after seeing what I saw. I need to be alone for a while and ask Bastet for advice. Bring me her sistrum!
A little fight against multiple opponents helped me clear my head.
Time to Train
I know what Nimiru learned about her mother’s true motives. The secret was revealed too soon. My own fault. I need to unwind in the training ground.
I’ll be glad if my pendant can be useful in the creation of our weapon. It’ll be a kind of gesture of vengeance against the Shadow for betraying my mother.
Solar Strike
Our weapon requires a powerful collector of sunlight. But we only have my pendant, the same as my mother had. Take it!
Solar energy goes through the amber lens and turns into a strong ray of light. We’ll send it straight at the Shadow and it’ll go through her like a spear!
Solar Strike
To create a directed sunbeam, we’ll need a lens of amber. Find some and turn it into a convex lens!
Now nobody except us will be able to touch the tube and get the secret diagrams of our weapon. This time we’re a step ahead of the Shadow!
Secret Diagram
The servants of the Shadow can’t be allowed to discover the plan for our weapon. Bring me a leather tube. I’ll cast one of my spells on it!
We’ll drill a hole in the pewter mirror for the ray to go through. The Shadow will first see her reflection, and that will overwhelm her. After all, she doesn’t really want to admit what she is.
Solar Strike
The third important piece of our weapon will be a pewter mirror, which will strengthen our strike. To find one, just ask any girl in the city!
The skystone, the amber lens and the pewter mirror must be securely fastened inside the copper frame. Otherwise we won’t be able to create the directed sunbeam.
Solar Strike
To combine all the main pieces of the weapon, we’ll need a copper frame. A few copper plates will be enough to fashion the frame.
You’ll need to create your double outside the stone portal and send it inside. When the Shadow takes your bait, we’ll strike!
Solar Strike
Unfortunately, we won’t be able to test the new weapon, but there are other unanswered questions too. We have to inspect the place where we want to ambush the Shadow.
The skystone will be hidden by a special cover until the time is right. It’ll be attached to brass cogs. You’ll raise it during the attack and aim the weapon right at the Shadow!
Plan of Action
We’re ready to assemble our secret weapon against the Shadow. Find the parts and arrange them in the frame.
One direct hit and the Shadow froze, looking at her reflection. She tried to call her servants to her aid, but in vain. Not a single trace of her was left after the sunbeam hit her!
Long-Awaited Meeting
The time has come – we now go to meet the Shadow. I trust that you won’t miss when the Shadow emerges from the stone portal. Don’t be afraid, I’ll be by your side!
They must be so tired. Let them rest first, then they can tell us what happened.
Helping the Suffering
Crowds of poverty-stricken people have been pouring into the city. We have to organize a team to help and feed them right away. Get to it!
We managed to catch some of the priests, but the others hid in the crowd. This can mean only one thing – Nimiru’s magical protection of the city has fallen…
An Enemy in the City
To arms! Priests of Amrun have infiltrated the city! We have to arrest them all before we lose them among the citizens.
I think we’ve managed to make the same kind of framework I saw in some images in the ancient scrolls.
Dreaming of the Sky
Help me make my childhood dream a reality. I want to fly up into the sky, but to do that I’ll need to build something out of bamboo!
While the sap seeps out of the tree, it flows and is sticky. But if you gather it and use it like glue, it goes solid and becomes harder than stone.
Dreaming of the Sky
We need to securely fix the frame together. We can use some special sap to glue the pieces. Bring as much as you can!
Such solid cloth. It should make some excellent wings!
Dreaming of the Sky
For the glider to fly, I’ll need a solid piece of cloth for the wings. The best thing for the task is sailcloth. The mariner should be glad to share some with us.
Leather fastenings are just what we need to securely attach the sailcloth to the glider. My dream is coming true right before my eyes. It’s hard to believe it’s all so simple.
Dreaming of the Sky
The sailcloth needs to be stretched across the frame and fixed on well. Got any ideas on how we can do that?
Now everything is ready for sure! Even if this is my last flight, I’ll be happy that I managed to feel like a bird at least once…
Dreaming of the Sky
I thought my glider was already done, but then I remembered the most important part. I’ll need some sort of comfortable seat. Can you try and fashion one from a bar stool?
I flew, I flew like a bird! The wind picked me up and made me soar through the sky. Thanks for the help! I’ll never forget this.
Bee’s Flight
Well, I’m ready to test out our creation. We need somewhere high up – let’s go into the mountains. Help me drag the glider up to a peak.
We’ve found a ritual iguana figurine. Our ancestors considered it a symbol of the earth and asked it for help with cultivation.
Carved Totems

I’m learning about the history of our barbarian ancestors from the master. Reading scrolls all day is boring, but searching for real traces of our ancestors’ presence is a lot more fun. Want to search with me?
Now this is a find – it’s a falcon figurine. In the old days, our ancestors considered the falcon a symbol of the sun.
Carved Totems
The master praised me for my discovery. I really want to find out which other animals our ancestors worshiped. Want to continue the search?
Some shamans turned to the dark path and desired power over the clans. The toad was a symbol of the moon. The first heretics performed their wicked magic at night!
Carved Totems
It turns out that some of our ancestors were inclined to worship evil creatures. The master gave me the task of studying the history of the dark shamans of old. Are you with me?
It says in the scrolls that people respected and feared the owl. It was a guide to the underworld. No one wanted the bird to come and visit them unexpectedly…
Carved Totems
I always thought that even the earliest people knew about gods. It turns out they didn’t. Want to learn something else?
Since ancient times, people have believed that our world sits on the back of a giant turtle. They worshiped it more than anything else – they probably feared it would throw them off…
Carved Totems
We have just one last totem to find, then the master will tell me that I’ve learned all I need to know. Do you still have strength for another search?
The dragon totem confirms that these creatures really did live among us once!
Myth or Reality
I suspect that our barbarian ancestors worshiped another creature – a dragon. Find me its statuette!
I wove your flower into my hair today and walked around all day. All the boys in the Sepat stared at me!
Foreign Beauty
The mariner told me that very beautiful girls live on some distant islands. They have a custom of weaving a white flower into their hair. Can you help me find one?
Great job! I heard a story of a captain not cleaning his ship. It got covered in coral and seashells and turned into a floating island.
Seashells and Plankton
My ship’s bottom is covered with sea life. If I don’t clean it now, it’ll only get worse.
Thank you! Feel free to come along to dinner. There’ll be plenty of people and tasty treats in honor of the god of fertility!
Dinner Escaping
Help, I’ve lost my chicken! It’s big, plump and white. Please find it, I beg you!
There we go. And today you’ll get paid for your sea urchin.
Hunting an Urchin
I’m going out to catch a sea urchin. Come with me, I’ll show you how it’s done. It’s easy!
How’s the sea urchin selling going? Wow, you managed to sell all of them!
Trading Urchins
The mariner brought a whole bunch of sea urchins to the market. But I don’t have any time to deal with them. Could you sell them all and count the money? I’ll owe you one!
They ran into the bushes right away when they realized why we were there. The beetle is saved, at least. Let it fly back home!
Tormenting Beetles
The boys from the Sepat have caught a beetle. They tied a thread to its leg and laughed when it couldn’t fly away from them. I can’t deal with these little hooligans on my own.
Thank gods, this evil place now safe behind wall. Evil shamans made rituals there. Me not want their spirits visit me at night. Hope they sleep sound now!
Old Temple
I dig new tunnel and suddenly find shaft to old barbarian temple. There stand evil totem with horrid face. Me not want such mean neighbor. You help me fill in hole?
Look – such fine craftsmanship. This sheath must have belonged to a pharaoh once upon a time. I swear, that character was either a pirate or a grave robber.
Suspicious Character

Some strange character came into the tavern. Tanned, strong. He drank beer and looked at everyone suspiciously. And when I asked him to pay, he gave me a valuable dagger sheath instead of money. Come on, I’ll show you!
Great, at least one quill turned up. I can’t stop writing in my annals about the city under any circumstances.
The Master’s Weapon
I’ve been writing so much recently about what’s happening in the city that I’ve gone through a ton of papyrus and worn down all my quills. Are there really no quills left at all?
I have a feeling the Ancients deliberately blocked off the cave from the inside, then put a powerful spell on the entrance. But with our combined strength, we’ll finally be able to get inside!
Mysterious Cave
Getting into the cave won’t be easy. The entrance is blocked by boulders. Apart from that, I feel the presence of some unknown enchantments there. Only together can we clear the way inside!
Oh, you come up with nice idea. Now is lantern on your helmet too!
Digging Equipment
I think, this cannot be only entrance into cave. If you go with me, we get all equipment we need. Hop to!
I won’t have to worry about you now. There’s nothing to eat underground but fungus and insects.
Edible Supplies
Planning a long trip underground? I’m sure there won’t be much food available down there.
My heels break hard stone. But your feet not like that. These boots keep your foot safe.
Digging Equipment
You want go underground, want dig tunnel? This very bad for health, for your feet for sure. You need very good boots!
I had a strange vision! I saw a tall strong man with golden hair. He said we need to be careful.
Old Acquaintance
I wanted to tell you something. It’s related to the journey you and the miner planned. Come visit me at the end of the work day.
This strong pick made only for working underground. Stone there very hard.
Digging Equipment
Me never been inside cave. No path lead there. That means we make one ourself. Make special tool!
We managed to find a few notes. It looks like our ancestors avoided the cave. They believed a primeval dark power lived within…
Useful Knowledge
I went through all the scrolls that might have mentioned the cave, but didn’t find anything. Let’s try searching together.
This beastie called naked mole rat. He not cute like cats of Sheriti, but he very loyal partner. Me share food with him and he help me find good route for tunnel.
Digging Equipment
Me want introduce you with loyal comrade. Promise not be afraid – he not like loud noise. Let’s go!
Behind tunnel is stone grotto which make underground river. We go there first of all!
Starting Work
I already start dig tunnel. Now me need give its walls strength. Bring me building materials for work!
I’ve placed spells on this chalk that make it glow in the dark. Don’t forget to mark the walls with the chalk!
Digging Equipment
I’ve prepared a little trinket for the underground journey. It’s nothing special, but you’ll like it. Hmm, where did it get to?
This thingy make big hole where me need it! Is also good weapon for underground beasties.
Emergency
Sometimes me use clever tactic for fighting stone obstacle. Come, you help me prepare secret weapon!
My tribe’s shamans told a story about animals which were mutated by the magic of evil genies. Legend has it that these creatures lived at the bottom of the world. And you’re heading there now!
The Fortunate Hunter
I want to go with you underground. Let’s go. I’ll tell you a few stories about my tribe on the way!
This little bloodsucker has probably never seen like. That was its downfall. Who knows how dangerous its bite could be…
Cave Inhabitants
Sometimes small predators are far more dangerous than large ones. Keep your eyes open and we might be able to catch one such beast!
If we hadn’t defeated that giant, we’d be flailing around in his cocoons right now.
Cave Inhabitants
I bet we’ll see creatures on this journey that live only in the ancient stories of the desert shamans… Gods, where did all these spider webs come from?
Me never go so deep before. If we not strengthen supports for our new tunnel, they fall. We dig ourself big grave!
Breaking Ground
Path get more and more dangerous. No time for losing, we need strengthen tunnel supports. Bring all our building material!
This lion has such pale skin. It must not have seen sunlight for a long time. Wait – could this creature have come from underground?
Cave Inhabitants
Help! A giant lion with long teeth as sharp as swords attacked me. Protect us!
Many weeds have fallen before my sickle, but I never thought I’d become their victim… This is all because of that crazy underground exploring.
Cave Inhabitants
All kinds of awful creatures are starting to emerge from the mine. Do you know what’s going on over at my lot?
There isn’t just gold from our era here, but from the one our ancestors created legends about too!
Underground Treasure
I heard stories about how the naga used to trade gold with humans in the old days. Now all that gold belongs to us.
Now much is clear to me! All the underground beasts were transformed by dark magic. But it looks like the metamorphosis was spontaneous. It’s like an epidemic!
Terrible Discovery
I inspected a few of the animals that we managed to catch… Will you help me solve this mystery?
Looks like evil naga tribe die out, but leave descendants. These eggs crack not long ago. Means young offspring already nearby!
Cave Inhabitants
In underground under cave we maybe see other tribe of naga. Promise call me if see them!
Those two extra arms gave the naga an advantage in battle. I wouldn’t have beaten it without you!
Serpentine Warrior
I’ve learned that there are naga underground that are faithful to Amrun himself. I won’t skip the opportunity to meet with such an opponent in a duel.
I noticed that this hammer looks similar to the tools we found on the ship. I’m inclined to think that the blue crystals increased the strength of the strike!
Mine of the Ancients
Some huge strange weapons have been found underground. I’d be grateful if you could join me in studying them!
Bandits leave this old cache behind. They never come back for it, me think. They lives very much too short for this!
Old Cache
Me often find old caches. Me not need them at all. But city always need more gold.
Is this a drilling device for searching for ore? I’ve never seen anything like it. The miner will be pleased about this!
Mine of the Ancients
I need your help in studying another strange tool.
The Ancients were searching for some sort of rare mineral in this area, and the first nagas helped them in their quest!
Mineral Deposit
Help me translate some messages the ship’s captain left for us. Many of the captain’s notes were damaged.
This is a metal insect. The Ancients most likely used it as a scout in mineshafts. The crystals’ power used to bring it to life, but right now its mechanism is broken.
Mine of the Ancients
The Ancients astound me with their ingenuity. What I’m working on right now simply goes beyond all reasonable limits of understanding!
These supplies will help your research team to restore their energy. The city is going to need plenty of it!
Lunch for the Miners
I’m not too pleased that you’re disturbing the bowels of the earth, but I’ll help. Come visit me and pick up some food for your team.
Unbelievable! The Ancients themselves created the first generation of nagas and gave them sentience!
Servants of the Ancients
Some more notes from the captain talk about the nagas and where they came from. I still don’t understand it all. I need your help!
