The Ancients’ inventions were founded on the strength of the blue crystals. If you look at the world through them, you can see multicolored auras around people and items!
Mine of the Ancients
I went to the Seeing Stone that we found on the ship with my questions. The captain’s ghost mentioned an unusual item – intensifying eyepieces. Find it!
I think Ancient use box to move mineral they find here. But looks like someone steal all…
Mine of the Ancients
I break through another wall and find big grotto behind it. There is many big strange shape box. You need see it!
The snakepeople erected a massive monument in memory of their creators. It turns out that the Ancients were defeated by someone even stronger than them…
Grateful Servants
The Ancients used to mine a deposit of Sky Crystals in our lands. But then something happened and they all disappeared. We have to find out why!
The miner didn’t remember meeting the Ancients because they wiped his memory. Now it’s time to found out what exactly they were trying to hide!
Psychological Test
I have a way to find out whether the miner really did meet with the Ancients in his past life. To do this, I need to give him a little test. I’ll need an assistant!
Little shots fly along corridor like deadly swarm of bee. But you block them with sword and save our life!
Deadly Traps
Now me sure that we need go deep underground. You help me find trap on our path!
This big sharp thing fly right in front of my nose… Somewhere in floor is stone panel which start dangerous mechanism. I not even notice it!
Deadly Traps
Labyrinth of corridors we walk through is full of dangerous traps. Their workings complicated, but you help me find them and stop them hurting us!
The glaive-thrower’s mechanism is too primitive to be an invention of the Ancients. Perhaps it was created by the evil nagas.
Only Guesses
The trap you encountered in the caves has a very strange mechanism. It doesn’t look like an invention of the Ancients. Who could have made it?
Gold as a precious metal didn’t interest the nagas. They used it in dark rituals instead.
Ill-Gotten Gains
It says in the ancient scrolls that in the olden days, some nagas left the caves and robbed from honest folk. The ill-gotten gains are still in their lair.
Few little movement and sharp disk come out little way from its secret nook. Now it not threaten us any more.
Deadly Traps
I remember there is other terrible trap in this dangerous corridor. It spit flying disk at us, with sharp edge.
A long time ago, life flourished in these catacombs!
Helping the Expedition
You’ve already dug a deep shaft in search of another entrance to the cave. I’ve prepared some more building materials for us.
I bet it’s hot down there underground… This telescopic tube in the shape of a fire-breathing dragon can release a stream of fire capable of turning anything living into a pile of ash!
Deadly Traps
I’m very interested in those traps that were set in the caverns. The miner has found something interesting again.
If man pass all traps, he already see exit from labyrinth and tired man hurry to it. Then bam! Big iron ball carry man straight to underworld!
Deadly Traps
Look like dangerous labyrinth of corridor ends. One trap left. We disarm it together!
If it weren’t for you, I’d be hobbling around on the surface on one leg. This trap was definitely designed to deal with prey much larger than me!
Steel Hunter
Help! I sprang a trap, but I managed to block it with my blade. Hurry, help me open up this steel jaw!
No mortal dig shaft to very heart of earth. Here underground flame rise to surface and spit out stone!
Deathtrap
You feel the heat coming from this corridor? Hard to breathe… And my eyes not work well through hot air. What there in the distance?
I saw a stone grotto full of giants of some kind. The creatures were leaping around in a furious dance, and the stones under their feet turned into liquid fire!
Sinister Dreams
Since we went into the bowels of the earth, I’ve been having strange dreams. Help me go into a trance so I can remember them.
This vial is extremely valuable! This black liquid contains a huge energy capable of shifting the entire world…
Deathtrap
It says in the scrolls that there are geysers and rivers of a thick black liquid in the depths. Our ancestors called it the blood of the earth. Bring me some of it if you happen to find any!
Me long time ago lose taste for normal man food, but is so deep underground here that heat kill all life.
Empty Stomachs
Our provisions come to end. Time to go back to surface and collect food!
Ugh, disgusting! It looks like the spores that destroyed the Ancients on the ship, but these ones are far more primitive.
Deathtrap
In the catacombs you reached, there are probably some completely different forms of life. If you see anything that stands out, collect some samples for me!
The deathtrap we found underground is none other than someone’s lair. The whole place is filled with the evil energy of its inhabitants. If you ask me, those catacombs should be blocked up at once!
Scientific Research
I’ve been researching the black liquid, volcanic rock and mold found in the depths. There’s only a little more to do before I have my results.
You see the purple threads? This statue is a source of the dark magic that Menes and his master wield. It looks like we’ve found our way into the very home of the forces of evil…
Deathtrap
In one of the deepest caves of the catacombs, the miner has found a strangely shaped sculpture. You already know the way. Lead on!
Naga chief say me that his people long ago run from this place because demons here live. They capture souls of his ancestors and make them slave.
Time to Retreat
I speak with naga chief. He say me that we unlock terrible secret of Amrun. We must leave and fill in entrance to mine. Collect building materials for this!
We’ve finally found the deposit of Sky Crystals! But what’s wrong with them? It looks as if someone has drawn all the magical power out of them.
Deathtrap

Since I’ve had to descend into this lair of dark powers anyway, I should take a quick look around. I might be able to find some answers to some longstanding questions. Tell me if you see anything unusual!

When the demons came to our world, they fed on the strength of the Sky Crystals. Hunger made them weak and then Amrun created this oven so that the underground flame would keep at least a little life in his brethren!
Source of Existence
I had a vision. I saw a gigantic stone oven. Search for it in the demons’ lair!
In a time long ago, the Gods studied the wisdom of the universe inside this Pyramid and shared it with us.
Mysterious Pyramid
The Pyramid was mentioned in the Ship Captain’s message. I did not believe it until I saw the ruins for myself. Restoring it won’t be easy!
There are two ways we can restore the Pyramid: we can bring stone from the Mine or we can make blocks out of a construction mixture right at the site itself.
Construction methods
I looked around the ruins of the Pyramid, and I can definitely say that it was very high.
This Pyramid is the most incredible building that we decided to construct.
A large purchase
We have enough people to build the Pyramid, but we don’t have enough tools. We need to collect some money to buy these tools.
This tool is called an adze. You see head of tool? This is what we use to make blocks for construction!
Stone Mining
The Mines have a lot of good stone for building. We dig it out and work on it right there. I will need a special tool to do this.
Pumice comes from hot lava that has cooled quickly during a volcano eruption. This happens often at sea.
Stone Mining
We must smooth some building blocks. The best way to do this is to use pumice. There is a lot of this stone under the sea.
The scrolls say that only the Gods could enter the Pyramid. I wonder if we are violating divine laws with our construction work?
Tales of the ancestors
I tried to find out about the Pyramid from the chronicles of the past, but without success. We need to try to read the untranslated scrolls.
Don’t look at the fact that it looks very old. There is nothing better than flint for work of this kind. The symbols turn out delicate and precise.
Stone Mining
The Pyramid was covered with sacral symbols from top to bottom in the past. However, we will need a special cutting tool to engrave stone.
Now there is enough money both for my construction machine and for hiring workers to build it.
Project expenses
I have developed a plan to construct a machine that can lift stone blocks. Building it will require an additional payment.
If my calculations are correct, then a few people should have no problems lifting stone blocks to the top levels of the Pyramid.
Stone Mining
I am building the first crane according to my diagrams. If it will fulfill my expectations we can make more machines of this kind.
If the skis on these sledges are constantly kept wet with water, they will be very good for transporting large cargoes.
Stone Mining
The weight of stone blocks it too great for the suspension of a cart. However, I know a way to transport building materials over long distances.
This is the strongest breed of elephant. One of these animals can drag far more blocks in a day than horses or people!
Mighty helper
I can make a contribution to the building of the Pyramid. I know where to find a really strong beast that will help us!
Oh, gods! Some villains have broken my fruit tree! I will find these ruffians and make them work in the Garden all day and night!
Uninvited guest
It seemed to me that someone was wandering around outside my house last night. I think that some street urchins were getting inside the Garden again.
The sounds coming from the jungle were like the howls of a wild beast and I am sure that I saw the silhouette of some sort of giant on the other side!
Nocturnal ambush
I heard someone wondering around the ruins of the Pyramid last night. I should keep vigil on the ship and see what is happening on the other riverbank.
It looks like the hive has been robbed by a very hungry creature, as it was not even afraid of the bites of wild bees when it wanted to consume their honey…
Uninvited guest
The bees look very worried today. They are not letting me relax in the sun. Maybe a hornet has entered the hive again?
It’s not that hard to construct hives, the main thing is that I now have everything I need.
Renovations
Several of the hives in the Apiary have been destroyed by an unknown vandal. New hives need to be built as soon as possible. But materials are needed for that!
Several of the hives in the Apiary have been destroyed by an unknown vandal. New hives need to be built as soon as possible. I need to gather some food and get to work.
You would need several people to carry this huge barrel and even more to drink it. But here it is, cracked and empty…
Uninvited guest
A barrel of my best beer that I put aside for the most honored guests has vanished from the cellar.
I never managed to see the creature that entered the city. It was scared away by the noise of the crowd in the street, but it was really huge!
City patrol
Someone is getting into the houses of the citizens. This must end. I am going to go and patrol the streets!
I was afraid for the oven the most. It doesn’t just feed me, it feeds the whole city as well. I can’t even imagine who could have the strength to destroy it…
Uninvited guest
Some huge beast got inside the bakery and started to destroy everything. While I ran to get help everything quietened down inside. I hope the oven is intact, at least.
Just a few days and the new oven will be ready so I can start working again. I can’t leave the citizens without bread and sweet cakes!
Stonework
My work has halted, but the people can’t live without bread. A new oven needs to be urgently built out of stone. I need building materials.
This helmet belonged to one of my patrolmen. The tracks of the creature lead to the Pyramid. Now we know where it comes from!
Uninvited guest
One of the patrolmen has disappeared. He was looking for a huge beast around here. We must find the lad, I am worried about him!
Only a sleeping spell managed to take down this giant. This is the last of the Ancients! He was infected by Spores on the Ship and turned into a mindless animal…
The Last Cursed One
A gigantic creature is wandering around near the Pyramid. It would have no problem defeating any man. But we will try to catch it using magic!
This money should be enough to hire new workers. I will select the best men from the village and share the gold equally among their families.
Paying the workers
The construction of the Pyramid is going full speed ahead but we need to hire more workers from the neighboring villages. We will need gold for that.
I will select the best men from the village. This much food should be enough to feed the new workers.
The construction of the Pyramid is going full speed ahead, but we need to hire more workers from the neighboring villages. We need to stock up on food: good work requires a full stomach.
The construction mixture is poured into this wooden box and then it sets. Then we take off the box and we have an even block.
Big Building Site
We will make some of the blocks for the Pyramid ourselves using a special construction mixture. I need to make a mold for the block.
The lower blocks of the Pyramid will be the largest. The stonemasons won’t be able to get these from the mines. This is why we must mold the blocks ourselves!
Big Building Site
Part of the Pyramid will be built using artificial blocks. We will make them ourselves. We need to make a special limestone mix…
There are stories of a sleep inducing mist that appeared from openings in the Pyramid when anyone tried to get inside.
Chemical reactions
The mist that enshrouded the Pyramid for all these years has attracted my interest. I will try to find references to it in the old scrolls…
We put the lime mixture into the mold and mix it with dolomite chips. This mixture makes our blocks really strong!
Big Building Site
A special stone is needed to strengthen the construction mix. Dolomite chips would be just right.
This food will last for a long time. As soon as it starts running out, tell me and I will bring more.
Food for the builders
There are many people working at the building site and each of them is supposed to have a daily ration. I think I have brought enough food for them for the time being.
The purchased food will last a long time. As soon as it starts running out, tell me and I will buy more.
There are many people working at the building site, and each of them is supposed to have a daily ration. I'll need gold to buy food.
The first block you’ve done has worked out straight. I don’t see any rough or broken edges. We can load it onto the sledge and start a new one!
Big Building Site
Hired worker now build Pyramid. While they mold all blocks and put them together, we will get stones from the Mine.
If we have calculated everything properly, we are only building a third of its actual size. Common mortals could never create something like this!
Architectural giant
We are only building the upper part of the Pyramid now and its size is astounding. How big might it be under the ground?
Scaffolding will make working on the highest levels of construction and engraving holy symbols on the walls much easier.
Big Building Site
Scaffolding will need to be erected to work at great heights. It can be connected using bamboo trunks.
The Ancients thought that pyramid-shaped objects could collect a powerful charge of energy inside them. The golden top will increase the power of the Pyramid!
Concentration of energy
I ordered a golden top for the Pyramid from the mountain masters. It will be covered with magical symbols from top to bottom.
The Pyramid was a focus of all the knowledge that the Ancients received. Even the Gods lived in it prior to appearing before the people.
Home of Gods
The Captain’s message often mentions the Pyramid. It was a very important place for the Ancients. But what was the purpose of its creation?
I managed to get several books from the underground storerooms of the Pyramid. I can’t wait to begin to study them.
Mind exercise
There is a huge hall full of unusual tomes in the lower part of the Pyramid. I need to take some food for the road and go to study them!
There is a huge hall full of unusual tomes in the lower part of the Pyramid. I need to study them. Let's grab some essential supplies and set off!
This is a very interesting work by the Ancients. It contains knowledge of the minerals and ores that fill our world!
Wisdom of the elements
All of the books found in the Pyramid match the elements in our world. For instance, the Book of Stone has a stone cover…
This tome speaks of the energies that fill our world and about the right way to interact with and direct them!
Wisdom of the elements
I will help to decipher the texts in the books found in the Pyramid. The Book of Fire is one of the most interesting. It seems to burn with a real flame.
It looks like the juices of living trees flow under the cover of this book. It contains valuable information about all of the plants of the world and their qualities.
Wisdom of the elements
From the books of the Ancients, I understand more and more how man and the world around him are connected. Every book complements another.
While studying the Pyramid, I am coming to understand that the Ancients were even stronger than the Gods!
Deluge of knowledge
I have taken in so much information recently that my world has turned upside down!
Now I will know that when I come to the factory again I will not find three mummies that are dried to the bone.
The supplies have run out
Food has run out at the factory and you still can’t tear yourself away from your precious books. Just you wait, you could die of hunger and not notice it.
Metal is an element that can be flowing and flexible in some situations and hard and unmoving in others.
Wisdom of the elements
Time to start on the next tome, where I’m looking forward to lots of interesting things. It will probably be even heavier than the stone tome.
This book is the most unusual of all. Basically, its pages are empty and the texts appear and vanish as soon as I manage to read them!
Wisdom of the elements
The Book of Water is shrouded in illusion, the same as the Book of Fire. This is why Master ordered me to study it.
These books have been sent to us by the Ancients. They say something about the power of knowledge that leads to eternal life and the void of ignorance that consumes forever…
The essence of study
All of the elemental books are united by some sort of basic truth. But we don’t have a connecting link. We need to find it!
This item look like special mold to put melted metals in.
Forge of knowledge
Me will dig underground hole into lower part of Pyramid and go to find mystery door that Brewer see in his dreams.
This be big luck for us. We find much gold ore. Someone get it before and put it here.
Forge of knowledge
Me don’t know if that thing help us find road to mystery door, but we must go on.
We have no choice, must clean this corridor. I quickly go, prop up walls and ceiling and then we go on!
Collapsed ceiling
There be collapse down the corridor, he now do block on our way. We must prop it up! I need materials!
I saw one of the Ancients, standing in armor in front of a Skystone forge. He had a Magical Scepter in his hands.
Another vision
The items that you found will help me to have another vision. But it is very difficult for me to concentrate at the moment.
That is the same anvil I saw in my dream! Like all the creations of the Ancients it possesses great power!
Forge of knowledge
I am also going to the lower levels of the Pyramid this time. I saw three strange items and I know what they look like.
The indentations in the foundry mold are an exact match for those found on the Gates. This means that the Ancients made the missing parts for the Gates!
Piece of the puzzle
I was looking at the foundry mold that was found inside the Pyramid for a long time. The indentations on the inside seemed to be very familiar…
The Ancients must have been really wealthy if gold was just an element for scientific studies!
New coinage
I ordered new gold coins to be made from the ore that was found in the Pyramid. They should be taken to the treasury.
This armor is truly great. Just right for one of the mighty Ancients. In my vision, it protected the body of the smith at work.
Forge of knowledge
Now we must find the armor worn by the Ancient in my vision. It would be just right for Montu, the God of War himself.
The Ancients forged Golden Runes in the Forge of Knowledge in the Pyramid. Maybe we will finally be able to open the Gates with their help!
Forge of knowledge
It’s strange that the Ancient used a scepter with a Skystone on the end instead of a hammer. We need to find out what exactly was it that the blacksmith was making.
The Ancients gave this key to my predecessors because they knew the day would come when people would enter the Pyramid!
Priestly relic
The knowledge in my head begins to come together into a full picture. I had a key which was passed from priest to priest over generations.
Our work on the Sphinx is finally complete and his spirit has returned to our world!
People’s hope
Once upon a time, the old Sphinx statue meant a lot to our ancestors. We must restore it!
The soil in the places where the excavations began is very loose, but we now have enough materials to reinforce the trenches.
Renovations
Excavations will take place in the city. However, the trenches are quite dangerous unless they are reinforced. We will need materials for this.
We have found the lion figurine. It always represented bravery and fairness on the one side and cruelty and savagery on the other.
Loyal Protector
I am going to do some excavations near the city. I will have to get a bit dirty while getting rare items out of the ground.
The Sphinx used to set riddles for mariners by the sea channel. The channel was only crossed by those who gave the correct answers!
Legend of the Sphinx
The Sphinx was a very interesting creature. There were many legends about him.
The bull was considered to be the representation of the uncontrollable forces of nature and fertility. The one who had mastered the bull was the one that mastered those forces!
Loyal Protector
Our distant ancestors respected animals. I think there are many more figurines of other animals under the ground.
The ancestors had a special respect for eagles as they rose high into the sky, where man could never get to!
Loyal Protector
We must get to understand which animals the ancestors respected the most. The figurines we found should help.
We found a human figurine! It seems to be from the period when our ancestors decided that they were the direct descendants of the Gods.
Loyal Protector
I found another figurine, but I need to be very careful not to damage it.
It looks like the ancestors had some way of minting coins which is unknown to us. They look far better than ours!
Treasures of the earth
The earth contains both ancient artifacts and the treasures of our ancestors.
The first mention of the Sphinx states that this animal had the body and paws of a lion, the tail of a bull, the wings of an eagle and the head of a human.
The priestess’ theories
I think that the set of figurines you found during the excavations is very strange! Our past keeps so many secrets!
This is the Sphinx, looking the way it did when first seen by our mariner ancestors. He looks truly fearsome!
Loyal Protector
I came across a figurine depicting a mysterious animal but I can’t tell which one it is, under the dirt.
Since then, luck was always on the side of the ruler, who became famous as a brave warrior and defender of his people!
Inherited powers
Because he could not solve the riddle of the Sphinx, Pharaoh Khafra went to fight it. The Sphinx gave the Pharaoh a golden amulet for his bravery.
Khafra was a brave warrior that always went to battle at the head of his army. The Pharaoh got this bravery after meeting the Sphinx.
Courageous Ruler
The legends say that Pharaoh Khafra ordered for a Sphinx statue to be built during his rule.
It looks like these are the bracers of Pharaoh Khafra. A lion is depicted on them. The Ruler respected this animal and surrounded himself with its pictures!
Pharaoh Khafra
Legends tell that Pharaoh Khafra always fought in the same uniform using the same weapon.
This is the legendary helmet of Pharaoh Khafra that inspired terror in his enemies from the wild nomadic tribes!
Pharaoh Khafra
Investigations into the story of the Sphinx continue and the armor of Khafra is connected to this mysterious creature.
Now you don’t have to worry that the sandstorm will cover up the trenches. The stone reinforcements will stop the sand.
Sandstorm
A sandstorm is coming from the center of the desert. We need materials to construct additional reinforcements!
Legends say that the armor of Pharaoh Khafra was enchanted and gave him extraordinary power…
Werewolf Pharaoh
The story of Pharaoh Khafra is shrouded in darkness. Some tales of him inspire hope and others inspire fear. Some consider him a hero and others a murderer.
Thousands of nomads broke their spears upon this shield and found their end at the feet of Pharaoh Khafra.
Pharaoh Khafra
If Pharaoh Khafra’s armor really gave their owner this sort of power we must continue our search!
The young ruler decided to do a terrible deed — he took the spear that never missed the enemy from the tomb of his father Pharaoh Kheops.
Pharaoh Khafra
Once, the sword of Pharaoh Khafra broke in the heat of battle. After the end of the battle, the ruler got his new weapon and attracted a curse.
Now I don’t worry about you anymore! You can continue your excavations. It's better to work on a full stomach.
A few provisions
You and the chief are constantly digging in the sand looking for relics of Pharaoh Khafra. Isn’t it time for having a bite?
The enemies could never penetrate this armor with their weapons. However, Khafra accidentally stabbed himself with the spear of Kheops and fell upon the field of battle…
Pharaoh Khafra
Only the armor of Khafra remains to be found. The legends say that when these items are collected, the soul of the Pharaoh will be free of the curse.
Now, the soul of the Pharaoh has returned to this world so the Sphinx will become the invisible protector of our city!
The Curse of Kheops
After death, Khafra took a new form and protected these lands until the Sphinx statue was destroyed.
These herbs will save you from any ailment. Let the power and might of the Sphinx make the energy of these medicinal herbs grow throughout our lands!
Gifts from the citizens
I will take my gift to the Sphinx first. It will be of sacred herbs gathered at midday and enchanted by me.
Legends say that anyone that is pure of heart can bring his gift to the foot of the Sphinx statue and ask the question that interests him.
Answers to questions
If the spirit of the Sphinx really returns to our lands, the City will be very lucky. This mythical creature can do so many things.
This is a famous blade! Father earned the title of chief and gave the people hope thanks to its sharp blade!
Gifts from the citizens
The Sphinx is the defender of his people, so the gifts brought to him must be appropriate.
Now we can feed more than the whole city — we can even feed the residents of the surrounding villages!
Bountiful harvest
I don’t know what happened, but all of the harvests came much earlier than usually!
Let this basket be a symbol of the fertility of our land!
Gifts from the citizens
I think that I should thank the spirit of the Sphinx for the last harvest. People constantly bring gifts to the foot of this unfinished statue.
It seemed to me that I became hundreds of times stronger and that no one can ever stop me now. The presence of the Sphinx gave us so much courage!
Enemy spies
Menes’ spies have entered the city. It seems that the dark priest is planning something against the citizens again. To arms!
We managed to catch a mahi-mahi. I hope the Sphinx will accept this gift and will not be angry with me for the sins of my ancestors.
Gifts from the citizens
I know that the Sphinx was also worshiped as the keeper of the waters. I want to bring him fish as a gift.
I think that an altar is needed for the gifts that are brought to the foot of the Sphinx. This money will go on making it.
Successful investment
Streams of people are going to the unfinished Sphinx statue to give thanks to his spirit. Each of them carries a gift of some kind.
Once, the nomadic tribes took the mines where our ancestors were extracting turquoise but Pharaoh Khafra reconquered them!
Gifts from the citizens
I want to give a gift of this homemade jade necklace to the spirit of the Sphinx. This stone is important to him.
The people are bringing their gifts to the foot of the Sphinx without stopping. I am so happy that our countrymen now have hope for the future!
It’s a miracle
The Masters have made an incredibly beautiful altar that we will place inside the Sphinx.
Thoth’s idol has taken its rightful place next to Bastet’s idol.
Power Over Time
We need to build Thoth’s idol so that his spirit can return to our world.
Thoth created language and writing to teach people to talk to each other.
Godly Wisdom
Thoth carried a palette of ink and wrote down all his knowledge to share it with people.
With the coming of Thoth, much will change for the better in the city!
Monetary Contribution
To build a statue of Thoth, we’ll need quite a lot of gold.
Thoth himself invented this amazing tube and called it a telescope.
Godly Wisdom
One of Thoth’s hobbies was astronomy. He studied our world by watching the stars through a special tube.
Thoth could stop time whenever he wanted, or travel through it to the past and future!
Old Legend
I’m not interested in writing, but the shamans of the desert respected Thoth for more than just his letters.
Everyone has replenished their strength. Time to continue the work.
Food for Workers
Building a statue is no easy task, especially when it’s the statue of a god. It’s time to have some refreshments.
Thoth believed that art inspires people and gives them the opportunity to know themselves.
Godly Wisdom
Apart from everything else, Thoth loved music. He had a beautiful harp.
Thanks to this unusual study of numbers, people learned to measure everything they see!
Godly Wisdom
Among the sciences that Thoth invented was counting, which he called mathematics.
Thoth was a protector of worldly order and always helped the pharaohs, even in the underworld!
Great Protector
Thoth is one of the greatest gods our ancestors worshiped.
Any priest would give his life for a mere look at that legendary scepter.
Godly Wisdom
The priests used to honor Thoth more than anyone else. He even had a magical scepter of his own.
People held the ibis in high regard for eating the small river animals that destroyed the crops.
Divine Bird
Thoth, like the other gods, was connected to certain animals. These were the sacred ibis birds.
Among his first close followers were not only minor gods and pharaohs, but even animals!
Followers of Thoth
Like any mighty god, Thoth had his allies.
Seshat’s sacred animal was the panther. The goddess always wore one of their skins.
Divine Retinue
Among Thoth’s close friends was his sister, Seshat, the goddess of writing. She was a great help to her brother.
It’s hard to judge how complete the idol is, but I like what we’ve done.
Lacking Resources
Construction of Thoth’s idol is going at full steam, but we don’t have enough building materials.
Djehuti honored Thoth’s laws about worldly order and relied on them to govern justly.
Divine Retinue
Thoth’s first ally among people was the pharaoh Djehuti. His name means "Thoth the God".
Astennu kept an eye on the scales on which human deeds were weighed, and he allowed no mistakes!
Divine Retinue
Thoth’s closest ally was Astennu the baboon. He was an incarnation of the moon and always stayed close to his master.
Our citizens must start believing in the gods again, that’s why we’re building their idols!
The Power of Personification
We won’t be able to free all the gods from their confinement by building idols. That only worked with Bastet.
In his youth, Thutmose wasn’t in line for the throne. But Thoth pronounced his will before the priests, and Thutmose became pharaoh.
Divine Retinue
Another great follower of Thoth among humans was Thutmose III.
It seems the citizens’ spirits have lifted, and they now believe in the return of the gods.
Help from the Citizens
The money allotted to construct the Thoth statue is coming to an end. We need more gold.
Maat always kept watch on universal order and controlled the changes of the seasons throughout the year.
Divine Retinue
Thoth has a wife – Maat, the goddess of justice and harmony. She was Thoth’s most loyal ally.
There he is! A little thoughtful, always concentrating. People should truly heed his wise counsel!
In the Flesh
You managed to find figurines of all the allies and followers of Thoth. But a figurine of Thoth himself is not among them.
Osiris managed to teach people much, but he fell at the hands of his envious brother, Seth.
Lord of Time
Five days from Thoth’s calendar were forgotten, but we will restore them. We need to draw Osiris – the first day was his!
Finally, someone has started restoring Thoth’s calendar.
Field Work
The harvest has unexpectedly ripened, but I don’t have near enough free hands to bring it in.
Before, the calendar was smaller and the days of the Great River’s flooding were never the same as the previous ones.
Unsuccessful Calculations
People tried to create the first calendar themselves, but they hit on some discrepancies with the days.
Isis protected mothers and their children. She was believed to be the foremother of all pharaohs!
Lord of Time
The second day received the name of the goddess Isis – the wife of the lord of the underworld.
Thoth taught people how to determine the start of the Great River’s flood based on the movement of Sirius.
Bright Star
When Thoth helped the people to create the calendar, he brought many natural phenomena to their attention.
These building materials really came in handy. We managed to make a new roof for the people living in the Sepat.
Whims of Nature
A sandstorm took the roof of the Sepat right off. We need to restore it.
It was Horus who took vengeance against Seth for betraying Osiris, and then revived his father.
Lord of Time
The third day was named in honor of the god Horus. He was the son of Osiris and Isis.
It was believed that Nephthys helped spirits traveling to the underworld, and sang them mournful hymns as they went!
Lord of Time
Another of the lost calendar days was named in honor of the goddess Nephthys. She was the wife of Seth and a friend to Isis.
Seth wanted to rule over the world of the living himself, and so he betrayed Osiris.
Lord of Time
The god Seth, in whose honor Thoth named the fifth and last day, was a combative and savage creature.
Menes carefully defended Thoth’s calendar with his dark magic, but our spells were stronger.
A Gift to Humanity
All the lost days of Thoth’s calendar have been restored. All that remains is to find the calendar itself.
Construction of the Bes idol is complete. This little god is loved by all!
Defender of Citizens
Bes is the male incarnation of Bastet. Start building his idol!
The building materials we’ve collected should be enough to build a new stove in the Sepat.
Caring for Children
The stove in the Sepat has cracked. I called on the Lady for help in making a new one, but we need to get some materials first!
We’ve made ourselves a wonderful hearth – big and cozy. Praise Bes for the help!
Little Merrymaker
The invisible presence of Bes should help us in building a new stove for the Sepat. He’s the protector of the home hearth, after all.
Bes used to love the night. Night is the time when wicked forces become stronger, and he always liked a challenge!
A Fearless God
Bes is my closest friend among the gods. It’s always amazed me that there can be so much energy in such a little body!
Ginger cats have always been considered incarnations of Bes. Now I have one protecting my house and my kids!
Little Merrymaker
I’m always worrying about my kids. I want to get Bes’s support in protecting them.
Every dancer decorated her head with a feather tiara like this in honor of Bes.
Little Merrymaker
Every girl in my tribe learns how to dance from birth, and I’m no exception. We need to find my feather tiara!
Once, Bes saved the young god Ra from death by defeating Apep the giant serpent, who had slithered into the cradle!
Conqueror of Serpent
Bes always amazed the gods with his bravery, even the strongest of them. There are many legends of his deeds.
I once found this flute in the grass – it’s a gift from Bes. I learned to play it and fell in love with music!
Little Merrymaker
Bes is my protector and the defender of my family. Someone has to look after the house while I work in the field after all – and it’s him.
Praise Bes for keeping our city prosperous!
Old Debts
It seems Bes’s power really is returning to the city. One of my neighbors has decided to pay off his debts to us.
If you keep makeup in flasks that depict Bes, it gains healing properties.
Little Merrymaker
I’ve ordered a little flask in the shape of Bes from the potter to keep my perfume in.
When a child suddenly stops crying and starts laughing, that’s invisible Bes making faces at him.
Childish Joy
Children love Bes most of all. That’s why there’s a mask of Bes’s happy face in every household.
The forest folks are as fast and agile as ants.
Forest folk
I had the luck to meet with some of the forest folks. They’re small and brave.
One of the principle activities of the pygmies is foraging.
Forest folk
One of the names for the forest folks is pygmy, which means fist-sized person.
Since the forest dwellers are friends of Bes himself, why shouldn’t we be friends with them too?
Neighborly Gifts
We need to collect plenty of vegetables and fruit into the big basket the Nomad has.
Many pygmies fell at the hands of their enemies. Then they ran into the jungle and hid themselves away there forever.
Great Migration
The pygmy people used to live in the desert. But with time, people in service to demons began to oppress them.
This is the bow of the pygmy chief. He gave it to me as a sign of friendship.
Forest folk
The pygmies are not only excellent gatherers, but also great hunters. I once had the opportunity to hunt alongside them.
Anyone who gets a drop of this infusion in their blood immediately loses control over their body.
Forest folk
Many dangers lie in wait in the jungle, and a little person like a pygmy has to know how to defend himself.
The power of Bes will soon return to the world, and we must make contact with the pygmies.
New Allies
Bes told the gods about the pygmies. But we decided not to disturb them for the time being.
I will use this money to buy tools for farming and weapons for hunting for the pygmies.
Large Purchases
Since we’ve decided to make friends with the little aboriginals, let’s collect a little gold for the forest dwellers!
Only a very powerful pygmy shaman could wear such beads.
Forest folk
The shamans of the forest people are very powerful. I once had the pleasure of meeting one.
This is a frontier hut of the pygmies. I’m sure they’ve been watching us from the undergrowth for a while now.
Heart of the Jungle
I’m going in search of the pygmy villages, to make an alliance between our peoples.
It’s true what they say – Bes protects homes from all uninvited guests who threaten the householders’ lives.
Fierce Defender
It’s a good thing I started keeping a cat in the Sepat. He spotted a venomous snake in the corridor and cornered it.
I’m surprised a larger animal didn’t find its way in through that hole.
Home Repairs
I found the hole in the wall which the venomous snake slithered through into the Sepat. We need to fill it in!
Praise Bes, you managed to find that dangerous creature!
Fierce Defender
I caught a scorpion in the desert. I wanted to observe it and brought it home, but it escaped its reed box.
Because of his short stature, Bes learned to hide in the night and protect those that need his help!
The Night is Dark
At night, the wicked serpent Apep rules the world, and his servants slither throughout the land.
Who knows how much of our food supply that rat might have destroyed in the storehouse!
Fierce Defender
Something has gotten into the storehouse, and has been devouring our supplies for days.
If I’d been a little late and come home after midnight, I wouldn’t have noticed the uninvited guest.
Fierce Defender
While I was repairing the wall in the Sepat, a crocodile got into my house. I must have forgotten to lock the door.
We’re in luck – a lot of our supplies untouched by our nighttime thief.
Hard Work
The rat that got into the storehouse might have been carrying a disease. I’ll reinspect all the sacks of supplies.
We created some protective charms around the city that will temporarily hold back the encroaching forces of darkness.
Sense of Alarm
I can feel Bes’s power growing in step with our construction of the idol. But evil feels it as well.
Bes heard my prayers and helped me find the evil spirit before it could cause trouble in the city.
Fierce Defender
An evil spirit has escaped from the underworld, dodging Bastet’s magical charms. Catching it is practically impossible.
Bes has never had his own temple, because he always lived under the same roof as the people who believed in him!
Welcome Guest
Recent events have caused the citizens to believe again in the power of Bes. They’re creating small altars to him in their homes.
The might of Anubis has returned, and now we’re under his protection!
Mighty Anubis
Anubis has always been responsible for the spirits of people who depart for Duat – Underworld. If we build his idol, we’ll be able to defeat Menes’s new allies. Time to get to work!
Anubis brought Osiris back to life, but he didn’t return to the world of the living, but took the place of his savior in Duat!
First Ruler
Anubis was the ruler of Duat until a tragedy hit. Listen to the story of Osiris’s death.
At first, people disliked jackals, but then they realized that these animals serve Anubis by protecting souls.
Last Guide
Anubis has always been depicted with the head of a jackal. I’m setting off to observe one of them today. Come with me!
This is sacred cloth! With this artifact, any priest can grasp the secrets of the underworld!
Last Guide
With the help of embalming, Anubis brought Osiris back to life. We need to find part of the resurrected god’s shroud!
There’s a story in the scroll about one who managed to return to the world of the living…
Last Guide
The Book of Oblivion is the most famous of the ancient treatises. I need to find one of its scrolls!
Without Anubis’s permission, no one could enter the underworld or leave it!
New Position
In gratitude for saving him, Osiris rewarded Anubis with a new position. Let’s go, I’ll tell you all about it!
I hope Anubis comes soon to help us get rid of the dark forces that have settled in the city streets.
Citizens’ Offerings
The people await Anubis’s return and carry offerings to his unfinished idol. Will you help me gather up the gifts?
Lids for urns were often made in the shape of Anubis’s head, to protect remains from evil spirits.
Last Guide
I’ve made funeral urns from clay before. Will you help me make one now?
Now this spirit can be at peace. I put the urn there that you and I made.
Protection from Spirits
It looks like Menes’s servants have demolished a tomb. Help me restore it!
Anubis made this medicine for the pharaohs. It can heal many illnesses in mere days.
Last Guide
I read that Anubis taught the first priests to make the best medicines against all illnesses. I’ll teach you the same!
In the hour of the last battle, Anubis will allow the spirits of these brave warriors to return and fight against the forces of evil again!
Consequences of War
I’d like to honor the memory of those who died standing up to the power of Amrun and Menes.
We need to go to Duat to get our hands on a certain important ingredient. And I know how to get there!
Incursion Plan
In the Book of Oblivion, I learned about a priest that found a road to the underworld. I’ve formed a plan…
I’d almost stopped hoping that we’d find a real silver boat – they all go only one way!
Road to Duat
All spirits go to the underworld on silver boats. We need to find one of them!
I hope these supplies should be enough for you to go the whole way!
Supplies for the Road
I’ve heard that you’re setting out on a dangerous journey. Come visit me, I’ll help you with supplies for the road!
The clay head of Anubis must be placed on the nose of the silver ship. It will frighten away evil spirits!
Road to Duat
The ship won't traverse the Great River without good protection. I'll sort this out, but I'm going to need your help!
Only the simplest of things can be taken into Duat, things that are often placed in tombs!
Road to Duat
When a spirit is sent off to the underworld, it is given a knapsack of things for the road. We need one too.
If we read the scrolls out loud, Ushebti’s workers will appear and help hide us from the evil spirits!
Road to Duat
We need to find a tube of scrolls which lists those who can help us retreat from the underworld.
On your journey you will meet creatures that cannot be overpowered, but can always be bribed.
Payment for Crossing
I don’t like my daughter’s plan to go into the underworld. I think you’re going to need some gold for the road.
In Duat, never look back and don’t listen to the evil spirits’ whispers. Heed my advice, it could save your life!
A Dangerous World
Anubis has always strictly punished those who try to go through the gates of Duat. We need to be extremely careful!
We managed to sneak across the boundary between the human world and the spirit world! We succeeded in obtaining the sacred reeds!
Road to Duat
Duat is often called the Fields of Aaru, because thousands of reeds grow on the river bank there. And they’re what we need!
Duat burst out of the gate and is moving the borders of the world of the living. Amrun’s curse! We need Anubis to stop it!
The Other Side
We’ve gotten into the underworld, but we didn’t find the gate. Let’s try and find it!
We managed to extract and pacify the spirit of greed from the Nomad’s body!
Ghostly Fugitives
An evil spirit has settled in the nomad’s body and robbed the treasury! We need to exorcise it and bind it with a spell!
If a person does great evil in the world, in Duat he becomes an incarnation of his worst vice.
Sins Incarnate
In life, the spirits of the underworld weren’t like what they are now. Let’s go, I’ll tell you their sad story!
I remember how the spirit of greed merged with me, and where it hid what was stolen.
Searching for What Was Stolen
Under the influence of the evil spirit, I robbed the treasury. We need to get what was stolen back. Will you help me?
A spirit of lies has settled in the mind of the farmer. It’s a good thing we managed to sort everything out in time.
Ghostly Fugitives
The farmer is spreading false rumors around the city about Menes bringing the people peace and freedom. Something is wrong here.
We were able to pacify the spirit of anger that took advantage of father’s doubts and took over his mind.
Ghostly Fugitives
My father learned about how people were being incited to rebellion and rushed out into the streets waving his sword!
Evil spirits attach themselves only to people who are unsure of themselves.
Overpowered Spirits
You’re doing a good job pacifying the evil spirits that have broken into the city. Want some advice?
Now I’ll build a stone crypt so Nimiru can seal the evil spirits inside and put a spell on the entrance!
Spirit Prison
Mistress Nimiru has ordered us to collect building materials to build a prison for the evil spirits.
I don’t even understand how the evil spirit of pride took me over. Thank you for exorcising it from me!
Ghostly Fugitives
Are you still catching the remaining spirits without magical enchantments? I don’t think you’ll be able to overcome them without my help.
Such a panic overcame me that I was ready to disappear. Thank you, I feel a lot better now.
Ghostly Fugitives
Menes is just waiting for his chance to wipe the city off the face of the earth! And these ghosts too! Please do something!
One wave of Anubis’s half-moon poleaxe and all the negative consequences of these spirits’ lives will be cut away!
Weapon of Punishment
The evil spirits are imprisoned! Now you’ll need the weapons that Anubis used to free the spirits from their corruption.
With the return of Isis’s strength, I felt my own strength growing as well.
Isis’s Return
Isis is my role model. I’m willing to do anything to return her power, and you’ll help me do it!
The white cow has always been considered a symbol of motherhood.
Great Mother
All mortals honored Isis as a mother. Come, I’ll show you which animal was her symbol on earth!
The fresh milk of Isis’s cow has healing properties and gives children strength!
Great Mother
One of my charges has caught a cold. Bring me a jug of milk from the farmer’s white cow.
The white cow’s milk is healing. And if you touch its horns, you receive the blessing of Isis herself.
Taking Care of an Animal
The citizens give offerings to the white cow in the form of food. Gather up everything they’ve brought and pour it into the feeder!
Isis knew how to conduct births and how to bring up worthy children. She also knew all the secrets of feminine beauty!
Best Qualities
Isis was a true ally to women. Everything they now know and can do comes from her.
Our ancestors believed that it was Isis who taught women to weave, and that this process holds a special secret.
Great Mother
I was weaving some yarn, but my spindle broke. Please find me a new one, and make it stronger. But be quick!
Praise Isis for guiding these children into the city, and not into Menes’s forces!
New Home
The Nomad found some children left behind by the caravan. We need to build some new rooms for them!
Only thanks to the cunning of Isis was Horus able to prove his right to Osiris’s throne!
Mother of the Ruler
Isis was the mother of one of the most respected gods – Horus. And he, over time, became the ruler of the human world…
Isis transformed into a female kite and wrapped her wings around her husband. After whispering a spell, she was with child.
Great Mother
There is a legend about how Isis conceived her son Horus from Osiris. It’s connected to a kite.
It was in a reed nest just like this one, among the rushes and sedge, where Isis gave birth to the great Horus.
Great Mother
When Isis was with child, she had to hide from her enemy Seth for a long time.
Mothers placed a stone child like this with Horus’s face into the empty cradles of their children.
Birthing Ritual
Many magical rituals are associated with Isis, but one of them I like more than all the rest.
Isis wanted to become the ruler of the skies. She watched Ra for a long time and one day realized that he was getting very old.
Ancient Legend
Only thanks to her cunning and wits was Isis able to take Ra's celestial throne.
Isis managed to catch a single tear as it fell and saved it for her magic!
Mistress of the Skies
To trick the old god Ra, Isis needed a little part of him – a crystalline tear.
The next ingredient for Isis’s spell was dust from Ra’s well-trodden path.
Mistress of the Skies
Isis noted the path that Ra used to enjoy strolling along, and there she got her next ingredient.
Isis is one of the most highly respected gods! People have infinite love for her. Look how much gold they’ve generously donated to build her idol.
In Honor of a Goddess
Women all over the city are bringing me gold for the construction of Isis’s idol. The flow of people is so great that I can’t handle it alone. Help me accept the citizens’ gifts!
With our combined efforts, we’re doing a great deed – helping the gods return to the human world.
Time for Food
I’m responsible for feeding all the workers that are building the idol of Isis.
Ra accidentally stepped on the serpent and it bit the old god. Poisoned by its venom, he turned to stone forever.
Mistress of the Skies
Isis used the god’s tears and the path dust to create a magical serpent.
Isis asked Ra to give her the celestial throne and tell her his secret name, so that he could never return to power.
Secret Name
Isis was willing to heal the old god, but wanted a favor in exchange.
Isis asked him to give her his left eye – the Sun itself. Ra agreed. But that’s not the end of the story…
Mistress of the Skies
Ra was willing to give up his throne to Isis, but was determined not to tell her his secret name…
Isis asked Ra for his second eye, which was the moon itself. After this, she healed the old god.
Mistress of the Skies
Isis was afraid that the old god would return and take the throne back by force…
If the celestial gazelle appears in the skies again, that means that the strength of the goddess is returning to the human world!
Stellar Paths
Since Isis became the mistress of the celestial expanses, she has always watched over the stars and protected them.
Isis’s crown contains an enormous magical power that will help us find the chronometer!
Lady of Time
To find the magical chronometer, I need to become Isis herself. We’ll need to find the goddess’s crown!
Encoded in the tyet is the knowledge that the goddess used when creating her enchantments!
Lady of Time
Now we need to find a few items that Isis possessed. The key to her knowledge of time was her tyet.
These pathways haven’t been used for a long time, but now the entrance to the depths of the earth looks safer!
Secrets of the Earth
We need to get some building materials ready and reinforce the abandoned corridors!
Isis created hundreds of artifacts that each multiplied her magical power!
Magical Artifacts
From birth, Isis possessed great power, but that wasn’t her limit. She could multiply it…
With the help of these magical wings, Isis was able to travel through time.
Lady of Time
Thanks to Bastet, we can find Isis’s main artifacts. I think I know where the goddess’s wings can be found!
The goddess’s earrings were some of her most favorite and magical items.
Lady of Time
There truly is much power in the items we found, but there’s something missing.
Now this gold of our ancestors belongs to the citizens by right.
Ancestral Treasure
Fortune has smiled on us in our search for Isis’s artifacts. In one of the caves, I found a pile of ancient gold coins.
Nimiru is like an incarnation of Isis herself among people. With time, she will possess the power of the artifacts.
Heiress of Isis
Not everyone can use Isis’s artifacts, but there is one who can.
Isis’s bracelets remember all the goddess’s magical gestures.
Lady of Time
Isis’s artifacts are increasing my magical power. But I’m going to need the goddess’s enchanted bracelets!
Here it is, the goddess’s legendary artifact, the one that can give anyone a chance to correct their mistakes.
Fixing Mistakes
When I put on Isis’s artifacts, I suddenly knew where to look for the chronometer!
This underground passage never be finished. Diggers throw away building material and leave. What stop them?
Great sculptor
I find old underground passage. Is covered in abandoned building material. We not explore it until it cleared. You with me?
This grate cover entrance to cave. I think was underground jail here once. But now it empty. Wonder who was prisoner?
Great sculptor
I explore underground passage and find there dark cave. But entrance blocked by rusty grate. We must think of way to get through!
Who needed to shave in the catacombs? Someone probably used this razor as a weapon. More and more questions…
Great sculptor
We don't know why the underground passage was abandoned by the builders. To find out, we need to search it thoroughly. Time to get to work!
Pumice usually used for polish something. I think prisoner from cave was maybe one of builders of this underground passage.
Great sculptor
We need find out who was prisoner in underground cave. He must left things here. We search!
What a stroke of luck! This is the lost model of human proportions. It was created by a talented sculptor from one of the villages razed by Menes!
Great sculptor
I wonder what stories the abandoned cave hides? If you find any old notes or ancient letters in there, bring them to me at once!
This is my brother's modeling stick – he was a sculptor. Clay came alive in his hands. Menes learned of this and kidnapped him to use him in his plots!
Great sculptor
It was my brother who created the model of a man, and that was why Menes's servants kidnapped him. I think he was the prisoner of the mysterious cave. Help me find out!
Now I understand – prisoner from cave polish magical Ica stone here. They hold secret message for future generation.
Great sculptor
Me think one who is prisoner in cave do important work for someone. But me not understand what. Maybe we find else?
A plummet like this could only be used to create large sculptures. My brother must have been making clay statues for Menes. But why?
Great sculptor
My brother completed some sort of project for Menes. But what was it? If we find his other tools, we might be able to reveal it. Will you help me?
These magnifying glasses helped the poor sculptor work in the poor light of the cave. Now they'll come in handy to me – my sight has gotten very weak.
Great sculptor
I saw magnifying lenses in the abandoned cave. They probably belonged to the Potter's brother. Find them and bring them to me!
This is the face of Menes, but he doesn't look like a cruel magician here. My brother portrayed him cheerful. He always managed to see people in the best light!
Pure Vision
I found something else in the abandoned cave. It looks like my brother's last work. Help me carry it out of the catacombs, it's so heavy!
My brother created such frames as a basis for his future statues. But judging by the size of this template, the statue was intended to be gigantic.
Living Clay
We must search the catacombs around the cave where my brother lived. I want to find out what he did while imprisoned. To work!
I knew it! Red clay is considered sacred by our potters and sculptors. Legend has it that it comes alive in the hands of a true master.
Living Clay
I have suspicions regarding what my brother did in these caves. But to find out for sure, I'll need the clay he worked with!
These heavy hooked chains served as a means to bind something very large and fierce. But now this creature is at large!
Living Clay
The Potter believes that it's very dangerous to inspect the passageways now. Some sort of hostile creature is hiding there. Let's try to reveal what it is!
Menes places such seals on the bodies of mighty golems. Using this magical mark, the dark priest can control the will of these fierce creatures!
Living Clay
The Potter has an old wax seal that he found in the catacombs. Bring it to me – it has some sort of secret, I feel it!
I was right! This crystal was the heart of a golem and served as a vessel for a human soul. That's how Menes brought his new servants to life!
Living Clay
The master studied golems and found a shard of some sort of crystal in the catacombs. I think I know what it is. Hurry, bring it to me!
Now I know what happened to my brother. Menes forced him to create an army, and then sealed his soul inside one of the very creatures he created…
Living Clay
The search for my brother didn't lead to anything good. We learned what we shouldn't have to, and now golems have emerged from the catacombs after us. What now?
This shovel is just the thing! There'll be a lot of work to do. I suspect that there's an abandoned room of the priests of the Ancients underneath the Farmer's house.
Master's Digs
I found something interesting in the scrolls. I need your help to organize some digging outside the Farmer's place. Hurry and bring a shovel!
My suspicions turned out true. We managed to find an abandoned tunnel. A dangerous place, but it holds secrets I'm willing to risk a lot for!
Master's Digs
It says in the scrolls that the Ancients worked on projects related to flight in this place. We have a lot of work ahead of us!
This light should be enough for two of us. The old catacombs could be full of terrible monsters. But the bright light will scare them off and light up our path!
Master's Digs
The tunnel leads deep in catacombs, in total darkness. We'll need some good light to explore it. Hurry, bring a torch!
This golden model reminds me of a bird. Its flowing angles tell me that this thing really might fly. The Ancients did it!
Master's Digs
The scrolls of the priests of the Ancients have probably decayed after all these years, but some artifacts may remain. Keep an eye out, we should be able to find something at least!
These earrings were made by a jeweler famous for his wonderful malachite jewelry. The rumors of the craftsman reached even the queen of these lands.
Secret of Malachite
I'll tell you a certain legend if you help me find the ancient jewelry of my family. First of all, let's find the malachite earrings!
The jeweler was very proud that the queen herself had come to him as a client. He swore that she would be satisfied with the ring. And he kept his promise!
Secret of Malachite
The queen bought earrings from the jeweler and ordered a new piece of jewelry for herself. It was supposed to be a malachite ring. Let's start searching for it!
The bracelet and all the jeweler's other creations were made with such love that they took on magical properties. The queen's power became limitless!
Secret of Malachite
Afterwards, the jeweler began to live in the palace. He worked only for the queen, because he was in love with her. We must find another of the craftsman's masterpieces!
Only by combing her hair with the magical brush could the queen calm her internal power. Otherwise it made her cruel and domineering!
Secret of Malachite
The queen could feel her power and could barely hold it back. Then she asked the jeweler to create a comb for her. Hurry and bring it to me!
The queen didn't even spare the jeweler a second glance, and then he decided to take vengeance against her. These beads were his weapons. But the unfortunate man failed to escape punishment.
Secret of Malachite
At the same time, the jeweler longed to have his feelings returned, and without knowing it, he created a curse on his jewelry. Let's find the beads he made!
The jeweler was executed and buried at the entrance to his Lady's tomb. This crown was placed on her mummy, and since then, she has been remembered as the Malachite Queen!
Malachite Queen
A guard caught the jeweler standing over the lifeless body of his Lady. Before his punishment, he was to create one last gift for her. That's the one I need!
The fireflies were attracted by the glimmer of the gold my husband hid in the Sepat. They flew to it from all over the region, and the winged hunters followed them!
Glimmer in the Night
The bats are back, and in greater numbers. They're flying through the corridors and hunting fireflies. Help me drive these insects away!
What a stroke of luck! Who would have thought that all this time while I was making clay pots, such riches were hidden beneath my pottery!
Glimmer in the Night
As I was doing some repairs in the pottery, to my joy I dug up a cache under the house. Could you bring it to the surface and move it to the Sepat temporarily?
The fireflies were attracted by the glimmer of the gold my husband hid in the Sepat. They flew to it from all over the region, and the winged hunters followed them!
Glimmer in the Night
The bats are back, and in greater numbers. They're flying through the corridors and hunting fireflies. Help me drive these insects away!
My young charges were pleased with the treat! It looks like they'd be happy to endure another invasion of bats or even monsters if there was more ice cream at the end of it.
Glimmer in the Night
Our worries are behind us – none of my wards were injured. But they're somewhat frightened. It's time to lift the mood with some ice cream! Will you help?
We're incredibly lucky – these tiger shrimp are almost worth their weight in gold. You'll see, the Tradeswoman and the Brewer will fight over our catch!
Gifts of the Sea
Now is a good time to catch shrimp. I'm heading to the sea – you can join me if you like. It'll be easier to haul the nets aboard with two of us.
Catching mussels isn't difficult. In the village I grew up in, every child can do it. We collected hundreds of them while our parents worked in the fields!
Gifts of the Sea
Mom sent me to the shore to catch mussels, but it's boring on my own. Maybe you can keep me company? We'll catch a lot more together!
Thank you for the delicious dinner. Oysters are one of my favorite childhood treats. Father used to love catching them for me and my mother!
Gifts of the Sea
I want oysters for dinner today. I haven't tasted any seafood dishes in a long time. I hope you can catch something for me!
I hope the Tradeswoman will be pleased. I don't remember the last time my nets were so full. The boat is almost sinking under the weight of the catch!
Gifts of the Sea
Crabs have been in high demand at the market recently. The Tradeswoman asked me to catch more, as many as possible even. I won't be able to meet the demand on my own – will you help?
Blue lobsters are the largest of their ilk. They're worth a small fortune because they're hard to catch. But they taste simply divine!
Gifts of the Sea
An old friend came to visit me. I want to treat him to my best beer and a high-class snack. There's a fresh lobster in the basket. Bring it here!
This catch is a true victory! I haven't found spiny rock lobsters in these waters for a very long time. But now our net is overflowing with them!
Rich Catch
The fishermen say that our waters have been full of spiny rock lobsters recently. Catching them requires special skill and patience. Want to try with me?
This little birdie's trills are simply divine! I could listen to it all day. Its singing calms me down and gives me new strength. Let it live in my garden.
Beautiful Sounds
I'm tired of all these magical formulas and mysterious scrolls. My head is killing me. I need music to relax. Will you help me?
One pharaoh of ancient times liked to call corn the queen of the fields, because since time immemorial, it has been our main source of food.
Counting is Key
Alright! It's time to start counting our crop supplies. There's a lot to do, so I'll be able to find some use for you. For now, count the corn!
There we have it, the job is done! We counted all the supplies and gathered them together at the city storehouse. Our recent harvest was rich – nobody will have to go hungry!
Counting is Key
All the crops I've already counted need to be collected into sacks and taken to the storehouse. I entrust this difficult task to you, while I go take a rest!
We need to plant as many sorghum seeds as possible for the coming season. We can make lots of grain and flour from it, and straw is always useful for our farms!
Counting is Key
After counting our crops, I realized that we grew very little sorghum this year. Head to the market and buy a few seeds from the Tradeswoman!
Great! This'll make a great broth!
Mushroom Soup
The kids are so glad about their new knowledge. I'll make some champignon broth. This mushroom is good for memory.
Delicious! A royal mushroom indeed!
Mushroom Soup
There's nothing tastier than fried lurid boletes! They're hard to cook, but it will be delicious!
Mmm… Such a tasty treat!
Mushroom Soup
Enoki mushrooms help lighten the stomach.
These mushrooms will restore your spirit and body vigor.
Mushroom Soup
Feel weak? Eat some salad with shimeji mushrooms – it'll restore your health at once!
These mushrooms make a wonderful garnish good for beauty and health!
Mushroom Soup
The Ancients cooked food with eryngii to make skin, hair and nails beautiful.
Everyone enjoyed the soup!
Mushroom Soup
We can make a source of vitamins – mushroom soup! The citizens will love it!
These people happily return others' affections.
Animal Zodiac
This astrological sign represents diplomacy. The hare views the world as a game of chess.
These people don't like taking risks.
Animal Zodiac
People born in the year of the Pig are warm-hearted and have excellent taste.
Nevertheless, those born in the year of the Rooster are devoted to their loved ones.
Animal Zodiac
People born in the year of the Rooster take painstaking care with their appearance.
In addition, Bulls have superb intellectual and physical abilities.
Animal Zodiac
People born in the year of the Bull are meek and diligent, patient and taciturn, obstinate and resilient.
Monkeys are true artists of deception.
Animal Zodiac
People born in the year of the Monkey are likely to become famous.
Now people can uphold the old traditions!
Animal Zodiac
People used to believe that all the events in their lives were dictated by a special code – the animal zodiac!
There it is, there it is! Now I'll be the luckiest girl in the village!
Lucky Symbols
I want to find a four-leaf clover. Good luck will come to the person who finds one, or so they say.
Now I'm sure that I can teach the children everything I know!
Lucky Symbols
I'm trying to teach the children new things. It's not easy, I could do with some help from a magic knot!
Whoever received this gift of fortune became a rich and happy person.
Lucky Symbols
In earlier times, the pharaoh's horses had worn golden horseshoes! People ran after the chariots hoping that a horseshoe would come loose!
In the past, you could find lucky coins under the threshold of every home!
Lucky Symbols
Lucky coins. I'd like to make a few and put them in the treasury.
It's a pity you can't grow this tree in a garden…
Lucky Symbols
With a money tree in the house, prosperity will soon follow!
This talisman will help the city in all its endeavors!
Lucky Symbols
Everyone has different talismans… I want to make a special talisman.
The power emanating from this mask is giving me goosebumps! But it's useless without the rest of the outfit.
Old Shaman
The townspeople keep finding ancient items. Someone saw a shaman's mask nearby!
Here's the tambourine! It has been used to perform many rituals!
Old Shaman
I saw an old tambourine in the basement. Maybe it belongs to an old shaman!
Yes, that's it!
Old Shaman
I saw many amulets on my travels, and one was similar to the item we're looking for!
You won't go into battle with that, of course…
Old Shaman
Weapons were essential for shamans. This knife belonged to one of the most ancient representatives.
I'd rather not know what a shaman can see when he wears this hat.
Old Shaman
What a strange hat… And why does it have an eye?
The ancients' clothing was very different than ours.
Old Shaman
We can get a clear picture of the shaman and imagine what he was like.
This armor is sturdy enough! It won't withstand blows from a real sword, but a training one? No problem!
Training Attributes
I want to get everything ready for training the boys. First, we need leather armor.
Great helmet!
Training Attributes
A training helmet is an essential piece of equipment. It will help to prevent a lot of injuries!
Only an experienced warrior can practice without injuring their opponent.
Training Attributes
This sword might leave your sparring partner with bruises, but it's essential for training!
Thanks for helping to find it.
Training Attributes
This light shield will be perfect for any training session.
Everything's ready for the first training session!
Training Attributes
The boys might get injured in training. We need to stock up on bandages.
Now everything's ready for the first training session!
Training Attributes
The boys can't train in pairs right away! We need to build a training dummy for them!
This blue frog will be perfect for the pets' corner.
Frog Collection
The kids are collecting colorful frogs for the pets' corner. I think I should help them…
What a strange frog. I'll bring it to the Sepat, the children will take care of it.
Frog Collection
I saw a frog hop into one of the jugs. It won't be able to get out of there.
It's amazing! This frog is red as a tomato! Let's give it to the pets' corner!
Frog Collection
I was picking tomatoes and suddenly grabbed some creature. It gave me a fright!
A pink frog! It's very jumpy, it will be a challenge to catch it. The things we do for kids!
Frog Collection
I have seen many frogs on my travels. I will bring the most exotic specimens to the children in the Sepat!
That's the yellow frog! It must be kept away from my press… Perhaps the children at the Sepat would like to have it?
Frog Collection
Today a frog nearly fell into my papyrus press!
Look! This is the most beautiful frog of all! It will take pride of place in our pets' corner!
Frog Collection
I saw a beautiful frog by the Sepat walls! It was indescribable. You have to see it for yourself!
It's as if the owl wants to share some of its wisdom with me. It truly is a fascinating bird!
Tame Birds
The owl has always been considered a wise bird. It was gifted with knowledge of many secrets. I want to tame it!
See how agile it is! A falcon will never let its prey escape its clutches!
Tame Birds
There's no bird more daring and agile than the falcon! This is a warrior bird! Only the worthy can tame a falcon!
The raven chooses his own companion and I'm glad it was me!
Tame Birds
No matter what they say, not everyone can tame a raven.
No one will be able to get past this goose without a fuss. It's a great security system!
Tame Birds
I don't see the use of any other birds. A goose is a faithful guardian of the vegetable beds! I could do with one.
Now this peacock will grace our garden with its incomparable beauty!
Tame Birds
It may be hard to believe, but the peacock is very agile among the dense underbrush. It's extremely difficult to catch it!
Now we have a strong and sturdy cage for our pets!
Tame Birds
There are so many interesting birds, but we'll need a special cage for them. I think I know where to get one!
They're so beautiful, like real things! And they'll stay perfect whatever the weather!
Glass Figurines
I love my work. I have one sculpture – glass fruits. It represents the fruits of my labor.
Simply stunning! They don't give off a fragrance, but admiring them is such a pleasure.
Glass Figurines
I love flowers but they wilt too quickly. I wish I could find a bouquet that would last for a long time.
It's like a perfect miniature version of the horse.
Glass Figurines
I learned how to ride a horse when I was young. The horse has been gone for a long time, but I'd like to honor it with a sculpture…
There. A lovely little glass piglet! It's just as good as the other figurines.
Glass Figurines
I heard that our countrymen are collecting glass figurines. I had one too, I need to find it!
Although it'll never play with me, I'm going to love it just like a real kitty!
Glass Figurines
How can I find the kitty I saw in the Sepat? It was so cute and sparkly. I need to find it!
A glass goddess figurine – this sculpture will express our tribe's love for all that is sacred!
Glass Figurines
The Ancients always honored their gods, both by building monuments to them and making small figurines!
Here is it! If you can read sheet music, this book is a treasure trove of musical knowledge!
Favorite Pastime
I heard so much wonderful music on my travels. One day I came across a special music book!
And judging by the stories in this book, good always triumphs over evil!
Favorite Pastime
When I'm taking a break from work, I read a book that my father gave me long ago. I would like to read it to you.
A picnic is a chance for peace and relaxation, and afterwards you're ready to get back to work.
Favorite Pastime
There's nothing better than filling a basket with tasty food and enjoying it in the outdoors, listening to birds and wind in the trees.
I make edible decorations for each child's plate. This makes mealtime fun!
Favorite Pastime
Cooking food for the children is a great pastime. Meals should be delicious and interesting!
I did this drawing this afternoon and it's already one of my favorites!
Favorite Pastime
I love drawing more than anything. The Lady says that my drawings are very good!
When a warrior gets enough sleep, all his reflexes are sharpened again!
Favorite Pastime
A soldier's favorite pastime after exhausting training is sleep!
Even a little exercise can boost your feeling of well-being!
Corpore Sano
I use dumbbells to stay fit! They're not very big, but I don't need to lift a lot of weight.
Wow! It's nice to have a jump rope that's my size! I'm going to be jumping with it all the time now!
Corpore Sano
I really want to learn to use jump rope but I'm still very small and jump ropes are long. I wish I could find a long one.
Wearing a sweatband makes running much more comfortable! Now I don't need to keep wiping my face!
Corpore Sano
When I'm working in the garden, I wear a sweatband to keep my eyes clear of sweat. I think it would be useful on my runs as well!
This is a great bathing suit! I'll be able to swim even when it's sweltering!
Corpore Sano
Swimming is a great way to cool down in hot weather. I need to get a bathing suit!
This mat is what we need! It will protect the children from injuries.
Corpore Sano
When children play sports, they can suffer scrapes and grazes. It would be good to have a special mat.
This bag holds all my workout clothes and it will be much easier to carry!
Corpore Sano
After training, I usually carry my dirty clothes in my hands, but this isn't very convenient! If only I could find a suitable bag…
This is the armor of the hermit warrior! But it hasn't taken any damage. That means the Tradeswoman's former husband doesn't lie here among the skeletons of fallen warriors!
Hermit Avenger
We're heading to find the place where the Tradeswoman's husband was injured. She says he was wearing leather armor. Keep an eye out, we need to find it!
I knew it. The Hermit used an old trick. He buried himself in the sand and breathed through a blowpipe until his enemies left. That's how he survived.
Hermit Avenger
I don't understand how the Hermit survived. Menes's warriors never have any mercy after a battle. Perhaps he used a blowpipe. Let's find it!
The hunter's belt has many special pockets on it. Inside lie special devices for traps designed to catch small desert creatures.
Hermit Avenger
The Hermit might have hidden in one of the secret caves. But how did he survive alone in these parts? He must have a special belt. Let's search for it!
A dangerous weapon! It looks like the Hermit became an avenger of the sands. He didn't want to return home to his wife and daughter until he'd restored his honor!
Hermit Avenger
Shame kept the Hermit from returning home. The laws of honor ordered him to become the 'scorpion'. My words will be confirmed if we find his weapon!
In this poncho, you can hide so well in the sands that even an entire unit of enemies won't notice you when they walk past. I'm sure many have been sorry for it later!
Hermit Avenger
It isn't easy to hide in the desert when all Menes's warriors are hunting you. I'm sure the Hermit must have used some special clothing. We need to find it!
For so many years I thought that my husband had fallen alongside his warriors in the desert. But he survived, and continued to fight to the very end, like a hero!
The Last Hero
The Nomad said that he'd found a path leading to my husband's hut. Will you take me there? I want to see where he lived out his last days!
