I see a little freedom did my horse well – she's raring to go. Now is just the time to saddle her up and take a ride around the city's outskirts!
Favorite Steeds
I want to go for a ride. I haven't been in the saddle for a long time, and my horse has been standing idle in the stable. Let her out to stroll around and stretch her legs!
Thanks to you, all the horses are well fed and I didn't have to interrupt my work. I have a whole lot to do nowadays!
Favorite Steeds
It's time to feed the horses in their stalls, but I haven't collected food for them or put it in their feeders – I have so much to do. Can you take care of this for me?
Those traveling merchants go out of their way to trick people. If it weren't for you, I wouldn't have gotten such a wonderful charger, and for such a good price at that!
Favorite Steeds
I've decided to buy myself a new young and strong charger. Come with me, help me pick the best horse at the market!
This warhorse is a hardy thing. He can carry a rider in full armor without tiring, and still rear up and strike enemies with its hooves. A strong beast!
Favorite Steeds
I'm planning to train a new warhorse at the training ground. Help me put some armor on it and lead it out of its stall. This is one ornery stallion!
This book contains forbidden magical formulas. One who studies them would be capable of changing the physical form of any living organism.
Magic of the Future
An old book has been found in the Hermit's home. I suspect it's one of the forbidden tracts of Menes's priests. Bring it to me!
This bone was found in the caves. I suspect it belonged to one of the altered creations of Menes's priests, and was once a normal human.
Magic of the Future
Help me find a certain ancient relic in the office. It's an old bone from some sort of giant. You'll know it as soon as you see it!
Just as I thought, this species doesn't exist in nature! It is highly poisonous. The priests created it using magic from the forbidden book.
Magic of the Future
The Nomad found a new species of some sort of plant among the Hermit's things. I need it badly. I think it's the result of the priests' experiment!
I have studied this sheep and can state with certainty that it was not created by its own. This animal is the result of magic!
Magic of the Future
An unusual sheep with a strange coloring has appeared in the Farmer's herd. The Nomad found it in the desert. Bring it to me, I'd like to see it!
I think the priests combined various species of animals and plants. It looks like they learned how to create new life on this basis!
Magic of the Future
It looks like the priests turned to knowledge of reptiles to create new species. I must confirm my suspicions. I'll need lizard eggs!
This is the future army of our enemy! Right now, this creature is in hibernation and its growth has stopped. But if there are others, and if they're still in the hands of Menes…
Child of the Priests
The Hermit destroyed all the priests. But if my suspicions are true, they'd already succeeded in making their main creation a reality. Find it!
Me work so much that my tools not take it. Need tell Chief that soon me be digging caves with bare hands.
Underground Works
Me need go search for new oricalchum ore, but my pick break. Me need new one fast. You bring one here?
There no waste in my work! Me get stone and find precious metal, but stone always useful for city too.
Underground Works
All the stone me get from tunnel go to build new homes in city. You need collect it and bring it to build sites!
The Miner sees perfectly in the darkness and has spent around a hundred years underground, but I'm still worried. There's no sense in going underground without a lantern.
Underground Works
While I was helping the Miner in the tunnel, he suddenly disappeared. I'm worried something might have happened to him. Help me find a lantern. I'll never find our friend without some light!
This ore is of excellent quality! It will make excellent new armor for the guardians of the city and our allies from the south.
Underground Works
On my instruction, the Miner has found new veins of orichalcum. I'd like to assess the ore's quality. Bring me a piece!
There are wild animals roaming the area right now, so I won't take my cows out to graze. Let them eat at home under my watchful eye instead.
Champion Milk Yield
I've prepared some fresh grass for my cows. Will you help me bale it up and roll it to the house? I can't do it alone.
The runaway cow is very willful, she won't be easy to catch. But this rope is strong enough. Hopefully I'll manage.
Champion Milk Yield
Someone forgot to shut the gates on my favorite cow's stall, and it escaped! Hurry, bring me a strong rope. I need to catch the runaway!
You managed to find my dear horned cow. She's the best in the herd and gives more milk than any of the others. I hope the stress hasn't affected her milk yield.
Champion Milk Yield
I searched all over for my cow, but couldn't find her. What if she got caught by predators? Maybe you could look for her, I'm no good as a tracker!
Nobody except me will take care of this silly cow. I'll give her a good cleaning and she'll be the most beautiful cow in the herd again.
Champion Milk Yield
Where did my cow end up? She's so dirty! Was she bathing in swamp water all this time? I need a brush to clean her sides, can you bring one?
Mom says that the Farmer has the best butter in the city because he cares about his cows better than anyone else.
Champion Milk Yield
Mom asked me to go to the Farmer and get some melted butter from him. Come with me? Mister Farmer is always so grouchy!
My children love milk from the Farmer's cows! It's the tastiest in the city!
Healthy Produce
The Farmer promised to give me a bucket of fresh milk for my wards. I'd be grateful if you could go and get it!
Thanks to you, I managed to get the goods onto the merchant ship in time. My reputation with the foreign merchants hasn't suffered.
Valuable Cargo
I need to move some valuable goods onto a merchant ship urgently, but my cart has broken a wheel. Can you find a new one and replace it?
What a beautiful feather this is! It's so colorful. I think it'll look great in my hair, all the girls will be jealous!
Sheriti's Escapades
Merchant ships have come into the port with beautiful foreign birds on board. I wouldn't mind getting a feather from such a bird. Will you help me?
I thought someone from the Guild of Shadows had robbed me. It turned out to be the usual market boys. If the Warrior finds out, he'll give them a good hiding!
Thieves at the Market
While I was solving a few problems with the merchants, someone stole my entire takings for the week! Please help me find them!
This feather is perfect for the potion! When it's ready, it will allow anyone who drinks it to float as high as the birds!
Levitation Potion
Right now I'm working on a potion of levitation, but I'm missing the last ingredient. Hurry and bring me the feather of any kind of bird!
The rose by itself is a very symbolic flower, but the white rose is special. People have always considered it a symbol of eternal and pure love!
Heavenly Flowers
I've decided to start a beautiful rose garden. To do this, I'll need to collect various types of roses. I already have a white rose. Bring it here!
Tea roses, in contrast to white ones, symbolize the exact opposite – breaking up. They remind us of feelings that once were, but are now gone…
Heavenly Flowers
I ordered a tea rose for my garden at the market. Now I need to go fetch it, but I'm busy preparing the ground! Could you get it?
I love red roses so much! I remember when the Potter first gave me some. I still don't know where he managed to get hold of these wonderful flowers…
Heavenly Flowers
The red rose is a symbol of passionate and fiery love. I'll be sure to find a place for this flower in my garden too. Hurry and bring it here!
Black roses are the favorite of those who enjoy internal strength and resiliency of spirit. But often, this flower becomes a symbol of sadness…
Heavenly Flowers
The black rose is an incredibly rare flower, but the merchants from overseas found one and brought it to the city. Hurry to the docks and get it!
We got ourselves an unparalleled flower! Look, it looks as if made of charms and mystery. A worthy decoration for the Lady's garden!
Heavenly Flowers
I've decided to help the Lady get a blue rose for her garden. With your help and a little magic, it won't be difficult. Ready to start?
Oh gods, this flower is beautiful, although it doesn't look anything like a rose. I'll give it the very best spot in my garden!
Gift of an Empress
Nimiru ordered a Chinese rose from the Eastern Empress for me. I can't wait to see it. Will you go and pick it up?
The experiment finally worked and we managed to get some tin out of the ore! Now I can start perfecting the process.
Laboratory Experiments
I'm very busy right now – I'm extracting tin from ore. It's not an easy process, so if you want to help, feel free!
Wooow, so many bugs, and they each have a name. I'd better run to the kids in the garden so we can study the collection together!
Young Naturalist Historians
Mister Master promised to give me and the other kids a collection of dried bugs. Can you go get it? We don't want to distract him from his work.
I knew those cowardly pirates would drop everything as soon as they saw the city's armed guards. They don't make pirates like they used to!
Pirate Attack
Help, hurry! Under the cover of night, pirates stole into the city and ransacked the port storehouses. We need to find them and get back what was stolen!
Thanks to this moss, I can make a balm that will stop bleeding. It'll be great if soldiers can take it with them on the march!
Medicine for Wounds
A special type of moss grows in the catacombs under the city. I really need some of it to make medicine. Hurry and get some!
First item found! Maybe we'll be able to find the rest…
Manicure Set
I took my mom's manicure set without asking and mislaid all the accessories! I'm so ashamed… Please help me restore the set.
Look! Now my nails are smooth and shiny! Just like mom's!
Manicure Set
My mom puts some oil on nails and then polishes them, this helps the nails absorb more vitamins.
I personally think that my mom's nails are the perfect length, they're beautiful!
Manicure Set
Mom says that too long nails are unattractive… What do you think?
If this stick is made of orange wood, why doesn't it smell of oranges?
Manicure Set
My mom says that these sticks are made from orange wood, so they have antiseptic properties.
It's good that this item has been found.
Manicure Set
The set contained a very light stone. Mom said it was made from lava!
I not only put the set back in its place, I also admitted to mom that I took it without asking.
Manicure Set
I really hope I can put the set back before mom notices it's missing…
You can use caviar as a face mask.
Soft Skin
Caviar strengthens the skin's protective barrier, preventing moisture loss and keeping out dirt.
You can also use this fat to strengthen hair.
Soft Skin
Cobra fat contains essential fatty acids. It makes the skin of the face, under-eye area, and cheeks suppler.
You can make a "beauty potion" from parsley root.
Soft Skin
This humble plant has earned the name "woman's herb" and it helps to keep skin looking youthful.
Coconut is good for you and smells wonderful!
Soft Skin
Coconut contains healthy vitamins that firm the skin, making it elastic and supple!
Yes, these eggs will work for my plan.
Soft Skin
Raw egg white heals burns. Apply it several times to the wound as soon as the previous layer dries.
This set must be kept in a cool place so the cream retains its properties.
Soft Skin
I use my knowledge to make a set of creams.
Thanks! This set is just the thing.
Eye Shadow Set
I want to make an eye shadow set. For applying the color, I need a set of needles.
This amount of powder will be enough!
Eye Shadow Set
For the base, we need some coal powder.
Done! A little left to do.
Eye Shadow Set
Eye shadow made from malachite is bright and beautiful. We need to grind some up.
Green and brown always look good together.
Eye Shadow Set
Eye shadow made from cacao beans will be perfect for green eyes.
I'm not sure this element will turn out well. But we can try it.
Eye Shadow Set
To give the eye shadow a tint of red, we can use red clay.
The eye shadow set is ready! And just as I ran out, too.
Eye Shadow Set
The ingredients are ready. All that remains is to mix them in the right proportions.
Ground cumin is used in sauces.
Help in the Kitchen
I'm a great cook. You don't believe me? How can I convince you?
A pinch of coriander seeds is a better wake-up than morning coffee!
Help in the Kitchen
Let's do it this way – you show me a spice and I'll say what it's used for.
Cloves are widely used in different marinades.
Help in the Kitchen
I'm waiting for the next test.
Nutmeg? It goes well with pumpkin, spinach, onion, carrot, and cabbage.
Help in the Kitchen
I wonder what you'll bring next to test me with…
Cinnamon sticks are used to season meat and vegetable dishes.
Help in the Kitchen
It's all been too easy so far…
Looks like I've proven my culinary knowledge!
Help in the Kitchen
How about a challenge? I'll identify the spices by smell with my eyes closed!
What device can make work much easier?
Working with Wood
I promised the Potter to give him a stone disk. He's set on building some kind of device. He might as well try.
The Potter was so deep in thought that he didn't even notice my arrival!
Working with Wood
The Potter was recently here, it seems he dropped this drill.
This handle will do. This is exactly what the Potter wanted!
Working with Wood
The Potter asked me to find a special wooden handle for his invention. I think I can help him out!
Nobody's ever thanked me so much for a bow without a tool!
Working with Wood
The Potter was so delighted when I told him I had a bow I didn't need!
The Potter promised that I would be the first to see the device he wants to make.
Working with Wood
I wove a thick thread for the Potter. He needs it for some sort of tool. I've never heard of such a thing!
The bow drill works! I can't wait to show it to my countrymen!
Working with Wood
If it works out, I'll make a real bow drill! I'll be able to make holes in wood and stone!
Thank you for finding them. This should be enough for all the work.
Jeweler's Kit
We'll need nails to secure the oak planks together. They were here somewhere…
I think this piece of leather will be suitable for the Master and his mechanism.
Jeweler's Kit
It won't be difficult to find a piece of leather to fulfill the Master's request.
These oak planks look solid enough. They should do.
Jeweler's Kit
We need the strongest and best-quality materials to make jewelry bellows!
Just what I need!
Jeweler's Kit
You need to use thick fabric to make bellows.
I wonder what the Master's working on.
Jeweler's Kit
First nails, now strong rope. What's all this for?
With these bellows, I'll be able to make a heap of beautiful jewelry!
Jeweler's Kit
Now I can assemble the jewelry bellows. The old ones are completely useless!
A Bastet doll is a great start to the doll collection!
Doll Collection
I want to assemble a doll collection. Nimiru said that she would get me a Bastet doll!
I really like the Nomad's doll!
Doll Collection
The Nomad said he would give me an Anubis doll! I can't wait!
I never thought the Chief would have dolls!
Doll Collection
Wow! The Chief himself gave me a Thoth doll!
I'm going to have a big collection now!
Doll Collection
The Lady decided to give me the pharaoh doll!
This doll is so pretty!
Doll Collection
I've been given a very pretty princess doll!
All the girls in the Sepat are thrilled with my collection!
Doll Collection
I have so many dolls now! I'll take them to the Sepat so the other kids can play with them too!
I've never found out what he needed the bricks for.
Help the Food Expert
The Nomad asked me to make a batch of bricks. Time to get to work!
What do you mean it's short? You don't know what I need it for…
Help the Food Expert
How can I drag this wooden door to the house?
I wonder what dish needs a grate like this.
Help the Food Expert
I would have given the metal grate away but the Nomad promised to make me some exotic dish with it…
Phew! This bag will last a long time.
Help the Food Expert
You can never have too much coal. Let's stock up on a big sack of it. Will you help me carry it?
I found a door. Everything's going to plan so far.
Help the Food Expert
Now we just need to find an iron door for the stove.
With a smokehouse like this, I'll be able to treat my friends to delicious food every day!
Help the Food Expert
In one tribe I tasted the most amazing game! The secret was cooking it in a smokehouse!
I think the Sepat boys are going to like this toy soldier too!
Toy Soldier Set
Everyone used to have a favorite toy as a kid. Mine was this toy soldier.
Our army would be undefeatable if the boys aspired to be like this guy!
Toy Soldier Set
You should know your role models from a young age! This heavy infantryman is an incredibly powerful warrior!
These agile warriors are incredibly gracious!
Toy Soldier Set
Light pikemen are mobile midrange fighters. They will never let the enemy come close to them.
Now the boys will know that defense is the most important thing in combat!
Toy Soldier Set
The heavy pikeman has impenetrable armor. Nobody can take him down!
The path of a swordsman is harsh! These warriors always risk their lives more than anyone else on the battlefield.
Toy Soldier Set
You could say that this fighter acts as the final line of defense. It's just him, the sword, and the opponent! The swordsman is a courageous warrior!
The boys were really happy!
Toy Soldier Set
So many soldiers! They need a place where they can fight their battles…
Great tool!
Farmer's Tools
I have a lot of tools, but none like this! This wooden harrow will make my life much easier!
It's a good thing I got it done in time!
Farmer's Tools
My iron plowshare has rusted through. I need a new one.
Harvesting berries with a harvester is a joy!
Farmer's Tools
For harvesting berries quickly, I have a manual harvester!
Now the planting will go well and the harvest will be great!
Farmer's Tools
For good planting, I need to sift the soil.
This harvesting scythe is just the thing I need. My old scythe got completely blunt!
Farmer's Tools
I need a special scythe to gather the harvest! It'll save plenty of time!
Working with this ard is so nice!
Farmer's Tools
I need to make a new ard – it's lighter and easier than my big bulky!
We need to give this cleaver to the Lady. She'll find a use for it in her kitchen.
Cookware
I bought a cleaver from a traveling merchant, but now I see it's better suited for the kitchen than for battle.
I think a knife like this will come in handy at the Sepat kitchen!
Cookware
I sometimes use a mincing knife in my garden. It's a universal tool!
A meat tenderizer is an essential item for any kitchen!
Cookware
I hear the whole city is equipping the Sepat kitchen. I have something useful for it too.
I'm sure this knife will come in handy to the Lady.
Cookware
To cut meat in the kitchen, you absolutely need a sharp meat knife!
This corkscrew is simple, but very reliable.
Cookware
I found a corkscrew… I'm not sure if the Lady needs it, but I'll offer it.
Now my friendly lunch is bound to succeed!
Cookware
The city's residents really helped me! Now all I need is a mortar for spices.
Yes! Great stick! Suitable for fishing and for fights with the boys!
Child's Rod
Let's make a fishing rod! First, we'll need some kind of stick.
It's so small… Is it strong enough? Alright, I'll take your word for it.
Child's Rod
I was just thinking, where will we get our hands on a hook?
I think it'll all be fine, and the thread won't break.
Child's Rod
Do you think this thread will work as a line?
With this float, we'll be able to see even the smallest fish's bite!
Child's Rod
I found a few feathers. If I paint half a feather red, it'll make a good float!
Now no fish will escape us!
Child's Rod
Today I dreamed that we got a huge fish. But it broke the line and swam off…
So boring! Sitting, watching the water, not doing anything… I'll give the rod to the boys.
Child's Rod
Hurry, let's go to the river! I got some bait.
This log is strong enough. It'll do!
Martial Might
The Warrior asked me to organize the construction of a war machine to defend the city. Are you with me?
You already did it?! Your help is priceless!
Martial Might
We need to get these blocks to the construction site.
Turned out alright, I think.
Martial Might
Using the rope, we'll attach the log to the frame.
Stained planks are as strong as they are heavy.
Martial Might
Stained planks are the strongest. It's very important to know that you can rely on your own in battle. Even if they're planks.
A few final touches, and we can perform a demonstration.
Martial Might
We'll fix the planks together with brackets. It's important to do that very carefully.
Now a question: why do we need it if we don't plan to attack anyone?
Martial Might
Strange. The Warrior said that we need the machine to defend the city… But it looks more like a siege weapon.
You may not know it, but the theater is my passion.
Theater Masks
"All the world's a stage, and all the men and women merely players!"
He who has seen death many times can be surprised only by the birth of new life.
Theater Masks
"Knowledge begins with surprise." That was in some play…
I used to love watching all kinds of funny performances even as a kid.
Theater Masks
Laughter in the theater helps us forget life's troubles for a while.
There are no wrong emotions in the theater. Disgust for murderers is completely natural.
Theater Masks
The theater helps us understand what's bad through emotions. Bad stuff makes us feel disgust and condemnation.
Anger is encountered pretty often in real life. But unfortunately, it's usually over nothing.
Theater Masks
I have a special relationship with the feeling of anger. Anger caused by lies is righteous anger!
A theater group is a great idea! Talking to children fills me with energy!
Theater Masks
Maybe I should start my own theater group? I can't devote all my time to martial arts, after all.
In all my life, I've never found a butterfly as beautiful since!
Butterfly Collection
I remember catching butterflies in my childhood. Once I got an amazingly beautiful one, a red one!
I told the Lady about that wonderful butterfly.
Butterfly Collection
This morning, near the Sepat, I saw a huge blue butterfly! It looked amazing!
Later I laughed a long time. The winged monster wasn't so threatening after all.
Butterfly Collection
I got so scared today! I heard a rustle and looked into a pot… And a huge black butterfly flew out of it!
Today a white butterfly flew circles around me, and then landed on my shoulder!
Butterfly Collection
My garden is full of butterflies. I like the white ones most – it's like they carry joy on their wings!
Those butterflies are very beautiful. A sight like that is a good sign!
Butterfly Collection
In the lands to the south of the city, there are huge multicolored butterflies.
With this net, the children can catch the butterflies they like!
Butterfly Collection
Special nets are used to carefully catch butterflies. I think I saw one in the basement!
Thanks! This is my kids' favorite teapot. They love it!
Exotic Crockery
After dinner, I placed the remains of the food in whatever I had to hand. And now there's no crockery left in the house at all!
Just in time! It just happens to be time for me to make soup for the kids!
Exotic Crockery
I put some flax seeds in the ladle. And where did I put it?
Be so kind as to put my bouquet in the vase.
Exotic Crockery
The kids brought me a huge bouquet! But I lent my vase to someone… And I can't remember who.
I'm saved! The kids would never have eaten vegetables from anything else.
Exotic Crockery
The kids eat boiled vegetables only if I serve them in the flowery pot. And I made some broccoli for lunch!
The kids love this jug. Thanks!
Exotic Crockery
The Potter has given me an unusual gift. It's a jug, but shaped like a bag!
All done! We managed in time for lunch!
Exotic Crockery
All the crockery is in place. Now we just have to put it in order.
But the turnip was so big that the elephant couldn't do it! Can you imagine?
Teamwork
Want me to tell you a story? Once, an elephant found a huge turnip and wanted to get it out of the ground!
But even together, the elephant and the ox couldn't pull the turnip out of the ground!
Teamwork
Then the elephant called an ox. They started pulling the turnip out of the ground together!
But even all three of them couldn't do it…
Teamwork
A dog was walking by. He couldn't believe his eyes when he saw that the two giants couldn't pull out the turnip!
But neither the elephant's might, nor the cat's wisdom could shift the huge turnip!
Teamwork
Then a wise cat, who had been watching the proceedings, decided to help. With advice.
The animals laughed, but agreed to try again, alongside the jerboa.
Teamwork
And then, when the team was drowning in despair, a jerboa ran by.
They pulled out the turnip! Then the animals learned that when it comes to teamwork, everyone matters! And the turnip lasted them all year.
Teamwork
The turnip bowed to the strength of the beasts, first to one side, then to the other… They pulled and pulled… And…
None could compare to the lion's strength!
The Lion and the Mouse
There once lived a lion, and he thought himself the strongest beast ever!
The donkey said it was a man. Man, he said, could force any to obey through his cunning!
The Lion and the Mouse
Once, the lion met a donkey hitched to a cart and asked who had forced him to work.
The bull told the lion of his life among people.
The Lion and the Mouse
Then the lion met a bull with his horns cut off. "Who did this?" asked the lion.
The bear told the lion that a man had defeated him by cunning and taken his teeth!
The Lion and the Mouse
The lion saw a toothless bear.
He was lying bound when a mouse spotted him.
The Lion and the Mouse
The lion decided to take vengeance against man for the cruelty. But he fell into a hunter's trap!
In joy, the lion declared that the strongest beast is not him, and not even man, but mouse!
The Lion and the Mouse
The mouse felt sorry for the bound lion. She decided to help him, and chewed through the rope.
Out of fear for his chicks, the black kite rarely left the nest.
The Black Kite and the Cat
There once lived a black kite and a cat. The black kite lived in fear that the cat would eat his chicks.
In worry for his chicks, the black kite decided to make the cat a peace offering!
The Black Kite and the Cat
As the black kite left the nest to hunt less and less, his chicks got hungrier and hungrier.
And agreed! After all, the black kite was a threat to her kittens!
The Black Kite and the Cat
The cat listened carefully to the black kite's offer of peace…
But one day, the black kite broke the peace and attacked one of the kittens. It barely survived!
The Black Kite and the Cat
The kittens and the chicks lived peacefully for a long time.
Only on reaching the nest did the black kite notice that a burning coal had been carried with the prey.
The Black Kite and the Cat
The gods sent the black kite a cruel punishment. One day, the black kite brought the chicks some meat right from the spit over a fire!
A similar fate from the gods awaits people who break their word!
The Black Kite and the Cat
The black kite managed to save his chicks, but the nest burned!
The Pharaoh trusted the architect and commissioned him to build a treasury.
Greedy Architect
I want to tell you the legend of a certain architect…
The architect told nobody of the secret entrance in the treasury.
Greedy Architect
The architect conscientiously built the treasury. But he also made a secret passageway in it.
The sons stole the silver through the secret passageway. And they saw the many other beautiful treasures in the Pharaoh's possession.
Greedy Architect
One day, the architect decided that he had earned a rich old age. He sent his sons to steal a sack of silver from the treasury.
Little did the brothers know that the Pharaoh had learned of the theft from his treasury!
Greedy Architect
Getting into the treasury turned out to be so easy that the architect's sons gave in to their greed and decided to steal again.
The younger brother managed to escape, but the Pharaoh captured the elder. And to punish him, he locked him in a cage on the square!
Greedy Architect
The Pharaoh ordered a trap placed in the treasury. And the next evening, the elder brother fell into it!
The brothers had to find themselves a new home in other lands. And they never gave in to greed again!
Greedy Architect
With cunning, the younger brother managed to drug the guards, and they fell asleep. Then he freed the elder, and together they ran.
The southlanders train their zebras from birth. They aren't like the ones that roam the savannah in herds. They're as fearless as warhorses!
Southern Troops
Our allies from the south have already arrived in the city. They look strange. Want to see the southlanders' cavalry? Come, I'll show you their racehorse zebras!
The saber of the southlanders is lighter and longer than the khopesh. But when I saw this weapon in battle, I realized that it is faster and far more dangerous than my blade!
Southern Troops
I have a small gift for you – I bought it from one of the southlanders. It's a rider's curved saber. Want to try it out at the training ground?
It worked! This is the bow of a southlander warrioress. Only a very strong person can use it. Enemies have nowhere to hide from its deadly arrows!
Southern Troops
I need your help to string a battle bow. To tell you the truth, I'm not strong enough to bend it on my own!
This ox surely strikes fear into the heart of the enemy in battle! What sort of a woman must its rider be if she's capable of controlling this fierce animal?
Southern Troops
Help me lead the Lady of the South's battle ox into the stable. It's a very strong and willful creature! I can't handle it alone.
The coconut bolas is an excellent throwing weapon. One careful throw and it can immobilize any opponent, and even hopple an enemy horse!
Southern Troops
One of the southern warrioresses taught me to make a traditional weapon of their people out of coconuts. It's called a bolas. Want to test it out?
Once, Menes annihilated all the warriors of the south. Then this brave lady took sword in hand and inspired many of her nation's women to fight!
Amazon Queen
I want to introduce you to the Lady of the South! I'm glad that she has become our ally in the fight against Menes's army. She is a beautiful woman and a deadly warrior!
When you have a few kids in the family, washing doesn't take so much time. But when you have around a hundred little tearaways, it's a full day's work!
Chore Day
It's time to start washing the children's things. They've really piled up recently. Hurry and fetch me a washtub, and make it a big one!
I love taking care of the kids from the Sepat. All of them have lost their parents, and now I'm like a father to them. And they're always willing to help me out!
Chore Day
Help me with building materials – I need to gather them up and take them to the yard of the Sepat. The building's roof has worsened, I want to hurry and repair it!
An excellent broom, nice and solid. I hope it lasts longer than the old one. A little effort and the room will be clean and tidy again!
Chore Day
After the roof repairs, the room is full of debris. And my little ones broke the broom. Go to the market for a new one, I need to sweep up!
This kangaroo has a dislocated paw. I can take care of it, and in a week he'll be leaping about as if nothing happened!
Chore Day
My children found an injured kangaroo not far from the city and they want to bring it home to nurse it back to health. Help them, we can't abandon a sick animal!
The people of the Falcon tribe were brave. They didn't fear to fight, but preferred uneasy peace to a good war. For this, the Ancients gave them the Book of Existence.
Wild Tribes
I often see members of the Falcon tribe. Their chief received the Book of Existence from the Ancients and united the wild tribes. Let's take a look at them!
This tribe inhabited the swampy lowlands and brought terrible sacrifices to their totem beast. The warriors of the fierce Crocodile were merciless to their enemies!
Wild Tribes
In the olden days, the tribes constantly warred amongst themselves. Now we'll take a look at one of the most dangerous tribes of that time – the Crocodile tribe!
The Cobra tribe was famous for its dark priestesses. They didn't shy away from using the most wicked magic to achieve their treacherous ends!
Wild Tribes
Back in those ancient times, there were tribes led by women. Want to see how the people of one of those tribes lived?
For the people of the Elephant tribe, family always came first. But in battle, any member of this tribe could hold their own against a dozen enemies!
Wild Tribes
Among the ancient tribes, the members of the small Elephant tribe achieved particular respect. Let's take a look at the day-to-day lives of these extraordinary people!
The people of this tribe were never warriors, and they needed protection. On the other hand, in those days none but they possessed the secrets of farming!
Wild Tribes
Do you know of the Antelope tribe? Its chief was the first to make peace with the Falcon tribe. You're about to learn why!
In spite of their different customs, the five tribes acknowledged their unity under the sun. Thanks to the scripture of the Book of Existence, they united into one people!
Great Unification
You and I have seen the most influential tribes of the Dark Times before the gods came. Now let's see how they became one people!
Now it's all clear – the thief used a sharpened coin. Nobody even noticed how he cleverly cut the purses from their belts!
Trickster's Weapon
A clever pickpocket has appeared at the market and already robbed dozens of townsfolk. I don't understand how he does it. Will you help me figure it out?
These thieves were not servants of the Shadow, otherwise they'd have given us a run for our money. Now all the members of the gang are locked up!
Raid on Thieves
Gangs of thieves have taken up residence in the city. My scouts have found out where their dens are. I plan to organize a raid at night. Join in!
Silent shoes are an invention of the Guild of Shadows. The guild itself is no more, but its tools of crime are still used by criminals.
Investigation
Someone robbed the Brewer in the night. The thief crept into the house so quietly that its owner heard nothing. Will you help me solve the mystery of the silent thief?
The thief didn't even know the value of this coin. It was minted in the year of the great victory of Amenhotep over the nomadic barbarian tribes!
Coin Collector
The silent thief took many valuables from the house, but among them was a certain unusual coin. We need to get it back, whatever it takes. Will you help?
Cranberries are very good for you. They don't grow in these parts, but merchants often bring them from the northern lands.
Abundance of Berries
There are lots of berries this season. I'm thinking of making something tasty out of them for the kids. If you want to help, head to the market and grab some cranberries!
I hope the Farmer didn't grumble too much about the strawberries? He often sings the praises of his harvest and then doesn't want to share it without making a profit.
Abundance of Berries
My dish will require many strawberries. They'll be the main ingredient. Go see the Farmer, he promised to share his berry harvest!
My children often sneak out of the Sepat to snack on blueberries. They come back so grubby that it's obvious where they've been.
Abundance of Berries
It seems an abundance of blueberries are growing near the Nomad's house. Go there and gather up as many as you can for the new dish!
I already know what sort of dish I'll make for the kids – berry soup. Blackberries will give it a special, unforgettable taste.
Abundance of Berries
The Beekeeper promised to share some blackberries for my new dish. He's already picked them, all you have to do is visit the old man and get them!
There, all the ingredients for the berry soup are ready and I can start cooking!
Abundance of Berries
You can collect gooseberries for the soup right in our garden. That's if the children haven't already picked all the gooseberry bushes clean, of course!
My grandmother shared her recipe for berry soup with me a long time ago. She always said it's a very healthy dish. The children are sure to like it!
New Dish
Making a berry soup is not easy. Each type of berry has to be prepared in a special way, so I'm going to need your help!
This should be more than enough pay for the goods from the foreign merchants. When will they learn how to mint coins..?
Market Relations
The southern merchants still accept only the old currency for goods – utens. Hurry and trade some from one of the citizens for coins!
I've been trading with foreign merchants for a long time now. Fruits and vegetables grow in their country that we unfortunately don't get here.
Market Relations
A ship of food from overseas has arrived in the city. Go to it, make a deal with the merchants and pick up the bought goods!
My bees have done a good job, as always. The honey I collected will be enough to send plenty to the market and still have some left over for the kids from the Sepat.
Market Relations
The Tradeswoman asked me to take her lots of fresh honey to sell. Bring me a set of weights, I want to weigh what I collected last time!
Sheriti decided to play with the koala, and then forgot to lock its cage. It's a good thing we found the little thing and managed to get it onto the Empress's ship!
Market Relations
The Chief has decided to give the Eastern Empress a cute little koala as a gift. But it's disappeared somehow. Hurry and find it!
The ring-necked parrot is a clever bird! I had one myself once. They're always obedient and can even be taught to speak.
Colorful Parrots
A foreign emissary brought a cage full of unusual parrots as a gift for the chief, but lost it. We need to catch the feathered creatures. Will you help?
This is one of the happiest birds I know – so upbeat and talkative! I've often seen Ara parrots on pirate ships. Pirates keep them for amusement.
Colorful Parrots
I learned all the names of all the different types of missing parrots from the emissary. This should make our search a lot easier. Let's catch the first one – an Ara parrot!
Finding this little parrot wasn't easy. The little Lory decided to make its home among the rustling scrolls in the Master's house. It clearly likes them!
Colorful Parrots
We must find a Lory parrot! You'll recognize it right away, it's a very small and speckled bird. It likes to make its home in tree hollows!
The Jaco imitates human speech better than any other parrot. And the Beekeeper turned out to be the perfect conversation partner for this little bird.
Colorful Parrots
The Jaco parrot is a plain gray bird with a bright red tail. It's the most talkative parrot I've ever seen. Let's try and find it!
We barely found this little Corella. Their defensive ability is to blend in with their surroundings, protecting them from large predators.
Colorful Parrots
The Corella parrot is similar in color to the Jaco, but with a crest sticking out of its head. This little thing is so hard to spot that it won't be easy to find!
The Jaco parrot talked to Sheriti and convinced her to release all the birds. When she realized what she'd done, she got scared and decided to hide the cage!
Royal Gift
We managed to find all the parrots, but we never found their cage. The emissary said that it was made of pure gold. Where could it be?
The stranger bought an old boat from some fishermen. It turns out all traces of him disappear at the port. This person will appear again in the city, you'll see!
Stranger
A suspicious man came into the brewery. He asked many questions and paid in small coins only. Who might it have been?
The key to my chest in the hold! It's broken, and the chest is empty. Someone crept onto the ship in broad daylight and carried off all the captured pirate gold!
Daring Robbery
I heard some sort of noise in the hold, but all the sailors are on leave. I think someone crept onto the ship. Let's go and find out!
The old fishing boat isn't as fast as mine. The thief realized that he couldn't carry off all the gold, so he threw it onto the shore.
Daring Robbery
I saw an old fishing boat in the distance. It might belong to the thief that cleaned out the ship's hold. We have to catch up with him and get the gold back!
Looks like the thief's tracks. But they cut off suddenly. It's all quicksand further on. It may be that the stolen gold brought an end to the thief here…
Daring Robbery
The thief nonetheless managed to keep a small bag of money and hid in the jungle. We need to find the villain's tracks and catch him!
This is Jasmine's comb! So it wasn't just a dream. She must really be waiting for me at the shore.
Another Life
Recently, I saw a vision of Jasmine on the shore. She was combing her hair with a comb made of shell. Could it really be her?
I'm sure that harp belongs to Jasmine! My beloved often played it for me when we sat on the shore in the evenings.
Another Life
Every day I hear the charming sound of a harp from the sea. Jasmine loved to play this melody for me. I don't know where the music is coming from!
It can't be… this is the pearl I personally caught from the ocean for Jasmine. Now I'm absolutely certain that my beloved is still alive!
Another Life
Let's take a stroll along the shore! I think Jasmine left some other signs for me that we need to find before we can meet with her.
Irrawaddy dolphins always live in groups, but this one is all alone. It's showing us the way, it wants us to swim after it – clever animal!
Another Life
I started to notice an Irrawaddy dolphin not far from the shore. It's as if it wants to tell us something. Let's try to get closer!
This is the magical potion that sirens use to bewitch the sailors they lure. Could Jasmine really want me to drink it..?
Another Life
The Irrawaddy dolphin pointed out the entrance to an underwater cave. Something is glimmering dimly at the bottom… Could you dive down and see what it is?
Now Jasmine belongs to the sea, but she still loves me. My beloved came to me to warn me of a danger threatening the city…
Meeting of Lovers
When I drank the magic potion, I heard Jasmine's call. She has become a siren and wants to meet with me. Will you help me find the way to her?
I hope that all go well and Baker not injured. Much work to do, but we surely rescue friend!
Clearing Rocks
Baker trapped in one of unfinished mineshafts. Entrance there blocked with rocks. Hurry and bring me leather apron, me need start work!
Together we work faster than me expect. Rocks gone, but me not find Baker in cave. Where he go?
Clearing Rocks
While me clear rocks in cave and strengthen walls, you help me carry building material. Work time!
The Baker must have dropped this candle when he realized it was no longer useful. It went out very recently. Our friend must be somewhere nearby!
On the Baker's Heels
It looks like the Baker didn't wait to be dug out, and left to find an exit himself. We have to find out where he went and save him!
I feel like I've never eaten anything so delicious as these wheat cakes. It's so good to feel alive again… and full!
Great Hunger
Finally, freedom! Ugh, I got so hungry while wandering the abandoned caves. I wouldn't mind some fresh cake right now!
The deepwater folk use these terrible creatures as bloodhounds. Jasmine warned me that our enemies would soon rise from the depths again!
Enemy of the Depths
A horrible fish has appeared on our shores. If I'm not mistaken, these kinds live in the very depths of the ocean. We have to catch it!
Octopus ink is a dangerous poison used by the deepwater folk to poison people. Then they carry them off to their slave galleys!
Enemy of the Depths
One of my regular clients fell ill after some vagrant poured a black liquid into his beer. Find out what it was!
The stranger dropped his blade, leapt into the water and disappeared. I think it was one of the deepwater folk. His unusual sword was made from the nose of a swordfish.
Enemy of the Depths
A guard noticed a stranger in the crowd with an odd sword. This person might be dangerous, we need to disarm him at once!
The Eye of the Depths is a magical stone in the shape of a fish eye. The deepwater folk often use it to spy on their enemies.
Enemy of the Depths
I saw a spy of the deepwater folk who was tracking townsfolk using a magical eye. We need to take this item from him at once!
We managed to save the guard from his fate as a blind weapon of the enemy. Who knows what crime the deepwater folk would have ordered him to commit…
Enemy of the Depths
The deepwater folk can control people using parasitic remoras. I think I saw one on the back of the neck of one of the guards. We need to check it out!
I think this is a statuette of the Deepwater Lord, whom they call the Many-Armed God. Even I find its image terrifying…
Many-Armed God
The guards finally caught one of the deepwater folk in the city. He had a horrifying statuette with him. You need to see it at once!
Sometimes, a giant sea turtle appears on the shores in the twilight. The townspeople say it can answer any single question, and its answer is always the purest truth!
Alehouse Tale
Strange things happen in the city when dusk falls. Do you know the story about the twilight turtle? Then take a seat and listen!
The deepwater folk suddenly emerged from the sea and attacked us like vicious sharks! We barely managed to repel an enemy's ferocious attack.
Arrogant Attack
Hurry, to arms! The deepwater folk have attacked the city. We must repel their attack whatever it takes, every blade is critical!
This is a magical seal of oblivion! Show it to a deepwater denizen and it will stop him in his tracks. With its help, we'll finally catch our enemies.
Efficient Means
Catching the deepwater spies is no easy feat. They dive into the sea, and then it's useless to follow them. But there is one way… Will you help me?
This is my lucky horseshoe! But how did you find it? Now my business is sure to turn around and all will be well again!
Brewer's Talisman
My business isn't going so well. The beer is sour, the regulars have stopped coming. It's all because I lost my talisman. Will you help me find it?
Black peppercorns are the fruits of a tropical vine. They're mainly used as a spice for meat dishes.
Burning Delicacies
The festival of hot peppers is beginning in the city. I have to prepare to participate and collect some rare types of peppers. Will you help me?
Look at the shape of this pepper – there's a reason it's called 'dragon's tongue'. You can make very hot sauces out of it!
Burning Delicacies
It looks like the Farmer has already started preparing for the festival of hot peppers! Well then, I'd better not lag behind. Let's find the hottest species!
There are legends about this pepper. Wild tribes from across the sea used the fiery volcano pepper to make a deadly concoction for their prisoners!
Burning Delicacies
The foreign merchants have brought a rare species of pepper to the city – the 'fiery volcano'. Negotiate a purchase with them, I need it for the festival!
There was a belief in my tribe that only the most passionate women in the village could eat this hot pepper!
Burning Delicacies
Do you know anything about the 'white lightning' pepper? Oh, it's the favorite treat of women from my tribe. Let's collect a few for the festival!
This pepper looks completely harmless. If you try a little piece of it, you won't feel anything. The hot aftertaste comes on much later!
Burning Delicacies
The most foul type of pepper is the 'green firework'. Let's go and buy a few at the market, and I'll tell you all about its insidiousness!
The people who grow and harvest these peppers take a great risk. They even wear special protective clothing and wraps for their face!
For the Enthusiast
Help me find the rarest species of pepper for the festival – the 'Trinidad scorpion'. Nature has never created anything hotter!
With your help, I'll brew up a batch of my famous beer for my customers faster than you could drink a pint. I won't allow their cups to run dry.
Secrets of Brewing
The beer in my cellars is coming to an end – I need to brew a new batch. I'll get everything ready while you collect some hops!
Everybody thinks that all kinds of beer are easy to brew, but no. Using these ingredients, we'll add some variety to the taste of our beverage!
Secrets of Brewing
The beer is brewing, but I'm missing a few key ingredients that give my ale its trademark taste. Hurry and collect them!
If you don't mix the beer during the brewing process, it turns out less delicious. I should know!
Secrets of Brewing
The brewing process is going on schedule. It'll be done soon. Now is just the time to mix the brew. Hurry and bring a spoon!
Ah, there's nothing better than a mug of fresh beer after a hard day's work, with a portion of nuts to boot! It's time for us to taste the fruits of our labor.
Secrets of Brewing
The new beer is ready! Hurry and call the townspeople to enjoy this divine beverage. And don't forget to bring some nuts from the cellar!
What a clutz I am, I dropped the key to the barn right in my vegetable plots and didn't notice. I need to hurry and get the harvest under cover, the sun is scorching today.
Lost Keys
I was just about to take my harvest to the barn when I realized that I'd lost the key to the gates. Will you help me find it?
Thank the gods, the key turned up in the girls' room. They love to borrow jewelry from me to dress up in front of the mirror.
Lost Keys
One of the children took the key to my chest of jewelry out of my room. I need to find it fast, before it gets into the wrong hands!
Thanks to you, we managed to find out who stole the key to the dungeon and get it back. The city thief has a long time behind bars to think about what he did!
Lost Keys
I always carry the key to the dungeon on my belt, but now it's gone. Maybe one of the thieves thought to set his friends free. We need to get to the bottom of it!
The thief will be amazed when the stolen key doesn't fit the lock on the treasury doors. My warriors will quickly capture him while he fumbles with the key.
Lost Keys
A robber stole into my chambers and took the key to the city treasury. We need to change the lock at once and make a new key!
My key! If it weren't for you, I'd have had to sleep on the street with my beloved bees instead of in my warm bed.
Lost Keys
Ah, I had such a good time drinking a pint of ale with the Brewer that now I can't find the key to my house. Maybe you can help?
These keys will fit any lock in case of emergency. You keep them for now – away from the nimble hands of thieves!
Skeleton Keys
I've thought of a great way to help the townspeople that often lose their keys. Want to participate in a little magic?
The Master wants clay patterns on the new city buildings. I'm exactly the person to take on the job of making them!
Day in the Life of the Potter
I need to help the Master make diagrams for some future city buildings. I'm going to need some compasses. Get me some!
Great work! This jug will be placed in the chambers of Nimiru herself. I think she'll love it!
Day in the Life of the Potter
I'm finishing the work on my new jug. I heard you draw quite well – could you help me decorate it?
The thief must have hidden the money in the hiding place to return for it later. But thanks to you, we got it all back, down to every last coin!
Treacherous Thievery
Someone stole the money that I've been collecting so long to build new city buildings with. Will you help me find it?
I hope this protective statue protects my wife and our wards from trouble. Let the strength of Ra awaken within it!
Day in the Life of the Potter
I decided to put a protective falcon statuette above the entrance to the Sepat. It's ready – all we need to do is raise it up there and fix it on. Will you help me?
Yarrow looks beautiful even after it has been dried!
Herbarium Collection
I want to make a present for the Lady. She loves flowers, so I'll assemble a herbarium for her!
An excellent sample!
Herbarium Collection
I like how dried clover looks like… I think it will complement the gift very nicely.
The tulip is really pretty, but the Lady is even more beautiful!
Herbarium Collection
The delicate tulip will serve as a symbol of the Lady's beauty…
Peat moss will make a nice addition to the present.
Herbarium Collection
You can find some remarkably beautiful moss near bodies of water! It's as soft the Lady's gaze.
Oxeye daisies may be plain-looking, but their appearance conceals strength and tenderness.
Herbarium Collection
We need to find something as amiable as my beloved.
My beloved was absolutely delighted by my gift! All that effort was not in vain.
Herbarium Collection
All that's left is to assemble it all together.
Red is the symbol of love and happiness… By the way, do you remember your first love?
Painting with Sand
Painting with sand helps me collect my thoughts. Want me to show you? Let's get everything ready!
Golden yellow is the symbol of spirit and wisdom.
Painting with Sand
Sand flowing through your fingers resembles the rapid flow of life. It helps us remember what is truly important.
I often use this color in paintings.
Painting with Sand
Green is the symbol of life. It reminds us of willpower, perseverance, and stability.
I dyed some sand into this color as well.
Painting with Sand
In many cultures, blue symbolizes the sky and eternity.
Black symbolizes the arcana and the unknown. You've heard of "mysteries shrouded in darkness," haven't you?
Painting with Sand
When I have some tough decisions to make, but find it hard to collect my thoughts, I start painting with black sand…
This turned out pretty good for the first time!
Painting with Sand
It's time you draw something too. Give it a go! It's not hard!
I'm sure this gutter will do just fine!
Windmill
I know a way to perfect the flour-production process. Let's start with a gutter!
Tar-soaked fabric doesn't allow air to pass through it.
Windmill
We need to find a light yet sturdy fabric and then soak it in tar!
The Lady sewed a whole batch! Thank you for bringing everything here.
Windmill
It's time to get someone to sew the flour bags. I could probably ask the Lady to do it.
I hope the sails won't break when the windmill starts working.
Windmill
I asked the Potter to make the windmill sails. Perhaps he's already finished the job?
The mechanism has been delivered. Did they tell you how to install it?
Windmill
The Nomad will be collecting a special mechanism from my friend's workshop. My friend is good at sciences, and he's also a talented inventor.
We did it! Now we'll be able to produce flour at a faster rate.
Windmill
The construction of the windmill will be complete soon. Just a little left to do!
I always have this item in my kitchen.
Stockpot Set
Colander stockpots are often used during cooking.
I can fit a low stockpot on any shelf in my kitchen!
Stockpot Set
In my opinion, the low stockpot is the most convenient to use!
This stockpot has been serving me for years!
Stockpot Set
No food will ever be able to escape from the tall stockpot during cooking!
No preserved food has ever gone bad before being eaten!
Stockpot Set
I use the wide stockpot when sterilizing containers for preserved food.
I love cooking for the whole family. I would like to invite you for dinner tonight.
Stockpot Set
A large stockpot is the saving grace of a large family! You'll never be able to feed everyone if you use something smaller when cooking!
They are so heavy! Thank you for your help!
Stockpot Set
We need to bring all these stockpots back into the house.
Thank you for agreeing to draw with me.
Chalk Set
I feel really sad… Would you mind drawing some chalk pictures with me?
Is it okay if I draw the sky? I love drawing it…
Chalk Set
It's more interesting to draw using different kinds of chalks than just drawing with one.
You can draw anything you like with colored chalks!
Chalk Set
I added some red clay to the chalk. All that's left is to dry it and the red chalk will be ready!
You can draw grass and flowers with this chalk!
Chalk Set
You can make green dye for chalk from many different kinds of plants.
The pollen that we've added to the chalk gives off a magnificent scent!
Chalk Set
The pollen that bees gather can be used for dyeing the chalk yellow.
I didn't even notice how we've assembled a whole chalk set.
Chalk Set
No, I am not tired of drawing yet… I'll put all the chalks away myself when I'm done.
This tool is used for contouring.
Chisel Set
I want to learn wood carving. I found some notes on the craft in the library.
I'll have the entire set very soon at this rate!
Chisel Set
Okay, what else do we need… Right, a heavy-duty chisel is the next item on the list.
I'll never become a true wood-carver without a gooseneck chisel!
Chisel Set
The bent blade ensures the handle doesn't touch the surface you're carving.
Spoon chisels come in all shapes and sizes: they can be flat, semicurved, or gooseneck!
Chisel Set
Spoon chisels can be distinguished from their regular counterparts by their curved blade.
Looks like I can already begin honing my skills!
Chisel Set
This chisel is used more often than its appearance might suggest.
These chisels are excellent!
Chisel Set
I can't wait to test these tools in action!
This is exactly what I needed!
Glassblower's Tools
I found some scrolls on glassblowing. Please give this shears diagram to the blacksmith.
The Nomad got these in a trade with a merchant of a certain tribe. He only paid two jugs for them!
Glassblower's Tools
I am going to need a pair of glassblowing shears.
Excellent! This is just what I needed!
Glassblower's Tools
Tongs are mandatory when working with high temperatures. The Potter must have the right item…
I'm glad that the item is in great condition.
Glassblower's Tools
I saw this rare item in the Farmer's barn. That's not where it's supposed to be!
Okay, fine, I agree. There was no need for the stamp.
Glassblower's Tools
Every glassblower has a unique stamp. What does vanity have to do with this?
I can only imagine what kind of exquisite items real craftsmen made.
Glassblower's Tools
Now I can proceed to study the craft in great detail!
I got this hammer in a trade with foreign merchants a long time ago.
The Art of Blacksmithing
The Warrior said that the blacksmith's apprentice needed some tools. It's good that I have an old forging hammer in my possession!
The tongs are as essential to a blacksmith as the hammer!
The Art of Blacksmithing
What's a blacksmith without tongs? The blacksmith's apprentice is going to need this tool!
These shears cut through metal as if it's paper!
The Art of Blacksmithing
A blacksmith's work does not just consist of hitting metal objects with a hammer. You also need a special kind of shears.
This hammer is made specially for minting. It's not used for anything else!
The Art of Blacksmithing
Every blacksmith needs a special hammer for minting. Good thing I'm a provident person, so I have one!
Blacksmith nippers are capable of biting through rather thick metal pieces!
The Art of Blacksmithing
I got these nippers in a trade with a tribe that lives to the north of here. I'm sure the blacksmith's apprentice will find them useful.
It wasn't just the apprentice who thanked me, but his master too.
The Art of Blacksmithing
The blacksmith's apprentice is going to be really happy! Now he'll be able to learn all the intricacies of the art of blacksmithing.
There are forks with two, three, or four prongs! I never knew there were so many different kinds!
Fork Set
The Lady has told me that there are many different kinds of forks. I wonder what they are all used for…
I'm a simple person who uses some cutlery types very rarely, but I still think the salad fork is very convenient to use!
Fork Set
Out of all the forks I use the one for salads most often. It's easy to use when eating other kinds of dishes, and that's why I think it's the best!
The fruit fork is not meant to be used for other kinds of food, but it does serve its purpose pretty well!
Fork Set
I like the fruit fork because of its shape! It only has two prongs, but that's all you need for eating fruit!
The olive fork may look weird, but it does its job pretty well!
Fork Set
The fact that there exists a special fork for olives was a revelation to me! It doesn't even look like a fork…
Eating fish with this fork is so easy! You'll never drop a single bite.
Fork Set
In my opinion, the fish fork is a wonderful cutlery item. It's easy to use, and there's nothing excessive about it either.
I keep this set safe for special occasions.
Fork Set
I got this wonderful fork set from my grandmother. It contains some of the most essential pieces of cutlery for setting the table.
This tool is extremely handy when laying bricks!
Bricklayer's Kit
The Chief wants to gather up some tools for the new bricklayer! I think this jointer is just what we need!
This trowel will make life easier for the new bricklayer!
Bricklayer's Kit
The new bricklayer needs a bricklayer's trowel. How else would he clear away the excess mortar?
This set square will help the bricklayer lay bricks at any angle!
Bricklayer's Kit
Without a set square, it'll be very hard for the young bricklayer to lay angles. It's a good thing I have a spare set square…
This zigzag rule's helped me many times! I hope it'll come in handy for the bricklayer's work!
Bricklayer's Kit
What will the new bricklayer use to make measurements? You know, I have a zigzag rule around here somewhere!
A mallet always comes in handy for a bricklayer's work!
Bricklayer's Kit
The bricklayer needs a special mallet! One that will let him work even more precisely!
The bricklayer thanked us for collecting tools so quickly, and he's already started work!
Bricklayer's Kit
All the tools are collected! Now the new bricklayer can get to work! We were the ones who made it possible!
I hope this catheter stays unused.
Surgeon's Tools
My father has decided to assemble a surgical kit. Misfortune might befall any of us, so such a kit could always come in handy.
This spoon has a rather unusual form. But then, it's not something you use every day either…
Surgeon's Tools
We'll need a special kind of spoon for the surgical kit.
The blacksmith made an excellent scalpel! I'm sure the Chief will be pleased.
Surgeon's Tools
It sure took me a long time to explain to the blacksmith how exactly the scalpel is supposed to look like! Must be because he's used to making bulky swords.
I've sterilized the forceps so they should be usable now.
Surgeon's Tools
Forceps aren't restricted to the ones you use for grasping something in the furnace – surgeons have a special kind for performing their work too!
You can perform some really delicate work with these tweezers!
Surgeon's Tools
A surgeon needs a pair of tweezers for extremely delicate work! I received one of these in a trade with a foreign merchant.
My father used to say, "Always be ready for all sorts of trouble." I try to follow his advice!
Surgeon's Tools
The kit is complete. All that's left is to clean all the tools thoroughly.
This type of wood is extremely valuable because of its rich color.
Luxurious Decor
The Nomad wants to gather expensive wood for trading with other tribes. I think amaranth would do just fine.
It's as if this wood has been painted by a skilled artist.
Luxurious Decor
Guaiacum wood has a really pretty texture. Some tribes would pay a hefty sum for it!
Certain combinations of black and white can make for some really interesting art.
Luxurious Decor
Have you ever come across a plant species known as the granadilla? Its two-color wood is really peculiar.
Rosewood has the most distinguishable appearance of all types of wood when used in decor.
Luxurious Decor
Rosewood has the brightest texture, no matter what they say! It's as if the patterns just pierce the table all the way through.
The main thing about using ebony is knowing when enough is enough!
Luxurious Decor
Ebony is often used in expensive works as it's perfect for accentuating the necessary elements!
Wood is one of the most beautiful elements of decor!
Luxurious Decor
We've gathered enough of expensive materials. Now I can trade them with other tribes in exchange for some useful items!
This is exactly what the Lady was asking for.
Nature's Colors
The Lady has asked me to gather some red elderberries. She wants to show us what kind of paints you can make from plants!
The Sepat children will have some brown paint now!
Nature's Colors
I know that many people make brown paint from lichen. Finding some is not that hard and neither is making paint from it.
Horsetails can grow anywhere – in a heath or even in your garden!
Nature's Colors
It's best to make green paint from horsetails. The color of such paint usually turns out bright, rich, and fade-resistant.
It's almost impossible to find any blackberries in gardens. There's loads of them in forests though!
Nature's Colors
The children are going to need some blackberries for the blue. They are not just tasty and good for you – their color doesn't fade so easily too.
Another important property of wormwood is that it's a great insect repellant!
Nature's Colors
I know what I could use to make some yellow paint for the children. Wormwood flowers have a bright yellow color, and that's exactly what I need.
I selected the most suitable ingredients for making paints. The children will be happy!
Nature's Colors
The children and citizens have brought so many different kinds of plants and berries! I don't even know how long it's going to take me to make all of these paints.
I thought this baking mold was gone for good! I'm going to try and restore some of those old traditions!
Baking Molds
I remember a time when people used to bake pies of all kinds of shapes! I loved the hare ones – they had cabbage inside!
I sometimes use this mold for baking. Shame I don't cook with it as often as I used to.
Baking Molds
Yes, indeed! I remember how my mother used to bake fish pies shaped like lobsters! Eating them was a lot of fun!
I used to love turtle-shaped pies! From now on, I'll make them more often!
Baking Molds
I remember eating turtle-shaped pies with a nut filling as a kid. It's my childhood's fondest memory! The pies had an awesome mold!
Some hearts would taste really sweet, and then you'd come across a really hot pepper in the next one!
Baking Molds
I remember how ladies used to bake heart-shaped pies all the time. They had some of the most extraordinary kinds of filling inside!
Kids used to love "shearing" sheep like these!
Baking Molds
Sheep pies had icing on them. This made it seem like they were growing white wool!
It was nice to watch the citizens recalling moments from their childhood while tasting the pies.
Baking Molds
Now that the citizens have brought me these molds, I'll be able to bake all kinds of pies!
There we go. Swinging my axe is not the only thing I can do! The lioness looks very much like its living counterpart.
Sand Figures
Sometimes it's good to distract yourself from the military stuff and take part in a sand art contest.
A fat, massive hippo. It's as if it's frozen still to rest in the sun!
Sand Figures
So many interesting ideas! I'll make a hippo!
I wouldn't survive a day without this item.
Sand Figures
Everyone is molding these wondrous animals, but I'm going to make the one that often helps me out in the garden!
The lizard turned out rather nice! I think many people are going to like my work.
Sand Figures
I'd like to make a lizard – it's the symbol of inner peace, after all.
The dragon turned out menacing and mighty-looking.
Sand Figures
I want to surprise the people of my tribe by making dragon out of sand. I learnt about these creatures during my travels.
The citizens really liked the castle. We should hold contests like these more often!
Sand Figures
I would really love to build a large castle. It will become the symbol of home and unity for all our people.
The wide stalks and interesting calamus flowers will give the pond an air of wildness!
River Plants
Father wants to make an artificial pond. I think calamus will be the right thing to make it look real!
I hope the Chief will appreciate the water caltrop in his pond!
River Plants
What's a pond without water caltrop? We need to find this plant and give it to the Сhief!
Although sedge is considered a weed, everything has its place!
River Plants
Some sedge would look great by the pond.
Water weed is an unusual plant. It'll reveal the beauty of the artificial pond's waters!
River Plants
We can plant a wonderful thing on the edge of the pond – water weed! It'll decorate the clear waters!
I found the biggest lily ever! I hope the Chief will like this natural decoration!
River Plants
I know what I'll give the Chief for his pond! Lily is just the right flower that should decorate any pond!
This pond is the loveliest ever! The citizens and I really did our best!
River Plants
What an amazing artificial pond I'm going to have! I just need to arrange the decorations properly!
The baboons are trained and equipped with special armor.
War Animals
I've heard there is a tribe that uses war baboons in battle. Can you imagine? Baboons!
Wolves are hard to tame, but they are as easy to train as dogs.
War Animals
My father once told me that he'd seen a war wolf among the enemy troops. It was handling the task before it no worse than humans.
The war boars have destroyed the enemy troops in mere seconds!
War Animals
The war boar is the most unusual military animal I know. I mean, no one expects a living battering ram running rampant on the battlefield.
All you can do is pray if you encounter a war panther on the battlefield!
War Animals
The agile and deadly war panther possessed the combat strength of a dozen warriors. Nobody could ever hide from this beast.
The strength of war bears was the stuff of legend!
War Animals
Some tribes even managed to train a war bear! Just imagine one of those massive clawed fortresses!
The war elephant has proven to be the most powerful combat unit! No other animal would come even close!
War Animals
The outcome of any battle could change when a herd of war elephants was released onto the battlefield. An irrefutable argument for any army!
This sea creature emits ink that is also extremely poisonous to humans. But in the Mariner's tattoos, its effect is slowed.
Sea Tattoo
I managed to learn something about the Mariner's magical tattoos. I need to study the properties of the ink with which they were made. Let's start with cuttlefish ink!
A substance from the jellyfish's body forms part of the ink for the magical tattoos.
Sea Tattoo
I'm going to need your help! I need to find a jellyfish – a moon jellyfish, to be precise. It lives only in the deepest and darkest crevices of the sea.
This sea plant is parasitic in nature. If it finds its way into a human body, it can have harmful effects.
Sea Tattoo
Red seaweed must have been used in the ink for the tattoos. Hurry and bring me some for my research!
Such precise tattoos can only be made using additional scarification. The shark's tooth is the perfect tool for that!
Sea Tattoo
I suspect that some of the Mariner's tattoos were done using a sawing item. Perhaps a shark's tooth. Could you find one for me?
Do you see how long and sharp this sea urchin's spines are? Only with their help are the deepwater folk able to make the tattoos deep enough.
Sea Tattoo
The tattoo ink went very deep into the Mariner's skin. I'm going to need a sea urchin!
This is it, the book of magical tattoos! Among them I found the ones on the Mariner's arms. Things look bad – it won't be easy to save our friend.
Tattoo Magic
Somewhere among my scrolls, there's a book of pictures that the guards took from one of the deepwater spies. Bring it here!
If this ivory sells well overseas, any merchants who come here will want to buy more.
Export Commodity
Go to the Nomad for some ivory! The foreign merchants from the east want to buy as much as he has, and are willing to pay well for it.
You managed to collect all the taxes down to the last gold piece. The merchants usually don't give in so easily.
Timely Taxes
It's time to collect taxes from the city tradespeople and merchants. I trust you more than anyone else.
I just love this cloth! You'll see, this time tomorrow I'll have no end of customers. All the beauties of the city will gather at the market!
Import Commodity
Ships from the Eastern Empress have arrived. Go to the arriving merchants and accept all the goods they brought!
The boys from the Sepat were playing robbers and decided to take ownership of my treasure. But I happen to know the best thief-catcher in the city!
Market Thief
I hid my bag of treasure near my house, but now it's gone. I think I know who might have stolen it. Will you help me find the thief?
One could live in this barrel as if it was a real house. Are you really going to lower it to the bottom of the ocean with a few brave men inside?
Underwater Reconnaissance
I make my own barrels for my beer, but this time I'm going to need your help! The Master needs a barrel that several people can fit inside.
Now I'm confident in this boat! When it plunges into the depths, its crew won't have to worry about leaks – there can be none now!
Underwater Reconnaissance
My illness has passed and I feel well again. I'm ready to help build the underwater vessel. We'll need lots of tar to caulk up the holes!
If we clean this mineral up well, it'll be transparent enough to see through it clear as day.
Underwater Reconnaissance
Our scouts won't be able to see what's on the ocean floor without windows. Find me some transparent mica!
When scouts see ocean bottom, they let go of stone weights and boat rise to surface again.
Underwater Reconnaissance
You me help get good boulder for weight! We tie them to undersea boat and then it quickly fall to bottom!
If something goes wrong, a team of strong sailors will be able to pull the underwater scouts back to the surface using these ropes!
Underwater Reconnaissance
Although the underwater vessel will have oars, we need to tie it to the wharf, just to be safe. Gather up all the mooring lines we have!
I don't know how closely we managed to recreate the vessel of the Ancients, but I'm sure of one thing – it's ready for its dangerous submersion!
Advanced Vessel
Our underwater vessel is ready, and I intend to test it out! I want to make sure that nothing threatens the crew. Will you join me?
You're just in time! The merchants are just about to set sail, they almost decided that I'd lied to them about the spices. Thanks to you, my reputation is saved!
Spices for Sale
The Tradeswoman promised to send a batch of spices to the docks for sale to visiting merchants. She must have forgotten. Go get the goods from her!
The sailors would probably buy my entire stock if they could! The Mariner tells me that many of them are sick to death of fish.
Sailing Rations
Every month, the sailors buy part of my harvest for sailing rations. Help me collect some provisions into sacks for them!
Wow, this crockery is much better than the last. Now I'll need to keep it away from my little hooligans. It'd be a shame if they broke it as well!
New Crockery
My little children were playing in the kitchen again and broke all the crockery. Hurry to the market and buy some, otherwise I won't have anything to serve dinner on tonight!
The gems have been returned to their owner and the thief has been punished. We need to make sure this doesn't happen again!
Market Robbery
Someone robbed a certain high-ranking guest of our city at the market. He lost a bag of gems. We need to return the stolen goods at once!
It's a good thing the victims received first aid. The danger has passed.
Deadly Drinks
Several townspeople have been badly poisoned by snake bites. We need to study the venom of the snakes that attacked them.
It seems one of Menes's servants sold this poison, specially made to look like an edible additive. But no matter, I have an antidote.
Deadly Drinks
A few townspeople have been poisoned by some sort of foreign food additive they bought at the market. I suspect it was Amanita juice.
Great! The important thing is to measure it out right. A few drops of this juice and I can make an antidote for the snakebitten townspeople!
Deadly Drinks
Belladonna juice can be a cure for snake venom, but can also be poisonous in itself. Can you find me a vial of it?
This venom is so strong that it can even stop your heart. I'm sure this sudden invasion of scorpions in the city is another of Menes's plans!
Deadly Drinks
Scorpions have started to make their way into people's homes recently. Bring me a bottle of the creatures' venom, I need to study it!
Spider venom causes paralysis in humans. Over time, the effects of the venom dwindle, but not everyone can survive it.
Deadly Drinks
We should study the consequences of spider bites as well. You never know what to expect from Menes. Bring me a bottle of venom from these creatures!
It turns out this deadly drink contains some extremely strong poisons. I hope the spy wasn't able to offer it up to any of the townspeople…
Last Swallow
Our soldiers took a bottle of strange caustic liquid from one of Menes's spies. Bring it to me, it could be something dangerous!
The paths in the garden are no longer covered in grain, and the birds are taking turns to snack at the special feeder!
Caring for Birds
The children spread some grain for the birds in the garden, but it's right on the path, and that's no good. Will you help me make a special bird feeder?
Finally, the lazy bird got caught! Any longer and all the other seagulls would have followed its example, and I'd have no fish left.
Winged Thief
Help me get rid of an intrusive gull! This brazen thief has been stealing fresh fish from the stall for days now.
These greenhorns haven't even tasted the harsh life of a soldier, but they've certainly been tasting plenty of beer. Tomorrow I'll force them to clean the whole training ground until it gleams!
Absent Without Leave
Several new recruits have violated military regulations by leaving the barracks at night. I think I know where to find them. Will you help me?
This wicked black kite swooped down on the chickens so fast so that I didn't even notice it. It carried off half my laying hens!
Terror of Chickens
Such trouble has fallen on my house! Someone has been stealing chickens every day. Help me catch the cursed thief!
I like your idea of candle figurines. They're a lot more fun to make than ordinary candles. I think I'll give this one to our tireless Sheriti!
Wax Shapes
I've gotten bored sitting here with my bees. I've decided to get a new hobby. I'll take wax from the hives and make candles. Will you help?
Without you, my pine candle would have looked more like a cactus. I never knew that such unusual trees grew in the north!
Wax Shapes
I found some pine needles on a sailing ship from the north. I want to make a candle shaped like one of those exotic trees. You know what they look like, right?
I hope the Nomad lights this candle in the rare times when he sleeps at home. May its scent remind him of a calm desert night!
Wax Shapes
Let's make a gift for our friend the Nomad! He loves to sleep under the open sky, and that gives me an idea for a new candle!
