What a wonderful composition we got – it reminds me of the sea and the mysteries it hides. I'll give this candle to the Mariner so he can light up his cabin!
Wax Shapes
What if I place a few pebbles and seashells in a candle? It should turn out great. Let's try making the composition together!
Although the Miner sees perfectly in the dark, hopefully this candle will at least decorate one of his humble caves and bring him some comfort.
Wax Shapes
Making candles is a lot of fun! And I still have so many ideas. Let's try to make a candle for the Miner!
I never expected that we could make such a masterpiece! This candle is worthy of decorating the chambers of Mistress Nimiru!
Candle Master
We're doing a good job of these candle figurines. It's time to do something a little more challenging. Think we can manage that?
I have more customers and less beer every day. It's time to build a few extra rooms for my business.
Brewery Expansion
I need your help! I need to get some basalt foundation stones to expand the brewery. Can I entrust this task to you?
Unloading ships by night is no easy work, but it has to be done. The sailors were held up by pirates on the way here – they barely managed to keep the goods.
Material Delivery
A few cargo ships carrying rare building materials are going to dock at the wharf tonight. I'll need some help to unload them!
Rebuilding shouldn't take too much time. In a couple of days, the barracks will be back to normal.
Reinforcement
Some of the quarters in the barracks have collapsed, but nobody was hurt. We're going to need granite blocks to reinforce the building. Get on it!
This is the armor of our enemies. There weren't many of them, and we defeated them. But if all the warriors of Menes start wearing such heavy armor, they won't be easy to beat!
Battle Trophy
Come, I'll show you what I managed to bring back from the last military campaign. I'll bet you haven't seen armor like this before!
Now that's a majestic ship! I heard that its crew bravely fought with the deepwater army, but couldn't withstand them…
Deepwater City
First things first – let's submerge the underwater vessel in the place where the deepwater folk sank a ship a hundred years ago. Tell me if you see it!
This is the statue of the queen of the sirens, who ruled the sea people before the deepwater folk destroyed them. A sad tale!
Deepwater City
The border of the deepwater city should be somewhere near the sunken ship. There's a statue there, you'll see!
This column once served as a support for a temple complex. The deepwater folk destroyed all traces of the cult of the sea gods!
Deepwater City
Now we need to be careful – we don't know what we'll find in the underwater city. Tell me at once if you see anything unusual!
The brave warriors of the sea people rode on these chariots. Their underwater cavalry was great, but even it could not withstand the darkness of the depths…
Deepwater City
The sea people were once allies of humans, but fell under the thrall of the deepwater folk. Do you see that sagging war chariot over there?
It's just an abandoned city park full of underwater trees. Yes, the civilization of the sea people could appreciate beauty, unlike the deepwater folk…
Deepwater City
Some sort of growing, moving mass is approaching our vessel! We need to be careful not to fall into a trap.
This is a pyramid-temple of our enemies, and it's holding a service in honor of their wicked Many-Armed God. It's time to get out of here, before they see us!
Dark Liturgy
Do you hear that rumbling coming closer? I think we're approaching our enemies' lair. Look – it's a pyramid of the deepwater folk. Stay on the alert!
My fears have been confirmed! Anu is one of the first gods of this world, the patron of the sky. He only ever makes himself apparent to people to warn them of danger!
Signs in the Sky
Recently, the stars in the night sky lined up in a very strange manner. It is a portent of strife, I feel it. Help me find the Anu constellation in the sky!
The flames sprang up so fast, but we still managed to put them out. Nonetheless, it did its damage – much of the harvest has been destroyed, along with several merchants' tents.
Approaching Trouble
Fires have suddenly broken out all over the city! Hurry and organize a group of people to put out the flames!
Things can't get any worse than this – the Hippopotamus constellation bodes nothing good. Since ancient times, this animal has been considered an incarnation of chaos!
Signs in the Sky
One disaster has already struck the city, but it's unlikely to be the last. I can find out for sure if we try to find the Hippopotamus constellation in the sky!
The Anhur's Anger spell has gotten out of control. I don't understand how this happened… The townspeople heard the cry of this god of war and all went crazy at once!
Unbridled Magic
It's as if the townspeople have gone insane – they're attacking each other with weapons. The reason is Anhur's Anger. We must take control of it!
A black mark? Is that not a pirate symbol? Well, this surely bodes ill. It seems there's some plot afoot within the city walls…
Pirate Plot
Another group of suspicious-looking vagabonds met in the brewery. They've already left, but one of them dropped some sort of black emblem.
It looks like the meeting has already been and gone – we were late. The barrel has been drunk, the earth trampled with dozens of feet. The tracks lead away from this place…
Pirate Plot
I've been entrusted with finding the place where the pirate leaders plan to meet. We'll know it when we see a huge barrel of rum. Keep an eye out!
This torch still hot. Strangers was in cave not long ago.
Pirate Plot
Not long ago, me start hearing strange people walking in caves. They here again – they lit torch and whisper something. You see light over there?
Me be right – look this leather scroll. Strangers left sharp blades inside. But law of city forbid strangers to carry weapon!
Pirate Plot
I think strangers plot something bad. What you think they do in my cave? Maybe they hide weapons here?
This is a pirate map! It has the bay marked on it in which the enemies hid their fleet. When did these brigands manage to assemble such a large army?
Pirate Plot
There can be no doubt that pirates are at large in the city, but where did they leave their ships? You're going to have to find out!
It can't be – this is an ancient magical horn. It summons terrible sea monsters. It seems the pirates have decided to summon the deepwater folk to their aid…
Magic of the Sea
I heard the call of a battle horn, but where did it come from? There it is again, do you hear it? We need to find the source of the noise at once!
Amon's Breath can calm the minds of the townspeople. They'll soon be themselves again and will get back to work.
Calming Magic
After the disasters that befell the city, the people are dismayed and alarmed. We have to cast a calming spell to help them!
This snowflake appeared from a drop of water to which I sang a beautiful song. Its pattern is so incredible because now the song is sealed inside!
Ice Magic
I started studying ice magic again. I'm going to need your help. Find the most beautiful snowflake in the icy chambers.
Me think it hard to make ice magic on surface of land in this time of year. Now will be easier for Lady!
Ice Magic
Me build in catacomb special room for ice magic for Mistress Nimiru. Me need building material. You help bring?
The mirror is done, and on it appears the pattern of the coming… But what's this? Another misfortune awaits the city! This time, the trouble comes from the sea!
Ice Magic
I've been working on an ice mirror for some time. It will be able to predict the future. Can you finish it?
These grapes grow only in the Sepat and are rarely picked, except by the children.
Special Cultivar
I saw in a dream the forgotten recipe for the wine that the gods themselves drank. I'm going to need some of the red grapes that grow in the Sepat!
The green color of the grape doesn't mean it hasn't ripened, it's just a feature of the type of grape. In fact, these are very sweet and tasty!
Special Cultivar
Lots of green grapes have come to the market. Hurry there and buy them all up! I plan to make a lot of wine!
As far as I know, the Farmer brought this species of grape from the southlands and started a vineyard here. We've never had these grapes in our lands before.
Special Cultivar
I know that the Farmer is growing a special type of yellow grape in his garden. Go get as many as you can from him, I'll pay him later!
The merchants made good on their promise and brought me the freshest grapes from their vineyards. Of all the different types of grapes, these are the largest!
Special Cultivar
I asked the foreign merchants to bring some black grapes from their country. Their ship has already arrived – go to the docks and get the goods!
I won't ask where you managed to find these rare grapes. I know it can't have been easy. Now it's time to turn them into some wonderful wine!
Special Cultivar
Almost all the ingredients for my new – or rather, old and forgotten – wine recipe are ready! But there's one more thing I need – blue grapes!
Oh, gods, what a taste! One drop of this nectar is enough to feel an intoxicating flash in the head and lightness throughout the whole body. We did it!
Brewer's New Brew
I can't wait to make the very same wine my father told me stories about. Will you help me finish it?
Libyan rugs are very highly priced. Only the richest people in the city or other merchants can afford to buy them. Let's see how the trade goes…
An Expensive Commodity
Ships loaded with Libyan rugs have arrived in the city. I already agreed to buy a few of them, and I need you to pick up the goods!
Excellent, the storerooms of the barracks are now full to bursting. The troops should always be well-fed. How would they fight on an empty stomach?
Supplies for the Guard
The barracks is running out of food – it's time to stock up on new supplies for my boys. Buy everything you consider necessary at the market!
Oh, I completely forgot that I last smoked this pipe with a mug of excellent beer. I thought I'd lost it completely.
Sailors' Gift
Some sailors who came from my homeland brought me a gift – a smoking pipe. Where did it get now..? Maybe you can find it?
Wow, she's so beautiful! This dancer's movements flow as if she's walking on air. I'd love to learn to do that!
Sheriti's Dream
A troupe of wandering actors has arrived in the city, and one of them is a girl who dances like a goddess. Let's go admire her!
Our city has needed a blacksmith for a long time, but now it seems we have one. Do you mind if I keep this candlestick for myself?
Artistic Smithing
Thanks to the fact that you're from another world, certain modern skills come easier to you than to others. Want to try some smithing?
This flower is a true wonder! And more importantly, it will never wither – time has no power over it, save for a little rust…
Artistic Smithing
Rumor has it that you're good at working metal. I've wanted to give my wife an original present for a long time. Help me out!
A weathervane is an excellent thing. You never know where the wind is going to come from.
Artistic Smithing
Hey, I heard you're doing artistic metalwork now? I've always wanted to put a weathervane on my house. Will you help me?
Thank you so much for the new cooking pot!
Artistic Smithing
The old cooking pot in the Sepat has rusted almost to nothing. How am I supposed to cook for the children now? Maybe you could help me make another one?
This weapon is perfect – simple, heavy and durable!
Artistic Smithing
My favorite dagger broke in the last battle. I want to order a new one from you. Think you can manage that. Make it strong.
I like your idea of putting iron gates on the market and closing them at night. I'll also ask my husband to appoint a couple of guards for me!
Safety First
I recently noticed that someone has gotten into the habit of sneaking into the market and stealing goods from the storehouse. We need to solve this problem at once!
I've loved music since I was a child. Wandering musicians often visited my father's alehouse. They were wonderful!
Secret Skill
It's been so long since I strummed on my harp… Hm? You didn't know that I can play? Then hurry up and bring it here, I'll play something for you!
Thank the gods! I was so afraid that it had fallen into the water at the port. This butterfly in amber is a symbol of my beloved. Now she has a new life…
Nostalgia
Great sea demons, where has the pendant of my beloved gone? It's my last reminder of her time on earth! Help me find it!
The danger has passed, Sheriti is safe. She wasn't injured and the kidnapper fled. But he won't go far with so much gold to carry!
Ransom in Gold
Disaster! Someone has kidnapped Sheriti and demanded a ransom in gold for her, otherwise… It doesn't bear thinking about. Gather up all the gold you can and bring it to me, there's no time to lose!
The fugitive's tracks end here and all that remains of him is a starfish. It must have been one of the pirates… or the deepwater folk…
Seaward Escape
I'm tracking my stepdaughter's kidnapper. We need to find him, whatever it takes.
Great! We managed to intercept all the enemy boats. The pirates were unable to damage any of our ships.
Pirate Fleet
The enemy fleet is still far away, but the pirates sent some brigand boats ahead as a diversion. You'll need to intercept one of them!
Thanks to your leadership, our fleet isn't surrendering its position. We managed to capture the enemy ships and kept them from penetrating our defensive line!
Pirate Fleet
The first enemy ships approach. We must hold out against this attack. Your task is to intercept one of the battle canoes at all costs!
This ship came to us at a heavy cost! Before we took its crew prisoner, its ram sent several of our best boats to the bottom…
Pirate Fleet
A floating ram is approaching us – a ship that crushes all enemy ships in its path. We have to capture it!
The crew of this bireme fought bravely and boarded many of our ships. If it weren't for you, the battle would have been lost…
Pirate Fleet
Do you see that fast vessel that deftly darts between our ships, forcing them to collide? It is now your main target!
The pirates kidnapped people in the city or took sailors prisoner, and then forced them to labor aboard this terrible ship.
Pirate Fleet
Gods of the ocean, I see a slave galley among those pirate ships. Many of those on board are our countrymen. We have to save them!
Capturing such a powerful ship is a true accomplishment. Although we took some losses fighting with its crew, thanks to you we won!
Main Forces
Our fleet is sure to be lost if we don't capture the dromon – the most powerful of the enemy vessels. Can you do this?
This brand is familiar to me. It is placed on the shoulders of slaves being sent to row on galleys.
Kidnapped People
People have started to go missing in the city. I believe this to be the work of slave traders. We must find at least some signs of their lair.
The slave traders knew how important the Nomad is to the city. He's done so much for the people that his disappearance would have been a terrible loss for us!
Kidnapped People
The slave traders kidnapped the Nomad and are threatening to put him to work on the galleys if we don't pay a ransom. We need to save our friend!
These whips are often used to keep slaves obedient. It seems that it's the place where the traders found the most drunken townspeople and kidnapped them.
Kidnapped People
The slave traders' victims are often people who enjoy drinking to excess. If you notice anything unusual, tell me at once!
The deepwater folk dispatched that sea monster to help the pirates. It wasn't easy to defeat, but you did it. However, the battle isn't won yet!
Danger from the Depths
Alarm! A terrible serpent has arisen from the depths to the call of the sea horn. If we don't defeat it, it will destroy our fleet!
The Moplah sword is perfectly suited to warfare at sea.
Aftermath of a Crash
While boarding our ships, the pirates used very dangerous swords. I want to add one to my weapon collection. Can you find one for me?
An excellent find – now my establishment will be even more popular, especially with sailing types. They're sure to like it!
Aftermath of a Crash
I've always wanted to decorate the brewery with a wooden figurine like the ones placed on the prows of boats. Do you know where I might get one?
It's a pity that this wheel is cracked, but we haven't got another one. I'll fix it up and easily attach it to my crane mechanism.
Aftermath of a Crash
I want to make a crane for the second floor at the storehouse. Maybe I could make one from an old ship's wheel? Find one for me.
This flag is a symbol of piracy. They're willing to destroy our entire culture, the way of life and overthrow our leaders!
Aftermath of a Crash
I managed to capture a pirate flag at sea. The enemy standard has always been considered an excellent trophy. Come by and pick it up, so we can give it to the Chief!
The Mariner said that this drum was used to beat the rhythm for the rowers on a ship. But now the Lady will be able to use it to call everyone to lunch!
Aftermath of a Crash
My friends and I found a huge drum on the shore. It makes such a loud noise that the walls shook in the Sepat. Want to see it?!
Gold is good compensation for the city for those losses we suffered in battle. With its help, we'll repair all our ships and reward our heroes!
Paying for Sins
Not far from the shore, I noticed something gleaming on the sea bottom. I wouldn't be surprised if it's a pirate's chest of gold. We should haul it out!
Thanks to you, my infusion will be ready on time, and there'll be enough for all our wounded.
Medicine for Wounds
The battle at sea left us with many wounded. To make a healing infusion, I'll need river weeds collected at midnight. Hurry and bring them to me!
This staff can calm snakes. I don't know whether it will work on a sea serpent, but it's worth a try. I'll give it to Nimiru!
Forgotten Artifact
We once found a magical staff at the bottom of the sea. It's been left on a shelf all this time with no purpose. I need it now, and quickly. Help me!
It seems our ritual was successful. We won't have to worry about the deepwater folk setting their monster on us again for a while yet!
Magical Ritual
We drove away the sea serpent, but it could attack again at any time. We must perform a special protective ritual using the magical staff!
Nimiru wants to cast a spell on this stele which will warn us about approaching sea serpents. That way we will always be ready for them!
Protection from Serpents
We need to create a protective stele on the shore to frighten sea serpents away. Can I rely on your help?
Once a week, I hold a fish day at the market. I didn't expect all my fish to be gone by lunchtime!
Woven Baskets
Customers bought up all the fish that was on the stall. I need more, and fast. Hurry over to my trading tent and bring me a basket of fresh fish!
Now that's what I call a flame! The dry firewood caught fire quickly.
Woven Baskets
Hmm, the flame in my stove is very weak, I can't brew good beer on that. Head outside and bring in some firewood, and don't skimp on it!
Finding mushrooms in the desert is almost impossible – they only come up after the rainy season in hidden hollows. But they're worth all the effort!
Woven Baskets
I'm setting out on a mushroom hunt. It can be hard to find them in these parts.
The fruit this season is better than ever – so ripe and juicy! I'll sort through everything and share the harvest with the Lady and the Tradeswoman.
Woven Baskets
Now is just the time to gather in the fruit harvest. The fruit has ripened, but there are no spare hands to pick it all. Will you help me out?
Any housewife of our city can wash all their household's clothes in one morning. For me, it takes all day…
Woven Baskets
The time of the great washing is at hand – there's a lot of work ahead! I'm going to need your help to wash all the clothes in the Sepat. Bring them here!
Oof, it's a good thing we found him! If the Lady finds out that I lost her child, she'll give me an earful… Please don't tell her!
Little Helper
The Lady is still busy with washing clothes, and she asked me to watch her little baby. Only I forgot where I left him. What now?
This sea creature is so unusual. It came to us from the northern seas, and the Nomad wants to send it back to its homeland with some northern sailors.
Escape from the Zoo
A wall has fallen down in the Nomad's animal pen, and a few of his animals have escaped. We need to help him catch them! Are you with me?
Poor pink birdie! She's at her wits' end. I know my stepfather's soldiers – they wouldn't have let her go alive, they'd have plucked her and put her straight in the pot…
Escape from the Zoo
A flamingo from the Nomad's pen flew onto the training ground. Let's hurry and save it before the soldiers make a soup out of it!
A little more and the wall will be done. This time I made it solid as a rock. It won't fall down again, mark my words.
Hole in the Wall
The masonry in my animal pen is getting old and finally broke. While Sheriti rounds up the escaped animals, I'll repair the wall. Want to give me a hand?
A while ago, I noticed this pelican creeping into our trading tent and stealing fish. But now it's time to send it home…
Escape from the Zoo
We've already caught almost all the Nomad's escaped animals. There's just one bird left – an orange pelican. And I know where to find it! Let's go!
Alright, let's start. First we need to dig up the earth in the spot where I want to place the flowerbed. That won't take much time.
Skilled Gardener
I want to put a new flowerbed on my property. I've been meaning to get started on it for a while. If you want to help, bring me a shovel!
So the Farmer has taken up flowers again – that's good news. Our city always needs more flowers.
Skilled Gardener
The Farmer asked me to give him the best gladiolus seeds I have for his new flowerbed. Grab some from my storehouse and take them to him!
These pegs will help support the weak sprouts of my new gladioluses until they grow strong.
Skilled Gardener
Some little sprouts have already started to poke their heads out of the flowerbed, but they're still so weak. I have a task for you – hurry and get me some pegs!
This should be enough twine. I'll carefully tie each sprout to the pegs, then they'll be able to stand up against the wind more easily while they're still weak.
Skilled Gardener
It can't be! I've completely run out of garden twine. Hurry to the Mariner and get some from him!
A little fertilizer is all the gladioluses need to flower and make the whole garden smell good.
Skilled Gardener
The gladiolus sprouts are already stronger, but I need to give them a little fertilizer. You can collect some at the Nomad's animal pen!
Aren't they beautiful? Can you smell the aroma floating through the garden? Only I can be so proud of flowers as if they were my children…
Garden Decoration
It seems the gladioluses in the flowerbed have already flowered. Want to see the results of our labor?
This net looks strong enough, but I'll still give it a good looking over before heading to the river.
Hunting a Bichir
I'm heading out to hunt the river bishir. It's a large and very strong fish – I'll need a sturdy net. Can you find me one?
I'll make some grilled fish for my kids for dinner… And tomorrow I'll cook the tastiest fish soup…
Fresh Fish
The Mariner caught so many fish last time, and it just so happens that I was planning to prepare food supplies. Ask him for some fish for me!
Of course, how could I forget about a fire basket! I'll go lure the bishir right into the net by the light of burning coals at night!
Hunting a Bichir
The bishir turned out to be very clever. Several times I threw the net, and several times my prey escaped. I need to lure it in. Do you know how to do that?
Got him, that cunning fish! We finally managed to catch it! Just look how big it is!
Hunting a Bichir
You know, I think you'd best come with me to catch the bishir. I noticed long ago that you bring me good luck when we go fishing. Let's go!
This bamboo is a strange plant. No flowers, no branches, only the loops at the end are beautiful. Are all trees like this in the east, I wonder.
Eastern Guest
We need to head to the Empress's ship and get her favorite plant from the cabin – bamboo. She wants some to be in her room. Hurry!
With a fan this big, the Empress doesn't have to worry about heat. Only she'd be better off using servants to carry around a really big fan instead.
Eastern Guest
The Empress went to look at our flourishing grain fields and forgot her fan somewhere. You're going to search for it!
This dragon doesn't even have any wings – it looks more like a sea serpent, only with claws.
Eastern Guest
It seems the figurine of an eastern dragon that the Empress carries everywhere with her has gone missing. If we don't find it, our guest will be upset!
The servants left this lantern behind when the Empress was busy tasting honey. She likes having bright lights all around her when she travels…
Eastern Guest
The Empress wants a paper lantern to be hung in her room. I've looked everywhere and can't seem to find one. Maybe you could try?
This is truly a beautiful thing – we don't have such in the city. Any girl would love to have something so elegant!
Eastern Guest
When the Empress went to visit my wards in the Sepat, she left her painted parasol there. You're going to get it!
The crown just gleams with all its precious stones and jewels. I'd love to try it on just for a second… I've never seen anything so beautiful!
Imperial Presence
A dinner party will take place soon, and the Empress wants to attend it in her imperial crown. We need to get it ready for the Lady's entrance!
I'll give this ring to the Empress as a gift. If she wears it while she visits the city, she'll be protected from the influence of dark forces!
Security Measures
While the Eastern Empress is visiting us, we need to think about her security. I'll need a ring of defense – find one!
I see you're very responsible with your calculations, as always. That's why I trusted you with these supplies. Their safety is in your hands.
Security Measures
The Empress brought many edible supplies from her country. You need to take it all from her servants and make an account of it!
This spell will help Nimiru weave protective enchantments around the Empress's room.
Security Measures
I will need a scroll of Thoth's first formula. I recall that it contained some sort of protective spell. Find it among the old papers!
With the help of this ball, I can telepathically connect to everyone responsible for the Empress's safety.
Security Measures
Do you know where the crystal ball from the Ship of the Ancients is? It could be useful to me in organizing the guard for our guest.
I just knew we'd find the bear eating honey in the Beekeeper's yard…
Gifts from the Empress
We need to find a giant panda bear. Don't worry, they aren't dangerous. On the contrary, you won't find a nicer creature.
Catching the red panda wasn't so hard – it's a very trusting animal. All we had to do was lure it with a sweet sprout and it wandered over all by itself!
Gifts from the Empress
The red panda is related to the giant panda, and is just as pleasant. I'm sure we'll find it in the place with an easy source of food.
When people first saw this monkey, they thought they'd met a demon! It was all because of the bright color of its fur and its sinister blue face.
Gifts from the Empress
Catching the snub-nosed monkey won't be easy – it's a very crafty critter.
The soft-shelled turtle is a timid and defenseless creature. It hides under the water from predators and takes in air only thanks to its long beak.
Gifts from the Empress
The children did some work for us and caught a soft-shelled turtle. We need to hurry and get it from them – I worry that the kids will damage its leathery shell!
The bright color of the mandarin duck often attracts predators, but not all of them can catch it!
Gifts from the Empress
Catching birds is hardest of all. Thankfully, our bird stands out. When you see a small bright yellow duck, lure it in and grab it!
The one who catches the Fenghuang catches luck itself! In the east, this bird is also considered a symbol of peace.
Unseen Bird
Among the gifts of the Empress was the wonderful Fenghuang bird! Its feathers burn with fire and sear hands. Got any ideas for catching it without getting hurt?
Exploding tunnels is dangerous job. Not for weaklings.
Tunnel Work
Me mine ore in catacomb. Need dig deeper into bowels of earth. Me place explosive pots and you lead fuse to them!
This good pot. Time for heat tar. Old dam which protect tunnels from underground river start leak. This very dangerous for us!
Tunnel Work
Me want heat tar to patch holes in old underground dam. Me need huge pot, can you find?
The Miner will reinforce the dam and the underground river will no longer threaten to flood our mines!
Tunnel Work
I'm making bricks to help the Miner reinforce his underground dam – he doesn't have enough building materials. Can you help me?
Ox finally move! You know, animals not like me much. Probably because me different from other people…
Tunnel Work
I need take some building materials to the mine, but the Farmer's old ox won't obey me. Maybe you can get it to budge?
Sun anemones are one of the most widespread species. They grow mainly in colonies and look like sea sunflowers!
Sea Flowers
I'm studying anemones – sea creatures that look like flowers. I need to find all the species that grow on our shores. Will you help me?
This species of anemone settles as deep as possible in the water, and is always alone. It hunts small fish, paralyzing them with its tentacles.
Sea Flowers
I can't hold my breath underwater for long, and deepwater anemones are very hard to get. I know! You're a good diver – you can help me!
In case of danger, this anemone releases a poisonous substance into the water that frightens off predators.
Sea Flowers
Finding a carpet anemone will be easy. It looks like a big woody mushroom. Try to find it on the side of an underwater cliff!
This anemone has such a thick leg so it can hold onto underwater cliffs when the currents are strong. Otherwise it would be carried far away from its home.
Sea Flowers
Cold-water anemones can be found in places with strong underwater currents. You'll recognize it by its huge thick leg!
The seaweed protects the anthopleura from predators. Among the green seaweed, it is in perfect safety.
Sea Flowers
Many anemones live in symbiosis with other plants and creatures. Anthopleura is usually found in places where seaweed grows. Let's go take a look!
Thanks to its carrier, these anemones can make long journeys across the sea floor. In exchange, it protects the carrier from predators using its tentacles!
Strange Friendship
The most interesting species of anemone are rider anemones. They live right on the shells of large crustaceans. How can we find one of those?
Well, if the seasnails have started to breed again, we need to cordon off their nesting area and destroy it as soon as possible!
New Epidemic
It sounds like a new nest of seasnails has been found in the caves. If this is true, we could be in danger of an epidemic. I need you to go check it out!
There were a lot of sick people – the seasnail's bite is venomous. Without your help, it would have been a lot harder to heal so many people. Thank you!
New Epidemic
It looks like some of the townsfolk got into the seasnail nest before we found it. Many have gotten sick. I'm going to need your help!
The reptile stole into the barracks and bit several people before it was found. The people got sick, but the Lady is already busy healing them!
New Epidemic
The seasnails have started to evolve more quickly. One has already transformed into a reptile and made its way to the surface. Find it!
The liquid fire will burn for far longer than normal fire, and it can withstand the dampness at the bottom of the nest. With its help, we'll destroy those disease carriers!
New Epidemic
The only way to destroy the seasnail nest is to burn it. We must prepare some liquid fire. Will you help me?
Of course, the grasshopper was the first creature I thought of that uses camouflage!
Master of Camouflage
My study of the animal world continues. Master has given me the task of finding creatures that survive thanks to camouflage. Will you search with me?
This little bird finds its food on the ground. Avian predators don't see the nightjar from up high, because the color of its plumage blends in with the soil.
Master of Camouflage
Master says that there are even some birds who survive thanks to the color of their plumage. Let's find a nightjar!
Stonefish always lives among the coral reefs, blending in with their surroundings. On top of that, it's the most poisonous fish in the world!
Master of Camouflage
Be careful with the next specimen – it's a stonefish. The needles on its back are very dangerous. Why don't you be the one who tries to catch it?
The color of this moth's wings is similar to the color of the bark of the trees they live on. Up to a hundred of these moths can hide in plain sight on one of these trees!
Master of Camouflage
Now we need to find a geometer moth, but be careful with it. It's a very fragile creature, and we wouldn't want to hurt it!
This frog has found a way to camouflage itself just like the geometer moth. It can sit for a long time without moving before finally pouncing on its prey…
Master of Camouflage
The only creature that can threaten the geometer moth is the tree frog. Could you catch one for me?
This reptile's ability to change color helps it not only to hide from predators, but also to creep up on its own prey unnoticed!
Stealthiest Specimen
There's one last specimen to find – a chameleon! Nothing can camouflage itself better than this little guy. This reptile will be harder to find than the others!
It seems you managed to alter the helmet's effect. It is because only your mind is as strong as that of the Ancients who created it!
Artifacts of the Ancients
The Captain's helmet which we found on the ship has begun to negatively affect the psychological state of its wearers. You need to test it!
The merchants were elated – they'd never seen anything like it, and rewarded us generously from what I can see!
Artifacts of the Ancients
The merchants from the southern tribes are willing to pay a fortune merely to look at artifacts of the Ancients. I'll show them while you count the gold!
In your hands, the blade once again shone with blue light. Master told me that you have the ability to revive the artifacts of the Ancients…
Artifacts of the Ancients
Look what happened to the Captain's blade. When I take hold of it, the blue crystals inside stop glowing for some reason. What's the problem?
Now the pointer's arrow is pointing north again. How did you manage to fix the thing? Artifacts of the Ancients are a complete puzzle to me…
Artifacts of the Ancients
I almost died in the desert because of the arrow pointer of the Ancients. It suddenly stopped working and I got lost. Check what's wrong with it!
This community had its own symbol in the shape of bronze ears of wheat.
Golden Age
When the gods stopped walking the earth, the people split into five different social classes. The farming community was the largest. Find its symbol!
Makes sense – the guild's symbol was always a sack of gold coins.
Golden Age
Thanks to the guild of merchants, the city has flourished and grown rich. Help find its symbol!
Almost all sailors used to catch fish – it's what they lived on!
Golden Age
The alliance of sailors wasn't so large back in the day. What sort of symbol was the decoration of their class?
The symbol of the brotherhood of warriors was a bronze shield. It served to remind them that all life is precious!
Golden Age
Not all the groups in the olden days were harvesters. Some took another path. Their aim was to protect the city.
The class of priests called themselves the Cathedral, just like the building in which they congregated and wrote their secret texts.
Golden Age
The smallest class of the Golden Age was that of the priests. They were the wisest citizens and were the core of the community.
This golden sun is a symbol of the pharaohs themselves! They stood above all the classes and lit the way for their subjects!
Golden Age
We have seen all the classes of the Golden Age of the pharaohs, but my visions haven't ended. I see something bright and shining.
The demon turned out to be nothing more than a man in a mask. Unfortunately, the criminal managed to escape.
Strange Thief
The city treasury has been robbed by an unusual thief. Everyone says it was a demon with a dog's head.
The hound will quickly scent the thief's trail and lead us to his lair.
Strange Thief
I know how to find the daring thief. A dog will help us. Choose the best from a pack of Ibizan hounds!
This emerald jewelry reminds me of my first love!
Strange Thief
It wasn't just gold that disappeared, but my emerald necklace as well. You already know where the thief's lair is, right?
The thief remained in the catacombs. He'll never get out of there without help…
Strange Thief
The thief escaped his pursuers again, but perhaps we can find the gold he stole?
This is just what I need!
For the Sake of Love
The stalk of jade vine is squashy and flexible. It needs to be cut quickly to avoid falling into the chasm.
The main thing is not to damage the flower while I drop down from the mountain.
For the Sake of Love
Descending from the mountaintop while holding the vine won't be easy. It would be best to carry it in a shoulder sack.
According to legend, ravens are the souls of brave people who went after the jade vine. Their path ended at the bottom of the abyssal canyon…
For the Sake of Love
The peak upon which jade vine grows is a nesting ground for ravens. This bird will show us the way.
It seems this is that very boulder – the first step on the dangerous path to a beautiful plant.
For the Sake of Love
The route to the peak begins by a gigantic boulder. We need to find it before nightfall!
Phew, a little more and I'd have fallen into the chasm. Now I owe my life to you. Thank you!
For the Sake of Love
I brought you with me to depend on your aid in this dangerous adventure.
Oh gods, this flower is truly beautiful! My wife will be joyful beyond words!
For the Sake of Love
The jade vine must be somewhere nearby!
I want to offer this ruby heart to my beloved wife on the day of our anniversary.
Romantic Evening
In the catacombs lies an ancient artifact of the goddess Bastet. Help me find this thing!
My wife is a true goddess, and I want her to know that!
Romantic Evening
I want my beloved wife to remember the day of our anniversary. Rose petals must be spread across all her chambers.
Orchids have such an alluring aroma, and their petals are like the silken dress of my beloved. These flowers are a perfect reflection of her true nature!
Romantic Evening
Orchids are my wife's favorite flowers. Our romantic evening approaches, and I haven't even bought the flowers for her.
It seems we were just in time – my wife is just coming in, do you hear her steps? Leave through the back door!
Romantic Evening
My wife and I have everything we need to celebrate our anniversary. All that remains is to decorate the room. Will you help me before my beloved returns home?
Long ago, the gods showed the first people where to find thyme, and taught them to make infusions from it that extend life.
Healing Herbs
I came up with a recipe for a new healing potion made of herbs. To prepare it, I'll need several thyme flowers.
The ancient healers called sage the 'sacred herb'. They used it to stop bleeding and quickly heal wounds.
Healing Herbs
The healing infusion will consist of the five most useful herbs. We already have thyme, now we need to find some sage. Get to work!
This plant is excellent for calming the nervous system.
Healing Herbs
An important ingredient of my herb infusion will be calendula. This is the perfect time to collect some. Hurry!
Valeriana will greatly strengthen my herbal infusion.
Healing Herbs
I'm missing something for my herbal infusion – valeriana flowers. Their healing properties are very useful in treating illnesses of the heart. Let's collect some!
The healing properties of rose hips increase depending on the environment they grow in.
Healing Herbs
There's one more ingredient left – rose hips. Gather them away from the dusty roads.
This medicine combines the curative properties of five healing herbs.
Healing Herbs
We have all the ingredients for the healing infusion. All we have to do now is grind them up well in a mortar and let it brew.
I'll give the boy this duck so he can play with it when he bathes.
New Toy
I want to make a toy for the son of the Potter and Lady – a wooden duck. But I'm getting nowhere with it. Could you help me?
Morning dew barely touched by the rays of the rising sun is already a powerful medicine on its own!
A Little Magic
For my new medicine, I'll need a little morning dew. It must be collected with special care at a certain hour. Can you handle it?
I'll hurry and put some fresh bread in the basket and take it to the children for lunch, before it gets cold!
Little Chores
The Sepat urgently needs fresh bread, but, unfortunately, my basket has worn through. Maybe you know where I can get a new one?
It isn't just our countrymen buying honey nowadays, but lots of foreign merchants too.
A Home for the Bees
I'm building some new hives for my bees. I'm going to need your help.
This die can show the numbers one through four. The one at the top of the pyramid will be counted on a throw.
Dice Games
I thought of a new game for the customers of the brewery while I was sleeping. Help me carve a four-sided die!
In theory, the maximum number of points you can get with a four-sided die and six-sided die at once is ten. On the other hand, you can't get a one!
Dice Games
I'm going to need a whole set of dice for my game. I need to think it over some more – in the meantime, you make a six-sided die!
Throwing an eight-sided die will compensate for throwing the two previous dice. You can't use it to get a ten, but there won't be any problem with ones!
Dice Games
I've done my calculations – now I need an eight-sided die. It should look like our pyramids, linked by their foundations. Can you make something like that?
Players will decide for themselves how to use this dice. It can help you get ones or tens. But the quickest way isn't always the easiest!
Dice Games
My game will be called Thousand, and the aim of the game is to quickly reach a thousand points. The most commonly used die will be the ten-sided one.
With this die, there'll always be a chance to try and get that missing ten.
Dice Games
A twelve-sided die is an excellently balanced choice. Let's try and make it together!
Now I have an entire set of multi-sided dice for my new gambling game!
Dice Games
I think the game will often begin with a twenty-side die. Can you carve one?
The magical symbols and elegant carving tell us that this is the very throne we've been looking for!
Ancient Relic
I decoded one of the manuscripts of the Ancients and managed to calculate the location of Isis's throne!
You will dance in the falcon mask, embodying the divine energy of Ra himself. In the meantime, I will sing a protective song!
Ancient Relic
We must protect Isis's throne from the black magic of Menes. Bring me a falcon mask. We will perform a protective ritual!
While the gods are beyond the border of the realms, in the place where Amrun sent them, we must take any chance we have to give them strength!
Ancient Relic
Isis's throne is a very powerful relic. If we place gifts at its base, we will bestow power on the goddess while she is still in exile!
This hound can be trusted to guard the throne. He won't allow strangers to approach it, even if it means his life!
Ancient Relic
Menes's servants will most likely try to steal Isis's throne. We'll need a reliable guard.
I'll have to train long and hard to learn to wield this weapon.
Northern Allies
One of the northern warriors gave me his weapon – it is a giant battle hammer. Help me take it to the armory – I can't carry it on my own!
Unbelievable! This talisman is simply vibrating with the divine energy stored within it. Now I understand why the northern warriors are so strong!
Northern Allies
I noticed that many northerners wear unusual talismans on their chests. Try to get hold of one, I'd like to see it!
This shield provides excellent protection against enemy attacks, but only if you can hold it with one arm!
Northern Allies
I want to practice at the training ground using the round shield of the northerners. Will you bring me one?
The northerner told me he's a berserker! Those are warriors that eat dried amanitas before battle and become fearless and unbeatable!
Northern Allies
A northerner is looking for a place to buy dried amanitas. Search in my storehouse, I had a few!
A fine thing, worthy of a powerful warrior and commander!
Northern Allies
The Chief of the northerners left his helmet at the training ground – for him, it's as important as a pharaoh's crown.
The northern sailors are brave folk. They traveled a great distance on this ship!
Northern Allies
There's a northern ship at the docks – it has an unusual design. Let's go take a good look at it!
It says in the book that the evil spirits will take on a new form on the day of the Northern Giants' arrival. It seems to be somehow connected with the northerners, but how?
Unbridled Element
I've had a bad feeling of late. Hurry, bring me my book of prophecies!
This evil spirit glimpsed fear in one of the northern sailors. The creature really did look terrifying!
Unbridled Element
The meaning of the prophecy is becoming clear to me! One of the evil spirits has taken on the form of an ice bear, and nobody can pacify it.
The destruction wasn't too great. The workers will have it all repaired in mere days.
Unbridled Element
The ice bear destroyed several trading stalls at the market. We need to repair them at once.
We were lucky that nobody got hurt!
Unbridled Element
The evil spirit has taken on a new form. It's scaring the townsfolk in the guise of a sand leopard. Hurry and catch it!
Osiris, the god of the underworld, is giving us a sign! He lit his star in the sky.
Legend of the Phoenix
Keep looking at the sky, we'll get a message soon!
A black pyramid rose right out of the sands on the horizon in the rays of the rising sun! What could this mean for us?
Legend of the Phoenix
After Osiris's star began to shine in the sky, I had an unusual dream. You need to go into a trance with me!
I feel life within the egg. The reborn phoenix is an embodiment of Osiris himself. It gathers strength within the egg and is preparing to come into the world!
Legend of the Phoenix
The black pyramid is a sign of the birth of a phoenix. You must find the place from the dream where it rose from the sand!
I've heard so much of this elixir! It can return the dead to life.
Legend of the Phoenix
When the phoenix comes to the world, a magical elixir appears in its nest – the Essence of Life.
These leaves are still burning, and I see traces of ash on them. The old phoenix was extinguished and caught fire again within the flaming egg that materialized…
Legend of the Phoenix
According to legend, the phoenix carries its forebear in its talons, wrapped up in myrrh leaves. The leaves should still be in the nest.
The phoenix spread its wings and sang its song? It foretells the coming of a new time – this is the message the gods sent us!
Legend of the Phoenix
The phoenix broke out of its egg and is darting around the factory! Hurry and let it out while I put out the smoldering scrolls!
The evil spirits fear lightning, and we'll take advantage of that.
Secret Weapon
We have to be on guard after that evil spirit caused alarm in the city. Bring me a jar of lightning from my laboratory!
So the cockerel just ran away? Well, I'll give him more grain than usual today so he doesn't do it again…
Chicken Run
I slept in this morning because the cock never crowed. I thought he was sick, but he's just gone – could he have been stolen?
I haven't made pies with a vegetable filling in a long time. They're very popular where I come from.
Pie Filling
I'm making dough for some new pies, but I really need some ingredients for filling. Hurry and get me some!
It's my fennec fox! The poor thing got a little dirty, but it doesn't matter, I'll give it a bath.
Mean Little Boys
The street boys took my plushy fennec fox and threw it somewhere. Little foxy must be very lonely!
The sages considered this bell a symbol of feminine wisdom, and its sound – of the emptiness of all existence.
Eastern Wisdom
Once, some eastern sages came to our lands and brought unusual relics with them. We need to find them all!
The dorje is also called a diamond scepter. This scepter served the sages as a symbol of masculine strength and skillful methods!
Eastern Wisdom
In their rituals, the sages always used the bell in combination with the dorje. It's a type of special scepter. Let's find it!
If you turn the drum on its axis, the magical formulas within begin to work to the benefit of all living creatures!
Eastern Wisdom
The eastern sages always carried prayer drums filled with magical formulas. I need one of those drums!
The sages never shed blood with this dagger. It was only ever used in rituals to banish evil spirits!
Eastern Wisdom
The sages from the east often used daggers in their magical practices – the purba. Help me find this weapon!
This gau emanates great power. Incredible!
Eastern Wisdom
One of the most important ritual objects of the eastern sages was the gau. It was a small wooden box of relics hung around the neck.
This is a place of wonders! When I walk around this strange structure, my thoughts are no longer confused, and my speech becomes clear again!
Eastern Wisdom
Me know where find place of power of eastern sage. Come, me show you!
This water clock is just what I need to measure the time for a turn!
Chess Club
I've decided to start a chess club in the brewery. I'll need a clock to hold tournaments. Can you bring one?
Excellent, now all the chess pieces are in place. My customers can't wait to start playing.
Chess Club
My chess set is missing a black pawn. The last person to play chess was the Beekeeper – he probably lost the piece. Go to him and find it!
Well, if things continue like this, chess will have a big future in this city!
Chess Club
The entrants in the future chess tournament have decided to independently invest in its development.
Ah, here's the lost rook! The game yesterday was fierce – a true chess duel.
Chess Club
The tournament went well, and all the players enjoyed it. Only I can't seem to find one of the pieces.
Back when the first man took club in hand, he felt within him the spirit of the warrior for the first time.
Evolution of Weaponry
I'm preparing a short lecture for my new recruits. I want to talk to them about the evolution of weaponry.
Stone was stronger than wood, but had to be thrown, making their bearer weaponless again. Then people got the idea of fastening stone to wood!
Evolution of Weaponry
The first people understood very quickly that stones can also play the role of weapons. That's how the first stone ax was made.
One day, early man realized that bone could be made into a sharper weapon than stone.
Evolution of Weaponry
After the era of stone and wooden weapons, it was the time of bone weapons. Could you find a suitable example?
In the age of copper weapons, man became truly dangerous. It was then that the first military campaigns began.
Evolution of Weaponry
Over time, human civilization firmed up, and copper was discovered! And that was what the first swords were made of.
Bronze weapons are still used by many civilizations to this day.
Evolution of Weaponry
Copper was too soft a material for weaponry, so early man mixed it with tin. That's how bronze was made!
Thanks to the iron mines and good blacksmiths, we know how to make the best weapons in the world.
Evolution of Weaponry
Nowadays, weapons are sharper and more reliable because we make them out of iron. My sword is an excellent example of that.
Our horse looks almost real! I'll name her Star and give her to the Warrior.
Sheriti's Hobbies
I've really gotten into folding various figurines out of paper. In the east, this hobby is called 'origami'. Can you help me fold a horse?
I hope the Master doesn't notice that we 'borrowed' these ancient pages covered in writing.
Sheriti's Hobbies
What a shame… I've run out of paper for my origami. Where can I get more? What do you think, will the Master get angry if we borrow a little from him?
This bird can flap its wings if you pull its tail! I could never make this on my own…
Sheriti's Hobbies
Well, wanna try making a paper figurine together? Maybe a bird?
Ikebana is the art of collecting flowers, I think. Nothing complicated there!
Sheriti's Hobbies
I think I'm going to get into Ikebana – it's more fun. Will you help me find a dried flower?
You're just in time, I've already lit a big fire and put a pot of water on it. We need to put the ore in there and boil it for half an hour.
Philosopher's Stone
To create the philosopher's stone, we'll need a pound of lead ore.
We add the arsenic to the boiling water and boil our concoction for around another hour.
Philosopher's Stone
To continue the preparations, we need two ounces of arsenic. I happen to have a flask of it somewhere.
We need to grind up the oak bark thoroughly and add it to the other ingredients.
Philosopher's Stone
While our brew quietly bubbles away on the flame, we need to find the next ingredient – three ounces of oak bark.
When we add the rose water to the cauldron, our concoction will finally smell a little better!
Philosopher's Stone
The brewing time is coming to an end. Time to add some rose water. Ask for a flask of it from one of the girls!
This is a little too much soot – we only need three ounces.
Philosopher's Stone
It's time to add some soot to the brew. Know where to get some?
Now we can turn other metals into gold and heal people!
Philosopher's Stone
I put an old rusty nail in the cauldron, and it turned to gold – that means the philosopher's stone is done already!
Poor thing! Must have been tough on the street…
Good Heart
I saw a hungry little kitten at the port. We need to hurry and find it so we can put it in the kennel and feed it. Will you help?
The notices worked! The kitten's owners came to the nursery and finally took him home…
In Search of Owners
We need to try and find the owners of the kittens we picked up at the dock. Let's put some notices up throughout the city!
Ah, so that's it! The thief turned out to be a kitten! Well, I guess I'll keep the little guy…
Elusive Thief
Someone has started stealing dried fish from the locked cellar. I can't seem to catch the thief.
The grapefruit juice needs to be mixed with yeast and left to sit in hot water. Afterwards, I'll put it on my face and then wash it off fifteen minutes later.
Feminine Secret
I really need some fresh grapefruit to make a mask for my face. I can't go and get it myself, unfortunately, so I need you to do it!
The milk from my cow has taken on a youth-giving effect! Everyone who drinks it has noticed that they've started to look younger than their years…
Eternal Youth
Something strange is going on with my cow. It's as if it's become younger and its milk is so tasty now. Want to try it?
Do you feel your body filling with strength and energy after drinking?
Eternal Youth
The olive oil in the kitchen has turned into an aromatic ambrosia. Take a few swigs, I insist!
What bliss! I could scoop this healing water out of the fountain forever! Every cup heals old wounds, and the scars disappear without a trace…
Eternal Youth
There's been a crowd around the old fountain at the dock for an hour already. Let's go see what all the fuss is about!
It turns out all the clay in the house became magical overnight and now gives youth?
Eternal Youth
Miracles are happening in the city! My work-hardened hands have become smooth like a boy's again. Can you explain to me how this happened?
I once heard a legend about sky fire. It doesn't burn the righteous, but instead gives them great strength.
Eternal Youth
A fireball fell right out of the sky outside my house! It's been smoldering ever since, and I can't seem to put it out.
The properties of the philosopher's stone dust diminish over time. On the other hand, thanks to its effect, we've gotten a universal potion of healing and youth!
Eternal Youth
I collected some particles of this miracle-working substance in the city and decided to use it as a basis for a universal healing potion.
These new apples from the Farmer really work wonders, and the Beekeeper has finally woken up. It seems all this was because of the Master's experiments…
Old Age Begone
The citizens found the Beekeeper at the entrance to his house, not breathing. But the poor man can still be saved. Hurry and bring me a rejuvenating apple!
Nimiru said that I can't eat anything but celery until she finishes her healing ritual. She says it's a healthy diet!
Healthy Nourishment
I feel as if born anew! And I really want to crunch on something. Bring me some celery!
The miracle of the apple healing the Beekeeper amazed many townsfolk. They believe that now all the fruit and vegetables from the Garden are magical…
Healthy Nourishment
There's been a high demand for the crops of the Farmer's Garden recently. I need more fresh fruit and vegetables!
It's as if the Beekeeper is ten years younger.
Healing Ritual
The Beekeeper is much better now. There's one last thing to do – I must perform a magical ritual. I'm going to need a Bast mask.
Mistress Nimiru sure to like our work and later order even more unusual chest.
Collection of Chests
Me make alabaster chest for Mistress Nimiru. She want keep discovery from city of Ancients inside. You help me finish this work?
This silver chest will be a safe place to put the amulets. Now the evil spirits will never get in without human aid!
Collection of Chests
I've decided to tidy up my magical laboratory and sort everything into chests. What do you think, where should I put my amulets against evil spirits?
The undeciphered scrolls will sit inside this chest, reminding me of how much we still have to study!
Collection of Chests
I've accumulated many encrypted scrolls of the ancient sages. A malachite chest would be just perfect for them.
Such elegant work the foreign craftsmen did! This chest will serve as a fine place to store my magical stones.
Collection of Chests
The foreign merchants are selling an unusual golden chest at the dock. I must have it!
One must always treat magical herbs with care. This chest will keep them fresh for longer than any other.
Collection of Chests
Where can I store my valuable magical herbs? A wooden chest would be perfect for them. One made of sandalwood, for example.
Sunlight shimmer in every facet of our chest. Mistress Nimiru want keep only most valuable magic ingredients inside!
Collection of Chests
Me and you have very difficult task! We must make chest of glass. This very fine work, need much patience.
Such coins were used by servants of the Shadow. When a person puts them in his or her purse, they disappear and end up back in their master's pocket!
Proof of Guilt
A swindler has been exchanging money with sailors at the port, only for them to find their pockets empty later. We must find out what's going on!
Who would have thought that the Potter would turn out to be the swindler we've been looking for? I'd always thought highly of him!
Proof of Guilt
The sailors say that the money changer hid his face under a ram mask. I think I know where to find such a mask.
The gaps in my memory began after I met a person in black in an alleyway. And now here I am, like a criminal…
Proof of Guilt
I don't even know how I ended up doing community service. I've had gaps in my memory of late. Help me unload these stones, I'll tell you all about it!
Here is the proof of my husband's innocence. Someone clouded his mind using the powder of oblivion.
Proof of Guilt
I believe my husband! Help me prove his innocence!
Delicious, tender pastrami.
Old Recipe
I discovered a new recipe for my kitchen. A fine dish for a big breakfast, called ful medames. Go to the market and get some pastrami for it!
Beans digest slowly, which is why ful medames is eaten for breakfast. It's the best dish to give you energy to work all day!
Old Recipe
The main ingredient of ful medames is beans. Put some into the pot and slowly heat them on a low flame with some tomato sauce!
Our dish is missing a touch of sourness, but the lemon juice will fix that and give the meat and beans a unique, subtle taste.
Old Recipe
While I mix the cooked beans with some fried pastrami, you hurry and find a slice of juicy lemon!
I remember this smell. You managed to make tahini paste no worse than my own. It's time to add it to the dish before it thickens up!
Old Recipe
I'm going to need some tahini paste. To make some, we'll need to heat and grind up some sesame seeds.
We'll cut the boiled eggs into slices and place them on the plate with the main dish.
Old Recipe
The ful medames will be ready soon. We'll need to boil a few chicken eggs as well, to garnish the dish. Get to it!
The dish turned out just like I remember it from childhood!
Old Recipe
Want to get plenty of energy for today's work?
We found nothing but these climbing irons, which he used to get up to my window…
Heir of the Past
Someone tried to sneak into my chambers. He looked like one of the servants of the Shadow. We must find his tracks!
The thief opened all the chests with nothing but a lockpick. This looks like the work of the Shadow's servants.
Heir of the Past
Disaster has struck – someone got into all the chests containing the revenue from the last few months. I don't get it, how is this possible?
I wouldn't have been able to find the criminals' tracks alone. Thanks to you, we've found the secret lair of the robber and a cache of gold.
Heir of the Past
I'm searching for the Tradeswoman's missing property. They say the servants of the Shadow stole it.
It can't be! Only the Shadow herself leaves tracks like these. But we destroyed her… Could she really have found a way to return again?
Heir of the Past
We might as well inspect the thief's lair in more detail while we're here.
The World Egg is a symbol of the birth of a divine being. The mage must have expected the coming of this creature to our world.
Mighty Mage
The lair of the mage – an opponent of Menes – was deep under the ground. He kept a powerful artifact there – the World Egg.
The symbols on this dagger indicate that its owner honored the gods of light. The dagger itself was made to cut ties with the world of the dead!
Mighty Mage
I noticed a certain ritual dagger in the catacombs. I want to study the blade.
The dragon ring is a rare artifact from the north. Not just anyone can harness its raging power!
Mighty Mage
Mages often use many power-enhancing artifacts. Among them are the magical rings.
This dark mirror is a terrible thing! It allows you to see into the future, but only mages and dark priests can use it…
Mighty Mage
I want to learn more about the mage who was an enemy of Menes for so long!
These runes are still full of magical energy. They came to our lands from the north.
Mighty Mage
The Master found a sack of runestones in the mage's lair. I must study them at once. Bring the sack to me!
How did this doll get into my room? Maybe it's the work of the mage. After all, we have no idea where he went after his attempt to revive Horus…
Mighty Mage
In a dark corner of the room, I noticed a rag doll. I feared to touch it. Maybe you could pick it up?
If the first plate belongs to Horus, then this one must belong to his brother – Menes. But how did it end up in the mage's lair?
Echo of the Tomb
It seems there is a golden breastplate in the mage's lair, just like the one we found in Horus's tomb.
This destruction happen for reason. We scare someone's spirit. Me think story of underground mage and story of prince brothers is connected!
Echo of the Tomb
After we find Menes breastplate, wall in Horus tomb fall down. We need repair it right away!
This statuette is of the pharaoh Menetnasht – the father of Menes and Horus. It has been vibrating since we found the mage's lair.
Echo of the Tomb
Something was knocking around loudly all night on the upper shelf of my storeroom. Perhaps it is spirits from another world.
This atlas belonged to the mage. Using his knowledge, he really did raise the mummy of Horus, but failed to turn it back into a person…
Echo of the Tomb
I think the mage wanted to somehow bring the mummy of Horus back to life, and displace Menes in the process. Help me find proof of my theory!
At the time when the mage created the formula of the elixir, it was hard to get pearls. Nowadays, pearl hunters gather them every day on our shores.
Elixir of Immortality
To create the elixir of immortality, I'll need a handful of pearl powder. It's going to take quite some effort to grind up the pearls properly!
Since ancient times, priests have observed that white coral has a very positive effect on the human body.
Elixir of Immortality
Coral is one of the main ingredients for the elixir of immortality.
It's no wonder one of the ingredients of the elixir of immortality is sandalwood. There's a reason they call it evergreen.
Elixir of Immortality
We're going to need a piece of sandalwood to make the magical drink. This wood contains useful oils.
Aloe juice is fantastic for healing wounds. In the elixir, it stops the aging process…
Elixir of Immortality
Aloe is one of the most renowned healing plants of our time. We'll need the juice of its leaves to create our elixir.
Women often use amla berries to help their hair grow.
Elixir of Immortality
It says in the recipe that an essential part of the elixir is amla berries. These bright yellow berries look like gooseberries. Collect some!
If the mage didn't get anything wrong, then we've managed to create a true elixir of immortality. But let's keep our discovery between us for now…
Elixir of Immortality
I've already started making the elixir, but I need your help to make it correctly. You're going to need to concentrate very hard!
These tablets describe how to make excellent makeup for ladies-in-waiting. This is a very valuable discovery for the beauties of today!
Recipe for Beauty
The Miner discovered some tablets that describe makeup recipes. I'd like to get hold of them and have a read.
Many beautiful women in this city have agreed to donate part of their savings to create the new makeup.
Recipe for Beauty
Makeup for ladies-in-waiting was always very expensive. Even now, it will cost us much to make it.
Musk is the main ingredient of the new makeup.
Recipe for Beauty
I managed to get everything we'll need to make the new makeup, but I completely forgot the musk. You'll have to go get some!
There we have it, the first set of makeup is ready. I just can't wait to try it for myself.
Recipe for Beauty
A little extra information from the Master's scrolls and we'll be able to start producing makeup.
My cellmates and I came up with this game while languishing in Menes's dungeon. Our imprisonment was long, so we wanted something to pass the time…
Fun Parchis
I want to make a fun game with tiles to amuse my customers. Will you help? Then carve a fire tile in the shape of a pyramid out of red stone!
All the players' tiles must differ from each other by color, and between themselves by size. This is so we can tell the difference between them on the game board.
Fun Parchis
Four players play the game, each with six tiles of their element. We already have a fire tile. Now make a water tile!
The tiles in the game don't necessarily have to relate to the elements. They could be units of enemy armies instead, for example.
Fun Parchis
I think we should make the earth tile from green stone. That way it will look brighter on the board.
Quartz is the best material I can think of for making a tile of this element.
Fun Parchis
Three tiles of different sides are done, now we have to make the last – the air tile. Everyone associates the element of air with something colorless and transparent.
I love to feel the weight of the dice in my palm while I play.
Fun Parchis
The main weapon of Parchis players is dice. Since we've made everything else out of stone, let's make the dice out of stone as well!
In the dungeon, we marked out a board on the floor and made the tiles out of bread. But now the game has taken on new life. I hope my customers enjoy it!
Fun Parchis
For the test version of the game, one tile on each side is enough. All that remains is to make and line the board.
I'll rub the cedar oil on my temples and the pain will quickly stop. Oh, I've been working too much lately, a rest sure wouldn't hurt!
Being Healthy
I feel ill somehow – my head hurts, my temples are pounding. Go to the Nomad and ask him for some cedar oil!
The Warrior loves eating pease pudding after his exhausting sessions at the training ground. He says it gives him lots of strength and energy!
Food for Strength
I wanted to make some pease pudding for dinner, but as ill luck would have it, I've run out of peas. Go get some at the market, and hurry, the Warrior will be back soon!
Everything on the list is here. These provisions should be more than enough for the crew.
Provisions for the Road
At night, one of the ships departs for a long voyage, but the sailors' provisions haven't been delivered from the market yet. Maybe you could take care of it?
Although the homeless often come to ask for food, they're always willing to help in the kitchen or the garden for a cup of rice porridge.
Helping the Homeless
Homeless people have gathered at the doors to the house again. We need to get some food for them. Bring me some rice grits, I'll make some porridge for the unlucky fellows!
Now you and I can make a wonderful refreshing hibiscus tea, once the favorite beverage of the pharaohs!
Refreshing Drink
The heat is so unbearable today, the children don't even want to play in the street. We need to think of a way to refresh them. Bring me some hibiscus flowers!
The pomegranate seeds will give the drink a special sourness. It is that taste that holds the true secret of wakefulness!
Refreshing Drink
The refreshing tea will consist mainly of red ingredients. We'll need to find some pomegranate seeds.
Nowadays, we know how to get sugar from sugarcane, but people used to just chew it while drinking unsweetened tea. It was a favorite treat for kids!
Refreshing Drink
We can't let the drink be too sour – we need to add a little sweetness. Cane sugar is just the thing.
It's a great idea to freeze mint leaves in ice cubes and add them to drinks!
Refreshing Drink
In heat like this, the drink should be cool. Some ice cubes with mint inside will lend it freshness. The Brewer has some.
The grapefruit slice should be squeezed slightly into the tea and then left in it. Now our drink is almost ready!
Refreshing Drink
There's one last ingredient to get for the tea – a slice of grapefruit. As it happens, the Farmer recently harvested many ripe grapefruits. Go see him!
The children were pleased with the tea! They've started having fun and playing their games again, forgetting about the forbidding heat.
Refreshing Drink
The children can't wait to try the tea you and I made to help them with the heat. Pour it into a jug and take it to the garden, they're getting restless!
This book I have read many times now, and my speech has become less confused – you have no doubt noticed. If this continues, I will remember how I used to speak…
Learning Equals Light
A terrible disaster has struck! My wise book is lost, the one I was studying to speak with. Where it went I know not. Will you help me find it?
Now things are running a little more smoothly, and all my customers are happy.
Fun Party
There are so many customers in the brewery that I can't count them. The Baker over there has been waiting too long for his beer. Can you help?
…So that's how a bread roll under my shirt saved my life when Menes's soldiers attacked. An enemy arrow landed in it and the enemy thought I was dead…
Fun Party
Since we happen to have met in the brewery, maybe you'll keep me company? I really want to talk to someone about life!
I'm a rare visitor to the brewery, I spend most of my time with my bees. But sometimes I decide to go out into the city, to see people and have a drink or two…
Fun Party
Oh! You're helping the Brewer now? Commendable! Bring me some of his best oatmeal beer, then. I haven't tried it in so long!
Someone enchanted these beads with an evil power.
Or Amrun’s cult
Amrun's followers use prayer beads during their services. Please get some for me!
I’d be glad to break the chains and free the city from Amrun!
Or Amrun’s cult
Broken chains are a symbol of freedom from slavery.
Under the effect of this cactus, followers believe whatever they're told!
Or Amrun’s cult
The street priests use a hallucinogenic cactus to bring in new believers. Do you know where it grows?
Cult members who drink this beer don’t tell the truth.
Or Amrun’s cult
Amrun's priests influence their believers’ minds. Have you heard about the Draft of Truth?
That's it! It's the ancient letter "A" for Amrun!
Or Amrun’s cult
Cult members have a mark on their body. I can't figure out what it means…
Thank the Gods that we burned that book!
Or Amrun’s cult
I know where to find a book of Amrun's teachings. We must find it and destroy it!
Pie Filling
I need some fresh fish for fish pies. Will you help me?
Fresh Grain
The Farmer has harvested some grain from the field. I'd like to get my share from him and pay for it.
What do you mean it's not a big deal?! I don’t understand?!
A Snack with Beer
Oh, no! Those wonderful beef sausages are all gone!
Pie Filling
Let's make a delicious apple pie! You can pick some ripe apples near here.
Is this all you could save!? Oh, woe is me!
City Curses
Fire! My scrolls! Hurry!
Amazing! How is that even possible?
City Curses
I just gathered the harvest yesterday, and today it's covered in fungus?!
Strange… I just brewed this batch…
City Curses
This beer smells like old boots! Quick, let's get rid of it!
The sword fell apart like rotten wood! Here's hoping my courage doesn't go the same way…
City Curses
Just look at this! My blade is crumbling like sand!
All I see is a broken ball…
City Curses
There are rumors in the city about a priestess' vision. I'm not sure they're well grounded.
Just as I suspected, the rumors were not true. The people are exaggerating as usual.
City Curses
The citizens say the priestess’ vision caused their bad luck. It's time to put a stop to this nonsense!
It looks good and it’s tasty too!
Sweet Treat
I've seen bakers putting coconut flakes on their pastries. Let's find some coconuts!
We grease up the saddle a bit… And there, good as new!
Work in the Stables
An old saddle has cracked, but we can fix it up.
City Taxes
Thanks! I'll go make the healing infusion.
Cough Medicine
My daughter has a bad cough! Please bring some mint for an infusion!
Nimiru gave it to me. Thanks!
Animal Weaponry
A snake's tooth is missing from my chest. It has sentimental value to me.
This is the fang of a musk deer, a cloven-hoofed beast.
Animal Weaponry
You know, predators aren't the only ones with fangs!
A huge wild boar leapt at me! Only the gods know how I survived.
Animal Weaponry
Let me tell you what happened to me on my last hunt!
I threw a mug at the baboon. It ran off, and I got this trophy!
Animal Weaponry
Recently, a baboon somehow got into the brewery and scared all the customers.
The owner of this tusk must’ve been a giant elephant.
Animal Weaponry
To feed my village, I had to hunt elephants at times.
A whole ship could disappear into those gigantic jaws!
Animal Weaponry
The most dangerous creature in the sea is the great white shark.
I'm sure this is the very same quill!
Attributes of Osiris
Osiris used Maat’s quill in his court.
In the museum building the attributes in safety will be.
Underground Museum
I need to build a museum. Will you help me carry the materials?
According to legend, this is King Menetnasht’s heart.
Attributes of Osiris
The second symbol — a human heart — may be hidden nearby.
Let it fly away.
Saving a Butterfly
A huge butterfly flew into my house. We need to catch it carefully and set it free!
Making these dolls is easier than I thought.
Toys for Orphans
The children in the Sepat don't have enough toys. I've decided to make dolls for them.
I’ll give this doll to Sheriti and she can paint it.
Toys for Orphans
I'm helping my daughter make dolls. I'm glad she wants to help the orphans.
My father carved this doll. It needs someone to play with it.
Toys for Orphans
I found a whole basket of toys to give to the kids. Hmm, there should be a doll somewhere around here too…
Look! Its little arms and legs move! The kids are going to love this!
Toys for Orphans
I decided to get involved and made a few toys for the kids.
I love children.
Toys for Orphans
I saw a doll! I will give it to the children!
By helping others, we help ourselves! Good deeds soften the heart.
Toys for Orphans
Sheriti didn't just collect toys for the orphans… she also warmed the townspeople's hearts!
It's so beautiful! All right, I've memorized the pattern. You can let it go!
Young Naturalist
I want to study the pattern on the butterfly's wings so I can paint it!
It says here: "It is not so hard to find the Path of Truth as it is to follow it."
Prophecies of the Ancients
Decipher notes for the Master? All right, show them to me…
Helping the Beekeeper
Would you please help me check the beehives? I can’t do it alone by sunset.
That means Truth opens the mind.
Prophecies of the Ancients
It says here that a person who steps onto the Path of Truth becomes free of ignorance.
Let this lamp be a symbol of letting go of superstitious thoughts.
Ritual of Liberation
We must help the city free itself of superstitions. Let's perform a symbolic ritual.
Sometimes Truth must be given voice in symbols rather than facts.
Ritual of Liberation
This is just ordinary chalk, but to add weight to our ritual, we need to give it an air of mystique.
This crystal should cool the passion of superstition like a cool breeze.
Ritual of Liberation
A crystal scepter symbolizes clarity of judgment and pureness of heart.
This knife will symbolize the cutting away of superstition.
Ritual of Liberation
Understanding alone is not enough for change. Old beliefs must be cut away.
It is believed that this helps to reinforce willpower and maintain steadfastness.
Ritual of Liberation
As a symbol, hematite will remind people to be wise and brave.
We did it! I'm so glad we managed to get through to the townspeople!
Ritual of Liberation
By collecting all these symbols, we can open the Portal of Liberation and dispel the rumors.
Look, this is a symbol of the person’s spirit in life.
The Next World
Sometimes people believe in ghosts for good reason. I agree, even I've succumbed to the panic. Let's just forget about this and help Nimiru.
What do you mean it wasn't a ghost!? My sword broke from corrosion!?
The Next World
I've decided to appease the ghost that destroyed my sword. I'll give him gold as a gift.
I have good news, too. There’s a way not to be a prisoner of your bad feelings.
The Next World
Ba, the human spirit, turns out to be a prisoner of the feelings it felt during its life.
