If people reform themselves during their lives, then the soul is cleaned, like this amber.
The Next World
How do you not succumb to being a prisoner of your feelings? See this blue amber? It was once black…
Just as I thought! This stone is cursed!
Revenge of the Pharaohs
The owner of this stone claims that his illnesses are linked to the pharaohs’ curse!
Any contact with the antimonite puts you at risk of being poisoned unless you're very careful!
Revenge of the Pharaohs
Look what else I found with our cursed patient! Look at that silver!
I’m afraid to imagine what we’ll find next…
Revenge of the Pharaohs
Oh, gods! Cinnabar is the main source for obtaining mercury.
Why does he have so many dangerous stones in his home!?
Revenge of the Pharaohs
Just look, Galena! This isn’t a house. This is a ticking bomb.
Where did he get all these stones from!?
Revenge of the Pharaohs
This mineral is dangerous! It contains uranium!
The ancients placed poisonous stones in tombs to punish thieves for their transgressions.
Revenge of the Pharaohs
Just think about it! The soldiers that robbed the tomb paid the poor fellow for a place to sleep using the stones!
I never thought the thieves might be our own soldiers!
Revenge of the Pharaohs
The thieves stole the High Ruler’s crown right from the tomb!
The disturbance in the city has settled down some, but how long will it last?
Revenge of the Pharaohs
Too many people believe that the disasters in the city are the work of ghosts.
Why do people even need this rubbish?
Revenge of the Pharaohs
I found another stolen item in the barracks! This is chaos!
It’s true what they say: thievery clouds common sense.
Revenge of the Pharaohs
This stolen chest was also seen with the accused soldiers! Why did they need it in the barracks?
Our ancestors’ horses became as fast as the wind after they were tamed.
Cave Story
I’m leaving for distant cavers where our ancestors lived. Will you keep me company?
One needs great courage and cleverness to defeat the beast.
Cave Story
Our ancestors hunted alone. Was it dangerous?
This bird frightened our ancestors.
Cave Story
The Roc is a bird that could carry man in its talons.
The brave hunter was the chief of our ancestors.
Cave Story
Hunting is important business.
Right! Ancient person!
Cave Story
I recognize the image. You too?
As a Wise One, everyone wanted to see it for themselves. Pride is a terrible thing.
Cave Story
The ancestors’ art ends here. The chief says it’s the last drawing.
Serving Dinner
To serve a dish for dinner, we'll need some fresh olives.
Work in the Bakery
I need a cup of water for my pie dough! I love my job!
Caring for the Elderly
I'm off to see the Farmer for provisions. Want to keep me company?
I slept so sweetly last night! Thanks so much for the help!
Caring for the Elderly
I've been struggling with insomnia lately. Be a good friend and gather some sedative herbs for my pillow!
This whistle sounds like a bird’s song.
Joyful Warble
Clay whistles shaped like animals will help the littlest kids in their studies!
It turned out well!
Joyful Warble
A whistle shaped like an antelope is a great idea. The antelope is a symbol of striving for perfection.
Oh, and it sounds so funny!
Joyful Warble
I came up with a new shape for a funny-sounding whistle. Let's make one shaped like a fly!
Because of its long life, the turtle is considered a symbol of good health in old age.
Joyful Warble
I've always wanted to make a whistle shaped like a turtle.
The sound it makes is odd, but I like it.
Joyful Warble
What if we make a whistle shaped like a fish that you'll only be able to blow under water?
I think this ocarina is too complicated for kids' games. Let's give them all away except this one, all right?
Joyful Warble
Such a strange instrument! I'm not sure we should give it to the kids as a toy…
Helping the Elderly
I've started building some new hives for my beloved bees. Have you seen my carpenter's plane?
Thank you! Now I have enough materials for all the hives!
Helping the Elderly
I'm afraid I miscalculated the amount of materials I need to build the hives…
Thanks a lot!
Helping the Elderly
To prevent the hive roof from rotting, I need to add a good coat of varnish. Could you bring me some?
May the gods favor you for your kindness!
Helping the Elderly
I have another favor to ask you… I hope my requests aren't starting to annoy you.
That gift immediately made its recipient an agent of the pharaoh!
Nub-It's Punishment
Once upon a time, the pharaoh gave the leopard skin from his own back to a citizen!
So the unknown Nub-It suddenly became an important person!
Nub-It's Punishment
The new agent of the pharaoh was called Nub-It. On that same day he was given a wig of authority!
This caused rumors to spread about Nub-It’s fear of sunlight…
Nub-It's Punishment
Nub-It would not leave home without a fan, even at night!
They said that the jug held the blood of criminals.
Nub-It's Punishment
Many noticed that Nub-It always carried a strange jug filled with red liquid.
They say he was even buried with the cat.
Nub-It's Punishment
Nub-It loved only one creature – his cat!
I don't know whether to believe the rumors or not, but the bust turned out great!
Nub-It's Punishment
One of my customers cut Nub-It’s likeness out of wood. Want to see?
Work in the Bakery
I'm such a klutz! I'm making rolls, and just now realized that I don't have enough raisins!
Wholemeal flour is better for your health, but it tastes different.
Work in the Bakery
Should I go with wholemeal flour or not?
Work in the Bakery
The Farmer has to deliver his products to the bakery, but I don't think he can manage it alone…
Ah, here they are. You have a sharp eye!
Work in the Bakery
It's time to put the dough in the oven! Where are my baking trays?
Her soul was stone. She didn’t love her own children… only her followers.
Statues of the Banished
I know about the banished gods! One banished goddess called Snake Mother sacrificed people.
The chief was bloodthirsty that he killed his own army across from the sea.
Statues of the Banished
The old gods were driven out for their terrible deeds. One of them, the Descending Eagle, was a bloodthirsty chief.
Osiris was Lord of Bones’ enemy.
Statues of the Banished
Lord of Bones was terrible… he had no goodness in his heart.
The warrior woman was foolish when she was angry.
Statues of the Banished
The warrior woman smote people on her altar. She did not know love.
The Master of Flame’s servants set fires around the city!
Statues of the Banished
Master of Flame was a cruel god. People made a red stone statue of him. Red as blood.
People confused reality and made him out to be a monster. He wanted to save them, but it turned into a nightmare.
Statues of the Banished
Feathered Snack was chief god. It’s believed he created the world.
The silver harp’s music at sunset is just wonderful.
Pleasant Evening
Recently, there’s been a lot of confusion in the city. Playing music calms me down.
If it’s dark in mine, you must find light!
Safe Path
The danger isn’t the darkness in the mine, but the darkness in the soul! You must just find the light in the mine…
Now the path is clear!
Safe Path
The building materials are blocking the entrance. We need to move it to go in!
The hyena didn't bite anyone. I'll take care of it!
Wild Hyena
A hungry hyena ran into the city. We need to catch it at once!
What a fun invention from your world! It's such a hoot riding on it around the city. The boys will be green with envy!
Things of the Future
Tell me about your world. I really want to know how kids my age have fun there!
This straw hat looks like ours except the brim is only on one side…
Things of the Future
How do people in your world protect themselves from the hot midday sun?
These things are called sunglasses?
Things of the Future
What if the sun is shining right in your eyes?
Now I can hear the sea in these seashells whenever I want!
Things of the Future
What do people from your world like the most? Me, I like listening to the sound of the ocean or playing musical instruments. How about you?
How did I never come up with the idea of making a bag out of coconuts?
Things of the Future
What do girls look like in your world? Do they look different somehow? Do tell!
Riding on this thing is way more fun than running.
Things of the Future
Do people ride horses in your world, or use other animals to get around?
Perfect, a bottle of fine white wine!
Work in the Brewery
One of my customers ordered wine, but there isn't a single bottle in the cellar.
Thanks for the help!
Work in the Brewery
Can you help count the proceeds for the day while I serve the customers?
A wonderful vintage!
Work in the Brewery
A ship with merchants has arrived in the city. They have delicious pomegranate wine among their wares.
It's a good thing the purse's owner turned up.
Work in the Brewery
One of my customers left a purse here. How am I going to find its owner?
This training equipment is nothing special… yet.
Athlete's Training
What do people do in your world to train?
Dumbbells help build muscles.
Athlete's Training
I think I’ll join you in the training. I have everything I need!
Whew! Look at my lifting all this weight!
Athlete's Training
I'm used to training with a heavier weight! Bring some more!
I'm not sure this is what I need… But I'll try it!
Athlete's Training
Can you recommend some training equipment that could improve coordination?
The more the equipment weighs, the more quickly their attacks become in battle.
Athlete's Training
Training with a medicine ball strengthens the core and improves coordination.
Training hard makes fighting easier.
Athlete's Training
This equipment is everything you need for excellent training.

My wooden jewelry box fell on the floor and cracked! What can I replace it with?
Helping the Elderly
Hornets have attacked the apiary! Hurry! I need to get rid of those vicious insects!
She still has these beads. I made them a long time ago when we walked along the shore.
Day-to-Day Hassles
When my wife broke her jewelry box, and some of her jewelry got lost! I want to help her find it…
Now everyone will know that this is a house cat.
Thoughtful Sheriti
I found a homeless kitty on the street! Help me pick out a collar for her!
The owner was found? Perfect.
Surviving Refugees
In all the fuss, one of the refugees left this knapsack with provisions. We need to get it back to its owner!
They came all this way and still had that chicken. Strange.
Surviving Refugees
The refugees gave us this chicken as a sign of gratitude. Let's take it to the chicken pen.
Look, it's so small and cute!
Surviving Refugees
A little goat was born on the crossing through the desert in the caravan. I think that's a good sign!
A good dog is a loyal dog!
Surviving Refugees
The refugees say that this dog joined them on the road and protected their cart! Maybe Sheriti can find a place for it in her animal refuge?
This ox pulled a refugee cart most of the way here.
Surviving Refugees
Please take this tired creature to the stables! It really needs some rest…
How many villages has Menes destroyed? He’s a wicked person!
Surviving Refugees
There's a refugee cart in the rear courtyard. Let's fix it up!
This is still better than sleeping on a cold, hard floor…
Surviving Refugees
A few poor souls took refuge in my house, but I have no place for them to sleep!
The work went great!
Surviving Refugees
These materials can be used to make homes for the new arrivals. Let's get to work!
It's a shame that I can't do more for them.
Surviving Refugees
The refugees need to regain their strength! Milk is a great way to do that and fuel the spirit!
Thanks for helping the city!
Surviving Refugees
This is all I had left in the workshop after the fire. Maybe someone else needs it more?
The staff is here, but the old man is gone! Hmm…

I learned from the refugees that they last saw the old man among a crowd. He limped, leaning on an old staff for support.
What a strange scent. It smells like the potion that gives you strength.
Disappearing Old Man
It turns out the old man didn't eat anything on the road! All he had were drinks.
It's strange that we're finding all these things in the road! Is the old man in trouble, or…?
Disappearing Old Man
They say the old man wore a sheepskin. Maybe that will make it easier to find him?
I don't want to believe that the old man we're looking for is a fraud!
Disappearing Old Man
Look what the children found on the next street over! It looks like our runaway is younger than we thought…
We need to find the fraudster, and fast!
Disappearing Old Man
Is this the stranger's instrument? Only snake charmers use flutes like this!
This snake was trained to be a killer!
Disappearing Old Man
The person you're looking for is surely a spy! Just look at what I found in my chambers…
Let's return it to where it should be…

Look what I bought from a wandering merchant! Tutankhamun's necklace!
Gold earned at another's expense doesn’t bring happiness.
Precious Relics
The merchant I bought the necklace from returned all my money when he found out it was stolen!
This merchant seems like a good guy, right?
Precious Relics
The merchant said that he sold Tutankhamun's necklace before he learned that these were stolen.
The merchant lost a small fortune on this deal. He'll be more careful about who he buys his goods from next time.
Precious Relics
What luck! The apologetic merchant wants to help us find the missing necklace!
The kids just love this kite!
Conquerors of the Air
There are some children among the refugees! We need to take their minds off dark thoughts at once!
I'm so proud of my kids' success!
Conquerors of the Air
Look! The first launch inspired the kids to make such a wonderful kite!
These kites are bringing so much joy to the kids and the grown-ups!
Conquerors of the Air
I noticed that there are some colorful sheets flying through the sky. What are they?
It turned out great!
Conquerors of the Air
We can paint a kite to look like something… like a bee, for example!
I never thought this hobby would catch my interest!
Conquerors of the Air
Sheriti decided to give her kite to the soldiers! She's so generous!
The children can't tear their eyes away from the sky!
Conquerors of the Air
Let's launch many kites into the sky! Let them represent our freedom from Menes!

I want to give this flower vine to the refugees as a sign of the peace they will find here.
Phew! I think we made it in time.

We need to hurry and deliver all the fresh fruit and vegetables for the newly arrived refugees!
There’s already a new leaf! That means the tree is growing!
The Farmer's Profession
The Nomad wants to grow a tree! That's a nice thing to do. Why don't we give him a hand?
You're doing great for a newbie!
The Farmer's Profession
The Lady wants us to replant her sapling. That require skills.
The leaves have to be carefully taken off the stem and cut into small pieces.

We have to mince the garlic cloves, then mix them in with the jute leaves.
Traditional Dish
I'm going to need several garlic cloves for my dish.
Coriander adds aroma and flavor to the dish.
Traditional Dish
I need some coriander, or the dried seed of the cilantro.
You're doing a great job!
Traditional Dish
All families have different ways of making mulukhiyah. In our family, we add shrimp.
Mmm, not bad! What do you think?
Traditional Dish
We serve rice cakes separately from the main dish.
I'm glad that everyone is satisfied!
Traditional Dish
Dinner is ready. Time to call everyone to the table!

Concentrating on the flame helps calm my thoughts.
Working with Consciousness
I’m sleeping better… but I still need to sleep with a light because of the nightmares.
Now I’m sleeping well again and wake up rested in the morning.
Working with Consciousness
These nightmares take up a lot of energy. Maybe some myrrh incense will help me relax?
You were right! As soon as I stopped obsessing over my dreams, the nightmares passed!
Working with Consciousness
I can't understand why I keep dreaming of Menes! Hmm, you think it's better not to be fixated on interpreting the dreams?

Hurry and melt the butter in the bain-marie! We'll add it to the mixture!
Hmm, it turned out very taste. Looks like the chocolate mixture is ready!
Homemade Chocolate
Keep mixing our chocolate concoction until it reaches a boil, then take it off the flame!
Homemade Chocolate

Homemade Chocolate
I've buttered the mold and the chocolate mix has already set a little. It's time to pour it into the cells. Can you do it?

Face Mask
We got the effect we need, the chocolate has completely melted. Now we need some vegetable oil!
This is a very convenient brush for applying the mask to the face. Its bristles are so soft and they don't irritate the skin at all.
Face Mask
Face Mask
After I take the mask off my face, I'll need some moisturizing cream. Go get some!
I can't wait to try the miracle-working properties of this chocolate mask on my face!
Face Mask
If the mask is done already, pour it into a suitable container and bring it here!
Perfect fresh fish! It can't have been an hour since it was caught from the river.

The fish must be well cooked in wine with flour and onions until golden brown.
Fish in Chocolate
To make my unusual dish, we're going to need some good white wine. You know where to get some!
These pieces of chocolate will be enough to make a delicious chocolate and white wine sauce.
Fish in Chocolate

Hmm, the chocolate sauce turned out great! It tastes just as good as the one I usually make.

Pour the chocolate sauce onto the fish in the tray and stew it for a while over a low flame. Get it out when it's ready!
A banana will be one of the three ingredients of the health potion for the hair!
Natural Shampoo

Natural Shampoo
The egg yolk nourishes the hairs all along their length and makes them soft and gleaming!
Natural Shampoo
The banana needs to be mashed up well with a fine grater.

Natural Shampoo

To squeeze out the lemon juice, we’ll use a hand juicer.

Natural Shampoo
All that remains is to thoroughly mix all the ingredients into a smooth paste.

Body Scrub
I want to share how I take care of my skin.
Body Scrub
Olive oil is a good moisturizer and contains calcium, iron, copper and the vitamins A, D and E.
Body Scrub
For aroma, we can add a little vanilla extract.
Just ten drops of the tincture will be enough for our recipe!
Body Scrub
Beauticians value melissa as a unique plant for removing defects on the skin.
Body Scrub
Regularly using cinnamon oil makes the skin clean, shining and supple.
We need to store the mixture in a cool place so it doesn’t go bad!
Body Scrub
Let’s place the mixture in a jar.
Fruit contains all kinds of vitamins!
Healthy Smoothie
It’s important to maintain health and beauty from within. Let’s make some healthy drinks out of fruit!
It’s healthy to eat a spoonful of honey in the morning.
Healthy Smoothie
Honey improves the blood, heightens immunity and gives energy.
Healthy Smoothie
Any kind of berries will do for our smoothie, either fresh or frozen.
If anything has more vitamins than fruits, it’s green vegetables!

That’s all the ingredients! Fantastic!

If you just mix the ingredients, all you’ll get is a paste. Let’s add some water.
Mmm, it’s tasty!

We’ve made not only a healthy drink, but a tasty one too.
I didn’t notice right away that there was something unusual about this cat, but later I realized that it has four ears!
Hissing Entourage
After Bastet’s announcement, everyone got to work searching for Nub-It’s cats. You should drop in at the animal pen.
Hissing Entourage
A strange cat wanders the corridors at night. It’s half ginger, half black. Maybe it’s one of Nub-It’s cats?
It’s so little, but it knows how to lock horns!
Hissing Entourage
I’ve seen much in my travels, of course, but I’ve never seen any horned cats. It’s prowling around my house.
It must be good at hunting birds with a skill like that…
Hissing Entourage
A winged cat? I’m sure this is one of the creatures you’re searching for. I thought I’d just imagined it.
What creatures won’t Nub-It come up with!?
Hissing Entourage
I got a bit shocked when I saw that I was being watched from the cellar. Could you check what sort of creature is hiding there?
I think this one was Nub-It’s favorite. Now he’s sure to get angry…
Hissing Entourage
A fiery cat is running across the roofs of the merchant tents. That thing has already started a fire in the market!
Worldly Affairs
I’ve run out of candles at home. I heard there’s a candle tree growing somewhere in the city.
Worldly Affairs
My kids are training hard, they need lots of strength and energy. I want to make sure they’re well fed.
Worldly Affairs
I want to add another decorative plant to my garden. I’ve wanted to plant a Nubian tree there for a long time.
We need to wait for the sap to start to harden. Then I’ll make a sword from it!
Worldly Affairs
It turns out the sap of the rubber tree can be used to make an excellent play sword. Will you help me get a little sap?
Hunting Nub-It
Nub-It can’t stand the smell of garlic. If we gather some and hang it over the front door, we’ll keep ourselves safe from his attacks.
Now there are enough weapons for all the townspeople.
Hunting Nub-It
An aspen stake is the best weapon against Nub-It. Time to work!
This crossbow is a lot more powerful than a bow.
Hunting Nub-It
I found some diagrams from the Ancients. They describe how to make an excellent crossbow.
Hunting Nub-It
Nub-It, like all monsters from the underworld, can be overpowered by silver. Find a silver dagger so that I can enchant it!
Lying in tomb his so long, Nub-It start hate the earth. It weaken his body, so he run away at night.
Hunting Nub-It
Know me what can weaken Nub-It. Earth from his tomb he terribly fear.
Hunting Nub-It
The townspeople have driven Nub-It into a trap. It’s time to deal the finishing blow!
Thanks to this figurine, the spirit of the priestess will receive a temporary body in the world of the living, and I’ll finally be able to speak to her.
Signs in Darkness
I’ve been trying to contact the powerful spirit of a priestess from the past. Will you help me?
The Eye of Atum ended up here for a reason. The god must want us to create a sacred altar in this place…
Signs in Darkness
The priestess’s spirit told me that somewhere in the caves, on one of the walls, the Eye of Atum has appeared. We have to find this sacred place at once!
There’s a reason the serpent god Atum chose an underground space for his altar. The naga will come here too to worship their god.
Signs in Darkness
I need some help to build the sacred altar of Atum.
I can explain the appearance of the sacred Uraeus on the cave wall – it is a blessing of Atum. He is pleased that we have erected an altar in his honor!
Signs in Darkness
There’s a new symbol in the caves. We have to see it!
This jellyfish is a valuable specimen! Many healers use them to cure illnesses of the lungs and to reduce arterial pressure.
Guests of the Depths
Many species of jellyfish swim in our waters, and I have plans to study them.
The stripes on this jellyfish appear as it matures. We have ourselves quite an old specimen.
Guests of the Depths
The striped jellyfish can inflict serious stings on a human. Be careful while you search for it!
This jellyfish can move through the water without using waves!
Guests of the Depths
I’ve always wanted to study a jellyfish that looks strangely like an egg yolk. You’ll know it when you see it.
The blue jellyfish isn’t native to these parts. The current of the north seas brings it to these waters.
Guests of the Depths
If you see a blue jellyfish with incredibly long tentacles, be careful – it’s very dangerous.
The sea nettle is the only flesh-eating species of jellyfish! But it mainly eats plankton, small fish and other jellyfish.
Guests of the Depths
I’m going to need your help to catch the largest and most dangerous jellyfish that inhabits our waters.
When the immortal jellyfish rejuvenates, it turns into a polyp for a while and falls to the ocean floor.
Guests of the Depths
The most unique species of jellyfish is the immortal jellyfish. It can live forever thanks to its ability to periodically make itself young again.
It seems the attacker used these silver threads to knock out my men.
Enemies All Around
Several of my soldiers have been put to sleep right at their posts. Search the area and tell me if you notice anything unusual!
This is one of Menes’s trained beasts. With the help of magic, the priest can see through the eyes of this rat.
Enemies All Around
I feel in my gut that someone is plotting something in the city. There could be spies everywhere.
I don’t like that it’s so quiet in the city. I think it’s the calm before the storm.
Enemies All Around
I’ve increased the patrols on the streets. The city isn’t safe right now. You’re going to have to head up one of the units.
Curses! These are poisonous arrows – a coward’s weapon.
Enemies All Around
To arms! The barracks has been attacked and many troops are seriously injured. We need to find out what sort of weapons the enemy used!
The figure-of-eight is one of the simplest seafaring knots there are. It serves as an excellent stopper at the end of a rope, to stop it flicking out.
Ocean Knots
Want to learn to tie seafaring knots? Let’s start with the figure-of-eight. Do as I do!
Ocean Knots
We leave a loop in this knot. It allows sailors to quickly undo it in an emergency and free up the sails.
This is the most useful knot I know.
Ocean Knots
I call this knot a quick loop. It never comes undone on its own, so it can be safely used to moor up a ship.
Sailors are very inventive people when they have nothing to do.
Ocean Knots
If you try, you can weave a whole rug for your cabin…
When sailors stock up on fresh water on the shore, they can carry full bottles back to their ship far more easily using a bottle sling.
Ocean Knots
The bottle sling was created for carrying bottles by attaching the knot to the bottleneck.
The three loops of the masthead knot makes it one of the most functional seafaring knots there is.
Ocean Knots
A masthead knot can be used not only for rigging sails and fixing backstays and flagstaffs, but also for carrying watermelons.
There’s still plenty of turquoise in the mines, and that means that we’ll have a deal with the southerners.
Worldly Affairs
Merchants from the south want to buy a large batch of turquoise from us, but there’s almost none left at the market. Find out whether there’s any left in the mines!
Worldly Affairs
I’ve wanted to do something nice for my husband for a long time by decorating the yard of his workshop. Help me plant some broom bushes in front of his house!
Worldly Affairs
The townspeople insist that there should be more green plants in the city. You’re going to need to get a little money from the treasury to make this happen!
Worldly Affairs
I could do with patching a few holes. I’m going to need some sap of the mastic tree.
With this ring, Menes could have read the thoughts of his subjects.
Coronation Outfit
The spirits have told me where to find the jewelry for Menes’s canceled coronation. First let’s find the ring!
Inside these bracelets lie the souls of two of Menes’s bodyguards.
Coronation Outfit
The jewelry for the coronation was stolen by Menes’s enemies and hidden throughout the city. I know where to find the bracelets.
Within the stones of this collar, Amrun sealed the spirits of the soldiers of the pharaoh Menetnasht, Menes’s father.
Coronation Outfit
Menes feared for his life after the country’s betrayal, so Amrun created a protective collar for his student.
This belt allowed its owner to create copies of himself and be in several places at once.
Coronation Outfit
I’ve discovered where Menes’s belt is hidden. We have to find it before our enemies do.
The earrings allowed their owner to hear any whisper echoing through the corridors of his palace.
Coronation Outfit
So many souls were lost for the sake of these artifacts. We have to find the earrings!
Coronation Outfit
Menes’s mask possesses the power of hypnosis. Find it, but be careful!
The children thought up another prank again and hid my sandals far out of sight.
Childish Prank
I can’t find my sandals, but I need to run to the market for some clay. Where could they have gotten to?
Dangerous Work
Mother’s Chores
Sheriti is so forgetful – she threw her new sandals down somewhere and now she can’t find them.
Now it’s time to see what it tastes like…
A Treat for Sheriti
The Baker is making delicious deserts today. Maybe we can grab a piece from him without him noticing?
This clothing was sewn of a fine material and was even beautifully embroidered.
Garb of the Past
The clothes of palace servants in the old days looked a lot richer than they do now. Let’s find one of their tunics!
Most palace servants of the Golden Age preferred to wear white – it was considered very fashionable.
Garb of the Past
I’ve discovered where we can find some servant’s clothing. It’s going to be a valuable specimen!
The palace guard always stood out for its gleaming parade armor made of precious metals.
Garb of the Past
It seems one of the townspeople still has the old clothing of a palace guardian with a few pieces of armor.
Look at the elegant patterns covering the neck and waist of this tunic!
Garb of the Past
Only rulers and noblemen were allowed to wear bright colors.
The ritual collar and belt indicate that this belonged to one of the pharaoh’s priests.
Garb of the Past
Priests throughout the ages have preferred white clothing decorated by ritual patterns.
Garb of the Past
A ceremonial dress of an ancient queen has been found among Nimiru’s treasures. I just can’t wait to see it!
The cow has always been a symbol of fertility. Fresh bread in the shape of this animal would be make an excellent offering on Min’s altar.
Offering to Min
The holiday of Min, the god of fertility, approaches. I’d like to offer an unusual gift at his altar.
Tax Collector
Bread for the Table
I’m expecting guests, and I’ve made lots of tasty dishes, but there isn’t enough fragrant fresh bread on the table.
This is excellent wine. I’m sure it’ll go down well with my guests.
Wine for the Holiday
How did you manage that? I would have been afraid to go anywhere near that horned giant!
Ancient Giants
Who would have thought that such huge creatures even exist!
Ancient Giants
A giant creature has stumbled into the Garden and started eating everything within sight! If you don’t stop it, the whole harvest will be gone!
Ancient Giants
A giant beast has made its way into my house. It’s already broken my stone stove!
I’ll spread the word that our sailors are not to go out to sea until we return this beast back to the caves.
Ancient Giants
Something very large has scared off all the fish and damaged several ships. We need to do something about this!
How do such creatures come to be? A herd of these winged beasts could ruin our entire city.
Ancient Giants
A terrible winged creature broke my sailwing. Get it away!
We’re going to have to work very hard to restore everything that these giants destroyed.
Ancient Giants
Our soldiers managed to drive the most sharp-toothed of the gigantic monsters onto the training ground. That thing is very dangerous!
Now it all looks just great!
Decorating a Cake
I made a beautiful cream cake, but I need one last thing to finish decorating it – a small cherry.
Now I don’t have to worry about not having anything to bake bread.
Provident Master
Fruit Salad
I’m making a salad out of fresh fruit. All I’m missing for it is avocado. Will you bring me one?
Sowing Season
I need to sow some new patches with pumpkin seeds, but I can’t find my supplies. I’ll have to buy some at the market.
These horns belonged to a mountain goat. Only I was able to catch the agile beast in our land!
Beast Crowns
Want to see my hunting collection? Then let’s go to the trophy hall. You’re about to see something exciting!
This is the horn of a crazed ox that burst into our village. Despite its strength and size, I managed to bring it down!
Beast Crowns
Hunting is an ancient ritual in which a man can challenge nature itself. So it was when I fought with an ox.
Once, I found myself in the desert all alone, with no food. I hunted an antelope for an entire day. I kept these horns to remind me of that trying time!
Beast Crowns
Help me find some antelope horns. They’re the smallest in my collection.
The situation seemed desperate, but I lured the enemy into the jungle and won!
Beast Crowns
These horns once belonged to the riding ram of a barbarian chieftain. My troops were defeated that day. The chieftain attacked me, riding that gigantic beast…
No beast in our lands has such horns. But the animals of the north are simply incredible!
Beast Crowns
Once, in the north, I saw a crowned animal. It was if its very appearance was a challenge to me.
The beast that carried these was huge and old. It lived in the darkest thicket of the wood, where people fear to go.
Beast Crowns
The time has come to show you my greatest achievement. I call these horns the Crown of the Forest Lord!
We need to ask Nimiru to think of a way to deal with these insects!
Protecting the Garden
There’s practically an invasion of aphids in the Garden. If we don’t deal with them, they’ll eat all the crops!
From a distance, this scarecrow looks like a living person. Now the birds will avoid the Garden.
Protecting the Garden
Will you help me make a scarecrow to frighten off uninvited guests?
Protecting the Garden
No sooner did we get rid of the aphids than an invasion of snails struck. Why all this trouble all of a sudden?
Caring for the Home
It’s time to bring some order to the house and patch up a few holes in the roof. I’ll get started on it on my days off.
There are still traces of paint on this brush. It looks like it was used very recently to deface one of the city walls.
Defilers of the City
I saw a man with a bamboo brush on the street. He tried to hide from me. I’ll hold him, you look for the weapon of the crime!
What need did the followers of Amrun have for a whole bucket of paint? It seems they had big plans…
Defilers of the City
There’s a group of Amrun’s followers in the next backstreet! They’re going to deface the walls again!
The followers of the cult draw on the walls with anything they can find. Even coal pencils!
Defilers of the City
It’s going to take a lot of time to clean the city walls of their scrawl!
This is some sponge that was used to make a stencil of Amrun in the main square of the city. Now I know where to look for the culprit!
Defilers of the City
I hope the disturbances will stop now. But how much time will we need to wash this powder from the stone statues..?
Defilers of the City
This goes beyond all bounds! The followers of Amrun are defacing the statues of the gods by covering them in a colorful powder.
This is the last statue that was defaced by the servants of Amrun. I’ll make sure it’s cleaned up right away!
Defilers of the City
The city is going back to normal. Are there are any defaced statues anywhere that we missed?
I’ll personally put this malcontent crowd to rest!
Disorder Again
The followers of Amrun are holding demonstrations against our gods in the city streets. We have to stop this!
Thank you for the help! You have a real gift for finding lost things.
Disorder Again
I wanted to sharpen my blade, but I can’t find a grindstone.
I want the squadron symbol of Montu to strike fear into the hearts of the traitors!
Disorder Again
I’m going to deploy our best squad of warriors to the city streets – the Children of Montu! Bring me their symbol!
Thanks to your courage and strength, we managed to beat back the enemy attack.
Disorder Again
The angry crowd of Amrun’s followers has attacked defenseless citizens. To arms, we must defend our brothers and sisters!
This is the letter ‘A’, or the symbol of the vulture. Since ancient times, this bird has been considered an embodiment of the destruction of all life.
Symbols of Amrun
I suspect that all the symbols left on the walls by Amrun’s servants spell out his name. Find the first letter!
Our ancestors believed that the owl symbolizes wisdom. But it was always wisdom of another kind, bordering on calculation and cunning…
Symbols of Amrun
Find where the letter ‘M’ has been drawn in the city. Hurry!
The Symbol of Enlightenment is an opening eye!
Symbols of Amrun
The picture is becoming clearer. Find another letter of Amrun’s name!
This is the Symbol of Appearance. It was this magical symbol that our enemy used to appear before mortals for the first time…
Symbols of Amrun
I can’t wait to solve all the riddles of Amrun’s name. We need the next letter. Find it!
The crown is the Symbol of Power. This is Amrun’s true goal – limitless power over humanity…
Symbols of Amrun
Help me solve the mystery of Amrun’s name – find the last symbol!
This symbol represents Amrun’s system of power, in which a few rule over many, and he sits at the height of this pyramid and rules over all!
Symbols of Amrun
The Symbols of Amrun aren’t the only things his followers have been daubing on the walls.
I still don’t know what has brought so many bats to our city, but I’ll get to the bottom of it…
Trouble on Trouble
A horde of predatory bats has invaded the city. I’m sure there’s magic at the root of this.
We have to stick together to survive these troubled times…
Trouble on Trouble
The sun burns stronger and stronger with each passing day. The plants are dying and the animals have nothing to drink.
Trouble on Trouble
All the crops that survived the burning heat of the sun must be harvested and distributed among the townspeople.
Trouble on Trouble
A dark cloud is advancing from the desert. Could rain finally be on its way? Find out what’s on the horizon!
This is the Pillar of Bravery, dedicated to our fearless Warrior. It is to be installed on the military training ground.
Monument Pillars
The Chief wants me to create several monument pillars for the city in honor of its most respected citizens. Will you help me?
Monument Pillars
The next pillar will be dedicated to my good wife. She’s helped many of the city’s people. I’m so proud of her!
The Master is worthy of a monument so that our descendants can remember his name and be proud of the fact that he was a respected member of this city!
Monument Pillars
We owe our knowledge of the history of our ancestors to the Master. He deserves a monument of his own.
Monument Pillars
You can’t find a more loyal comrade in this city than the Brewer. We should make a monument dedicated to him and call it the Pillar of Friendship. I’ll help you!
This pillar is dedicated to our unequalled Mistress Nimiru! She truly is beautiful…
Monument Pillars
The Pillar of Djed is a symbol of sheaves of wheat. Grains were the first plant domesticated by man.
Monument Pillars
We need to create another pillar in honor of the one who toils every day to feed us – the Farmer! He’ll be glad to get a little attention for himself!
Shipbuilding
Shipbuilding
I’ve decided to build a new ship. Work is underway on its hull right now.
Shipbuilding
To install the masts on the deck of the new ship, we’ll need to construct a lifting mechanism. Make some strong cogs for it!
With oars like this and a hundred skilled rowers, the new ship will be the fastest in our flotilla!
Shipbuilding
The ship is almost done, but before we can launch it on its maiden voyage, we need oars. Hurry and bring them here!
Just what my dish needs!
Spiced Eggplants
Mmm, good peppers. Truly fiery!
Spiced Eggplants
Spiced eggplants are renowned for the amount of spices used to make them, including very hot ones.
Spiced Eggplants
It seems I forgot to add greens to the dish. Hurry and bring me some parsley!
I’m sure the aroma from my kitchen is already floating all along the street…
Spiced Eggplants
Spiced Eggplants
Huh, what’s that smell? I totally forgot to add a little more oil to the dish. Bring me some, before the eggplants burn!
This dish is all thanks to you! Without you, I’d never have been able to make something so tasty. My husband even asked for seconds AND thirds…
Spiced Eggplants
Dinner is ready! Hurry, serve it up and take it to the tables!
Now I can rest easy knowing my products are safe.
Household Chores
Bats have taken up roost in the cellar of the brewery. I need them gone! I think this is right up your alley. Will you help me?
Household Chores
I can’t find my favorite cat-shaped pillow. The Warrior gave it to me. What am I to do?
Thank you for the help! It’s all here to the last coin!
Household Chores
I sold a whole cart of bread to the barracks, but didn’t pick up the payment yet – I’ve been too busy in the bakery.
Since I started making lots of flour for the soldiers, they’ve been showering me with gratitude. They say the food in the barracks used to be a lot worse…
Household Chores
Dinner is soon. I need to make lots of thick soup for the soldiers. Will you help me?
Now that we have one of the stones of the Stellar Wanderers, we can start looking for the others.
Monument to the Wanderers
It is known that the Stellar Wanderers left four unusual stones in these lands. If we find one of them, we’ll be able to find the others too!
I was right. Soon we’ll have them all!
Monument to the Wanderers
I think I’ve calculated the location of the second of the Wanderers’ mysterious stones. Let’s go and see if I’m right!
Monument to the Wanderers
All the Wanderers’ stones are an equal distance away from each other. The third isn’t far from us. Go get it!
We now have all four stones. They differ in color and the notches on their surfaces. What could this mean?
Monument to the Wanderers
I can hardly believe this, but the fourth stone of the Wanderers is buried right beneath my house.
Monument to the Wanderers
Apart from the stones, the Wanderers created an incredible statue. I feel a great power emanating from it, but I don’t want to risk touching it without you!
We do all the right way. Power like mighty freed. All townspeople feel it!
Monument to the Wanderers
Me find ancient place in city which scrolls speak of. We need place statue and stones of Wanderer there.
A special unit of the pharaoh used arrows with glass heads to hunt ghosts…
Excavation
There are many unusual things underground, but my interest is in glass arrowheads. It would be nice if you could find even a single specimen!
Good stone – it’ll make a great kiln. I know better than anyone!
New Kiln
My business is growing. One kiln just doesn’t cut it any more.
I recognize this arrow head – one just like it was on the arrow of the hired killer that broke into the palace. Now I know where to find him!
Attack
Escape from a Cage
It’s obvious that the Stellar Conquerors were well defended creatures. Few would dare to challenge them…
Stellar Wanderers
The Stellar Conquerors most often visited our world. At the behest of the Ancients, these creatures protected our ancestors from evil. Find a figurine of one of them!
Stellar Wanderers
Our ancestors often called the Ancients themselves Stellar Wise Ones. I know where to find a figurine of one of them.
The scrolls say that the Outsider was a fierce monster. Many brave men died attempting to overcome him, but in the end the enemy was defeated…
Stellar Wanderers
The Stellar Outsider was one of the most dangerous and mysterious creatures there ever was. While I read about him in the scrolls, you try to find his figurine!
The Vagabond accidentally left his world and couldn’t go back. He settled in these lands and grew old among our ancestors…
Stellar Wanderers
The stellar Vagabond is mentioned in the tales of the ancestors as a good friend to humanity. I can’t wait to see the figurine of that creature!
It says in the scrolls that the Hunter sought out the Outsider. He took his remains and left our lands soon after. A strange story…
Stellar Wanderers
Finding the figurine of the Stellar Hunter will be easy. It says in the scrolls that this Wanderer never took off his helm!
It is believed that the Wanderers visit our realm once every thousand years. But as for what their goal is, that remains a mystery…
Stellar Wanderers
I wonder what the Wanderers in Time looked like, the ones that created their unusual memorial.
I plan to serve sliced pieces of nutty cheese as an extra snack with the main dish. It’ll be delicious!
Snack for the Table
Pleasant Tea Party
Want to drink some tea with me? I’ve been wanting to sit and have a good chat for a while now!
My grandmother gave me this cheese recipe – it’s a real treat! If you want, I’ll tell you how to make it…
A Treat with Tea
I haven’t treated you to my fine fruit cheese yet!
I traded a barrel of my best beer with some northerners for this recipe. I can’t wait to try it for myself!
New Recipe
I’m thinking to make a new tasty drink out of honey, but I’m going to need a few ingredients for it. My new drink will be called ‘mead’.
Scarab Pendants
I’m planning to buy some jewelry for myself from some visiting merchants. You have such good taste – will you help me choose?
Scarab Pendants
I lost my favorite silver pendant in the shape of a scarab – it was a gift from my husband. Will you help me find it?
Scarab Pendants
A valuable piece of jewelry has been stolen from the treasury. We need to return it, whatever it takes!
What an unusual piece of jewelry! But how it got here is a real mystery to me!
Scarab Pendants
It seems I baked something hard with the bread. It doesn’t look like filling, but what could it be?
Only with the support of the Great Scarab can one learn to command the sands. This pendant will help me acquire his power!
Scarab Pendants
Mother-of-pearl is the favorite color of my beloved siren! She’s sure to like this jewelry!
Scarab Pendants
I really miss my beloved siren. When we meet again, I’d like to give her something unusual.
Folk Remedy
Ugh, this burning sun is really getting on my nerves! I could really use some refreshing mint tea.
Quackery
I’m going to need some fresh acacia leaves to make my new healing potion. But they must only be collected at night, otherwise they lose their potency!
Thanks to you, I managed to learn much about rare herbs and the potions that can be made from them!
Quackery
Palm leaves release an oil that preserves the healing properties in medicine for longer, keeping it potent for years.
Quackery
The Ancients gave our ancestors much knowledge, but not all of it survived to our time. Now we have the opportunity to study it for ourselves!
Ancestral Medicine
This disc of the Ancients talks about the origin of various species of creatures. But without you, I can’t decipher it!
All nine months of the development of new life are described here.
Ancestral Medicine
This disc shows the development process of fruit.
An ideal medical instrument!
Ancestral Medicine
The Ancients used unusual instruments to perform complex operations. It’d be nice to find at least one of them!
All medical instruments of the ancient times were made of lydite. This stone is very hard and almost impossible to break!
Ancestral Medicine
If you manage to find any more ancient medical instruments, bring them to me at once – such things are extremely rare!
Few can bear toothache. It’s very important to study medicine of this kind.
Ancestral Medicine
Incredibly, our ancestors learned how to heal damaged teeth from the Ancients. Want to see confirmation of this?
The Ancients believed that everything in the world consists of tiny little particles, which they called Kernels. This orb is a perfect copy of the shape of such a kernel!
Ancestral Medicine
Help me find a lydite orb. I’ve kept it in my house for a long time, but only now do I finally realize what it is!
With this machine, I can make enough clothes for everyone – the children and the homeless alike!
Seamstress
I’ve decided to take up weaving. There are many children in the Sepat, and not enough clothes to go round.
Thanks to you, today I managed to make a tidy profit! I wouldn’t mind having more days like that!
Trading Skills
Agile Hands
The kids and I climbed the trees and I accidentally tore my dress. I need to find a needle and carefully mend it. Will you help me?
Danger in the Night
A black beast has taken up residence in one of the caves and is terrorizing the outskirts of the city. Please, catch it!
Actually, there's nothing scary going on. It's just Halloween! Our people celebrate this holiday every year.
Halloween Metamorphosis
It's that time again, when the gates into the past and future open between the worlds of the living and the dead. Spirits rush to earth, taking on all kinds of forms…
I want to make a ghost costume and celebrate with everyone.
Halloween Metamorphosis
To frighten off ghosts, people have to dress in terrifying costumes and go out in the streets. I'm planning to wear one too.
This pendant is small, but it's a very important part of my costume.
Halloween Metamorphosis
A fish eye makes a great complementary amulet for my image.
Wow, it's a real bat! Great idea!
Halloween Metamorphosis
I want to add something small, yet significant to my outfit. I haven't decided what it might be yet…
Great work! These teeth look very realistic.
Halloween Metamorphosis
My holiday costume is almost ready, there's just a little left to do… Find a craftsman that can make me some big sharp teeth.
My costume is ready! I can't wait to wear it and go celebrate. Nobody will recognize me!
Halloween Metamorphosis
There isn't much time left before the holiday! Thanks for helping me, I wouldn't have made it in time on my own.
What a nice ripe pumpkin! Let me show you how to make a great Jack-o'-lantern out of it.
Jack-o'-lantern
Did you know that the symbol of the coming holiday is the Jack-o'-lantern? It can be made out of an ordinary pumpkin growing in my garden!
Just what we need! This knife will come in handy not only for cleaning the pumpkin, but for working with it after that too.
Jack-o'-lantern
First, we need to clear the pulp out of the pumpkin, and that means I'll need a knife with a fine blade.
I always have a lot of Jack-o'-lantern orders on the eve of Halloween, because it's the symbol of the holiday.
Jack-o'-lantern
Sometimes, when I want to make a lot of Jack-o'-lanterns, I use a stencil to cut out the pumpkin, using a ready template.
By the way, you can paint Jack-o'-lanterns in some very fun and original ways.
Jack-o'-lantern
I don't really like noise or merrymaking, so I won't be going to the celebration. But I've always liked carving faces on pumpkins.
Great! But we'll need to watch all night to make sure the candle doesn't go out.
Jack-o'-lantern
The Jack-o'-lantern is practically done, but one important part remains – a lit candle. Please find me one.
I think the Jack-o'-lantern turned out better than ever this year!
Jack-o'-lantern
You should place the Jack-o'-lantern at the threshold of your home and light the candle. Not only will it frighten off spirits, but it'll lend a holiday atmosphere and make your home cozier.
I know that no spirits will bother us this night, and people only wear frightening costumes to have a good time!
Holiday Mask
You've probably already heard about the night when the border between the worlds of the living and the dead begins to blur?
Thanks for helping me! Now things will go much quicker.
Holiday Mask
I want to make a mask for the Nomad. He's always off doing business far from the city and never has time to properly prepare for holidays.
Good job! This is just what I need!
Holiday Mask
I need to tear some papyrus into a bunch of small pieces. That's the most important part in a papier-mâché mask.
With these paints, I'll make the mask more frightening and expressive.
Holiday Mask
All spirits fear bright colors, so I'll need some paint.
I'll need to split this tree bark into several pieces and attach them at both sides of the mask.
Holiday Mask
Before decorating the mask, I need to cover it with a fine layer of wood to make it sturdy.
If you are brave enough on this night, dress up as a monster and… have a blast!
Holiday Mask
I think the Nomad is going to love my creation!
Some people think that men can cook no worse than women. Help me prove it.
Stuffed Turkey
I'm going to cook a stuffed turkey. I'll need half a day to marinate it in orange juice.
Rosemary is evergreen. You can smell citrus notes in its aroma.
Stuffed Turkey
To give the meat a special flavor, we need some rosemary.
The Farmer often shares interesting facts. Did you know that a corn cob always has an even number of flowers?
Stuffed Turkey
Corn is an important ingredient in our dish. To get all the benefit from corn, we need not only to eat its kernels, but also cook dishes with corn.
Great! This is just what we need!
Stuffed Turkey
We need cranberry sauce. I can't imagine eating duck or turkey without it. It's a perfect sauce for meat!
Yam skin is rough and smooth, making yams hard to peel. But it softens when warmed.
Stuffed Turkey
Turkey is usually served with garnish like sweet yams. Its tubers look like little mother-of-pearl shells.
It's like you're part of the family already. You should join us at our holiday feast.
Stuffed Turkey
Turkey is a traditional Thanksgiving dish. No family starts celebrating without it!
It took us a lot of time to find what we needed. But I promise you, it's worth it!
Holiday Symbol
I have an idea about the holiday!
Great! I promise you, no animals were hurt!
Holiday Symbol
Soon you'll find out what I'm going to do, but now help me collect feathers.
Wow! This is what we need!
Holiday Symbol
Now I need a substance that I can sculpt out of!
An awesome autumn bouquet! You've made a great composition, you know.
Holiday Symbol
I like the smell of fallen leaves. Let's get an autumn bouquet together. It'll come in handy for my idea.
There we go. You've probably already guessed what we're going to do.
Holiday Symbol
Oh, I almost forgot! I'll need some orange paint and a brush.
Look at the beautiful turkey we've made! It's an excellent decoration for the house on holidays. We need to put it where everyone can see it!
Holiday Symbol
A turkey is the main symbol of Thanksgiving. It has to take a place of honor in the house!
It's a good thing you brought a ready crust for our pie. It'll speed up the cooking process!
Pumpkin Pie
On the eve of Thanksgiving, I want to make a pumpkin pie for the orphan children. Let's get started!
It's nice when you have a garden where almost all crops have grown!
Pumpkin Pie
The pie crust is almost all the work done! Now let's pick out the best pumpkin!
I never thought you'd find what we need so quickly!
Pumpkin Pie
I need some yogurt to make the pie filling extra soft and flavored.
Well done! You're a great helper!
Pumpkin Pie
Now I need some chicken eggs.
The cinnamon properties were known to our distant ancestors. They used it both as a spice and a medicine.
Pumpkin Pie
Sugar and cinnamon will be the key flavorings in our pie. The secret of taste lies in spices!
The kids will be overjoyed with the surprise we've prepared for them!
Pumpkin Pie
Actually, it isn't hard to make a pumpkin pie at all when I have a helper like you!
Good sea gods, so many knots! When I find out who did this, I'll make them scrub heads for a month!
Little Prankster
Someone's thrown all the ropes about the deck for people to get tangled up in. There has to be order on a ship!
Someone keeps deliberately throwing frogs into milk to sour it. It must be some hooligans from the Sepat.
Little Prankster
Recently, the milk has started to go bad very quickly.
Seth take the one who did this!
Little Prankster
I want to go to the training ground and practice my swordplay.
Ugh, that was my best barrel of honey, and someone dropped this black filth in it.
Little Prankster
I heard some rustling at the barrel storehouse. Go check out what's going on!
This horse looks worn out… Who could treat an animal this way?
Little Prankster
A horse went missing from the stables last night. Was it stolen?
This creature set up his lair right under my nose! Just look at him – he's so small, but he's caused so many troubles!
Little Prankster
I think I found the trickster that had been causing trouble for the citizens. Help me catch him!
New Uniform
To sew a new uniform for the city guard, I'll need some good, durable cloth.
New Uniform
First, let's cut out some patterns for the new clothes!
Food for Thought
I know a recipe for a delicious and healthy dish from honey and walnuts. Guess what is missing!
This food will last the whole season! Now I can rest easy knowing that we won't go hungry any time soon.
Seasonal Supplies
If we pay a little more attention to our new friend, he will help the citizens in time of need!
Helpful Brownie
I told you the brownie would be only too happy to help. He sorted all my grain and put it into sacks.
The one who did this is a true homemaker! I've wanted such a responsible helper for a long time!
Helpful Brownie
Last night someone decided to wash all the clothes in the Sepat! Will you help me hang it all out to dry?
This is very strange, but the cart has everything I wanted to collect in it. Unbelievable!
Helpful Brownie
I wanted to put together a cart of goods to send it to the neighboring village, but someone already loaded one up. Let's see if it has everything it should have!
Just look – all the scrolls have been carefully gathered and sewn into fine leather bindings. I'd never have gotten around to that…
Helpful Brownie
Huh, what's that rustling in the far hall with the scrolls? Mice? Go check it out!
Me live here so long, but never find diamond vein. The Chief will be so happy!
Helpful Brownie
Me get neighbor – little person. He say he find diamond veins. We find out if he saying true!
The brownie is sure to love this dinner! It has only the best sausages and the freshest beer from my cellar.
Helpful Brownie
The mischievous brownie that everyone is talking about really has helped the citizens. It's time to thank him properly.
Building a Bathhouse
I'm building a bathhouse in the Sepat. My building materials are running out, though.
Now is just the time to wash clean my grubby rascals!
Bathtime
My beloved husband has built a small stone bathhouse. I want to take the kids there and wash them right away.
Bathtime
Baths are great for cleaning your skin, and if you use a special salt, it can completely rejuvenate you. Do you know where I can get some?
Nutmeg can make an excellent spice for meat dishes.
Spices for a Dish
It seems that while we were looking for the hen, it managed to find somewhere comfortable and laid an egg…
Aviary
One of the workers forgot to close the gate to the aviary, and the birds escaped to the city.
Aviary
We need to hurry and find the goose and its whole brood – they're still so small, I'm worried about them!
I was so worried that it'd end up in some soldiers' soup!
Aviary
Any ideas about where a turkey might have gotten to?
I was so worried about this duck. It's the only one of its kind in the aviary, but soon I'll find a drake for it.
Aviary
This ostrich hen is very young and hasn't gotten used to me yet.
Aviary
An ostrich hen came to the aviary not so long ago. It's still so nervous. I can only imagine what kind of chaos it might cause in the city.
It seems this peacock escaped from the Farmer's aviary. He should look after his birds better, especially beautiful ones like this!
Aviary
A peacock flew into my aviary and began to strut from side to side after spreading its tail out proudly. Can you help me catch it?
I'm setting off on a dangerous journey. This rope will serve me well when it comes to scrambling through underground caves.
Mountain Hike
Mountain Hike
Where has my flute gone? I think I left it at the Brewer's after last night's musical evening.
Great shoes. They should make it far easier to climb among the sharp rocks.
Mountain Hike
If you want to go hiking with me, I suggest finding some good footwear. Hurry, time marches on!
The new underground routes that we discovered will come in handy later. We should tell the Chief about them.
Mountain Hike
Now is just the time to explore new caves and find secret exits. Let's go, adventure awaits us!
Museum of the Ptolemies
I need to raise an ancient statue from the seafloor. I cannot do it without your help!
Even after so long under the water, this sculpture is in excellent state!
Museum of the Ptolemies
On the seafloor and in the underwater caves, there are still many statues from the time of the Ptolemies' rule.
This is a statue of one of the Ptolemaic dynasty rulers. In those days, the country flourished… until the rulers' palace disappeared under the water.
Museum of the Ptolemies
Great work. From afar, this statue looks just like a real wild beast.
Museum of the Ptolemies
The lion was the symbol of the Ptolemaic dynasty. There's still a statue of a lion in a sunken cave.
Museum of the Ptolemies
A statue of the Osiris's priest lies in the deepest depths. It would make a great exhibit for our future museum of the Ptolemaic dynasty.
Museum of the Ptolemies
The bust of Cleopatra, the last queen of the Ptolemaic dynasty, would look great in the museum.
This is pure gold. Look how it gleams!
Work in the Foundry
One of the caves is home to a stash of gold bars. We need to fetch one of them and take it to the treasury!
These coins are of the highest quality! I'll make sure they quickly go into circulation in the city.
Work in the Foundry
We need to mint more coins for the city. Melt the gold bar and mint some coins from it – that should be enough!
Secret Alchemy
I'm holding an alchemy ritual for which I'll need some pure tin.
An excellent sound. It's been a long time since my lute sounded so pure.
Musical Evening
I want to relax and play the lute for the customers of the brewery this evening. Only, I don't know how to tune the instrument. Maybe you can manage it?
This is just wonderful – it feels as if the petals of this flower are made from light itself!
Secret of Crystal
Some beautiful flowers have bloomed in the gardens. I've never seen them before.
This giant is beautiful and very friendly. I think it swam into the bay to get to know us!
Secret of Crystal
I first thought that an orca had gotten into the fishermen's net, but then I realized that I'd never seen a creature like this. Let's free the animal!
This creature came to my garden to snack on some fruit. It's as swift as the wind!
Secret of Crystal
Secret of Crystal
A bird that I'd never seen before flew into my window, and now can't get out again. It's scared. Will you help it?
Wow, what a cute and fluffy little thing! I think it likes you!
Secret of Crystal
I'm trying to catch an unusual creature. I've never seen anything more beautiful! Hurry, follow me!
Great power lies within it!
Secret of Crystal
Crystal extend my life. We need welcome it!
Martial Potion
Martial Potion
I need a drop of castor oil for my new potion, but I forgot where I put the bottle.
Martial Potion
I'll need an assistant while I make the Courage Potion for the soldiers.
Martial Potion
Finding mandragora root is no easy task. It's also very dangerous. But I know you can handle it!
A lunar eclipse – that's a bad luck! It seems Menes has something wicked planned!
Menes's Sorcery
Why is this night so dark? I have a bad feeling about this…
Oh, please, no, not a sandstorm! We need to hurry and warn the citizens!
Menes's Sorcery
The air is so dry – that can't bode well. Look, what's that growing on the horizon? I think it's approaching the city!
I can't figure out what's wrong with the grass. It's as if it's been poisoned and is withering before our eyes…
Menes's Sorcery
Just look what has happened to the grass in the garden!
This smoke is coming right out from underground! I think something happened in the mines…
Menes's Sorcery
Do you smell burning? I can't figure out where it's coming from.
This ghost looks very unhappy… It's as if some irresistible power is pulling him under the ground, back into the mines…
Menes's Sorcery
Dark ghosts have flooded the city. They're causing no harm, just shuffling off somewhere.
Menes manage to get into caves and corrupt Crystal with magic. Now he become Heart of Darkness.
Menes's Sorcery
The Crystal of Creation is in danger! Let’s get to it!
Have rodents really gotten into the cellar again?
Thief in the Brewery
We need to hurry and make some snacks for the guests. Go bring some cheese from the cellar!
Thief in the Brewery
I owe the Tradeswoman for some groceries. I need to fix this at once.
Looks like the mice have done their work here, too… It's time for the gloves to come off!
Thief in the Brewery
I want to make some garlic croutons. My customers love them with beer.
I'll make a protective amulet from this claw. It will help to drive the rodents out of my cellar.
Thief in the Brewery
Sand Figures
A sand figure contest has begun. Time to get to work. Could you help me?
There are lizards in my homeland, of course, but they're tiny. But in these lands I saw such huge lizards for the first time.
Sand Figures
Help me make my figure more realistic!
Our lioness looks almost alive. As if she could roar at any moment!
Sand Figures
Let's try and make a sand animal. Maybe a lioness?
Sand Figures
I like horses, they're some of the kindest animals in the world. I'm going to make one for the sand figure contest.
Sand Figures
There isn't much time left until the sand figure contest ends, but I also want to participate.
Thanks to you, I won! This sand palace looks almost real. When I grow up, I'll live in one like this…
Sand Figures
Help me finish my palace. It'll be the best, you'll see!
Sheriti loves my berry pies! Yours looks just as good. I'm sure the girl will be pleased.
Feeding Everyone
I promised to make a berry pie for Sheriti, but I have too much to do already. Could you help me out?
Feeding Everyone
My cellars are empty. It's time to fill them up with new grain and other food. Get to it!
Feeding Everyone
A unit of our soldiers is heading out on a reconnaissance mission. We should make them some meat pies for the road.
Missing a Loved One
Sit next to me and watch the clouds swimming through the sky. Look, that one looks like a heart!
This mineral is rare in these lands. I'll make ink from it for the Master, so he can write his beautiful wise words on papyruses.
World of Crystals
Me need a certain mineral. Foreign merchants should bring it for me. Me no want to go out in sun, you go get goods!
Many flowers grow on the surface, but underground flowers different. They please me eye and live much long!
World of Crystals
Me go in search of underground flower. Me long search for it, and now me know where it grow.
Find this is big lucky.
World of Crystals
Merchants bring ametrine. Me must get one of these stones.
This jasper bewitched – help me see in daylight.
World of Crystals
Me have disaster – me lose my healing jasper.
No use from this stone, but it feel good.
World of Crystals
Brewer make gift for me – very interesting mineral. Go fetch it, if you can!
Bismuth one of my favorites. Silver and pink flow over edges. Very quaint.
World of Crystals
Me reveal secret… Me myselves grow crystals in caves.
Such bad luck. One of the pots I'd made for the Farmer broke. Now my friend will be disappointed again…
Little Troubles
Little Troubles
One of the builders steals stones from a building site. The Warrior's already started investigating, but the work can't stop.
Little Troubles
It's time to sort out the fishing tackle. Gather up all the torn nets and bring them to me. I'll mend them later!
I think I see your little dolphin! Wow, it really does look real. You win this time!
Children's Game
Whoever finds the most unusual animal shape among the clouds wins!
Happiness lies in the simple things. All you have to do is learn to notice them.
Riches of life
Immersed in our own concerns, we often forget what is truly important.
Family brings fullness of life and happiness. It is inconceivable without love… and a good dinner!
Family dinner
It seems Menes has done all he can to ruin our family dinner!
True beauty needs no loud words. The things that seem beautiful are the things you look upon with love.
Holiday wreath
So many simple, but stunning things surround us! This holiday wreath should become the symbol of our holiday!
Keep it up! You're doing a great job!
Menes's servants
I don't believe that anyone would willingly become a follower of Menes. We'll find a way to destroy this magic!
An animal gnawed through a sack in the storehouse and ate the grain supplies.
Metamorphoses
I almost thought I'd gone mad when I saw a flying crocodile. What if sharks also learnt to fly?
Metamorphoses
If you see what I saw, you'll understand the danger threatening the city.
The fierce beast turned out to be a rodent in a lion's skin – what sort of joke of nature is that?
Metamorphoses
An enraged lion stormed into the yard. I've never seen anything like it. None of my guards can come close to it.
Metamorphoses
A strange creature has started flying into the Garden and eating my cabbages and carrots.
So strange! It's some kind of spiderfly, or flyspider…
Metamorphoses
Some strange insect is attacking my bees. I almost thought it was a spider, but then it suddenly flew off! Help me catch the creature!
City you managed to save! While live you among us, we fear no dark magic – or Menes's monsters!
Metamorphoses
Terrible creature arise from bowels of earth. Me never before see such freaks of nature.
Organizing Weddings
I've started organizing weddings. What a great job – making people happy! Will you help me prepare a wedding retinue?
Organizing Weddings
I could use a little luck to make sure the first wedding I organize goes well!
Organizing Weddings
Today is the first wedding I've organized. I want to make a special cake for the young couple.
Organizing Weddings
Wedding celebrations mean big feasts. We need so much food for them. How do we keep up with it all?
Incredible. This tree just came alive and walked into the city streets!
Menes's Creations
It was impossible to defeat the enemy with normal weaponry. It's a good thing you're always on guard!
Menes's Creations
This stone creature defeated ten of my soldiers. How did you manage to take care of it on your own?
Menes's Creations
The earth is shaking as if a volcano is erupting! There's a battle to come, I feel it!
The flame of this fire elemental has spread throughout the city. Although it's defeated now, the fire will take a long time to put out…
Menes's Creations
Many ships have sunk. This is the price for victory over the fury of the elements.
Menes's Creations
The water arose in a massive wave and covered the nearby streets. Now it has also become our enemy…
It seems order has returned to the city streets. People no longer have to fear attacks.
Menes's Creations
I've found the source of the elementals' power, but I won't be able to harness it alone.
Banishing Ritual
In these dark times, Fear has eclipsed the citizens' hearts. I must help them deal with this. I'll need a red thread for the ritual.
The two energies will intertwine like two threads in a cloth, and only then will harmony and peace come!
Banishing Ritual
To harness the power of Fear, I need a force opposite to it.
Few mortals in this world can create such a powerful artifact. But the power of another world flows through you!
Banishing Ritual
To perform this important ritual, I'll need an artifact – a mask.
Now that the city's Fear has taken on its physical form, I'll burn the mask and destroy it! You'll see. The citizens will soon be at peace again.
Banishing Ritual
Help me harness the power of Fear and lock it up in a terrible mask!
Mystery of Sound
I lost an ancient musical instrument of my family. It is very precious to me. Help me find it!
This is the instrument I spoke of!
Mystery of Sound
I managed to find a fine musical instrument. Its sound is a delight to the human ear.
This is a kalimba! Quite a jolly musical instrument. I saw how people of the southern tribes played it and decided to make one.
Mystery of Sound
It's been a long time! Come in, don't be shy. As it happens, I'm making something interesting right now.
When you scratch this wooden frog's back with a stick, it starts croaking… just like a real one!
Mystery of Sound
In my country, this instrument is called a jaw harp and is made of metal.
Mystery of Sound
My people's culture differs greatly from the local one, but I found one similarity – a musical instrument known as mukkuri.
This is probably some musical instrument of the Ancients. Listen to the incredible sounds it makes!
Mystery of Sound
The Miner found something unusual in the Ancient City.
Thank you for helping with the replanting! This is a valuable plant, and I'm trying to treat it as carefully as possible…
Looking after the Garden
I hope this money is enough to buy everything I need.
Looking after the Garden
I'd like to go to the market and buy new seeds for the garden.
Looking after the Garden
Merchants from the north have brought a magic flower. If you plant it on a house roof, lightning will never strike there.
Give the spider to the Miner! That madman loves all disgusting creatures that have more than four limbs… Ugh!
Looking after the Garden
A giant spider has settled in the garden. It's already covered all the flowers with its sticky web.
This crab is just huge! It can easily climb up palm trees and tear the coconuts from them!
Amazing Nature
I've started taking lessons on natural history from the Master. Today I'm supposed to find a palm thief, but I don't even know what it looks like.
I always knew that not all the flowers in the world are boring and look the same. This tree is a proof of it.
Amazing Nature
I once heard of iridescent eucalyptus, but I've never seen it. I think I know where this tree grows.
This is the funniest sheep of all I've ever seen! Just look at its grubby little muzzle!
Amazing Nature
This vegetable has a very odd shape!
Amazing Nature
I need to find a pyramid broccoli! Do you know where one might grow?
This ant is actually a camouflaged wingless wasp.
Amazing Nature
The Master asked me to be careful while searching for the panda ant. He says this insect's bite is very painful!
This beast will always stay that cute. It's every little girl's dream – to have her own pet dragonling!
Amazing Nature
Foreign merchants have brought a sea dragonling to the market! Let's go see it!
We're so lucky that you noticed this fish! If it had flipped over our boat, we wouldn't have come back…
Sea Predators
Recently, predatory fish have started swimming into our harbor often. I want to build an underwater wall to help hold them back!
Sea Predators
Sea Predators
Another toothed predator swam into the port in search of easy prey.
These dice are very precious to me. They serve as an only pleasant memento of my time as a slave.
Sea Predators
After such an exhausting sea hunt, I wouldn't mind playing dice with my friends!
These threads are of just the right color for pine needles.
Holiday Tree
Fir trees don't grow here! But the children want us to make them a holiday tree out of yarn!
This yarn is so soft and pleasant to the touch. I wonder whether real fir trees have such soft needles.
Holiday Tree
Now we need some fuzzy yarn to make our tree fluffy.
Thank you! Now let's glue the cone sides together and start winding it with threads.
Holiday Tree
Take this thick parchment sheet. We need to roll it into a cone. Could you help?
We need to fasten the threads to the parchment cone with these pins.
Holiday Tree
We're doing something wrong, the threads are slipping off the cone… Oh, I forgot about the safety pins!
We can use buttons or beads instead of seeds.
Holiday Tree
What could we decorate the tree with? Perhaps sandalwood seeds will do?
Let's take our tree to the Sepat! The children will be delighted!
Holiday Tree
What a beautiful tree we've made! We should show it to others as soon as we can!
By the way, we can use apple or banana puree instead of butter.
Ginger Cookies
Cookies made with fresh ginger will fill the house with a pleasant scent and create a holiday atmosphere!
Ginger powder has a pleasant aroma and a spicy taste.
Ginger Cookies
Ginger root is good for your metabolism, so our cookies will be both tasty and healthy!
With these molds, my children will be happy to help me bake the cookies!
Ginger Cookies
To cut out the cookies from the rolled-out pastry, we can use an ordinary knife.
Melt the chocolate over a low flame in cream – and the glaze is ready!
Ginger Cookies
For a milky glaze, we need 150ml of light cream and 180g of milk chocolate!
We cut the shelled nuts. As a result, we should get almost transparent and elongated flakes.
Ginger Cookies
To shell the almonds, we soak them in cold water for one day. The water has to be changed every now and again.
Mmm, what a wonderful smell!
Ginger Cookies
After half the recommended baking time passes, the tray in the oven should be rotated!
Sunflower, melon, watermelon and pumpkin seeds all make a good snack for birds. So does a pack of old oats!
Bird Treat
The kids love playing around with animals. Let's help the children make a treat for the birds!
We'll put the seeds into these molds.
Bird Treat
We won't just pour the seeds into the feeder, we'll make some edible decorations!
I doubt the birds would refuse such a treat.
Bird Treat
The treat will be tastier if we add some berries to it.
After we melt gelatine in water, it'll be like edible glue. Then we carefully add it to the molds with the seeds.
Bird Treat
To make everything stick together, let's add a gelatine mixture. We can use margarine or sunflower oil.
Our treats will hang by these twine loops.
Bird Treat
Help me cut this twine. Each piece needs to be tied into a loop.
The treat looks like holiday tree decorations! Now we can hang them on the branches to spruce up the trees and feed the birds!
Bird Treat
Now all we have to do is to wait for the gelatine to set…
Sailors have always respected Sebek and seen him as their protector. But now they've begun to doubt their faith in him…
Shades of the Gods
The sailors are complaining that a shade of Sebek has been invading their cabins. Now they fear to go out in the sea.
This is shade of Anubis. Don't bode nothing good. This creature of darkness is omen of ill things!
Shades of the Gods
Restless underground now. Shades in distant caves come alive. Danger coming, me feel it. Me need your help!
This creature is an incarnation of Geb – the god of fertility and the land. Then why is it destroying everything I've created?
Shades of the Gods
I've seen some sort of dark creature in the field a few times now. Wherever it steps, the harvest dies. Please save me from it!
I can't believe the goddess Neith, who is respected by the entire warrior brotherhood, has come to us in such a terrible form.
Shades of the Gods
A mysterious shade attacked my warriors and now it's smiting them with arrows from its bow.
This creature emanates cold and horror… I don't believe that this is the real goddess Serket.
Shades of the Gods
It seems the goddess Serket herself has come to me today to send me to the underworld. But I'm not ready yet! Help me escape her scorpion tail!
Few mortals in this world can touch the shades of the gods. But you are an exception, as the power of another world flows through you!
Shades of the Gods
To find the last divine shade, we need a person possessing great internal strength. I can entrust this task only to you!
Family Matters
There's a lot of work to do today, so I'm going to need a good helper. I need to tidy up all the things strewn around the house.
Now I don't have to worry about debts anymore. I can finally sleep in peace!
Family Matters
It's time to pay my taxes. I've earned a decent amount this month.
Family Matters
The animal's shadow is there, but the animal itself isn't. May the gods save us from Menes's dark magic!
Family Matters
