I think I saw a cat in one of the house corridors, but all the cats are locked up in the animal pen at night.
It looks like the face of Sebek aboard the ships has inspired bravery and confidence in my sailor brothers again!
Return of the Gods
To make the sailors believe that Sebek is still their protector, we need to paint his image on the ships.
Image of Anubis become protection for world of living. When they see it, ghosts too afraid to leave underworld.
Return of the Gods
We need draw image of Anubis on cave walls! Save city from ghosts!
Now everything will get back to normal. The dark forces won't threaten future crops again!
Return of the Gods
To gain Geb's favor once again, I've decided to paint his image on my house walls.
The image of Neith on the barracks' walls has raised my warriors' spirits again! Thank you!
Return of the Gods
After the attack from the shade of Neith, my warriors lost courage! I can't allow this to continue any longer. Help me!
Return of the Gods
We must return all the images of our gods to the temples, so that people will remain faithful to them and never forget them!
What we've done is a great victory! It will show Menes and his overlord that we will never give up on our gods!
Return of the Gods
To protect the city from Menes's dark magic again, we must use the image of Ra. Let his watchful eye protect us from all dangers!
Enemy from the Darkness
Enemy from the Darkness
One of Menes's skeletons has attacked the city. I managed to injure it, but it ran away. Help me find its tracks!
Enemy from the Darkness
Hmm, you say you have a weapon that can defeat the skeletons?
Enemy from the Darkness
Cold Medicine
Sheriti is ill – she has a bad cold. To make some medicine, I'll need kalanchoe leaves. Please hurry and bring some!
This is the best medicine for nose or throat diseases!
Cold Medicine
To make the potion, I'll need a fresh onion.
Cold Medicine
Now we need to grind up the kalanchoe leaves and the onion.
Cold Medicine
The mixture of kalanchoe and onion has to be strained well. I'll need a piece of fine, but sturdy cloth!
Cold Medicine
The juice we strained from the onion and kalanchoe is very concentrated. Let's dilute it with water.
Thanks for your help! Sheriti has already taken the medicine, and she is feeling a lot better now.
Cold Medicine
I'll go check on my daughter. In the meantime, you mix the juice with the water.
It seems the skeleton knew that you wouldn't harm it. It felt that you would free it from its terrible imprisonment.
Enemy from the Darkness
A skeleton weapon! It looks like Menes sent more of his servants to the city than I expected. Well, we'll just have to deal with them!
Enemy from the Darkness
Thanks for the help! You have a real gift for finding lost things. With this weapon, we need not fear the skeletons!
Enemy from the Darkness
I think I know how the skeletons are getting into the city. With these building materials, we can block up the cave in the mountain securely and cut off their path.
Enemy from the Darkness
If it weren't for you, I'd never have found this rare flower!
Carnivorous Plants
Right now I'm studying some very interesting plant specimens, which can be very dangerous. Can I rely on your help?
This flower is shaped like a jug. First, it lures insects with the sweet nectar on its edges. Then the insects slip inside and die.
Carnivorous Plants
What amusing plants the nature has created! Each of them looks so unusual! Take sarracenia, for example. Let's find one!
Rafflesia lures the prey with its scent. It also parasitizes the roots of other plants, stealing their nutrients.
Carnivorous Plants
We need to find one of the most unusual carnivorous flowers!
This plant lures the insects with dewdrops on its leaves, which are actually a paralyzing substance.
Carnivorous Plants
It's a good thing that carnivorous plants aren't big enough to eat a person. Some of their hunting methods are just horrible.
Nepenthes loves to hunt insects. But at the same time, it serves as a haven for bats.
Carnivorous Plants
That's incredible! Some carnivorous flowers live in symbiosis with animals.
Many animal bones around. Such plant is great danger to city.
Carnivorous Plants
Me find giant plant seeds in one cave. You need see what they turn into!
This snake is possessed by an evil spirit. We have to be careful! Danger lurks everywhere.
Displeasure of Spirits
It's a good thing this is just the image of an elephant, not a giant dragon.
Displeasure of Spirits
A giant shade has appeared in the city, roving in the streets and destroying everything in its path. We must stop it!
The evil spirits that left the underworld are ready to take on any form in the world of the living to return to life!
Displeasure of Spirits
A fierce black crocodile has emerged from the Nile waters. Another incarnation of evil is hunting the townspeople. But we won't allow it!
Displeasure of Spirits
Too many spirits have escaped the underworld. We can no longer stop them. The only way to calm the storm for some time is to give them gifts!
Taking care of animals is very responsible work, but the main thing is to get started!
Animal Breeding
I once caught a goat kid while hunting and raised it. Now it's fully grown and can have its own offspring.
If we breed livestock, we'll never want for food or clothing.
Animal Breeding
Sheep are peaceful animals and are easy to look after. Let's hurry and get this cute little farm animal to its new home.
Patience is an excellent quality for hunters. I'm sure you have plenty of it.
Animal Breeding
To tame an animal, you need to stock up on patience and be ready to spend an awful lot of time…
You won't believe it, but the cleanest animal on the farm is the pig!
Animal Breeding
Pigs are clever and difficult to tame, but they can eat anything and can be bred in any location.
I didn't expect that working with you would be such a pleasure! Way to go!
Animal Breeding
I'm always trying to catch some animal or other when I hunt, but they often only come out of their lairs at night.
Yep, this cow is going to need lots of time before it starts giving milk… Oh well. We'll wait for as long as we have to!
Animal Breeding
We need a cow! They provide delicious and nutritious milk that even little kids can drink.
With your help, all my business is going much faster!
Animal Breeding
We've done plenty of work. I'm planning to go get some food and make lunch. Will you help me?
Donkeys are used to move people and heavy loads. Their one drawback is their stubbornness.
Animal Breeding
I need a sturdy, patient and strong animal that handles the heat well and isn't a picky eater. I hope you can help me in my search.
Farm life is a sheer pleasure!
Animal Breeding
You have to pay attention to animals every day, so that they get used to people.
Dogs are good allies on the hunt, but they can also be fine helpers on the farm! The important thing is to train them right.
Animal Breeding
Now we need a helper that will not only protect the farm, but also look after the animals so they don't wander too far. I'm talking about a dog.
I'm so glad you support me in all my endeavors!
Improving the Farm
A cattle pen is a very important thing to have on a farm.
Well done! Whatever work you're given, you handle it with flying colors!
Improving the Farm
We need to make the farm safe so that predators can't get in at night.
This trough is made conscientiously, so it'll serve the farm for a long time to come.
Improving the Farm
We need troughs urgently! This is one of the main tasks for today.
Time marches on, and so do we!
Improving the Farm
Oh, there's so much work still to be done in a short time! But we'll manage it all.
These are very comfortable nests for large birds like ducks or geese. They won't stay empty for long.
Improving the Farm
We don't have any birds on the farm yet, but we'll soon fix that. So we can already start making nests for them…
Bright colors will bring luck to our farm and make it flourish.
Improving the Farm
When we're done building the farm, we'll need to paint it all in bright colors.
Fine work!
Improving the Farm
There's an enclosure on the farm, so the cattle can't run away. But we need to take care of our feathered friends in advance… Let's make a poultry house!
I see you slept well and are ready to keep working!
Improving the Farm
I didn't notice how quick the day passed me by. Sleep well, my friend, see you tomorrow.
Well done, you correctly understood what I was saying and got a water trough for the cattle! You're a clever one and I like it!
Improving the Farm
You can tell me what you want, but in conditions like this you are always thirsty.
Wonderful! Look how much we've done already! I'm proud of you.
Improving the Farm
We need to make a shelter for the cattle – we can't let the animals sleep under the open sky.
This grapevine will soon grow into a green wall decorated by juicy grapes.
Crops
I heard you built a farm! That's awesome, I approve of your efforts. You know, I can share my experience with you.
The more plants, the cleaner the air on the farm.
Crops
Did you know that plants are a main source of oxygen?
If you follow a few recommendations on looking after the tree, it'll live a long time, enriching your life with beauty and wondrous fruits.
Crops
Dates are very healthy and nutritious. They're incredible fruits that reinforce health and extend life…
You could be a great farmer!
Crops
The faster we plant crops around here, the faster they'll grow and start providing value.
You can't even imagine the massive contribution we're making for the future right now!
Crops
Flax is a universal plant! It can be used to make clothing, oil, and medicine. We're going to need flax for something, that's for sure!
Soon you'll be an expert in crops.
Crops
The flowers of plants are always bright and aromatic to attract more insects for pollination.
When used properly, sugar cane produces almost no waste.
Crops
We need sugar cane. It's a tough plant that produces sugar.
Cotton is an incredible plant! Did you know it can even be used in medicine?
Crops
Cotton plant contains substances that are very beneficial to human health, and it can be used to make various kinds of cloth.
I told you, you have a green thumb!
Crops
You have a green thumb! When you plant something in the ground, it grows even faster than usual.
Thanks to good care and the right feeding, everything will grow a lot quicker.
Crops
If you want to get a good harvest, be sure to feed the plants with fertilizer.
You can take cupcakes instead of candies.
Valentine Candies
I want to surprise the townspeople with some unusual cards. I'll need some pyramid-shaped candies so that they stand up on the table.
Valentine Candies
Let's make a heart-shaped template out of thick paper.
Valentine Candies
Now we cut hearts out of the template. Felt, thick cloth or paper will do the trick. We need twice as many hearts as candies!
Valentine Candies
Now to attach the templates by pairs and fix them on the base: some fine food skewers or ordinary toothpicks will do the job.
Now all we have to do is combine the candies with the decorations!
Valentine Candies
If we want to, we can decorate our valentine cards with ribbons or beads.
This treat will be a great way to celebrate the holiday: both tasty and beautiful!
Valentine Candies
We have to carefully unfold the candy wrapper, put the valentine cards in and wrap them up again. Carefully!
Strawberry Clouds
The next treat is made from strawberries! I've already washed them, now we have to mash them into a puree.
Strawberry Clouds
Let's add some gelatin to the puree and soak it for 10 minutes. To make the taste sharper, we'll add a little crushed mint. Mint can be replaced with kiwi juice.
Now we heat the mixture on a low flame while mixing it until the powder and the gelatin dissolve. The important thing is not to let the puree boil!
Strawberry Clouds
Now we add some lemon juice. Oh, it's sour! No, it's alright, I just forgot the powdered sugar.
Now we cover the dish with plastic wrap, put our mixture to the side and let it cool.
Strawberry Clouds
Now everything has to cool down, then we whisk it up well. Let me do that while you search for a square glass dish.
Strawberry Clouds
We need to add some whipped cream to this treat.
Now we dip the candy in the whipped cream – and eat it! Mmm…
Strawberry Clouds
Now we have to cut the soufflé into pieces and serve it at the table…
Now that's good! Let's put two berries to the side, we'll need them for decorations.
Cupid's Arrow Cake
The main feature of the table will be a Cupid's Arrow cake. Do we have a few strawberries left?
If there's no suitable dish, we can cut the right shape out of a sponge cake.
Cupid's Arrow Cake
Grease the dish with butter, sprinkle a little sugar in the bottom and put some strawberries in.
While you mix the dough, I'll make some strawberry puree. To do this, I'll mix another half a glass of strawberries with sugar.
Cupid's Arrow Cake
In one cup we mix the dry ingredients – flour, salt, soda, vanilla. In the other, we mix the butter and sour cream.
Cupid's Arrow Cake

Now we combine half of the liquid mix with the floury mix and add the cream. The second half we combine with the strawberry puree. We put the dough on the berries in the dish. We need to bake it at 180°C for 25-27 minutes.
Cupid's Arrow Cake
We're going to make a Cupid's Arrow. To do this, let's put two strawberries on a toothpick – one will be the arrowhead, the other – its fletching.
Cupid's Arrow Cake
Sprinkle the cake with powdered sugar and stick the decoration into both sides – so that it looks like a heart pierced by an arrow.
You need to have something in common to understand each other, and something that makes you different. That way you can truly love each other.
Sometimes the whole life seems like a locked door. But it all changes when you find the key to another person's heart.
They say that a person can be judged by their friends.
True friendship happens slowly and flourishes only when people prove it to each other with deeds.
True love begins where nothing is expected in exchange.
The finest things in the world can't be seen or touched, only felt.
Keep it up! You're doing a great job!
Menes's servants
I don't believe that anyone would willingly become a follower of Menes. We'll find a way to destroy this magic!
I will use the pestle and mortar to make powders for blushers, eye shadows, and other things.
Makeup Corner
It's hard to imagine how many things a lady needs to be beautiful! What should I start with? First of all, I need a pestle and mortar.
Mom will come along later, but I can help you now.
Makeup Corner
Hello! Mom told me that you need all sorts of practical things for your Beauty salon! Maybe I should bring something from the market?
The shells are great for making good face powder. This powder is easy to apply and blend, it gives a nice shimmery finish.
Makeup Corner
I will need mother-of-pearl shells. I will use them to prepare some face powder.
Look how many things I've brought! These jars are both pretty and convenient, and they have different shapes so you don't mix up the contents.
Makeup Corner
I will bring some jars and containers! You can put prepared potions in them.
Look, didn't we make some really beautiful powder? It can be used to make eye shadow.
Makeup Corner
Now I'm going to crush lazurite in the mortar. It's a bright blue stone, so the powder will have a wonderful blue color.
Here's the basket. Mom put things she reckoned you might find useful in it. Some sort of flowers and twigs…
Makeup Corner
My mom has various plants that can be used to make red and pink paint. I'll be back in a moment!
The blusher made from iris juice is bright, but also subtle. The juice also smells really nice.
Makeup Corner
These are very useful little flowers. For instance, there is the iris flower, I'll make some blusher using its juice.
Mom told me that people even make up scary names like the Kiss of Anubis for cosmetic salves!
Makeup Corner
It's so interesting to watch you make salves. Is it true that some of the paints for skin and lips come out a little poisonous?
Lip salve is made from berries, crushed rubies and even from fish scales… But I think that seaweed makes the best lipstick!
Makeup Corner
I make my mixtures from harmless plants. For example, I use purple seaweed to make lip salve.
The visitors of our Beauty salon will sit at this table, and I will do some magic on them.
Makeup Corner
Sheriti, thanks to you, I've collected the things for the Beauty salon. Now, let's move this table over to the window and put our jars on it.
I wanted to come yesterday, but there was a lot of work. I spent the whole day at the market.
Day of Beauty
Good morning! My daughter said that you worked hard at decorating the Beauty salon. Sorry I couldn't help you. Maybe you need help now?
The milk bath softens your skin and makes it smooth. This recipe comes from Cleopatra!
Day of Beauty
I'm glad you came, Tradeswoman! You are my first visitor. Now, I will make a milk bath for you!
I don't want to distract you, you are probably way too busy to worry about me.
Day of Beauty
I really don't know… I am not used to give my appearance so much time and attention.
Sesame oil will protect you from the hot sun and the harsh desert wind.
Day of Beauty
I assure you that I'm glad to be of help, dear Tradeswoman. You keep working in the sun, so you need something to protect you from its rays.
I feel a lot better now, thanks to the Lady and her Beauty salon!
Day of Beauty
I don't want to complain, but my skin really gets dull and dry from the wind and sun. I think it's not good.
Don't be afraid, these fish don't bite! Look, they don't even have teeth. It shouldn't hurt. It is just a bit tickly, isn't it?
Day of Beauty
And now, you should put your feet into this small pool, Tradeswoman. It is full of tiny fish that will clean your skin and make you less tired.
It seems it's my time to go. Thank you very much!
Day of Beauty
I never even thought about how nice it is to relax and not to think of business sometimes.
I like the hairstyle you usually have, it's really practical. It's nice to let your hair down sometimes though, right?
Day of Beauty
Tradeswoman, please don't leave so soon. Let me comb your luxuriant hair with a golden amber comb.
Now you are absolutely stunning, dear Tradeswoman!
Day of Beauty
The final touch is jasmine perfume. It has a really attractive smell, so you won't go unnoticed.
I am happy that our city now has a place where a hard-working woman can just relax and remember how beautiful she is.
Day of Beauty
Tradeswoman, you are gorgeous! I am a simple warrior, and I have no words to describe your beauty. Let this bouquet express my feelings!
I told Nimiru about my idea and asked her to help me. She'll be here any minute.
Beauty Salon Opening
Our Beauty salon is working already, but there are few people that know about it. We need to organize something like a grand opening. Let's start preparing!
We will ask Sheriti to help us deliver invitations. This way, everyone will find out about our celebration.
Beauty Salon Opening
I think that organizing a celebration for the Beauty salon opening is a great idea! I propose writing invitations for everyone.
For instance, if the Chief's daughter chooses any of my cosmetics, I can call it Nimiru's Choice. This will attract clients.
Beauty Salon Opening
We need someone who can be the face of our Beauty salon. Someone that everyone loves and respects. Nimiru agreed to help. We will talk over the details tomorrow.
Great job! It's hard to ignore such beauty!
Beauty Salon Opening
Let's put balloons around the Beauty salon, to make our celebration more cheerful.
Let life be full of beauty and color!
Beauty Salon Opening
I came to say that I got the invitation to your celebration. I'll definitely come. Life is dull if you do the same thing all the time.
Cakes with pieces of fruit will make the Beauty salon opening event even greater.
Beauty Salon Opening
We completely forgot about the treat, and what sort of celebration can it be without sweets? I know a recipe for very tasty fruit cakes.
All right, now I will leave the beautiful ladies to discuss their beautiful plans.
Beauty Salon Opening
Could I interrupt you, Nimiru? I wanted to discuss a new caravan route with you. Lady, it will take less than a minute, I promise.
This ribbon-cutting ceremony looks a bit funny, but it is really symbolic. No opening would be complete without it.
Beauty Salon Opening
Here's something I also came up with: we will put a red ribbon across the entrance and cut it at the celebration.
The grand opening is about to start. It's Nimiru's turn to cut the red ribbon.
Beauty Salon Opening
Everything's ready! All you need to do is to cut the ribbon. Hurry up, where are the scissors?
Thank you, friends! We are ready to organize a wonderful celebration. Now the Beauty salon will be open for all visitors!
Beauty Salon Opening
It's just the time for a holiday reception. Today will be a great day!
The door is still sturdy, and it will serve well on the new hinges.
Spring-cleaning
Let's start with the door. The hinges are rusty, so it's barely holding up.
Victory! I won my forge back from those striped bandits!
Spring-cleaning
Insects have flown in through the open door. Not good. Need to drive them away fast!
That's much better now! But what's that suspicious squeak?
Spring-cleaning
I heard you're renovating your forge. I came to help. It's a little dirty in here – there are even some broken bricks on the floor… You can't work in these conditions.
All the mice have been caught! Now the Lady has nothing to be afraid of.
Spring-cleaning
Looks like there are mice under the floor! Those pesky creatures, you drive one out, and two take its place…
These nails are stuck in the ground, so I didn't notice them right away. You can injure yourself badly if you are not careful.
Spring-cleaning
Ouch! I pricked myself with a nail. Bent nails are sticking out on the floor here, and I've got thin sandals on.
Everything's clean now. Well, I need to get back to my work. Can you manage here without me?
Spring-cleaning
Let me take a closer look. I need to make sure there aren't any nasty surprises left in here…
Here's my hammer! It was covered in dust.
Spring-cleaning
Thank you, Lady! I wouldn't manage without you. By the way, I've lost my hammer. Have you seen it? I left it somewhere around here when I started cleaning…
All swept up! Now it's definitely time for me to go. Goodbye!
Spring-cleaning
Oh no, I'm not going anywhere until I sweep up the place properly. Everything is all gray with dust here.
Found it! Must take it to the Lady quick.
Spring-cleaning
Hold on. She came with a broom but left empty-handed. Her little broom must be somewhere around here.
Looks great! I hope I will make a good blacksmith.
Spring-cleaning
It's a bit empty in my forge right now. On the other hand, there is enough space for the most important item.
The crucible's shape is similar to that of a horn. Molten copper is poured from the narrow end.
Out of the Hot Furnace
I'm almost ready to start work, but I need a crucible. Thankfully, it won't be difficult to make one as they're manufactured from clay.
I see you have lots to do. I'll come back later then.
Out of the Hot Furnace
I've come to ask you a favor, Potter! I really need a copper jug, and I heard that you're a blacksmith now. I see you're busy with something… All right, I'll wait.
Now you need to take this firewood to the Forge, and we are ready to start smelting.
Out of the Hot Furnace
Of course, I will make the Farmer a jug, but my crucible needs to dry in the sun. In the meantime, I'll gather some fuel for the furnace.
I got hungry waiting for you. I'm going to go grab a bite.
Out of the Hot Furnace
So here I am at the Forge again, and he's just fiddling with firewood. You are not planning to cook lunch per chance, are you? How many times do I have to come here before my jug is finally ready?
Maintaining the required heat is important… And very tiresome too. I need to rest for a minute.
Out of the Hot Furnace
Plenty of air is needed for the fire to burn strongly in the Forge. I'll need some cane reeds. I'll be blowing on the flames through them.
I have work to do, and here I am chatting away with you… I've always got my hands full! Unlike someone else…
Out of the Hot Furnace
Whenever I drop by, the blacksmith is always loafing around. Could you make me a clay jug? I just can't wait any longer.
Now I have everything that a blacksmith could ever want. Finally, I can work on this jug.
Out of the Hot Furnace
I learned that they had recently invented some kind of a device that supplies air to a fire in a better and simpler way than that with a cane reed. It's called bellows. Wish I had one of those!
I just can't get to sleep. Seems like everything is ready, but I think I could have done a better job…
Out of the Hot Furnace
It's gotten dark outside. I finished the jug, but the Farmer isn't here. He probably went to sleep. Well, time for me to go too, but first I must carefully clean it all up.
I will use the stamps to add a pattern on the jug. It's always nice when something is not just useful, but pretty too. I am sure the Farmer will be happy!
Out of the Hot Furnace
I've got it! I'll make a beautiful pattern on the jug. I have a suitable piece of wood for the job, so I'll carve some stamps out of it now.
And there is my jug! Looks a bit on the small side… And a little uneven too… But on the whole, not bad for a first go. Well done! You can do it when you put your mind to it!
Out of the Hot Furnace
Here I am! Potter, how come you are yawning? Didn't you get enough sleep last night? Is my jug ready yet?
Judging by the design, we have a lot of work to do. We need to make the carriage, fit some cloth over it, and attach the wheels and the harness.

There's still lots to do, but we're off to a good start.

Little by little… Well, I think it's all done now.

Here's the sackcloth. You've already assembled the whole carriage? Well done!

The Farmer said that he has an excellent piece of sturdy sackcloth to fit over the chariot. I'll bring it now.
Now the clay needs to dry properly.

Assembling the wheels and the axle turned out more difficult than I had thought! But it does seem like the chariot is almost ready.
Gift for Nimiru
We'll finish the wheels in the meantime. I see you've cut out plank segments for them, Potter. Now we need to put everything together. Bring the rivets!

These horses aren't just beautiful; they're also clever and well-trained.

Thank you so much! This is no ordinary chariot. It's a symbol of how much we can accomplish if we work together and help each other.

I was told you were looking for me. Is something wrong? Oh my! Is this for… me? Thank you!
When a book is compelling, you want to read it through the night without stopping!
Signs
All my friends are enjoying reading a book about ancient traditions. Bring some candles, it's already getting dark.
It's a ficus. According to the "Traditions and Lore" book, it brings happiness and success.
Signs
The Lady brought me a flower in a pot. She asked me to find this plant in my book and tell her if it's connected to any superstition.
Signs
The Tradeswoman's mirror broke and now she's very upset. I want to replace her mirror right away!
I think the best way to approach superstitions is as follows: they are interesting as a legacy of the past, but they shouldn't make you afraid of everyday objects!
Signs
I've been thinking a lot about all these superstitions. Some of them seem quite sinister!
A swallow has built a nest under our roof. Now everything will be great in our house!
Gifts for Luck
Swallows bring wealth and prosperity. If only I could lure a swallow to my house!
The Nomad and I have reconciled. He said my friendship was worth more to him than all the precious stones in the world!
Gifts for Luck
I argued with the Nomad and I don't know how to make things up. I've got it! I'll give him lazurite, the amulet of friendship!
I'm sure she'll like my gift!
Gifts for Luck
The smell of juniper banishes evil spirits. I want to make a juniper comb for a beautiful woman. Where can I find some juniper?
We give amulets to our loved ones in hope that they will bring luck and protect them.
Gifts for Luck
A Leopard Claw is a protective amulet against wild animals. I'll give it to my father so he can wear it when he hunts!
This is a brown long-eared bat. When it sleeps, it covers its ears with its wings.
Pets for Children
Sheriti asked me to go into the mountains and bring cave bats for the pets' corner. Here's the first specimen!
Fruit bats like eating mango best of all, but other fruits will do.
Pets for Children
Another interesting creature for the pets' corner.
Pets for Children
Common noctules hunt primarily at night, but they can also fly during the day. Catching a noctule is no easy feat, I'll need your help!
Pets for Children
This is a common black rat. I think it will do for the pets' corner, but we need to be careful, it may bite.
Thank you! I think we've gathered enough food for the animals.
Breakfast for Animals
We love animals here, but everybody's very busy today, and I've been asked to help with the feeding.
Don't throw away the apple core – we'll give it to one of our pets.
Breakfast for Animals
I've worked up an appetite… And you? Want an apple?
Breakfast for Animals
Let's pop into the market for a piece of goat's cheese. The Chief's raven loves cheese.
Breakfast for Animals
Now we need to go to the pets' corner in the Sepat and feed all the animals. But be careful, some of them bite.
Training Ground
We need a good space to train young warriors.
Our wall isn't very high and the ladder isn't either. But it's built to last, it's as good as the real thing!
Training Ground
It was a brilliant idea to build a training wall! But the boys will need a ladder to storm it.
Training Ground
I'm worried that a training helmet won't offer much protection if they fall off the ladder. Will you help me make a few battle helmets?
In practice fights, the boys learn how to be warriors and to protect the people they love.
Training Ground
We'll put a flag on the assault wall. The team holding the flag at the end of the battle will be the winner!
These sandals are light and comfortable. I'm going to be fast as wind with them on!
Little Runner
Tomorrow there's going to be a race! Mom said I could take part too. I need new sandals!
Little Runner
My mom's afraid that I'll get too hot in the sun, and she wants me to drink more on the day of the competition. She gave me a big flask, but… where is it?
Well, am I fast enough? Will I win the competition?
Little Runner
I need to train. Stop here and note the time!
Little Runner
I'm so nervous… If only I had some kind of lucky charm!
Favorite Pies

The pie is wonderful! Thanks!
Favorite Pies
My favorite pie has a sweet crust with tart apple filling. Delicious and healthy too!
My friends say that I only like chocolate cakes so much because the color reminds me of clay. But chocolate is much tastier, believe me!
Favorite Pies
I love chocolate. To me, there's nothing better than a chocolate pie with berries!
This pie is making me think of far-off magical lands.
Favorite Pies
If you add chocolate to the dough and combine that with ordinary dough, you get a zebra pie. It looks amazing!
Well done! These confusing markings are the musical notation for an ancient melody. If we get enough musicians together, we can play it!
Orchestra
This simple-looking instrument can produce wonderful delicate sounds.
Orchestra
The main part of the melody is carried by the flute. What a stroke of luck – our Beekeeper can play the flute! Let's find a shepherd's flute for him.

We also need a drum, it will set the rhythm. Our Fisherman is a great drum player, so we just need to get an instrument.
Thanks for your help. Let's rehearse!
Orchestra
We need cymbals. They join the melody rarely, but their loud sound provides a bold accent. I'm sure I can manage it.

Sometimes you can find shards of weapons in the ground. I've started collecting some of them.
This is a bronze arrowhead. I have several of them, so you can have this one if you like.

This arrowhead is made from copper. This dates to the time before people knew how to smelt bronze.

The history of weapons starts with a stone. This tip is hundreds of years old!
Museum of Antiquity

Wash your hands before eating!

Vitamin Boost
You need vitamins to be beautiful and healthy! I know several recipes for healthy beverages. Let's start with the simplest one – hibiscus tea.

Vitamin Boost
I will make almond milk from almonds. It's rich in calcium.

Mint

Mint

Now, thanks to you, I have a silver ingot.
Mint
Time to move on to more valuable metals. Silver coins are more highly prized and you can buy more with them.

Finally, it's time to move on to gold. I think our Chief will be pleased to hear that I've learned to mint gold coins!
Compiling an herbarium is a worthy pursuit for a learned man!
Herbarium
An herbarium is a collection of dried plants. It can provide valuable information about the flora of a specific area.
Figs are very tasty and the tree's leaves are used in medicine. I'll put a fig leaf in my herbarium.
Herbarium
A fig tree, for example. Its leaf looks like an open palm. It is also known as a ficus.
Persea is more widely known as avocado. Everybody's tried avocado, but would they recognize the tree just by its leaf?
Herbarium
And this oval leaf is a Persea of the laurel family.
Ceratonia is famous because its seeds were used as a measure of weight. The fruits of this tree are edible and sweet-tasting.
Herbarium

Someone can cut themselves on the pieces of this broken cup. It shouldn't be left here!
Order Above All
Mom has given me an important job: going through the market and picking up any garbage. Order above all! Look at that, a cup!
Picking up other people's trash isn't very pleasant. But it's important and necessary work.
Order Above All
Let's keep cleaning. Somebody was eating sunflower seeds here and left the shells! Hold the dustpan while I sweep up.
Wow, someone threw a whole washtub away! It has a crack, but we can probably fix it. I'll take it to my mom.
Order Above All
What's this? Look, there's a piece of wood sticking out of the sand. Help me dig it out.
I like working with you! You never slack off and you're always willing to help.
Order Above All

Yes indeed, that's just the handle I was looking for! Thank you, I couldn't have found it on my own!

Lost and Found

Lost and Found

Now we're going to build a small pavilion where people can bring the things they find. It will be a lost and found office!

I can't wait to try my hand at wood carving. Could you please bring me something suitable?
A weapon with decorative carving doesn't just look attractive – it also grants its wielder confidence.

Fantastic! Every housewife loves cooking utensils with some decorative wood carving.

Excellent. Now we can get back to carving.
The Pangs of Art

I never doubted our success for a second.

You can't forge a quality and sturdy weapon without fire. Let's use some of its elemental power.
My day has become even more splendid thanks to you.

I enjoy working with gold even though I'm no jeweler.

Not bad. Now we'll be able to work more comfortably.

Routine Tasks

Excellent! This should be more than enough.

You have a real gift for gathering the most delicious fruit. These berries should be enough for us.

Perfect Protector
A good owner always takes care of his pets.
Congratulations! We've made the first step in our grand undertaking.
Flora and Fauna
I've been thinking about making a little animal enclosure in my house. Will you lend me a hand?
I think he's going to like our aquarium.
Flora and Fauna
Let us think about the enclosure's first inhabitant. I wonder what animal will make the perfect candidate.
What a gorgeous creature! I've never come across anything more beautiful in the world.
Flora and Fauna
Flora and Fauna
I am going to need some materials for the enclosure. Would you mind helping me?
Thank you. I'm sure my guests will find it comfortable to sit here.
Rest Time
This teapot is magnificent! I'm sure we'll be able to brew some delicious tea in it.
Rest Time
We'll need to brew some tea for the guests. Do you see any suitable tableware around?
Rest Time
Help me find something I could decorate the holiday table with.
Not bad. My guests will be pleased.
Rest Time
Just a little left to do. We need to bring the food into the house.
Oh gods! What was that noise? The plate broke? No worries, that's a sign of good luck, after all.
Kitchen Hassles
I am really short on time today. Will you help me out in the kitchen?
Thank you. This is just what I needed.
Kitchen Hassles
Will you help me look for new crockery? I could really use a few plates now.
Kitchen Hassles
Amazing! A chicken hatched from one of the eggs on the way here. Don't worry, we'll take care of it.
Kitchen Hassles
Oh, what's that sound coming from the far food crate you've recently brought?
It smells utterly divine! Thank you very much.
Self-care
I completely forget about myself when constantly thinking about my guests. I need to spruce myself up without delay.
You must be wondering why I need this item, right? How should I put it… let this be our little secret, okay?
Self-care
Self-care
There's a lot of shopping I've got to do. Would you like to keep me company?
I didn't doubt your taste for one second. Thank you.
Self-care
Just a little finishing touch left to add to my dress. Which precious stone suits me best do you think?
These brushes are so soft and fluffy! I'm sure you could make some really pretty paintings with them.
Making a First Draft
I am pretty good at drawing with chalks. But I also have a dream of trying my hand at painting with brushes.
What a pretty mushroom! I think it will look spectacular on canvas.
Making a First Draft
What should I draw?
Making a First Draft
I am missing some of the materials. Will you help me out?
I never realized I had such a talent. Trust me, I would've never discovered it if it hadn't been for your help.
Making a First Draft
What should I draw next?
This is just what I needed. Thank you for your help.
New Recipe
I'm working on the recipe of a paint that will gleam in the sunlight. First of all, I'm going to need some ground-up porcelain.
I guess adding a bit of gold to the paint won't do any harm.
New Recipe
New Recipe
Just look at it gleam in the sunlight! I suppose I'll keep this paint's recipe a secret.
New Recipe
With a bit more effort, the new paint will be ready.
Not exactly what I wanted, but let's give it a go anyways.
Glass Border
I cannot wait to master the art of glassblowing. Since I don't have the required tools yet, I might as well use the items at hand.
Glass Border
Using a regular pipe instead of the glassblowing one is not the best solution. Perhaps it would be better to wrap it in something?
This turned out to be a rather nice incense flacon. I'm sure it won't stay empty.
Glass Border
I'm going to try making my first glasswork piece.
The gathered materials should be enough for us to continue our glassblowing experiments.
Glass Border
We've made a rather powerful medicine that can cure many kinds of diseases.
Healer's Skills
Making the right remedial potions is important if you want to cure your patients.
Wonderful! This should last us a long time.
Healer's Skills
We could really use some gold now because we need to buy the medicine ingredients.
The item you've brought is very good for you, and it also has powerful healing properties. We'll now be able to use it in our medicine.
Healer's Skills
Healer's Skills
I have no doubt in our medicine's healing properties. Do you think somebody might need our help already?
Thank you. Now we'll always have fire to hand.
Two Elements
You can't make food without a hot stove. Want to help me light the fire?
Great. I think this will be enough.
Two Elements
Two Elements
It takes so long to go to the river for water! Will you help me fix this?
Our well has such clean and fresh water!
Two Elements
Now I have to get water, then I can start cooking.
Beautiful! That should be enough, and our guests won't go hungry.
Dessert for Lunch
We made such a soft soufflé. I think people will love it!
Dessert for Lunch
It's time to think about dessert.
Dessert for Lunch
Don't you think there isn't enough fruit on the table?
I don't even know how to thank you. Take a piece of chocolate!
Dessert for Lunch
We need to get some chocolate. No holiday is a holiday without chocolate.
Not exactly what I was thinking of, but still better than nothing. Beware, worms!
River Fun
Going fishing without bait is a bad idea. Help me dig up some worms.
What a wonderful bucket! I think my whole catch will fit in here.
River Fun
I'm planning to catch lots of fish today. But I can't carry them home in my arms!
River Fun
Thanks for the help! This fish almost dragged me in!
River Fun
Oooh! A big one! I need your help!
Young Entomologist
I had a collection of butterflies somewhere. I used to collect all kinds of things.
Thanks! Now I can arrange my collection.
Young Entomologist
I need to get a few coins. Help me.
I think it'll be easy to catch butterflies in them.
Young Entomologist
These flowers will make my collection look great. Thank you!
Young Entomologist
I want to make my butterfly collection more expressive. Will you help?
You're right! Knowledge of mathematics will help us. Let's start calculating.
Arms Race
We need to hurry and increase the power of our war machines. I'll need your help.
Look, we found what we needed. This formula will increase the power of our war machines.
Arms Race
You and I dealt with the quest at hand easily.
Arms Race
To reinforce our war machines, we'll need materials.
Arms Race
A little more effort, and our war machines will crush any army. Think of a way to increase the firepower of our shells.
An interesting theme for our first play! Roaring waves and a black ship sailing to nowhere.
First Script
We need a script worthy of our theater group's first performance. Can you help me choose a theme?
We'll end up with a very mysterious story. The audience is sure to love it. Thanks for the help!
First Script
We'll tell a story of good and evil. We need to think of the main villain for our play. Any ideas?
First Script
We'll need gold to buy props.
But of course! I completely forgot about this important aspect of an actor's work.
First Script
Spirit of an Ancient King
The spirit of an ancient king came to me in my dream. He asked me to find something stolen from him.
We're on the right track. Let's hurry!
Spirit of an Ancient King
The dagger we found was stolen from an ancient tomb. But where is it? Let's look for tracks leading to it.
Yes! This is the very place. Now we can return the dagger, and its master's spirit will be at peace.
Spirit of an Ancient King
We're near the goal of our journey. Now we need to look around.
Great! Let's have a snack and head home.
Spirit of an Ancient King
Thanks for the help! But what's this? Someone's nibbled on our chocolate.
Tailed Thief
Some food has gone missing from my kitchen. And I wouldn't be surprised, but it doesn't look like the kids this time.
No sweet tooth could refuse such a treat!
Tailed Thief
I want to catch the thief. For that I need a lure. Will you help me?
Tailed Thief
Caught you! It's a chinchilla! Aww, so cute… I think I'll keep it.
Tailed Thief
Well, we'll build a trap and try to catch the thief.
This is a page from my school workbook. It's dear to me as a memento of my distant childhood.
Born in Childhood
Thanks, you fulfilled my childhood dream. I'm sure we'll make friends.
Born in Childhood
When I was little, I always wanted to have a little fluffy creature. Time to get myself a pet.
Born in Childhood
In my childhood, I dreamed of a horse and cart. I have horses, but what can I make a cart from?
It's all just as tasty as in my childhood!
Born in Childhood
I remember walking by stalls full of sweets when I was a kid. I'd stop and just wouldn't be able to move any further.
Prophetic Dream
I had a prophetic dream: our city was attacked by predators! Help me find my daggers. I need to be on guard!
Just what I need! It won't take long to make.
Prophetic Dream
I need to coat my weapon in a special potion. One of the ingredients is fish oil.
I'm sure the search wasn't easy. I'm very grateful to you.
Prophetic Dream
Now I need the final ingredient, then we can make a potion that no predator can withstand.
These taxes will let us prepare to defend against the predators' attacks.
Prophetic Dream
It wasn't easy to catch that reptile. But it looks like already caught prey holds no interest for secretary birds.
Winged Defender
The Farmer has suggested we tame secretary birds to protect us from snakes. Maybe a bird will be interested in the snake that settled recently near the Hut?
I didn't think so many vipers were crawling around in our city. That could be dangerous!
Winged Defender
I think we should search for snake nests in the city. Where there's prey, there's a hunter!
This boa is as lazy and harmless as our Beekeeper. The birds don't need it.
Winged Defender
There's a boa in the jungle behind the Apiary. Firstly, it's huge. Secondly, it's not venomous. I wonder if secretary birds eat them?
I saw a secretary bird swoop down on a snake with my own eyes! The Farmer is right, we need to tame them.
Winged Defender
The horned snake is very distinctive. I'll track it. Maybe I'll finally see how the secretary bird hunts.
Winged Defender
I understand this bird. It needs a worthy opponent. The carpet viper is the most venomous snake of those that live here. Let's introduce them!
Now we don't have to worry about snakes! The secretary bird will hunt them when we ask and when it wants!
Winged Defender
The Nomad has been taming secretary birds successfully, but it's down to me to take care of them. Let's see where we can put them where they can't trample my garden.
Slithering Reptile
Our Nomad hasn't tamed that useful bird yet? Something venomous is slithering around in the Sepat! Hurry, chase the beast away!
Hey, why are you feeding the pigeons with my best grain?! They'll do fine with table crumbs!
Table Crumbs
My little one also saw the secretary bird striking the cobra. Now he wants to be a "friend to birds"! I suggested he feed the pigeons.
Dancing with Snakes
I think the boa from the Apiary could still come in handy. I was told that a woman is looking for a snake. You won't believe what it's for – dancing!
Wow! While I was clearing a place behind the gardens for an aviary for the secretary bird, I found a little treasure trove in the ground!
Random Treasure
That's right, any letter has to start with parchment.
Pigeon Post
I think we could use a carrier pigeon postal service in our city. I'm willing to take on the responsibility of the letters, but not the birds!
All you have to do is stamp the letter with a signet ring like this. Each ring has its own unique pattern.
Pigeon Post
In the big cities I come from, there are plenty of fraudsters. People use seals to protect their letters against them.
Pigeon Post
Our educated Master brought me a recipe… for ink! He says I need to brew it almost like beer, only remember not to drink it later.
Pay attention and carefully pour the melted wax on the edge of the scroll… There… And now just press in the ring! But don't burn yourself.
Pigeon Post
Just try writing with it! You won't be able to stop!
Pigeon Post
To get true pleasure from writing letters, you need a good pen: comfortable, with a soft tip. And beautiful, of course.
Pigeon Post
I've prepared everything necessary for working with letters. Now you make a deal with the pigeons. That's not for me.
Now everyone in the city can write a letter.
Letters for the Masses
Nimiru asked me to prepare letterwriting sets for the city's residents. It'll go quicker if you can help me hand them out.
Dovecot
I suggested we build a dovecot on the Pottery roof. It's so romantic! But we need to feed the pigeons something, right?
We've made so many wonderful ribbons! Now anyone can send a letter, and it'll look great!
Letter Done Right
I know a lot about letters. There's one important detail that men forget – the ribbon that binds the package!
Yes, I have to admit it, the pigeon overtook me no matter how hard I tried. That's why he's a postal bird!
Postal Contest
Let's test out our new carrier pigeons! Who will deliver a letter fastest: the bird or me? Let's put up the skin I got as a wager!
From what I understand of the Brewer's description, the passenger sits right in a basket like this.
Mechanism from a Dream
The Brewer asked me to build an air balloon from his dream. He says it looks like a ship, and I should be able to do it.
I'll teach you to tie sailing knots one day. That skill could be as useful in the sky as at sea.
Mechanism from a Dream
The air balloon design is based on ropes. Well, I have enough of them at least.
It doesn't matter from a design point of view, of course, but it's good when a sail, or a balloon, is beautiful as well as functional!
Mechanism from a Dream
The balloon itself, which lifts up the basket, is similar to a sail. It gets filled with air just the same. And what are sails made of?
Remember this thing. If you start falling to the ground, throw it away first.
Mechanism from a Dream
The Brewer described to me in detail what he had seen in his dream. There's something like an anchor, only in reverse. You don't keep it, you drop it when you need to fly higher.
It looks fragile, but it's solid. It'll even hold me!
Mechanism from a Dream
I look at what the fisherman is making, and I keep thinking it's missing something… Of course! How are you supposed to get in?
I'm flying! Flying! Incredible! I've never felt this even at sea!
Mechanism from a Dream
Well, all we have to do now is try out the air balloon in action. That's a job for me: I built it, and I'll be the one to fall if anything's wrong.
A chariot is no air balloon, of course. But it solves problems of balance and a place for people to stand as well.
Valuable Advice
I hear the fisherman is building an air balloon. He should study these diagrams carefully.
Wow, you weren't afraid at all! You even caught a bird in flight! It sure was surprised…
Rope Jump
Flight demands true bravery. To prepare, try to pass our ancient test for warriors – jumping from a cliff with a rope.
Great idea! It's easy to tie the air balloon to a column like this, and it looks nice too.
Air Balloon Anchor
I think that as soon as they build the air balloon, they'll realize they need an anchor. Otherwise their toy will just fly away!
I made a few convenient clay braziers and got some coal ready. And here are some more tools for dealing with fire.
Fire and Air
Allow me to make my own contribution to the flight preparations. Few know fire better than I do, and you're going to need it.
Believe it or not, but this morning I found this model under a rock. Right next to me.
The Dream Comes True
The city's houses like toys! The Brewer has good dreams. I'll imagine it to myself before I sleep… As if I too can fly above the city like a bird!
Here's new model! In a new place. Me just forget to check if anything lie there before me sleep.
The Dream Comes True
Me lie last time. Before sleep I specially ask to see model of house. And I saw it. In morning. I liked it! Me try again.
Wow! I woke up and it's like I knew where to look! I dug up a model of the bakery right in the yard… Although I ordered the brewery.
The Dream Comes True
The Miner brought me some models of buildings and told me he had wished to see them before he slept. Maybe he's crazy, but I want to try it too.
It can't be! There was nothing there before! How did a model of the barracks get here? How did I know I had to dig right here?
The Dream Comes True
The Miner and Brewer speak of all kinds of wonders. They say if you wish to see a model of a building from our city before you sleep, you'll find it in the morning.
The Dream Comes True
It's as if some divinity is listening to our prayers before we sleep, and then sending us what we ask for.
Whatever spirit it was that told us where to look, it must be pleased. We've almost fully recreated an ancient model of the city!
The Dream Comes True
My dream wasn't random. I think someone already made a model of our city. But it was destroyed as well. And we're finding its remains.
Nothing happened… I only found this stone tablet. I probably have to wish for something related to the city.
Wrong Wish
Do they really say that in our city you can now wish for something as you fall asleep, and find it in the sand later? I want a new brooch with birds on it!
Let's place the city model on this foundation when it's complete.
Indestructible Base
We've started finding lots of ancient things – all those building models… I saw the remains of an old foundation in the city. It's part of our heritage as well.
I carefully watched over the city all night, but didn't see anything strange. A miracle after all, it seems.
Scientific Approach
A strange business, the dreams and the models. We need to keep an eye out. Maybe someone is walking through the city at night and burying the ancient artifacts?
Earthly Matters
You haven't gotten carried away by those silly prophetic dreams as well, have you? Maybe you could help me with something real? I need to clean my armor.
I found a flask in the jungle. Someone lost it, but not someone from our city. And it looks like some animal is wandering around, missing its owner.
Search in the Jungle
We need to search the jungle behind the Apiary thoroughly. Who's wandering there?
I haven't caught anyone yet, but I found some abandoned saddle bags. It's some sort of mount.
Search in the Jungle
It's definitely a domestic animal. It's afraid of strangers, but still drawn to people. I'll try to catch it.
Search in the Jungle
I'll need a lasso to catch the runaway. I don't usually use them, but right now it's important not to harm the animal.
This time I managed to get a good look at the runaway animal. It's a quagga. The Chiva tribe breeds them. They live far to the south of us.
Search in the Jungle
I found some hoofprints in the grass. Is it really just a horse? I'll take a bridle with me before catching it, just in case.
These gloves were in the saddle bags. I'm sure the owner of the quagga wore them. Their smell might help me calm the poor animal down.
Search in the Jungle
Now I know what I'm catching. I need something with the quagga's owner's scent. I fear he himself may have died…
It's a shame the rider didn't reach us. But we at least saved his quagga, the last of its kind.
Search in the Jungle
Only the Chiva bred quaggas. But I hear the entire tribe was destroyed. This last quagga must have belonged to a rider sent for help.
Picking Up the Trail
When you want to find someone in the woods, take a hunting dog with you.
I hear some rider was coming to us, but never got here. This must be his dog. Well, it can live with me now since it loves honey and isn't afraid of bees.
New Neighbor
See this dog? It's been hanging around here for a few days now. I've been feeding it honey. Maybe it's time we introduce ourselves?
The Face of the Shadow allows me to see through the dusk of death. I found the body. The rider was hit by a spell from an Amrun priest.
Shadow of a Threat
The Nomad is looking for a missing animal. My job is to find its owner. And if he really did die, a special ritual will help me.
Chiva Tribe
The Nomad recently asked about the Chiva tribe. I think I can write down everything I've managed to learn of them by morning.
The Potter didn't show me his weapon, but I saw a cane it cut down. It looks promising.
Sharp Invention
The Potter told me he'd invented a perfect weapon for conquering the jungle. But he's afraid to show his invention without testing it out properly first.
Such even cuts! I can't wait to see what cuts through all this undergrowth so well.
Sharp Invention
Hard, dry sticks are easy enough to cut. But can the Potter's invention handle flexible vines?
I found a cut down glade of ferns. Clean work!
Sharp Invention
I keep asking the Potter about his invention, but he doesn't want to show it yet. But he asked me to show him a place where some sturdy ferns grow.
Oh my! I never thought it would do so well!
Sharp Invention
I don't want to give the Nomad false hope, but could you find me a yew tree? If my tool can cut that down…
It's incredible, but the machete cut through the whole palm tree in one strike. True, I was the one using it.
Sharp Invention
The Potter told me to come to his last test and asked me to bring a palm tree with me. A whole one. Well, let's see.
Sharp Invention
I've been working on the blade all this time. Now I need to wrap the handle and make it nice and comfortable.
It seems the Potter wants to reproduce certain elements of these blades in his invention.
Example for Imitation
I've been keeping the terrible Blades of the Shadow for so long, and suddenly the Potter needs them. Where did I hide them to keep them out of the wrong hands?
I looked for so long, and the Potter only took a pinch. I hope it helps him rather than hurts him.
Side Effects
Nimiru gave me some strange powder to keep safe, and the Potter needs it for some reason. What could this powder be used for in smithing?
It went great! The Potter got a good shock. Then he promised to visit us in the evening.
Prank
The Potter has holed up in his Forge and stopped coming to visit us! I think the children and I should play a prank on him so he remembers us.
Smithing Work
It's not easy to make a good blade. I don't have enough hands for it all. Will you help me with the work?
This is one of my belts. And you know, half of my pockets are usually full of all kinds of treats.
Who's the Boss at the Zoo?
Whoever becomes the zookeeper, they'll need to constantly carry around a bunch of things. Trust my experience of looking after animals!
I made a jacket, but I won't wear it myself. And don't ask me to! It turned out alright, but not very elegant.
Who's the Boss at the Zoo?
Help the zoo? I can make a protective jacket. The zookeeper is going to have to deal with animals in all kinds of moods, after all.
It's fun to help, but cleaning up after zebras and baking buns don't mix.
Who's the Boss at the Zoo?
Whoever is going to work in the zoo, I recommend they use gloves. I use these to get bread out of the oven. But they'll protect from bites too.
No, I won't be the zookeeper. I already have zoos aplenty: my farm, my family… I can't do it.
Who's the Boss at the Zoo?
As an experienced farmer, let me tell you – all the animals eat bran. Well alright, apart from predators. I'll provide the zoo with this universal feed.
Who's the Boss at the Zoo?
I want to help the zoo. I can make bowls of various shapes and sizes for feeding the animals. But I don't understand animals well myself.
Imagine that! Me, a zookeeper! Alright, beasties, now go and find yourself something for dinner…
Who's the Boss at the Zoo?
Me? Why me? Well, yes, bees are a kind of animal… I have enough experience… Time too, I suppose… Will I have to do much work?
Forgotten Tool
Where are you, pickaxe? I remember waving you around here. Right here, where there's a bat cave now. Where did you run off to, pickaxe?!
What listeners? You won't believe it – elephants! Honestly! That means elephants like music, right?
Big-eared Listeners
Oh, I have a story to tell! I was strolling through the zoo, playing my reed pipe, and suddenly… I see I have listeners!
Let the birds sing for the elephants! They whistle even better than I play the reed pipe!
Music for Elephants
I need to run. Mom is waiting for me… But how can I leave the elephants? Who will play music for them? Oh, I have an idea!
Big Cleanup
I visited our zoo, and there's a… hmm. To put it bluntly, it doesn't smell great. We need to gather all the women and do a big cleanup.
A strange shell of some kind… I don't remember birds like that. And it's spread all over the zoo!
Trouble in the Zoo
Can you hear how all the animals in the zoo making a ruckus? What a noise! We need to see what's going on.
Someone has definitely been here – otters couldn't chew through boots like that. But right now there are no other animals in the pen.
Trouble in the Zoo
The sound is coming from the otter pen. We need to examine it thoroughly. I brought some special boots so my feet don't get dirty…
See that pile of rags? That's the bedding the monkeys were sleeping on. Who's been playing house here?
Trouble in the Zoo
Chimpanzees live next to the otters. Let's see what's going on with them.
There was some kind of toothed creature here, and went from the chimpanzees to… where? There's hard ground behind the bush, there are no tracks.
Trouble in the Zoo
But of course! These are crocodile tracks! Or more precisely, baby crocodile tracks. And looks like there are lots of them!
Trouble in the Zoo
We'll have to inspect the whole zoo to figure out who's behaving badly. Look for any unusual tracks!
I hope we've found all the crocodiles. They'll be comfortable in this specially equipped pen. And everything else will be safe!
Trouble in the Zoo
So the newborn crocodiles caused all this uproar! We need to hurry and catch them all. While they're still small…
You and I really get on well with animals! Now the hippo is fed.
Dangerous and Hungry
In this chaos in the zoo, nobody can feed the hippo. They're all afraid to go near him!
New Crockery
I heard someone broke all the crockery I made for the zoo. I need to go there in the evening and help.
This is a unique creature! Our most valuable specimen! How did it escape?! Thank gods you caught it.
Fast Fugitive
Grab it! Hurry, catch it! I left for a minute to walk in the zoo, and this thing… Hurry!
Simple Work
It isn't like the Chief to shy away from simple work. Someone in the zoo has chewed through and broken many fences and doors. We need to fix it all.
Even I would go to the effort to come see such a marvel! But actually, I work here – I don't need to go anywhere.
Big Cats
I saw a strange black lion in the woods yesterday! As the zookeeper, I of course invited him over. But he didn't come…
I'm sure that this tiger will have a much better time in our zoo than in that awful cage.
Big Cats
There are some wonderful kinds of animals in the world. Some merchants came to us from the east – they have an albino tiger in a cage.
A wonderful specimen! It would be the pride of our zoo if it wasn't hiding in the sand all the time.
Big Cats
Have you ever seen a sand leopard? You won't see one if I can't catch the clever beast.
See the cheetah's coloring? It's a rare species! And very clever, which is why hunters often tame them.
Big Cats
You know, this cheetah came to my hut on his own. He must have been tame once. I think we should settle him down in the zoo.
Meet the red puma! They're not native to these parts. Hunters from across the sea brought this male here.
Big Cats
I caught this furry lady in the mountains very far away from here. And she's the mother of two kittens, a boy and a girl!
Big Cats
A whole company of incredible big cats has gathered in the zoo. But they're all males. We need to find a female or a pair…
Let it live in the zoo, in an aquarium. Anything's better than clinging to the bottom…
New Home
I took this strange creature from a ship of some merchants that sailed to us from across the sea. But he isn't having a good time here – he needs sea water.
Look, look! Those huge cats are playing with our ball! How fun! Oh… Well that's all. Maybe we should bring them a new ball?
Cat Games
Will you help us? The kids and I were playing in the zoo, but our ball flew off somewhere. It just flew off all on its own, I swear!
Taking Care of Safety
There are so many big predators in the zoo now! Let's mark the pens of the most dangerous animals somehow to warn visitors.
Daily Round
Cats are always cats, no matter how big. Say hello to this one, scratch this one behind the ears, fill this one's bowl yourself, or else there'll be trouble!
Sweet Artist
Being a confectioner means being an artist of sweet things! And an artist's main tool is his brushes.
Simple, but convenient. With a spatula like this, I can lift whatever I like… As long as it's sweet.
Sweet Artist
There are tools that don't seem to be anything special. But you never seem to let them go!
Sweet Artist
It's really fun to draw by hand. But when you need to make a hundred pies or a thousand cookies, you need a stamp.
Look, it's made of special silk. And the cap is made of bone. Truly fine work!
Sweet Artist
Pastry bag is a crude name. But I can use it to create incredibly elegant decorations.
It's a good thing a set of various rings turned up. Now I can make little pies and huge cakes!
Sweet Artist
The circle is the perfect shape in all respects. The circle is suitable everywhere and always. All the more so in the art of confectionery!
We did it! The patterns on the rolling pin are so finely carved! Now I can make the most beautiful pies in the world!
Sweet Artist
In the last few days, I remembered what it means to be an artist! I think now I'm ready to make something truly complex.
Spare Pot
I have one pot that I don't use. It's too small to make soup for my whole rabble, and too big for porridge. Maybe it could be useful at the Confectionery?
Workplace
The Baker thinks only of the art! But the Confectionery itself could be made a little more comfortable.
Of course, the Baker will need this! Measuring by eye is completely unacceptable!
Order and Accuracy
Order and accuracy is what's important in any business. If the Baker is getting involved in the confectionery arts, he'll need precise measurements!
That was wonderful! Just me, sweet treats and art… And Sheriti, of course. I think she wants to move in here.
Confectioner's Day
Not everything is ready at the Confectionery yet, but I can't wait to spend all day at my new job!
The Nomad values efficiency. He travels a lot, and chocolate is the best sweet treat on the road. It's tasty, healthy and compact.
Guess the Favorite Treat
My dad the jeweler felt which stone he needed. I have a talent too – I can guess your favorite sweet treat!
This soufflé is softness itself! On top of that, this is a dish that is made to look beautiful.
Guess the Favorite Treat
The Lady is beautiful and gentle. And she loves beauty and gentleness in others. I know what to make for her!
For those who are children in spirit, the best treat will always be ice cream!
Guess the Favorite Treat
Our Farmer loves to look businesslike. But that's because he's a child in spirit.
The basic recipe for halva is simple. But a huge number of different things can be added, which makes preparing halva a truly creative process.
Guess the Favorite Treat
Sheriti is a child, and it might seem like she loves anything sweet. But actually, she has very refined tastes.
Basbousa is our traditional dish. I'm sure the Chief will like it. Although he'll never admit to his sweet tooth.
Guess the Favorite Treat
The most important things to the Chief are tradition and ancient practices. Even when it comes to sweet treats…
I would have called this wonderful cake the crown jewel in my career as a confectioner… If I didn't plan on getting even better.
Guess the Favorite Treat
Nimiru is a complex puzzle. She is strong and brave, but kind and open. What could reflect her multifaceted nature? Maybe something with many layers?
Cocoa beans can be used whole, ground up into a powder, roasted… I could talk about them forever!
Magic Beans
You won't believe how many sweet treats use cocoa beans! Even if the treat doesn't seem to have anything to do with chocolate.
Well, now I'll suspect that every sweet treat has a mushroom hidden inside.
Secret Ingredient
The Baker asked me to get something for the Confectionery… Enoki mushrooms. Also, he told me not to tell anyone. Says it's a secret ingredient!
The Baker refuses to use a combine harvester. He says it tastes better if you pick each berry yourself… He's a strange one!
Berry By Berry
I want to lend the Baker my berry harvester. It pains me to see him picking everything by hand. It's impractical!
Sweet Recipes
I like to create, not to write everything down. But people are always asking me for recipes! Let me create, and you keep track of it all.
Yes, noble cane! And that's justified, because without it, we wouldn't know the taste of sweetness!
Where Sugar Comes From
Everyone knows that ordinary sugar comes from sugarcane. But few know the real name of this wonderful plant.
A special kind of beet is used to produce sugar. It's also called sugar beet.
Where Sugar Comes From
There are countries in the north where sugarcane doesn't grow. But a wonderful vegetable grows there – sugarbeet.
Now I know that there are countries across the sea where maple syrup is used to make sugar.
Where Sugar Comes From
Before I became a confectioner, I thought that maple syrup was just a sweet condiment.
Yes, this is another accessible source of sugar for us!
Where Sugar Comes From
I can't figure out whether we have any palm trees that are suitable for getting sugar. Can you climb that tree and get that cob?
But I hope that we won't have to use sorghum stalks. Getting sugar from them is a very difficult process.
Where Sugar Comes From
I'll tell you a secret. If all our sugarcane dies out and a hurricane rips away all the palms, we can still get sugar.
The sugarloaf looks nice just as it is. But I'm so glad I can just take sugar out of it now and get baking!
Where Sugar Comes From
A confectioner's work has a technical side and a creative side. I'm going to prepare myself some sugar in advance and then I can concentrate on my art.
This is great! Now I can give this thing to the boys and they'll bring me back that set of mother's needles I lent them…
Honest Exchange
I really need something sharp and fine. Don't ask why! It's connected to the Confectionery.
Those Boys!
Well, the boys said they hid the needles in some old cart. Where am I supposed to find it?!
Hurray! Now mom will let me help the Baker in the Confectionery all day!
Coveted Reward
You know, I shouldn't have taken mother's needles. She thinks she just lost them! And she promised me a reward if I get them back.
Oh! I ate so much sugar that I won't want anymore all year! Well, maybe not all year. But a couple of hours at least.
Sweet Work
The Baker ordered me to sort out all the different sweet additives. You know them: raisins, marzipan, chocolate chips… And I can try as much as I want!
That first lesson came to me easily in my time. But for some reason I remembered it well. What next?
Shentayet’s Lessons
To undergo Shentayet’s blessing, you must move from the simple to the complex. Like in lessons at school, actually.
This lesson is called figure weaving. I remember my first shirt so well…
Shentayet’s Lessons
Oh, I remembered the second lesson of Shentayet. We need to sew an item with a particular shape! You know, not just a square piece of cloth.
Shentayet’s Lessons
Sewing a plaid is like creating coziness with your own hand! The elder priestess loved to repeat that. I don’t think she knew how to weave anything except plaid.
Shentayet’s Lessons
So, what was after the plaid? Ah, that’s it! Velvet! It’s a capricious cloth. But it’s usually worth it.
We were told: “In cashmere lies the soul of Shentayet.” It was revealed to me on the eighth try, as I recall. Or on the tenth…
Shentayet’s Lessons
I remembered the next lesson all my life! You know, that happens with nightmares. Cashmere doesn’t forgive mistakes.
Whatever you say, there are things that you can’t feel. In creating a picture out of silk, you become Shentayet yourself for a while!
Shentayet’s Lessons
Shentayet’s final lesson is a tapestry. Yes, there were six lessons in total. I hope I didn’t forget anything… Yes, no, that’s right – six lessons!
Alright, let the weavers pick the cotton themselves. But they shouldn’t wear it! I’ll give them this ox. It’s too lazy to work in the field.
Not Woman’s Work
These craftspeople have such mania – doing with their hands that which they have tools for?! I offered the Tradeswoman some help with collecting cotton.
The secret is that if you weave the dried fibers of this mushroom into cloth, it becomes so durable that… Hey, it’s a secret!
Weaver’s Secret
Mom wants me to become a Shentayet priestess. She’s already revealed one weaver’s secret to me! Now I just need to collect these mushrooms.
There you are, my universal tool for fixing everything! I’ll go find out what needs fixing in the spinnery.
Helper at Home
At first I helped the Lady because… it doesn’t matter. And now, wherever a man’s hand is needed, they call me. But I don’t mind!
Women and Mechanisms
The spinnery started working recently, and half the machines have already broken. Women and mechanisms don’t go together!
The shuttle pulls the thread in, like the laws of nature lead the beast. And the laws of gods lead man. It sounds a little flashy, but it’s true in principle, right?
Weavers’ Artifacts
We were taught: for a priestess of Shentayet, all that concerns thread is sacred. I’ll say it simpler: keep your tools in order!
Weavers’ Artifacts
There were some horror stories in the laws of the goddess: all comes to an end, and Shentayet’s scissors can cut any thread. That’s right!
Since I’m a priestess of Shentayet again, I’ll need to teach other people how to live sometimes. But I’d better teach you how to spin later.
Weavers’ Artifacts
Man must create his own fate. Just like the weaver creates the thread herself that she uses to weave!
I love this tool. There’s no special philosophy connected to it, but it’s convenient!
Weavers’ Artifacts
You pass the shoot of thread through the base, and then you take up the reed. The reed lines up the thread and evens out the cloth.
Find the woman in you, find the girl in you… For me it’s just about choosing the tool that is most convenient right now.
Weavers’ Artifacts
The elder priestess said: the shuttle pulls the thread in the woman’s hand, and the needle – in the girl’s. It’s not about age, but the search for yourself! That’s it!
Finally, all the rituals are done. Now I can just work!
Weavers’ Artifacts
The ordinary weaving machines are shared, any weaver can sit down at one. But there’s an artifact that Shentayet herself places in the hands of the priestess!
Ordinary Tool
There’s one tool that isn’t sacred to Shentayet. But it’s very useful when you need to cut cloth evenly.
What?! I searched for that silly powder so that I could then clean all the tools in the spinnery with it?! That’s not fair!
Responsible Quest
Mom wants me to find some coal powder. She says she wants to entrust something very responsible and important to me. Awesome!
Work for Cinderella
Please, help me! I’ll never manage this on my own! I need to clean a whole bunch of parts on the weaving machines!
Weaving in the moonlight is fun, of course. But the most fun thing of all is that now I can hang around in bed all day!
Brocade Night
It turns out it’s a good thing we rushed to clean everything. Today is some sort of special night – mom is going to teach everyone to weave a brocade! Even me!
I’ll tell you what I know about dyeing cloth. Shentayet has many secrets, but these aren’t secrets at all! I can share them.
Coloring Cloth
There are hundreds of recipes for cloth dye. The most ancient and most efficient method is to use onion skins.
Barberry berries are red, and the leaves are green. But a concoction made of the bark gives cloth a wonderful yellow color.
Coloring Cloth
Yellow is the happiest color! Yellow clothes always put you in a sunny mood.
We need the leaves from this plant. The process is complex, but we can get a green dye for our cloth.
Coloring Cloth
An incredible plant – so many different properties! It turns cloth a deep blue color.
Coloring Cloth
I know sage as a medicinal plant. But the Tradeswoman told me that its flowers can also be used to dye cloth!
I showed the Tradeswoman where I usually collect sage and marjoram. Such beautiful cloth is about to appear in the city!
Coloring Cloth
Here’s some more news from my old friend in healing! Marjoram doesn’t just heal, it can be used to dye cloth red!
I’ll dedicate this piece of work to Shentayet! Although, if you think about it, what does a goddess need a tablecloth for?
Coloring Cloth
I have all the dyes I need! I’ll try to show you that speckled and bright can be beautiful and appropriate.
How inventive! They washed my harrow, put it on its side and now they’re stretching cloth on it while dyeing it!
Improper Use
I don’t know why the spinnery needed a wooden harrow, but I was asked and I’ll look for one.
A concoction made of this mushroom allows us to color cloth an incredible deep red. Another little secret from the great Shentayet.
Color of Sunset
I’m not used to this task. But they say that even I can manage with a braid like that. It’s worth trying for the dress!
Beauty Demands Sacrifice
I asked the Tradeswoman for some cloth for a new dress. Red this time! She suggested I go with them to cut some marjoram for dye.
They color cloth! Sometime they sprinkle malachite crumbs, sometime put flowers on cloth. Beauty!
Malachite Flowers
Give them malachite. Give them malachite! Why does a spinnery need malachite? Yes, be my guest! Piece of cake for me!
The circle hook is used to catch predatory fish. It's sort of like a float. But today I would like to show you another type of fishing.
All Types of Fishing
Here's my home. Let's see what tackle we can use for today's fishing trip.
You set these things up on the water along the banks. Then, from time to time, you check to see what you've caught. If you're lucky, you'll get a catfish.
All Types of Fishing
If you're interested, I'll tell you: this kind of fishing tackle is also used to catch underwater predators. I have some somewhere…
Throw the clonk in the water. It makes a gurgling sound. The catfish takes this to be the sound of a female and swims into your hands.
All Types of Fishing
By the way, about the catfish. No matter how you're trying to catch a catfish, there's only one way to lure it out of its shelter.
To catch fish using the ring sinker, you have to take a boat to the middle of the current. But today we're going to relax and not work for our living.
All Types of Fishing
If we really had to catch a lot of fish, for a holiday or something, I would suggest we use the ring sinker.
Ah, this will come in handy, too. With the feed, we don't have to look for the place where all the fish are. We can make that place ourselves.
All Types of Fishing
Where is my favorite fishing rod? Why is it that when you're looking for something, it's always the last thing to turn up?
Aha! Here's my fishing gear! In layman's terms: an ordinary fishing rod. Let's go fishing.
All Types of Fishing
Today we're going to sit on the banks with the most ordinary fishing rod and admire the float. If I could just find the tackle…
When I was fixing up my house, the Nomad brought me several blankets like this.
Fishing Arrangements
Apart from tackle, we need some more mundane things. For one, we need something to sit on the riverbank.
Bucket for Fish
If we're lucky and we catch some fish, we'll need something to take them home in.
Contemplating water triggers thirst. Wine mixed with water quenches that thirst.
Wine on Fishing Trips
You have to keep a sound mind when fishing. But a bit of light wine won't do us any harm.
Leisurely Fishing
Make yourself comfortable. Here, hold the fishing rod. Keep a close eye on the float.
Bottom fishing lets you catch the fish that swim near the bottom of the river. You need fishing line that's especially strong and thick to do this.
Bottom Fishing
