I knew I could count on you! After all, more tables means more customers, right?
You're clever to build a roof! Now my customers can enjoy their beer in the comfort of the shade.
The rumors were true! The decorations you've picked out make the brewery feel brand new!
This is perfect! The customers want more flavors? I'll create something new and delicious!
Amazing! You somehow added even more seating! This will surely lower the number of angry outbursts we experience.
Brewery Cellar
It's hard to keep up with demand! I can brew beer quickly, but without a cellar, I have nowhere to store it all. Any chance you could help?
Good thinking! The bees shouldn't bother anyone out here.
A Hive of Activity
I talked to the Chief about building an apiary to make honey. He agreed it was a good idea, but asked me to build somewhere away from houses. Any suggestions for a good spot?
Excellent! We have a brewer ready to share his talents with the city. This will certainly raise morale with our soldiers.
A New Brew
If we're going to build an army, we'll also need a brewery. Soldiers can get thirsty quite easily. I'm putting you in charge of this important task, friend.
Confection Affection
Phew! We did a great job! Praise Mother Desert for these lands filled with clay and rock! Now we can stock building materials for our city.
Wow! This is better than I could have hoped for! Thank you for your hospitality, friend. I won't let you down.
Formed from Clay
Greetings! I'm a potter, and I'd love to help provide building materials for your city. Is there somewhere I could set up shop?
Farm Fresh
Hooked on the Fishery
Good choice! This is a wonderful location, and easy for everyone in the city to find.
Market Value
With the city bouncing back from disaster, it's time we restarted the market so our citizens can sell their goods. But where to put it?
The Chief will be thrilled that we can gather new materials! Don't worry, I have a friend who will oversee the mining process for us.
What's Mine is Yours
The Chief requires more building materials, but I can't create them unless we dig a mine. There are all sorts of wonderful minerals beneath our very feet just waiting to be discovered!
While these barracks are small, they will nicely accommodate out first set of recruits.
A Growing Army
With each passing day, our land recover more and more. It's time to rebuild our barracks and amass an army to protect our great city!
A Thing of Beauty
Forging Ahead
The Show Must Go On
Spinning Yarns
This Place is a Zoo
Congratulations! You have your first amulet! You'll need to learn how to use it.
Buy the Scroll of Knowledge amulet
Scroll of Knowledge
We have an Amulet! Now to teach you how to use it.
The city is full of magic items. Keep your eyes open, and be sure to use them when the opportunity presents itself.
Let's speed up our resource collection! We can use Amulets to help us. Let me show you how to use them.
Let's speed up our resource collection! We can use Spells to help us. Let me show you how to use them.
The dark power is on our enemy's side and we have no chance without amulets. I'll show you how to use them.
Go to the Store to buy an Amulet.
[1]Go to the Shop[1] to buy a Spell.
First, let's buy a Knowledge Scroll.
This Amulet increases the amount of resources you collect. Tap to buy it!
This [1]Spell[1] increases the number of resources you collect. Tap to buy it!
First, let's buy the Thoth's Wisdom amulet.
Keep looking for amulets. They can increase your opportunities dramatically!
Keep on looking for artifacts. They can open up great opportunities!
Super Crystal Effect
Use the Super Crystal
The Super Crystal works for a limited time. Don't waste any time and use it for the good of the city!
Let's hope the sandstorm won't be very strong and the crops won't be damaged. Anyway, we did all we could.
Emergency Measures
The villagers say a sandstorm is coming! We must build a fence in the field to protect it from the wind!
While searching an alley, I saw a child eating the vegetables. Poor thing doesn't know where his parents are. I can feed him in the meantime.
Petty Thief
Where is that basket of vegetables that Farmer left the doorstep? It was here moments ago. We may have a thief in our midst!
Sneak! He played a joke on me! It's just radishes! I've spent the whole night planting the seeds!
Special Seeds
The nomad gave me new seeds from overseas for growing giant watermelons. Unbelievable! The seeds should be planted in the nighttime…
Nimiru agreed to let me open a confectionery. I have some amazing recipes, but nowhere to make them!
Thank you, friend! This is enough to get me started!
There's plenty of room to make the sweets, but nowhere to sell them! We need a dedicated sales area.
Chocolate, cakes, candy, caramel! Customers want it all, but I have no more room in which to make it! I desperately need a bigger kitchen.
I'd love to be able to display my sweets to draw the eyes of hungry children, but I'm afraid they'll melt in the desert sun. Any suggestions?
If I have space for my customers to sit, they will stay longer and eat more candies, right? Let's build some tables!
Wonderful! Hopefully this will keep the children out of my kitchen. They always eat the icing before I can put it on my cakes!
Ah, yes. This will make things easier for now.
This shaded display case is exactly what I was hoping for!
I hope I'm right, and the hungry children of the city come by for a lengthy visit!
Our citizens banded together to clear the rocks from the cave entrance. We can continue our exploration now.
Amrun knows we're on our way to defeating him! He's blocked the cave entrance with a boulder!
These Skystones are powerful, but we'll need many more to power the gateway!
The cave surely holds the secrets to opening the gate. Keep an eye out for Skystones as we explore.
I can only hope that as we explore the cave, Amrun doesn't attempt to trap us inside…
The way is blocked again! Gather the strongest soldiers you can find to help us clear the way.
Soon, we'll learn what secrets the gateway hides from us.
We must bring more Skystones to the surface! Its the only way we can defeat Amrun!
The cave is a maze, but with time and patience, we will unlock its mysteries.
We must return to the cave and discover its secrets.
Quickly! Let us venture inside before the cave's entryway becomes blocked again!
The entrance to the cave has been blocked again! Amrun clearly fears our progress.
Just as I said, our people are masters at recovering hidden items!
The Skystones are not easy to find, but our people are known for having keen eyes.
We must remain vigilant in our efforts!
We've made so many trips into the cave that my eyes have adjusted to the darkness.
We must move quickly, while the way is clear!
We must venture back into the cave, but the way is blocked. Amrun has outstayed his welcome in our region.
You have a keen eye! You gathered more stones than the rest of us combined!
Our search for Skystones continues. Keep an eye out as we venture deeper into the caves.
The sun is always brighter, warmer, and richer once we exit the cave!
I miss the sunlight when we journey beneath ground, but I know it's for the greater good.
We dug out the boulders in record time!
Simple rocks cannot keep us from completing our mission!
We return once again with another bag full of Skystones. This was a worthwhile trip!
We still need to gather Skystones for the gate. Look sharp as we venture into the depths!
Together we will learn the truths hidden away within this cave.
This cavern is a mystery, full of secrets and perils.
There's no time to rest! We must venture back inside the cave!
It seems an avalanche of rocks has blocked our path into the cavern. We must work quickly to move them!
Could this be all the Skystones we need to activate the gate? Let us pray as much.
Surely there are other ancient artifacts waiting to be discovered in this cave, but we must keep our attention on the Skystones.
The gate will soon show us its true purpose. I can feel it!
I hear whispers that all this effort will be for nothing, but I believe we're close to making an amazing discovery!
The city's men have banded together to toss the boulder aside. Let us enter the cave while we still can!
The pathway has been blocked once more! Does Amrun have nothing better to do than taunt us?
We must venture into the cave again, for the good of the city!
Our searchers are exhausted, but there's no time to rest!
Give it to the Lady? Hmm… it might just convey how I feel about her in a way that words can't describe.
Profess Love
Pots by themselves may not be that interesting, but with a little decoration they can become a symbol of friendship… or love.
The god Ptah is the greatest of the gods! If we continue our search, he is sure to help us uncover the secret of the ancient architects!
The Secret of the Ancient Architects
We bring this beautiful stone as a gift for the god Ptah, in the hope that he will reveal the secret of the ancient temples' construction to us. Let us start the ceremony!
Where did such structures even stand? Oh no! The wind took the diagrams from my hand! Help me recover them, quickly!
Ancient Architecture
The tube I kept the diagrams in got drenched in the rain one day and was ruined. I gave them to the farmer and asked him to dry them in the sun. Let's go and pick them up…
The Farmer said he hasn't seen any of the diagrams? It was worth a try. Let us continue our search.
Ancient Architecture
If we can't recover those diagrams quickly, they'll disappear beneath the sand!
There! That wasn't so bad, right? I'm going to take a quick nap. I suggest you do the same.
Ancient Architecture
We've spent the entire day harvesting fruits and vegetables for the city. Just one more load, and we can take a short respite.
Look at the size of that statue? Do you know who this god was? Probably someone important to deserved such a large effigy…
Ancient Architecture
We recovered another diagram! This one was just moments away from being lost to the sand.
It's so dark now I can't see my hand in front of my face. We may be exhausted, but it's less work that we'll have to put in tomorrow.
Ancient Architecture
Sirius is lighting the sky with its vibrant glow. Perhaps we should keep working for a while. This harvest is our responsibility!
Perhaps this is a drawing from a child's imagination? I mean, have you ever seen pyramids built so high?
Ancient Architecture
I believe one of the parchments you and the Nomad were seeking found its way into my field.
Offer him a tomato? That's a great idea! Perhaps any good karma from the deed will be returned to us in the coming days.
Ancient Architecture
A refugee from outside the city wandered onto the farm looking for food. Perhaps there's something around here we can spare…
Good thinking, trading the child some sweets for the diagram. This one shows an ancient palace surely long lost to the desert.
Ancient Architecture
I just saw a small child run past holding a piece of parchment in her hand. I think it was one of the missing diagrams! Hurry and catch her!
I appreciate your help. This stockpile of herbs should help us treat those who have succumed to Amrun's magic.
Ancient Architecture
My father's condition has me deeply worried. What if other villagers need my help? You will accompany me outside the city to collect herbs.
Wow, this is a drawing of an ancient sphinx. Could this construct possibly be buried somewhere beneath our very feet?
Ancient Architecture
A piece of parchment fell from the sky and landed at my feet. Is this what you and the Nomad were going on about?
This is perfect! Now I can start working with sand to create stronger walls, roads, gardens… the possibilites are endless!
Stronger Materials
Most of my work is done with clay, but if I had more room I could incorporate sand, which will make my building materials even stronger.
Thank you for your generosity! It's wonderful to see my efforts helping to restore this beautiful city!
Granite Mining
Did you know your city was home to a granite deposit? I can start building with the rock, but I'll need a larger building first…
Each day I must travel outside the city to gather clay. I don't mean to complain, but if I dig behind the pottery, I could extract it on site. Will you give me a hand?
I'm constantly creating new materials, but I have nowhere to put them! Would you be willing to help me build a storehouse?
Every time it rains, I fear the pottery's thatch roof will collapse. I've made some new clay shingles, but I can't put them up alone. Can you help?
It would be nice to have a separate sleeping area. Most nights I sleep at my potter's wheel. What if we added a second level to the building?
Some of my materials have gone missing! Unfortunately, I have to figure out a way to upgrade the building and keep my goods safe from thieves.
With the city mostly rebuilt, I'm back to making and selling decorative items. Nimiru suggested I put up a sign. What do you think?
I can't thank you enough! Mining clay on-site will save me so much time.
Fantastic! Now I can safely store my materials and still have room to work inside.
Much better! Now I won't worry about waking up underwater when it rains!
It will make such a difference to sleep lying down! My back has been sore for weeks. Thank you for your help.
This is perfect! Thieves won't steal what they can't see.
I wasn't sure about the sign at first, but people are already lining up to buy my latest batch of clay pots!
Oh, gods! I don't believe it! The book regained its power! With the help of this book, we can get precious artifacts that will help us restore the city and defeat Amrun!
The feast was a success! The citizen's moral has been restored and everyone has agreed to continue rebuilding!
Lavish Feast
Complete the Delicious Dinner collection.
The people are starting to gather. I must assure them that despite the destruction, and our chief missing, the city will persist.
All levels in the hut have been completed with three stars. Hurray, you collected all the stars!
Collect all stars
Complete all levels in the hut with 3 stars!
That's what I need. Now we should follow the plan.
Big Plans
I've got an idea, but I need resources to make it happen.
It's a relief to have a stockpile of food. We can rest a little easier knowing the tribespeople won't be in danger of starvation.
Rich Harvest
Mmm, it smells so good! The wonderful melons are ripe! It's time to harvest them! To work!
The next harvest is ready to be collected. We must hurry!
Everyone, including gods and mortal beings, knows that you are a hunter. From now on, this is your true face to the world. The spirits and people will know you by it!
Banquet
There'll be more guests than we expected. We need more time to prepare.
Thank goodness! Nimiru was right. You're the one in the prophecy.
Collect coins.
Trade Training
The hut is located not far from the trade routes. For starters, let's do trade and earn a little money. Tap the building to go inside.
If they come, we'll give this money to the priests of Amrun. At the moment, we're not ready for a rebuff.
Lavish Feast
The priests of Amrun may appear at any time. Well, it's good you have an amulet, but you'd better have gold to pay them off.
Great! It should be enough to carry out our plan.
Gratitude to the Creator
The legend says that Khnum created the man out of clay. We should express our gratitude to the Creator to remind the people to whom they owe their lives.
Here are all necessary foodstuffs. I bought vegetables and fruit from the farmer. The nomad brought me the lamb. I may be wrong, but the nomad looked very sad. What happened to him?
Provisions
I need to thank the potter for his help. I'll ask him to dinner and prepare rice pilaf with the best lamb!
It'll be easy to feed the horses as they eat the same food as bulls and camels. They like oats and grass.
Caring Housekeeper

Wonderful animals! It wouldn't be fair to make them carry goods or plow. I will only use them for riding and ask they be put into special stables separate from the cattle. I also want to feed them the best food… Hmm… What do they eat?
Oh, those awful bees… I shouldn't have tried, but I wanted to taste fresh honey. My only option is to become a beekeeper…
Unwilling Beekeeper
Oh, what a lovely smell… Like honey. It's coming from the hives. If I can get some, it'll make a wonderful breakfast. Although I'd rather get some more sleep.
A warrior's diet must include fresh fruit and vegetables. Cereals and beans are important too. I could arrange it all! Still, I must talk to the nomad about meat and fish.
The ingredients are ready. My wife is an excellent cook. The people in the village love her dishes. The potter won't regret entrusting her to cook the festive meal!
Sacred Bond
What's a wedding without treats? We can add fresh fruits and vegetables to the wedding table: beans, figs and pomegranates. I'll get them ready.
Wow! This should be enough to pay everyone who helped me build the dam. By the way, the dam turned out solid and reliable!
Mmm, this melon just melts in the mouth! Want to try some?
The Nile's Trickery
A Hot Day
Building dams is no easy business! I called my neighbors for help and promised to pay them for the work with fresh fruit and vegetables.
It's so hot! It'd be nice to pick a juicy melon and enjoy it in the shade of a spreading tree somewhere…
Thankfully, there are plenty of villages along the way where I can get more resources should I need them.
End of the Earth
Edge of the Earth
The sly genie deceived me when I asked him to show me the northern lands. Still, I want my wish to come true and see what is beyond the horizon. I decided to organize a caravan and go on a journey.
The cities to the south are further away than I'd like. Taking something to eat will allow me to keep my energy up.
OK, I've loaded the food supplies on one camel and roped it to the other camel with the rider. This way we can take more food without tiring both camels.
Long Journey
There's nothing worse than finding oneself with empty pockets and stomach in the midst of the desert. It's a sure death. We need to take care of provisions.
Regular training will keep your body strong and the mind ready for anything.
Perseverance Wins
It's important you stay in good physical shape. You never know when our army may be called upon.
Phew, we did it! Let's rest a little to pull ourselves together before we set out. See you!
That should do it. I'd hate to have another food shortage.
Packed
Full Pockets

We've prepared everything. Only the most boring part remains… we need to collect supplies for the journey. A routine matter and we just need to do it. In the meantime, you can think about other things. I usually dream…
We should gather additional crops for safekeeping in case the fields should be attacked without warning.
Food Supplies
I just talked to the chief. He told me about the army and asked me to take care of food supplies for the warriors. I'm honored the chief entrusted me with such an important task.
I'll buy a nice hoe and spade for this money!
New Tools
It's a harvest season but my tools are worn! I must go to the market to buy new tools!
This gold should be enough. Menes isn't very generous. He pays his warriors very little. They most likely serve him out of fear, not for the rewards.
Expensive cloth, house decorations, fine dishes from faraway… I bought all this for my friend. I hope he and his bride enjoy it!
Sacred Bond
The potter is my friend, so I shouldn't be greedy. There's a сaravan in the valley by the Nile. I'll head there to choose presents for the newlyweds.
Dangerous Journey
The temple entrance is guarded day and night. Better take a little gold to bribe the guard to get inside the temple.

I was wandering the neighborhood searching for the bee hive when I stumbled upon a strange cave at the bottom of Cogged Mountain. I need to draw a map of the area and mark the cave or else I'll forget how to get there. I'll return after I take care of the bees.
Mysterious Cave
Looks like the bees in the hives are dying. We need to get rid of them before they infect other bees. If the master gives me papyrus, I can make another hive and put a new cluster in it.

The kids and I have been busy cleaning the place all day. We're very tired. All the old stuff and junk are in the junkyard! We just need to fix a few things and the renovated homes for the warriors will be ready!
I can make a nice rug from this papyrus. As soon as I'm done, I can start working on the house. A clean and spacious room will help the potter recover faster.
Dangerous Wound
The potter's on his way to making a full recovery, but it'll be awhile before he gets well. The rug he's lying on is too thin. Let's make a new one to comfort him.
New Homes
There's not enough space for all the warriors in the barracks. In the outskirts of town, there are old abandoned houses. We can restore them to accommodate our warriors.
I have two sons and a little daughter at home. I'm anxious about their destiny. I pray to the gods asking for help to see my family again!
Caring for Children

Many homeless children live in the sepat. Although they are watched, I still think that they need love and care. I'll get some papyrus and make a toy ship for them. All children like to play with toy ships!
We'll gift these to the leader of the foreign army. These gifts will be a token of peace and friendship.
New Allies

It turned out the foreign warriors aren't intruders and they're not planning to attack our city. Their army is more experienced and organized than ours. And they have horses to make their army even stronger. I'd like to ask these warriors if they'd like to team up.
It is an honor for me to give my armor to such a glorious ruler. My grandfather told me of the deeds and conquests of this man. He is worthy of great admiration.
A Guest from the Past
When I heard that the Colossi of the great Pharaoh Amenhotep are being rebuilt in our city, I immediately decided to bring him my armor as a gift.
I told the Warrior and the Nomad about the ancient Pharaoh Amenhotep's cursed soul. They were amazed and said they'd heard many incredible legends about him.
A Guest from the Past
After everything I went through these past nights, a little well-deserved rest wouldn't hurt. Not to mention a little of my fine brew in the company of good folk.
A Guest from the Past
He is as swift as lightning. Look, my Lord, he has brought a seagull for you. In my day, this bird was often served at table. Those who dislike its taste simply don't know how to cook it properly.
Amenhotep
In your place, my Lord, I'd try seeing how my new friend hunts. Release him here and let him catch a bird for you.
A Guest from the Past
The Farmer and I took the skin to the foot of the Colossi and left it there as an offering to Amenhotep. The statue's eyes shined and we took this as a sign that our offering was accepted.
A Guest from the Past
The Farmer used the ancient amulet of Amenhotep to summon life-giving rain. I offered him the Cheetah skin I was wearing in gratitude, but he told me he could not take credit for this service.
All I had to give in thanks to the Pharaoh was the honey my bees make. I brought some to the Colossi and asked them to keep defending our city's borders from attacks.
A Guest from the Past
I heard the Farmer happened to have an amulet belonging to the recently resurrected Amenhotep. Coincidence or not, its strength saved us from starvation. I was grateful to the spirit of the Pharaoh.
Thank you, my Lord. Amenhotep has proved himself to be a loyal and powerful ally to us. He promised to train the Warrior and his men with the totem. He will give them his Fire.
Reviving Former Glory
My Lord, I have given orders to build a totem of Amenhotep. It will strengthen our soldiers in future battles. We're going to need additional funds to build it.
Reviving Former Glory
Reviving Former Glory
These Colossi bind the soul of Amenhotep himself - the greatest Pharaoh of the past. He swears loyalty to us and longs to join us.
A Guest from the Past
If we rebuild the two collapsed Colossi statues in the city, we'll be doing our people a great service. I promise my people that they will receive a new and powerful ally!
Reviving Former Glory
Reviving Former Glory
Reviving Former Glory
A merchant paid me in gems for the Libyan rugs. Let them decorate the Colossi statues, and Amenhotep will keep helping our citizens.
Reviving Former Glory
I'm so glad our soldiers have been able to win more battles with the help of Amenhotep's power. We should go to the Colossi to present a gift to the ancient Pharaoh in gratitude.
Reviving Former Glory
Reviving Former Glory
Reviving Former Glory
Reviving Former Glory
Reviving Former Glory
Urbanization

This is my helmet. It has protected me throughout many victories, and now it is yours. I have heard that the servants of the wicked Amrun are threatening the city's borders. The helm will protect you when you go into battle.
A Guest from the Past
I have heard of your wisdom, my Lord. I do not want you to repeat my mistakes. I swear to help you. As a sign of my loyalty, accept a gift - it is hidden under one of the Colossi.
Urbanization
Urbanization
Urbanization
Urbanization
Urbanization
Old Pharaoh say I dig deep and good. He trust me much. I need bury statuette very deep, then Amenhotep will be invincible, I think.
Urbanization
Amenhotep ask me to see him and thank me for my help to people. He say I can help he too. He say where he hide little gypsum statuette and ask me go find it.
In Chains of Ice
In Chains of Ice
In Chains of Ice
I brought the last bundle of wheat to the feet of the Colossi as an offering and asked him to do something, anything, to take away this cold, vile snow.
In Chains of Ice
I see how much fun everyone is having with this mysterious snow. But they've completely forgotten about the crops. It falls to me to take care of things again. I need to ask Amenhotep for help.
A Guest from the Past
I did as the Pharaoh said and found the cave in the south, and an amulet of one of the ancient Gods hidden inside it. When I brought it to the city, the clouds parted and the snow began to melt.
In Chains of Ice
Amenhotep summoned me and said that if I want to help free the city from its chains of ice, I need to go south and find a deep cave. He says the power of the Sun is hidden there.
In Chains of Ice
In Chains of Ice
In Chains of Ice
In Chains of Ice
In Chains of Ice
In Chains of Ice
In Chains of Ice
In Chains of Ice
In Chains of Ice
By training your mastery of the written word, you are also learning how to think and how to speak beautifully. A ruler must be a good orator, for he rules his people with words.
A Guest from the Past
My Lord, a true chief must have not only a sharp sword, but a sharp mind as well. I advise you to train your reading and writing every day. This will require much time.
In Chains of Ice
In Chains of Ice
Speaking to the Stars
Speaking to the Stars
Speaking to the Stars
I remember from my past life that these birds were once an omen of peace. Many of them settled in the city after the snows went, particularly at the market. Perhaps a time of peace awaits us.
Speaking to the Stars
I am glad you have decided to honor me with your presence, my Lord. It is always a pleasure to meet and speak with you. By the way, take a look at the bird is sitting on the broken Colossus.
The birds have made a nest on the second Colossus and soon there will be chicks there. I've never been so pleased to see new life. It seems life in the city is taking a turn for the best.
Speaking to the Stars

It seems I am not the only one that appreciates the sound the broken head of the second Colossus makes, my Lord. All the birds of the city alight here each morning. And some, it seems, have decided to stay.
Speaking to the Stars
Speaking to the Stars
An Unexpected Attack
When the warriors and I came to the statues, we saw one of the eyes of the still-standing Colossus launch a lance of flame at Menes. He barely repelled the attack and, seeing us, fled into a portal.
A Guest from the Past
I've heard rumors that Menes himself personally appeared at the Colossi. He summoned dark forces and struck one of the Colossi statues with a thunderbolt. I rushed to the barracks for help.
An Unexpected Attack
I have another gift for you here, my Lord. This is my silver-stringed harp. In hours of longing and sadness, I played it and it made me feel better. Music cleanses the human soul.
A Guest from the Past

Menes made a surprise attack, like a coward. It's a terrible shame that the head of one of the Colossi was struck off, but the wind blowing through the crack in it makes music. Do you like music, my Lord?
I managed to find some builders to patch up the remaining damage to the Colossus. Otherwise it might have collapsed over time, which would bode ill for Amenhotep.
A Guest from the Past
I asked Amenhotep if we should repair the Colossus head, but he refused. He says the wind makes a beautiful noise in one of the cracks of a morning. That said, we should patch up the other cracks.
The Lady and I searched the entire city to find the best dancer around. When she danced, Amenhotep's joyful laughter was so loud that it shook the coconuts from the palms.
A Guest from the Past
I asked Amenhotep what reward he wants for saving the city from Menes's attack. The Great Pharaoh said that nothing would please his eyes more than beautiful women dancing.
I see that there has never been a person as worthy as you in the entire history of this land. With you, this city has a bright future. Rule it justly from this high throne!
A Guest from the Past

I see that you have surpassed me, my Lord. You learn quickly and know how to listen to advice. In one of the caves beneath the city, there is hidden a symbol of my power. You will know it when you see it!
I hope it will never happen again! I don't want to lose my beloved cats!
Statue of Bastet
It's good that all the cats are found. From now on, I will watch my pets more carefully and lock the door before going to bed.
Haw-haw, look at them! They obey! Ting-a-ling and the cows come running. An interesting thing!
Magical Sound
We need to find a way to get the cattle together. I bet there's a tool for it!
I told you! You've never had anything more delicious than this!
Culinary Genius
Everything's almost ready. There are a few little things left to do, but we can't do without them!
All we can do now is wait and hope my father regains his strength. I'm not sure that I can lead our people if something were to happen!
Path of the Warrior
My father stirs in his sleep! I hope the healing tincture will soon have him back on his feet. Our city desperately needs his leadership.
We did it! Unbelievable… What is it? We need to see Nimiru right away! She probably knows what to do with it!
Godsend
Unusual artifact… Let's try to restore it. No time to waste!
Why thank you! A cup of compote solves every problem. Now I realize that the most important thing is that I be myself on this date, right?
Tea Party
I need something to help me focus. Perhaps a glass of compote…
They say singing to plants makes them grow. I'm no singer, but they seem to like my flute playing!
Sitting on a Beautiful Hill
It's been a lot of hard work replanting the fields. Sometimes I like to take a break and sit on the hill with my flute.
You passed the test! I'm proud of you!
Trial of Symbols
The exam will show how well you've mastered all that knowledge I provide to you.
The perfume has a subtle scent. I think the master will appreciate it!
Hidden Beauty
I want to remind the master that even the simplest things can hide the unusual sometimes.
I don't recognize the language written on this bowl. It's strange that such an ancient artifact would suddenly come to light.
Pharaoh's Gold
This piece is too ornate to be some sort of ordinary bowl. I wonder if it belonged to a pharaoh?
I see many strange connections to the past. Let us consult the Book of Life. Our people have been uncovering its secrets for centuries.
Book of Life Secret
These are curious times indeed…
Hapi has considered my tribute and granted another bountiful harvest!
Earth Patron
As the patron of the harvest, I'm sure Hapi is overwhelmed by the prayers she's receiving from farmers across the desert.
The least we can do is pay a tribute to the gods. What's important is to recognize the kind of people we are now and how we through through every single day of our lives.
Sun in the Sky
Look up! Can you see the sun shining bright? They say it's Amun Ra who sends life-giving sunlight to the Earth! Let's thank the sun for every day that we have!
Great! I think it will make the potter's work easier!
Now that we've recovered all my tools, and my arm seems to be on the mend, we can refocus our efforts on helping to rebuild the city.
Wise Chief
Potter's Tools
You shouldn't instruct your people in such a haughty manner. Leave some things to their discretion. This gift may help the potter not to scatter his tools. What do you think?
Getting the new pottery in order went faster than I could have hoped!
Almost ready! Whew! Enough, I'll finish it myself. What say? Sure, I'll share with you. I couldn't have done it without your help!
This is the first pot I've made in some time. Perhaps I'll give it to Lady, the nice woman who runs the Sepat. She has such a sweet smile.
Neat and Tidy
Pottery Wizard
I am exhausted but I need to clean the house. I won't be able to do it on my own… Who could I ask for help?
I have my tools, and my arm seems to be healing… it's time to put my skills to the test.
Mmm… Yummy! I'll grow more of these tomatoes next time!
Rich Harvest
Wonderful vegetables! It's a feast for the eyes, I say! It's time we taste them.
Thank goodness the genies have been dealt with. If they truly are the spirits of old magicians, let them now find peace.
Old Magician's Spirit
They say genies are the souls of old magicians. I don't know if that's true, but it doesn't make the spirits any less frustrating to catch.

It appeared that the farmer's younger son broke my pots! It makes sense why he was scared when I came in. Still he is a nice boy who confessed after I gave presents to all the kids. He was very sorry for his pranks.
Go and speak with the Farmer. Perhaps some of the ingredients we need have grown with the latest harvest.
Hunter to Be
Medicine for the Chief
I wanted to cook wheat pancakes for dinner, but I ran out of flour. I need to go to the farmer. In fact, I'll see his kids there so I can give them clay whistles. They'll be happy!
I've found the recipe for the healing tincture, but I don't have the required ingredients on hand.
Whew! The seeds are planted. I wish they'd sprout soon!
Simple Joy
I bought new seeds at the market! I need to plant them right away. Otherwise they will perish in this hot weather!
These qualities may come naturally to some warriors, while others require practice and strict focus.
World View Lesson
Warriors may fight in the day, but operating at night requires stealth and precision.
"A guest from nowhere will crush the sinister plans of the enemies, release the leader from the abode of the spirits and unite the people…" Is that all? I'm afraid it can't help me cure Father.
You don't happen to speak this language do you? Well, I guess it won't hurt to try reading the scroll… "Arucane dauthleikr finna sundavrblaka."
Remedy for the Chief's Disease
Hrm. These symbols on the Scroll of Destiny look truly archaic. I doubt anyone has spoken this language for thousands of years.
They showed you visions of a purple crystal? Hrm. It must be important to saving my father's life.
Remedy for the Chief's Disease
The spirits didn't speak. Instead, they showed me fire… My vision did not bode well for the city. Did you see anything that might help us?
It's time to say goodbye. Thanks for seeing us off. We'll travel on our own. See you!
Whew, I'm back! Now the baker can make his very best pies for the upcoming celebration.
Long Journey
Urgent Business

Our caravan heads out right after the sunset so that we can travel part of the way in the cool of the night. We'll reach the Sapphire Oasis by daybreak. There we can rest and wait until the scorching heat passes.

The baker asked me to swing by the neighboring village to grab some ingredients. A mutual friend of ours is celebrating his anniversary tomorrow, and there's not much time to prepare. If I leave right now, I can make it back by morning!
Thank you very much! I'm rested and feel much better.
Changing of the Guard
I'm so sleepy. Will you replace me? Be on guard! Otherwise we'll have trouble…
We've made sure the papyrus is strong.
Strength Test
Many people think papyrus isn't strong enough. Let's make an experiment to prove them wrong!
One doesn't simply pick up a sword and claim to be a soldier. One must train their body and their mind.
Strength Test
Menes was right… some of our soldiers have abandoned to Amrun. I need your help to train others in the city to follow the path of the warrior.
Can you feel them? The spirits… they're here.
Remedy for the Chief's Disease
Drink this potion. It will help you hear the spirits. No, I can't go with you. Stop arguing. Just drink… Good luck!
The spirits can help us to find a cure for my father. They've shown me the way before. Drink this potion to hear their words of guidance.
The lady said that a stranger had stolen two hens from her hen house! Maybe the same person stole my bread? We should find the thief and teach him a lesson!
Mysterious Thief
All of the bread has been stolen from the pantry. How annoying! I'll go to the lady to borrow a few fresh loaves while dinner is still hot!
Some unknown area appeared on the map. Maybe it's the homeland of the foreign warriors. Looks like the lands are far and this map shows them their way back home.
Common Foe

We can sprinkle the papyrus with water and put it in some warm place to help the ink absorb the ashes quickly. However, it's important not to keep it in the sun for long. Otherwise, it'll ruin the invisible ink and we'll only see grey stains.
Our forces are at full strength! After some training, the new troops will be ready to defend our city!
Fiery Chariot
Battle chariots are important part of the army. The more warriors trained in the art of chariot fighting, the better chance we have in winning the battle!
A useful training dummy! I'll ask my servant to order more from the local master. Each warrior should have a chance to do a lot of training.
New Allies
You can't forget about training! Even a few idle days can impair a warrior's physical condition.
My warhorse and I have been inseparable for many moons. He saved my life so many times and helped me win many battles.
Fellow Warrior
I noticed my horse is lame in one leg. It must have lost its shoe. I'll ask the blacksmith to shoe my fellow friend.
I found all the ingredients and prepared the antidote for the white cobra venom. I should be OK. Thank the gods.
Cobra Venom
I had a case of potions somewhere in the pantry. I believe there's a special powder for making antidotes. If I drink this potion before the sunset, the venom won't be deadly.

Too late. The priestess in the temple was my mother's close friend. She said Mother had been taken to Kypher a couple of days before where she would be ordained a priestess of Seth. After the ceremony, she can talk only to the spirits, and no mortal will be able to see her!
Dangerous Journey
Officiating the ceremony is the woman with the symbol of Amun Ra on her hands. She looks like the woman I saw in the temple last time. Maybe she's my mother? I must talk to her.
Well, here it is. Black bee honey has a distinctive flavor and useful properties. It'll make an excellent ingredient in the cake!
Black Bee
I need lots of time and effort to find the hive. I've asked the beekeeper to help me with it. We head out tomorrow at dawn.
I fell asleep and awoke when I heard rustling. I saw a stranger grab a hen and run off! He was a warrior! I haven't seen that uniform on our warriors… I must tell the Chief about it.
The basket is filled with medical and beauty aids. Honey helps with many diseases and the women of our tribe use it to prolong their youth and beauty.
Sacred Bond
Honey has many uses. What better gift is there than giving this wonderful product of beekeeping to the newlyweds?
Well, I'm heading to the hammock where I'll rest until lunchtime, then I'll start on the house… Actually, I'd better start on the house.
Lazy Beekeeper
I've had a lovely time in the sepat. It was wonderful sharing the fruits of my labor!
Wow! I don't believe it. First place! I even beat the nomad! Oh, he was so angry! Thanks to the farmer. I couldn't have done it without his help.
Labor Day
I was about to quit the contest, but the farmer says I'm ready. I'm stronger and more resilient. It's time to put it to the test!
Mysterious Thief
They say the helmet comes from one of the pharaohs of ancient Egypt. Unfortunately, without spells, it's just iron. I took the helmet from one of Amrun's priests. It'll make a good trophy.
Raging Battle
The battle is in full swing! I must take the helmet of Anubis from the head of the enemy's leader. It contains magic. That's why I need the moon sword!
I decided to spend a night in the hen house. Maybe the thief will come back for another hen.
The necklace is gold and contains a blue crystal. For generations, it's been passed from mother to daughter. One day, I'll pass it on to my eldest daughter.
Sacred Bond
The dress is ready. Let's add some jewelry to make it complete.
My dress is beautiful! It has a layer of fine dense fabric, a translucent one and another that's a short embroidered coat! All three are dazzling white!
Sacred Bond
I don't like lush costumes. My wedding dress must be elegant yet practical. The color white will symbolize purity.
The children were delighted to help with the bees. We still have more bees left. What else can I do?
Unsafe Distance
It looks like the bees have been here for a long time. I need help dealing with them. The kids can help.
I've arrived at the sepat! I hope the kids like the honey.
Lazy Beekeeper
Oh… it's so hot! Maybe I should've stayed home and rested? No, if I've decided to go, I should go. I shouldn't be lazy.

A warrior's life is full of hardships. In return for their faithful service, generous governors grant them with lands, cattle and slaves, or they confer the Gold Praise Order on honored warriors and provide them with a decorated weapon. I shall follow this tradition.
Army
No army can succeed without discipline. And effective commanders ensure their warriors are disciplined. We have a few thousand volunteers. Let's hold a contest to choose the best to lead the troops.
The warriors were satisfied with my work! Now we can mass produce the weapons. It'll only take us a couple of weeks. No longer do we have to waste our gold and buy spears from foreigners.
Victory Weapon
If the Chief likes the spear I made, we can mass produce them. I'll take it to the barracks so the warriors can test the new weapon.
The search party returned. An unknown troop set up a camp at the south border. Looks like they have been here for a long time. Who are they and what do they want?
Mysterious Thief

Something strange is going on in the city… Hens are missing, bread is stolen… The lady says she saw a warrior. But how would he get by the city guards? Maybe she didn't see him? Anyway, we must round up the troop and send out a search party.
Wow! This is fast! The beauty and grace of horses have won me over! I can't wait to return home and tell our Chief about these amazing animals!
Fellow Warrior
They said I can ride one of the horses… I hope it's safe!

Menes didn't strike back after Nimiru had been rescued from the temple because he was busy plundering the neighboring lands. He believes we won't be able to put up a good fight and prevent him from conquering more lands. He's sorely mistaken!
Common Foe

The High Priest of Amrun is your enemy and mine. The soldiers of Menes attacked the innocent civilians in faraway lands, destroyed their houses, killed men and enslaved women and children. If we don't stop them, we'll suffer the same fate.
The teacher listened attentively and said he'd help me find out the truth about Mother. He gave me a recipe for a magic potion. The one who drinks this potion will the truth.
Pendant Mystery
Father doesn't want to tell me the truth about Mother. What should I do? Maybe my teacher has advice?

Mother's alive?! Father said she is the priestess in the Temple of Amrun! How did she ever end up there and why can't she come back? Unfortunately, Father fell asleep because of the elixir, so I couldn't find out more… I need to think about what to do next.
Pendant Mystery
Sorry, Father. I have no choice. I'm giving you an elixir so you will tell me the truth about Mother.
It's not hard to ride a horse. But this will be a very long journey, so I must be prepared for it.
Dangerous Journey
If my mother's alive, I need to see her. While Father is busy training the warriors, I'll go to the temple to find her. Thanks to the horses, I can get there quickly.
I didn't expect so many volunteers to join the army! I hope we have enough resources to supply our warriors with everything they need.
Fighting doesn't always solve everything. But well-armed warriors make a strong statement in any fight.
Rescue Plan
While the Chief thinks about how to save Nimiru, I'll round up the warriors and prepare them for the trip. We need sharpshooters and deft swordsmen.
Nimiru is with Amrun's priests getting ready for initiation. They have powerful magic, so the only way we can defeat them is with magic weapon… We must hurry.
Rescue Plan
The barbarian wants to make my daughter Amrun's priestess! Shame! I'll do anything to stop this from happening! It's not going to be easy… I need time to think…
We've defeated the enemy… No one got out alive. That'll ensure Menes won't soon find out that Nimiru is no longer in the temple. We have time to get away, but we still need to hurry!
Raging Battle
We couldn't leave unnoticed. The enemy's army is twice as big as ours, but that won't stop us from fighting for the honor of the Chief's daughter. So, we must win! Attack!
I've heard the beekeeper is going to take part in the contest! Ha ha! I don't think that's a good idea. He's awkward and will have a hard time with the tasks!
Labor Day
There are only a few days left to practice running and archery!
Whew… I'm really tired. How does the farmer manage all his work? It turns out that I'm not as strong as I thought… Maybe I shouldn't take part in the contest?
Labor Day
The farmer suggested I should practice by digging the flowerbeds. I have no idea how it can help me win the contest, but I'll follow his advice.
Army

The stronger army you have, the more powerful your empire will be. We'll equip the barracks with nothing but the best: convenient recreation rooms, a full kitchen and special training grounds for perfecting their skills.
The tracks stop on the bank of the Nile. They must've dragged her across the river. We don't know where to go from here…
Nimiru Kidnapping
We've searched the village and found some of Nimiru's things. It's clear she was kidnapped. We need to round up a group to figure out which direction they took her.
Buy
Find
Праздник папируса
Ура, вот наш победитель! Ты собрал больше всех папируса! Поздравляю, ты действительно самый ловкий!
Сегодня жители празднуют праздник папируса, попробуй собрать больше всех папируса.
Papyrus needs to dry before it can be used for crafting but it will warp if it sits in the hot sand. Perhaps you'll help me build some drying racks?
I'm at the factory night and day, but I have nowhere to rest! It would be wonderful to have a small room for a bed and some books.
The desert's sand storms keep blowing my tools across the city! There must be something we can do to prevent this!
There are those who would steal my building supplies. I hate to sound distrusting, but I think it's time we build a gate around the factory.
As more uses for my papyrus are discovered, I must keep track of my supplies. However, I have nowhere to store them! Can we raise the ceilings?
The city is bustling! Nimiru has suggested I add some signage to the factory to help customers and workers locate it. Could you help me design something?
Every morning the sun shines into my quarters, waking me at dawn. I need my sleep if I'm to work all day! How can I keep this from happening?
The Chief will be thrilled to hear that we can now double our production!
This drying rack will do nicely! Thank you for constant help, friend.
This addition the perfect size for a sleeping quarters! I won't be spending too much time inside, after all, there's plenty of work to be done!
Perfect! These curtains will keep the wind and sand at bay!
That should keep any would-be thieves out! I would hate for the Chief to have to bring in his armies to protect my factory.
It worked! This will allow me to keep the milled papyrus out of my workspace. Well done!
I like the new factory sign! It's simple, yet sophisticated. Thank you for your assistance!
Ah, it's amazing what a little shade can do. Now I can get a good night's rest. You're quite the problem solver.
Expanding Production
The Chief will use the milled papyrus for ropes, baskets, and building materials, but without a bigger mill, I can't hope to provide enough resources!
The field's harvest is impressive, but citizens want eggs and milk. It's time we established a farm within the city.
This building will surely get us started. I'm not the best farmer in the world, but someone must take charge.
The sheep, which provide the city with wool, are getting too cold at night. I wish there was something we could do to help them.
I worry that the farm animals aren't able to escape the elements. An covered shelter for them would be ideal.
Dangerous predators lurk in the night looking for an easy meal. A fence would surely keep the coyotes at bay.
The Chief has asked for eggs. He says his soldiers need protein. It's time to build a chicken coup, if you're able.
The fence may be keeping away predators, but I never considered chicken thieves. We must extend the farm's fence immediately!
The farm produces so many resources, and yet, we don't have room to store them all. An extra room on the farmhouse would be wise.
The Chief purchased a cow from a neighboring city, but I have nowhere to house it! What do we do?
A sandstorm damaged the farm's chicken coup and gate. It's time we rebuilt them stronger than before.
Perfect! Happy animals produce much more resources!
The animals were kept dry in the rain, but now they can escape the cold desert nights.
It took some work, but the fence looks sturdy. Hopefully the animals can sleep better at night. I know I will.
The Chief will be happy to hear the chicken coop is built. I expect the hens to start producing eggs soon.
Now I can sleep soundly without having to worry about coyotes… or chicken thieves!
This will surely increase the amount of resources the farm can produce.
The cow seems happy in its pen. Let us pray it produces the sweetest milk in the city.
Good work! I feel as though the farm is now safe from the elements!

Socialize!
You're getting along great, my Lord! Log into Facebook and you can exchange free crystals with your friends!
Sign in Facebook
You're doing well, Master! Sign in Facebook and share your achievements with friends!
That's it! That's the tool!
Farmer's Trade
I had a special tool that helped me loosen the soil. It always helped the plants to grow.
This tool is perfect for cutting down weeds. Now, if only it could do something about the insects…
Farmer's Trade
The field is quickly becoming overgrown. If the grass gets much taller it will keep the sun from reaching the crops.
We did it! This soil is good for farming but we don't have any seeds to plant… What are we going to do?
You chose a perfect spot. Let us begin planting seeds at once!
The Miracle of Growth
If we can recover the science of farming, our tribe will never starve again. Not far from the river, there is a nice plot with fertile soil. Shall we go there?
We should rebuild the fields close to the river, where the soil is fertile and crops will thrive!
Праздник земледельцев
Ура, вот наш победитель! Ты собрал больше всех плодов! Поздравляю, ты действительно самый ловкий!
Настал праздник урожая, участвуй в состязании земледельцев - добудь больше всех плодов с поля.
I found the stockpile of gold I had buried in one of the fields. It should be enough to get the supplies we need for the dam.
Trecherous Nile

According to the calendar, the next flood comes in a week! We need to build a dam as soon as possible. We don't have all the required materials, but we can barter them for gold and food. Let's get to work!
The Nile will flood soon! We need to build a dam at once! We don't have the materials we need, but we can barter for them with gold. Let's get to work!
The Nile will flood soon! We need to build a dam at once! We don't have the materials we need, but we can barter for them with some food. Let's get to work!
The Nile's waters are rising! We must build a dam or the city will flood. The materials we need will come at a steep price.
A flood calendar? Where did you find this? It seems the river waters shouldn't be this high. There may be sinister magic at work…
Trecherous Nile
If the Nile floods, we could lose all the crops. If only there was a way we could predict the flooding…
Good harvest depends on how the seeds grow. It's very important. Thank you for helping me with the watering. Come to my place and I'll introduce you to my family. I have a big family!
With some attention and careful watering, these seeds will become a bountiful harvest. Thank you for your help!
Art of Farming
You need to treat the land gently! Each seed requires good care. You must protect it from the sun, cold and overwatering.
Each seed must be treated with the utmost respect if you want it to grow.
We must find a way to imprison the genie, but I fear this clay pitcher won't be strong enough…
Harvest Struggle
I went inside to rest but heard something splashing about. It was a river genie! We must capture it before it floods the crops!
There's enough fruit here to disperse amongst the citizens. I'm sure they're famished.
First Harvest
The first harvest is complete! Help me collect it, will you?
Thank the goddess Hapi! I think you've saved the sprouts.
Fighting for the Harvest
I was so preoccupied that I forgot to water the date sprouts! Would you mind watering them before they wither away?
It worked! Genies don't want to grant wishes, they just want to cause trouble. The city has had enough trouble to last a lifetime.
Harvest Struggle
If left unchecked, that river genie will destroy our work! We need to use a strong, metal oil lamp to capture it…
The Scroll of Destiny is said to contain ancient healing spells. I'll try anything to save my father!
Remedy for the Chief's Disease

I tried all the possible cures on Father, but he's getting worse every day. I think it has something to do with magic. A witch told me about the Scroll of Destiny that supposedly has miraculous powers. Maybe it'll help?
Something's wrong… father is unconscious again. Magic may be the only thing that can save him!
The Nilometer may not be the most advanced method for cataloguing floods, but it works.
Harvest Struggle
When the Nile floods, we don't have much time to react. Fortunately, we keep historical records of the water levels.
The new field will surely provide some breathing room for our food reserves. Let us hope it is enough.
Expanding Fields
As we rebuild the city, more people are returning! We must expand the fields once again to grow more crops.
I've recovered some new grapevine seedlings, but there's nowhere to plant them! We must once again expand our fields.
I've discovered some coconuts, which will provide us with food and building materials, but they will need plenty of room to thrive.
Pomegranates are a strong and hearty fruit. But first, we'll need to find a space for them.
I worry that our fields will soon draw the eye of wild animals or thieves. We must find a way to protect the harvest!
The field requires many hands to keep it maintained. If only we had another entrance from which to work…
Nimiru is proud of what we've accomplished in the fields, but thinks we need a sign to identify it for the city's newcomers.
Excellent! With a field this size, surely our city won't go hungry!
Thank goodness for the Nile. The river nourishes our crops with water, the gift of life!
I worried that our fields would never be this lush with fruits and vegetables again. How wrong I was!
The children of the city will be happy to see pomogranates growing once again. They are a favorite amongst those who live at the Sepat.
If we plant corn around the edge of a field, the stalks will grow, keeping prying eyes away from the goods inside!
Perfect! Now we can access the field without falling over one another.
It's quite the sign! Surely no one will mistake the fields for the pottery!
Better Than Before
I've plowed the entire field with this plow in two days! It's magic! We have lots of new seeds, so we can easily extend our area. Let's get to work!
We'll need to expand the fields to accommodate the new seeds I've found.
Great! We did it!
One Thing After Another

There's something behind that. The beast appeared right in the place where you found that strange thing. What if the beast was sent to get it back? The farmer disturbed what was hidden. The light attracted evil. Whatever the explanation, it's time to hunt and defend ourselves.
Thank the gods, you did it. There's something behind it… Spiders and toads. What's next? Will it ever be quiet and calm here? Is it a curse?
They Came from the Depth
Ahhhhh! Look! There is a beast in my field! Why are you standing still? Do something! I have all my crops there… Oh, gods!
The kitty is too cute! Now I have something to talk about with the lady.
Common Interests
The lady has a pet… What if I get a cat to give us a common interest to talk about?
Ooh, what's this? Some kind of mysterious stone! It looks so beautiful in the sunshine! What luck! I'll say I found it on the road and try to trade it for gold in the Sepat.
Mysterious Cave

I don't think anyone noticed me coming into this cave. I heard stories from the local citizens about these caves: that they often contain precious gems. But after the earthquake, many of them collapsed and the people can no longer get into them.

I found this jewelry in my house after the warriors of Menes took away my wife and kids. I think my wife wanted to take it with her, but she had no time… I keep it in memory of my family. I always think about the day when I can get revenge on my enemy!
Bitter Memories
When Menes's army attacked the city, I hurried home to protect my wife and children. But it was too late… It looked like they had already been taken away from the city along with other citizens…
Bingo! We're on the right track!
On the Right Track
Finding the pharaoh's cup in those ruins means that a palace could have been there long before. Maybe it has other valuable things there.
I once found a pharaoh's cup amid some ruins. I wonder if a palace once stood there? There might be some more valuables waiting to be discovered!
Help me think! There must be something we can use to get this creature back outside!
The basalt cup worked to catch the wind genie! Let’s get this magical miscreant out of my workshop before the whole place falls apart!
Devious Genies
The wind genie easily broke free of the clay pot and shattered several more around my workshop! This is turning into a disaster.
Nomad says that genies must be captured using something made of metal or stone. The only thing I have that might work is a tiny basalt cup…
This one seems durable and waterproof. We don't have a lot of rain the desert, but I may need to contend with the Nile.
Worthy Hunter
I'll need a sturdy bag to carry my supplies for this journey.
This bowl looks ancient! The Farmer is often digging up relics. I wonder if he's ever come across something similar.
Hidden Intent
I found something valuable in the city ruins that I would like to restore. That's why I helped the potter.
While searching for the missing diagrams, I came across something else in the sand…
I dreamed of people in silly clothes… They sat behind tables in a similar, but not as comfortable place and drank BEER with nuts!
A Snack with Beer
Today I decided to offer my guests a new snack with their BEER, and completely for free to boot. This idea came to me in a dream.
A warrior can learn a thing or two from the hippo, a beast that is powerful and elegant.
Stay Cool
I've seen many a warrior lose his or her head in the heat of the moment.
I haven't been on a good hunt for a long time. It's time to return.
More Game
Did you see that? An antelope stormed past us! If we can shoot it, we'll return home with more game!
This lip paint is beautiful, but maybe a natural look would impress Potter more…? What do you think?
Gutsy Color
One child told me that the potter went to the sepat to sell his pots. He's likely stopping by to see the children… I'll be glad to see him too!
One of the children told me that Potter is on his way to the Sepat, and I'm nowhere near ready! I need makeup… lip paint… something!
I've used this chisel for cutting papyrus, but the beekeeper can use it to collect honey. I'll gift this to him!
Mastering Craft
The beekeeper helped me with my toothache. I owe him big. I saw him working hard while cleaning the honeycomb. Let's give him a better tool for that.
My people have made a leather apron for the Brewer, covered in all kinds of pockets for his ingredients and tools. It'll lend the Brewer authority.
Troubles of the Trade
The Brave Brewer is no simple man. Brewing BEER isn't all he's capable of, he also wages wars on his own. I placed a gift for him somewhere around here.
These are perfect for cultivating so we don't have to go look for them in the valley and run into wild animals.
New Fruit
I have an idea! Different kinds of fruit grow in the valley. Maybe we can try cultivating them?
As soon as the invisible ink absorbs the ashes, we'll be able to see the hidden image on the map. People use invisible ink to share confidential information. I wonder what's on this map?
Common Foe
We found a secret map in the foreigners' camp. It turned out it used invisible ink. To make the ink visible, we need ashes to sprinkle on the map.
According to the kids, the animals they saw by the Nile aren't dangerous. To be safe, we should take an axe.
Unknown Animals
The kids said they saw some strange animals on the other side of the Nile. They looked like small bulls. We need to find out what these creatures are.
Excellent! That makes a difference. The cattle will be well fed.
This bag will do nicely, though, it looks like we'll be making several trips.
Thinking Big
To Feel at Home
This basket doesn't work for carrrying feed. We'd lost part of it on the way. We need to think of a better item to store it.
It's time we collected the children's clothes and toys from the rubble of the old Sepat. We just need a way to carry them…
On Labor Day, I'll show them how to carve a doe! It requires a remarkable strength and agility. A sandbag will strengthen the biceps. Let's start training today!
Labor Day
There will be a Labor Day in the village soon. The locals will hold contests based on skills and abilities. I have something, but I need to practice.
Superb! That's what we need. It's delicious. The children will like it!
Festive Meal
One of the homeless boys in the village has a birthday tomorrow. Let's create a big feast for the children and treat them to the best meal!
It's wonderful we prepared a feast! The children will remember it forever. Their eyes filled with joy!
The Main Feast
Shh… the children are sleeping. Let's surprise them with a big festive meal!
Thankfully, a ragball is easy to make with some fabric and wool. At least now the children can play together as a group.
Play Together
Now the children are fighting over the wooden horse! Some days it never ends. We need something they can do together…
These sweets, made with fresh fruit, are for the kids at the sepat. Tasty and healthy!
There they are! How did they get here?
Tasty and Healthy
That's strange… I'm sure that I put the fruit here. Now it's gone.
I'm grateful to the Chief for the people he's provided me with. With so much Barley and Rice, I'll be able to brew BEER for many days to come.
The Birth of Brewing
I'll need a lot of ingredients if we want everyone in the city to be able to try my wonderful brew. I can't get ahold of them on my own.
Yes! I knew my rosy-faced friend would agree to help me! He gave me all his yeast and I promised to treat him to a mug of my best BEER later!
How the Brewer Saved the City
While I was searching for helpers in the matter of state importance we face, I asked the Healer for help too. Without him, the plan will come to nothing.
We have the cup. Now we need to pick a time and place.
You're right. Violet it is. A few sprays and… I hope I didn't overdo it!
Remedy for the Chief's Disease
First Date
The spirits never talk straight. Sometimes I don't think they know the answer. It doesn't matter. There's no other way out.
I don't normally wear perfume, but perhaps the Potter find it irresistable! Now, which scent? Violet or sage?
My hands still remember the warmth of the handle. It's not just a weapon. It holds the power of the ancestors, which will help resist the priests' magic.
Honor and Courage
Chief's putting a team together to rescue Nimiru. I prefer pottery to fencing and training. However, when it comes to saving the Chief's daughter, I'm ready to take up arms.

The deeper I go into the Mine with my staff, the louder the muttering becomes. It seems the source of the sounds is somewhere underground… I'd better tell the Potter everything, perhaps he can help me.
The Secret of the Blue Crystal

I can't give in to panic! I need to calm down and think about why I only hear the muttering when I'm in the Sepat… It can't be! It seems my staff is serving as a conduit for these strange sounds! But how do I find their source?
Honey bread has more curative properties than bee pollen. My little girl has almost recovered. We need to thank the beekeeper.
Cure the Daughter
My daughter is sick with abdominal cramps. The doctor said there is a remedy… Either ambrosia or honey bread made of pollen. I'll ask the beekeeper.
The yard is filled with boxes… Wish someone would move them. Ouch! Just hurt my foot on one of them. I guess I'd better move them myself or else it'll never get done.
Unwilling Beekeeper
Achoo! So much dust. I need to clean house, but it's too much work for today. I'll start tomorrow. I'm going to sit on a bench and take in the fresh air. Achoo!
Beeswax candles give off a soft, light and natural fragrance. I'll light them at dusk to create a pleasant atmosphere.
Sacred Bond
The potter invited me to the wedding… What shall I give to the newlyweds? I know! I'll buy wax from the beekeeper to make wedding candles.
Thankfully, the toothache is gone! That was a miraculous remedy. If you chew it every day, you won't get any more toothaches!
Toothache
The medical scrolls say that uncappings are the best remedy for a toothache. I'm sure I can get it from the beekeeper. Evidently, uncappings are removed bits of wax filled with honey.
Children love learning! Learning is good. Good to know world around, to avoid danger.
Learning Equals Light
Miner not know what these bugs called. But Lady know. She teach children and they remember.
Great! The swarm entered the trap. Time to take them far away from the sepat and set them free. They'll have no trouble finding a new home.
Unsafe Distance
The bee trap is supposed to capture swarms of bees. The nomad advised to put it near the beehive, wait until they move in and then take it away.
Done! The ancients used the elixir of truth in courts and while interrogating spies. Fortunately, it's not harmful. After the effect of the elixir wears off, people don't remember what happened.
Pendant Mystery
The elixir of truth is made from a special recipe and it's effective within a few hours after it's ready. I'll need Belladonna berries and quills from a sea urchin.
Thankfully, the chair was easilyrepaired. Let us hope the spirits of the citizens can be mended as quickly.
Rest Your Feet
It seems my chair was destroyed along with the building. I can't imagine standing all day to throw pottery.
Apart from the rituals to honor of Amrun, there are rites that honor minor deities. With this statue in my hands, they will think I am the priestess of Bes.
Dangerous Journey

It's better to enter the temple at night. At this time, there are fewer people inside and all they do is keep the fire lit. Besides with just the light of the torches, they'll think I'm one of the priestesses.
I saw a black bee in the grove at the bottom of White Mountain! Let's see if I can find the beehive and get some honey.
Black Bee
The beekeeper gave me a protective hat in case I come across a beehive again. He says he hasn't seen black bees for a long time. They could've moved elsewhere.
Yes, the pets are all back home! Thank you!
Fear Has Big Eyes
A pack of jackals roamed around the sepat tonight. Their howling scared away many of the pets. They haven't returned home. Won't you please help me find them?
The Chief will do anything to rescue Nimiru. I'll keep praying for her safe return and wear this black dress to show support. However, I have a bad feeling…
Nimiru Kidnapping
How awful! The Chief's daughter has been kidnapped! Apparently, the kidnappers want to initiate her as a priestess of Amrun… What a terrible fate for her!
The Ladys isn't well yet and is taking medicines from Azeneth's box, so I brought her a blanket so she will get better faster.
Good Deeds Master
I know the Lady met otherworldly forces face to face, and that this meeting seriously affected her health. I really want to help her!
Beautiful and useful! This blanket will remind me of home.
Memories of Home
It's going to be a long journey. It'll be a long time before we can return to our sepat. I want to take something to remind me of home.
I can't believe we made this ourselves and from papyrus too! Amazing!
Big and Useful
The master asked me to make something out of papyrus so that I can learn to work with it. I want to make something big and useful.

Mother loved my idea! Today I sold everything I managed to make over the last few days, and the customers are still coming for new trinkets. I could make even more, but I'm not feeling so well. I need to take a lie down…
A Good Heart
Mother and I only have each other. I love her very much and I want to help her in her trade… I'll make some trinkets from colored sand and sell them at the market!
My trusty bow has gotten me out of many a predicament. I shall take comfort in having it with me.
Worthy Hunter
I must collect my hunting gear before setting out on my mission. The desert can be dangerous.
I don't recognize the symbols on these gauntlets. It is possible they could be from another age?
Book of Life Secret
While digging the new field I came across a strange artifact, buried deep in the soil. What do you make of it?
Someone stole our bread! I've lived in the countryside for many years and no thief has ever entered my house until now… Who would do it?
Mysterious Thief
What's for dinner today? Stewed mutton with vegetables! Yum! Smells good! All I need to complete the meal is fresh bread… I'll check the pantry.
It'll help us when it comes time to go to the afterworld. Wise people say those who get lost when moving to another world will never be able to leave the land of the dead.
Getting in Touch
We live on this land, but when we pass away, we head to another world.
Use the broom to clear the dust from the floor. Children always like to play in the dirtiest of places.
Feel at Home
It's so nice to have the Sepat rebuilt. However, this house won't feel like a home until I get it cleaned and comfortable.
I took all the trash out and the remainder of my illness along with it, and invited the Potter over. He was very glad that I'm not angry with him.
Accidents Will Happen
The Potter is probably concerned about what's happened. I'm well again now, so I'll go see him and invite him to visit me. I just need to tidy up a little first.
A cold shower will help the beekeeper wake up! Besides, there are some other exercises to improve endurance.
Labor Day
The beekeeper is participating in the contest, but working in the apiary isn't enough to prepare him… I must help him avoid embarrassment and train him.
Great! Why didn't I think of it myself? I've been pulling the plow all day. Shh… please don't tell me wife. She'll give me a hard time if she hears about this.
New Technologies
We must decide who will pull the heavy plow. I can't do it on my own. You know someone strong?
Phew, I'm so tired of pulling this plow… It's pretty heavy! I can't do this alone… What? You know someone a little stronger?
What funny-looking animals. They look like dwarf bulls and seem friendly. I think I saw a skull of these animals not far from their watering hole. I'll bring it home as a trophy for the kids.
Unknown Animals
We need to be careful when we're dealing with something unfamiliar, especially with animals. Danger is all around us in the wilderness.
I gave the Brewer the keys to the barrack cellars, so he can fill them with his magic brew every week. And we'll be sure to show him our gratitude.
Troubles of the Trade
I invited the Brave Brewer over to let all my warriors thank him and to present him with a special symbol of trust.
The cacti make a nice treat for the camels.
Low Maintenance Animals
It's difficult to live in the desert without a couple of camels. These animals can eat almost anything, even cacti and burs.
Beautiful singing! My wife will love this gift.
A songbird? What a wonderful idea! She will fill the early morning hours with her sweet melodies.
Dreamland
Child's Play

My wife's birthday is coming soon. We've been happily married for years and I'd like to give her something special as a token of my love and gratitude. I'd love to catch a singing bird in the valley for her.
I need to bring some cheer to the Sepat. I'd like to get an animal, but cats are indifferent and dogs are too filthy. Do you have any ideas?
I'm glad the Brewer agreed! My scones are going down a treat with the citizens. Tomorrow I'll bring some new ones for sale - with hot spices this time.
A Healthy Snack
It's a good idea to serve dried peas with BEER. I also have something for the Brewer. I'd like to propose a profitable trade for it.
What luck! This giant tub I've inherited will serve as an excellent container for chilled BEER. Copper lends it healthy qualities.
City of the Past
I wonder what other secrets are hidden in my family's old cellar. No doubt there are things worth finding down there. We need to light it up.

I wasn't wrong. This man is apparently connected to the bandits. I followed him all along the road and was amazed to see him turn towards the Mine after he left the city. He disappeared into one of the tunnels. We need to get some people together and search the labyrinth.
The Bandits' Lair
I saw a suspicious person in a black cloak at the market today. I decided to follow him discretely, just in case he's connected with the band of thieves we still haven't been able to catch.
Each battle chariot can carry a charioteer and a warrior armed with a bow and arrows. A chariot can also be used in peace. For example, they've been used in special ceremonies.
Fiery Chariot
If we have chariots, it'll improve our battle capabilities and flexibility. Troops with 25 chariots will become the strike force in our army.
My old teacher and his family live on the northern slope of Blue Mountain. If anyone knows how to defeat evil spirits, it'd be him.
My old teacher lives on the northern slope of Blue Mountain with his family. If anyone knows where we can find a master of letters, it's him.
Old Teacher
In Search of a Master
People fear the priests of Amrun. The evil spirits headed by the Old Magician's Spirit helped them. It's time to put an end to it and get rid of the evil spirits! But we can't do it on our own.
Finding a person capable of helping us restore the writing won't be easy! We need the advice of a wise man.
All we found out was their army has more than a few thousand warriors. It's a big army. How we can learn more about them quickly and safely? I think I have an idea!
Friend or Foe?

We haven't seen any identification signs near the foreign camp. We should send out a small search party. We need to sneak up to the camp to get more information about them. As we need to be quiet, we'll take only bows and arrows.
I'll gather all the cassava root into one place for the next caravan. Without me, our Chief would never be able to help our western neighbors. It's all thanks to my hard work.
Helping Neighbors
We have a good cassava harvest in the fields this year, enough to feed all Egypt. Cassava root is delicious boiled!

What a disaster! Someone broke into the granary at night and carried off all the supplies we were going to take with us on our journey! These thieves must have no heart to do such a thing! What are we to do now?
Losing the Caravan

Everything is ready for the journey! I put my weapons and supplies in the granary. Tomorrow at dawn, we'll saddle the camels and set off on our journey. Poor little Sheriti is getting worse every day - we have to hurry.
One of the most important things a warrior needs is body armor to protect him from weapon-related injuries. The armor must be light and strong.
Army
A warrior's life is fraught with dangers and hardship. The right equipment can save a warrior's life and ensure victory!
What a comfortable seat! I doubt I'll be able to sit on it, though - my daughter Sheriti has fallen in love with it, and I can't say no to that face.
The Bloom of Trade
A successful salesman is an active salesman! It's no easy task to stand up all day hawking your wares. Sometimes you need to have a break, sit down, and rest.
I managed to trade an excellent piece of cheese from the Farmer. I'll try to lure the little devil into a trap with it. I'll show it who's the boss here!
Order in the Brewery
A giant rat has taken up residence in my Brewery, and it's been scaring my guests. We need to get rid of it at once, otherwise I'll lose all my clients.
I went to the hen house for eggs only to find a missing hen! The children said they saw a warrior in the yard. He left in a hurry carrying something under his cloak…
Mysterious Thief

I've been busy sewing new clothes for the kids all day and didn't even notice the day ended. The potter will be home from the market soon and dinner isn't ready! I'll cook an omelet. It's quick and tasty!
We can find a place to plant new seeds in the field before the harvest. This fruit is supposed to be healthy and delicious.
Favorable Climate
We have some free time before the harvest season. Maybe we can put it to good use?
You're right… if I can't find the right flower to give her, I'll bring her a variety. Such wonderful advice!
Bold Step
Can I show up to the Sepat with just a single flower? What if the Lady is expecting a beautiful bouquet?
One of the Mine's tunnels goes through a deposit of very strange black stone. It's not strong enough to make sculptures and homes out of, but perhaps it has some other useful properties?
First Descent
