First things first: we need to study the subterranean strata and find out which of them we can find something useful in.
We have plenty of coal, but we'll need to find a way to heat it.
Vegetable soup should do nicely for the feast. We have all the ingredients available, and some hot coals will allow us to warm up the broth.
Ouch! I have a snake bite! I need an antidote! Must hurry home and ask my wife to catch the cobra or else it'll hurt the kids!
Cobra Venom
With the new tools, I'll work smarter and faster! I'll take some water and bread and go work in the field for the day.
A-ha! So that's what it was! A talking bird has taken up residence in my garden! I want to catch it and put it in a cage - but how?
A Talking Bird

I was awoken this morning by some strange sounds coming from the garden… At first I couldn't quite make out what they were, but then I realized someone was repeating the following words over and over: "Praise be to the Pharaoh!", "Praise be to the Pharaoh!"… Who could it have been?

Got you! So that's how you take purses from passers-by - you cut them with a sharpened coin so subtly that they don't even notice until it's too late! Now you'll cool your heels in our prison and answer for all your misdeeds.
Thieves in the City

It seems a band of thieves has set up shop in our city, a band wanted along the entire southern bank of the Nile, no less! They're professional bandits, and they're highly elusive! We can only catch them at the scene of the crime… We don't have much chance, but I'm going to try!
The Brewer kept my compasses safe for me. Without this tool, I'm like a man without hands. He's a very good man, I think we'll make good friends.
Lost Things
Yesterday, after correcting some flaws in the Brewery diagrams, we sampled a little of the Brewer's drink and I lost my compasses somewhere.
I think that should be enough corn for our neighbors for a while. You can make flour and bake bread from it, and there's nothing like bread to take the edge off hunger!
Helping Neighbors
The first carts will set off from the Sepat to our western neighbors tomorrow. I asked the Farmer to pile them as high as he could with food.
A cornflower? This is perfect! It reminds me of the Lady's eyes… blue as the sky!
In Love
I'm supposed to meet Lady at the Sepat, but I can't show up empty handed. What if I took her a beautiful flower? Would that be too forward of me?
What a beauty! Time for me to learn how to milk it, but I'm afraid it'll kick me. Step aside… Hey, I think I got it! The fresh milk will be a nice and healthy treat for my kids!
New Horizons
I've been thinking of getting a cow for a long time.
Just because I've been working hard all day around the Sepat doesn't mean I have to look it.
Date under Threat
Potter will be here any moment! I must get this hair of mine under control!
Do you think my clay pots can contain something as powerful as a genie? It's worth a try!
The sun is already high in the sky and I can't go look for the genie barefoot on the scorched sand. We have to find that little scoundrel before he gets into trouble.
These sandals may be old, but they still have some life left in them.
Devious Genies
Edge of the Earth
I opened the Pottery door to let some air in, and a whirling genie thought it was an invitation! We must find a way to trap it!
My old sandals are somewhere in this mess, please help me find them. That mischievous genie turned my whole house upside down, and I hate clutter.
I'll need my sandals to traverse the desert. I made it through Menes' attack without injury… I'd hate for the hot sand to get the better of me.

I ran to the bank and saw the largest crocodile I'd ever seen! I wasn't frightened. On the contrary, I quickly jumped onto its back and tore off its jaw. After that, they made me the leader of my company.
Legends of the Desert

I too once met a strange animal in the desert. Our company stopped in the desert by an oasis and we laid down to sleep. But in the night, I heard the frightened neighing of horses and a roaring growl.
While we wait for Hapi to decide whether or not to bless us, we can dig a canal from the river to the field.
Feast of Hapi
We've been battling drought for many days. I should make an offer to Hapi, the goddess of water, to ensure the waters rise slowly.
This super crystal's power won't last long, so we must use it wisely!
Super Crystal
Complete a level in the hut
It's clear that the enemy we face is very dangerous. I think it would be wise to find a super crystal in case we find ourselves in need.
The journey was teacherous, but we successfully retreieved one of the crystals. When I broke it open, energy flowed over my father.
I can only pray that by morning, father's condition will have improved.
Remedy for the Chief's Disease
You say the purple crystal in your vision sat atop the Blue Mountains? It won't be easy to get to there, but we must try.
My father's breathing has deepend. Unfortunately, we now know how powerful Amrun's magic is. If he did this to my father, all of us are at risk!
Everything was perfect! I think he's in love too. I invited him to my place tomorrow.
This place already feels more charming! The children won't forget about the attack anytime soon, but at least they can start the healing process.
Going as Planned
To Feel at Home
Whew! I'm home. I was in such a hurry that I almost lost my sandals. I couldn't wait to tell you how it went.
At least much of the furniture from our previous building was salvageable. We just have to get it inside and clean it up.

I stepped back and fell into some kind of deep hole. My loyal friends quickly came to my aid. I got scratched up pretty bad, but never mind. On the other hand, I found these… The mysterious Pharaoh cylinders that can heal any wounds!
City of Sacred Beings
Be careful! This city is full of secrets and mysteries we have no idea about. Don't touch anything you don't recognize, it could be dangerous… Oh! Ahhh, help!
We need special things for the rite. We found some… Let's continue…
Have you ever seen anything like that? It's a MIRROR! They're used to see what you look like. The people of Knowledge learned how to use them to communicate with the Spirits though.
This dagger has served me well for years, but I pray to the gods I won't have to use it.
Remedy for the Chief's Disease
Edge of the Earth
The scroll was useless. And there's no other way out. We need to turn to the spirits. Yes, it's dangerous, but I need to do it for my father.
Daggers are used for sacrifices. Don't worry, you just need a few drops of blood. We will need something else to communicate with the Spirit Realm though…
If the northern cities were unaware of our plight, those to the south need warned too! I'll be taking my dagger along in case I run into trouble.
A minute later I heard a rustling and saw a mummy rise out of a stone sarcophagus. I picked up an old sacrificial knife from the floor and prepared to defend myself.
Legends of the Desert
The cave was the tomb of some sort of dark creature, buried here far from human eyes, and I had unwittingly opened its vault.
That's a great idea! I'll ask the nomad to teach my son how to handle darts. And if he likes it, maybe he can learn hunting.
My father taught me to fire darts when I was just a boy. It's a good skill to have.
True Talent
A Worthy Hunter

My son broke all the pots? I'm very frustrated… What can I do about him? He's a nice boy, but he never lets go of his slingshot. No matter how hard I try to make him work in the field, he just doesn't obey.
As comfortable as I am with a blade, I've found that moving targets can be dispatched from a distance with darts.
A warrior must always keep his weapon handy. We never know when there's danger or what is in store for us.
New Allies

We are lucky to make friends with the local people. It was very generous of them to offer us food and a place to live. However, we can't get used to this peaceful life. Our goal is to gain strength and return to our homeland to attack Menes and release our families from slavery.
Looks like everything is ready, but I feel like a nervous teenager.
Nervous Admirer
It's a disaster! I don't have anything for tea. The lady is about to arrive.
Stubborn creature! It wouldn't budge… Get up! Here, take the carrot! That worked! This donkey does anything for food!
Thanks so much! I didn't want that burro to go hungry. I haven't found its owner either, so I feel responsible for the poor creature.
Devious Genies
Stubborn as a Stone
That genie made a lot of noise. A startled donkey ran into my yard and I had to catch it. While its owner hasn't shown up, it can help me carry clay.
I noticed our new friend the donkey likes eating, though it looks like we're out of food. Help me find this glutton something else to scarf down.
Someone's frightened donkey ran into my yard, and it really took some catching. I'll try using it to transport clay until its master shows up.
The Master kindly helped us to make a drill and hammer! With these tools, we can quickly get started with mining minerals.
First Descent
To work in the Mine, we're going to need special tools. We can make them at the Factory, since it has all the equipment necessary. Let's ask the Master for help!
It's important for buyers to be sure that the goods are high in quality and that they're not being fleeced! Then they'll come back to the market again and again.
The Bloom of Trade
To ensure that business goes well, we need to make sure that the trading area is well equipped. Firstly, I'll need weights to properly weigh out goods and a board to write prices on.
All I could find was this faience cup. I'm not sure it's big enough to hold much of anything, let alone a genie!
Tried-and-True Method
Farmer bragged that he captured a water genie with an oil lamp. Maybe I have something I can use to trap this troublesome wood genie.
Ah! I recognized it because I saw the same pendant in my mother's box. But why would Amrun's priestess have the same pendant my mother used to wear?
Pendant Mystery
When I was in Amrun's temple, I saw an emerald pendant on a priestess's neck. It looked familiar… But I don't remember where I've seen it.
My troop returned with bad news. We saw a military camp without any identifying signs at the south border. We don't know who these warriors are, but we must be prepared for their attack.
Friend or Foe?

Leading an army isn't easy. We lack experienced commanders. The chief asked to lead one of the troops. I accepted the offer. Our first mission is to find places by the border where we can build watchtowers.
It may be a funny looking hat, but it'll protect my face from bee stings and I'll be able to work with the bees. Wish I had a tool for collecting honey…
Mastering Craft
I care for the bees and they thank me by stinging me! I don't want my face to swell, so I'd better find a way to protect myself from stings.
The Lady already feels much better. She said her spirit was torn from her body in an instant. Then she wandered an endless violet desert for a long time until the falcon showed her the way back.
City of the Past
I'm going to need a sacred bird - a sunchild. It will travel to the World of the Dead and return the lost soul to us. To strengthen it, I'll have to avail myself of the power of the totems.
Thank you! This is important to me… It's associated with something special to me.
Upsetting Incident
Somehow I lost something important to me. Could you please help me find it?
Another part of an artifact. Maybe an old piece of jewelry from the pharaoh's headwear. But what exactly?
Light at Night
We've been rummaging in the ruins all day long! It's dark and time to go home… Wait! Something is sparkling under the rocks!
The birdfeeder is ready! I'll hang it on the acacia next to the house so the birds won't have to fly far to get food for their chicks!
A Good Heart

Some chicks have hatched under the roof of our house! They're always hungry, and their poor parents don't have time to feed them all. I'll go to the Master and ask him if he can help me make a birdfeeder for them!
I want her to have a high opinion of me. It's important to me.
They were in my toolbox? Of course they were! Without the wire cutter, I would never be able to remove the clay from my wheel.
Best of the Best
Potter's Tools
She's coming to my pottery tomorrow. I want her to see I'm a skillful craftsman and a businessman.
If only I could find my caliper and wirecutter… without them, shaping the pot will be incredibly difficult. See if you can spot them?
I was lucky to catch the queen. She's the mother so there won't be any new bees. Now to get rid of the rest.
Unsafe Distance

Unbelievable! The house has been attacked by bees and the owner doesn't care. I'll have to take care of it. It's better to start with the queen. It won't be hard to catch it as its slower and surrounded by worker bees.
That was the last genie in our land. But that was the easy part. The hard part is ahead… Battling with the Old Magician's Spirit. Get ready!
A hefty bucket of water from the river should send this dangerous genie back to where it came from!
Time on Our Side
Cunning Genies

The teacher says you need to catch all the genies first. Then, and only then, you can defeat the Old Magician's Spirit. You've caught most of the genies. There's just one left… the fire genie. Be careful!
Hmm… I smell smoke. And where there's smoke there's… fire genies! We must stop the creature before it burns down all we've rebuilt!
Thanks for your help! We haven't had a feast in our village for ages. People have lived in fear for so long that they've forgotten joy. Things will change for the better.
Lavish Feast
These hares will make an excellent roast. Yes, the nomad never returns from a hunt without a catch. Let's start a fire to cook the catch.
Thank you for bringing it over! This firewood should light easily with a single spark from the bow drill.
We'll need wood to keep a good fire going. Perhaps you can fetch the dry firewood behind Nomad's hut?
See-through fish! Children love look at it!
Fishing
Miner love play with children, and children love how Miner catch fish. Miner catch fish like children never seen!
With bow drill in hand, we just need a way to light the coals.
I'm not skilled in fire-making, are you? Hmm… the Nomad has spent years living off the land. There should be a bow drill in his hut.
I'll use this flour to bake bread using the baker's recipe. If he tells the truth, I should make a lot of sales.
Unusual Recipe

I met a foreigner in the city today. He is a baker and said that he owned a bakery in his homeland. He had to leave his home because of the war against an unpopular ruler. He gave me a bread recipe that promises to be the most delicious bread I've ever tasted.
Beautiful bird. Miner catch it for Lady. Miner give Lady bird and flowers.
Miner Want Friend
Miner want make friend with city people. Miner go visit Lady.
Every little detail is important in baking a dessert. It won't turn out well even with the slightest mistake with the ingredients.
Important Trifles
Let's treat Nimiru to a dessert! I'll bake a cake tomorrow!
It won't be hard to look after these animals, and they'll do us a lot of good!
Household Helpers
I noticed that there are many friendly animals in the neighborhood. They could help us around the house. Maybe we can try taming them?
How do I look? Really? Oh, should I take off the apron? Well, it doesn't matter now. There's no time left. She's coming!
You found them! These mittens may look silly, but it's impossible to handle fired clay without them.
Rehearsal
Pottery Wizard
I need more instruments to make it look impressive. Oh, I must hurry! I want to rehearse a little before she comes. Practicing will help me feel more confident.
Perhaps you'll help me sift through the rubble of my old pottery to find all of my tools. First, I need my work mittens.
Fireflies light up darkness. Children love look at them at night. In nature many wonders. Miner show them to children.
Taking Care of Orphans
Miner also had family… Miner not know where they are now. Miner will make friend with orphans and give them gifts.
The kids enjoyed the jaunt! They like spending time with you.
Gratitude to the Creator
Yesterday I promised the kids to take them to the statue of Ptah so that they could honor the god with their gifts. But I have a lot of things to do… Will you take them? I'd be grateful!
It turned out great! I think I've never made anything more majestic.
Gratitude to the Creator
Well, let's begin. We should finish it by morning to surprise everyone.
The bracelet of Horus? How did it get here? It's a sacred bracelet that only an initiated person can wear. I must find out the truth about my mother.
Pendant Mystery
I can't forget the pendant I've seen around the priestess's neck in the Temple of Amrun… I found the same pendant in the jewelry box I inherited from my mother. What's the connection?

Benben is a stone that fell from the sky long ago. It was placed on a pillar in the city of Innu, the sacred capital. It was hidden from the uninitiated in the Temple of Phoenix. As far as we know, it disappeared during ancient times.
Pink Granite
I discovered deposits of pink granite at the foot of Cogged Mountain. It's a rock used in making obelisks in the shape of the old sacred Benben. We need to excavate the granite there.
Whew! I found it. Thankfully, the camel didn't go far.
Loss
Woe is me! My best camel ran away! Looks like I chained it poorly. There's no time to lose. Let's split – you go north, I go south!
The Master said that the animals on this stone are spoken of in the ancient scrolls! Many believe that these animals lived on this land in the time of the City of Sacred Beings.
Mysterious Artifacts
When the miner put his bag down, I noticed a strange stone fall out of it, with an image of some creature I don't know… I decided to hide the find and take it to the Master.

In the chest, I found a griffin feather among other things. They say such feathers are used to make amulets that protect people from the magic of the priests of Amrun. How did this feather get in here?
Griffin Feather
I found an old chest in one of the abandoned houses. It's full of many old things that may come in handy.
Look, a desert hare! Those things taste great fried!
You scaled the tree like it was nothing! What's that? A genie put him up there? Hrmph. Genies are nothing but trouble.
This harpoon has saved my life on more than one occasion.
Rage of Nature
A Worthy Hunter
My goodness! There's a child stuck in a tree outside. We have to do something! If he falls, I'd never be able to live with myself.
A harpoon may seem excessive, but if I run into a wild rhino, I'll be glad to have it.
This rare animal is called a HEJ-HOGG, you don't get them in these parts. Next time I'll bring a few more back.
Good Deeds Master
I brought a little friend from distant lands for the Ladys children. I need to pick him up from the Hut when I next go to the Sepat.

The Brewer had never played the game before and didn't know the rules as well as I do. He comes from other lands, after all. But nonetheless, he still managed to beat me. I'm trying to figure out why…
City of the Past
I asked the Brewer to play a very ancient game with me, one my ancestors used to love playing. I saw it in his Brewery - one of the guests left it there.
While I was weeding the field, I found this strange coin… It's very worn, but all the same, you can clearly see the lines of an old ruler's face on the coin's surface.
A Strange Coin
Oh no! While I was visiting my brother in the next village, weeds took over my field! I need to start weeding at once, otherwise we won't be able to rely on a good harvest this year!
This chisel is perfect for collecting honey. It's so easy now. Thanks to the master for the gift!
Mastering Craft
What a nice tool! Collecting honey will be easier and a pleasure! Come on, let's try it!

Mmm! Am I truly once again breathing in the aroma of that tobacco? It reminds me of distant journeys and calls me to the road again… This tobacco is pleasing to the senses and completely harmless. I know, there are those who smoke stupefying grasses, but I'm not one of them!
An Unusual Item

Once, when I was on one of my travels, I came upon a nomad camp far away in the desert. They invited me to sit by the fire with them and partake of their hookah - a strange container filled with aromatic smoke…
The Farmer looks after his land well. Everything he touches grows like yeast. He's a very economical and clever man!
How the Brewer Saved the City
The Farmer promised to harvest some hops cones for me, only the choicest and largest!

My warrior's instinct did not deceive me. An enemy spy was trying to steal into the city. My men chased him and he threw down his weapons and surrendered. Just give the order and I can bring you to him for interrogation.
Enemy at the Gates
My Master, there have been no attacks on our lands for a long time and I feel that my people are losing their vigilance. Will you allow me to patrol the outskirts of the city with a small scout?
Nothing seems to be missing. I don't understand… why would someone attack and not take anything? What does this Amrun want with our city?
Worthy Hunter
Cleaning Up
Hunters have to head out before the break of dawn, so lets wrap this up and go to bed early.
It appears as though my hut was ransacked when the city was attacked. I must organize it and see if anything is missing.
Blowing into a hunting horn emits a loud noise and will let everyone know that trouble is near.
Worthy Hunter
Nimiru has suggested I take a hunting horn with me in case I run into problems along the way.
Oh, that's it. There's a beehive on the roof of the house. Would it be OK with the owner if we take care of it? No one needs to put up with it, so I'll handle it!
Unsafe Distance
Ouch! A bee stung me! Oh, it hurts. Wait a minute, let me get it. Oh! There's a swarm here! Where did they come from?

Wow! What a beautiful animal! The warrior said that horses can be used like camels. They can carry people and things, and they're also useful in battles. A horse cavalry can easily defeat a larger group of soldiers on foot.
Fellow Warrior
One of the warriors liked our wine so much that he offered to exchange all the wine we have for an animal he referred to as a horse. I've never heard of such an animal.
These horses are as fast as the wind! We must hurry and tell the Chief everything we learned at the camp. He'll decide what to do next.
Common Foe
While the warriors sleep, we can take a few horses and return to the city. I'm sure the Chief will be anxious to know what we found out.

These are the best horses that we have. I'd like to give them to the Chief's family. His daughter can learn riding. Horses are useful in farming and construction. My servant will show you how to look after them.
New Allies
Horses will make your army stronger. I will ask my warriors to teach the local soldiers how to ride and the art of fighting on a horse.
The horse and the rider become whole. Trust is the basis that helps man and animal understand each other without words. I enjoy riding! It lifts my spirits! I'm ready to go!
Dangerous Journey

The commander of the foreign army gifted a few horses to my family. I liked one of them more than others. I've never ridden on horseback that far. I better make sure I can survive such a long journey.
The Brewer found my horseshoe! I wouldn't dare go into the desert without it. This is the horseshoe of my loyal old courser. That stallion was as fast as the wind.
Lost Things
I tried out many varieties of the Brewer's magical drink yesterday, and I dropped my lucky charm somewhere. It's strange, but it's not in the Hut.
Everything's ready! As the sailors say, the wind favors us! Farewell! We shall meet again someday…
I think we'll be able to tame this animal later, but I just don't have time for that now. Lock it up in the dog pen so it gets used to it. Don't forget to feed it while I'm gone.
I found Scout! He was hiding beneath the hut, and was eager to see me. I'll be glad to have him at my side.
End of the Earth
A Worthy Hunter
I've seen a creature in the valley at dawn. Maybe it can help with my journey. No matter how much I want to hit the road, I'd better stay for a few more days to catch this creature.
Tonight a wild desert dog tried to attack my camel, and it was able to bite its leg and injure it. We have to catch the dog before it can bite anything else.

It looks like my dog dug a hole out under its pen and ran off to hunt. It was also once wild, which is why it constantly senses the call of blood. Help me to find him, because I already heavily delayed
I would take my hound, Scout, with me, but I haven't seen him since the city was attacked. I can only pray he is safe.
Fruit juice with ice! Children love! Children will be happy!
Miner Want Friend
Miner make friend with children from Sepat! Miner want make for them surprise!
Farmer thank Miner. Farmer give Miner tasty fruit. It called banana.
Miner Want Friend
Hot. Farmer work in field under hot sun. Miner give Farmer ice cream.

The market grows day by day! My new assortment of goods will help me fulfil even the most unusual requests from my customers, and that's very important! People have to have everything they need to live. After all, they work day and night for the good of the city.
The Bloom of Trade
Business is booming, so we can start thinking about expanding. Apart from fruit and spices, I could sell other items in demand in the city as well.
I'll draw the map with invisible ink. This way I can be sure this place remains a secret.
Mysterious Cave
I don't want anyone else to know about this cave. What if there is something precious inside?

The arrowheads are forged in casting moulds made of stone. Apart from ordinary arrows, every warrior must have a special ancestral arrow in his quiver. A fallen warrior on the battlefield can be identified by this arrow, and a victor can take it as a trophy.
In Defense of the City

If war comes, we're going to need a lot of weapons. We can make some of the spears and swords we need ourselves, and trade for the rest at the totems. Let's start with making arrows. We're going to need plenty of iron for those.
I never expected such profit! I'll probably give this money to the Tradeswoman. Let her make offerings to the Gods and hold a celebration in honor of her daughter's recovery!
Foreign Goods
The people who live on the other side of the Northern Desert turned out to be very hospitable hosts. They put a caravan together for me for the road home and loaded it with various goods.
Jasmine, you say? It is quite gorgeous. It reminds me of the beautiful clothes the Lady always wears. She's fashionable and beautiful!
In Love
Hmm… the cornflower you found is beautiful, but what if the Lady is allergic?! Maybe I should find something different.

Phew, it's done! The platypus and the koala weren't too nimble, but I really had to run to catch that kangaroo! I'll fence off a small area by the river, put the animals in there, and let the local kids come and see them.
Havoc in the City
Apart from goods, I brought something… unusual. You'll see! Oh, the foreign animals escaped their cages! Now they'll wreak havoc in the city! We need to catch them right away!
There are entire veins of crystals with unusual properties underneath our city. One of those properties is the memory of the ancestors. It seems the Brewer opened himself to it.
City of the Past
The key I saw at the Brewer's place was made in this part of the world. I asked him to find it; I think it can open a door to the past.
What a nice gift! I hope he'll understand my feelings and feels the same way about me.
A perfect gift!
Perfect Woman
I'd like to give something to the potter… Something to remind him of home and family. But what?
What a wonderful kite! Sheriti will be so pleased! I bought it from an outlander merchant who was simply amazed that we don't make these for children here in our city.
A Gift for a Daughter
I turned a good profit on my sale and now I want to give Sheriti a nice surprise - I'll buy something special for her…

This crown belongs to the last pharaoh of Egypt. For many centuries, the pharaoh's family members have been the keepers of the Book of Life. The book protected the Egyptians from the evil. Only compassionate people could touch it.
You think I should wear my father's crown? Not until I've exhausted all options to save him!
New Hope

The old hermit who lives over the river told me a strange story. He said that long ago, the almighty God Ra gifted the Book of Life to the Egyptian people. Apparently, the book has secrets that can help defeat the evil of Amrun.
The spell from the ancient scroll failed and I'm losing hope. The city needs its chief!

I saw a man in the labyrinth! I couldn't catch up to him - he runs too fast - but he dropped his lantern while he was running away… The lantern is very old. It looks like this man has spent many years in the caves!
Caveman
I saw a strange light deep under the ground. It flashed by quickly and disappeared into the mine's labyrinth tunnels. We should go down and check it out.
I'm so grateful to the Master for this clever device! He said that I can use these lockpicks to open any lock!
Medicine for Sheriti
Oh, how clumsy I am! I broke the key to the medicine chest… What am I to do now?
It's going to be a long journey. A good caravan will help us travel longer distances. It'll increase our chances of finding the right person.
Searching for the Master
The future of the city largely depends on whether we can restore the writings and keep the ancestors' knowledge. I'll do whatever I can to find someone who can help us.
A winged lion statue? Yes, this creature exemplifies generosity and selflessness. Most impressive.
Strong Beliefs
I must ensure you're capable of training new warriors. Bring me something that symbolizes a quality you value in others.
A snake, eh? Good choice. Menes is full of venom and is quick to strike when you least expect it.
Evil
Show me your ability to assess your enemy. Bring me something that represents Menes.
Caught him! This lizard came here for something more substantial than tomatoes. Good thing the kids went to the river, or else something bad could've happened.
Threat
Looks like someone plundered my vegetable patches again. I'll teach him to come into my vegetable garden and steal my tomatoes!
Take this lotus for example. It's not only beautiful, but is used in several potions and elixirs.
River Flower
The banks of the Nile are often overlooked, but they are full of wonders. For instance, they are home to a wide variety of river plants.
This mace is made out of unknown metals. It's much lighter and stronger than the ones our warriors have! Looks like they're great warriors! But why are they wandering in desert?
Superior Weapons
I wonder what weapons the warriors have. From what I see, their equipment is much better than ours.
Ouch! Help! I've disturbed the beehive and the swarm attacked me! And they're not even black bees. I can't find any… What can I do?
Black Bee
I'd like to bake a wedding cake for the lady and the potter. The recipe requires honey from a rare black bee. I hope to get lucky in finding its hive.
The mummy flew at me, reaching towards me, and then I remembered the Totem that Nimiru gave me. I thrust it forward with the dagger, cut open the rotting bandages, and the mask fell to the floor…
Legends of the Desert
When the mummy stood up to its full height, and it was no shorter than three meters tall, I saw a baleful marble mask on its face. The creature's whispering chilled my veins.
You must appreciate your time and work to live a happy, fulfilling life.
Lesson
Lessons always teach diligence and obedience. Respect other people's time as well as your own.
In my travels, I happened upon a herd of wild antelope and I had no trouble shooting a few for the Brewer.
A Snack with Beer
I just returned from my travels and brought the Brewer some meat, just as I promised. I dried it along the way and left it in my house.
I hope he'll appreciate it. Between you and me, I like him. I would never be the first to show my affection, but he is so shy…
Way to a Man's Heart
Tomorrow, I'm going to the pottery for new pots. I want to treat the porter with some fruit… Something juicy and refreshing is good to have when the weather is hot.

The Miner gave us a map of the labyrinth and told us he'd show us the Place of the Blue Stone. I'll take it to the Potter so he can study the route and arrange the necessary equipment. I can't wait to go down under ground and see this mysterious place!
Mysterious Artifacts

The Miner gave me a cup of unearthly beauty… It changes color depending on the time of day, and if you pour water into it, it turns into wine! Where could the miner have gotten these strange things? I think I need to ask him to show us around the caves.
I saw a nightmare in which a little girl took that very same mirror from a dark man as a gift, and when she looked into it, she fell in a dead faint. We have to warn the Potter!
My hair is filthy from all this work. How can I hope to impress the Potter like this?
City of the Past
First Date
The Potter came yesterday to brag about buying an antique mirror from the Miner, which he found in the caves. He wants to take it to the Lady as a gift. I have a bad feeling about this.
I invited Potter over for dinner! It feels selfish to do something for myself, but Nimiru said we should go on with our normal lives.
I returned the gloves to the Beekeeper today, and he confirmed that our conversation of yesterday wasn't empty chatter. I can't wait to get his honey.
Lost Things
Yesterday I discussed a new type of BEER made of honey with the Beekeeper. He liked the idea so much that he ran off right away and left his gloves somewhere around here.
Miner know how to catch moles. Many live in caves. Mole good food when you hungry.
Helping the Farmer
Farmer upset. Mole dig his garden. Miner help Farmer catch mole and gather harvest.

What a cute little thing you are! But what am I to do with you…? I know! I'll give you to a certain little girl by the name of Sheriti. She'll love you! You're practically still a baby, so she'll be able to train you.
An Uninvited Guest
I don't know how this little creature got into my home, but I need to capture it. Otherwise it'll destroy all my grain stores.

This is a very rare sword. It's made of a white lizard tail and contains the magic of Seth, the founder of witchcraft. When its magic is in action, you can see a ray of moonlight. I'll try it on Amrun's priests.
Rescue Plan
White lizards live in the underwater caves by the Nile. When cut, its tail turns into a moon rock. We can use it to create a magic weapon and defeat Amrun.
Ah, the moss! I hope this medicine helps my wife recover quickly, so she can dance the sacred dance of atonement at the festival in honor of the great god Ptah!
Medicine for the Wife

My wife must dance in honor of the god Ptah, but she twisted her ankle. The performance might have to be cancelled! They say the best medicine for twisted ankles is cave moss. We need to get our hands on some!
Here's the ring! Now I can head out. I hope I'll meet Mother soon to find out why she left us and became the priestess of Amrun.
Dangerous Journey

Mother left when I was a baby, so she won't recognize me. There's a scarab ring in our family jewelry box. Father gave it to Mother when I was born. I should take it with me as proof that I'm her daughter.

Oh Gods! I got lost in the labyrinth and I've been wandering it for three days. My torch burnt out and I found myself in total darkness. Luckily, I found these glowing mushrooms in one of the caves. I took them with me and one of the workers happened to notice their light while I was wandering the labyrinth!
Frustrated Repairs

I've wanted to repair the house for a long time, but I had material problems. Now that we've built the mine, I can start my repairs. The Potter is too busy to help me, so I think I should go into the Mine alone and get the materials I need.
I was at the Chief's house where I found out that no one has seen Nimiru since morning. I have a bad feeling something bad happened. Quickly, we need to round up people to look for her.
Nimiru Kidnapping
On my way home after the hunt, I found this bracelet in the grove. I think it's the same one Nimiru wore… I'll return it to her.
I didn't find any clues of kidnapping. But I found Nimiru's belt not far from the hut. There was some magic… I think they somehow moved her in the air.
Nimiru Kidnapping
The Chief's daughter always carries a weapon. Who would dare to kidnap her in the village in the daylight? I'd better take another look in the grove where I found the bracelet.
My son found a woman's sandals by the river that belong to Nimiru. The marks in the sand show that someone dragged her… This is a kidnapping!
Nimiru Kidnapping
Chief told the tribe that his daughter has disappeared. I volunteered to help. I'm going to round up the kids and we'll look by the Nile.
I've given my father the tincture. I suppose there's nothing else we can do except wait… and pray.
Remedy for the Chief's Disease
Praise the gods! You brought the herbs back from the Farmer! Now to create the healing potion.
I can't find the other sandal… Where did I leave it? Ah, it doesn't matter…. too lazy to look for it. I'll go barefoot.
Lazy Beekeeper
How lonely it is here! I'm heading to the sepat to pick up my things from the old house. I can also bring some honey to give to the lady and the kids.
I gave the Chief a huge onion to eat and made him a hot drink, then sent him to bed. Health has to be looked after, especially the Chief's.
A Snack with Beer
The Chief came to the Brewery today. He looked unwell and I didn't advise him to have a cold BEER, but I did come up with a way to help him get better.
What an unusual combination of emerald green and blue! I've awaited this day for many moons! This stone is worthy of giving to the great god Ptah to ask for his mercy!
A Rare Find

The underground tunnel branches off in many directions, forming a giant labyrinth. We need to be prepared for this search to take many days. But we can't afford to rush: it'd be easy to get lost in this labyrinth.
Good spoils! Just think what a tasty dinner we'll cook with this game!
Gathering by a Fire
I very much miss our evening gatherings by the fire. I think I'll go hunting and then invite friends to dinner. Are you coming along?
Yum! We shall have the tastiest bread in the whole desert!
Important Ingredient
We need a bird that lays eggs if we want to bake tasty bread. Are you a fast runner, by the way?
We have no Pharaoh in our state at the moment. The Chief rules over the city, and he handles his duties perfectly. Our ruler's image is worthy of being printed on the state's most valuable coin!
Our Own Coin
We'll mint several types of coins of various value. We'll start with the most valuable - it must be engraved with the image of the worthiest person in our city.
Thanks for your help! It's amazing how you have time for everything.
No Limit
I need one more thing to continue working. It should be somewhere in the workshop. Let's find it.
That's quite a story! Maintaining order is important in every trade.
Practice Makes Perfect
Everything is perfect. But what should we do with the tools after we're done with them? We need to figure this out…
Here's the press. I'll put a couple of scrolls in it and leave it for a few days. As soon as the papyrus is flattened, I'll be able to make a new house for the bees.
Mysterious Cave
I need a papyrus press to make a new home for the bees. I think I can borrow one from the master of the papyrus factory.
Great! If you have questions, please ask.
First Lesson
We need writing tools for our lessons. It's not hard. I'll show you how you can make everything you need. Let's begin.
I wouldn't want the citizens to feel bad in the mornings, they have a lot of work to do after all. The Farmer and I made a deal: he's going to deliver dried peas to me every month as a snack.
A Healthy Snack
My guests have taken to the BEER a little too fondly, and at times some of them can barely stand up. I need to do something about this, otherwise I'll lose my reputation.

My goodness! I asked the genie to show me the lands to the north as I want to see the world. Instead, he took me to the top of Blue Mountain and I had to find my way home. It took all night. Thankfully, the tigers didn't attack me.
One can't be too careful in these dangerous times, right? After all, we don't yet know the extent of Amrun's plans.
Devious Genies
Medicine for the Chief
Still I'll try to make a wish. To ensure the genie doesn't deceive me, I'll use this protective amulet. I know it didn't work last time, but it should now.
I will hang my mother's magic pendant around my father's neck to ward him against Amrun's evil.
The dagger belonged to the first pharaoh. It has great power! We'll enter Amrun's temple at night, strike the priests with the moon sword and free Nimiru.
Honor and Courage
We can't do without your help, Master. I beg you to come with us. You can read the sacred book. Use it as a weapon against Amrun.
I can't hide a pick in my pocket, but everyone will think I'm going to work in the Mine.
Mysterious Cave
Now that work is underway in the Mine, I can disguise myself as a worker, go into the cave I saw a few days ago and see if there's anything valuable in there.
How pleasant it is to fan myself and lie in a hammock eating rich grapes! Life is wonderful!
Honey Harvest
The honey harvest is done and I can once again rest in my hammock and enjoy the cool breeze in the shade of a flowering acacia…
While the apron dries, I can rest.
Am I foolish to think that my friendship with Potter could become something more? What if he's too busy rebuilding to notice me?
Gaffe in the Kitchen
To Feel at Home
Oh, I'm so clumsy. I knocked over the bowl with the dough. Now I'll have to stop working and wash the apron.
The Potter will be here any minute and… what's this? A stain on my apron?!

They say the Persian weavers weave threads of their own fate into the patterns… I suppose it must be true - you can look at the intricate patterns on the rug for hours, feeling as if they yearn to tell you of their creator's life story.
Persian Rugs
My old rug has worn very thin. Perhaps it's time to buy another one. I heard that some fine Persian rugs have arrived at the market. They cost a lot, but they're worth it.

I went down into the dark cellar and found an ancient pitcher for BE-ER. When I touched it, I once again saw the beautiful city, and I suddenly understood - this is the land of my ancestors, and I am not here by chance.
City of the Past
I listened to my instincts and found another cellar under the Brewery. It smells of malt. It seems the Chief chose this place for a reason. The Gods themselves brought me to these lands.

What is this? Where am I? I touched this strange bird- like statuette and I was teleported from the caves to the surface! Now I can't go back, I don't know the way… Wait, what if… Wow! I'm in the caves again. This is a magical item!
City of Sacred Beings
What an incredible place! These ruins are thousands of moons old, but they're so well preserved that I can make out old temples and houses in them… Look, what's that light behind that column?
These are old, but I got used to them and don't want to throw them away. When I get home, I'll wash the dishes and repair this bench. They'll shine again!
Lazy Beekeeper
First, I'll pick up my things at the house. Then I'll stop by the lady's. She scolded me for handling the bees. I hope she'll change her mind when she sees the honey.
Look! The statue of Anubis is glowing! It's time to ask for help!
Getting in Touch
The gods will accept our gifts yet it's not enough. We need to do more for them… We need their help.
Now our people have mastered writing, and the gods can reveal to us a multitude of secrets from the past. This is an important day! Only one who knows the past can truly change the future.
I may be behind on my farming, but with the plow fixed up, I'll be able to plant more vegetables in half the time.
I plan to use the gold Nimiru gave me to build an irrigation system. I'll use the the power of the Nile to grow many more crops!
New Technologies
Replanting the fields is exhausting. I'm going to take a break to repair my damaged plow.
Before we can plow the field, we must collect the vegetables that have grown.
Pomegranates do not grow on north slopes. It will be a nice treat for the teacher's grandchildren. Let's go!
As it turns out, if you eat a pomegranate your heart will be healthy, and infirmity will stay away for a long time to come.
Old Teacher
Healer's Secrets
I haven't seen my teacher for many moons. He and his family moved to the mountains soon after my tribe granted me the right to bear arms. I loved him very much. He was kind and taught me good things.
The pomegranate is one of the most ancient edible fruits known to man. In our lands, it is often called the king of fruits.
Time to get back to work… provided I’ve recovered everything I need.
Pottery Artist
My potter's wheel is like the city itself… damaged, but its spirit is still intact. The wheel, however, can be fixed quickly.
I fell and stumbled down a passage, in the depths of which was a hidden door. By hitting it, I broke the Magic Seal locking it and fell head over heels into a cave.
Legends of the Desert
I was hit by a sandstorm in the desert recently, and I lost all my camels. I had to slide into a gap between some rocks in search of cover.
You found the pitchfork, too! The faster we find my tools, the quicker we can recover the fields.
Fascination
I wish I had my pitchfork. It would make collecting this wheat so much easier.
The potter has a fever. Propolis oil should help. This man is dear to me, so I pray for his speedy recovery…
Dangerous Wound
Nimiru is saved! Thank the gods! Unfortunately, my bad feeling turned out to be right. The potter was seriously wounded by a poisoned arrow. He needs urgent treatment.
Don't let your mind be idle. Use it to keep it sharp.
Review Lessons Learned
Repetition helps you retain what you learn. Let's see if you've learned the previous lesson.
This coin was given to me by a traveler who I let stay at my home once. He told me that it will one day save my daughter's life. He turned out to be right…
Medicine for Sheriti

Before I can give Sheriti the remedy, I'll need to wrap her in cloth soaked in myrrh. Without it, the medicine won't work properly. But where can I find such so much medicinal oil? It's very expensive…

It fell for it! The beast will frighten my guests no longer. I'll give the rat to the Miner and let him release it into the caves. It's a good home for a rat, and the Miner will be grateful for some company.
Order in the Brewery
I asked the Potter to make me a special jug with holes for catching the rat. Now the clever trap is ready for it.
This is the family recipe for BEER belonging to one of my ancestors. It differs a little from the one I invented. We must brew a drink from this old recipe right away.
City of the Past
So it wasn't the Gods who revealed the recipe of my brew to me. I remembered it because my family knew it. What else does the secret cellar hide?
Beautiful cup! Take as gift!
Mysterious Artifacts
Miner not forget kindness! Miner thank!
Looks like everything's ready. Oh, I need one more thing…
Brilliant Idea
I enjoyed the master's drawing lessons. I wonder how I can use this skill in my trade.
Here it is! I panicked for no reason… It explains how one can train a falcon and use it for hunting. I doubt the servants of Menes were looking for this. But what did they want?
Inside my father's manuscript is a recipe for a healing potion written by my grandmother! We must create the tincture immediately.
Enemy Plot
Medicine for the Chief
Looks like my house was left messy for a reason… I found out that one of the manuscripts was missing. Many years ago, I bartered with an old Bedouin in the desert for it.
A soldier found my father in the mist! He's alive, but ill. If we can heal him, we'll learn more about what caused Menes to attack his people.

What an agile girl! She leaps over the bench even better than my Zulfia, and I thought no one could match her at bench-jumping! This girl has become like a daughter to me, and I'm always glad to see her in my home.
Thick as Thieves
The Tradeswoman's daughter is just charming! This morning, she brought us cakes from the market and got along great with my children. Now they play together every evening! I'm so glad!
Thank the gods! The ointment worked and the fever is gone. The potter almost paid for his life in rescuing the Chief's daughter. He did his duty… Thank goodness he's OK.
Dangerous Wound
It's been more than a day and he still has fever. A woman in the village told me to prepare the ointment using royal jelly. I hope it works.
I couldn't think of a way to measure out the cloth for my customers no matter how hard I tried… Thanks for the great idea! What did you say this is called again? A MEA-SURE? What a useful device!
An Example of Selflessness

My friend is a weaver. She weaved several rolls of excellent cloth and asked me to sell them at the market and split the profits. I don't want to take the money, but I'll help the poor girl - she has a large family.
Yum! That's an unusual pairing! This bread indeed tastes better with salt! Who knew? I need to thank the baker for the recipe! I'll go and share this bread with my neighbors!
Unusual Recipe
This bread is delicious! I remember the baker recommended eating this bread with… salt! Who eats bread with salt? I can't imagine it's tasty, but I'll give it a try.

This camel will do well. It's young and strong, which allows it to travel without water and rest for many days. However, we must remember to keep our luggage light. We don't want to take things we don't need.
That's a good bridle made from soft leather. It even has a safe bit. I don't want to hurt the camel - they can be good buddies on long journeys.
End of the Earth
In Search of a Master
In order to reach the northern lands, we need to cross the desert. It will take many days, so we need a camel strong enough to go such a long way.
Oh, you know, my friend, riding a camel isn't as easy as it looks. You may think the hump helps, but it doesn't. It will be easier if I can find a special saddle.
I can't believe people think genies are kind spirits that grant wishes! They're nothing more than a nuisance!
Devious Genies
I have returned! The southern cities will be safe if Menes keeps his attention on us. However, we have bigger problems… genies have appeared!
That should be enough papyrus to make a scroll three ells long. I'll get started making it right now. The gods' wish is my command.
The Divine Message

Great Gods! I had a vision last night! A messenger of the god Ptah came to me in a dream and told me I must make an extra- strong sheet of papyrus and write a message on it for my people. I'll need to cut down a lot of papyrus for this! Let's get going!
Thank you! Nice job!
Looking Back
Symbols represent lost knowledge. Reading the symbols may help uncover a mystery from our past.
This product draft is only for a simple pot, but just like rebuilding the city… we will start small and work our way to larger creations.
Pottery Artist
What's this, you ask? Before I start working on a project, I first create a product draft. This lets me envision a piece before I begin.
I found an old toy for the children - a SCOO-TER - and repaired it! Now they're riding around the yard on it one by one and laughing!
Good Deeds Master
I'm very worried about that incident with the magic mirror! Who'd have thought it'd turn out to be cursed… We need to take care of the children while the Lady recovers.
I visited the Lady to give her some pies my wife baked. In gratitude, she gave me salt for my bath and said that bathing with sea salt washes all maladies from the body. What a wonderful gift!
A Gift
My hoe is broken. I think I can buy a new blade for it in the Sepat. And at the same time, I can pay a quick visit to the Lady.
An shark statue? So you're saying you're wise and powerful… and this spider statue tells me you can merciless when the need arises.
Get to the Root
Now, bring me something that symnbolizes your greatest strengths.
The dagger is well preserved, but it's old and blunt. I can't cut the papyrus with it… Come on! Ouch! My tooth! Silly me, why did I try biting this papyrus?
Toothache
I've read in the ancient scrolls about a secret recipe for superstrong papyrus. I need special tools to make it.
This unique weapon works perfectly! Sharp knives wipe out foot soldiers on both sides of the chariot and, at the same time, clear the way. These dangerous weapons will put the fear in our enemies!
Fiery Chariot
A battle chariot must be equipped with special long, sharp forged knives. These knives, attached to the wheels, make a very valuable weapon.
Clumsy warrior! You didn't move fast enough and paid for it with your life. Now your weapon belongs to me.
Raging Battle
I fight as well as any warrior and can stand up for myself! I just need a good weapon like this beautiful dagger!
This turban will not only protect me, but help me to blend in with the locals if the need arises.
That's a good bridle made from soft leather. It even has a safe bit. I don't want to hurt the camel - they can be good buddies on long journeys.
End of the Earth
In Search of a Master
I must ensure the cities to the south escaped Amrun’s fury. First, I’ll need a turban to protect my face from the desert winds.
You know, camels are quite the capricious animals. They don't like wearing a bit. I wouldn't either, but there are no two ways about it.
As you can see, simple materials can make the most complex things.
Simple Materials
You can make a lot of useful things from papyrus. Do you think it's not strong enough?

Holy Isis! It seems an animal has made my storeroom its home! Mongooses rarely enter human homes, but this little thing wasn't afraid to build its nest in one of my pots. It looks like it's been living here for a long time.
An Uninvited Guest
What are those strange sounds coming from the storeroom I keep my pots in? I'd better put my silent sandals on and check it out. It could be a thief!

We went down into the depths of the Mine and started digging where the sounds were loudest. We soon discovered that we were digging a passage into some kind of unknown tunnel leading deep under the ground. That must be where the sounds are coming from.
The Secret of the Blue Crystal

There must be something underground that transmits the mutterings of the mysterious cave- dweller through the Blue Crystal in my staff. I need to go down into the cave and find this place. The Potter has agreed to help me.

What a cute creature! True, it's wild and terribly dirty. Still the kids like it! It won't be difficult to wash the cat and tame it. It'll be nice to have a pet at home for the children to take care of and love.
Look! The cat has brought a dozen friends along. Looks like I'll be taming them all!
Pet
The barbarians have a beautiful tradition of letting a cat inside a new house before they move in. I don't believe in these things, but I think I'll ask the kids to bring a wild cat.

New residential buildings have been built in the Sepat. Letting the cat be the first to enter a new home is an old barbarian custom. I'm not superstitious, but it's a neat custom. I should ask the potter to catch me a wild cat!
You found it! A sickle is the perfect tool for reaping wheat.
New Technologies
The attack on the city scattered my farming tools to the wind! I could use your help tracking them down. If only I had my sickle…
Just what I need! It'll certainly come in handy!
Maintain Reputation
After the cannibals captured me, I lost my thirst for adventure. I want to find a home and do good things for others. I'll start small!
On the way to the Sepat, I watched the clouds floating across the sky, changing into fantastic shapes. The Gods truly made us such a wonderful world! Mom says I have the eye of an artist!
A Good Heart
The Lady bought some cloth at the market, but couldn't take it home, since she had too much to carry. Mom asked me to help her. I'll be glad to help!
My grandmother called Sirius the Dog Star. She said that on a clear night you work can by its great light.
Ancestors' Experience
At night, the Nile's banks provide the best view of Sirius, the brightest star in the sky. Our ancestors were the first to see it.

It's a sistrum! Amrun's priests use the same musical instrument in their rites! It means Menes is focused on conquering new lands. That's why they didn't strike back. We should team up to go after Menes.
Common Foe
These warriors come from lands occupied by a foreign army headed by priests who know magic. These priests worship some unknown god called Amrun. Could they be Menes's servants?

I found this crystal skull among the temple ruins. It was obviously on the altar and must have been used as a ritual item in ceremonies. I don't want anything to do with any kind of magic! I'll give it to Nimiru, let her decide what to do with it.
City of Sacred Beings
Has anyone seen the Nomad? He said he was going to go see what's behind the far column in this temple. But a lot of time has passed and he still hasn't returned…
You think it was a slingshot, hmm? It's frustrating, but I'm impressed with their aim.
Hunter to Be
I set my newest pot out to harden in the sun and suddenly it exploded! Did you see anything suspicious?
Ugh, what kind of monster is that?! I somehow drove it into the granary and locked it in. I'll talk to the Nomad - maybe he knows what this beast is and where it came from?
A Monster in the Field

I heard the Nomad returned from his long journey. Few dare to cross the Northern Desert! I'm glad my friend got back safe and sound! I'm going to pick a few fresh tomatoes in the field and go visit him.
We'll mint a dozen bags of change! That'll be enough for the merchants at the market to divide up without taking any losses.
Our Own Coin
To make correct trades, we need a small change coin. They're made from cheap metal and usually display an image something insignificant, like a pot, for example.
There's something strange in the old barn near the house… I have no idea what it is. I can try using it as a fan to cool off from the heat.
Unwilling Beekeeper
What a lovely day! I think I shall postpone cleaning until later… I want to go for a walk in the meadow behind the house.

The miner was very glad of an opportunity to bathe, but the result wasn't exactly what I expected. Right after his bath, he put on his old rags again and disappeared into the tunnels. It seems he prefers that life now.
Miner

I fed the underground man for many days, and little by little, we made friends. It turns out he's a miner. Long ago, the entrance to the mine collapsed and he found himself stuck underground. Now he's been rescued and I want to help him get his humanity back!
I'm glad the Farmer liked the seeds, and I hope they'll take root and produce crops next season under his tender care. Or flower, or whatever it is they do…
Helping Neighbors
I returned from another campaign today and brought some seeds from the Southlands to give to the Farmer. We need to take them to him.
The spear is a good weapon we can make in our workshop. It's made out of light bamboo and has a sharp stone spearhead.
Victory Weapon
As far as I know, neighboring empires hold special weapon workshops. Why not adopt this practice?
Thank you for spending the whole night with my sick father! You're kindhearted and sympathetic. These qualities are as good as gold!
You found the sponge just in time. I think I can still salvage this piece!
Remedy for the Chief's Disease
Potter's Tools

I've come for help. Father has a fever… I need to go to the neighboring village for some herbs. It's urgent. Could you stay with Father overnight so I can get the herbs? I promise to return by early morning.
Now, if I could only find my sponge. Without it, this clay will dry out much too fast!
Oho, my head is spinning just from its smell! This'll be a stunning brew, literally. Hold on tight, foes!
How the Brewer Saved the City
Well, it's time to take up my giant spoon and brew the wildest BEER I've ever made. Even an elephant wouldn't be able to stand up to this, never mind a person.
Well, that was an introduction to our lesson. Now we need to get back to writing.
Lesson
I need time to evaluate your progress. Meanwhile, let's keep practicing.
Oh, thank you so much! You're a regular jack of all trades!
Oh, thank you so much! You're a regular jack of all trades!
Secrets of Mastery
Now I'll need a special tool to prepare the medicine. Please make me a mortar so I can grind up the ingredients.
Now I'll need a special vessel to hold the mixture. Please make me a mortar so I can grind up the ingredients.

I inspected the table the strangers sat at. This kerchief obviously belonged to a distinguished gentleman, and the apple core, which normally wouldn't be significant, is actually very interesting - this variety of apples doesn't grow in these parts!
Thieves in the City

Some suspicious types met in the bar yesterday. I'd never seen them before… They only ordered snacks, they didn't try a single mug of my fine beer! And at midnight exactly, they left the establishment…
Hmm, you say you have a plan? Well, I'll count on you…
Dad Needs Help
My twins have a birthday soon. I want to treat them to something special, but nothing comes to mind. Can you help?
Everything happens for its reason. The gods put a man through trials to help him find his way to the Path of the Good.
Power of Signs
A magician follows the Paths of Signs. I think I know how we can contact the Old Magician's Spirit.
Father set off to excavate some old ruins. I wonder if I could find anything valuable there?
The basket is full of broken toys. One of the children must have snuck out to bring this to me for repair.
Jack of all trades
Hmm, someone left a basket by the hut. Did you see where it came from?
Garlic has healing properties. If you mix it with a little salt, it'll help reduce fever. Remember this, it may come in handy!
You know, they say sycamore fruit grows directly from the other world to meet the Sun. May broth made from it take my father to meet the Sun as well.
Remedy for the Chief's Disease
My grandmother was a healer. She taught me how to recognize herbs and make various concoctions with them. One kind woman from the neighboring village gave these herbs to me. They will help Father.
My father needs a good remedy to fend off other diseases and build his strength while he's still weak.
The nomad is sick! He needs a good remedy to heal his illness and strengthen his body.
They say sycamore fruit grows right out of the underworld in search of the sun. An infusion of this fruit can heal many ailments.
My grandmother was a healer. She taught me how to recognize healing herbs and make infusions from them. Come on, I'll show you!
It's the sigil of Amrun! But that would mean his evil stretches back millennia. I don't understand… how could Amrun have survived this long?
Book of Life Secret
The hermit says that Egypt was destroyed because one of the pharaoh's sons cursed the Book of Life. The son made a deal with evil Amrun by giving him Egypt.
Wait, I recognize this symbol on the Scroll of Destiny… the spirits showed it to me during my vision…
Some legends say that people have lived on nothing but dates and water for several years. This miraculous fruit should help Father recover quickly.
Oh, thank you so much! Aren't you just a jack of all trades. Okay, let's not waste a minute. We need to get the medicine ready for my father right away.
Many tales and legends speak of people living on nothing but dates and water for days on end.
Remedy for the Chief's Disease

The date is the healthiest fruit that grow in our lands. People can survive with nothing but dried dates for food on long journeys. Because of their healing properties, they're often used in medicine.
There's a special tool I need now to get the medicine ready for my father. Please make a mortar for me so I can grind up the ingredients.
No matter how much water you drink, you'll still be thirsty. Green tea with mint is salvation for a nomad in the desert!
Long Journey
The nomads of the great desert never drink water as they know it won't quench their thirst. Drink tea instead. Otherwise you won't survive the long journey in the desert.
You need to practice reading and writing symbols to use them properly. Otherwise, you'll quickly forget everything you know.
Importance of Knowledge
You can use symbols to pass on knowledge from generation to generation.
We can help the potter speed up his work with it. It's important that people don't make more work than necessary when there's an easier way.
You found my shaping tool! These pots wouldn't be nearly as interesting without it!
Chief's Help
Potter's Tools
Starting today, we will practice the things that a tribe's chief usually does. And these are not battle moves, it's to help people.
Anyone can make a pot. It's all in how you decorate that makes a true artist. In fact, I used to have a tool specifically for that…

It wasn't need that drew these people onto the path of thievery, but greed. They left me a threatening note. I know what people like this are like. You can't play their game. If I don't speak out, it'll only get worse. I need to ask the Chief for help.
Thieves in the City

Help! Thieves have robbed my stall! What cruel people! Of course, it's all in a lifetime… I've had to endure an empty belly myself more than once. But I never stole from others! If they'd only asked me, I'd have given them everything they needed anyway…

The message proclaims: "I am the God Ptah, speaking from the Heavens! I created the four winds so that all men may breathe in the time allotted to them, and I made people free to choose between good and evil. I want you to do good deeds and reject evil. This is my will!"
The Divine Message

The first letters of each paragraph have to be made of a white- colored metal. This will serve as a symbol of the purity of divine thought. Be ready to hear the divine message and obey it in your heart, oh Lord!
It's one of the toy whistles the potter gave my kids! It's pretty! I think the daughter will like it and she'll play with it.
You're right, a whistle could do the trick. Hopefully the sound doesn't drive us all mad in the process.
Refreshed
Child's Play
My family is busy getting ready for the feast. The wife has been in the kitchen all day and I'm watching the younger daughter… How can I entertain her?
The children are restless. They don't understand the danger the city is facing. There must be something around here that will amuse them…
The farmer gave me toothpowder and advised me brushing my teeth every day, the rest will come easy. Why?
Labor Day
I'm good with handling bees, so I can particpate in the Labor Day competition and show everyone my skills.
I took a torch and set off in search of the source of the noises. But as soon as I left the house, the muttering stopped. How could that be? Could I be going mad? The gods couldn't be so cruel to me!
The Secret of the Blue Crystal
I'm still hearing that strange muttering… Madness is the worst punishment the gods can send us. Am I going mad..? There's only one way to find out - by finding whoever is making these noises.
Great idea! This wooden horse will keep the children's imaginations occupied. Let's hope they remember how to share…
Toys for Kids
Unfortunately, the whistle didn't keep the children entertained for very long. There must be something else around here we can use…
It's beautiful and neat! The kids will love it!
Homework
I'm excited to get lessons from the master of writing! At the last lesson, he asked us to think what we can make out of papyrus. And I have an idea!
I found some tracks leading into the Mine after all. It looks like there were seven of them, and they were carrying something heavy…
Thieves in the City
Last night, I thought I heard rustling outside… As if someone was sneaking past the Potter's place into the Mine… I'll look around, maybe I'll be able to find some traces of them.
The Potter helped me find a trough and I got to work. There are only men around the Lady now, who will help her with her washing if I don't?
Good Deeds Master
I also decided to help the Lady a little while she recovers, and decided to wash her children's clothes for her. Now I just have to find something to wash them in…
The Brewer found my trowel, although I couldn't remember for the life of me where I left it. What a nice man! I need to get started on those pitchers for him right away.
Lost Things
I promised the Brewer in the Brewery yesterday that I'd make a new batch of pitchers for his brew, but I've lost my trowel somewhere.
I found a map in their commander's tent. It was well hidden. It has something important on it. I'll take it to the city to show our Chief.
Common Foe
These warriors do not look like barbarians or invaders. We still need to make sure. Let's wait until they fall asleep and look around the camp.
The animal's shell was covered in ancient writing… I wandered after it, and at dawn, I came to the Nomad's camp. Was the turtle helping me? I don't know…
Legends of the Desert
I have also seen strange things in the desert. Before I met the Nomad, I had been wandering alone for several days when I met a strange turtle in the night.
This a special coin. It has beautiful pattern on it. Miner not know what it is, but Miner think Gods themselves mint this coin!
A Gift for the Chief
Miner hear Chief minting coins? Miner bring coin from underground city. Coin gift for Chief!
With the help of the uten, I can correctly measure the value of goods and make equal trades.
The Bloom of Trade

We have a mixed trading system here in the city. Some barter while some use gold and coins brought by the merchants. When the market grows, we'll mint our own coin, but for now I need to learn how to measure the value of goods.
Be careful! Just don't make any sudden movements! We need to capture this dangerous bird.
Enemy Among Friends
Look, who's here to disrupt our feast… We need to get rid of it before it hurts someone!

A warhorse is protected by special armor for horses that covers them all the way down to their hooves. Such armor make the horses look like a threating iron statue furiously approaching the enemy on the battlefield.
Fiery Chariot
We've harnessed the trained horses to the chariots. They also wear armor.
Thank you for walking home with me. Who knows what could've happened if I had been alone.
The secret to making nice, thin pancakes is the getting the ratio of ingredients just right. Don't add too much water!
Just in Time
Secrets of Mastery
On my way to the market, I ran into a friend and we got carried away with our conversation! I need go home before it's dark.
I want to make some pancakes for the neighbors. Can you help me out?
The new pots are better than old ones! I'll sell them and use the proceeds to buy sweets for the kids.
Yes, that's it! I never expected to see it again.
The Further, the Better
Pottery Wizard

I am glad that my pots are in great demand! Besides, a trip to the city gives me a good excuse to see the kids and the lady. She's such a lovely woman… Ah, I need to stop dreaming and get back to work!
The throwing rib is my favorite tool… it allows me to add decoration to clayware. I love incorporating the beauty of the city into my work.

I spent a long time collecting all the wonderful items in this bag. They're so pleasant to look at! This will be my hiding place, and I won't tell anyone about it… Except Zulfia, but I know I can trust her!
The Hiding Place

As a thank you for helping her carry her cloth home, the Lady gave me a beautiful medallion with an image of the God Ra on it. I'll put it with my other treasures and bury them in the garden behind the Apiary! Yay!
What a nice breechcloth! The embroidery is amazing! I'm grateful to my sister for her talent.
Sacred Bond
To help the dress hold together, I need a breechcloth. I'll ask my sister to help me with the embroidery. She's very good at it.
I've realized that I can't live without the caring hands and beautiful eyes of my lady. I hope she likes this wedding ring and agrees to be my wife!
Sacred Bond
Thanks to special care, I feel much better! The lady stood by me every day. What a lovely woman! Oh, I would die if I could never see her again!
The tunic is ready. I've sewn it from the finest white linen, which a relative gifted to me.
Sacred Bond
Sewing a wedding dress is the sacred duty of the bride's family. The bride must make it with little help from her friends and sisters. It's time to work.

Done! Now we can start! We will have a lot of pink granite soon. With this unique rock, the artists of our city will create wonderful architectural and sculptural masterpieces: portals of temples, sarcophagi, statues of the governors and obelisks.
Pink Granite
The pink granite is located far from the pottery. We need a big wheelbarrow to transport the granite. It's a very strong wheelbarrow, but one of the wheels is broken. We need to fix it.
It's going to be a long journey. I won't give up until I see the world!
The road will be long, but no matter what happens, we have to find someone who can help us restore the writing!
Long Journey
In Search of a Master
I taught everything I knew to my apprentice. So now I can think about going on a journey. I know it's dangerous, but I hunger to see the world. Let's organize a caravan!
My next journey will be a dangerous one, but I have wanderlust in my blood. Let's get a big caravan together!
Dad gave me this snowy tiara. He says snow is made of little snowflakes like in the tiara. Snow is very cold and melts in your hands.
Sacred Bond
I'm glad that the lady and potter have decided to marry. The wedding is in a few days. I have to figure out what jewelry I'll wear.
It's alive! Alive! Thank the gods!
Predator's Clutches
A cat is missing! Did it fall into the jackals' clutches? Oh, no!
Although we've been married for many moons, my wife is as beautiful now as she was on our wedding day. I thank the gods for sending me a faithful and loving wife!
Sacred Bond
My wife is sad because she lost the earrings she was going to wear to the wedding. I can't stand to see her cry… I must find them to see her smile again!
Cats are sacred animals. If the beekeeper takes good care of this sweet thing, the gods will favor him.
Lazy Beekeeper
My neighbor is indeed a beekeeper. It turns out he's not such a bad fellow! He's changed! I'll give him this cute stray cat to cheer him up.
Miner lead friends to Place of Blue Stone! Come!
In Search of the Blue Crystal
Miner help cross chasm. Miner make bridge.
It worked! The warriors mistook us for nomads and drank our wine with great pleasure. Soon, we'll know who they are and where they came from.
Friend or Foe?
If we can get the warriors drunk, we can learn everything we need to know about them. Besides, when the night falls, we can look around their camp to get more information.
Take this statuette. It'll remind you that the most important thing is to have peace of mind and pure heart in all situations.
Wise Warrior
The power of a warrior is not about dexterity and fearlessness. It's about cleverly using the enemy's weaknesses to his advantage, and turning his own weaknesses into advantages. It's called wisdom.
And here are my bathing things! I bought this pumice from an outlander tradesman for a lot of money, but I never regretted it. A better way to battle with my rough skin simply doesn't exist!
The Valley Celebration

I've been in the kitchen making food for the Valley Celebration for several days, and I'm very tired. It feels like my entire body is filled with the smell of jam and spices. Now that everything is ready, I can finally rest and have a good bath.
I was able to capture the wood genie in an iron pot. He won't be escaping anytime soon, and the area should be safe for the children once more.
Another One
It's best to capture genies as soon as they turn up. You have to work fast, though. After all, they're stronger and faster than humans!
The bees didn't let me rest and attacked me when I was napping. I saw them fly out of those strange boxes in the yard… They can live there.
Unwilling Beekeeper
Who'd tidy up so late? I'll start in the morning. I'll sit on the mat and listen to the crickets… Oh, the lady in the sepat must be pouring soup by now.
We've collected a whole jar of earthworms! But the weather has gotten a lot worse… I fear fishing will have to wait for a few days.
Fishing
The children have been asking me to take them fishing for a long time. I'll be glad to fulfill their wish! I need to think about bait…
The port is so busy that my husband, a simple fisherman, barely has any room for his boat. It would be wonderful if he had a place of his own.
Thank you for listening! My husband will be so glad you built this!
It's nice to be able to fish without having to contend with the trader's ships. However, it would be nice to have a bigger house. I like fish, but I don't enjoy smelling like them!
This is remarkable! I appreciate you listening to my suggestions.
I must fish despite what the weather is doing. For those rare times when it rains, it would be nice to have a dry spot to stand.
This is just what I was thinking! I'll surely stay dry if it rains.
Business has been good and I'm considering a renovation of the fishery. What do you think?
Thank you for your help! It's so nice to have a comfortable place on the water.
Beautiful! You have some real talent. I'm so nervous about dinner. What if the Lady saw me like this? She's always so calm and collected…
Sense of Beauty
I'm a fool when it comes to arranging flowers. Want to give your hand a try?
You catch on fast! Ah, what I'd give to go on this trip with you.
Heading out
I'll show you the right equipment.
The sooner I leave, the sooner I can return to protect the city. It's time I set out.
End of the Earth
I hate the thought of leaving you unprotected, Princess, but I know you're just as strong as your father. It's time I set out.
We've performed a thanksgiving rite according to the custom of the ancients. From this day forward, good fortune should be with us!
Valuable Experience
Our last hunt was a success. It's not often we can bring home such good game during this time of the year. Let's thank the gods for it!
I know who can become my apprentice. The farmer's son! I saw him shoot a slingshot and throw darts very accurately. Looks like he is a natural hunter.
Scout and I have returned! Our neighbors to the north had no idea of the troubles plaguing our city. They vowed to help us in any way possible.
Teacher and Apprentice
A Worthy Hunter
I've returned! The journey was dangerous and I barely survived… I've been thinking a lot about the future. It's time for me to bring in an apprentice and teach him hunting skills!
This gear should serve me well, but if things are dangerous outside the city gates, I'll wish I had a pet lion with me!
Oh, it's so cute! Just look at it! Come here, little imp! I'll give you a tasty treat!
Petty Thief
Oh, now I know who stole my fruit! It's a tame monkey! I need to find a way to catch this little thief!
You must practice your focus to ensure you only attack your enemy.
Warrior's Decision
