Ура, вот наш победитель! Ты собрал больше всех пряжи! Поздравляю, ты действительно самый ловкий!
Сегодня праздник города, участвуй в состязании среди жителей города - добудь больше всего пряжи.
We've taken in more children since the attack than we had prior! I'm happy to help as many as I can, but I'm out of room again. The Sepat is going to need another addition!
Now that things are mostly back to normal, the children must continue their lessons. However, I don't have a suitable classroom for them to study in. Do you think you can help?
I've never had so many mouths to feed! Don't get me wrong, I love to cook, but I have nowhere to serve the children meals. We could really use a dedicated dining area.
I nearly broke my ankle stepping on a child's wooden horse last night. I wish the Sepat had a dedicated play area for the children and their toys.
I'm all for children playing and being loud, but it's nice to have quiet time as well. Should I bother the Potter to help me build a library?
The Sepat is large enough to accommodate the city's displaced children, but the grounds are rather bare. Could you help me pick out some decorations?
Nimiru thinks we should hang a sign or symbol on the Sepat to help wayward children find us. Do you have any ideas?
The Potter is such a beautiful… er… kind soul. He spent all day building more rooms onto the Sepat, allowing us to take in more children.
You're amazing! Clearly you've studied that handsome Potter's building techniques. What would we do without the two of you?
It's better than I could have hoped! The children will benefit greatly having their studies separate from their living quarters.
This is more than I could have hoped for! The new dining area can accommodate all the children. I should invite the Potter over for dinner…
You built a dedicated play area! You're my hero! Say, is the Potter planning to come around soon?
You did it! Thank you so much, friend! Now, the children will learn that being studious is just as important as playtime.
These flowers are gorgeous! Wait, the Potter chose them? They're my favorite!
Wonderful! I think that sigil suits my personality perfectly. After all, I do love beautiful jewelry!
Friend's Help
The Potter is on his way over, and he's going to see that the Sepat has already reached capacity! There are more children than we can comfortably house.

Nimiru really did surprise me. She found some old nautical charts among the scrolls taken from the Ship. For me, this is worth more than pure gold. With these charts, I can review much of the surrounding land and make new routes for my journeys.
The Ship's Secrets
A boy ran to me from the Sepat and said that Nimiru has found some papers in her collection that may interest me. I'm no man of letters… I wonder what they could be. I should go and take a look.
The gloves I brought are well worn and missing their coral in places. But judging by the scrolls, they're good enough to use. Only… How exactly are they used?
The Ship's Secrets

Nimiru read in the scrolls that the crew used some special gloves made of pieces of blue coral to control the Ship. It made me remember that I saw something just like that in the junk I dragged out of the Ship's hold.

The Nomad found the Ship's wheel – all its handles are made from the same material as the gloves. When I put these items side by side, they started to glow dimly. Incredible as it is, it seems the gloves' wearer could sail the Ship with a single movement of his hands.
The Ship's Secrets

For a long time, I couldn't figure out how the coral gloves worked, but then I noticed that they seemed to emanate energy when they were together. I asked the Nomad to go to the Ship and find some other items made from blue coral.

I was amazed when I arrived at the Field. The Farmer's home was covered in blue mushrooms in various places. These parasites have multiplied at an incredible pace in just one day. I carefully rolled a few up in a cloth to take them to Nimiru so she and I can figure out where they came from.
The Ship's Secrets

The Farmer is slowly getting better, but he's still very ill. In a moment of consciousness, he said that before he got sick, he noticed strange mushrooms on his work clothes. He cleaned his clothes and started to feel ill by the evening. We should look into this.

It's incredible! Outside the Potter's house, I found the same mushrooms as in the Field. They were much smaller, but they oozed a strange thick liquid with vile slugs crawling around in it. I caught one and then ran to the Field… The same was happening there!
Today, we found out that the Potter fell ill in the morning too. He came to Nimiru with symptoms similar to the Farmer's and said some kind of slug bit him near his home. I went to see what it was.

It's incredible! Outside the Bakery, I found the same mushrooms as in the Field. They were much smaller, but they oozed a strange thick liquid with vile slugs crawling around in it. I caught one and then ran to the Field… The same was happening there!
The Ship's Secrets
Today we found out that the Baker fell ill in the morning too. He came to Nimiru with symptoms similar to the Farmer's and said some kind of slug bit him near his home. I went to see what it was.

I went to the Nomad for help, and together, we searched the entire Sepat until we found a giant spitting lizard under the benches. It spat poison, but the Nomad was able to catch it and put it in a cage. If things continue like this, we'll be in real danger.
The Ship's Secrets

I'm amazed at what's happened. When I opened the box I was keeping the mushrooms in, I saw they'd disappeared and a slug was crawling around in their place! I decided to compare it to the one the Nomad brought, but it disappeared, leaving a huge trail behind it on the floor. I'm going to need help…

The Potter, the Chief and I went to the Pottery together. Our hunt lasted all night until we finally caught the monster and threw it into the Sepat's cellars. The monster turned out to be a quarry worker. He was also infected, and the sickness turned him into that awful creature.
The Ship's Secrets

The Potter came to me and said the Lady was attacked by a strange man-like creature. The Potter hid her in the Pottery while the monster tried to force its way in. Something unimaginable is happening on our streets. We need to act fast.

The Nomad made one more foray into the Ship and found a giant skull among the rocks, with huge sharp fangs and a crack in its forehead. I don't know who it belonged to, but I wouldn't want to meet a creature that big.
The Ship's Secrets

The Nomad invited me to his Hut under the cover of night, saying he had something terrible to show me. I didn't know what more I could expect from such dark times. Unexpectedly, the Ship had become a curse for the entire city. Our citizens were in danger.

By using the scrolls found on the Ship and studying these unusual creatures, I managed to create an antidote. We cured our infected people, returned the poor worker's old form to him, and eradicated all the mushrooms that appeared in the city. The Gods smiled on us…
The Ship's Secrets

It seems it was these strange rapidly mutating creatures that caused the shipwreck. After the catastrophe, they fell into a kind of hibernation, but awoke again when fresh air reached the Ship's hold.

I'd bet my life that this blade belonged to a great warrior. It has a unique comfortable grip made of coral and a blade made from a metal I don't recognize, covered in mysterious symbols. I know of no weaponsmith who could create such a weapon.
Courageous Captain

I decided to go into the Ship's hold with the Nomad to carry out more of the Ancients' treasure. Among many things, a strange blade caught my eye. The Nomad brought it back to his Hut, and I decided to inspect it more closely.

I found my pick and went to the Sepat. All the city's able-bodied men were gathered there. The Nomad told us we're heading to the opposite bank of the river to pull some old Ship out of the pile of boulders… I hope it won't be dangerous.
Earthly Tremors

The Nomad is assembling a group of workers to clear away a pile of boulders on the western bank of the river. I have a lot of work to do in the Field as it is, but without me, they won't make any progress. I need to find my worker's tool and head to the Sepat.

The staff truly turned out to be wonderful. I've never seen anything like it! It contains incredible power, and even I can't control it. The one who wielded this must have been a very powerful priest indeed.
Courageous Captain

I found out that my father and the Nomad brought new strange items from the Ship, and that among them, there was a certain staff. It may have belonged to one of the priests of the Ancients. If I see it, I can learn much of their power.

At first I didn't know what this thing was, but then I cleaned off the dirt and rust and realized it was a warrior's helmet. Judging by the helmet's size, this warrior was over two meters tall. I hope the warrior wasn't the monster whose skull we found in the Ship's hold.
Courageous Captain

Ever since the Chief found the strange blade, he keeps it with him at all times and admires the power of its former master. There's something else that may amaze him among the treasures we brought out last time. I'll take it to the Sepat and give it to him.

As it happened, the Potter saw Menes running away and started throwing his pots at him. The wicked priest grew angry and attacked the brave Potter. At that moment, he dropped the crystal, and the transparent figure of a giant man appeared above it. Menes was scared and ran away…
Courageous Captain

I woke up to a scream from my daughter in the night. It emerged that Menes – a priest of Amrun – infiltrated the Sepat and stole a certain crystal from Nimiru, given to her the day before by the Nomad. I could hear a disturbance coming from the Pottery, so I took my new blade and ran in that direction.

I took the crystal Menes tried to steal and set off to the Field in the night. To my surprise, I really did see the stranger's tall transparent figure. When I came closer, he seemed to feel something. He pointed to the Ship and said: TERMA!
Courageous Captain

Menes's attack and the odd stranger's appearance have put the citizens into a flutter. The transparent figure disappeared, but some say they can still see it at night by the Field. Perhaps it appears there because that place provides the best view of the Ship on the opposite bank.

The Nomad and I headed for the Ship and found a coral-encrusted case bearing that very same inscription. Inside, there was an old scroll with much written on it about how the Ship was built and how to sail it. This is just what we've been looking for.
Courageous Captain

Last night, when the strange ghost pronounced his incomprehensible word, he dissipated and vanished into the crystal. I returned and spent a long time studying the scrolls from the Ship, trying to translate the strange word. I finally discovered that it means "KNOWLEDGE".
Red sandalwood resin is the most reliable and sets fast. This Ship won't spring a leak any time soon.
Major Repairs
Work is in full swing at the Ship again. To patch up the holes in its sides, the Nomad asked me to find him the type of wood that produces the best resin. Naturally, I'm just the person for the job!

I cleaned the resin out of my pot and filled it with as many victuals as I could find. The Farmer also took the initiative and provided plenty of food. The people working on the far bank under the blazing sun need to eat too, right?
I didn't expect that my help would be needed in the repair works. The Nomad said he'll need a giant pot to collect resin from the trees, and I'm the only person with a big enough pot.

I cleaned the resin out of my pot and filled it with as many victuals as I could find. The Farmer also took the initiative and provided plenty of food. After all, the people working on the far bank under the blazing sun need to eat too, right?
Major Repairs
I didn't expect that my help would be needed in the repair works. The Nomad said he'll need a giant pot to collect resin from the trees, and I'm the only person with a big enough pot.
The Potter and I went down into the basement and found all the tools we need. He's so kind, he never refuses to help! We then went and contributed our little share to repairing that mysterious Ship.
Major Repairs

Many and varied were the tools used to build the Sepat. To this day, they lie somewhere in our cellars. The Nomad asked me to gather them up before he arrives. I don't want to go down there alone. I'll call the Potter.
No matter, my ox is very strong. He can pull anything you like. Why is that? It's all because he's my ox, and I've always taken care of him myself and fed him the best grain and grass.
Major Repairs

This time, they need my ox. We've gathered so many building materials to repair the Ship that people can't carry them to the other bank by themselves, especially wading across. So the Nomad decided to load it all into a cart and hitch it to my ox.
The Nomad was very pleased when I told him about the cart. He brought the ox he loaned from the Farmer and hitched the cart to it at once, putting all the tools in it at the same time.
Major Repairs

To carry the tools to the Ship and bring back the broken boulders from the opposite bank, we'll need a cart. I saw just the kind of cart we need standing in the Sepat's rear courtyard. I need to tell the Nomad about it.

I remembered an old recipe for a powerful burning substance. The Lady helped me make some of this dangerous liquid. With its help, we can blow up the base of the stone pile and make our work easier. Just in case, I'll ask for a Totem's blessing.
Earthly Tremors

The people spent all day trying to clear away the boulders from around the Ship, but all their efforts were in vain. It's as if these stones are enchanted. They'll need something stronger to free the Ship from its stone prison. I think I know a way…
Using knowledge of the Ship shared by Nimiru, I was able to create a perfect repair plan for it. I'm confident we'll be launching the Ship before the week is out.
Major Repairs

I had to spend quite some time gathering all the tools and building materials we need to repair the Ship. It's good that our citizens are so responsible – they were happy to help me. Now I can finish the repair plan.

My Lord, my daughter claims that the Gods themselves sent us this Ship. Its design is complex, and we have no idea how it is steered. But this isn't the first challenge we've had to face. I've given the order to completely repair it.
We have finished repairing the Ship. Using large logs, we launched it into the water. While it lay on the bank like a giant injured beast, I couldn't imagine how marvellous it was!
New Horizons

My Lord, my daughter claims that this Ship was sent to us by the Gods themselves. Its structure is complex, and its sailing methods are so unusual that in spite of its size, the Ship can be sailed by just one man. I gave the order to repair it completely.
Our voyage was full of peril, but in the end, we reached the island we needed and found what we were looking for! This mysterious diagram will help us uncover the secrets of the past!
Secret of the Diagram
The Gods directed us to one of the islands where we can find the key to the secrets of the past. All that remains is to find this island on the map and get to it as fast as we can!

It wasn't easy, but I did it. It's a shame I was the only one who could do it. Nimiru wants to fill the pots with some kind of explosive substance, so the Nomad can use them to blow up the stone pile around the Ship.
Earthly Tremors

Since the Nomad found the abandoned Ship on the western bank of the river, the entire city has been in a flutter. Now my help is needed also. I have to make ten clay pots overnight and bring them to the Sepat at dawn.

The heavy boulders surrounding the Ship are impervious to the workers' picks. The Nomad decided to blow it up at the base, but to avoid harming the Ship itself, he calculated which areas would be the safest for setting the charges. I made several special flags to mark out these areas.
Earthly Tremors

Everyone is talking about the Ship found on the opposite bank. It seems exploring it is very important to our city. Many people are helping to remove the stone pile, and today, Nimiru asked for my help too.

I made the fuse as long as possible so that nobody gets hurt. Someone getting hit by shards of rock is all we need right now. Who else would take care of our compatriots if not me…? And you of course, my Lord!
Earthly Tremors
The clay pots have already been filled with the liquid fire and placed in various places on the stone pile. One finishing touch remains – I must weave a fuse overnight from oiled string.

I lit the fuse. I doubt anyone could have been hit by shards. The Farmer weaved such a long fuse that we could have lit it all the way from the Field. The fire quickly approached the pots, and then we heard a huge explosion!
Earthly Tremors

That's it, everything's ready! Blowing up the rock pile seemed a dangerous plot to me at first, but then Nimiru helped me figure out good spots for placing the charges, and promised me that she would secure the aid of a totem. It's time!

It emerged that Nimiru had deciphered several of the few surviving notes we found in the Ship's hold. The instrument I brought to her is used for navigation and helps you find your bearings using the stars. It could be very useful to me in my travels.
The Ship's Secrets
I brought some things I found on the Ship back to the Hut. I didn't think there was any magic in them, but I couldn't make any sense of them all the same. I'll ask Nimiru for help.

Nimiru studied my needle pointer for some time and dug through some half-rotten papers. It turns out this strange device is also used for navigation and always points north. Our predecessors must have been very wise people indeed.
The Ship's Secrets

One of the items I found looked like a metal disc with a needle in the middle. It was strange, but whichever way I turned it in my hands, the needle always pointed towards the strange building jutting out of the fog in the North. I wonder what Nimiru will have to say about it…

It turns out the Potter gave a similar ball to the Lady. He found it in his basement. The Lady dusted it every day, and this time, she suddenly saw me. It seems the Ancients used these crystal balls to communicate over a distance. Incredible…
The Ship's Secrets

The Nomad found a strange crystal ball in the Ship's hold. I couldn't figure out what it was meant to do, but during the night, it suddenly lit up and the Lady's face appeared above it. She looked frightened and it seemed she could see me too. How did this happen…?
Our group will be full of experienced sailors in no time!
Secret of the Gate
Our first expedition was a success! We recovered new pieces of the diagram, but we must also collect anchors in order to improve the integrity of our vessel.
The ship appears usable now. Let us pray it helps us to find the answers we seek.
Secret of the Gate
If we recover all pieces of this diagram, I believe we may learn the secrets of the gate. Let us repair this ship to aid us in our search.
We owe much to whoever brought this ship to rest in the Nile.
Secret of the Gate
Our next journey could prove to be the most dangerous. We must keep watch for anchors to strengthen our ship.
The diagram pieces will show us how to rebuild the gate, allowing us to finally learn what the structure hides!
Secret of the Gate
I feel the gate contains secrets we must learn in order to protect ourself from Amrun. We must find the missing diagram pieces!
Wonderful! These upgrades should aid us in our mission to find the missing diagram pieces.
Secret of the Gate
I never expected to be an explorer, but this ship has unlocked my sense of adventure! We need to be able to carry more supplies for longer journeys.
The trip was not easy, but the rewards were great!
Secret of the Gate
We are in no hurry to return to the cold of the north, but we must collect more diagrams and anchors, no matter the cost!
Our efforts paid off! We have more pieces of the diagram in hand!
Secret of the Gate
We must sail north on our search for the missing diagram pieces. Bring something warm to wear!
Ah, yes… the eye of Horus! I can't think of a better banner under which to sail.
Secret of the Gate
Other ships I've seen at sea have identifying marks on their sails. I think we should do the same. But what design should we use?
Thank you for believing in me! We have returned home safely, and we know where to search for the next diagram pieces.
Secret of the Gate
I believe we'll find a clue to for the missing diagrams on the next island. You'll have to trust my instincts! Keep an eye out for anchors, as well.
We may have brought home more diagrams, but our men are tired and hungry. We must take some time to regroup.
Secret of the Gate
You never know what dangers the islands may show us. We must remain steadfast in our search for the diagram pieces.
Excellent! Now we can continue our search for the missing diagrams.
Secret of the Gate
The ship's rigging became tangled on our last journey. We'll have to replace it before we can set sail again.
We've brought back more anchors! Our vessel will soon be even more powerful.
Secret of the Gate
We're pushing the ship as far as it can go! To explore the outlying islands, we'll need to collect more anchors to upgrade the ship.
Those islands were beautiful, and we brought home several more diagrams. Hopefully that gave the crew the respite they needed.
Secret of the Gate
Our crew is tired, but we must persist! Once all the diagrams have been found, we'll take a much needed rest.
This ship has come a long way from when we found it broken on the rocks! We owe you a great debt.
Secret of the Gate
A larger ship will let us brave deeper waters. See what improvements you can make to the hull.
We ran into dangerous storms on our last voyage and the ship took heavy damage. We'll have to repair it before we can set out again.
The gods have blessed our journeys, but by collecting more anchors we'll ensure we can sail further than ever before!
As the number of diagrams needed lessens, it becomes more difficult to find them. With patience and persistence, we will prevail.
The citizens still fear Amrun's powerful magic. We must collect all the diagrams if we hope to set their minds at ease.
You're the one who brought these pillows and artifacts on board? Wonderful! It's a welcome reminder of home when we sail.
These journeys have become long and difficult. I wish the ship had more comforts of home…
We've done it! We've recovered all the diagrams! It's time to repair the gate with our newfound knowledge!
We've nearly recovered all of the diagrams. Hopefully this voyage into the unknown will be our last.
The ship looks as good as new. Back to the seas we go!
The ship was damaged in a storm unlike any I've ever seen! We'll have to make significant repairs before we can continue our search for the diagrams.
I convinced the Chief that building a blacksmith forge will let produce more building materials, but I have no idea how to construct one! I need your help!
Once more, you've saved the day. Metal will make our buildings even stronger.
The forge is strong, but small. We must increase the size to increase productivity!
I'm spending too much time throwing wood into the fire. The forge needs some sort of air pump to keep the fire burning hot.
I'm able to forge many metals for use around the city, but I'm constantly tripping over them. Perhaps you can help me find some storage space?
Citizens are constantly wandering into the smithy as I'm carrying around hot metal. I need some way to keep them out!
Camel-drawn carts are coming to pick up a large supply of iron tomorrow. I'll need to expand the workshop's gates to accommodate the load.
It's time we added another forge for some of the smaller projects the Chief wants completed. If we work together, the work should go quickly.
The new forge has cut into my storage space. It's important we find another place to hang hot metals for cooling.
The workshop gets so hot during the day. Perhaps we can renovate it to ensure a good flow of air runs through it?
Excellent! A bigger forge means a bigger fire, and more heat!
Just like that! I knew you'd understand what I needed.
I can't tell you what a difference this will make in my workflow.
The fence may not look friendly, but it's for the safety of everyone.
Thank you for your unending help, friend! I don't know what our city would do without you.
The new forge may be smaller, but it will help to get the job done.
That will do perfectly! I wouldn't want anyone accidentally grabbing hold of hot metal. Especially children!
It's better than I thought it could be! I feel the heat dissipating already.
The gate has been restored, but now we must find a way to power it if we hope to fully unlock its secrets.
With the diagrams collected, we have a blueprint for what the gate should look like. Our workers can now begin restoring the mysterious structure!
The gate seems to have activated! We're one step closer to solving the mystery.
The skystones we collected could power the gate. Our intelligence of our ancestors is truly unmatched!
Great! Now we can start our improvements!
Bigger Harvest!
It would be great to expand the field! But it's going to take some work.
Great! Now you know how to mine gold!
First Capital
Let's go, I'll teach you how to mine gold!
Nice! We have the seeds! All we have to do is find a good place for the field.
First Harvest
I saw seeds in the hut. Let's find them so we can divide up the field!
You may think of me as a soldier, but I've enjoyed acting as well. If only I had a place to share my talents with the city.
The actors love the stage, but they're easily blinded by the sun and forget their lines. Think you could come up with a solution?
There's too much rubble in the guest area. I worry someone could injure themselves. Will you help me clear it?
We accidentally sold more tickets than we have seats! We'll need additional seating before the play opens tonight!
You built this for me? I shall write a play in your honor!
It's idyllic! Now the actors have no excuses for forgetting their lines…
Wow, you paved the entire theater… I hope you won't miss opening night!
You're a miracle worker! Our play about gods Nut, Shu and Geb will surely be dedicated to you!
I described the symbol that appeared in my dreams to the master. He told me it's an omen portending tears in our city, many tears.
A Woman's Vengeance
I've been having trouble sleeping lately, and when I do sleep, I have strange dreams. A strange symbol in the shape of an eye appears above our city in them. What could it mean..?
Our troops searched the entire city, but couldn't find the villain. The tradeswoman says he smelled of musk, just as the Shadow did when it broke out of the tomb.
A Woman's Vengeance
Mistress Nimiru told me some kind of villain dressed in dark clothes sold the tradeswoman poison, after which many women in our city came down sick. We have to find the scoundrel immediately.
I was able to pick up enough pork fat at the port. I'll need it to prepare an ancient remedy for the women who bought the tradeswoman's cosmetics.
A Woman's Vengeance
The skin disease the women in our city caught isn't that bad, thankfully. I know of a remedy, though I'm not sure I'll be able to make enough for everyone.
My grandmother said the ancient beauty was one of our ancestors, and I inherited her secret of eternal youth.
A Woman's Vengeance
In ancient times, these lands were ruled by one woman, and everyone who saw her said there was no one more beautiful in all the world. There was a secret behind her beauty.
I took all the honey I collected to the Lady and Mistress Nimiru at the Sepat. I don't get women. Are they really going to smear honey on their faces?
A Woman's Vengeance
Mistress Nimiru told me that she and the Lady need as much honey as I can get them right away for some kind of cosmetic remedy. There's certainly no way I can refuse.
Nimiru told me it isn't all that bad and that her potion would soon be ready. All she needs now is aloe, as its juice sooths irritated skin and gets it looking as good as new.
A Woman's Vengeance
Many of the city's women are angry with me. They think I purposefully sold them the cosmetics that made their skin age, but that's not true. I so want to help them.
I was able to put together a small sum that will cover the ingredients for the miracle cure. While I was doing that, the disfigured girls sat at home sobbing away in their sorrow.
A Woman's Vengeance

Our city's poor women were hit by a strange disease that made their skin age quickly. Nimiru is preparing a special potion for them, though she doesn't have enough money to buy the expensive ingredients.
I was wrong to think that the Lady would object. In fact, she herself helped me cut the rose bushes to make oil for my wonder cream.
A Woman's Vengeance
I need a very rare ingredient for my remedy: rose oil. But where can I get some? I think I saw a few rose bushes at the Sepat, so I hope the Lady won't be upset if I use them.
The farmer grumbled a little, but gave me an entire basket of fresh, choice mint leaves when he learned that Nimiru herself needed his help.
A Woman's Vengeance
Nimiru's cream needs one more ingredient: mint, which I think I can get her from the farmer's garden.
The tears on the faces of our city's beauties are finally drying and they were able to forgive my simple mistake. Never again will I buy shady potions from suspicious strangers.
A Woman's Vengeance
Oh, gods! I'm so happy Nimiru was able to prepare her magical cream, giving our city's women back their beauty. I will personally visit each of them to see what I can do to help.
The palm did turn out to be very tall, and the boys would never have gotten those delicious coconuts if it weren't for my climbing skills. We gorged ourselves on them all evening.
Day by Day
The boys from the Sepat said there's a palm tree growing not far from the apiary with the biggest coconuts they've ever seen. This I have to see for myself.
The Lady was saying that the sun is like a person: it can both kill and grant life with its rays. It is like a strict but loving parent for all of us people living here on earth.
Day by Day
Sometimes I go to the Sepat to hear what the Lady is teaching other children. It's even fascinating on occasion: today she was talking about what the sun hieroglyph means.

I'm not taking a single soldier with me; just the strength of the totem. My enemies will be caught completely unawares, as they won't consider just one person a threat. That will be their last mistake.
Solitary March
I'm sick and tired of Amrun's vile servants attacking. They say Menes and maybe even the shadow itself are hiding somewhere in the caves outside the city. I'm going to go find them.
The warrior doesn't want anyone to know where he's going, which is why he asked me to take him some lentils for the road without telling my mom. He's so brave!
Solitary March
The warrior is my best friend. He told me a secret: he's going to hunt Menes and the Shadow in the misty caves outside the city. He needed my help.
It turns out I was almost out of wheat groats, so I had to head to the market and stock up. Now I'm going to bake cakes for both the children and the entire barracks.
Day by Day
The Lady asked me to bake cakes for her wards. She says they love my pastries so much, the little chipmunks pack both cheeks with them. Let's see if I have enough wheat to make the flour.
All right, that's it. The frying pan is sparkling as if brand new, so give me an hour or two and I'll have a whole basket of red cakes baked. The children will be happy.
Day by Day
Well, there's some bad luck for you! I think last time I completely forgot to wash the burnt dough out of my pan. Time to put in some work.
My friends and I put together a rescue party, searching all the city's hiding places without finding the missing cats. I sure hope they're alright.
Trailblazing
My friends from the Sepat told me a couple of cats are missing from the nursery. How can those poor little things live on their own without our care? We have to find them right away.
I headed over to the baker and asked him for a big water tub. While my mom went to see Nimiru on business, I boiled water, washed my dress, and bathed myself.
Trailblazing
I got coal all over myself while my friends and I were looking in the mines for the missing cats. I'd better do something fast, or I'll get an earful when my mom sees me like this.
I ended up loading an entire cart full of produce: fruit, vegetables, sausage, and cheese. I deliver food to the storehouses every month to keep everyone in the city from going hungry.
Trailblazing

The tradeswoman asked me to collect a new cartful of produce for the city storehouse. Now really isn't a great time – there are some vile thieves prowling around the city's outskirts, and I'm trying to catch them
I searched the entire port and found my catch in a sewage drain. I don't know how the fish got there; certainly not on their own…
Trailblazing

This morning as usual I headed to the sea for some fishing. I didn't have much luck, so I didn't bring many fish back with me. Even then, someone pilfered them from my boat while I was drying my oars on the bank.
If the troops were playing a trick on me, it wasn't a good one and it won't go unanswered. I had to order a new portion of meat for lunch.
Trailblazing
I'm always in the mood for some meat to get me going again after a heavy workout. My plate was full, but all the food went missing while I was gone getting some beer.

I decided to run over to the brewery for some cream, and in return the baker made me some delicious treats. It's all very strange: the mariner had fish go missing yesterday, and today the baker couldn't find his cream…
Trailblazing
I had dropped in to see the baker and buy a few cakes when I saw he was very agitated. He needed the cream he'd prepared for the icing right away, but his dish turned out to be empty.

I hid overnight at the brewery, where I saw two huge shadows drag smoked sausages around the corner. I screamed as loud as I could and the shadows quickly melted into the darkness, leaving the sausage behind.
Trailblazing
As I was walking by the brewery, I heard the brewer loudly shout that someone had stolen a sausage from his cellar. Well, nothing for it but to see what I can do!
Well, they're good thieves, I'll give them that much. They turned out to be the two fat cats who ran away from the Sepat a week ago. We'll just have to punish them with a strict diet…
Trailblazing
Sheriti told me the thieves who crept up on me in the cellar at night were probably servants of the Shadow. She showed me where they ran off to and we set off in pursuit.

The beekeeper is an old man with his share of peculiarities, but he knows his fair share of tall tales. I can remember all those years ago how I used to sit with my father at home and have him entertain me with his stories.
A History of Honey
Ah, how I love going to see my friend the beekeeper and eating dozens of different pancakes with honey and tea. The only problem is that he is out of tea today, so I'll have to go get my own.
I was able to kill the biggest hornet, after which the rest didn't know what to do and abandoned the apiary.
A History of Honey
No, no, no! While the baker and I were having tea and pancakes, hornets attacked my favorite beehive. I need to help all those sweet little bees right away.
They say fig trees are one of the oldest kinds that humans have eaten from. Figs have been a favorite treat for everyone ever since, but especially for children.
A Long-held Dream
I've always wanted to plant a few rare trees in the garden. I happen to have some time at the moment, and my specimens should be arriving at the port today.
The swarm of hornets was a mortal danger to everyone in the city, though I was most worried for the children. Thanks to the totem, however, I was able to drive the crazed insects out of the city.
A History of Honey
A swarm of crazed hornets attacked the city. The beekeeper says they lost their leader and are now panicking. All it takes is one sting to kill a person.
It seems I've got myself a nice stone wall that will keep the city hooligans away from my trees. They'll probably be wanting to gorge themselves on my juicy figs.
A Long-held Dream
New trees are cropping up in the garden and they need their own walled-off section. Only a coating of green grass will grow there.
A little steam and my striped friends stopped anxiously flying around the apiary, returning instead to their hives. Now I have to clean up a little in there and get the honeycombs in order.
A History of Honey
Some bees died in the hornet attack, and the rest were unsettled. I need to calm them down so they don't go crazy too.
One of the farmer's new trees is an apple tree. I was once able to enjoy a few apples. They're a rare and expensive fruit in these southern lands.
A Long-held Dream
Yet another trading vessel has arrived at the port, this time with new saplings on board for the farmer. He is busy, so he asked me to take them to the market.
I found a little oasis in the desert, and there was a beautiful pomegranate grove on the bank of the pool. I carefully dug up one of the trees to give to the farmer.
A Long-held Dream
I heard the farmer decided to plant an orchard in his garden. Traders have been bringing him trees from different lands, and even I found him a little something.
The farmer grew such choice barley this time, it simply delights the eye. Many a little makes a lot.
Day by Day
Food reserves are running low in the Sepat. I already bought bread from the baker and honey from the beekeepers, so now I need to head to the market for grain.
There are more and more new trees in my orchard. Once upon a time, however, my date palm was the first. Where it all began, so to speak.
A Long-held Dream
I'm busy up to my neck again with the new orchard. I have to harvest dates right now, and then I need to run to the market to pick up my new trees.
I'm so lucky a ship docked at the port with some hives from neighboring settlements on board. I was able to buy a new queen bee from the traders.
A History of Honey
I was finally able to get everything straightened out in the apiary, but now the problem is that the hornets killed my little queen bee. This is terrible news for the whole bee colony…
The chief has everyone under command at the barracks, and he is looking for the warrior too. The chief dispatched a few soldiers and a cart with me to bring back some sacks of grain.
Day by Day

The warrior disappeared somewhere and no one can find him. The troops come to me looking for their rations around this time of the month, so I need to head to the barracks and find out if anyone is going for grain today.
All day I watched the tree, and by evening it was bigger than all the rest of them in my orchard. It is so fragrant that I'm sure the gods themselves are rewarding me for my hard work.
A Long-held Dream
Last night I noticed a little white sprout among the trees in my orchard. By this morning it had turned into a bunch of different trunks all twisted together. What is it?
It's good when all is peaceful and quiet. We trade with our neighbors, grow, and create new things. This handful of white rice is a fitting symbol of our prosperity.
Day by Day
A ship from the southern settlements docked at the port today. Everyone from down there always buys rice from us, so I should help our good neighbors load up their ship.
Good food and deep sleep will have the warrior feeling better than ever. Let him get his rest; afterward he can tell us where he was and what he saw there.
Solitary March
The warrior suddenly reappeared, tired and hungry. He said he had news about our enemies, though first he wanted to have a good meal and get some sleep.
The beekeepers from the neighboring settlements were so impressed by my methods that they bought my honey. They even gave me a new little bee house and promised to come back and learn from me.
A History of Honey
I asked the beekeepers who sold me my new queen bee to come visit. They were very interested to see how I have been able to tame the wild bees who now live with me as one big family.
You've restored a totem! The power of the ancient hammer is ours!
Ancient Power
Our ancestors had a powerful weapon with which to defend the city, but over time, the knowledge was lost. I believe that by restoring the totems, we can gain access to their ancient wisdom.
You upgraded the Totem of Thoth! Congratulations! Our warriors now have access to more powerful weapons. Soon you will follow the Path of the Warrior. Remember to keep your eyes and mind clear…
Path of the Warrior
As soon as Father recovers, he'll teach you the Path of the Warrior. First, you need to go through a trial. I am sure you can handle it. It's just a formality.
The sacred Totem of Horus is restored! I'm thankful you joined our tribe in its struggle against evil. Don't take pride in yourself or you'll find yourself changing sides.
This sacred totem has been restored! Just as I suspected, the gods have blessed us with a new ability.
Ancient Power
We've build one totem, but it's not enough to win this war. It's time to restore the Totem of Horus! Oh, help us, the great god of war!
Let us restore the next totem. The gods will surely bless us for our perserverance.
This totem has been repaired! Once more, the gods provide us with the tools we need to defend our city from Amrun.
Ancient Power
With each totem restored, the gods bless us with new knowledge. We require something more powerful to defend our city. Let us repair the next emblem.
With Horus on our side, Amrun will wish he'd never set foot on our lands!
Ancient Power
Evil cannot escape the watchful eye of Horus. Let us repair this totem to unlock the powers of the supreme god!
The totem is repaired, and the gods will roll over our enemies when we call upon them.
Ancient Power
There is no greater power than the chariot of the gods. But first we must repair this totem to be granted access to such an ability.
These bombs are a powerful and dangerous weapon. Their main advantage is that they only hit the enemy. This is the gods' secret… ordinary people can't know about it.
Wonderful! This weapon makes us even stronger. The Gods favor us and none will dare to bring harm to our lands!
Path of the Warrior
The Totem of Horus holds the knowledge of making sacred bombs. We can use the bombs on our enemies. Go get the knowledge!
The sacred totem holds the knowledge of how to create a powerful weapon which we can use against our enemies in battle. Go now and build it!
Hopefully Nomad will return soon. He's better suited for swinging hammers than I.
Path of the Warrior
We must restore the sacred hammer by praying to the Thoth totem. We may need our ancestor's weapon in the battle to come.
You upgraded the totem! Congratulations! now our warriors can get more weapons, and that will make them stronger.
The Power of Totems
Totems give us powerful weapons which help us defeat our enemies. Evil never sleeps, however – we need to be on guard. Upgrade the totem to increase its power!
You're a talented apprentice. A word of warning… Do everything with a pure heart. Conceit erodes the heart and ruins the soul.
Warrior's Dance
Faith is a warrior's most important tool. A man can't become a warrior unless he strongly believes that he serves the true gods.
Make your messages fun and expressive with stickers!
Enjoying yourself? You’re doing great! New records await you!

Go to your Inventory to use the Amulet.
[1]Go to the Inventory[1] to use one of your energy items.
Don't waste time now that you know how to use the amulets. Make the most of them!
Use the Scroll of Knowledge
Scroll of Knowledge
Congratulations! Now you know how to use Amulets! Don't waste any time, try to get the maximum advantage possible out of them!
Spells range from small to very powerful. We must use them to our advantage!
In a battle such as this, one can't be afraid to leverage any advantage he or she may have!
There are powerful dark forces on the enemy's side, and we'll need the magic of the Amulets to deal with them.
If Amrun's army is as powerful as Menes claims, we'll need every advantage we can find.
The Power of Spells
Amulets give you strength and power. Let's check out what this amulet can do!
The Knowledge Scroll will increase the amount of experience you earn for a while. Press Use to try it out!
The Thoth's Wisdom amulet will increase the amount of experience you earn for a while. Press Use to try it out!
A Charge of Vigor
Great! You did really well! I hope these tips will help you beat more match-3 levels!
With the 3D Touch function, you can get helpful hints in match-3 levels by pressing the screen. Let’s try it!
Things at the market are running just fine without me. I'd like to expand into weaving, but construction is a skill I don't have.
This is perfect! I can start selling my wares immediately.
My rugs are popular amongst the citizens, but my shop could use some sprucing up.
Looms take up quite a bit of room. Right now, mine is touching the eaves. If only the ceiling was higher…
I grow weary of walking to the shop each morning with the sun on my back. Perhaps you can help me construct some sort of living quarters here?
I would love to display my fabrics outside for customers to view. Think you could put something together for me?
Perfect! Now it looks like a real business!
Problem solved! What would we do without you?
You're wonderful! My legs and skin thank you!
This is just what I needed to catch the eye of a potential customer!
Whew! I did the best I could. Everything is ready for welcoming the bride to her new home!
Sacred Bond
It's time to get ready for the wedding. It'll be a modest one as we'll just invite close friends and family. I need to make sure that the bride and guests are happy.
Nimiru worries that the city will turn into all work and no play, so she's asked me to lead the creation of a zoo. I knew I had to call on you.
I suppose this building is big enough for some animals, right?
Nimiru worries that visitors may get too hot while enjoying the animals. She's requested we add some shade.
The children grow tired of seeing the same animals day after day. What if we bring in some camels for them to pet?
The camels are getting too hot in the afternoons and don't want to interact with the children. Let us hang a shade for our hardworking friends.
The zoo grounds are truly beautiful. I was thinking we should build an observation deck for our guests.
I believe Nimiru will be pleased with our efforts!
Wonderful! New and interesting creatures will keep people coming back. And who doesn't love camels?
If the camels could speak, I'm sure they would thank you!
This is so relaxing! I could stay up here all day if there wasn't so much to do…

Welcome back

[1]%s[1], the inhabitants of the city are happy to see you've returned, and have prepared a gift.
Welcome back
I thirst for the power I once had and for vengeance against Amrun and his servant Menes for imprisoning me!
Hurry and build the idol so I can rejoin this world!
I will come back to this world and help you fight Menes as soon as you restore the idol!
Don't disturb me for nothing! You'd better get to work and find all the attributes necessary for building the idol.
I'm getting stronger and stronger! Don't waste any time – use my power to speed up the city's construction!
The other gods will return very soon! Together, we will take vengeance against Menes for our imprisonment and help the townspeople to restore the city!
It is well that you came to me for help again. Use this power as it was meant to be used.
Don't waste any time! The idol's effect won't last forever!

Thanks to our successful mission, the people can read and write! It'll make the Book of Life more powerful!
We'll see what our city looked like if we find ancient writings in the ruins.
We must be prepared for anything. Be it a disadvantage in battle or the witchcraft of Menes.
Yes, Father, you're right. There isn't a moment to lose!

Shipwreck
This Ship is just as ancient as the building jutting out of the fog in the North… Perhaps if we restore it, we can lift the veil of mystery over the past?
All hands on deck! Board the ship and visit new lands full of adventure!
What is this ship and how long has it been here? Where was it sailing and who was its crew? No one knows.
But our road leads to the future where adventures and trials, enemies and friends, and a true sea voyage are waiting for us!
We will be the first to leave our footprints on the unexplored shores and discover new lands…
New levels
New levels with unique gameplay.
Mysterious diagram
Part of the mysterious diagram which will help you unravel the mystery of the past.
Complete all the levels to upgrade the building.
Ship (lvl.%d) construction complete!
Go to the Ship!
Ship Upgrade
Level completed
Available bonuses:
Play
Level %d
Sailing
You have always shown bravery, strength, wisdom and courage, my Lord. Your talents are unquestionable… The time has come to reveal their full potential!
You could be the one who can captain the ship!
It's time to go aboard! Let the Gods watch over you!
The ship is ready to set sail! Exciting adventures and treasure await us, and much more besides!
Look! I [1]see an island[1] ahead! Let's find out [2]what's there?[2]
Each island is a unique match-3 level with several [1]special tasks[1].
[1]Press[1] the task icon [2]to see the details[2].
[1]Complete tasks[1] to get [2]the anchors[2] you need to upgrade the Ship.
Remember, the main requirement for completing the levels is still to [1]remove all the tiles[1] in a limited number of turns or a limited time. [2]Good luck![2]
Perfect! You completed one of the tasks and got an anchor!
You can replay a level at any time to get the remaining anchors.
Each time you enter a level, you can see [1]a list of tasks[1] you must complete [2]to get an anchor[2].
You can also buy bonuses that will help you to successfully complete all the tasks.
Hurray! You found [1]a piece of the diagram[1] we need to unravel the mystery of the past!
Clever Nimiru, found a way to bring your father back from the brink of death, did you?
Healing a single person is one thing, but healing a whole town… that's an obstacle that even you can't overcome!
Your efforts to rebuild end here. I summon Amrun's magic, blighting the landscape with a curse of crystals!
Oh no! Menes placed a curse on our lands! We can't continue building the City until we find out how to remove it…
What are we to do…?
Do not despair, my daughter! I am sure we will find a way to remove the curse and force Menes to pay for the evil he has done to our people…
Look! It looks like the Nomad is signalling us to follow him to the river… Let's hurry! He must have something important to show us!
Not enough anchors
Get the required number of anchors to upgrade the building.
Silver Chest
Silver|Chest

We've changed the mechanics for synchronizing progress. To be able to play on different devices, you must connect to Facebook. This will allow you to save your game progress and play with your friends!
Don't want to lose your synchronization progress?
I dreamed last night that the Gods directed me to an island where there is something that could help us unravel the mystery of the past…
I decided to inspect all the charts found on the Ship again.
One of the islands on a chart was marked with a symbol I saw in my dream…
When I studied the chart further, I saw that this was not the only island marked in such a way.
So what are we waiting for?! I've had enough of sitting in my hut. I'm ready to set out on a new voyage!
Wonderful! But we must choose our route carefully. The ancient charts may not be entirely accurate…
That won't stop me! I'm preparing for the new expedition today. Let the Gods smile on us!
Hmm, what a strange diagram! I saw ancient signs like these in the ruins before…
So that's it! I remembered! It was over there, on that giant ruin! Let's go look! Hurry, hurry!
I knew it! This is a Place of Strength… Shall we try and find out what our Gods are trying to tell us?
Look! We might find the mysterious symbol Nimiru saw in her dreams [1]on this island![1] It looks like some kind of [2]ancient diagram…[2]
Incredible! This odd building holds the diagram to itself with some unseen power! I can feel the earth trembling! What is happening, O Mighty Gods?
Hurray! It seems a source of Light Power was sealed in this building. It destroyed all the Evil Crystals made by Menes and freed the City from the curse!
Hmm, what other secrets does this strange building hold…? We have to discover them, whatever it takes!

Spring has come to the city! Create the garden of your dreams!
Prepare the garden for the Spring Festival!
You have prepared the garden for the Spring Festival!
There is so much greenery in the garden! Let's keep this up and we'll eventually turn this place into something straight out of a fairy tale!
The garden is transforming with each passing minute! I'm sure the festival will be a success!
Let's decorate the garden with flowers and make it as colorful and dazzling as possible!
Oh, you can just smell the soothing floral fragrances in every part of the garden!
It's time to think about how the guests will be seated. Everyone should feel cozy and comfortable!
The garden has become a lot cozier! Hopefully, everyone else will love it!
We just need to add a few more details and we'll be ready to start the festival!
Everything is ready for the festival. I think this year's festival will be a great success!
I would not have managed to decorate the garden without your help! You have my undying gratitude.
Congratulations on the coming of the spring! May it bring joy and be full of warm and sunny days.
The festival may be over, but its magic will stay in our hearts until next spring.
The garden is ready!
Spring Festival
Getting the Garden Ready
Sprucing Up
Adding Flowers
Arranging Furniture
Hanging Decorations

Complete match-3 levels and prepare the garden for the Spring Festival! You will receive tons of gifts, but the most valuable prize awaits you in the end, when you finish decorating the entire garden.
Spring is in the air – what a perfect time for a festival!
The city garden is the best place for the festival. It's a shame that it has been neglected for such a long time.
Help clean up the garden so we can have a festival that the citizens will reminisce about for a whole year! Let's go!
If even the smallest of shoots is filled with life energy during springtime, then what happens to people in this season?
I hope you're full of vim and vigor and ready to perform new feats!
Spring has truly transformed the city! Everything is coming into bloom, warm wind is bringing new ideas, and the sun is filling everything and everyone with energy!
Numerous wonders surround us. You just have to look really close!
%d
%s
Chips:
Chips
Repair and construction is hard work. But now, thanks to you, I have everything I need to do it.
Few mortals in this world can touch an artifact of such great power. But the power of another world flows through you!
I think this will be the best addition to the table today. My guests are sure to love it.
You saved the city! While we have you living with us, we don't have to fear any creations of Menes's dark magic!
It seems this is just what we need. I like your detective methods. I think I now know where to look for the runaway.
This is the very same treasure that was stolen. We're lucky that the thief didn't manage to get it out of the city.
Sometimes I feel like you bring luck. See – today's catch is just huge!
This is just what I need – a little snack sure won't hurt. I'll gather a little strength and then get back to work.
Thank you for the help! I think I'm feeling a lot better now.
Thanks for the help! You have a real gift for finding lost things.
That's what I need. Now we should follow the plan.
Only thanks to taxes can I make sure our city is safe and flourishes.
I told you! You've never had anything more delicious than this!
You're welcome to my place anytime. Sometimes it's important to share your concerns with people you care about.
What a beauty!
Great! We did it!
Thank you! This is important to me… It's associated with something special to me.
That's quite a story! Maintaining order is important in every trade.
Thanks for your help! It's amazing how you have time for everything.
Nimiru will be glad she entrusted us with the fields.
Hmm, you say you have a plan? Well, I'll count on you…
You have an eagle eye!
These bags have it all, they're full of fresh fruit and vegetables. They'll last us a long while.
Thanks for the help!
Thanks a lot!
Now we can continue!
You’re doing a great job!
This isn’t all that you need to collect.
Practice makes perfect.
Hurry! We still have a lot to do!
There’s no enemy that we can’t overcome!
Thanks! I always appreciate your help.
You can always be relied on!
Thanks to your bravery and strength, we managed to repel the enemy attack. Many opponents have been defeated, and the ones that ran will remember this day!
You get along great with animals!
This thing will be a fine addition to my collection!
Thanks to you, all the city’s residents feel safe.
You're doing a great job!
Great! It’s always nice to do business with you.
That was unbelievable!
Now things are really going to take off!
Great job!
It seems order has returned to the city streets and people no longer have to fear attacks when they leave their homes in the evening.
Finding a good helper is already half the job. If it weren't for you, I'd never have managed in time!
This rare ingredient is just what I was missing.
It's as if the animals understand that you mean them no harm. They feel they can trust you.
Sometimes I just can't get by without your help.
It's time to collect taxes from the townspeople. I know how responsible you are, so I'm entrusting this task to you!
To perform this important ritual, I'll need an artifact of great power. You're the only one I can trust to find it!
I'm having a party at home today, and I want to treat my friends to something special. Will you help me?
One of the monsters of Menes has attacked the city. Nobody can go up against the terrible creature. Only you can defeat it!
An insolent crime has been committed in the city, and the criminal is still at large. Help me track down the villain!
The weather is perfect for a little fishing today. If you want to come along, hurry and get in the boat!
I have so much to do that I barely have time to eat! Bring me a snack before I starve to death!
I don't feel so well. I need to hurry and take some strong medicine.
I need to find a certain lost item, and quickly. I really need your help!
I've got an idea, but I need resources to make it happen.
Everything's almost ready. There are a few little things left to do, but we can't do without them!
My cellar has emptied out fast recently. It's time to fill it with some new supplies.
Somehow I lost something important to me. Could you please help me find it?
I have a special task for you.
The next sample won’t be easy to find.
I’m so glad I met you! I really need your help.
Hmm… You say you know what to do next?
I need your help.
Could you help me find something?
What are your plans for the day? I need to ask you about something.
Today is a great day! Will you keep me company?
Excuse me, I’m looking for an item right now… Where could it have gotten to?
Enemies have attacked the city! We must protect the townspeople and fight back against our enemy. Hurry, to arms!
There isn’t much time! We need to start the search right away!
We’re on the right path! Let’s keep looking!
I’m so glad you decided to keep me company.
Can I rely on you in this matter?
I know you can be trusted.
They say you get along great with animals. I could use your help.
It’s time to stock up on food supplies.
Good deeds sometimes have a certain price.
Let’s stock up on resources.
Nimiru has provided some gold to help with expanding the field! I know just what to do with it.
It's your turn to go out on patrol today. Be careful – there have been dangers on the city's streets recently!
Have you seen this item anywhere, by any chance?
I have so much to do that I don’t even know where to start…
There's a lot of work to do today, and I'm going to need a good helper. It's all on you!
It's time to make lunch, but I'm missing a few ingredients. Hurry and fetch them!
I'm missing an important ingredient I need to give my potion the necessary effect. Hurry and find it!
You get along great with animals, and that's not a gift everyone can boast of. Can you help catch something? I can't do it without you.
You can understand the meaning of old texts and ancient images easily. Can you help me figure this one out?
Mysterious diagram
Collect all the diagram's parts to decipher the mystery of the Ancients…
Collected: %d/%d
Mysterious diagrams:
%d/%d
A mysterious structure towers in the North. If you restore it, the veil concealing the secrets of the past might be lifted.
None know how long ago the fog appeared above the city, but one thing is certain – it hides many secrets…
None know how long ago the fog appeared above the City. What are the ruins it hides and what secret lies within them..? The day will come when these questions are answered.
Those who settled these lands many centuries ago tried to hide the traces of their presence from prying eyes… But the day will come when the Ancients reveal their secrets to us!
A mysterious structure jutting out of the fog in the North. If you can restore it, it might reveal the secrets of the past.
Nobody knows how old these runes are. What mystery do they conceal? A day will come when all the answers will be revealed.
Hey, look! It's [1]an ancient design[1]. If we collect all the pieces, we can use it [2]to rebuild the gate![2]

Golden runes:
We’re unable to access the event data right now. Connect to the internet and await the results!
Because of your efforts, we successfully returned many stars to the sky and the trouble has been dealt with.
Congratulations! Because of your efforts, the community returned all fallen stars to the sky! The sailors, farmers, and tribespeople thank you for bringing light back to the city.
Starfall
To join the community in a hunt for the fallen stars, Collect [1] 10 stars [1] and earn a special gift!
Create matches next to stars to collect them, and complete the level to keep them!
Play with friends
Getting friends’ results…
Thank you to the entire Cradle of Empires community for aiding Bastet in her mission.
The community was able to return all fallen stars back to the sky!
Collect and contribute as many fallen stars as you can to help the community meet the goal!
Collect [1]10 stars[1] to join the community event and earn the first [2]gift[2].
Do your part to help the Cradle of Empires community collect all %s fallen stars and you’ll receive a valuable prize!
A reward awaits you!
Gift %d
Collect [1]%d[1] more stars and receive a gift:
Collect stars in Match-3 levels and combine them into constellations. Return them to the sky for amazing rewards!
Work together with the community to collect all the fallen stars and you’ll get a piece of the final prize.
Community Goal:
How to collect fallen stars:
This time, Menes' mischief has caused the stars to fall. Collect the fallen stars in three-in-a-row levels and return them to the sky to get valuable gifts.
Ensure your device is connected to the internet to see the results of the Starfall event.
You won’t be able to help the community achieve its goal until you’re connected to the internet.
Something’s wrong!
Player List
It’s a fallen star. Bastet can help you return it to the sky.
Star
Look there… it’s one of the fallen stars we’ve been searching for!
Make a match next to the star to collect it.
Several fallen stars may appear in each level. Take your time to ensure that you collect them all!
Wonderful! I’ll take the stars you’ve collected and return them to their rightful place in the sky.
We’ve come too far to stop now! Continue collecting stars and you’ll earn valuable rewards.
Press the “Play” button to advance to the next level and continue hunting for stars.
You’ve collected the first constellation! Now, accept this gift as a token of my gratitude.
In addition to this gift, you’re invited to join the rest of the community in the search for the fallen stars.
You must connect your device to the internet in order to join the community in the search for fallen stars.
You may now join other players and work toward reaching the community goal!
As a community, players must collect 145,000,000 fallen stars.
Should the goal is reached, each player in the community will be rewarded for their efforts.
We may be victorious, but we can’t lower our guard. Menes is still out there, and we can’t be sure what insidious plans he may have for us next.
Thank you for coming to my aid. I couldn’t have collected all those stars without you!
Don't worry, our efforts were not in vain. We successfully returned many fallen stars to the sky, but unfortunately, we didn't retrieve all of them.
Congratulations! The community worked together, and we’ve successfully restored the fallen stars to the sky.
The people of this city go about their lives without a care in the world. It’s clear they have forgotten their true master!
Such impudence will not go unpunished. The city’s disobedience and defiance will be its own undoing!
The tribespeople need a reminder of the Great Lord Amrun’s power… I’ll take their precious stars and pull them right from the sky!
Menes may have failed to leave us in eternal darkness, but he will surely try again. We must stay on our guard.
Thank you for your help in restoring the stars. I will take my leave, but I won’t go far in case Menes should return.
The tribespeople have grown complacent, feeling safe inside the city. It’s time to strike some fear into their hearts!
Once more I’ll pluck their stars from the sky, and they will tremble at my power.
Let them cower in fear as they suffer the wrath of the Great Lord Amrun!
Menes has returned, and once more he’s used his dark magic to pull the stars from the heavens!
You know what to do… search for the fallen stars while I attempt to stop Menes from doing any further damage.
Together we will foil his evil plans!
Can you believe it? Menes made good on his threats and pulled our stars from the sky!
Without the stars in their rightful place, sailors will be lost to the waters, farmers won’t know when to plant their crops, and our tribespeople will come to fear the dark!
We must find the fallen stars and return them to the sky. Hurry… we have to act fast before the starlight is extinguished and the celestial bodies are lost forever.
Your Contributions
In response to numerous requests from users, we’ve decided to repeat an event that lets you play more often and for longer!

During the Days of Plenty celebration, [1]energy is turned into pumpkins[1]. Pumpkins [2]restore more quickly[2] than energy. [3]The entry cost[3] to game levels is [4]reduced[4]. Now you can spend more time with Cradle of Empires!
The event lasts until [1]November 17[1]. When the Days of Plenty end, the game returns to normal. Have fun and happy holiday!
