Ha ha! Nimiru, is he the Chosen?
So, the citizens are attempting to rebuild? Even they cannot stop Amrun's plans!
Your naivety surprises me. You're a grown up kid that still believes in tales. Do you still hope to save this city?
Great job, Master! Now we have protection from the High Priest's magic. So we can rest a bit and reflect on our plans.
We can begin the city's restoration, but our food supplies are low. Let us find [1]seeds[1] and replant the field.
I saw Nimiru heading to the river in search of a rare flower. Let's help her find it!
I saw seeds somewhere in the hut… Let's find them!
The number of moves in each level is limited.
Gather what's left of your tribe and leave the city at once, or your people will join us… whether they want to or not.
It was Menes, one of the Amrun's priests. I think he will cause a lot of trouble. We'd better not waste our time!
I can’t believe our high priest would harm his own people! What has changed in Menes’ heart?
The priests of Egypt worship the evil spirits! Soon their era will come to an end! The prophecy will come true and Amrun won't be able to do anything about it!
You'll get nowhere! Your pitiful attempts make me laugh… Well, Chosen, I am Menes. Glad to meet you.
This is your only warning. Next time, my master will not be so generous, and even I cannot save you.
Amrun's High Priest will soon learn we've started building the city and will do everything to stop us. Let's hurry!
We'll [1]need resources[1] if we want to restore the city.
To resist the magic of the High Priest, we need a strong amulet. Let me show you how to find it and teach you a couple of tricks.
We need resources to rebuild the city. First and foremost, [1]gold[1]! Come and I'll show you how to get some!
We need resources to rebuild the city. Come and I'll show you how to get some!
Each building gives you resources. Resources can be gold, food or supplies.
To find the item, you must complete the level where it's located. Let's find the amulet!
Beat the level [1]to find the seeds[1]. Tap the level to find them!
[1]Let's get[1] a little [2]gold[2]!
Amrun is very powerful! He'll kill everyone if you don't stop the revolt!
Tap the button to see all the Collections!
Complete the collection!
Here you can review the [1]items[1] you’ve found. Each of them belongs to a specific [2]collection[2].
Once you've found everything in a given collection, you can assemble it to get a reward.
It’s time to [1]assemble[1] the First Harvest collection.
Help me! The priests of Amrun are|following me. I owe them money, but the|goods spoiled and I lost everything!
Sure! We need an experienced tradesman!
Thank you! I will serve faithfully!|First, I need to pay a debt.
I've been wandering in the desert for a long time, but the wind whispered in my ear that it's time to come back home! I heard you need to plant seeds, yes?
Для этого дела вам не найти никого лучше меня! Я - земледелец в седьмом поколении и с удовольствием возьмусь за эту работу!
I'm a seventh generation Farmer and would like to take care of that!
Greetings… I used to be a farmer, I will volunteer to replant the fields, if you'd like.
Praise the gods! We really need them! We also need someone who knows farming.
Bless you, Farmer. We have a visitor from a distant land who will aid you in this endeavor.
Apart from resources, you can find other|useful things in the buildings. For|example, you can find various|cooking utensils.
Apart from resources, you can find other useful things in the buildings. For example, you can get various cooking utensils.
Complete the level to find the kettle!
Do you think the new Sepat will have enough room for the children, Lady?
It's wonderful, Potter! To see the children smile has been a blessing! Thank you for helping, despite your injuries.
It's barely a scratch. Keep those children safe. We don't know if and when Menes might return.
3D Touch outside the border of a match-3 level hides all chips.
3D Touch on match-3 obstacles shows a hint about how to remove it.
Learn more about the [1]3D TOUCH[1] function [2]in settings[2].
I'm still in shock that our own high priest would attack our beautiful city. What is the world coming to?
%s Mode
Attention!|You've unlocked %s mode.
Break all the tiles before time runs out.
Move the torch around the screen to find possible moves.
All the chips became colorless.
Skulls hamper your progress. When matched, add more tiles to the field.
Match chips with the clock icon to earn more time to complete the level.
%s
Attention!|There is a new obstacle on the level: %s.
Break the rope by matching the chips underneath.
Break the box by matching the tiles next to it.
The wall doesn't let you swap the chips.
Destroy the grass by matching the tiles next to it.
Break the slab by matching a vertical row of tiles above it.
Break the scarecrow by matching tiles next to it two times in a row. If you don't break it at once, it'll be restored within a couple of moves.
To break the ice, first match chips next to it and then match chips over the already broken ice cell.
To break crystals, first make a three-in-a-row next to it and then another three-in-a-row with the broken cell with the crystal.
Match the chips over the double tile twice to destroy them.
Swap the tiles to make a match-3.
Some tiles have tablets underneath.
These tokens are on puzzle cells.
You can find these tokens in puzzle squares.
Match chips over the tiles to destroy them.
Make a three-in-a-row above them to break the tiles and beat the level.
Collect [1]3 identical chips[1] in a row to break the blue cells.
Break all the tiles before you run out of moves.
Break all the [1]blue cells[1] to complete the level!
Match five chips in one move to get a special chip.
Let me teach you a couple of other tricks. [1]Make a match-5[1] to get a bomb chip.
Keep collecting identical chips in the [1]blue cells[1].
Make a match with this chip [1]to activate[1] it.
Great! Create special chips and activate them to complete the level faster!
Bonuses also help you beat the levels faster!

You can use bonuses on levels to break obstacles. Drag and drop the Hammer bonus over the tile you want to break. To make sure you're on the right tile, verify the selected tile's background color changes.
Great! You can always buy bonuses while playing a level or in the shop.
When matched, some tiles give you resources.
Some tiles bring you resources. Match three in a row to collect these bronze coins.
These bronze coins get you gold. Make a three-in-a-row to collect them.
These [1]coins get[1] you [2]gold[2]. Make a three-in-a-row to collect them.
This counter shows the amount of resources you've collected on this level. Complete the level to get your earnings!
Here you can see how much gold you've collected so far. [1]Beat the level[1] and it's all yours!
You get resources and experience for successfully completing the level.
Hurray! You beat the level and get a reward: gold and experience.
Here's the amulet! You got lucky this time. Note that not all the items will be found on the first attempt.
It didn’t take you long to find the seeds. Good work!
An autumn celebration is starting in the city! The residents are celebrating the season of plenty and prosperity!
Look! Your [1]energy[1] has turned into [2]pumpkins[2]! And that’s good news. Pumpkins restore faster! [3]Tap[3] to learn more.
If you run out of pumpkins, you can always restore them using [1]pumpkin elixirs[1]. They’re just like energy elixirs!
All the energy elixirs in your inventory have been transformed into pumpkin elixirs. You can use them whenever you want!
But that isn’t all the good news! Let me show you something interesting.
The entry cost for [1]all levels is 10 pumpkins[1]! Now you can play more often and for longer!
The celebration lasts [1]until November 17[1]. When the Days of Plenty end, all pumpkins turn back into energy.
Don’t miss your chance to take part in the event! Have fun playing and happy holidays!
The bull moves in the direction of a three-in-a-row combo. Knock down apples using the bull to complete the level.
The Bull and the apple Tree
Great! Now you can always bring your Empire into the real world!
Augmented Reality
Use the augmented reality technology on your device’s camera and bring your Empire into the real world.
Use your device’s camera and bring your Empire into the real world.
Bone spikes block the chip after a move. Be patient and you will be able to destroy the bone block when it is open.
You did great! Good luck! Take a small set of bonuses so you can get used to the changes in full!
Congratulations! [1]Bonuses are available[1] now!
To break the box, [1]drag[1] the Hammer to it and [2]drop[2] the bonus.
Use bonuses in difficult situations.
Wow! You're doing great! If things get difficult, [1]try the other bonuses[1]. I'm sure you'll like them!
[1]Choose the Hammer[1] to activate the bonus.
[1]Tap the box[1] to break it with the bonus.
All that remains is to [1]confirm[1] use of the bonus.
If things get difficult, [1]try the other bonuses[1], I'm sure you'll like them!
Boxes constantly appear in front of the wooden obelisk until they fill the whole line.
Make three in a row opposite the red roof to smash the barrel.
Grass constantly grows around the Bush.| The Bush cannot be destroyed.
To grow peonies, make a three-in-a-row combo next to the flower bed. Collect flowers to complete the level.
Peony bush
You can only destroy a muffin from one side. To remove the muffin, make a three-in-a-row next to a cherry.
The building doesn’t always have the mode you need. To change the mode, complete any level in the building or throw the mode dice.
Free!
Modes change [1]randomly[1]. If you don’t get the mode you need, [2]try your luck[2] again!
To put out fires or coals, make three in a row next to them. Careful! Smoldering coals can flare up again!
Every trade in Egypt has its own god.
Build its statue and get a bonus to the corresponding building!
To dig up a nugget, make a three-in-a-row combo with it. Collect nuggets to complete the level.
Don’t miss game [1]events[1]! Use [2]Drag&Drop[2] and add reminders to your [3]calendar[3].
Press and hold the event [1]icon[1].
Holding the [1]“Add to Calendar”[1] event icon, tap the [2]“Home”[2] button and drag the icon to your calendar.
The aim of this level is to drop all the special items down to the bottom. Make a three-in-a-row combo so that each item ends up in a lower cell.
The new aim of this level is to drop all the special items down to the bottom. Make a three-in-a-row combo so that each item ends up in a lower cell.
To break a dune, first match chips next to it and then match chips over the cell underneath the sand.
To break the Old Box, make a three-in-a-row next to it. |Attention: these boxes drop down.
The aim of this level is to fill the entire field with pumpkins. Match three pumpkin cells in a row to turn all the ordinary cells in the row into pumpkin cells.
Congratulations!|You've completed your training!|You're now ready to build the city|on your own. Good luck!
A firework can help you complete the level. To activate a firework, make a three-in-a-row combo next to it.
Firework
Beehive
To break a beehive, make three-in-a-row next to it twice. Be careful; beehives drop from above, but they can be moved like chips.
Excellent! Learn more about the Gestures function in settings.
Gesture Controls
Use gestures to perform certain in-game actions much faster! Try closing any game dialog by shaking your device.
Use gestures to perform certain in-game actions much faster! Try closing any quest dialog by shaking your device.
Learn more about the Gestures function in settings.
Learn more about the [1]Gestures[1] function [2]in settings[2].
In match-3 levels, you can pause and unpause the game by shaking the device.
Swipe with two fingers to instantly take all items lying on the City map.
You can collect all taxes from resource structures by shaking the device.
To settings
You can close most game dialogs by shaking the device.
To open the gift box, make a three-in-a-row next to it three times. If you don't open the gift box right away, it will close again a few moves later.
Oh my heavens, you're the man in the prophecy! Take these gifts as the symbol of our acceptance. From now on my people will always follow you.
The Genie has hidden several Easter eggs under the grass. Find all the hidden eggs to complete the level.
Haptic Feedback
Haptic feedback works in match-3 levels when you finish your moves, when you apply bonuses and when you make super combos.
You can [1]disable[1] this function in game settings in the [2]“Additional Settings”[2] window.
It's time to [1]upgrade[1] the Hut!
Once you've collected all the stars, you can upgrade the building to the next level!
Greetings! There have been some recent changes in the city.
Your [1]Collections[1] are now found here.
Nearby are the [1]Settings[1], with the latest [2]Game News[2].
The [1]Friends[1] window is on the right.
The [1]Shop and Inventory[1] are now in one place. Tap to learn more.
The [1]Shop[1] is on the first tab.
To see your [1]Inventory[1], switch to the second tab.
To break ice, first make a three-in-a-row next to it or a three-in-a-row with a chip below it.
Ice constantly appears in front of the ice obelisk until it fills the whole line.
The Ice Mushroom gets angry as it grows. Destroy it by making a three-in-a-row next to it, otherwise it will freeze the surrounding cells.
Finally, all the attributes have been gathered! [1]Let's build the idol[1].
My [1]idol is ready![1] Hurray! [2]Let's start it[2] right away!
Here, you can see all the idol's [1]characteristics[1] and [2]a description of its effect[2].
[1]Press[1] "activate" [2]to get my help![2]
[1]The idol is active![1] Hurry, I can't wait to [2]use its power![2]
While the idol is active, you will receive my help. But even a goddess's power has limits.
While the [1]idol is active[1], you will receive my [2]help[2]. But even a goddess's power has limits.
[1]The idol's effect won't last forever![1][2] [2]Use its power wisely.
To remove the jelly, make a three-in-a-row next to it. The jelly constantly pours out of the jar, and the jar can't be destroyed!

To break the bottle of liquid fire, make a three-in-a-row next to it. |Attention: bottles drop from the top and they must be destroyed before the counter reaches 0, otherwise the level will be failed!
To break Menes’s bomb, make a three-in-a-row next to it. |Attention: bombs may drop from the top and they must be destroyed before the counter reaches 0, otherwise the level will be failed!
Make three keys in a row to unlock the nearest chest.
To destroy the mask, match three in a row next to it three times.
To destroy Menes's heart, make a three-in-a-row next to it. The obstacle must be destroyed before [1]the counter drops to 0[1], or the level will be [2]failed[2]!
The thieving mouse isn't afraid of three-in-a-row combinations. Clear the field from the grass, and it'll have nowhere to hide.
Either you destroy the mummy or the mummy will explode and destroy the golden tiles around itself.
To destroy a mummy, match three-in-a-row next to it. Destroy the mummy or it will explode and make tiles around itself.
You've unlocked mode
I’ll look after the city in your absence and tell you about any important events. Don’t forget to switch on notifications in your device settings.
To destroy the nets, complete the requirements indicated inside the special blocks.
The bull calf will eat the apples if you send it! Collect chips nearby, and it will run in that direction!
Break the barrel by combining chips next to its ceiling or bottom.
Buzzz! Clear the hives from the field by making combos next to them.
Make a combo with the thorny chips. But wait for|the thorns to open!
Each move, the float moves one cell upwards. To collect the floats, make combinations of fish of a single color with the float. Good luck fishing!
Float
Break the crates by making a chips combo next to them.
The obelisk places boxes in the row|every move.
To tie off a Button, make a combo of same-color chips with it. The removed Button can be moved across the field.
Button
See the cherry? Great! Collect the chips around it, and the delicious muffin is yours!
Fire! Hurry and put out the coals! Collect nearby chips before you have to flood everything!
To lift the curtain, make match-3 combos next to it.
Curtain
It’s a gold rush! Find gold nuggets in the ground: collect chips nearby|and find gold!
Lower the items to the receiving cells.
See those chips in the sand? Make a combo with them!
Take care! That box could fall on your head! Just collect chips nearby.
Light the big firework, a couple of combos next to it will be enough!
Only the most stubborn are worthy of gifts! Collect chips next to it until it opens up!
Make a three-in-a-row with a golden tablet, and it'll paint adjacent cells gold.
Golden Tablet
Grass grows around the bush every move.
Clear the growing grass by making combos next to it.
Crack the ice by making a combo next to it.
Show off your jewelry work! Make a combo with the chip in the crystal or next to it.
The obelisk freezes nearby chips every move.
Make a combo of chips next to the mushroom if you don’t want to see|an ice show!
To make an idol statue, make a three-in-a-row combo next to a wood workpiece.
Idol Statue
Too sweet! Collect the chips next to the jam before you have|to visit the dentist!
Collect chips next to the bomb before the counter reaches zero, otherwise the level is lost!
Opening a chest is easy. All you have to do is collect some keys in a row!
A mask parade! Collect chips nearby and enlarge your collection of guises!
Need to chase away the mice? Piece of cake! Clear all the grass from the field – just collect the chips on the grass!
Boo! The evil mummy is frightened of the chips collected around it… and it loves to snack on golden cells!
Boo! The evil mummy is frightened of the chips collected around it… and it loves to play with puzzle tiles!
Complete the quests shown on the nets to remove them.
Who knows what you can find under your feet? Collect chips on the ground and you might find treasure!
Collect chips in a row next to the flask, show who’s the best perfumer!
The plate will be destroyed if you make a vertical combo over it.
Плита разрушится, если на ней составить вертикальную комбинацию.
Chips that fall into the teleporter come out|of the other one.
The river has a flow along which it moves chips each turn.
A stick of dynamite with puzzle tiles is no joke! Make a combo nearby before|it explodes!
Untie the ropes by matching the tied-up chip.
Collect chips next to the bush to grow beautiful flowers!
Clear the mannequins by making combos next to them.
Easy as pie! Collect chips on puzzle tiles!
Everything is covered in a spiderweb! But don’t worry, a couple of combos next to it, and it’ll all be cleared up!
You won’t break this pebble so easily. But a bomb chip can do it! Just bring it closer. Boom!
Chase away the storm clouds by collecting chips near them!
Easy as pie! Collect chips on puzzle tiles!
Relax, the thorns will disappear on their own, just don’t collect the chips next to them!
The pole will be destroyed if you make a vertical combo on it.
Time for puzzles! Restore the mechanism: collect the nearby chips and|rotate its parts!
Menes is a master of fire. But you’re stronger! Just collect chips near the fire!
We need something more helpful for this plate! Make a bomb chip and blow up|the nearby plate!
You can’t move chips across the walls, but you can make combos across them!
Once the basket becomes full with wool, it will entangle several chips on the field. To free a chip, make a chip combo next to it.
Basket of Wool
To collect a drop of perfume, make a three-in-a-row combo next to the bottle. Collect drops of perfume to complete the level.
Bottle of perfume
When the tiles get to the teleporter, they appear on another part of the board.
To break a pumpkin, match three next to it. If you don't destroy the pumpkin in time, it will burst and spread seeds.
Every move, the Nile moves the rafts with the current.
To break a firework, match chips next to it.|Attention! Keep an eye on the counter – if it reaches zero, the firework will explode and scatter tiles everywhere!
To destroy the spiderweb, make a three-in-a-row next to it. The spider is weaving the web and it can’t be destroyed!
You can only shatter the cobblestone with bonuses and bomb chips. When the cobblestone cracks, break it with a three-in-a-row combination.
To destroy the threatening stormcloud, make a three-in-a-row next to each of its cells. The threatening stormcloud won't disappear until each of its cells turns into a white cloud.
I see that looking for items is your calling. So I would like to tell you about [1]rare collections[1].
Let's have a look at them.
[1]Tap the tab[1] to go to Rare collections.
This is the [1]final item[1] of the rare collections.
You can get it by assembling the [1]required collections[1].
You'll [1]need chargers[1] too. You can find them in buildings or buy them for crystals.
Assembling a rare collection gives a [1]worthy reward[1]. Good luck assembling them!
I see that looking for items is your calling. So I would like to tell you about [1]rare collections[1]. Let's have a look at them.
To break the triple tile, make a three-in-a-row combination over it three times.

Each small thorn will gradually change into a dangerous thorn, then into a withered thorn, after it dies. Putting three similar thorns in a row will destroy them, but dangerous thorns will blow up instead and scatter new small thorns in all directions.
To break the totem pole, make a vertical three-in-a-row above it.
Assemble the correct tablet pattern to destroy the obstacle. Make a three-in-a-row combo next to the mechanism parts to put them in the correct position.
Revolving Mechanisms
To put out Menes's fire, make a three-in-a-row combo next to it. If you don't put out the fire in time, three new cells will start to burn.
Menes's Fire
Strong plates are hard to break – only bonuses and bomb tiles can manage it.
Strong tiles are hard to break – only bonuses and bomb chips can manage it. But the tile can be swapped with the neighboring chip if that chip is in a three-in-a-row combination.
You can only break a muffin from one side. To do this, make a three-in-a-row next to a heart.
To deal with the muffin, make a three-in-a-row combo next to the heart.
Match three key chips in a row to unlock the nearest chest.
I have great news! [1]VIP statuses[1] are now available to you!
Open the Crystal Bank and I’ll tell you more about [1]VIP status[1].
Open the Crystal Bank and I’ll tell you more about|[1]VIP statuses[1].
When you buy crystals at the bank, you’ll get an extra bonus – [1]VIP tokens[1].
When you buy crystals at the bank, you’ll get an extra bonus – [1]VIP Tokens[1].
That’s great, because VIP Tokens fill your [1]progress bar[1] for [2]raising your VIP status[2].
You can raise your [1]VIP status[1] level with VIP Tokens.
Now for the fun part! Let’s learn about the [1]benefits[1] that [2]VIP statuses[2] provide!
Each VIP status provides [1]benefits and rewards[1], which help you make progress faster.
Every level of [1]VIP status[1] gives you valuable benefits and rewards.
Let’s take a look at your initial VIP status.
This is your [1]current VIP status[1]. Your benefits and rewards are displayed here.
As you can see, you can already claim a [1]daily reward[1].
Raise your [1]VIP status level[1] and get a reward and new benefits!
Raise your [1]VIP status level[1] and get more rewards and new benefits!
Have fun playing!

Lollipops

Every holiday leaves a pleasant warmth in our hearts, especially Valentine's Day!
It'll be much easier to start new adventures with all this good cheer! So many discoveries and achievements await us!
The most amazing feeling is to love and be loved! That's precisely why it's so exciting to make surprises and gifts for Valentine's Day!
The citizens have already begun preparing for the celebration of love! There's no time to waste. Let's follow their lead!

We love you!|Thank you for giving your time to our game! Without you, there would be no Cradle of Empires! We wish you love and happiness on this holiday and for the whole year ahead. Internet hugs and we hope to get some back!
The Cradle of Empires team
Romantic Evening
Gift
Hurray! We assembled all the collections and managed to make all 3 recipes! Thanks for the help and happy Valentine's Day!
Preparing for Valentine's Day
Let's make something special for the holiday! Assemble all 3 collections. In exchange for your help, you'll get valuable gifts!

␣Beautiful multicolored paper or bright felt is suitable for a Valentine. Make a template out of thick paper and cut some blanks out of it.|␣Then, on the reverse side of one "heart," add some glue, attach a stick and fix the second blank on top of it. Leave it to dry.|␣Now you need to unfold the edge of the candy wrapper, place inside the heart with the stick and fold the wrapper again. These Valentines can be decorated with sequins and ribbons. You can also write a greeting on them for the one you want to give your heart to.
heart template
paper templates
glue
sticks
tasty candies
Valentine Candies recipe

␣Mash the strawberries and mix them into a consistent puree. Add the gelatin and leave it to set for 10 minutes. Then add the lemon juice, crushed mint, and powdered sugar to taste.|␣Heat on a low flame until the sugar and gelatin dissolve. Leave the mixture to cool, then whisk it well. Cover a square mold with food wrap. Pour in the mixture and leave it in the fridge until fully set.|␣Put the set soufflé on a board and carefully remove the wrap. Cut the strawberry clouds into squares. The soft and healthy treat is ready!
300g strawberries
10g gelatin
140g powdered sugar
lemon juice
mint leaves
Strawberry Clouds recipe

␣Grease a cake tray with butter, add 1/4 of a glass of sugar and put in the strawberries. Mix the dry ingredients – the flour, salt, soda, and vanilla. In another bowl, whisk the butter, sour cream, eggs, and remaining sugar. Now knead half of the liquid mass into the dry mass, add the butter, then add the second half and the strawberry puree. Mix it all up well. Put the dough in a mold, bake it at 180 degrees for 25 minutes.|␣In the meantime, make the Cupid's Arrow. To do this, put two strawberries on toothpicks. Take your cake, place the strawberries on the dish above, sprinkle on some powdered sugar, and stick in the toothpicks from both sides. The cake is ready!
strawberries
200g sugar
200g flour
1/2 tsp salt
1/2 tsp soda
30g butter
80g sour cream
2 eggs
Cupid's Arrow Cake recipe

Hooray! I can’t believe it! We managed to collect the right number of these rare stones! I have everything ready. All that’s left is to arrange the stones like in the sketch!
The necklace is exquisite! It’s worthy of Cleopatra herself! Thank you, without you I couldn’t have done it.

Blue Sapphire
Tabia needs them to make jewelry.
Collect another %d
Help Tabia collect the right number of Blue Sapphires and get a reward.
Complete difficult levels where Blue Sapphires lie. Blue Sapphires drop on first attempt. Collect all the stones for Tabia and a valuable reward is yours!
Hi, it's me again, Tabia! Do you remember me? I am that jeweler who loves making all kinds of adornments!
Take a look at the sketch I've drawn this time. I'm sure the adornment will turn out absolutely gorgeous!
But to make everything work, I need Blue Sapphires… Yes, they are indeed Cleopatra's favorite stones!
It would be awesome if you and I managed to collect some Blue Sapphires! I would make an adornment out of them, and you would get a rare collection charger.
Hi! My name is Tabia. I’m a jeweler. Making jewelry isn’t just my profession, it’s my passion!
I love my craft so much that ideas come to me at the most unexpected moments. That’s why I always keep a scroll and pencil close at hand.
Look at this sketch! The idea came to me in a dream! It’s a good thing I had time to finish the sketch. Ideas that come from dreams are hard to hold on to…
Only Blue Sapphires will work for this jewelry! The Blue Sapphire is a very rare stone!
They say Cleopatra herself loved this stone and believed the crystal could protect you from harm, sharpen your intuition, and make you kind and wise.
Help me collect the right number of Blue Sapphires and I’ll give you this rare collection charger.
Help Tabia make jewelry and get a rare charger|as a reward.
